analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa
yuddha kāṇḍa
śrutvā hanumataḥ vākyam yathāvat abhibhāṣitam
rāmaḥ prīti samāyuktaḥ vākyam uttaram abravīt

original: 6.001.002a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ sumahad bhuvi duṣkaram
analyzed: kṛtam hanumatā kāryam su mahat bhuvi duṣkaram

original: 6.001.002c manasāpi yad anyena na śakyaṃ dharaṇītale
analyzed: manasā api yat anyena na śakyam dharaṇī tale

original: 6.001.003a na hi taṃ paripaśyāmi yas tareta mahārṇavam
analyzed: na hi tam paripaśyāmi yaḥ tareta mahā arṇavam

original: 6.001.003c anyatra garuṇād vāyor anyatra ca hanūmataḥ
analyzed: anyatra garuṇāt vāyoḥ anyatra ca hanūmataḥ
deva dānava yakṣāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām
apradhṛṣyām purīm laṅkām rāvaṇena su rakṣitām

original: 6.001.005a praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan ko nāma niṣkramet
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan kaḥ nāma niṣkramet

original: 6.001.005c ko viśet sudurādharṣāṃ rākṣasaiś ca surakṣitām
analyzed: kaḥ viśet su durādharṣām rākṣasaiḥ ca su rakṣitām

original: 6.001.005e yo vīryabalasaṃpanno na samaḥ syād dhanūmataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vīrya bala saṃpannaḥ na samaḥ syāt dhanūmataḥ
bhṛtya kāryam hanumatā sugrīvasya kṛtam mahat

original: 6.001.006c evaṃ vidhāya svabalaṃ sadṛśaṃ vikramasya ca
analyzed: evam vidhāya sva balam sadṛśam vikramasya ca

original: 6.001.007a yo hi bhṛtyo niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhṛtyaḥ niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare
kuryāt tad anurāgeṇa tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam

original: 6.001.008a niyukto nṛpateḥ kāryaṃ na kuryād yaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: niyuktaḥ nṛpateḥ kāryam na kuryāt yaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: 6.001.008c bhṛtyo yuktaḥ samarthaś ca tam āhuḥ puruṣādhamam
analyzed: bhṛtyaḥ yuktaḥ samarthaḥ ca tam āhuḥ puruṣa adhamam
tad niyoge niyuktena kṛtam kṛtyam hanūmatā

original: 6.001.009c na cātmā laghutāṃ nītaḥ sugrīvaś cāpi toṣitaḥ
analyzed: na ca ātmā laghu tām nītaḥ sugrīvaḥ ca api toṣitaḥ

original: 6.001.010a ahaṃ ca raghuvaṃśaś ca lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: aham ca raghu vaṃśaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ
vaidehyāḥ darśanena adya dharmataḥ parirakṣitāḥ

original: 6.001.011a idaṃ tu mama dīnasyā mano bhūyaḥ prakarṣati
analyzed: idam tu mama dīnasyāḥ manaḥ bhūyas prakarṣati

original: 6.001.011c yad ihāsya priyākhyātur na kurmi sadṛśaṃ priyam
analyzed: yat iha asya priya ākhyātuḥ na kurmi sadṛśam priyam
eṣa sarva sva bhūtaḥ tu pariṣvaṅgaḥ hanūmataḥ

original: 6.001.012c mayā kālam imaṃ prāpya dattas tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: mayā kālam imam prāpya dattaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
sarvathā su kṛtam tāvat sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam

original: 6.001.013c sāgaraṃ tu samāsādya punar naṣṭaṃ mano mama
analyzed: sāgaram tu samāsādya punar naṣṭam manaḥ mama
katham nāma samudrasya duṣpārasya mahā ambhasaḥ
harayaḥ dakṣiṇam pāram gamiṣyanti samāhitāḥ

original: 6.001.015a yady apy eṣa tu vṛttānto vaidehyā gadito mama
analyzed: yadi api eṣa tu vṛttāntaḥ vaidehyāḥ gaditaḥ mama
samudra pāra gamane harīṇām kim iva uttaram
iti uktvā śoka saṃbhrāntaḥ rāmaḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
hanūmantam mahā bāhuḥ tatas dhyānam upāgamat
tam tu śoka paridyūnam rāmam daśaratha ātmajam
uvāca vacanam śrīmān sugrīvaḥ śoka nāśanam

original: 6.002.002a kiṃ tvaṃ saṃtapyase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
analyzed: kim tvam saṃtapyase vīra yathā anyaḥ prākṛtaḥ tathā

original: 6.002.002c maivaṃ bhūs tyaja saṃtāpaṃ kṛtaghna iva sauhṛdam
analyzed: mā evam bhūḥ tyaja saṃtāpam kṛtaghnaḥ iva sauhṛdam

original: 6.002.003a saṃtāpasya ca te sthānaṃ na hi paśyāmi rāghava
analyzed: saṃtāpasya ca te sthānam na hi paśyāmi rāghava

original: 6.002.003c pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ
analyzed: pravṛttau upalabdhāyām jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ

original: 6.002.004a dhṛtimāñ śāstravit prājñaḥ paṇḍitaś cāsi rāghava
analyzed: dhṛtimān śāstra vid prājñaḥ paṇḍitaḥ ca asi rāghava
tyaja imām pāpikām buddhim kṛtvā ātmā iva artha dūṣaṇīm
samudram laṅghayitvā tu mahā nakra samākulam

original: 6.002.005c laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmo haniṣyāmaś ca te ripum
analyzed: laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmaḥ haniṣyāmaḥ ca te ripum
nirutsāhasya dīnasya śoka paryākula ātmanaḥ
sarva arthāḥ vyavasīdanti vyasanam ca adhigacchati

original: 6.002.007a ime śūrāḥ samarthāś ca sarve no hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: ime śūrāḥ samarthāḥ ca sarve naḥ hari yūthapāḥ
tvad priya artham kṛta utsāhāḥ praveṣṭum api pāvakam

original: 6.002.008a eṣāṃ harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaś cāsmin dṛḍho mama
analyzed: eṣām harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaḥ ca asmin dṛḍhaḥ mama

original: 6.002.008c vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītāṃ hatvā yathā ripum
analyzed: vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītām hatvā yathā ripum

original: 6.002.009a setur atra yathā vadhyed yathā paśyema tāṃ purīm
analyzed: setuḥ atra yathā vadhyet yathā paśyema tām purīm

original: 6.002.009c tasya rākṣasarājasya tathā tvaṃ kuru rāghava
analyzed: tasya rākṣasa rājasya tathā tvam kuru rāghava

original: 6.002.010a dṛṣṭvā tāṃ hi purīṃ laṅkāṃ trikūṭaśikhare sthitām
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tām hi purīm laṅkām trikūṭa śikhare sthitām

original: 6.002.010c hataṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe darśanād upadhāraya
analyzed: hatam ca rāvaṇam yuddhe darśanāt upadhāraya

original: 6.002.011a setubaddhaḥ samudre ca yāval laṅkā samīpataḥ
analyzed: setu baddhaḥ samudre ca yāvat laṅkā samīpatas

original: 6.002.011c sarvaṃ tīrṇaṃ ca vai sainyaṃ jitam ity upadhāryatām
analyzed: sarvam tīrṇam ca vai sainyam jitam iti upadhāryatām

original: 6.002.012a ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: ime hi samare śūrāḥ harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 6.002.012c tad alaṃ viklavā buddhī rājan sarvārthanāśanī
analyzed: tat alam viklavā buddhiḥ rājan sarva artha nāśanī
puruṣasya hi loke śokaḥ śaurya apakarṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.002.013c yat tu kāryaṃ manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā
analyzed: yat tu kāryam manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā
śūrāṇām hi manuṣyāṇām tvadvidhānām mahātmanām

original: 6.002.014a vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarvārthanāśanaḥ
analyzed: vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarva artha nāśanaḥ
tvam tu buddhimatām śreṣṭhaḥ sarva śāstra artha kovidaḥ

original: 6.002.015a madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham ariṃ jetum ihārhasi
analyzed: madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham arim jetum iha arhasi

original: 6.002.015c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ kaṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi aham kam cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava

original: 6.002.016a gṛhītadhanuṣo yas te tiṣṭhed abhimukho raṇe
analyzed: gṛhīta dhanuṣaḥ yaḥ te tiṣṭhet abhimukhaḥ raṇe

original: 6.002.016c vānareṣu samāsaktaṃ na te kāryaṃ vipatsyate
analyzed: vānareṣu samāsaktam na te kāryam vipatsyate

original: 6.002.017a acirād drakṣyase sītāṃ tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam
analyzed: acirāt drakṣyase sītām tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam

original: 6.002.017c tad alaṃ śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate
analyzed: tat alam śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate

original: 6.002.018a niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyā mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati
analyzed: niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyāḥ mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati
laṅgana artham ca ghorasya samudrasya nadīpateḥ
saha asmābhiḥ iha upetaḥ sūkṣma buddhiḥ vicāraya

original: 6.002.019c ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: ime hi samare śūrāḥ harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
tān arīn vidhamiṣyanti śilā pādapa vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 6.002.020c kathaṃ cit paripaśyāmas te vayaṃ varuṇālayam
analyzed: katham cit paripaśyāmaḥ te vayam varuṇālayam

original: 6.002.021a kim uktvā bahudhā cāpi sarvathā vijayī bhavān
analyzed: kim uktvā bahudhā ca api sarvathā vijayī bhavān
sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat parama artha vid
pratijagrāha kākutsthaḥ hanūmantam atha abravīt
tarasā setu bandhena sāgara ucchoṣaṇena vā
sarvathā su samarthaḥ smi sāgarasya asya laṅghane

original: 6.003.003a kati durgāṇi durgāyā laṅkāyās tad bravīhi me
analyzed: kati durgāṇi durgāyāḥ laṅkāyāḥ tat bravīhi me

original: 6.003.003c jñātum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ darśanād iva vānara
analyzed: jñātum icchāmi tat sarvam darśanāt iva vānara
balasya parimāṇam ca dvāra durga kriyām api

original: 6.003.004c gupti karma ca laṅkāyā rakṣasāṃ sadanāni ca
analyzed: gupti karma ca laṅkāyāḥ rakṣasām sadanāni ca

original: 6.003.005a yathāsukhaṃ yathāvac ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān
analyzed: yathāsukham yathāvat ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān

original: 6.003.005c saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalo hy asi
analyzed: saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalaḥ hi asi
śrutvā rāmasya vacanam hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.003.006c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaṃ punar athābravīt
analyzed: vākyam vākya vidām śreṣṭhaḥ rāmam punar atha abravīt
śrūyatām sarvam ākhyāsye durga karma vidhānataḥ

original: 6.003.007c guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ
analyzed: guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ

original: 6.003.008a parāṃ samṛddhiṃ laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīmatām
analyzed: parām samṛddhim laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīma tām

original: 6.003.008c vibhāgaṃ ca balaughasya nirdeśaṃ vāhanasya ca
analyzed: vibhāgam ca bala oghasya nirdeśam vāhanasya ca
prahṛṣṭā muditā laṅkā matta dvipa samākulā
mahatī ratha saṃpūrṇā rakṣaḥ gaṇa samākulā
dṛḍha baddha kavāṭāni mahā parighavanti ca

original: 6.003.010c dvārāṇi vipulāny asyāś catvāri sumahānti ca
analyzed: dvārāṇi vipulāni asyāḥ catvāri su mahānti ca
vapreṣu upala yantrāṇi balavanti mahānti ca
āgatam para sainyam taiḥ tatra pratinivāryate
dvāreṣu saṃskṛtāḥ bhīmāḥ kālāyasa mayāḥ śitāḥ

original: 6.003.012c śataśo rocitā vīraiḥ śataghnyo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: śataśas rocitāḥ vīraiḥ śataghnyaḥ rakṣasām gaṇaiḥ

original: 6.003.013a sauvarṇaś ca mahāṃs tasyāḥ prākāro duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sauvarṇaḥ ca mahān tasyāḥ prākāraḥ duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
sarvatas ca mahā bhīmāḥ śīta toyāḥ mahā śubhāḥ
agādhāḥ grāhavatyaḥ ca parikhāḥ mīna sevitāḥ
dvāreṣu tāsām catvāraḥ saṃkramāḥ parama āyatāḥ
yantraiḥ upetāḥ bahubhiḥ mahadbhiḥ dṛḍha saṃdhibhiḥ
trāyante saṃkramāḥ tatra para sainya āgame sati
yantraiḥ taiḥ avakīryante parikhāsu samantataḥ

original: 6.003.017a ekas tv akampyo balavān saṃkramaḥ sumahādṛḍhaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ tu akampyaḥ balavān saṃkramaḥ su mahā dṛḍhaḥ

original: 6.003.017c kāñcanair bahubhiḥ stambhair vedikābhiś ca śobhitaḥ
analyzed: kāñcanaiḥ bahubhiḥ stambhaiḥ vedikābhiḥ ca śobhitaḥ
svayam prakṛti saṃpannaḥ yuyutsuḥ rāma rāvaṇaḥ
utthitaḥ ca apramattaḥ ca balānām anudarśane
laṅkā purī nirālambā deva durgā bhaya āvahā

original: 6.003.019c nādeyaṃ pārvataṃ vanyaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca caturvidham
analyzed: nādeyam pārvatam vanyam kṛtrimam ca caturvidham
sthitā pāre samudrasya dūra pārasya rāghava

original: 6.003.020c naupathaś cāpi nāsty atra nirādeśaś ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: naupathaḥ ca api nā asti atra nirādeśaḥ ca sarvatas

original: 6.003.021a śailāgre racitā durgā sā pūr devapuropamā
analyzed: śaila agre racitā durgā sā pūḥ deva pura upamā
vāji vāraṇa saṃpūrṇā laṅkā parama durjayā

original: 6.003.022a parighāś ca śataghnyaś ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: parighāḥ ca śataghnyaḥ ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca
śobhayanti purīm laṅkām rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
ayutam rakṣasām atra paścima dvāram āśritam
śūla hastāḥ durādharṣāḥ sarve khaḍga agra yodhinaḥ
niyutam rakṣasām atra dakṣiṇa dvāram āśritam
caturaṅgeṇa sainyena yodhāḥ tatra api anuttamāḥ
prayutam rakṣasām atra pūrva dvāram samāśritam
carma khaḍga dharāḥ sarve tathā sarva astra kovidāḥ
arbudam rakṣasām atra uttara dvāram āśritam
rathinaḥ ca aśva vāhāḥ ca kula putrāḥ su pūjitāḥ
śatam śata sahasrāṇām madhyamam gulmam āśritam
yātudhānāḥ durādharṣāḥ sāgra koṭiḥ ca rakṣasām

original: 6.003.028a te mayā saṃkramā bhagnāḥ parikhāś cāvapūritāḥ
analyzed: te mayā saṃkramāḥ bhagnāḥ parikhāḥ ca avapūritāḥ

original: 6.003.028c dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāś cāvasāditāḥ
analyzed: dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāḥ ca avasāditāḥ

original: 6.003.029a yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam
analyzed: yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam
hatā iti nagarī laṅkām vānaraiḥ avadhāryatām

original: 6.003.030a aṅgado dvivido maindo jāmbavān panaso nalaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ dvividaḥ maindaḥ jāmbavān panasaḥ nalaḥ

original: 6.003.030c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva balaśeṣeṇa kiṃ tava
analyzed: nīlaḥ senāpatiḥ ca eva bala śeṣeṇa kim tava

original: 6.003.031a plavamānā hi gatvā tāṃ rāvaṇasya mahāpurīm
analyzed: plavamānāḥ hi gatvā tām rāvaṇasya mahā purīm
sa prakārām sa bhavanām ānayiṣyanti maithilīm
evam ājñāpaya kṣipram balānām sarva saṃgraham
muhūrtena tu yuktena prasthānam abhirocaya
śrutvā hanūmataḥ vākyam yathāvat anupūrvaśas
tatas bravīt mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 6.004.002a yāṃ nivedayase laṅkāṃ purīṃ bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: yām nivedayase laṅkām purīm bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.004.002c kṣipram enāṃ vadhiṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
analyzed: kṣipram enām vadhiṣyāmi satyam etat bravīmi te
asmin muhūrte sugrīva prayāṇam abhirocaye

original: 6.004.003c yukto muhūrto vijayaḥ prāpto madhyaṃ divākaraḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ muhūrtaḥ vijayaḥ prāptaḥ madhyam divākaraḥ

original: 6.004.004a uttarā phalgunī hy adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate
analyzed: uttarā phalgunī hi adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate
abhiprayāma sugrīva sarva anīka samāvṛtāḥ

original: 6.004.005a nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me
analyzed: nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me
nihatya rāvaṇam sītām ānayiṣyāmi jānakīm

original: 6.004.006a upariṣṭād dhi nayanaṃ sphuramāṇam idaṃ mama
analyzed: upariṣṭāt hi nayanam sphuramāṇam idam mama
vijayam samanuprāptam śaṃsati iva manoratham

original: 6.004.007a agre yātu balasyāsya nīlo mārgam avekṣitum
analyzed: agre yātu balasya asya nīlaḥ mārgam avekṣitum
vṛtaḥ śata sahasreṇa vānarāṇām tarasvinām
phala mūlavatā nīla śīta kānana vāriṇā

original: 6.004.008c pathā madhumatā cāśu senāṃ senāpate naya
analyzed: pathā madhumatā ca āśu senām senāpate naya
dūṣayeyuḥ durātmānaḥ pathi mūla phala udakam

original: 6.004.009c rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethās tebhyas tvaṃ nityam udyataḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethāḥ tebhyaḥ tvam nityam udyataḥ
nimneṣu vana durgeṣu vaneṣu ca vanaukasaḥ
abhiplutya abhipaśyeyuḥ pareṣām nihatam balam
sāgara ogha nibham bhīmam agra anīkam mahā balāḥ
kapi siṃhā prakarṣantu sahasraśas

original: 6.004.012a gajaś ca girisaṃkāśo gavayaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: gajaḥ ca giri saṃkāśaḥ gavayaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 6.004.012c gavākṣaś cāgrato yāntu gavāṃ dṛptā ivarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: gavākṣaḥ ca agratas yāntu gavām dṛptāḥ iva ṛṣabhāḥ
yātu vānara vāhinyā vānaraḥ plavatām patiḥ
pālayan dakṣiṇam pārśvam ṛṣabhaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
gandhahastī iva durdharṣaḥ tarasvī gandhamādanaḥ
yātu vānara vāhinyāḥ savyam pārśvam adhiṣṭhitaḥ
yāsyāmi bala madhye ham bala ogham abhiharṣayan
adhiruhya hanūmantam airāvatam iva īśvaraḥ
aṅgadena eṣa saṃyātu lakṣmaṇaḥ ca antaka upamaḥ
sārvabhaumeṇa bhūta īśaḥ draviṇādhipatiḥ yathā

original: 6.004.017a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān ca suṣeṇaḥ ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ

original: 6.004.017c ṛkṣarājo mahāsattvaḥ kukṣiṃ rakṣantu te trayaḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣa rājaḥ mahā sattvaḥ kukṣim rakṣantu te trayaḥ
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ
vyādideśa mahā vīryān vānarān vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
te vānara gaṇāḥ sarve samutpatya yuyutsavaḥ

original: 6.004.019c guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaś ca āśu pupluvire tadā
analyzed: guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaḥ ca āśu pupluvire tadā
tatas vānara rājena lakṣmaṇena ca pūjitaḥ

original: 6.004.020c jagāma rāmo dharmātmā sasainyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: jagāma rāmaḥ dharma ātmā sa sainyaḥ dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 6.004.021a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
analyzed: śataiḥ śata sahasraiḥ ca koṭībhiḥ ayutaiḥ api

original: 6.004.021c vāraṇābhiś ca haribhir yayau parivṛtas tadā
analyzed: vāraṇābhiḥ ca haribhiḥ yayau parivṛtaḥ tadā

original: 6.004.022a taṃ yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī harivāhinī
analyzed: tam yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī hari vāhinī
hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve sugrīveṇa abhipālitāḥ

original: 6.004.023c āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: āplavantaḥ plavantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.004.023e kṣvelanto ninadantaś ca jagmur vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: kṣvelantaḥ ninadantaḥ ca jagmuḥ vai dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 6.004.024a bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca
udvahantaḥ mahā vṛkṣān mañjarī puñja dhāriṇaḥ

original: 6.004.025a anyonyaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭā nirvahanti kṣipanti ca
analyzed: anyonyam sahasā dṛṣṭāḥ nirvahanti kṣipanti ca

original: 6.004.025c patantaś cotpatanty anye pātayanty apare parān
analyzed: patantaḥ ca utpatanti anye pātayanti apare parān

original: 6.004.026a rāvaṇo no nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ naḥ nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ
iti garjanti harayaḥ rāghavasya samīpatas

original: 6.004.027a purastād ṛṣabho vīro nīlaḥ kumuda eva ca
analyzed: purastāt ṛṣabhaḥ vīraḥ nīlaḥ kumudaḥ eva ca

original: 6.004.027c pathānaṃ śodhayanti sma vānarair bahubhiḥ saha
analyzed: pathānam śodhayanti sma vānaraiḥ bahubhiḥ saha

original: 6.004.028a madhye tu rājā sugrīvo rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
analyzed: madhye tu rājā sugrīvaḥ rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ eva ca
bahubhiḥ balibhiḥ bhīmaiḥ vṛtāḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 6.004.029a hariḥ śatabalir vīraḥ koṭībhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: hariḥ śatabaliḥ vīraḥ koṭībhiḥ daśabhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.004.029c sarvām eko hy avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa harivāhinīm
analyzed: sarvām ekaḥ hi avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa hari vāhinīm
arkaḥ ca atibalaḥ pārśvam ekam tasya abhirakṣati

original: 6.004.031a suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃś caiva ṛkṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ jāmbavān ca eva ṛkṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ āvṛtaḥ
sugrīvam puratas kṛtvā jaghanam saṃrarakṣatuḥ
teṣām senāpatiḥ vīraḥ nīlaḥ vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 6.004.032c saṃpatan patatāṃ śreṣṭhas tad balaṃ paryapālayat
analyzed: saṃpatan patatām śreṣṭhaḥ tat balam paryapālayat

original: 6.004.033a darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaś ca jambho 'tha rabhasaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaḥ ca rabhasaḥ kapiḥ

original: 6.004.033c sarvataś ca yayur vīrās tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
analyzed: sarvatas ca yayuḥ vīrāḥ tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
evam te hari śārdūlāḥ gacchantaḥ bala darpitāḥ
apaśyan te giri śreṣṭham sahyam druma latā yutam
sāgara ogha nibham bhīmam tat vānara balam mahat
niḥsasarpa mahā ghoṣam bhīma vegaḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: 6.004.036a tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrās te kapikuñjarāḥ
analyzed: tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrāḥ te kapi kuñjarāḥ

original: 6.004.036c tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sadaśvā iva coditāḥ
analyzed: tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sat aśvāḥ iva coditāḥ
kapibhyām uhyamānau tau śuśubhate nara ṛṣabhau
mahadbhyām iva saṃspṛṣṭau grāhābhyām candra bhāskarau

original: 6.004.038a tam aṅgadagato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā
analyzed: tam aṅgada gataḥ rāmam lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā
uvāca pratipūrṇa arthaḥ smṛtimān pratibhānavān

original: 6.004.039a hṛtām avāpya vaidehīṃ kṣipraṃ hatvā ca rāvaṇam
analyzed: hṛtām avāpya vaidehīm kṣipram hatvā ca rāvaṇam
samṛddha arthaḥ samṛddha arthām ayodhyām pratiyāsyasi

original: 6.004.040a mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava
analyzed: mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava
śubhānti tava paśyāmi sarvāṇi eva artha siddhaye

original: 6.004.041a anu vāti śubho vāyuḥ senāṃ mṛduhitaḥ sukhaḥ
analyzed: anu vāti śubhaḥ vāyuḥ senām mṛdu hitaḥ sukhaḥ
pūrṇa valgu svarāḥ ca ime pravadanti mṛga dvijāḥ

original: 6.004.042a prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvā vimalaś ca divākaraḥ
analyzed: prasannāḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ vimalaḥ ca divākaraḥ

original: 6.004.042c uśanā ca prasannārcir anu tvāṃ bhārgavo gataḥ
analyzed: uśanā ca prasanna arciḥ anu tvām bhārgavaḥ gataḥ

original: 6.004.043a brahmarāśir viśuddhaś ca śuddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: brahmarāśiḥ viśuddhaḥ ca śuddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
arciṣmantaḥ prakāśante dhruvam sarve pradakṣiṇam
triśaṅkuḥ vimalaḥ bhāti rājarṣiḥ sa purohitaḥ
smākam iṣkvākūṇām mahātmanām
vimale ca prakāśete viśākhe nirupadrave
nakṣatram param asmākam ikṣvākūṇām mahātmanām
nairṛtam nairṛtānām ca nakṣatram abhipīḍyate
mūlam mūlavatā spṛṣṭam dhūpyate dhūmaketunā
saram ca etat vināśāya rākṣasānām upasthitam
kāle kāla gṛhītānām nakatram graha pīḍitam

original: 6.004.048a prasannāḥ surasāś cāpo vanāni phalavanti ca
analyzed: prasannāḥ surasāḥ ca apaḥ vanāni phalavanti ca
pravānti abhyadhikam gandhāḥ yathā ṛtu kusumāḥ drumāḥ
vyūḍhāni kapi sainyāni prakāśante dhikam prabho
devānām iva sainyāni saṃgrāme tārakā maye

original: 6.004.050a evam ārya samīkṣyaitān prīto bhavitum arhasi
analyzed: evam ārya samīkṣya etān prītaḥ bhavitum arhasi

original: 6.004.050c iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt
analyzed: iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitriḥ abravīt

original: 6.004.051a athāvṛtya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mahatī camūḥ
analyzed: atha āvṛtya mahīm kṛtsnām jagāma mahatī camūḥ
ṛkṣa vānara śārdūlaiḥ nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhaiḥ vṛtā

original: 6.004.052a karāgraiś caraṇāgraiś ca vānarair uddhataṃ rajaḥ
analyzed: kara agraiḥ caraṇa agraiḥ ca vānaraiḥ uddhatam rajaḥ

original: 6.004.052c bhaumam antardadhe lokaṃ nivārya savituḥ prabhām
analyzed: bhaumam antardadhe lokam nivārya savituḥ prabhām

original: 6.004.053a sā sma yāti divārātraṃ mahatī harivāhinī
analyzed: sā sma yāti divārātram mahatī hari vāhinī
hṛṣṭa pramuditā senā sugrīveṇa abhirakṣitā
vanarāḥ tvaritam yānti sarve yuddha abhinandanaḥ
mumokṣayiṣavaḥ sītām muhūrtam kvāpi na āsata
tatas pādapa saṃbādham nānā mṛga samākulam

original: 6.004.055c sahyaparvatam āsedur malayaṃ ca mahī dharam
analyzed: sahya parvatam āseduḥ malayam ca mahī dharam
kānanāni vicitrāṇi nadī prasravaṇāni ca

original: 6.004.056c paśyann api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca
analyzed: paśyan api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca
campakān tilakān cūtān aśokān sinduvārakān

original: 6.004.057c karavīrāṃś ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: karavīrān ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ
phalāni amṛta gandhīni mūlāni kusumāni ca
bubhujuḥ vānarāḥ tatra pādapānām bala utkaṭāḥ
droṇa mātra pramāṇāni lambamānāni vānarāḥ

original: 6.004.059c yayuḥ pibanto hṛṣṭās te madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ pibantaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ te madhūni madhu piṅgalāḥ
pādapān avabhañjantaḥ vikarṣantaḥ tathā latāḥ
vidhamantaḥ giri varān prayayuḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
vṛkṣebhyaḥ nye tu kapayaḥ nardantaḥ madhu darpitāḥ

original: 6.004.061c anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanty api cāpare
analyzed: anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanti api ca apare

original: 6.004.062a babhūva vasudhā tais tu saṃpūrṇā haripuṃgavaiḥ
analyzed: babhūva vasudhā taiḥ tu saṃpūrṇā hari puṃgavaiḥ
yathā kamala kedāraiḥ pakvaiḥ iva vasuṃdharā
mahendram atha saṃprāpya rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ
adhyārohat mahā bāhuḥ śikharam druma bhūṣitam
tatas śikharam āruhya rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
kūrma mīna samākīrṇam apaśyat salilāśayam

original: 6.004.065a te sahyaṃ samatikramya malayaṃ ca mahāgirim
analyzed: te sahyam samatikramya malayam ca mahā girim
āseduḥ ānupūrvyeṇa samudram bhīma niḥsvanam
avaruhya jagāma āśu velā vanam anuttamam
rāmaḥ ramayatām śreṣṭhaḥ sa sugrīvaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
atha dhauta upala talām toya oghaiḥ sahasā utthitaiḥ

original: 6.004.067c velām āsādya vipulāṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: velām āsādya vipulām rāmaḥ vacanam abravīt
ete vayam anuprāptāḥ sugrīva varuṇālayam

original: 6.004.068c ihedānīṃ vicintā sā yā na pūrvaṃ samutthitā
analyzed: iha idānīm vicintā sā yā na pūrvam samutthitā
atas parama tīraḥ yam sāgaraḥ saritām pati

original: 6.004.069c na cāyam anupāyena śakyas taritum arṇavaḥ
analyzed: na ca ayam anupāyena śakyaḥ taritum arṇavaḥ

original: 6.004.070a tad ihaiva niveśo 'stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha
analyzed: tat iha eva niveśaḥ stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha
yathā idam vānara balam param pāram avāpnuyāt
iti iva sa mahā bāhuḥ sītā āharaṇa karśitaḥ

original: 6.004.071c rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
analyzed: rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
saṃprāptaḥ mantra kālaḥ naḥ sāgarasya iha laṅghane

original: 6.004.072c svāṃ svāṃ senāṃ samutsṛjya mā ca kaś cit kuto vrajet
analyzed: svām svām senām samutsṛjya mā ca kaḥ cit kutas vrajet

original: 6.004.072e gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrā jñeyaṃ channaṃ bhayaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrāḥ jñeyam channam bhayam ca naḥ
rāmasya vacanam śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
senām nyaveśayat tīre sāgarasya druma āyute

original: 6.004.074a virarāja samīpasthaṃ sāgarasya tu tad balam
analyzed: virarāja samīpa stham sāgarasya tu tat balam
madhu pāṇḍu jalaḥ śrīmān dvitīyaḥ iva sāgaraḥ
velā vanam upāgamya tatas te hari puṃgavāḥ
viniviṣṭāḥ param pāram kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ mahā udadheḥ
sā mahā arṇavam āsādya hṛṣṭā vānara vāhinī
vāyu vega samādhūtam paśyamānāḥ mahā arṇavam
dūra pāram asaṃbādham rakṣaḥ gaṇa niṣevitam
paśyantaḥ varuṇāvāsam niṣeduḥ hari yūthapāḥ
caṇḍa nakra graham ghoram kṣapā ādau divasakṣaye
candra udaye samādhūtam praticandra samākulam
caṇḍa anila mahā grāhaiḥ kīrṇam timitimiṃgilaiḥ
dīpta bhogaiḥ iva ākrīrṇam bhujaṃgaiḥ varuṇālayam
avagāḍham mahā sattaiḥ nānā śaila samākulam

original: 6.004.080c durgaṃ drugam amārgaṃ tam agādham asurālayam
analyzed: durgam drugam amārgam tam agādham asura ālayam
makaraiḥ nāgabhogaiḥ ca vigāḍhāḥ vāta lohitāḥ

original: 6.004.081c utpetuś ca nipetuś ca pravṛddhā jalarāśayaḥ
analyzed: utpetuḥ ca nipetuḥ ca pravṛddhāḥ jala rāśayaḥ
agni cūrṇam iva āviddham bhāskara ambu manaḥ uragam
surāri viṣayam ghoram pātāla viṣamam sadā
sāgaram ca ambara prakhyam ambaram sāgara upamam
sāgaram ca ambaram ca iti nirviśeṣam adṛśyata

original: 6.004.084a saṃpṛktaṃ nabhasā hy ambhaḥ saṃpṛktaṃ ca nabho 'mbhasā
analyzed: saṃpṛktam nabhasā hi ambhaḥ saṃpṛktam ca nabhaḥ mbhasā
tādṛś rūpe sma dṛśyete tārāḥ ratna samākule
samutpatita meghasya vīcci mālā ākulasya ca

original: 6.004.085c viśeṣo na dvayor āsīt sāgarasyāmbarasya ca
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ na dvayoḥ āsīt sāgarasya ambarasya ca
anyonyaiḥ āhatāḥ saktāḥ bhīma niḥsvanāḥ
ūrmayaḥ sindhurājasya mahā bheryaḥ iva āhave
ratna ogha jala saṃnādam viṣaktam iva vāyunā
utpatantam iva kruddham yādaḥ gaṇa samākulam
dadṛśuḥ te mahātmānaḥ vāta āhata jalāśayam
anila uddhūtam ākāśe pravalgatam iva ūrmibhiḥ
bhrānta ūrmi jala saṃnādam pralolam iva sāgaram

original: 6.005.001a sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā susamāhitā
analyzed: sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā su samāhitā
sāgarasya uttare tīre sādhu senā niveśitā

original: 6.005.002a maindaś ca dvividhaś cobhau tatra vānarapuṃgavau
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividhaḥ ca ubhau tatra vānara puṃgavau

original: 6.005.002c viceratuś ca tāṃ senāṃ rakṣārthaṃ sarvato diśam
analyzed: viceratuḥ ca tām senām rakṣā artham sarvatas diśam
niviṣṭāyām tu senāyām tīre nadanadīpateḥ

original: 6.005.003c pārśvasthaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: pārśva stham lakṣmaṇam dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: 6.005.004a śokaś ca kila kālena gacchatā hy apagacchati
analyzed: śokaḥ ca kila kālena gacchatā hi apagacchati

original: 6.005.004c mama cāpaśyataḥ kāntām ahany ahani vardhate
analyzed: mama ca apaśyataḥ kāntām ahani ahani vardhate

original: 6.005.005a na me duḥkhaṃ priyā dūre na me duḥkhaṃ hṛteti ca
analyzed: na me duḥkham priyā dūre na me duḥkham hṛtā iti ca
etat eva anuśocāmi vayaḥ syāḥ hi ativartate

original: 6.005.006a vāhi vāta yataḥ kanyā tāṃ spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa
analyzed: vāhi vāta yatas kanyā tām spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa
tvayi me gātra saṃsparśaḥ candre dṛṣṭi samāgamaḥ

original: 6.005.007a tan me dahati gātrāṇi viṣaṃ pītam ivāśaye
analyzed: tat me dahati gātrāṇi viṣam pītam iva āśaye

original: 6.005.007c hā nātheti priyā sā māṃ hriyamāṇā yad abravīt
analyzed: hā nātha iti priyā sā mām hriyamāṇā yat abravīt
tad viyoga indhanavatā tad cintā vipula arciṣā

original: 6.005.008c rātriṃ divaṃ śarīraṃ me dahyate madanāgninā
analyzed: rātrim divam śarīram me dahyate madana agninā
avagāhya arṇavam svapsye saumitre bhavatā vinā

original: 6.005.009c kathaṃ cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptaṃ jale dahet
analyzed: katham cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptam jale dahet

original: 6.005.010a bahv etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum
analyzed: bahu etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum

original: 6.005.010c yad ahaṃ sā ca vāmorur ekāṃ dharaṇim āśritau
analyzed: yat aham sā ca vāma ūruḥ ekām dharaṇim āśritau
kedārasya iva kedāraḥ sa udakasya nirūdakaḥ

original: 6.005.011c upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīṃ yac chṛṇomi tām
analyzed: upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīm yat śṛṇomi tām
kadā tu khalu su sūoṇīm śatapattra āyata īkṣaṇām

original: 6.005.012c vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītāṃ sphītām iva śriyam
analyzed: vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītām sphītām iva śriyam

original: 6.005.013a kadā nu cārubimbauṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam
analyzed: kadā nu cāru bimba oṣṭham tasyāḥ padmam iva ānanam
īṣat unnamya pāsyāmi rasāyanam iva āturaḥ

original: 6.005.014a tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tālaphalopamau
analyzed: tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tāla phala upamau

original: 6.005.014c kadā nu khalu sotkampau hasantyā māṃ bhajiṣyataḥ
analyzed: kadā nu khalu sa utkampau hasantyāḥ mām bhajiṣyataḥ
sā nūnam asita apāṅgī rakṣaḥ madhya gatā satī
mad nāthā nātha hīnā iva trātāram na adhigacchati
kadā vikṣobhya rakṣāṃsi sā vidhūya utpatiṣyati

original: 6.005.016c vidhūya jaladān nīlāñ śaśilekhā śaratsv iva
analyzed: vidhūya jaladān nīlām śaśi lekhā śaratsu iva
svabhāva tanukā nūnam śokena anaśanena ca
bhūyas tanutarā sītā deśa kāla viparyayāt
kadā nu rākṣasa indrasya nidhāya urasi sāyakān
sītām pratyāhariṣyāmi śokam utsṛjya mānasam

original: 6.005.019a kadā nu khalu māṃ sādhvī sītāmarasutopamā
analyzed: kadā nu khalu mām sādhvī sītā amara sutā upamā

original: 6.005.019c sotkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyaty ānandajaṃ jalam
analyzed: sa utkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyati ānanda jam jalam

original: 6.005.020a kadā śokam imaṃ ghoraṃ maithilī viprayogajam
analyzed: kadā śokam imam ghoram maithilī viprayoga jam
sahasā vipramokṣyāmi vāsaḥ śukletaram yathā

original: 6.005.021a evaṃ vilapatas tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: evam vilapataḥ tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ
dinakṣayāt manda vapuḥ bhāskaraḥ stam upāgamat
āśvāsitaḥ lakṣmaṇena rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata
smaran kamala patra akṣīm sītām śoka ākulīkṛtaḥ

original: 6.006.001a laṅkāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham
analyzed: laṅkāyām tu kṛtam karma ghoram dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham
rākṣasa indraḥ hanumatā śakreṇa iva mahātmanā

original: 6.006.001e abravīd rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: abravīt rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kim cit avāṅmukhaḥ

original: 6.006.002a dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī
analyzed: dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī

original: 6.006.002c tena vānaramātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī
analyzed: tena vānara mātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī

original: 6.006.003a prasādo dharṣitaś caityaḥ pravarā rākṣasā hatāḥ
analyzed: prasādaḥ dharṣitaḥ caityaḥ pravarāḥ rākṣasāḥ hatāḥ

original: 6.006.003c āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā
analyzed: āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā

original: 6.006.004a kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhadraṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā yuktam anantaram
analyzed: kim kariṣyāmi bhadram vaḥ kim vā yuktam anantaram

original: 6.006.004c ucyatāṃ naḥ samarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ bhavet
analyzed: ucyatām naḥ samartham yat kṛtam ca su kṛtam bhavet

original: 6.006.005a mantramūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ prāhur āryā manasvinaḥ
analyzed: mantra mūlam hi vijayam prāhuḥ āryāḥ manasvinaḥ

original: 6.006.005c tasmād vai rocaye mantraṃ rāmaṃ prati mahābalāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vai rocaye mantram rāmam prati mahā balāḥ
trividhāḥ puruṣāḥ loke uttama adhama madhyamāḥ

original: 6.006.006c teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ guṇadoṣaṃ vadāmy aham
analyzed: teṣām tu samavetānām guṇa doṣam vadāmi aham
mantribhiḥ hita saṃyuktaiḥ samarthaiḥ mantra nirṇaye

original: 6.006.007c mitrair vāpi samānārthair bāndhavair api vā hitaiḥ
analyzed: mitraiḥ vā api samāna arthaiḥ bāndhavaiḥ api vā hitaiḥ
sahitaḥ mantrayitvā yaḥ karma ārambhān pravartayet

original: 6.006.008c daive ca kurute yatnaṃ tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam
analyzed: daive ca kurute yatnam tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam

original: 6.006.009a eko 'rthaṃ vimṛśed eko dharme prakurute manaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ rtham vimṛśet ekaḥ dharme prakurute manaḥ

original: 6.006.009c ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhur madhyamaṃ naram
analyzed: ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhuḥ madhyamam naram
guṇa doṣau a niścitya tyaktvā daiva vyapāśrayam

original: 6.006.010c kariṣyāmīti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa narādhamaḥ
analyzed: kariṣyāmi iti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa nara adhamaḥ
yathā ime puruṣāḥ nityam uttama adhama madhyamāḥ
evam vijñeyaḥ uttama adhama madhyamaḥ
aikamatyam upāgamya śāstra dṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā

original: 6.006.012c mantriṇo yatra nirastās tam āhur mantram uttamam
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ yatra nirastāḥ tam āhuḥ mantram uttamam

original: 6.006.013a bahvyo 'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇo hy arthanirṇaye
analyzed: bahvyaḥ pi matayaḥ gatvā mantriṇaḥ hi artha nirṇaye

original: 6.006.013c punar yatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: punar yatra eka tām prāptaḥ sa mantraḥ madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
anyonya matim āsthāya yatra saṃpratibhāṣyate

original: 6.006.014c na caikamatye śreyo 'sti mantraḥ so 'dhama ucyate
analyzed: na ca ekamatye śreyaḥ sti mantraḥ saḥ dhamaḥ ucyate
tasmāt su mantritam sādhu bhavantaḥ mantri sattamāḥ
kāryam saṃpratipadyantām etat kṛtyatamam mama
vānarāṇām hi vīrāṇām sahasraiḥ parivāritaḥ
rāmaḥ bhyeti purīm laṅkām asmākam uparodhakaḥ

original: 6.006.017a tariṣyati ca suvyaktaṃ rāghavaḥ sāgaraṃ sukham
analyzed: tariṣyati ca su vyaktam rāghavaḥ sāgaram sukham
tarasā yukta rūpeṇa sa anujaḥ sa bala anugaḥ

original: 6.006.018a asminn evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha
analyzed: asmin evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha

original: 6.006.018c hitaṃ pure ca sainye ca sarvaṃ saṃmantryatāṃ mama
analyzed: hitam pure ca sainye ca sarvam saṃmantryatām mama

original: 6.007.001a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: iti uktāḥ rākṣasa indreṇa rākṣasāḥ te mahā balāḥ
ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve rāvaṇam rākṣaseśvaram
rājan parigha śakti ṛṣṭi śūla paṭṭasa saṃkulam

original: 6.007.002c sumahan no balaṃ kasmād viṣādaṃ bhajate bhavān
analyzed: su mahat naḥ balam kasmāt viṣādam bhajate bhavān
kailāsa śikhara āvāsī yakṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ āvṛtaḥ

original: 6.007.003c sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā vaśyas te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: su mahat kadanam kṛtvā vaśyaḥ te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ
sa maheśvara sakhyena ślāghamānaḥ tvayā vibho
nirjitaḥ samare roṣāt lokapālaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.007.005a vinihatya ca yakṣaughān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca
analyzed: vinihatya ca yakṣa oghān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca
tvayā kailāsa śikharāt vimānam idam āhṛtam
mayena dānava indreṇa tvad bhayāt sakhyam icchatā
duhitā tava bhāryā arthe dattā rākṣasa puṃgava
dānava indraḥ madhuḥ nāma vīrya utsiktaḥ durāsadaḥ
vigṛhya vaśam ānītaḥ kumbhīnasyāḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: 6.007.008a nirjitās te mahābāho nāgā gatvā rasātalam
analyzed: nirjitāḥ te mahā bāho nāgāḥ gatvā rasātalam

original: 6.007.008c vāsukis takṣakaḥ śaṅkho jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ
analyzed: vāsukiḥ takṣakaḥ śaṅkhaḥ jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ

original: 6.007.009a akṣayā balavantaś ca śūrā labdhavarāḥ punaḥ
analyzed: akṣayāḥ balavantaḥ ca śūrāḥ labdha varāḥ punar

original: 6.007.009c tvayā saṃvatsaraṃ yuddhvā samare dānavā vibho
analyzed: tvayā saṃvatsaram yuddhvā samare dānavāḥ vibho
sva balam samupāśritya nītāḥ vaśam ariṃdama
māyāḥ ca adhigatāḥ tatra bahavaḥ rākṣasa adhipa

original: 6.007.011a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca varuṇasya sutā raṇe
analyzed: śūrāḥ ca balavantaḥ ca varuṇasya sutāḥ raṇe
nirjitāḥ te mahā bāho caturvidha bala anugāḥ
avagāhya tvayā rājan yamasya bala sāgaram

original: 6.007.013a jayaś ca viplulaḥ prāpto mṛtyuś ca pratiṣedhitaḥ
analyzed: jayaḥ ca viplulaḥ prāptaḥ mṛtyuḥ ca pratiṣedhitaḥ

original: 6.007.013c suyuddhena ca te sarve lokās tatra sutoṣitāḥ
analyzed: su yuddhena ca te sarve lokāḥ tatra su toṣitāḥ
kṣatriyaiḥ bahubhiḥ vīraiḥ śakra tulya parākramaiḥ

original: 6.007.014c āsīd vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhir iva pādapaiḥ
analyzed: āsīt vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhiḥ iva pādapaiḥ

original: 6.007.015a teṣāṃ vīryaguṇotsāhair na samo rāghavo raṇe
analyzed: teṣām vīrya guṇa utsāhaiḥ na samaḥ rāghavaḥ raṇe

original: 6.007.015c prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ paramadurjayāḥ
analyzed: prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ parama durjayāḥ

original: 6.007.016a rājan nāpad ayukteyam āgatā prākṛtāj janāt
analyzed: rājan na āpad ayuktā iyam āgatā prākṛtāt janāt

original: 6.007.016c hṛdi naiva tvayā kāryā tvaṃ vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
analyzed: hṛdi nā eva tvayā kāryā tvam vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
tatas nīla ambuda nibhaḥ prahastaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.008.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ śūraḥ senāpatis tadā
analyzed: abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam śūraḥ senāpatiḥ tadā
deva dānava gandharvāḥ piśāca pataga uragāḥ

original: 6.008.002c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar vānarā raṇe
analyzed: na tvām dharṣayitum śaktāḥ kim punar vānarāḥ raṇe

original: 6.008.003a sarve pramattā viśvastā vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā
analyzed: sarve pramattāḥ viśvastāḥ vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā

original: 6.008.003c na hi me jīvato gacchej jīvan sa vanagocaraḥ
analyzed: na hi me jīvataḥ gacchet jīvan sa vana gocaraḥ
sarvām sāgara paryantām sa śaila vana kānanām

original: 6.008.004c karomy avānarāṃ bhūmim ājñāpayatu māṃ bhavān
analyzed: karomi avānarām bhūmim ājñāpayatu mām bhavān
rakṣām ca eva vidhāsyāmi vānarāt rajanīcara

original: 6.008.005c nāgamiṣyati te duḥkhaṃ kiṃ cid ātmāparādhajam
analyzed: nā āgamiṣyati te duḥkham kim cit ātma aparādha jam

original: 6.008.006a abravīc ca susaṃkruddho durmukho nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca su saṃkruddhaḥ durmukhaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.008.006c idaṃ na kṣamaṇīyaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ naḥ pradharṣaṇam
analyzed: idam na kṣamaṇīyam hi sarveṣām naḥ pradharṣaṇam
ayam paribhavaḥ bhūyas purasya antaḥpurasya ca
śrīmataḥ rākṣasa indrasya vānara indra pradharṣaṇam
asmin muhūrte hatvā ekaḥ nivartiṣyāmi vānarān

original: 6.008.008c praviṣṭān sāgaraṃ bhīmam ambaraṃ vā rasātalam
analyzed: praviṣṭān sāgaram bhīmam ambaram vā rasātalam
tatas bravīt su saṃkruddhaḥ vajra daṃṣṭraḥ mahā balaḥ
pragṛhya parigham ghoram māṃsa śoṇita rūpitam

original: 6.008.010a kiṃ vo hanumatā kāryaṃ kṛpaṇena tapasvinā
analyzed: kim vaḥ hanumatā kāryam kṛpaṇena tapasvinā
rāme tiṣṭhati durdharṣe sugrīve sahalakṣmaṇe
adya rāmam sa sugrīvam parigheṇa sa lakṣmaṇam
āgamiṣyāmi hatvā ekaḥ vikṣobhya hari vāhinīm

original: 6.008.012a kaumbhakarṇis tato vīro nikumbho nāma vīryavān
analyzed: kaumbhakarṇiḥ tatas vīraḥ nikumbhaḥ nāma vīryavān
abravīt paramakurddhaḥ rāvaṇam loka rāvaṇam
sarve bhavantaḥ tiṣṭhantu mahā rājena saṃgatāḥ
aham ekaḥ haniṣyāmi rāghavam sahalakṣmaṇam
tatas vajrahanuḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ parvata upamaḥ

original: 6.008.014c kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktraṃ jihvayā vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktram jihvayā vākyam abravīt
svairam kurvantu kāryāṇi bhavantaḥ vigata jvarāḥ
ekaḥ ham bhakṣayiṣyāmi tān sarvān hari yūthapān
svasthāḥ krīḍantu niścintāḥ pibantu madhu vāruṇīm
aham ekaḥ haniṣyāmi sugrīvam sahalakṣmaṇam

original: 6.008.016e sāṅgadaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ rāmaṃ ca raṇakuñjaram
analyzed: sa aṅgadam ca hanūmantam rāmam ca raṇa kuñjaram
tatas nikumbhaḥ rabhasaḥ sūryaśatruḥ mahā balaḥ
suptaghnaḥ yajñakopaḥ ca mahāpārśvaḥ mahoaraḥ

original: 6.009.002a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: agniketuḥ ca durdharṣaḥ raśmiketuḥ ca rākṣasaḥ
indrajit ca mahā tejāḥ balavān rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
virūpa akṣaḥ vajra daṃṣṭraḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.009.003c dhūmrākṣaś cātikāyaś ca durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: dhūmrākṣaḥ ca atikāyaḥ ca durmukhaḥ ca eva rākṣasaḥ
parighān paṭṭasān prāsām śakti śūla paraśvadhān

original: 6.009.004c cāpāni ca sabāṇāni khaḍgāṃś ca vipulāñ śitān
analyzed: cāpāni ca sa bāṇāni khaḍgān ca vipulām śitān
pragṛhya parama kruddhāḥ samutpatya ca rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.009.005c abruvan rāvaṇaṃ sarve pradīptā iva tejasā
analyzed: abruvan rāvaṇam sarve pradīptāḥ iva tejasā

original: 6.009.006a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: adya rāmam vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvam ca sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.009.006c kṛpaṇaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ laṅkā yena pradharṣitā
analyzed: kṛpaṇam ca hanūmantam laṅkā yena pradharṣitā
tān gṛhīta āyudhān sarvān vārayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.009.007c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ punaḥ pratyupaveśya tān
analyzed: abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam punar pratyupaveśya tān

original: 6.009.008a apy upāyais tribhis tāta yo 'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate
analyzed: api upāyaiḥ tribhiḥ tāta yaḥ ṛthaḥ prāptum na śakyate

original: 6.009.008c tasya vikramakālāṃs tān yuktān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya vikrama kālān tān yuktān āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
pramatteṣu abhiyukteṣu daivena prahateṣu ca

original: 6.009.009c vikramās tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ
analyzed: vikramāḥ tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ

original: 6.009.010a apramattaṃ kathaṃ taṃ tu vijigīṣuṃ bale sthitam
analyzed: apramattam katham tam tu vijigīṣum bale sthitam
jita roṣam durādharṣam pradharṣayitum icchatha
samudram laṅghayitvā tu ghoram nadanadīpatim

original: 6.009.011c kṛtaṃ hanumatā karma duṣkaraṃ tarkayeta kaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam hanumatā karma duṣkaram tarkayeta kaḥ
balāni aparimeyāni vīryāṇi ca niśācarāḥ

original: 6.009.012c pareṣāṃ sahasāvajñā na kartavyā kathaṃ cana
analyzed: pareṣām sahasā avajñā na kartavyā katham cana
kim ca rākṣasa rājasya rāmeṇa apakṛtam purā
ājahāra janasthānāt yasya bhāryām yaśasvinaḥ

original: 6.009.014a kharo yady ativṛttas tu rāmeṇa nihato raṇe
analyzed: kharaḥ yadi ativṛttaḥ tu rāmeṇa nihataḥ raṇe

original: 6.009.014c avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathā balam
analyzed: avaśyam prāṇinām prāṇāḥ rakṣitavyāḥ yathā balam

original: 6.009.015a etannimittaṃ vaidehī bhayaṃ naḥ sumahad bhavet
analyzed: etad nimittam vaidehī bhayam naḥ su mahat bhavet

original: 6.009.015c āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalahārthe kṛte na kim
analyzed: āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalaha arthe kṛte na kim

original: 6.009.016a na naḥ kṣamaṃ vīryavatā tena dharmānuvartinā
analyzed: na naḥ kṣamam vīryavatā tena dharma anuvartinā

original: 6.009.016c vairaṃ nirarthakaṃ kartuṃ dīyatām asya maithilī
analyzed: vairam nirarthakam kartum dīyatām asya maithilī
yāvat na sa gajām sa aśvām bahu ratna samākulām

original: 6.009.017c purīṃ dārayate bāṇair dīyatām asya maithilī
analyzed: purīm dārayate bāṇaiḥ dīyatām asya maithilī
yāvat su ghorā mahatī durdharṣā hari vāhinī

original: 6.009.018c nāvaskandati no laṅkāṃ tāvat sītā pradīyatām
analyzed: na avaskandati naḥ laṅkām tāvat sītā pradīyatām

original: 6.009.019a vinaśyed dhi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: vinaśyet hi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.009.019c rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayaṃ yadi dīyate
analyzed: rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayam yadi dīyate

original: 6.009.020a prasādaye tvāṃ bandhutvāt kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: prasādaye tvām bandhu tvāt kuruṣva vacanam mama

original: 6.009.020c hitaṃ pathyaṃ tv ahaṃ brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī
analyzed: hitam pathyam tu aham brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī
purā śarad sūrya marīci saṃnibhān
nava agra puṅkhān su dṛḍhān nṛpa ātmajaḥ
sṛjati amoghān viśikhān vadhāya te
pradīyatām dāśarathāya maithilī
tyajasva kopam sukha dharma nāśanam
bhajasva dharmam rati kīrti vardhanam
prasīda jīvema sa putra bāndhavāḥ
pradīyatām dāśarathāya maithilī
suniviṣṭam hitam vākyam uktavantam vibhīṣaṇam
abravīt paruṣam vākyam rāvaṇaḥ kāla coditaḥ
vaset saha sapatnena kruddhena āśīviṣeṇa vā
na tu mitra pravādena saṃvaset śatru sevinā
jānāmi śīlam jñātīnām sarva lokeṣu rākṣasa

original: 6.010.003c hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣv ete jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā
analyzed: hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣu ete jñātīnām jñātayaḥ sadā

original: 6.010.004a pradhānaṃ sādhakaṃ vaidyaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ ca rākṣasa
analyzed: pradhānam sādhakam vaidyam dharma śīlam ca rākṣasa

original: 6.010.004c jñātayo hy avamanyante śūraṃ paribhavanti ca
analyzed: jñātayaḥ hi avamanyante śūram paribhavanti ca
nityam anyonya saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vyasaneṣu ātatāyinaḥ
pracchanna hṛdayāḥ ghorāḥ jñātayaḥ tu bhaya āvahāḥ

original: 6.010.006a śrūyante hastibhir gītāḥ ślokāḥ padmavane kva cit
analyzed: śrūyante hastibhiḥ gītāḥ ślokāḥ padma vane kva cit

original: 6.010.006c pāśahastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadato mama
analyzed: pāśa hastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadataḥ mama

original: 6.010.007a nāgnir nānyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśā bhayāvahāḥ
analyzed: na agniḥ na anyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśāḥ bhaya āvahāḥ

original: 6.010.007c ghorāḥ svārthaprayuktās tu jñātayo no bhayāvahāḥ
analyzed: ghorāḥ sva artha prayuktāḥ tu jñātayaḥ naḥ bhaya āvahāḥ

original: 6.010.008a upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.010.008c kṛtsnād bhayāj jñātibhayaṃ sukaṣṭaṃ viditaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: kṛtsnāt bhayāt jñāti bhayam su kaṣṭam viditam ca naḥ

original: 6.010.009a vidyate goṣu saṃpannaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ
analyzed: vidyate goṣu saṃpannam vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ

original: 6.010.009c vidyate strīṣu cāpalyaṃ vidyate jñātito bhayam
analyzed: vidyate strīṣu cāpalyam vidyate jñātitaḥ bhayam

original: 6.010.010a tato neṣṭam idaṃ saumya yad ahaṃ lokasatkṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas na iṣṭam idam saumya yat aham loka satkṛtaḥ

original: 6.010.010c aiśvaryam abhijātaś ca ripūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ
analyzed: aiśvaryam abhijātaḥ ca ripūṇām mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ

original: 6.010.011a anyas tv evaṃvidhaṃ brūyād vākyam etan niśācara
analyzed: anyaḥ tu evaṃvidham brūyāt vākyam etat niśācara

original: 6.010.011c asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvāṃ tu dhik kulapāṃsanam
analyzed: asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvām tu dhik kula pāṃsanam

original: 6.010.012a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ nyāyavādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ paruṣam vākyam nyāya vādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ
utpapāta gadā pāṇiḥ caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 6.010.013a abravīc ca tadā vākyaṃ jātakrodho vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā vākyam jāta krodhaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
antarikṣa gataḥ śrīmān bhrātaram rākṣasa adhipam

original: 6.010.014a sa tvaṃ bhrātāsi me rājan brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
analyzed: sa tvam bhrātā asi me rājan brūhi mām yat yat icchasi

original: 6.010.014c idaṃ tu paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ na kṣamāmy anṛtaṃ tava
analyzed: idam tu paruṣam vākyam na kṣamāmi anṛtam tava
su nītam hita kāmena vākyam uktam daśānana

original: 6.010.015c na gṛhṇanty akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ
analyzed: na gṛhṇanti akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ
sulabhāḥ puruṣāḥ rājan satatam priya vādinaḥ

original: 6.010.016c apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
analyzed: apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
baddham kālasya pāśena sarva bhūta apahāriṇā

original: 6.010.017c na naśyantam upekṣeyaṃ pradīptaṃ śaraṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: na naśyantam upekṣeyam pradīptam śaraṇam yathā
dīpta pāvaka saṃkāśaiḥ śitaiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: 6.010.018c na tvām icchāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāmeṇa nihataṃ śaraiḥ
analyzed: na tvām icchāmi aham draṣṭum rāmeṇa nihatam śaraiḥ

original: 6.010.019a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
analyzed: śūrāḥ ca balavantaḥ ca kṛtāstrāḥ ca raṇa ajire
kāla abhipannā sīdanti yathā vāluka setavaḥ

original: 6.010.020a ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣa purīṃ cemāṃ sarākṣasām
analyzed: ātmānam sarvathā rakṣa purīm ca imām sarākṣasām

original: 6.010.020c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā
analyzed: svasti te stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā
nivāryamāṇasya mayā hita eṣiṇā
na rocate te vacanam niśācara
parīta kālāḥ hi gata āyuṣaḥ narā
hitam na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhiḥ īritam

original: 6.011.001a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā paruṣam vākyam rāvaṇam rāvaṇa anujaḥ
ājagāma muhūrtena yatra rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
tam meru śikhara ākāram dīptām iva śatahradām
gagana stham mahī sthāḥ te dadṛśuḥ vānara adhipāḥ
tam ātma pañcamam dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ

original: 6.011.003c vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaś cintayām āsa buddhimān
analyzed: vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaḥ cintayām āsa buddhimān

original: 6.011.004a cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
analyzed: cintayitvā muhūrtam tu vānarān tān uvāca ha
sarvān idam vacanam uttamam
eṣa sarva āyudha upetaḥ caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 6.011.005c rākṣaso 'bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantuṃ na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantum na saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.011.006a sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ
analyzed: sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānara uttamāḥ

original: 6.011.006c sālān udyamya śailāṃś ca idaṃ vacanam abruvan
analyzed: sālān udyamya śailān ca idam vacanam abruvan

original: 6.011.007a śīghraṃ vyādiśa no rājan vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām
analyzed: śīghram vyādiśa naḥ rājan vadhāya eṣām durātmanām
nipatantu hatāḥ ca ete dharaṇyām alpa jīvitāḥ
teṣām saṃbhāṣamāṇānām anyonyam sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.011.008c uttaraṃ tīram āsādya khastha eva vyatiṣṭhata
analyzed: uttaram tīram āsādya kha sthaḥ eva vyatiṣṭhata

original: 6.011.009a uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
analyzed: uvāca ca mahā prājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān

original: 6.011.009c sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca saṃprekṣya khastha eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvam tān ca saṃprekṣya kha sthaḥ eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
rāvaṇaḥ nāma durvṛttaḥ rākṣasaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.011.010c tasyāham anujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham anujaḥ bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: 6.011.011a tena sītā janasthānād dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: tena sītā janasthānāt dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam

original: 6.011.011c ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
analyzed: ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ su rakṣitā

original: 6.011.012a tam ahaṃ hetubhir vākyair vividhaiś ca nyadarśayam
analyzed: tam aham hetubhiḥ vākyaiḥ vividhaiḥ ca nyadarśayam

original: 6.011.012c sādhu niryātyatāṃ sītā rāmāyeti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sādhu niryātyatām sītā rāmāya iti punar punar

original: 6.011.013a sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
analyzed: sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kāla coditaḥ
ucyamānaḥ hitam vākyam viparītaḥ iva auṣadham
saḥ ham paruṣitaḥ tena dāsa vat ca avamānitaḥ

original: 6.011.014c tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā putrān ca dārān ca rāghavam śaraṇam gataḥ
sarva loka śaraṇyāya rāghavāya mahātmane
nivedayata mām kṣipram vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam

original: 6.011.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvo laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā sugrīvaḥ laghu vikramaḥ
lakṣmaṇasya agratas rāmam saṃrabdham idam abravīt
rāvaṇasya anujaḥ bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: 6.011.017c caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhir bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhiḥ bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ
rāvaṇena praṇihitam tam avehi vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.011.018c tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye kṣamaṃ kṣamavatāṃ vara
analyzed: tasya aham nigraham manye kṣamam kṣamavatām vara
rākṣasaḥ jihmayā buddhyā saṃdiṣṭaḥ yam upasthitaḥ

original: 6.011.019c prahartuṃ māyayā channo viśvaste tvayi rāghava
analyzed: prahartum māyayā channaḥ viśvaste tvayi rāghava

original: 6.011.020a badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha

original: 6.011.020c rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hi eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.011.021a evam uktvā tu taṃ rāmaṃ saṃrabdho vāhinīpatiḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tam rāmam saṃrabdhaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ
vākya jñaḥ vākya kuśalam tatas maunam upāgamat

original: 6.011.022a sugrīvasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā rāmo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvasya tu tat vākyam śrutvā rāmaḥ mahā balaḥ
samīpa sthān uvāca idam hanūmat pramukhān harīn
yat uktam kapi rājena rāvaṇa avarajam prati

original: 6.011.023c vākyaṃ hetumad atyarthaṃ bhavadbhir api tac chrutam
analyzed: vākyam hetumat atyartham bhavadbhiḥ api tat śrutam

original: 6.011.024a suhṛdā hy arthakṛccheṣu yuktaṃ buddhimatā satā
analyzed: suhṛdā hi artha kṛccheṣu yuktam buddhimatā satā
samarthena api saṃdeṣṭum śāśvatīm bhūtim icchatā

original: 6.011.025a ity evaṃ paripṛṣṭās te svaṃ svaṃ matam atandritāḥ
analyzed: iti evam paripṛṣṭāḥ te svam svam matam atandritāḥ
sa upacāram tadā rāmam ūcuḥ hita cikīrṣavaḥ

original: 6.011.026a ajñātaṃ nāsti te kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
analyzed: ajñātam na asti te kim cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava

original: 6.011.026c ātmānaṃ pūjayan rāma pṛcchasy asmān suhṛttayā
analyzed: ātmānam pūjayan rāma pṛcchasi asmān suhṛd tayā

original: 6.011.027a tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro dhārmiko dṛḍhavikramaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi satya vrataḥ śūraḥ dhārmikaḥ dṛḍha vikramaḥ

original: 6.011.027c parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭātmā suhṛtsu ca
analyzed: parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭa ātmā suhṛtsu ca

original: 6.011.028a tasmād ekaikaśas tāvad bruvantu sacivās tava
analyzed: tasmāt ekaikaśas tāvat bruvantu sacivāḥ tava

original: 6.011.028c hetuto matisaṃpannāḥ samarthāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: hetutaḥ mati saṃpannāḥ samarthāḥ ca punar punar
iti ukte rāghavāya atha matimān aṅgadaḥ gratas
vibhīṣaṇa parīkṣā artham uvāca vacanam hariḥ

original: 6.011.030a śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkya eva hi
analyzed: śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyaḥ eva hi
viśvāsa yogyaḥ sahasā na kartavyaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
chādayitvā ātma bhāvam hi caranti śaṭha buddhayaḥ

original: 6.011.031c praharanti ca randhreṣu so 'narthaḥ sumahān bhavet
analyzed: praharanti ca randhreṣu saḥ narthaḥ su mahān bhavet
artha anarthau viniścitya vyavasāyam bhajeta ha

original: 6.011.032c guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatas tu visarjayet
analyzed: guṇataḥ saṃgraham kuryāt doṣataḥ tu visarjayet

original: 6.011.033a yadi doṣo mahāṃs tasmiṃs tyajyatām aviśaṅkitam
analyzed: yadi doṣaḥ mahān tasmin tyajyatām a viśaṅkitam

original: 6.011.033c guṇān vāpi bahūñ jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: guṇān vā api jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatām nṛpa

original: 6.011.034a śarabhas tv atha niścitya sārthaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: śarabhaḥ tu atha niścitya sārtham vacanam abravīt
kṣipram asmin nara vyāghra cāraḥ pratividhīyatām
praṇidhāya hi cāreṇa yathāvat sūkṣma buddhinā

original: 6.011.035c parīkṣya ca tataḥ kāryo yathānyāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
analyzed: parīkṣya ca tatas kāryaḥ yathānyāyam parigrahaḥ

original: 6.011.036a jāmbavāṃs tv atha saṃprekṣya śāstrabuddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān tu atha saṃprekṣya śāstra buddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
vākyam vijñāpayām āsa guṇavat doṣa varjitam

original: 6.011.037a baddhavairāc ca pāpāc ca rākṣasendrād vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: baddha vairāt ca pāpāt ca rākṣasa indrāt vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.011.037c adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam
analyzed: adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam
tatas maindaḥ tu saṃprekṣya naya apanaya kovidaḥ
vākyam vacana saṃpannaḥ babhāṣe hetumattaram
vacanam nāma tasya eṣa rāvaṇasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
pṛcchyatām madhureṇa ayam śanais nara vara īśvara

original: 6.011.040a bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvam kariṣyasi

original: 6.011.040c yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭaḥ na duṣṭaḥ vā buddhi pūrvam nara ṛṣabha
atha saṃskāra saṃpannaḥ hanūmān saciva uttamaḥ

original: 6.011.041c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam arthavan madhuraṃ laghu
analyzed: uvāca vacanam ślakṣṇam arthavat madhuram laghu

original: 6.011.042a na bhavantaṃ matiśreṣṭhaṃ samarthaṃ vadatāṃ varam
analyzed: na bhavantam mati śreṣṭham samartham vadatām varam
atiśāyayitum śaktaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ api bruvan

original: 6.011.043a na vādān nāpi saṃgharṣān nādhikyān na ca kāmataḥ
analyzed: na vādāt na api saṃgharṣāt na ādhikyāt na ca kāmataḥ
vakṣyāmi vacanam rājan yathārtham rāma gauravāt

original: 6.011.044a arthānarthanimittaṃ hi yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
analyzed: artha anartha nimittam hi yat uktam sacivaiḥ tava

original: 6.011.044c tatra doṣaṃ prapaśyāmi kriyā na hy upapadyate
analyzed: tatra doṣam prapaśyāmi kriyā na hi upapadyate

original: 6.011.045a ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate
analyzed: ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhum na śakyate

original: 6.011.045c sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me
analyzed: sahasā viniyogaḥ hi doṣavān pratibhāti me

original: 6.011.046a cārapraṇihitaṃ yuktaṃ yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
analyzed: cāra praṇihitam yuktam yat uktam sacivaiḥ tava
arthasya asaṃbhavāt tatra kāraṇam na upapadyate

original: 6.011.047a adeśa kāle saṃprāpta ity ayaṃ yad vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: adeśa kāle saṃprāpte iti ayam yat vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.011.047c vivakṣā cātra me 'stīyaṃ tāṃ nibodha yathā mati
analyzed: vivakṣā ca atra me sti iyam tām nibodha yathā mati

original: 6.011.048a sa eṣa deśaḥ kālaś ca bhavatīha yathā tathā
analyzed: saḥ eṣa deśaḥ kālaḥ ca bhavati iha yathā tathā

original: 6.011.048c puruṣāt puruṣaṃ prāpya tathā doṣaguṇāv api
analyzed: puruṣāt puruṣam prāpya tathā doṣa guṇau api

original: 6.011.049a daurātmyaṃ rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ ca tathā tvayi
analyzed: daurātmyam rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramam ca tathā tvayi

original: 6.011.049c yuktam āgamanaṃ tasya sadṛśaṃ tasya buddhitaḥ
analyzed: yuktam āgamanam tasya sadṛśam tasya buddhitaḥ

original: 6.011.050a ajñātarūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti
analyzed: ajñāta rūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti

original: 6.011.050c yad uktam atra me prekṣā kā cid asti samīkṣitā
analyzed: yat uktam atra me prekṣā kā cit asti samīkṣitā
pṛcchyamānaḥ viśaṅketa sahasā buddhimān vacaḥ
tatra mitram praduṣyeta mithya pṛṣṭam sukhāgatam

original: 6.011.052a aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai
analyzed: aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvaḥ vettum parasya vai

original: 6.011.052c antaḥ svabhāvair gītais tair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam
analyzed: antar svabhāvaiḥ gītaiḥ taiḥ naipuṇyam paśyatā bhṛśam

original: 6.011.053a na tv asya bruvato jātu lakṣyate duṣṭabhāvatā
analyzed: na tu asya bruvataḥ jātu lakṣyate duṣṭa bhāva tā

original: 6.011.053c prasannaṃ vadanaṃ cāpi tasmān me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prasannam vadanam ca api tasmāt me nā asti saṃśayaḥ
aśaṅkita matiḥ svasthaḥ na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati

original: 6.011.054c na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: na ca asya duṣṭā vāc ca api tasmāt na asti iha saṃśayaḥ
ākāraḥ chādyamānaḥ pi na śakyaḥ vinigūhitum

original: 6.011.055c balād dhi vivṛṇoty eva bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: balāt hi vivṛṇoti eva bhāvam antargatam nṛṇām
deśa kāla upapannam ca kāryam kārya vidām vara
saphalam kurute kṣipram prayogeṇa abhisaṃhitam

original: 6.011.057a udyogaṃ tava saṃprekṣya mithyāvṛttaṃ ca rāvaṇam
analyzed: udyogam tava saṃprekṣya mithyā vṛttam ca rāvaṇam

original: 6.011.057c vālinaś ca vadhaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaṃ cābhiṣecitam
analyzed: vālinaḥ ca vadham śrutvā sugrīvam ca abhiṣecitam
rājyam prārthayamānaḥ ca buddhi pūrvam iha āgataḥ

original: 6.011.058c etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tv asya saṃgrahaḥ
analyzed: etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tu asya saṃgrahaḥ
yathāśakti mayā uktam tu rākṣasasya ārjavam prati

original: 6.011.059c tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatāṃ vara
analyzed: tvam pramāṇam tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatām vara

original: 6.012.001a atha rāmaḥ prasannātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha
analyzed: atha rāmaḥ prasanna ātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha
pratyabhāṣata durdharṣaḥ śrutavān ātmani sthitam

original: 6.012.002a mamāpi tu vivakṣāsti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: mama api tu vivakṣā asti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.012.002c śrutam icchāmi tat sarvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ
analyzed: śrutam icchāmi tat sarvam bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ

original: 6.012.003a mitrabhāvena saṃprāptaṃ na tyajeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mitra bhāvena saṃprāptam na tyajeyam katham cana

original: 6.012.003c doṣo yady api tasya syāt satām etad agarhitam
analyzed: doṣaḥ yadi api tasya syāt satām etat agarhitam
rāmasya vacanam śrutvā sugrīvaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
pratyabhāṣata kākutstham sauhārdena abhicoditaḥ
kim atra citram dharma jña loka nātha śikhāmaṇe

original: 6.012.005c yat tvam āryaṃ prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ
analyzed: yat tvam āryam prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ

original: 6.012.006a mama cāpy antarātmāyaṃ śuddhiṃ vetti vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: mama ca api antarātmā ayam śuddhim vetti vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.012.006c anumanāc ca bhāvāc ca sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: anumanāt ca bhāvāt ca sarvatas su parīkṣitaḥ

original: 6.012.007a tasmāt kṣipraṃ sahāsmābhis tulyo bhavatu rāghava
analyzed: tasmāt kṣipram saha asmābhiḥ tulyaḥ bhavatu rāghava
vibhīṣaṇaḥ mahā prājñaḥ sakhitvam ca abhyupaitu naḥ

original: 6.012.008a sa sugrīvasya tad vākyayṃ rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca
analyzed: sa sugrīvasya tat rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca
tatas śubhataram vākyam uvāca hari puṃgavam

original: 6.012.009a suduṣṭo vāpy aduṣṭo vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ
analyzed: suduṣṭaḥ vā api aduṣṭaḥ vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ

original: 6.012.009c sūkṣmam apy ahitaṃ kartuṃ mamāśaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sūkṣmam api ahitam kartum mama aśaktaḥ katham cana

original: 6.012.010a piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyāṃ caiva rākṣasān
analyzed: piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyām ca eva rākṣasān
aṅguli agreṇa tān hanyām icchan hari gaṇa īśvara

original: 6.012.011a śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
analyzed: śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ

original: 6.012.011c arcitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ
analyzed: arcitaḥ ca yathānyāyam svaiḥ ca māṃsaiḥ nimantritaḥ

original: 6.012.012a sa hi taṃ pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam
analyzed: sa hi tam pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam

original: 6.012.012c kapoto vānaraśreṣṭha kiṃ punar madvidho janaḥ
analyzed: kapotaḥ vānara śreṣṭha kim punar madvidhaḥ janaḥ
ṛṣeḥ kaṇvasya putreṇa kaṇḍunā parama ṛṣiṇā

original: 6.012.013c śṛṇu gāthāṃ purā gītāṃ dharmiṣṭhāṃ satyavādinā
analyzed: śṛṇu gāthām purā gītām dharmiṣṭhām satya vādinā
baddhāñjali puṭam dīnam yācantam śaraṇa āgatam

original: 6.012.014c na hanyād ānṛśaṃsyārtham api śatruṃ paraṃ pata
analyzed: na hanyāt ānṛśaṃsya artham api śatrum param pata

original: 6.012.015a ārto vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: ārtaḥ vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣām śaraṇam gataḥ
ariḥ prāṇān parityajya rakṣitavyaḥ kṛtātmanā

original: 6.012.016a sa ced bhayād vā mohād vā kāmād vāpi na rakṣati
analyzed: sa ced bhayāt vā mohāt vā kāmāt vā api na rakṣati

original: 6.012.016c svayā śaktyā yathātattvaṃ tat pāpaṃ lokagarhitam
analyzed: svayā śaktyā yathātattvam tat pāpam loka garhitam
vinaṣṭaḥ paśyataḥ tasya rakṣiṇaḥ śaraṇa āgataḥ

original: 6.012.017c ādāya sukṛtaṃ tasya sarvaṃ gacched arakṣitaḥ
analyzed: ādāya sukṛtam tasya sarvam gacchet arakṣitaḥ

original: 6.012.018a evaṃ doṣo mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe
analyzed: evam doṣaḥ mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe
asvargyam ca ayaśasyam ca bala vīrya vināśanam

original: 6.012.019a kariṣyāmi yathārthaṃ tu kaṇḍor vacanam uttamam
analyzed: kariṣyāmi yathārtham tu kaṇḍoḥ vacanam uttamam

original: 6.012.019c dharmiṣṭhaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ syāt tu phalodaye
analyzed: dharmiṣṭham ca yaśasyam ca svargyam syāt tu phala udaye

original: 6.012.020a sakṛd eva prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yācate
analyzed: sakṛt eva prapannāya tava asmi iti ca yācate

original: 6.012.020c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāmy etad vrataṃ mama
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ dadāmi etat vratam mama
ānaya enam hari śreṣṭha dattam asya abhayam mayā

original: 6.012.021c vibhīṣaṇo vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam
tatas tu sugrīva vacaḥ niśamya tat
dharīśvareṇa abhihitam nareśvaraḥ
vibhīṣaṇena āśu jagāma saṃgamam
patatri rājena yathā puraṃdaraḥ
rāghaveṇa abhaye datte saṃnataḥ rāvaṇa anujaḥ

original: 6.013.001c khāt papātāvaniṃ hṛṣṭo bhaktair anucaraiḥ saha
analyzed: khāt papāta avanim hṛṣṭaḥ bhaktaiḥ anucaraiḥ saha

original: 6.013.002a sa tu rāmasya dharmātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tu rāmasya dharma ātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ
pādayoḥ śaraṇa anveṣī caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 6.013.003a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ vākyaṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmam vākyam tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.013.003c dharmayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sāmprataṃ saṃpraharṣaṇam
analyzed: dharma yuktam ca yuktam ca sāmpratam saṃpraharṣaṇam
anujaḥ rāvaṇasya aham tena ca asmi avamānitaḥ
bhavantam sarva bhūtānām śaraṇyam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: 6.013.005a parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca
analyzed: parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca

original: 6.013.005c bhavadgataṃ me rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca sukhāni ca
analyzed: bhavat gatam me rājyam ca jīvitam ca sukhāni ca

original: 6.013.006a rākṣasānāṃ vadhe sāhyaṃ laṅkāyāś ca pradharṣaṇe
analyzed: rākṣasānām vadhe sāhyam laṅkāyāḥ ca pradharṣaṇe
kariṣyāmi yathāprāṇam pravekṣyāmi ca vāhinīm

original: 6.013.007a iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmas tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam rāmaḥ tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.013.007c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ prītaḥ samudrāj jalam ānaya
analyzed: abravīt lakṣmaṇam prītaḥ samudrāt jalam ānaya
tena ca imam mahā prājñam abhiṣiñca vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.013.008c rājānaṃ rakṣasāṃ kṣipraṃ prasanne mayi mānada
analyzed: rājānam rakṣasām kṣipram prasanne mayi mānada

original: 6.013.009a evam uktas tu saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu saumitriḥ abhyaṣiñcat vibhīṣaṇam
madhye vānara mukhyānām rājānam rāma śāsanāt

original: 6.013.010a taṃ prasādaṃ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: tam prasādam tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyas plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.013.010c pracukruśur mahānādān sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
analyzed: pracukruśuḥ mahānādān sādhu sādhu iti ca abruvan

original: 6.013.011a abravīc ca hanūmāṃś ca sugrīvaś ca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: abravīt ca hanūmān ca sugrīvaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇam
katham sāgaram akṣobhyam tarāma varuṇālayam
upāyaiḥ abhigacchāmaḥ yathā nadanadīpatim
tarāma tarasā sarve sa sainyāḥ varuṇālayam

original: 6.013.013a evam uktas tu dharmajñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma jñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.013.013c samudraṃ rāghavo rājā śaraṇaṃ gantum arhati
analyzed: samudram rāghavaḥ rājā śaraṇam gantum arhati
khānitaḥ sagareṇa ayam aprameyaḥ mahā udadhiḥ

original: 6.013.014c kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryaṃ mahodadhiḥ
analyzed: kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryam mahā udadhiḥ
evam vibhīṣaṇena ukte rākṣasena vipaścitā
prakṛtyā dharma śīlasya rāghavasya api arocata

original: 6.013.016a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca harīśvaram
analyzed: sa lakṣmaṇam mahā tejāḥ sugrīvam ca hari īśvaram
satkriyā artham kriyā dakṣaḥ smita pūrvam uvāca ha
vibhīṣaṇasya mantraḥ yam mama lakṣmaṇa rocate

original: 6.013.017c brūhi tvaṃ sahasugrīvas tavāpi yadi rocate
analyzed: brūhi tvam sahasugrīvaḥ tava api yadi rocate
sugrīvaḥ paṇḍitaḥ nityam bhavān mantra vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.013.018c ubhābhyāṃ saṃpradhāryāryaṃ rocate yat tad ucyatām
analyzed: ubhābhyām saṃpradhārya āryam rocate yat tat ucyatām

original: 6.013.019a evam uktau tu tau vīrāv ubhau sugrīvalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: evam uktau tu tau vīrau ubhau sugrīva lakṣmaṇau
samudācāra saṃyuktam idam vacanam ūcatuḥ

original: 6.013.020a kimarthaṃ no naravyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava
analyzed: kimartham naḥ nara vyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava

original: 6.013.020c vibhīṣaṇena yat tūktam asmin kāle sukhāvaham
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇena yat tu uktam asmin kāle sukha āvaham
a baddhvā sāgare setum ghore smin varuṇālaye

original: 6.013.021c laṅkā nāsādituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: laṅkā nā āsāditum śakyā sa indraiḥ api sura asuraiḥ
vibhīṣaṇasya śūrasya yathārtham kriyatām vacaḥ
alam kāla atyayam kṛtvā samudraḥ yam niyujyatām
evam uktaḥ kuśa āstīrṇe tīre nadanadīpateḥ

original: 6.013.023c saṃviveśa tadā rāmo vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ
analyzed: saṃviveśa tadā rāmaḥ vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ
tasya rāmasya suptasya kuśa āstīrṇe mahī tale
niyamāt a pramattasya niśāḥ tisraḥ ticakramuḥ

original: 6.014.002a na ca darśayate mandas tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ
analyzed: na ca darśayate mandaḥ tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ
prayatena api rāmeṇa yathārham abhipūjitaḥ
samudrasya tatas kruddhaḥ rāmaḥ rakta anta locanaḥ
samīpa stham uvāca idam lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣmaṇam
paśya tāvat anāryasya pūjyamānasya lakṣmaṇa

original: 6.014.004c avalepaṃ samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam
analyzed: avalepam samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam

original: 6.014.005a praśamaś ca kṣamā caiva ārjavaṃ priyavāditā
analyzed: praśamaḥ ca kṣamā ca eva ārjavam priya vādi tā

original: 6.014.005c asāmarthyaṃ phalanty ete nirguṇeṣu satāṃ guṇāḥ
analyzed: asāmarthyam phalanti ete nirguṇeṣu satām guṇāḥ
ātma praśaṃsinam duṣṭam dhṛṣṭam viparidhāvakam
sarvatra utsṛṣṭa daṇḍam ca lokaḥ satkurute naram

original: 6.014.007a na sāmnā śakyate kīrtir na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ
analyzed: na sāmnā śakyate kīrtiḥ na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ

original: 6.014.007c prāptuṃ lakṣmaṇa loke 'smiñ jayo vā raṇamūdhani
analyzed: prāptum lakṣmaṇa loke jayaḥ vā raṇa mūdhani
adya mad bāṇa nirbhinnaiḥ makaraiḥ makara ālayam
niruddha toyam saumitre plavadbhiḥ paśya sarvatas

original: 6.014.009a mahābhogāni matsyānāṃ kariṇāṃ ca karān iha
analyzed: mahā bhogāni matsyānām kariṇām ca karān iha

original: 6.014.009c bhogāṃś ca paśya nāgānāṃ mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: bhogān ca paśya nāgānām mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa
sa śaṅkha śuktikāḥ jālam sa mīna makaram śaraiḥ
adya yuddhena mahatā samudram pariśoṣaye

original: 6.014.011a kṣamayā hi samāyuktaṃ mām ayaṃ makarālayaḥ
analyzed: kṣamayā hi samāyuktam mām ayam makara ālayaḥ

original: 6.014.011c asamarthaṃ vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane
analyzed: asamartham vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane
cāpam ānaya saumitre śarān ca āśīviṣa upamān
adya akṣobhyam api kruddhaḥ kṣobhayiṣyāmi sāgaram
velāsu kṛta maryādam sahasā ūrmi samākulam
nirmaryādam kariṣyāmi sāyakaiḥ varuṇālayam
evam uktvā dhanuṣpāṇiḥ krodha visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.014.014c babhūva rāmo durdharṣo yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
analyzed: babhūva rāmaḥ durdharṣaḥ yugānta agniḥ iva jvalan

original: 6.014.015a saṃpīḍya ca dhanur ghoraṃ kampayitvā śarair jagat
analyzed: saṃpīḍya ca dhanuḥ ghoram kampayitvā śaraiḥ jagat
mumoca viśikhān ugrān vajrāṇi iva śatakratuḥ
te jvalantaḥ mahā vegāḥ tejasā sāyaka uttamāḥ
praviśanti samudrasya salilam trasta pannagam
tatas vegaḥ samudrasya sa nakra makaraḥ mahān
saṃbabhūva mahā ghoraḥ sa māruta ravaḥ tadā
mahā ūrmi mālā vitataḥ śaṅkha śukti samākulaḥ
sa dhūma parivṛtta ūrmiḥ sahasā abhūt mahā udadhiḥ
vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ ca āsan dīpta āsyāḥ dīpta locanāḥ
dānavāḥ ca mahā vīryāḥ pātāla tala vāsinaḥ
ūrmayaḥ sindhurājasya sa nakra makarāḥ tadā
vindhya mandara saṃkāśāḥ samutpetuḥ sahasraśas
āghūrṇita taraṅga oghaḥ saṃbhrānta uraga rākṣasaḥ
udvartita mahā grāhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ salilāśayaḥ

original: 6.015.001a tato madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ

original: 6.015.001c udayan hi mahāśailān meror iva divākaraḥ
analyzed: udayan hi mahā śailāt meroḥ iva divākaraḥ
pannagaiḥ saha dīpta āsyaiḥ samudraḥ pratyadṛśyata
snigdha vaidūrya saṃkāśaḥ jāmbūnada vibhūṣitaḥ
rakta mālya ambara dharaḥ padma patra nibha īkṣaṇaḥ
sāgaraḥ samatikramya pūrvam āmantrya vīryavān
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam rāghavam śara pāṇinam

original: 6.015.004a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: pṛthivī vāyuḥ ākāśam āpaḥ jyotiḥ ca rāghavaḥ

original: 6.015.004c svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvataṃ mārgam āśritāḥ
analyzed: svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvatam mārgam āśritāḥ

original: 6.015.005a tat svabhāvo mamāpy eṣa yad agādho 'ham aplavaḥ
analyzed: tat svabhāvaḥ mama api eṣa yat agādhaḥ ham a plavaḥ

original: 6.015.005c vikāras tu bhaved rādha etat te pravadāmy aham
analyzed: vikāraḥ tu bhavet rādhaḥ etat te pravadāmi aham

original: 6.015.006a na kāmān na ca lobhād vā na bhayāt pārthivātmaja
analyzed: na kāmāt na ca lobhāt vā na bhayāt pārthiva ātmaja
grāha nakra ākula jalam stambhayeyam katham cana

original: 6.015.007a vidhāsye rāma yenāpi viṣahiṣye hy ahaṃ tathā
analyzed: vidhāsye rāma yena api viṣahiṣye hi aham tathā

original: 6.015.007c grāhā na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati
analyzed: grāhāḥ na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati

original: 6.015.008a ayaṃ saumya nalo nāma tanujo viśvakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: ayam saumya nalaḥ nāma tanujaḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ
pitrā datta varaḥ śrīmān pratimaḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ

original: 6.015.009a eṣa setuṃ mahotsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa setum mahā utsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ

original: 6.015.009c tam ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hy eṣa yathā pitā
analyzed: tam aham dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hi eṣa yathā pitā

original: 6.015.010a evam uktvodadhir naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalas tataḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā udadhiḥ naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalaḥ tatas
abravīt vānara śreṣṭhaḥ vākyam rāmam mahā balaḥ
aham setum kariṣyāmi vistīrṇe varuṇālaye

original: 6.015.011c pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ
analyzed: pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ

original: 6.015.012a mama mātur varo datto mandare viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: mama mātuḥ varaḥ dattaḥ mandare viśvakarmaṇā
aurasaḥ tasya putraḥ ham sadṛśaḥ viśvakarmaṇā

original: 6.015.013a na cāpy aham anukto vai prabrūyām ātmano guṇān
analyzed: na ca api aham an uktaḥ vai prabrūyām ātmanaḥ guṇān
kāmam adya eva badhnantu setum vānara puṃgavāḥ
tatas nisṛṣṭa rāmeṇa sarvatas hari yūthapāḥ
abhipetuḥ mahā araṇyam hṛṣṭāḥ śata sahasraśas
te nagān naga saṃkāśāḥ śākhāmṛga gaṇa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.015.015c babhañjur vānarās tatra pracakarṣuś ca sāgaram
analyzed: babhañjuḥ vānarāḥ tatra pracakarṣuḥ ca sāgaram

original: 6.015.016a te sālaiś cāśvakarṇaiś ca dhavair vaṃśaiś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: te sālaiḥ ca aśvakarṇaiḥ ca dhavaiḥ vaṃśaiḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.015.016c kuṭajair arjunais tālais tikalais timiśair api
analyzed: kuṭajaiḥ arjunaiḥ tālaiḥ tikalaiḥ timiśaiḥ api

original: 6.015.017a bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiḥ ca karṇikāraiḥ ca puṣpitaiḥ
cūtaiḥ ca aśoka vṛkṣaiḥ ca sāgaram samapūrayan

original: 6.015.018a samūlāṃś ca vimūlāṃś ca pādapān harisattamāḥ
analyzed: sa mūlān ca vimūlān ca pādapān hari sattamāḥ
indra ketūn iva udyamya prajahruḥ harayaḥ tarūn
prakṣipyamāṇaiḥ acalaiḥ sahasā jalam uddhatam
samutpatitam ākāśam apāsarpat tatas tatas
daśa yojana vistīrṇam śata yojanam āyatam
nalaḥ cakre mahā setum madhye nadanadīpateḥ
śilānām kṣipyamāṇānām śailānām tatra pātyatām

original: 6.015.021c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tadā tasmin mahodadhau
analyzed: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ tadā tasmin mahā udadhau

original: 6.015.022a sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makarālaye
analyzed: sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makara ālaye
śuśubhe subhagaḥ śrīmān svātī pathaḥ iva ambare

original: 6.015.023a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 6.015.024a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: āplavantaḥ plavantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.015.024c tam acintyam asahyaṃ ca adbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tam acintyam asahyam ca adbhutam loma harṣaṇam
dadṛśuḥ sarva bhūtāni sāgare setu bandhanam
tāni koṭi sahasrāṇi vānarāṇām mahā ojasām

original: 6.015.025c badhnantaḥ sāgare setuṃ jagmuḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
analyzed: badhnantaḥ sāgare setum jagmuḥ pāram mahā udadheḥ
viśālaḥ su kṛtaḥ śrīmān su bhūmiḥ su samāhitaḥ
aśobhata mahā setuḥ sīmantaḥ iva sāgare
tatas pare samudrasya gadā pāṇiḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
pareṣām abhighata artham atiṣṭhat sacivaiḥ saha

original: 6.015.028a agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
jagāma dhanvī dharma ātmā sugrīveṇa samanvitaḥ
anye madhyena gacchanti pārśvatas nye plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.015.029c salile prapatanty anye mārgam anye na lebhire
analyzed: salile prapatanti anye mārgam anye na lebhire

original: 6.015.029e ke cid vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇā iva pupluvuḥ
analyzed: ke cit vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇāḥ iva pupluvuḥ
ghoṣeṇa mahatā ghoṣam sāgarasya samucchritam
bhīmam antardadhe bhīmā tarantī hari vāhinī

original: 6.015.031a vānarāṇāṃ hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā
analyzed: vānarāṇām hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā
tīre niviviśe rājñā bahu mūla phala udake
tat adbhutam rāghava karma duṣkaram
samīkṣya devāḥ saha siddha cāraṇaiḥ
upetya rāmam sahitāḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
samabhyaṣiñcan su śubhaiḥ jalaiḥ pṛthak
jayasva śatrūn naradeva medinīm
sa sāgarām pālaya śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
iti iva rāmam naradeva satkṛtam
śubhaiḥ vacobhiḥ vividhaiḥ apūjayan
sabale sāgaram tīrṇe rāme daśaratha ātmaje
amātyau rāvaṇaḥ śrīmān abravīt śuka sāraṇau

original: 6.016.002a samagraṃ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaṃ dustaraṃ vānaraṃ balam
analyzed: samagram sāgaram tīrṇam dustaram vānaram balam
abhūta pūrvam rāmeṇa sāgare setu bandhanam

original: 6.016.003a sāgare setubandhaṃ tu na śraddadhyāṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sāgare setu bandham tu na śraddadhyām katham cana

original: 6.016.003c avaśyaṃ cāpi saṃkhyeyaṃ tan mayā vānaraṃ balam
analyzed: avaśyam ca api saṃkhyeyam tat mayā vānaram balam
bhavantau vānaram sainyam praviśya anupalakṣitau

original: 6.016.004c parimāṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: parimāṇam ca vīryam ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.016.005a mantriṇo ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ

original: 6.016.005c ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.016.006a sa ca setur yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
analyzed: sa ca setuḥ yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salila arṇave

original: 6.016.006c niveśaś ca yathā teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: niveśaḥ ca yathā teṣām vānarāṇām mahātmanām

original: 6.016.007a rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ ca vīryaṃ praharaṇāni ca
analyzed: rāmasya vyavasāyam ca vīryam praharaṇāni ca

original: 6.016.007c lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvato jñātum arhatha
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvataḥ jñātum arhatha

original: 6.016.008a kaś ca senāpatis teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām
analyzed: kaḥ ca senāpatiḥ teṣām vānarāṇām mahā ojasām

original: 6.016.008c etaj jñātvā yathātattvaṃ śīghram agantum arhathaḥ
analyzed: etat jñātvā yathātattvam śīghram a gantum arhathaḥ
iti pratisamādiṣṭau rākṣasau śuka sāraṇau
hari rūpa dharau vīrau praviṣṭau vānaram balam

original: 6.016.010a tatas tad vānaraṃ sainyam acintyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas tat vānaram sainyam acintyam loma harṣaṇam
saṃkhyātum na adhyagacchetām tadā tau śuka sāraṇau

original: 6.016.011a tat sthitaṃ parvatāgreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
analyzed: tat sthitam parvata agreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
samudrasya ca tīreṣu vaneṣu upavaneṣu ca

original: 6.016.012a taramāṇaṃ ca tīrṇaṃ ca tartukāmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: taramāṇam ca tīrṇam ca tartu kāmam ca sarvaśas
niviṣṭam niviśat ca eva bhīma nādam mahā balam

original: 6.016.013a tau dadarśa mahātejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tau dadarśa mahā tejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
ācacakṣe tha rāmāya gṛhītvā śuka sāraṇau
laṅkāyāḥ samanuprāptau cārau parapuraṃjayau

original: 6.016.014a tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmaṃ nirāśau jīvite tadā
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmam nirāśau jīvite tadā
kṛta añjali puṭau bhītau vacanam ca idam ūcatuḥ
āvām iha āgatau saumya rāvaṇa prahitau ubhau
parijñātum balam kṛtsnam tava idam raghunandana

original: 6.016.016a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat vacanam śrutvā rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
abravīt prahasan vākyam sarva bhūta hite rataḥ

original: 6.016.017a yadi dṛṣṭaṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vayaṃ vā susamīkṣitāḥ
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭam balam kṛtsnam vayam vā su samīkṣitāḥ

original: 6.016.017c yathoktaṃ vā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ chandataḥ pratigamyatām
analyzed: yathā uktam vā kṛtam kāryam chandataḥ pratigamyatām
praviśya nagarīm laṅkām bhavadbhyām dhanada anujaḥ

original: 6.016.018c vaktavyo rakṣasāṃ rājā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: vaktavyaḥ rakṣasām rājā yathā uktam vacanam mama

original: 6.016.019a yad balaṃ ca samāśritya sītāṃ me hṛtavān asi
analyzed: yat balam ca samāśritya sītām me hṛtavān asi
tat darśaya yathākāmam sa sainyaḥ saha bāndhavaḥ
śvaḥkāle nagarīm laṅkām sa prākārām sa toraṇām

original: 6.016.020c rākṣasaṃ ca balaṃ paśya śarair vidhvaṃsitaṃ mayā
analyzed: rākṣasam ca balam paśya śaraiḥ vidhvaṃsitam mayā

original: 6.016.021a ghoraṃ roṣam ahaṃ mokṣye balaṃ dhāraya rāvaṇa
analyzed: ghoram roṣam aham mokṣye balam dhāraya rāvaṇa

original: 6.016.021c śvaḥkāle vajravān vajraṃ dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ
analyzed: śvaḥkāle vajravān vajram dānaveṣu iva vāsavaḥ
iti pratisamādiṣṭau rākṣasau śuka sāraṇau
āgamya nagarīm laṅkām abrūtām rākṣasa adhipam
vibhīṣaṇa gṛhītau tu vadha arhau rākṣasa īśvara
dṛṣṭvā dharma ātmanā muktau rāmeṇa amita tejasā
eka sthāna gatāḥ yatra catvāraḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ
lokapāla upamāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtāstrāḥ dṛḍha vikramāḥ

original: 6.016.025a rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃl lakṣmaṇaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ śrīmān lakṣmaṇaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
sugrīvaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ mahā indra sama vikramaḥ

original: 6.016.026a ete śaktāḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām
analyzed: ete śaktāḥ purīm laṅkām sa prākārām sa toraṇām
utpāṭya saṃkrāmayitum sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ

original: 6.016.027a yādṛśaṃ tasya rāmasya rūpaṃ praharaṇāni ca
analyzed: yādṛśam tasya rāmasya rūpam praharaṇāni ca

original: 6.016.027c vadhiṣyati purīṃ laṅkām ekas tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ
analyzed: vadhiṣyati purīm laṅkām ekaḥ tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇa guptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī
babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvaiḥ api sura asuraiḥ
prahṛṣṭa rūpā dhvajinī vanaukasām
mahātmanām saṃprati yoddhum icchatām
alam virodhena śamaḥ vidhīyatām
pradīyatām dāśarathāya maithilī
tat vacaḥ pathyam aklībam sāraṇena abhibhāṣitam
