niśamya rāvaṇaḥ rājā pratyabhāṣata sāraṇam
yadi mām abhiyuñjīran deva gandharva dānavāḥ
na eva sītām pradāsyāmi sarva loka bhayāt api

original: 6.017.003a tvaṃ tu saumya paritrasto haribhir nirjito bhṛśam
analyzed: tvam tu saumya paritrastaḥ haribhiḥ nirjitaḥ bhṛśam
pratipradānam adya eva sītāyāḥ sādhu manyase

original: 6.017.003e ko hi nāma sapatno māṃ samare jetum arhati
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma sapatnaḥ mām samare jetum arhati

original: 6.017.004a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā paruṣam vākyam rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
āruroha tatas śrīmān prāsādam hima pāṇḍuram
bahu tāla samutsedham didṛkṣayā
tābhyām carābhyām sahitaḥ rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 6.017.005c paśyamānaḥ samudraṃ ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
analyzed: paśyamānaḥ samudram ca parvatān ca vanāni ca
dadarśa pṛthivī deśam su saṃpūrṇam plavaṃgamaiḥ

original: 6.017.006a tad apāram asaṃkhyeyaṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahad balam
analyzed: tat apāram asaṃkhyeyam vānarāṇām mahat balam
ālokya rāvaṇaḥ rājā paripapraccha sāraṇam

original: 6.017.007a eṣāṃ vānaramukhyānāṃ ke śūrāḥ ke mahābalāḥ
analyzed: eṣām vānara mukhyānām ke śūrāḥ ke mahā balāḥ
ke pūrvam abhivartante mahā utsāhāḥ samantataḥ

original: 6.017.008a keṣāṃ śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapayūthapāḥ
analyzed: keṣām śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapa yūthapāḥ

original: 6.017.008c sāraṇācakṣva me sarvaṃ ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: sāraṇa ācakṣva me sarvam ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
sāraṇaḥ rākṣasa indrasya vacanam paripṛcchataḥ

original: 6.017.009c ācacakṣe 'tha mukhyajño mukhyāṃs tāṃs tu vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: ācacakṣe tha mukhya jñaḥ mukhyān tān tu vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.017.010a eṣa yo 'bhimukho laṅkāṃ nardaṃs tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa yaḥ abhimukhaḥ laṅkām nardan tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ
yūthapānām sahasrāṇām śatena parivāritaḥ
yasya ghoṣeṇa mahatā sa prākārā sa toraṇā
laṅkā pravepate sarvā sa śaila vana kānanā
sarva śākhāmṛga indrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.017.012c balāgre tiṣṭhate vīro nīlo nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
analyzed: bala agre tiṣṭhate vīraḥ nīlaḥ nāma eṣa yūthapaḥ

original: 6.017.013a bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyāṃ mahīṃ gacchati vīryavān
analyzed: bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyām mahīm gacchati vīryavān

original: 6.017.013c laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ ca vijṛmbhate
analyzed: laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopāt abhīkṣṇam ca vijṛmbhate
giri śṛṅga pratīkāśaḥ padma kiñjalka saṃnibhaḥ

original: 6.017.014c sphoṭayaty abhisaṃrabdho lāṅgūlaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sphoṭayati abhisaṃrabdhaḥ lāṅgūlam ca punar punar
yasya lāṅgūla śabdena svananti iva diśaḥ daśa
eṣa vānara rājena surgrīveṇa abhiṣecitaḥ
yauvarājye ṅgadaḥ nāma tvām āhvayati saṃyuge

original: 6.017.016a ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca
analyzed: ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca
utthāya ca vijṛmbhante krodhena hari puṃgavāḥ
ete duṣprasahāḥ ghorāḥ caṇḍāḥ caṇḍa parākramāḥ
aṣṭau śata sahasrāṇi daśa koṭi śatāni ca
ye enam anugacchanti vīrāḥ candana vāsinaḥ
eṣaḥ āśaṃsate laṅkām svena anīkena marditum
śvetaḥ rajata saṃkāśaḥ sa balaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ

original: 6.017.019c buddhimān vānaraḥ śūras triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
analyzed: buddhimān vānaraḥ śūraḥ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ

original: 6.017.020a tūrṇaṃ sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ
analyzed: tūrṇam sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ
vibhajan vānarīm senām anīkāni praharṣayan

original: 6.017.021a yaḥ purā gomatītīre ramyaṃ paryeti parvatam
analyzed: yaḥ purā gomatī tīre ramyam paryeti parvatam
nāmnā saṃkocanaḥ nāma nānā naga yutaḥ giriḥ

original: 6.017.022a tatra rājyaṃ praśāsty eṣa kumudo nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: tatra rājyam praśāsti eṣa kumudaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ
yaḥ sau śata sahasrāṇām sahasram parikarṣati
yasya vālāḥ bahu vyāmāḥ dīrgha lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ

original: 6.017.023c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇāḥ ghora karmaṇaḥ
adīnaḥ roṣaṇaḥ caṇḍaḥ saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣati
eṣā eva āśaṃsate laṅkām svena anīkena marditum

original: 6.017.025a yas tv eṣa siṃhasaṃkāśaḥ kapilo dīrghakesaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu eṣa siṃha saṃkāśaḥ kapilaḥ dīrgha kesaraḥ

original: 6.017.025c nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkāṃ didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
analyzed: nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkām didhakṣan iva cakṣuṣā

original: 6.017.026a vindhyaṃ kṛṣṇagiriṃ sahyaṃ parvataṃ ca sudarśanam
analyzed: vindhyam kṛṣṇagirim sahyam parvatam ca sudarśanam

original: 6.017.026c rājan satatam adhyāste rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
analyzed: rājan satatam adhyāste rambhaḥ nāma eṣa yūthapaḥ
śatam śata sahasrāṇām triṃśat ca hari yūthapāḥ
parivārya anugacchanti laṅkām marditum ojasā

original: 6.017.028a yas tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punar punar

original: 6.017.028c na ca saṃvijate mṛtyor na ca yūthād vidhāvati
analyzed: na ca saṃvijate mṛtyoḥ na ca yūthāt vidhāvati
mahā balaḥ vīta bhayaḥ ramyam sālveya parvatam

original: 6.017.029c rājan satatam adhyāste śarabho nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: rājan satatam adhyāste śarabhaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ

original: 6.017.030a etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārā nāma yūthapāḥ
analyzed: etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārāḥ nāma yūthapāḥ
rājam śata sahasrāṇi catvāriṃśat tathā eva ca

original: 6.017.031a yas tu megha ivākāśaṃ mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: yaḥ tu meghaḥ iva ākāśam mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
madhye vānara vīrāṇām surāṇām iva vāsavaḥ

original: 6.017.032a bherīṇām iva saṃnādo yasyaiṣa śrūyate mahān
analyzed: bherīṇām iva saṃnādaḥ yasya eṣa śrūyate mahān
ghoraḥ śākhāmṛga indrāṇām saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣatām
eṣa parvatam adhyāste pāriyātram anuttamam

original: 6.017.033c yuddhe duṣprasaho nityaṃ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: yuddhe duṣprasahaḥ nityam panasaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ
enam śata sahasrāṇām śata ardham paryupāsate
yūthapāḥ yūthapa śreṣṭham yeṣām yūthāni bhāgaśas

original: 6.017.035a yas tu bhīmāṃ pravalgantīṃ camūṃ tiṣṭhati śobhayan
analyzed: yaḥ tu bhīmām pravalgantīm camūm tiṣṭhati śobhayan

original: 6.017.035c sthitāṃ tīre samudrasya dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ
analyzed: sthitām tīre samudrasya dvitīyaḥ iva sāgaraḥ
eṣa dardara saṃkāśaḥ vinataḥ nāma yūthapaḥ

original: 6.017.036c pibaṃś carati parṇāśāṃ nadīnām uttamāṃ nadīm
analyzed: piban carati parṇa āśām nadīnām uttamām nadīm
ṣaṣṭiḥ śata sahasrāṇi balam asya plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.017.037c tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathanaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ

original: 6.017.038a yas tu gairikavarṇābhaṃ vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu gairika varṇa ābham vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ

original: 6.017.038c gavayo nāma tejasvī tvāṃ krodhād abhivartate
analyzed: gavayaḥ nāma tejasvī tvām krodhāt abhivartate
enam śata sahasrāṇi saptatiḥ paryupāsate
eṣaḥ āśaṃsate laṅkām svena anīkena marditum
ete duṣprasahāḥ ghorāḥ balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 6.017.040c yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhā yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
analyzed: yūthapāḥ yūthapa śreṣṭhāḥ yeṣām saṃkhyā na vidyate

original: 6.018.001a tāṃs tu te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān
analyzed: tān tu te ham pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān

original: 6.018.001c rāghavārthe parākrāntā ye na rakṣanti jīvitam
analyzed: rāghava arthe parākrāntāḥ ye na rakṣanti jīvitam

original: 6.018.002a snigdhā yasya bahuśyāmā bālā lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ
analyzed: snigdhāḥ yasya bahu śyāmāḥ bālāḥ lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ

original: 6.018.002c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇāḥ ghora karmaṇaḥ
pragṛhītāḥ prakāśante sūryasya iva marīcayaḥ
pṛthivyām ca anukṛṣyante haraḥ nāma eṣa yūthapaḥ
yam pṛṣṭhatas nugacchanti sahasraśas
drumān udyamya sahitāḥ laṅkā ārohaṇa tatparāḥ
eṣa koṭī sahasreṇa vānarāṇām mahā ojasām
ākāṅkṣate tvām saṃgrāme jetum parapuraṃjaya

original: 6.018.006a nīlān iva mahāmeghāṃs tiṣṭhato yāṃs tu paśyasi
analyzed: nīlān iva mahā meghān tiṣṭhataḥ yān tu paśyasi
asitām jana saṃkāśān yuddhe satya parākramān
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhān vīrān tīkṣṇa kopān bhaya āvahān
asaṃkhyeyān anirdeśyān param pāram iva udadheḥ

original: 6.018.008a parvateṣu ca ye ke cid viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca
analyzed: parvateṣu ca ye ke cit viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca

original: 6.018.008c ete tvām abhivartante rājann ṛṣkāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
analyzed: ete tvām abhivartante rājan ṛṣkāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: 6.018.009a eṣāṃ madhye sthito rājan bhīmākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ
analyzed: eṣām madhye sthitaḥ rājan bhīma akṣaḥ bhīma darśanaḥ
parjanyaḥ iva jīmūtaiḥ samantāt parivāritaḥ
ṛkṣavantam giri śreṣṭham adhyāste narmadām piban
sarva ṛkṣāṇām adhipatiḥ dhūmraḥ nāma eṣa yūthapaḥ

original: 6.018.011a yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśyainaṃ parvatopamam
analyzed: yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśya enam parvata upamam

original: 6.018.011c bhrātrā samāno rūpeṇa viśiṣṭas tu parākrame
analyzed: bhrātrā samānaḥ rūpeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ tu parākrame
saḥ eṣa jāmbavān nāma mahā yūthapa yūthapaḥ
praśāntaḥ guru vartī ca saṃprahāreṣu amarṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.018.013a etena sāhyaṃ sumahat kṛtaṃ śakrasya dhīmatā
analyzed: etena sāhyam su mahat kṛtam śakrasya dhīmatā

original: 6.018.013c devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāś ca bahavo varāḥ
analyzed: devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāḥ ca bahavaḥ varāḥ
āruhya parvata agrebhyaḥ mahā abhra vipulāḥ śilāḥ

original: 6.018.014c muñcanti vipulākārā na mṛtyor udvijanti ca
analyzed: muñcanti vipula ākārāḥ na mṛtyoḥ udvijanti ca

original: 6.018.015a rākṣasānāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānāṃ ca romaśāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānām ca romaśāḥ
etasya sainye bahavaḥ vicaranti agni tejasaḥ

original: 6.018.016a yaṃ tv enam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ plavamānam iva sthitam
analyzed: yam tu enam abhisaṃrabdham plavamānam iva sthitam
prekṣante vānarāḥ sarve sthitam yūthapa yūthapam
eṣa rājan sahasrākṣam paryupāste hari īśvaraḥ
balena bala saṃpannaḥ rambhaḥ nāma eṣa yūthapaḥ

original: 6.018.018a yaḥ sthitaṃ yojane śailaṃ gacchan pārśvena sevate
analyzed: yaḥ sthitam yojane śailam gacchan pārśvena sevate

original: 6.018.018c ūrdhvaṃ tathaiva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam
analyzed: ūrdhvam tathā eva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam

original: 6.018.019a yasmān na paramaṃ rūpaṃ catuṣpādeṣu vidyate
analyzed: yasmāt na paramam rūpam catuṣpādeṣu vidyate
śrutaḥ saṃnādanaḥ nāma vānarāṇām pitāmahaḥ

original: 6.018.020a yena yuddhaṃ tadā dattaṃ raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā
analyzed: yena yuddham tadā dattam raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā

original: 6.018.020c parājayaś ca na prāptaḥ so 'yaṃ yūthapayūthapaḥ
analyzed: parājayaḥ ca na prāptaḥ saḥ yam yūthapa yūthapaḥ
yasya vikramamāṇasya śakrasya iva parākramaḥ
eṣa gandharva kanyāyām utpannaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanā
purā devāsure yuddhe sāhya artham tridivaukasām
yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ rājā jambūm upaniṣevate
yaḥ rājā parvata indrāṇām bahu kiṃnara sevinām
vihāra sukha daḥ nityam bhrātuḥ te rākṣasa adhipa
tatra eṣa vasati śrīmān balavān vānara ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 6.018.023e yuddheṣv akatthano nityaṃ krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: yuddheṣu akatthanaḥ nityam krathanaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ
vṛtaḥ koṭi sahasreṇa harīṇām samupasthitaḥ
eṣā eva āśaṃsate laṅkām svena anīkena marditum

original: 6.018.025a yo gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hastiyūthapān
analyzed: yaḥ gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hasti yūthapān
hastinām vānarāṇām ca pūrva vairam anusmaran
eṣa yūtha patiḥ netā gacchan giri guhā āśayaḥ

original: 6.018.026c harīṇāṃ vāhinī mukhyo nadīṃ haimavatīm anu
analyzed: harīṇām vāhinī mukhyaḥ nadīm haimavatīm anu
uśīra bījam āśritya parvatam mandara upamam

original: 6.018.027c ramate vānaraśreṣṭho divi śakra iva svayam
analyzed: ramate vānara śreṣṭhaḥ divi śakraḥ iva svayam
enam śata sahasrāṇām sahasram abhivartate

original: 6.018.028c eṣa durmarṣaṇo rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ
analyzed: eṣa durmarṣaṇaḥ rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ
vātena iva uddhatam megham yam enam anupaśyasi
vivartamānam bahuśas yatra etat bahulam rajaḥ
ete sita mukhāḥ ghorāḥ golāṅgūlāḥ mahā balāḥ
śatam śata sahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā vai setu bandhanam
golāṅgūlam mahā vegam gavākṣam nāma yūthapam
parivārya abhivartante laṅkām marditum ojasā
bhramara ācaritāḥ yatra sarva kāma phala drumāḥ
yam sūrya tulya varṇa ābham anuparyeti parvatam

original: 6.018.033a yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tadvarṇā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tad varṇāḥ mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.018.033c yasya prasthaṃ mahātmāno na tyajanti maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: yasya prastham mahātmānaḥ na tyajanti mahā ṛṣayaḥ
tatra eṣa ramate rājan ramye kāñcana parvate
mukhyaḥ vānara mukhyānām kesarī nāma yūthapaḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ giri sahasrāṇām ramyāḥ kāñcana parvatāḥ

original: 6.018.035c teṣāṃ madhye girivaras tvam ivānagha rakṣasām
analyzed: teṣām madhye giri varaḥ tvam iva anagha rakṣasām
tatra ete kapilāḥ śvetāḥ tāmra āsyāḥ madhu piṅgalāḥ
nivasanti uttama girau tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭra nakha āyudhāḥ

original: 6.018.037a siṃha iva caturdaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ
analyzed: siṃhaḥ iva catur daṃṣṭrāḥ vyāghrāḥ iva durāsadāḥ
sarve vaiśvanara samāḥ jvalita āśīviṣa upamāḥ
su dīrgha āñcita lāṅgūlāḥ matta mātaṃga saṃnibhāḥ
mahā parvata saṃkāśāḥ mahā jīmūta nisvanāḥ

original: 6.018.039a eṣa caiṣām adhipatir madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān
analyzed: eṣa ca eṣām adhipatiḥ madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān

original: 6.018.039c nāmnā pṛthivyāṃ vikhyāto rājañ śatabalīti yaḥ
analyzed: nāmnā pṛthivyām vikhyātaḥ rājam śatabalī iti yaḥ
eṣā eva āśaṃsate laṅkām svena anīkena marditum

original: 6.018.040a gajo gavākṣo gavayo nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ nalaḥ nīlaḥ ca vānaraḥ

original: 6.018.040c ekaika eva yūthānāṃ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: ekaikaḥ eva yūthānām koṭibhiḥ daśabhiḥ vṛtaḥ
tathā anye vānara śreṣṭhāḥ vindhya parvata vāsinaḥ

original: 6.018.041c na śakyante bahutvāt tu saṃkhyātuṃ laghuvikramāḥ
analyzed: na śakyante bahu tvāt tu saṃkhyātum laghu vikramāḥ
sarve mahā rāja mahā prabhāvāḥ
sarve mahā śaila nikāśa kāyāḥ
sarve samarthāḥ pṛthivīm kṣaṇena
kartum pravidhvasta vikīrṇa śailām
sāraṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 6.019.001c balam ālokayan sarvaṃ śuko vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: balam ālokayan sarvam śukaḥ vākyam atha abravīt

original: 6.019.002a sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahādvipān
analyzed: sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahā dvipān

original: 6.019.002c nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva
analyzed: nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva
ete duṣprasahāḥ rājan balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
daitya dānava saṃkāśāḥ yuddhe deva parākramāḥ

original: 6.019.004a eṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi nava pañcaca sapta ca
analyzed: eṣām koṭi sahasrāṇi nava sapta ca
tathā śaṅkha sahasrāṇi tathā vṛnda śatāni ca
ete sugrīva sacivāḥ kiṣkindhā nilayāḥ sadā
harayaḥ deva gandharvaiḥ utpannāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 6.019.006a yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau devarūpiṇau
analyzed: yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau deva rūpiṇau

original: 6.019.006c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau tābhyāṃ nāsti samo yudhi
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca ubhau tābhyām na asti samaḥ yudhi
brahmaṇā samanujñātau amṛta prāśinau ubhau

original: 6.019.007c āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā
analyzed: āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā

original: 6.019.008a yāv etāv etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvatasaṃnibhau
analyzed: yau etau etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvata saṃnibhau

original: 6.019.008c sumukho vimukhaś caiva mṛtyuputrau pituḥ samau
analyzed: sumukhaḥ vimukhaḥ ca eva mṛtyu putrau pituḥ samau

original: 6.019.009a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
analyzed: yam tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantam prabhinnam iva kuñjaram

original: 6.019.009c yo balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ

original: 6.019.010a eṣo 'bhigantā laṅkāyā vaidehyās tava ca prabho
analyzed: eṣaḥ bhigantā laṅkāyāḥ vaidehyāḥ tava ca prabho

original: 6.019.010c enaṃ paśya purā dṛṣṭaṃ vānaraṃ punar āgatam
analyzed: enam paśya purā dṛṣṭam vānaram punar āgatam

original: 6.019.011a jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putro vātātmaja iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putraḥ vātātmajaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: 6.019.011c hanūmān iti vikhyāto laṅghito yena sāgaraḥ
analyzed: hanūmān iti vikhyātaḥ laṅghitaḥ yena sāgaraḥ
kāmarūpī hari śreṣṭhaḥ bala rūpa samanvitaḥ
anivārya gatiḥ ca eva yathā satatagaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 6.019.013a udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ
analyzed: udyantam bhāskaram dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ
tri yojana sahasram tu adhvānam avatīrya hi

original: 6.019.014a ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣut pratiyāsyati
analyzed: ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣudh pratiyāsyati
iti saṃcintya manasā purā eṣa bala darpitaḥ
anādhṛṣyatamam devam api deva ṛṣi dānavaiḥ
an āsādya eva patitaḥ bhāskara udayane girau

original: 6.019.016a patitasya kaper asya hanur ekā śilātale
analyzed: patitasya kapeḥ asya hanuḥ ekā śilā tale

original: 6.019.016c kiṃ cid bhinnā dṛḍhahanor hanūmān eṣa tena vai
analyzed: kim cit bhinnā dṛḍha hanoḥ hanūmān eṣa tena vai
satyam āgama yogena mama eṣa viditaḥ hariḥ

original: 6.019.017c nāsya śakyaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ prabhāvo vānubhāṣitum
analyzed: na asya śakyam balam rūpam prabhāvaḥ vā anubhāṣitum

original: 6.019.018a eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkām eko marditum ojasā
analyzed: eṣaḥ āśaṃsate laṅkām ekaḥ marditum ojasā
yaḥ ca eṣaḥ nantaraḥ śūraḥ śyāmaḥ padma nibha īkṣaṇaḥ
ikṣvākūṇām atirathaḥ loke vikhyāta pauruṣaḥ

original: 6.019.019c yasmin na calate dharmo yo dharmaṃ nātivartate
analyzed: yasmin na calate dharmaḥ yaḥ dharmam na ativartate

original: 6.019.020a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ brāhmam astram vedān ca veda veda vidām varaḥ

original: 6.019.020c yo bhindyād gaganaṃ bāṇaiḥ parvatāṃś cāpi dārayet
analyzed: yaḥ bhindyāt gaganam bāṇaiḥ parvatān ca api dārayet

original: 6.019.021a yasya mṛtyor iva krodhaḥ śakrasyeva parākramaḥ
analyzed: yasya mṛtyoḥ iva krodhaḥ śakrasya iva parākramaḥ

original: 6.019.021c sa eṣa rāmas tvāṃ yoddhuṃ rājan samabhivartate
analyzed: saḥ eṣa rāmaḥ tvām yoddhum rājan samabhivartate
yaḥ ca eṣa dakṣiṇe pārśve śuddha jāmbūnada prabhaḥ

original: 6.019.023a eṣo 'sya lakṣmaṇo nāma bhrātā prāṇasamaḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ sya lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma bhrātā prāṇa samaḥ priyaḥ
naye yuddhe ca kuśalaḥ sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ

original: 6.019.024a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
analyzed: amarṣī durjayaḥ jetā vikrāntaḥ buddhimān balī

original: 6.019.024c rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
analyzed: rāmasya dakṣiṇaḥ bāhuḥ nityam prāṇaḥ bahiścaraḥ

original: 6.019.025a na hy eṣa rāghavasyārthe jīvitaṃ parirakṣati
analyzed: na hi eṣa rāghavasya arthe jīvitam parirakṣati
eṣā eva āśaṃsate yuddhe nihantum sarva rākṣasān

original: 6.019.026a yas tu savyam asau pakṣaṃ rāmasyāśritya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: yaḥ tu savyam asau pakṣam rāmasya āśritya tiṣṭhati
rakṣaḥ gaṇa parikṣiptaḥ rājā hi eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
śrīmatā rājarājena laṅkāyām abhiṣecitaḥ
tvām eva pratisaṃrabdhaḥ yuddhāya eṣaḥ bhivartate

original: 6.019.028a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ madhye girim ivācalam
analyzed: yam tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantam madhye girim iva acalam
sarva śākhāmṛga indrāṇām bhartāram aparājitam
tejasā yaśasā buddhyā jñānena abhijanena ca

original: 6.019.029c yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān
analyzed: yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān
kiṣkindhām yaḥ samadhyāste guhām sa gahana drumām
durgām parvata durga sthām pradhānaiḥ saha yūthapaiḥ
yasya eṣā kāñcanī mālā śobhate śata puṣkarā
kāntā deva manuṣyāṇām yasyām lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitā

original: 6.019.032a etāṃ ca mālāṃ tārāṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: etām ca mālām tārām ca kapi rājyam ca śāśvatam
sugrīvaḥ vālinam hatvā rāmeṇa pratipāditaḥ

original: 6.019.033a evaṃ koṭisahasreṇa śaṅkūnāṃ ca śatena ca
analyzed: evam koṭi sahasreṇa śaṅkūnām ca śatena ca
sugrīvaḥ vānara indraḥ tvām yuddha artham abhivartate
imām mahā rāja samīkṣya vāhinīm
upasthitām prajvalita graha upamām
tatas prayatnaḥ paramaḥ vidhīyatām

original: yathā jayaḥ syān na paraiḥ parājayaḥ
analyzed: yathā jayaḥ syāt na paraiḥ parājayaḥ

original: 6.020.001a śukena tu samākhyātāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapān
analyzed: śukena tu samākhyātān tān dṛṣṭvā hari yūthapān

original: 6.020.001c samīpasthaṃ ca rāmasya bhrātaraṃ svaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: samīpa stham ca rāmasya bhrātaram svam vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.020.002a lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ bhujaṃ rāmasya dakṣiṇam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam ca mahā vīryam bhujam rāmasya dakṣiṇam
sarva vānara rājam ca sugrīvam bhīma vikramam

original: 6.020.003a kiṃ cid āvignahṛdayo jātakrodhaś ca rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: kim cit āvigna hṛdayaḥ jāta krodhaḥ ca rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.020.003c bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathānte śukasāraṇau
analyzed: bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathā ante śuka sāraṇau
adhomukhau tau praṇatau abravīt śuka sāraṇau
roṣa gadgadayā vācā saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣam vacaḥ

original: 6.020.005a na tāvat sadṛśaṃ nāma sacivair upajīvibhiḥ
analyzed: na tāvat sadṛśam nāma sacivaiḥ upajīvibhiḥ
vipriyam nṛpateḥ vaktum nigraha pragrahe vibhoḥ
ripūṇām pratikūlānām yuddha artham abhivartatām

original: 6.020.006c ubhābhyāṃ sadṛśaṃ nāma vaktum aprastave stavam
analyzed: ubhābhyām sadṛśam nāma vaktum aprastave stavam

original: 6.020.007a ācāryā guravo vṛddhā vṛthā vāṃ paryupāsitāḥ
analyzed: ācāryāḥ guravaḥ vṛddhāḥ vṛthā vām paryupāsitāḥ

original: 6.020.007c sāraṃ yad rājaśāstrāṇām anujīvyaṃ na gṛhyate
analyzed: sāram yat rāja śāstrāṇām anujīvyam na gṛhyate

original: 6.020.008a gṛhīto vā na vijñāto bhāro jñānasya vochyate
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ vā na vijñātaḥ bhāraḥ jñānasya vā uchyate

original: 6.020.008c īdṛśaiḥ sacivair yukto mūrkhair diṣṭyā dharāmy aham
analyzed: īdṛśaiḥ sacivaiḥ yuktaḥ mūrkhaiḥ diṣṭyā dharāmi aham

original: 6.020.009a kiṃ nu mṛtyor bhayaṃ nāsti māṃ vaktuṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: kim nu mṛtyoḥ bhayam nā asti mām vaktum paruṣam vacaḥ

original: 6.020.009c yasya me śāsato jihvā prayacchati śubhāśubham
analyzed: yasya me śāsataḥ jihvā prayacchati śubha aśubham

original: 6.020.010a apy eva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
analyzed: api eva dahanam spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
rāja doṣa parāmṛṣṭāḥ tiṣṭhante na aparādhinaḥ
hanyām aham imau pāpau śatru pakṣa praśaṃsakau

original: 6.020.011c yadi pūrvopakārair me na krodho mṛdutāṃ vrajet
analyzed: yadi pūrva upakāraiḥ me na krodhaḥ mṛdu tām vrajet
apadhvaṃsata gacchadhvam saṃnikarṣāt itas mama

original: 6.020.012c na hi vāṃ hantum icchāmi smarann upakṛtāni vām
analyzed: na hi vām hantum icchāmi smaran upakṛtāni vām

original: 6.020.012e hatāv eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi snehaparāṅmukhau
analyzed: hatau eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi sneha parāṅmukhau

original: 6.020.013a evam uktau tu savrīḍau tāv ubhau śukasāraṇau
analyzed: evam uktau tu sa vrīḍau tau ubhau śuka sāraṇau
rāvaṇam jaya śabdena pratinandya abhiniḥsṛtau
abravīt sa daśagrīvaḥ samīpa stham mahodaram
upasthāpaya śīghram me cārān nīti viśāradān
tatas carāḥ saṃtvaritāḥ prāptāḥ pārthiva śāsanāt
upasthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ vardhayitvā jaya āśiṣā

original: 6.020.016a tān abravīt tato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tān abravīt tatas vākyam rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
cārān pratyayikām śūrān bhaktān vigata sādhvasān
itas gacchata rāmasya vyavasāyam parīkṣatha

original: 6.020.017c mantreṣv abhyantarā ye 'sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ
analyzed: mantreṣu abhyantarāḥ ye sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ

original: 6.020.018a kathaṃ svapiti jāgarti kim anyac ca kariṣyati
analyzed: katham svapiti jāgarti kim anyat ca kariṣyati
vijñāya nipuṇam sarvam āgantavyam aśeṣatas
cāreṇa viditaḥ śatruḥ paṇḍitaiḥ vasudhā adhipaiḥ
yuddhe su alpena yatnena samāsādya nirasyate

original: 6.020.020a cārās tu te tathety uktvā prahṛṣṭā rākṣaseśvaram
analyzed: cārāḥ tu te tathā iti uktvā prahṛṣṭāḥ rākṣaseśvaram

original: 6.020.020c kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ jagmur yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam jagmuḥ yatra rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
te suvelasya śailasya samīpe rāma lakṣmaṇau
pracchannāḥ dadṛśuḥ gatvā sa sugrīva vibhīṣaṇau

original: 6.020.022a te tu dharmātmanā dṛṣṭā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: te tu dharma ātmanā dṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasa indreṇa rākṣasāḥ
vibhīṣaṇena tatrasthāḥ nigṛhītāḥ yadṛcchayā

original: 6.020.023a vānarair arditās te tu vikrāntair laghuvikramaiḥ
analyzed: vānaraiḥ arditāḥ te tu vikrāntaiḥ laghu vikramaiḥ
punar laṅkām anuprāptāḥ śvasantaḥ naṣṭa cetasaḥ
tatas daśagrīvam upasthitāḥ te
gireḥ suvelasya samīpa vāsinam
nyavedayan bhīma balam mahā balāḥ

original: 6.021.001a tatas tam akṣobhya balaṃ laṅkādhipataye carāḥ
analyzed: tatas tam a kṣobhya balam laṅkā adhipataye carāḥ
suvele rāghavam śaile niviṣṭam pratyavedayan

original: 6.021.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: cārāṇām rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptam rāmam mahā balam

original: 6.021.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cic chārdūlaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: jāta udvegaḥ bhavat kim cit śārdūlam vākyam abravīt

original: 6.021.003a ayathāvac ca te varṇo dīnaś cāsi niśācara
analyzed: ayathāvat ca te varṇaḥ dīnaḥ ca asi niśācara

original: 6.021.003c nāsi kaccid amitrāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
analyzed: na asi kaccit amitrāṇām kruddhānām vaśam āgataḥ

original: 6.021.004a iti tenānuśiṣṭas tu vācaṃ mandam udīrayat
analyzed: iti tena anuśiṣṭaḥ tu vācam mandam udīrayat
tadā rākṣasa śārdūlam śārdūlaḥ bhaya vihvalaḥ

original: 6.021.005a na te cārayituṃ śakyā rājan vānarapuṃgavāḥ
analyzed: na te cārayitum śakyāḥ rājan vānara puṃgavāḥ

original: 6.021.005c vikrāntā balavantaś ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ
analyzed: vikrāntāḥ balavantaḥ ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ

original: 6.021.006a nāpi saṃbhāṣituṃ śakyāḥ saṃpraśno 'tra na labhyate
analyzed: na api saṃbhāṣitum śakyāḥ saṃpraśnaḥ tra na labhyate
sarvatas rakṣyate panthāḥ vānaraiḥ parvata upamaiḥ
praviṣṭa mātre jñātaḥ ham bale tasmin acārite
balāt gṛhītaḥ bahubhiḥ bahudhā asmi vidāritaḥ

original: 6.021.008a jānubhir muṣṭibhir dantais talaiś cābhihato bhṛśam
analyzed: jānubhiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ dantaiḥ talaiḥ ca abhihataḥ bhṛśam
pariṇītaḥ smi haribhiḥ balavadbhiḥ amarṣaṇaiḥ
pariṇīya ca sarvatra nītaḥ ham rāma saṃsadam
rudhira ādigdha sarva aṅgaḥ vihvalaḥ calita indriyaḥ
haribhiḥ vadhyamānaḥ ca yācamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
rāghaveṇa paritrātaḥ jīvāmi ha yadṛcchayā

original: 6.021.011a eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiś ca pūrayitvā mahārṇavam
analyzed: eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiḥ ca pūrayitvā mahā arṇavam

original: 6.021.011c dvāram āśritya laṅkāyā rāmas tiṣṭhati sāyudhaḥ
analyzed: dvāram āśritya laṅkāyāḥ rāmaḥ tiṣṭhati sa āyudhaḥ
garuḍa vyūham āsthāya sarvatas haribhiḥ vṛtaḥ
mām visṛjya mahā tejāḥ laṅkām eva abhivartate

original: 6.021.013a purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataraṃ kuru
analyzed: purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataram kuru

original: 6.021.013c sītāṃ cāsmai prayacchāśu suyuddhaṃ vā pradīyatām
analyzed: sītām ca asmai prayaccha āśu su yuddham vā pradīyatām
manasā saṃtatāpa atha tat śrutvā rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.021.014c śārdūlasya mahad vākyam athovāca sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: śārdūlasya mahat vākyam atha uvāca sa rāvaṇaḥ
yadi mām pratiyudhyeran deva gandharva dānavāḥ
na eva sītām pradāsyāmi sarva loka bhayāt api

original: 6.021.016a evam uktvā mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt

original: 6.021.016c cāritā bhavatā senā ke 'tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: cāritā bhavatā senā ke tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.021.017a kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāś ca vānarā ye durāsadāḥ
analyzed: kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāḥ ca vānarāḥ ye durāsadāḥ

original: 6.021.017c kasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tattvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa
analyzed: kasya putrāḥ ca pautrāḥ ca tat tvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa

original: 6.021.018a tatr atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣāṃ balābalam
analyzed: tatra atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣām balābalam
avaśyam bala saṃkhyānam kartavyam yuddham icchatā
athā evam uktaḥ śārdūlaḥ rāvaṇena uttamaḥ caraḥ
idam vacanam ārebhe vaktum rāvaṇa saṃnidhau
atha ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ yudhi rājan su durjayaḥ
gadgadasya atha jāmbavān iti viśrutaḥ
gadgadasya eva putraḥ nyaḥ guru putraḥ śatakratoḥ

original: 6.021.021c kadanaṃ yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām
analyzed: kadanam yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām

original: 6.021.022a suṣeṇaś cāpi dharmātmā putro dharmasya vīryavān
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ ca api dharma ātmā putraḥ dharmasya vīryavān

original: 6.021.022c saumyaḥ somātmajaś cātra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: saumyaḥ soma ātmajaḥ ca atra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ

original: 6.021.023a sumukho durmukhaś cātra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: sumukhaḥ durmukhaḥ ca atra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
mṛtyuḥ vānara rūpeṇa nūnam sṛṣṭaḥ svayambhuvā
putraḥ hutavahasya atha nīlaḥ senāpatiḥ svayam

original: 6.021.024c anilasya ca putro 'tra hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: anilasya ca hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ

original: 6.021.025a naptā śakrasya durdharṣo balavān aṅgado yuvā
analyzed: naptā śakrasya durdharṣaḥ balavān aṅgadaḥ yuvā

original: 6.021.025c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau balināv aśvisaṃbhavau
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca ubhau balinau aśvi saṃbhavau
putrāḥ vaivasvatasya atra pañca kāla antaka upamāḥ
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
śvetaḥ jyotirmukhaḥ ca atra bhāskarasya ātmasaṃbhavau
varuṇasya ca hemakūṭaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
vikrāntaḥ vegavān atra vasu putraḥ su durdharaḥ
daśa vānara koṭyaḥ ca śūrāṇām yuddha kāṅkṣiṇām
śrīmatām deva putrāṇām śeṣān na ākhyātum utsahe
putraḥ daśarathasya eṣa siṃha saṃhananaḥ yuvā

original: 6.021.030c dūṣaṇo nihato yena kharaś ca triśirās tathā
analyzed: dūṣaṇaḥ nihataḥ yena kharaḥ ca triśirāḥ tathā

original: 6.021.031a nāsti rāmasya sadṛśo vikrame bhuvi kaś cana
analyzed: na asti rāmasya sadṛśaḥ vikrame bhuvi kaḥ cana
virādhaḥ nihataḥ yena kabandhaḥ ca antaka upamaḥ

original: 6.021.032a vaktuṃ na śakto rāmasya naraḥ kaś cid guṇān kṣitau
analyzed: vaktum na śaktaḥ rāmasya naraḥ kaḥ cit guṇān kṣitau
janasthāna gatāḥ yena tāvantaḥ rākṣasāḥ hatāḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ ca atra dharma ātmā mātaṃgānām iva ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 6.021.033c yasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya na jīved api vāsavaḥ
analyzed: yasya bāṇa patham prāpya na jīvet api vāsavaḥ

original: 6.021.034a rākṣasānāṃ variṣṭhaś ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām variṣṭhaḥ ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.021.034c parigṛhya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāghavasya hite rataḥ
analyzed: parigṛhya purīm laṅkām rāghavasya hite rataḥ

original: 6.021.035a iti sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ tavedaṃ vānaraṃ balam
analyzed: iti sarvam samākhyātam tava idam vānaram balam
suvele dhiṣṭhitam śaile śeṣa kārye bhavān gatiḥ

original: 6.022.001a tatas tam akṣobhyabalaṃ laṅkāyāṃ nṛpateś caraḥ
analyzed: tatas tam akṣobhya balam laṅkāyām nṛpateḥ caraḥ
suvele rāghavam śaile niviṣṭam pratyavedayan

original: 6.022.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: cārāṇām rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptam rāmam mahā balam

original: 6.022.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cit sacivāṃś cedam abravīt
analyzed: jāta udvegaḥ bhavat kim cit sacivān ca idam abravīt

original: 6.022.003a mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai susamāhitāḥ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai su samāhitāḥ

original: 6.022.003c ayaṃ no mantrakālo hi saṃprāpta iva rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: ayam naḥ mantra kālaḥ hi saṃprāptaḥ iva rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.022.004a tasya tac chāsanaṃ śrutvā mantriṇo 'bhyāgaman drutam
analyzed: tasya tat śāsanam śrutvā mantriṇaḥ bhyāgaman drutam

original: 6.022.004c tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa sacivai rākṣasaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas saṃmantrayām āsa sacivaiḥ rākṣasaiḥ saha

original: 6.022.005a mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamaṃ yat samanantaram
analyzed: mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamam yat samanantaram
visarjayitvā sacivān praviveśa svam ālayam
tatas rākṣasam āhūya vidyujjihvam mahā balam
māyā vidam mahā māyaḥ prāviśat yatra maithilī
vidyujjihvam ca māyā jñam abravīt rākṣasa adhipaḥ
mohayiṣyāmahe sītām māyayā janakātmajām
śiraḥ māyā mayam gṛhya rāghavasya niśācara

original: 6.022.008c māṃ tvaṃ samupatiṣṭhasva mahac ca saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: mām tvam samupatiṣṭhasva mahat ca sa śaram dhanuḥ

original: 6.022.009a evam uktas tathety āha vidyujjihvo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tathā iti āha vidyujjihvaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.022.009c tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam
analyzed: tasya tuṣṭaḥ bhavat rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam
aśoka vanikāyām tu praviveśa mahā balaḥ
tatas dīnām a dainya arhām dadarśa dhanada anujaḥ
adhomukhīm śoka parām upaviṣṭām mahī tale
bhartāram eva dhyāyantīm aśoka vanikām gatām
upāsyamānām ghorābhiḥ rākṣasībhiḥ adūrataḥ

original: 6.022.012a upasṛtya tataḥ sītāṃ praharṣan nāma kīrtayan
analyzed: upasṛtya tatas sītām praharṣan nāma kīrtayan

original: 6.022.012c idaṃ ca vacanaṃ dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām
analyzed: idam ca vacanam dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām

original: 6.022.013a sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase
analyzed: sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase

original: 6.022.013c khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ
analyzed: khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ

original: 6.022.014a chinnaṃ te sarvato mūlaṃ darpas te nihato mayā
analyzed: chinnam te sarvatas mūlam darpaḥ te nihataḥ mayā
vyasanena ātmanaḥ sīte mama bhāryā bhaviṣyasi
alpa puṇye nivṛtta arthe mūḍhe paṇḍita mānini

original: 6.022.015c śṛṇu bhartṛbadhaṃ sīte ghoraṃ vṛtravadhaṃ yathā
analyzed: śṛṇu bhartṛ badham sīte ghoram vṛtra vadham yathā

original: 6.022.016a samāyātaḥ samudrāntaṃ māṃ hantuṃ kila rāghavaḥ
analyzed: samāyātaḥ samudra antam mām hantum kila rāghavaḥ
vānara indra praṇītena balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
saṃniviṣṭaḥ samudrasya tīram āsādya dakṣiṇam

original: 6.022.017c balena mahatā rāmo vrajaty astaṃ divākare
analyzed: balena mahatā rāmaḥ vrajati astam divākare
atha adhvani pariśrāntam ardharātre sthitam balam
sukha suptam samāsādya cāritam prathamam caraiḥ
tat prahasta praṇītena balena mahatā mama

original: 6.022.019c balam asya hataṃ rātrau yatra rāmaḥ sulakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: balam asya hatam rātrau yatra rāmaḥ su lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.022.020a paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgāṃś cakrān daṇḍān mahāyasān
analyzed: paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgān cakrān daṇḍān mahā āyasān
bāṇa jālāni śūlāni bhāsvarān kūṭamudgarān

original: 6.022.021a yaṣṭīś ca tomarān prāsaṃś cakrāṇi musalāni ca
analyzed: yaṣṭīḥ ca tomarān prāsan cakrāṇi musalāni ca
udyamya udyamya rakṣobhiḥ vānareṣu nipātitāḥ
atha suptasya rāmasya prahastena pramāthinā
asaktam kṛtahastena śiraḥ chinnam mahā asinā
vibhīṣaṇaḥ samutpatya nigṛhītaḥ yadṛcchayā

original: 6.022.023c diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvair lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha
analyzed: diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvaiḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha
sugrīvaḥ grīvayā śete bhagnayā plavaga adhipaḥ
nirasta hanukaḥ śete hanūmān rākṣasaiḥ hataḥ

original: 6.022.025a jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihato yudhi
analyzed: jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihataḥ yudhi

original: 6.022.025c paṭṭasair bahubhiś chinno nikṛttaḥ pādapo yathā
analyzed: paṭṭasaiḥ bahubhiḥ chinnaḥ nikṛttaḥ pādapaḥ yathā

original: 6.022.026a maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau nihatau vānararṣabhau
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca ubhau nihatau vānara ṛṣabhau
niḥśvasantau rudantau ca rudhireṇa samukṣitau
asinā abhyāhataḥ chinnaḥ madhye ripu niṣūdanaḥ
abhiṣṭanati medinyām panasaḥ panasaḥ yathā

original: 6.022.028a nārācair bahubhiś chinnaḥ śete daryāṃ darīmukhaḥ
analyzed: nārācaiḥ bahubhiḥ chinnaḥ śete daryām darīmukhaḥ

original: 6.022.028c kumudas tu mahātejā niṣkūjan sāyakair hataḥ
analyzed: kumudaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ niṣkūjan sāyakaiḥ hataḥ

original: 6.022.029a aṅgado bahubhiś chinnaḥ śarair āsādya rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ bahubhiḥ chinnaḥ śaraiḥ āsādya rākṣasaiḥ
pātitaḥ rudhira udgārī kṣitau nipatitaḥ ṅgadaḥ
harayaḥ mathitāḥ nāgaiḥ ratha jālaiḥ tathā apare
śāyitāḥ mṛditāḥ tatra vāyu vegaiḥ iva ambudāḥ

original: 6.022.031a pradrutāś ca pare trastā hanyamānā jaghanyataḥ
analyzed: pradrutāḥ ca pare trastāḥ hanyamānāḥ jaghanyatas

original: 6.022.031c abhidrutās tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhair iva mahādvipāḥ
analyzed: abhidrutāḥ tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhaiḥ iva mahā dvipāḥ

original: 6.022.032a sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
analyzed: sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cit gaganam āśritāḥ

original: 6.022.032c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān upārūḍhā vānarais tu vimiśritāḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ vṛkṣān upārūḍhāḥ vānaraiḥ tu vimiśritāḥ

original: 6.022.033a sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
analyzed: sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca

original: 6.022.033c piṅgākṣās te virūpākṣair bahubhir bahavo hatāḥ
analyzed: piṅga akṣāḥ te virūpa akṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ bahavaḥ hatāḥ

original: 6.022.034a evaṃ tava hato bhartā sasainyo mama senayā
analyzed: evam tava hataḥ bhartā sa sainyaḥ mama senayā
kṣataja ārdram rajaḥ dhvastam idam ca asya āhṛtam śiraḥ
tatas parama durdharṣaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
sītāyām upaśṛṇvantyām rākṣasīm idam abravīt
rākṣasam krūra karmāṇam vidyujjihvam tvam ānaya

original: 6.022.036c yena tad rāghavaśiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam
analyzed: yena tat rāghava śiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam

original: 6.022.037a vidyujjihvas tato gṛhya śiras tat saśarāsanam
analyzed: vidyujjihvaḥ tatas gṛhya śiraḥ tat sa śarāsanam
praṇāmam śirasā kṛtvā rāvaṇasya agratas sthitaḥ

original: 6.022.038a tam abravīt tato rājā rāvaṇo rākṣasaṃ sthitam
analyzed: tam abravīt tatas rājā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasam sthitam
vidyujjihvam mahājihvam samīpaparivartinam

original: 6.022.039a agrataḥ kuru sītāyāḥ śīghraṃ dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ
analyzed: agratas kuru sītāyāḥ śīghram dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ

original: 6.022.039c avasthāṃ paścimāṃ bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu
analyzed: avasthām paścimām bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu

original: 6.022.040a evam uktaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ śiras tat priyadarśanam
analyzed: evam uktam tu tat rakṣaḥ śiraḥ tat priya darśanam
upanikṣipya sītāyāḥ kṣipram antaradhīyata

original: 6.022.041a rāvaṇaś cāpi cikṣepa bhāsvaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ca api cikṣepa bhāsvaram kārmukam mahat

original: 6.022.041c triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sītām idam uvāca ha
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātam sītām idam uvāca ha

original: 6.022.042a idaṃ tat tava rāmasya kārmukaṃ jyāsamanvitam
analyzed: idam tat tava rāmasya kārmukam jyā samanvitam

original: 6.022.042c iha prahastenānītaṃ hatvā taṃ niśi mānuṣam
analyzed: iha prahastena ānītam hatvā tam niśi mānuṣam
sa vidyujjihvena saha eva tat śiraḥ
dhanuḥ ca bhūmau vinikīrya rāvaṇaḥ
videha rājasya sutām yaśasvinīm
tatas bravīt tām bhava me vaśa anugā

original: 6.023.001a sā sītā tac chiro dṛṣṭvā tac ca kārmukam uttamam
analyzed: sā sītā tat śiraḥ dṛṣṭvā tat ca kārmukam uttamam
sugrīva pratisaṃsargam ākhyātam ca hanūmatā

original: 6.023.002a nayane mukhavarṇaṃ ca bhartus tat sadṛśaṃ mukham
analyzed: nayane mukha varṇam ca bhartuḥ tat sadṛśam mukham

original: 6.023.002c keśān keśāntadeśaṃ ca taṃ ca cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
analyzed: keśān keśānta deśam ca tam ca cūḍāmaṇim śubham
etaiḥ sarvaiḥ abhijñānaiḥ abhijñāya su duḥkhitā
vijagarhe tha kaikeyīm krośantī kurarī yathā
sa kāmā bhava kaikeyi hataḥ yam kula nandanaḥ
kulam utsāditam sarvam tvayā kalaha śīlayā

original: 6.023.005a āryeṇa kiṃ nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa vipriyam
analyzed: āryeṇa kim nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtam rāmeṇa vipriyam

original: 6.023.005c yad gṛhāc cīravasanas tayā prasthāpito vanam
analyzed: yat gṛhāt cīra vasanaḥ tayā prasthāpitaḥ vanam

original: 6.023.006a evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī

original: 6.023.006c jagāma jagatīṃ bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā
analyzed: jagāma jagatīm bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā

original: 6.023.007a sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām
analyzed: sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām
tat śiraḥ samupāghrāya vilalāpa āyata īkṣaṇā
hā hatā asmi mahā bāho vīra vratam anuvratā

original: 6.023.008c imāṃ te paścimāvasthāṃ gatāsmi vidhavā kṛtā
analyzed: imām te paścima avasthām gatā asmi vidhavā kṛtā

original: 6.023.009a prathamaṃ maraṇaṃ nāryā bhartur vaiguṇyam ucyate
analyzed: prathamam maraṇam nāryāḥ bhartuḥ vaiguṇyam ucyate
su vṛttaḥ sādhu vṛttāyāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tvam mama agratas
duḥkhāt duḥkham prapannāyāḥ magnāyāḥ śoka sāgare

original: 6.023.010c yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'pi tvaṃ vinipātitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi mām udyataḥ trātum tvam vinipātitaḥ

original: 6.023.011a sā śvaśrūr mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava
analyzed: sā śvaśrūḥ mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava

original: 6.023.011c vatseneva yathā dhenur vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
analyzed: vatsena iva yathā dhenuḥ vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā

original: 6.023.012a ādiṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyus te yair acintyaparākrama
analyzed: ādiṣṭam dīrgham āyuḥ te yaiḥ acintya parākrama

original: 6.023.012c anṛtaṃ vacanaṃ teṣām alpāyur asi rāghava
analyzed: anṛtam vacanam teṣām alpa āyuḥ asi rāghava

original: 6.023.013a atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi satas tava
analyzed: atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasya api sataḥ tava

original: 6.023.013c pacaty enaṃ tathā kālo bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hy ayam
analyzed: pacati enam tathā kālaḥ bhūtānām prabhavaḥ hi ayam

original: 6.023.014a adṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ nayaśāstravit
analyzed: adṛṣṭam mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvam naya śāstra vid

original: 6.023.014c vyasanānām upāyajñaḥ kuśalo hy asi varjane
analyzed: vyasanānām upāya jñaḥ kuśalaḥ hi asi varjane
tathā tvam saṃpariṣvajya raudrayā ati nṛśaṃsayā
kālarātryā mayā ācchidya hṛtaḥ kamala locanaḥ
upaśeṣe mahā bāho mām vihāya tapasvinīm

original: 6.023.016c priyām iva śubhāṃ nārīṃ pṛthivīṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: priyām iva śubhām nārīm pṛthivīm puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 6.023.017a arcitaṃ satataṃ yatnād gandhamālyair mayā tava
analyzed: arcitam satatam yatnāt gandha mālyaiḥ mayā tava

original: 6.023.017c idaṃ te matpriyaṃ vīra dhanuḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam
analyzed: idam te mad priyam vīra dhanuḥ kāñcana bhūṣitam
pitrā daśarathena tvam śvaśureṇa mama anagha

original: 6.023.018c pūrvaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nūnaṃ svarge samāgataḥ
analyzed: pūrvaiḥ ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdham nūnam svarge samāgataḥ

original: 6.023.019a divi nakṣatrabhūtas tvaṃ mahat karma kṛtaṃ priyam
analyzed: divi nakṣatra bhūtaḥ tvam mahat karma kṛtam priyam
puṇyam rājarṣi vaṃśam tvam ātmanaḥ samupekṣase

original: 6.023.020a kiṃ mān na prekṣase rājan kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
analyzed: kim mān na prekṣase rājan kim mām na pratibhāṣase

original: 6.023.020c bālāṃ bālena saṃprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ māṃ sahacāriṇīm
analyzed: bālām bālena saṃprāptām bhāryām mām sahacāriṇīm

original: 6.023.021a saṃśrutaṃ gṛhṇatā pāṇiṃ cariṣyāmīti yat tvayā
analyzed: saṃśrutam gṛhṇatā pāṇim cariṣyāmi iti yat tvayā

original: 6.023.021c smara tan mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām
analyzed: smara tat mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām

original: 6.023.022a kasmān mām apahāya tvaṃ gato gatimatāṃ vara
analyzed: kasmāt mām apahāya tvam gataḥ gatimatām vara

original: 6.023.022c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām
analyzed: asmāt lokāt amum lokam tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām

original: 6.023.023a kalyāṇair ucitaṃ yat tat pariṣvaktaṃ mayaiva tu
analyzed: kalyāṇaiḥ ucitam yat tat pariṣvaktam mayā eva tu

original: 6.023.023c kravyādais tac charīraṃ te nūnaṃ viparikṛṣyate
analyzed: kravyādaiḥ tat śarīram te nūnam viparikṛṣyate
agniṣṭoma ādibhiḥ yajñaiḥ iṣṭavān āpta dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: 6.023.024c agnihotreṇa saṃskāraṃ kena tvaṃ tu na lapsyase
analyzed: agnihotreṇa saṃskāram kena tvam tu na lapsyase
pravrajyām upapannānām trayāṇām ekam āgatam
pariprakṣyati kausalyā lakṣmaṇam śoka lālasā

original: 6.023.026a sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyā vadhaṃ mitrabalasya te
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyāḥ vadham mitra balasya te

original: 6.023.026c tava cākhyāsyate nūnaṃ niśāyāṃ rākṣasair vadham
analyzed: tava ca ākhyāsyate nūnam niśāyām rākṣasaiḥ vadham

original: 6.023.027a sā tvāṃ suptaṃ hataṃ śrutvā māṃ ca rakṣogṛhaṃ gatām
analyzed: sā tvām suptam hatam śrutvā mām ca rakṣaḥ gṛham gatām
hṛdayena vidīrṇena na bhaviṣyati rāghava

original: 6.023.028a sādhu pātaya māṃ kṣipraṃ rāmasyopari rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sādhu pātaya mām kṣipram rāmasya upari rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.023.028c samānaya patiṃ patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
analyzed: samānaya patim patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam

original: 6.023.029a śirasā me śiraś cāsya kāyaṃ kāyena yojaya
analyzed: śirasā me śiraḥ ca asya kāyam kāyena yojaya
rāvaṇa anugamiṣyāmi gatim bhartuḥ mahātmanaḥ
muhūrtam api nā icchāmi jīvitum pāpa jīvinā

original: 6.023.030a śrutaṃ mayā vedavidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pitur gṛhe
analyzed: śrutam mayā veda vidām brāhmaṇānām pituḥ gṛhe

original: 6.023.030c yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
analyzed: yāsām strīṇām priyaḥ bhartā tāsām lokāḥ mahā udayāḥ

original: 6.023.031a kṣamā yasmin damas tyāgaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtajñatā
analyzed: kṣamā yasmin damaḥ tyāgaḥ satyam dharmaḥ kṛtajña tā

original: 6.023.031c ahiṃsā caiva bhūtānāṃ tam ṛte kā gatir mama
analyzed: ahiṃsā ca eva bhūtānām tam ṛte kā gatiḥ mama
iti sā duḥkha saṃtaptā vilalāpa āyata īkṣaṇā

original: 6.023.032c bhartuḥ śiro dhanus tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā
analyzed: bhartuḥ śiraḥ dhanuḥ tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā
evam lālapyamānāyām sītāyām tatra rākṣasaḥ
abhicakrāma bhartāram anīka sthaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
vijayasva ārya putra iti saḥ bhivādya prasādya ca
nyavedayat anuprāptam prahastam vāhinīpatim
amātyaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ prahastaḥ samupasthitaḥ

original: 6.023.035c kiṃ cid ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ tvaṃ darśanaṃ kuru
analyzed: kim cit ātyayikam kāryam teṣām tvam darśanam kuru
etat śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ rākṣasa prativeditam
aśoka vanikām tyaktvā mantriṇām darśanam yayau

original: 6.023.037a sa tu sarvaṃ samarthyaiva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa tu sarvam samarthya eva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ
sabhām praviśya vidadhe viditvā rāma vikramam

original: 6.023.038a antardhānaṃ tu tac chīrṣaṃ tac ca kārmukam uttamam
analyzed: antardhānam tu tat śīrṣam tat ca kārmukam uttamam
jagāma rāvaṇasya eva niryāṇa samanantaram

original: 6.023.039a rākṣasendras tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ tu taiḥ sārdham mantribhiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
samarthayām āsa tadā rāma kārya viniścayam
avidūra sthitān sarvān balādhyakṣān hita eṣiṇaḥ
abravīt kāla sadṛśaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
śīghram bherī ninādena sphuṭa koṇa āhatena me

original: 6.023.041c samānayadhvaṃ sainyāni vaktavyaṃ ca na kāraṇam
analyzed: samānayadhvam sainyāni vaktavyam ca na kāraṇam
tatas tathā iti pratigṛhya tat vacaḥ
bala adhipāḥ te mahat ātmanaḥ balam
samānayan ca eva samāgatam ca te
nyavedayan bhartari yuddha kāṅkṣiṇi

original: 6.024.001a sītāṃ tu mohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī
analyzed: sītām tu mohitām dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī
āsasāda āśu vaidehīm priyām praṇayinī sakhī

original: 6.024.002a sā hi tatra kṛtā mitraṃ sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā
analyzed: sā hi tatra kṛtā mitram sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā
rakṣantī rāvaṇāt iṣṭā sa anukrośā dṛḍha vratā

original: 6.024.003a sā dadarśa sakhīṃ sītāṃ saramā naṣṭacetanām
analyzed: sā dadarśa sakhīm sītām saramā naṣṭa cetanām
upāvṛtya utthitām dhvastām vaḍavām iva pāṃsuṣu

original: 6.024.004a tāṃ samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā
analyzed: tām samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā

original: 6.024.004c uktā yad rāvaṇena tvaṃ pratyuktaṃ ca svayaṃ tvayā
analyzed: uktā yat rāvaṇena tvam pratyuktam ca svayam tvayā

original: 6.024.005a sakhīsnehena tad bhīru mayā sarvaṃ pratiśrutam
analyzed: sakhī snehena tat bhīru mayā sarvam pratiśrutam

original: 6.024.005c līnayā ganahe śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt
analyzed: līnayā śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt

original: 6.024.005e tava hetor viśālākṣi na hi me jīvitaṃ priyam
analyzed: tava hetoḥ viśāla akṣi na hi me jīvitam priyam

original: 6.024.006a sa saṃbhrāntaś ca niṣkrānto yat kṛte rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa saṃbhrāntaḥ ca niṣkrāntaḥ yat kṛte rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.024.006c tac ca me viditaṃ sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili
analyzed: tat ca me viditam sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili

original: 6.024.007a na śakyaṃ sauptikaṃ kartuṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
analyzed: na śakyam sauptikam kartum rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ
vadhaḥ ca puruṣa vyāghre tasmin eva upapadyate

original: 6.024.008a na caiva vānarā hantuṃ śakyāḥ pādapayodhinaḥ
analyzed: na ca eva vānarāḥ hantum śakyāḥ pādapa yodhinaḥ
surāḥ deva ṛṣabheṇa iva rāmeṇa hi su rakṣitāḥ
dīrgha vṛtta bhujaḥ śrīmān mahā uraskaḥ pratāpavān
dhanvī saṃhanana upetaḥ dharma ātmā bhuvi viśrutaḥ

original: 6.024.010a vikrānto rakṣitā nityam ātmanaś ca parasya ca
analyzed: vikrāntaḥ rakṣitā nityam ātmanaḥ ca parasya ca
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā kuśalī naya śāstra vid
hantā para bala oghānām acintya bala pauruṣaḥ

original: 6.024.011c na hato rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: na hataḥ rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
ayukta buddhi kṛtyena sarva bhūta virodhinā

original: 6.024.012c iyaṃ prayuktā raudreṇa māyā māyāvidā tvayi
analyzed: iyam prayuktā raudreṇa māyā māyā vidā tvayi

original: 6.024.013a śokas te vigataḥ sarvaḥ kalyāṇaṃ tvām upasthitam
analyzed: śokaḥ te vigataḥ sarvaḥ kalyāṇam tvām upasthitam

original: 6.024.013c dhruvaṃ tvāṃ bhajate lakṣmīḥ priyaṃ prītikaraṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: dhruvam tvām bhajate lakṣmīḥ priyam prīti karam śṛṇu
uttīrya sāgaram rāmaḥ saha vānara senayā
saṃniviṣṭaḥ samudrasya tīram āsādya dakṣiṇam
dṛṣṭaḥ me paripūrṇa arthaḥ kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
sahitaiḥ sāgara antasthaiḥ balaiḥ tiṣṭhati rakṣitaḥ

original: 6.024.016a anena preṣitā ye ca rākṣasā laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: anena preṣitāḥ ye ca rākṣasāḥ laghu vikramaḥ

original: 6.024.016c rāghavas tīrṇa ity evaṃ pravṛttis tair ihāhṛtā
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tīrṇaḥ iti evam pravṛttiḥ taiḥ iha āhṛtā

original: 6.024.017a sa tāṃ śrutvā viśālākṣi pravṛttiṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa tām śrutvā viśāla akṣi pravṛttim rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.024.017c eṣa mantrayate sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: eṣa mantrayate sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.024.018a iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha
analyzed: iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha
sarva udyogena sainyānām śabdam śuśrāva bhairavam
daṇḍa nirghāta vādinyāḥ śrutvā bheryāḥ mahā svanam
uvāca saramā sītām idam madhura bhāṣiṇī

original: 6.024.020a saṃnāhajananī hy eṣā bhairavā bhīru bherikā
analyzed: saṃnāha jananī hi eṣā bhairavā bhīru bherikā
bherī nādam ca gambhīram śṛṇu toyada nisvanam
kalpyante matta mātaṃgāḥ yujyante ratha vājinaḥ

original: 6.024.021c tatra tatra ca saṃnaddhāḥ saṃpatanti padātayaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra ca saṃnaddhāḥ saṃpatanti padātayaḥ
āpūryante rājamārgāḥ sainyaiḥ adbhuta darśanaiḥ

original: 6.024.022c vegavadbhir nadadbhiś ca toyaughair iva sāgaraḥ
analyzed: vegavadbhiḥ nadadbhiḥ ca toya oghaiḥ iva sāgaraḥ

original: 6.024.023a śāstrāṇāṃ ca prasannānāṃ carmaṇāṃ varmaṇāṃ tathā
analyzed: śāstrāṇām ca prasannānām carmaṇām varmaṇām tathā
ratha vāji gajānām ca bhūṣitānām ca rakṣasām
prabhām visṛjatām paśya nānā varṇām samutthitām
vanam nirdahataḥ dharme yathārūpam vibhāvasoḥ

original: 6.024.025a ghaṇṭānāṃ śṛṇu nirghoṣaṃ rathānāṃ śṛṇu nisvanam
analyzed: ghaṇṭānām śṛṇu nirghoṣam rathānām śṛṇu nisvanam
hayānām heṣamāṇānām śṛṇu tūrya dhvanim yathā
udyata āyudha hastānām rākṣasa indra anuyāyinām
saṃbhramaḥ rakṣasām eṣa tumulaḥ loma harṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.024.027a śrīs tvāṃ bhajati śokaghnī rakṣasāṃ bhayam āgatam
analyzed: śrīḥ tvām bhajati śoka ghnī rakṣasām bhayam āgatam
rāmāt kamala patra akṣi daityānām iva vāsavāt
avajitya jita krodhaḥ tam acintya parākramaḥ
rāvaṇam samare hatvā bhartā tvā adhigamiṣyati
vikramiṣyati rakṣaḥsu bhartā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.024.029c yathā śatruṣu śatrughno viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ
analyzed: yathā śatruṣu śatrughnaḥ viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ

original: 6.024.030a āgatasya hi rāmasya kṣipram aṅkagatāṃ satīm
analyzed: āgatasya hi rāmasya kṣipram aṅka gatām satīm

original: 6.024.030c ahaṃ drakṣyāmi siddhārthāṃ tvāṃ śatrau vinipātite
analyzed: aham drakṣyāmi siddhārthām tvām śatrau vinipātite
aśrūṇi ānanda jāni tvam vartayiṣyasi śobhane
samāgamya pariṣvaktā tasya urasi mahā urasaḥ

original: 6.024.032a acirān mokṣyate sīte devi te jaghanaṃ gatām
analyzed: acirāt mokṣyate sīte devi te jaghanam gatām

original: 6.024.032c dhṛtām etāṃ bahūn māsān veṇīṃ rāmo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: dhṛtām etām bahūn māsān veṇīm rāmaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.024.033a tasya dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ devi pūrṇacandram ivoditam
analyzed: tasya dṛṣṭvā mukham devi pūrṇa candram iva uditam

original: 6.024.033c mokṣyase śokajaṃ vāri nirmokam iva pannagī
analyzed: mokṣyase śoka jam vāri nirmokam iva pannagī

original: 6.024.034a rāvaṇaṃ samare hatvā nacirād eva maithili
analyzed: rāvaṇam samare hatvā nacirāt eva maithili

original: 6.024.034c tvayā samagraṃ priyayā sukhārho lapsyate sukham
analyzed: tvayā samagram priyayā sukha arhaḥ lapsyate sukham
samāgatā tvam rāmeṇa modiṣyasi mahātmanā
suvarṣeṇa samāyuktā yathā sasyena medinī
giri varam abhitas nuvartamānaḥ

original: haya iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti
analyzed: hayaḥ iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti
tam iha śaraṇam abhyupehi devi
divasakaram prabhavaḥ hi ayam prajānām

original: 6.025.001a atha tāṃ jātasaṃtāpāṃ tena vākyena mohitām
analyzed: atha tām jāta saṃtāpām tena vākyena mohitām

original: 6.025.001c saramā hlādayām āsa pṛtivīṃ dyaur ivāmbhasā
analyzed: saramā hlādayām āsa pṛtivīm dyauḥ iva ambhasā

original: 6.025.002a tatas tasyā hitaṃ sakhyāś cikīrṣantī sakhī vacaḥ
analyzed: tatas tasyāḥ hitam sakhyāḥ cikīrṣantī sakhī vacaḥ
uvāca kāle kāla jñā smita pūrva abhibhāṣiṇī
utsaheyam aham gatvā tvad vākyam asita īkṣaṇe
nivedya kuśalam rāme praticchannā nivartitum

original: 6.025.004a na hi me kramamāṇāyā nirālambe vihāyasi
analyzed: na hi me kramamāṇāyāḥ nirālambe vihāyasi

original: 6.025.004c samartho gatim anvetuṃ pavano garuḍo 'pi vā
analyzed: samarthaḥ gatim anvetum pavanaḥ vā

original: 6.025.005a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ sītā saramāṃ punar abravīt
analyzed: evam bruvāṇām tām sītā saramām punar abravīt
madhuram ślakṣṇayā vācā pūrva śoka abhipannayā

original: 6.025.006a samarthā gaganaṃ gantum api vā tvaṃ rasātalam
analyzed: samarthā gaganam gantum api vā tvam rasātalam
avagacchāmi a kartavyam kartavyam te mad antare

original: 6.025.007a matpriyaṃ yadi kartavyaṃ yadi buddhiḥ sthirā tava
analyzed: mad priyam yadi kartavyam yadi buddhiḥ sthirā tava

original: 6.025.007c jñātum icchāmi taṃ gatvā kiṃ karotīti rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: jñātum icchāmi tam gatvā kim karoti iti rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.025.008a sa hi māyābalaḥ krūro rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa hi māyā balaḥ krūraḥ rāvaṇaḥ śatru rāvaṇaḥ
mām mohayati duṣṭa ātmā pīta mātrā iva vāruṇī
tarjāpayati mām nityam bhartsāpayati ca asakṛt

original: 6.025.009c rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir yā māṃ rakṣanti nityaśaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasībhiḥ su ghorābhiḥ yāḥ mām rakṣanti nityaśas

original: 6.025.010a udvignā śaṅkitā cāsmi na ca svasthaṃ mano mama
analyzed: udvignā śaṅkitā ca asmi na ca svastham manaḥ mama

original: 6.025.010c tad bhayāc cāham udvignā aśokavanikāṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: tat bhayāt ca aham udvignā aśoka vanikām gatāḥ

original: 6.025.011a yadi nāma kathā tasya niścitaṃ vāpi yad bhavet
analyzed: yadi nāma kathā tasya niścitam vā api yat bhavet

original: 6.025.011c nivedayethāḥ sarvaṃ tat paro me syād anugrahaḥ
analyzed: nivedayethāḥ sarvam tat paraḥ me syāt anugrahaḥ

original: 6.025.012a sā tv evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ saramā valgubhāṣiṇī
analyzed: sā tu evam bruvatīm sītām saramā valgu bhāṣiṇī
uvāca vacanam tasyāḥ spṛśantī bāṣpa viklavam

original: 6.025.013a eṣa te yady abhiprāyas tasmād gacchāmi jānaki
analyzed: eṣa te yadi abhiprāyaḥ tasmāt gacchāmi jānaki

original: 6.025.013c gṛhya śatror abhiprāyam upāvṛttāṃ ca paśya mām
analyzed: gṛhya śatroḥ abhiprāyam upāvṛttām ca paśya mām

original: 6.025.014a evam uktvā tato gatvā samīpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas gatvā samīpam tasya rakṣasaḥ
śuśrāva kathitam tasya rāvaṇasya sa mantriṇaḥ

original: 6.025.015a sā śrutvā niścayaṃ tasya niścayajñā durātmanaḥ
analyzed: sā śrutvā niścayam tasya niścaya jñā durātmanaḥ
punar eva agamat kṣipram aśoka vanikām tadā

original: 6.025.016a sā praviṣṭā punas tatra dadarśa janakātmajām
analyzed: sā praviṣṭā punar tatra dadarśa janakātmajām

original: 6.025.016c pratīkṣamāṇāṃ svām eva bhraṣṭapadmām iva śriyam
analyzed: pratīkṣamāṇām svām eva bhraṣṭa padmām iva śriyam

original: 6.025.017a tāṃ tu sītā punaḥ prāptāṃ saramāṃ valgubhāṣiṇīm
analyzed: tām tu sītā punar prāptām saramām valgu bhāṣiṇīm

original: 6.025.017c pariṣvajya ca susnigdhaṃ dadau ca svayam āsanam
analyzed: pariṣvajya ca su snigdham dadau ca svayam āsanam

original: 6.025.018a ihāsīnā sukhaṃ sarvam ākhyāhi mama tattvataḥ
analyzed: iha āsīnā sukham sarvam ākhyāhi mama tattvataḥ
krūrasya niścayam tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.025.019a evam uktā tu saramā sītayā vepamānayā
analyzed: evam uktā tu saramā sītayā vepamānayā
kathitam sarvam ācaṣṭa rāvaṇasya sa mantriṇaḥ
jananyā rākṣasa indraḥ vai tvad mokṣa artham bṛhat vacaḥ
a viddhena ca vaidehi mantri vṛddhena bodhitaḥ
dīyatām abhisatkṛtya manuja indrāya maithilī

original: 6.025.021c nidarśanaṃ te paryāptaṃ janasthāne yad adbhutam
analyzed: nidarśanam te paryāptam janasthāne yat adbhutam

original: 6.025.022a laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya darśanaṃ ca hanūmataḥ
analyzed: laṅghanam ca samudrasya darśanam ca hanūmataḥ

original: 6.025.022c vadhaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryān mānuṣo bhuvi
analyzed: vadham ca rakṣasām yuddhe kaḥ kuryāt mānuṣaḥ bhuvi

original: 6.025.023a evaṃ sa mantrivṛddhaiś ca mātrā ca bahu bhāṣitaḥ
analyzed: evam sa mantri vṛddhaiḥ ca mātrā ca bahu bhāṣitaḥ

original: 6.025.023c na tvām utsahate moktum artahm arthaparo yathā
analyzed: na tvām utsahate moktum artha paraḥ yathā

original: 6.025.024a notsahaty amṛto moktuṃ yuddhe tvām iti maithili
analyzed: na utsahati a mṛtaḥ moktum yuddhe tvām iti maithili

original: 6.025.024c sāmātyasya nṛśaṃsasya niścayo hy eṣa vartate
analyzed: sa amātyasya nṛśaṃsasya niścayaḥ hi eṣa vartate

original: 6.025.025a tad eṣā susthirā buddhir mṛtyulobhād upasthitā
analyzed: tat eṣā su sthirā buddhiḥ mṛtyu lobhāt upasthitā

original: 6.025.025c bhayān na śaktas tvāṃ moktum anirastas tu saṃyuge
analyzed: bhayāt na śaktaḥ tvām moktum a nirastaḥ tu saṃyuge

original: 6.025.025e rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣām ātmanaś ca vadhena hi
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca sarveṣām ātmanaḥ ca vadhena hi

original: 6.025.026a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: nihatya rāvaṇam saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
pratineṣyati rāmaḥ tvām ayodhyām asita īkṣaṇe
etasmin antare śabdaḥ bherī śaṅkha samākulaḥ
śrutaḥ vai sarva sainyānām kampayan dharaṇī talam
śrutvā tu tam vānara sainya śabdam
laṅkā gatāḥ rākṣasa rāja bhṛtyāḥ
naṣṭa ojasaḥ dainya parīta ceṣṭāḥ
śreyaḥ na paśyanti nṛpasya doṣaiḥ
tena śaṅkha vimiśreṇa bherī śabdena rāghavaḥ
upayataḥ mahā bāhuḥ rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
tam ninādam niśamya atha rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
muhūrtam dhyānam āsthāya sacivān abhyudaikṣata

original: 6.026.003a atha tān sacivāṃs tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: atha tān sacivān tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.026.003c sabhāṃ saṃnādayan sarvām ity uvāca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sabhām saṃnādayan sarvām iti uvāca mahā balaḥ
taraṇam sāgarasya api vikramam bala saṃcayam

original: 6.026.004c yad uktavanto rāmasya bhavantas tan mayā śrutam
analyzed: yat uktavantaḥ rāmasya bhavantaḥ tat mayā śrutam

original: 6.026.004e bhavataś cāpy ahaṃ vedmi yuddhe satyaparākramān
analyzed: bhavataḥ ca api aham vedmi yuddhe satya parākramān

original: 6.026.005a tatas tu sumahāprājño mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu su mahā prājñaḥ mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mātuḥ paitāmahaḥ bravīt

original: 6.026.006a vidyāsv abhivinīto yo rājā rājan nayānugaḥ
analyzed: vidyāsu abhivinītaḥ yaḥ rājā rājan naya anugaḥ

original: 6.026.006c sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīṃś ca kurute vaśe
analyzed: sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīn ca kurute vaśe

original: 6.026.007a saṃdadhāno hi kālena vigṛhṇaṃś cāribhiḥ saha
analyzed: saṃdadhānaḥ hi kālena vigṛhṇan ca aribhiḥ saha
sva pakṣa vardhanam kurvat mahat aiśvaryam aśnute

original: 6.026.008a hīyamānena kartavyo rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca
analyzed: hīyamānena kartavyaḥ rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca

original: 6.026.008c na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham
analyzed: na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham

original: 6.026.009a tan mahyaṃ rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa
analyzed: tat mahyam rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa

original: 6.026.009c yadartham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām
analyzed: yad artham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām

original: 6.026.010a tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāḥ ca jaya eṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.026.010c virodhaṃ mā gamas tena saṃdhis te tena rocatām
analyzed: virodham mā gamaḥ tena saṃdhiḥ te tena rocatām

original: 6.026.011a asṛjad bhagavān pakṣau dvāv eva hi pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: asṛjat bhagavān pakṣau dvau eva hi pitāmahaḥ
surāṇām asurāṇām ca dharma adharmau tad āśrayau

original: 6.026.012a dharmo hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇām ca mahātmanām

original: 6.026.012c adharmo rakṣasaṃ pakṣo hy asurāṇāṃ ca rāvaṇa
analyzed: adharmaḥ rakṣasam pakṣaḥ hi asurāṇām ca rāvaṇa

original: 6.026.013a dharmo vai grasate 'dharmaṃ tataḥ kṛtam abhūd yugam
analyzed: dharmaḥ vai grasate dharmam tatas kṛtam abhūt yugam

original: 6.026.013c adharmo grasate dharmaṃ tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate
analyzed: adharmaḥ grasate dharmam tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate

original: 6.026.014a tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmo vinihato mahān
analyzed: tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmaḥ vinihataḥ mahān
adharmaḥ pragṛhītaḥ ca tena asmat balinaḥ pare

original: 6.026.015a sa pramādād vivṛddhas te 'dharmo 'hir grasate hi naḥ
analyzed: sa pramādāt vivṛddhaḥ te dharmaḥ hiḥ grasate hi naḥ
vivardhayati pakṣam ca surāṇām sura bhāvanaḥ
viṣayeṣu prasaktena yat kiṃcid kāriṇā tvayā
ṛṣīṇām agni kalpānām udvegaḥ janitaḥ mahān

original: 6.026.016e teṣāṃ prabhāvo durdharṣaḥ pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: teṣām prabhāvaḥ durdharṣaḥ pradīptaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
tapasā bhāvita ātmānaḥ dharmasya anugrahe ratāḥ

original: 6.026.017c mukhyair yajñair yajanty ete nityaṃ tais tair dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: mukhyaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajanti ete nityam taiḥ taiḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: 6.026.018a juhvaty agnīṃś ca vidhivad vedāṃś coccair adhīyate
analyzed: juhvati agnīn ca vidhivat vedān ca uccais adhīyate
abhibhūya ca rakṣāṃsi brahmaghoṣān udairayan
diśaḥ vipradrutāḥ sarve stanayitnuḥ iva uṣṇage
ṛṣīṇām agni kalpānām agni hotra samutthitaḥ

original: 6.026.019c ādatte rakṣasāṃ tejo dhūmo vyāpya diśo daśa
analyzed: ādatte rakṣasām tejaḥ dhūmaḥ vyāpya diśaḥ daśa

original: 6.026.020a teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍhavrataiḥ
analyzed: teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍha vrataiḥ
caryamāṇam tapaḥ tīvram saṃtāpayati rākṣasān

original: 6.026.021a utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhāṃs tathā
analyzed: utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhān tathā
vināśam anupaśyāmi sarveṣām rakṣasām aham
kharābhiḥ tanitāḥ ghorāḥ meghāḥ pratibhayaṃkaraḥ
śoṇitena abhivarṣanti laṅkām uṣṇena sarvatas
rudatām vāhanānām ca prapatanti asra bindavaḥ

original: 6.026.023c dhvajā dhvastā vivarṇāś ca na prabhānti yathāpuram
analyzed: dhvajāḥ dhvastāḥ vivarṇāḥ ca na prabhānti yathāpuram

original: 6.026.024a vyālā gomāyavo gṛdhrā vāśanti ca subhairavam
analyzed: vyālāḥ gomāyavaḥ gṛdhrāḥ vāśanti ca su bhairavam

original: 6.026.024c praviśya laṅkām aniśaṃ samavāyāṃś ca kurvate
analyzed: praviśya laṅkām aniśam samavāyān ca kurvate

original: 6.026.025a kālikāḥ pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ prahasanty agrataḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: kālikāḥ pāṇḍuraiḥ dantaiḥ prahasanti agratas sthitāḥ

original: 6.026.025c striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyo gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca
analyzed: striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyaḥ gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca
gṛhāṇām bali karmāṇi śvānaḥ paryupabhuñjate

original: 6.026.026c kharā goṣu prajāyante mūṣikā nakulaiḥ saha
analyzed: kharāḥ goṣu prajāyante mūṣikāḥ nakulaiḥ saha

original: 6.026.027a mārjārā dvīpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha
analyzed: mārjārāḥ dvīpibhiḥ sārdham sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha

original: 6.026.027c kiṃnarā rākṣasaiś cāpi sameyur mānuṣaiḥ saha
analyzed: kiṃnarāḥ rākṣasaiḥ ca api sameyuḥ mānuṣaiḥ saha
pāṇḍurāḥ raktapādāḥ ca vihagāḥ kāla coditāḥ
rākṣasānām vināśāya kapotāḥ vicaranti ca

original: 6.026.029a cīkī kūcīti vāśantyaḥ śārikā veśmasu sthitāḥ
analyzed: cīkī kūcī iti vāśantyaḥ śārikāḥ veśmasu sthitāḥ
patanti grathitāḥ ca api nirjitāḥ kalaha eṣiṇaḥ
kālaḥ gṛhāṇi sarveṣām kāle kāle nu avekṣate

original: 6.026.030e etāny anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāny utpatanti ca
analyzed: etāni anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāni utpatanti ca

original: 6.026.031a viṣṇuṃ manyāmahe rāmaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
analyzed: viṣṇum manyāmahe rāmam mānuṣam deham āsthitam
na hi sau rāghavaḥ dṛḍha vikramaḥ

original: 6.026.032a yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ paramādbhutaḥ
analyzed: yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ parama adbhutaḥ
kuruṣva nara rājena saṃdhim rāmeṇa rāvaṇa
idam vacaḥ tatra nigadya mālyavan
parīkṣya rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ manaḥ punar
anuttameṣu uttama pauruṣaḥ balī
babhūva tūṣṇīm samavekṣya rāvaṇam

original: 6.027.001a tat tu mālyavato vākyaṃ hitam uktaṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tat tu mālyavataḥ vākyam hitam uktam daśānanaḥ

original: 6.027.001c na marṣayati duṣṭātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ
analyzed: na marṣayati duṣṭa ātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ

original: 6.027.002a sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ
analyzed: sa baddhvā bhrukuṭim vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ
amarṣāt parivṛtta akṣaḥ mālyavantam atha abravīt

original: 6.027.003a hitabuddhyā yad ahitaṃ vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate
analyzed: hita buddhyā yat ahitam vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate
para pakṣam praviśya eva na etat śrotra gatam mama
mānuṣam kṛpaṇam rāmam ekam śākhāmṛga āśrayam

original: 6.027.004c samarthaṃ manyase kena tyaktaṃ pitrā vanālayam
analyzed: samartham manyase kena tyaktam pitrā vana ālayam

original: 6.027.005a rakṣasām īśvaraṃ māṃ ca devatānāṃ bhayaṃkaram
analyzed: rakṣasām īśvaram mām ca devatānām bhayaṃkaram

original: 6.027.005c hīnaṃ māṃ manyase kena ahīnaṃ sarvavikramaiḥ
analyzed: hīnam mām manyase kena ahīnam sarva vikramaiḥ

original: 6.027.006a vīradveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ
analyzed: vīra dveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ
tvayā aham paruṣāṇi uktaḥ para protsāhanena vā
prabhavantam pada stham hi paruṣam kaḥ h vidhāsyati

original: 6.027.008a ānīya ca vanāt sītāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
analyzed: ānīya ca vanāt sītām padma hīnām iva śriyam
kimartham pratidāsyāmi rāghavasya bhayāt aham
vṛtam vānara koṭībhiḥ sa sugrīvam sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.027.009c paśya kaiś cid ahobhis tvaṃ rāghavaṃ nihataṃ mayā
analyzed: paśya kaiḥ cit ahobhiḥ tvam rāghavam nihatam mayā

original: 6.027.010a dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāny api saṃyuge
analyzed: dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāni api saṃyuge

original: 6.027.010c sa kasmād rāvaṇo yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati
analyzed: sa kasmāt rāvaṇaḥ yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati

original: 6.027.011a dvidhā bhajyeyam apy evaṃ na nameyaṃ tu kasya cit
analyzed: dvidhā bhajyeyam api evam na nameyam tu kasya cit

original: 6.027.011c eṣa me sahajo doṣaḥ svabhāvo duratikramaḥ
analyzed: eṣa me sahajaḥ doṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ duratikramaḥ

original: 6.027.012a yadi tāvat samudre tu setur baddho yadṛcchayā
analyzed: yadi tāvat samudre tu setuḥ baddhaḥ yadṛcchayā

original: 6.027.012c rāmeṇa vismayaḥ ko 'tra yena te bhayam āgatam
analyzed: rāmeṇa vismayaḥ kaḥ tra yena te bhayam āgatam

original: 6.027.013a sa tu tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā
analyzed: sa tu tīrtvā arṇavam rāmaḥ saha vānara senayā

original: 6.027.013c pratijānāmi te satyaṃ na jīvan pratiyāsyati
analyzed: pratijānāmi te satyam na jīvan pratiyāsyati

original: 6.027.014a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ ruṣṭaṃ vijñāya rāvaṇam
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam saṃrabdham ruṣṭam vijñāya rāvaṇam
vrīḍitaḥ mālyavān vākyam na uttaram pratyapadyata
jaya āśiṣā ca rājānam vardhayitvā yathocitam
mālyavān abhyanujñātaḥ jagāma svam niveśanam

original: 6.027.016a rāvaṇas tu sahāmātyo mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu sahāmātyaḥ mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca

original: 6.027.016c laṅkāyām atulāṃ guptiṃ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: laṅkāyām atulām guptim kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.027.017a vyādideśa ca pūrvasyāṃ prahastaṃ dvāri rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: vyādideśa ca pūrvasyām prahastam dvāri rākṣasam
dakṣiṇasyām mahā vīryau mahāpārśva mahodarau

original: 6.027.018a paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitaṃ tathā
analyzed: paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitam tathā
vyādideśa mahā māyam rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtam
uttarasyām pura dvāri vyādiśya śuka sāraṇau

original: 6.027.019c svayaṃ cātra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇas tān uvāca ha
analyzed: svayam ca atra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇaḥ tān uvāca ha
rākṣasam tu virūpākṣam mahā vīrya parākramam
madhyame sthāpayat gulme bahubhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
evam vidhānam laṅkāyām kṛtvā rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
mene kṛtārtham ātmānam kṛtānta vaśam āgataḥ
visarjayām āsa tatas sa mantriṇaḥ
vidhānam ājñāpya purasya puṣkalam
jaya āśiṣā mantra gaṇena
viveśa saḥ ntaḥpuram ṛddhimat mahat

original: 6.028.001a naravānararājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: nara vānara rājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ

original: 6.028.001c jāmbavān ṛkṣarājaś ca rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān ṛkṣa rājaḥ ca rākṣasaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.028.002a aṅgado vāliputraś ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ vāli putraḥ ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ

original: 6.028.002c suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādo maindo dvivida eva ca
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādaḥ maindaḥ dvividaḥ eva ca

original: 6.028.003a gajo gavākṣo kumudo nalo 'tha panasas tathā
analyzed: gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ kumudaḥ panasaḥ tathā
amitra viṣayam prāptāḥ samavetāḥ samarthayan

original: 6.028.004a iyaṃ sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇapālitā
analyzed: iyam sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇa pālitā
sa asura uraga gandharvaiḥ amaraiḥ api durjayā
kārya siddhim puraskṛtya mantrayadhvam vinirṇaye

original: 6.028.005c nityaṃ saṃnihito hy atra rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: nityam saṃnihitaḥ hi atra rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
tathā teṣu bruvāṇeṣu rāvaṇa avarajaḥ bravīt
vākyam agrāmya pada vat puṣkala artham vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.028.007a analaḥ śarabhaś caiva saṃpātiḥ praghasas tathā
analyzed: analaḥ śarabhaḥ ca eva saṃpātiḥ praghasaḥ tathā

original: 6.028.007c gatvā laṅkāṃ mamāmātyāḥ purīṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
analyzed: gatvā laṅkām mama amātyāḥ purīm punar iha āgatāḥ

original: 6.028.008a bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāś ca ripor balam
analyzed: bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ ca ripoḥ balam

original: 6.028.008c vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ yac ca tad dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ
analyzed: vidhānam vihitam yat ca tat dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ
saṃvidhānam yathā āhuḥ te rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.028.009c rāma tad bruvataḥ sarvaṃ yathātathyena me śṛṇu
analyzed: rāma tat bruvataḥ sarvam yathātathyena me śṛṇu

original: 6.028.010a pūrvaṃ prahastaḥ sabalo dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: pūrvam prahastaḥ sa balaḥ dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati
dakṣiṇam ca mahā vīryau mahāpārśva mahodarau
indrajit paścima dvāram rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
paṭṭasa asi dhanuṣmadbhiḥ śūla mudgara pāṇibhiḥ
nānā praharaṇaiḥ śūraiḥ āvṛtaḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
rākṣasānām sahasraiḥ tu bahubhiḥ śastra pāṇibhiḥ
yuktaḥ parama saṃvignaḥ rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
uttaram nagara dvāram rāvaṇaḥ svayam āsthitaḥ
virūpākṣaḥ tu mahatā śūla khaḍga dhanuṣmatā

original: 6.028.014c balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdham madhyamam gulmam āsthitaḥ

original: 6.028.015a etān evaṃvidhān gulmāṃl laṅkāyāṃ samudīkṣya te
analyzed: etān evaṃvidhān gulmān laṅkāyām samudīkṣya te

original: 6.028.015c māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghraṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
analyzed: māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghram punar iha āgatāḥ

original: 6.028.016a gajānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca rathānām ayutaṃ pure
analyzed: gajānām ca sahasram ca rathānām ayutam pure

original: 6.028.016c hayānām ayute dve ca sāgrakoṭī ca rakṣasām
analyzed: hayānām ayute dve ca sāgra koṭī ca rakṣasām
vikrāntāḥ balavantaḥ ca saṃyugeṣu ātatāyinaḥ
iṣṭāḥ rākṣasa rājasya nityam ete niśācarāḥ
ekaikasya atra yuddha arthe rākṣasasya viśām pate
parivāraḥ sahasrāṇām sahasram upatiṣṭhate
etām pravṛttim laṅkāyām mantri proktam vibhīṣaṇaḥ
rāmam kamala patra akṣam idam uttaram abravīt

original: 6.028.020a kuberaṃ tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata
analyzed: kuberam tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata
ṣaṣṭiḥ śata sahasrāṇi tadā niryānti rākṣasāḥ
parākrameṇa vīryeṇa tejasā sattva gauravāt
sadṛśāḥ darpeṇa rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.028.022a atra manyur na kartavyo roṣaye tvāṃ na bhīṣaye
analyzed: atra manyuḥ na kartavyaḥ roṣaye tvām na bhīṣaye

original: 6.028.022c samartho hy asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe
analyzed: samarthaḥ hi asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe

original: 6.028.023a tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tat bhavān caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
vyūhya idam vānara anīkam nirmathiṣyasi rāvaṇam
rāvaṇa avaraje vākyam evam bruvati rāghavaḥ
śatrūṇām pratighāta artham idam vacanam abravīt
pūrva dvāre tu laṅkāyāḥ nīlaḥ vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 6.028.025c prahastaṃ pratiyoddhā syād vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: prahastam pratiyoddhā syāt vānaraiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.028.026a aṅgado vāliputras tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ vāli putraḥ tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
dakṣiṇe bādhatām dvāre mahāpārśva mahodarau
hanūmān paścima dvāram nipīḍya pavanātmajaḥ
praviśatu aprameya ātmā bahubhiḥ kapibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
daitya dānava saṃghānām ṛṣīṇām ca mahātmanām
viprakāra priyaḥ kṣudraḥ vara dāna bala anvitaḥ

original: 6.028.029a parikrāmati yaḥ sarvāṃl lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ
analyzed: parikrāmati yaḥ sarvān lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ

original: 6.028.029c tasyāhaṃ rākṣasendrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham rākṣasa indrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ
uttaram nagara dvāram aham saumitriṇā saha
nipīḍya abhipravekṣyāmi sabalaḥ yatra rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.028.031a vānarendraś ca balavān ṛkṣarājaś ca jāmbavān
analyzed: vānara indraḥ ca balavān ṛkṣa rājaḥ ca jāmbavān
rākṣasa indra anujaḥ ca eva gulme bhavatu madhyame

original: 6.028.032a na caiva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ kāryaṃ haribhir āhave
analyzed: na ca eva mānuṣam rūpam kāryam haribhiḥ āhave

original: 6.028.032c eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe 'smin vānare bale
analyzed: eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe smin vānare bale
vānarāḥ eva niścihnam sva jane smin bhaviṣyati

original: 6.028.033c vayaṃ tu mānuṣeṇaiva sapta yotsyāmahe parān
analyzed: vayam tu mānuṣeṇa eva sapta yotsyāmahe parān

original: 6.028.034a aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahaujasā
analyzed: aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahā ojasā

original: 6.028.034c ātmanā pañcamaś cāyaṃ sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ātmanā pañcamaḥ ca ayam sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.028.035a sa rāmaḥ kāryasiddhyartham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: sa rāmaḥ kārya siddhi artham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam
suvela ārohaṇe buddhim cakāra matimān matim
tatas tu rāmaḥ mahatā balena
pracchādya sarvām pṛthivīm mahātmā
prahṛṣṭa rūpaḥ bhijagāma laṅkām
kṛtvā matim saḥ rivadhe mahātmā

original: 6.029.001a sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇam prati
lakṣmaṇa anugataḥ rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
vibhīṣaṇam ca dharma jñam anuraktam niśācaram

original: 6.029.002c mantrajñaṃ ca vidhijñaṃ ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā
analyzed: mantra jñam ca vidhi jñam ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā

original: 6.029.003a suvelaṃ sādhu śailendram imaṃ dhātuśataiś citam
analyzed: suvelam sādhu śaila indram imam dhātu śataiḥ citam
adhyārohāmahe sarve vatsyāmaḥ u tra niśām imām
laṅkām ca ālokayiṣyāmaḥ nilayam tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.029.004c yena me maraṇāntāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā
analyzed: yena me maraṇa antāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā

original: 6.029.005a yena dharmo na vijñāto na vṛttaṃ na kulaṃ tathā
analyzed: yena dharmaḥ na vijñātaḥ na vṛttam na kulam tathā

original: 6.029.005c rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tad garhitaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tat garhitam kṛtam

original: 6.029.006a yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasādhame
analyzed: yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasa adhame
yasya aparādhāt nīcasya vadham drakṣyāmi rakṣasām

original: 6.029.007a eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ hi kurute pāpam kāla pāśa vaśam gataḥ
nīcena ātma apacāreṇa kulam tena vinaśyati

original: 6.029.008a evaṃ saṃmantrayann eva sakrodho rāvaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: evam saṃmantrayan eva sa krodhaḥ rāvaṇam prati
rāmaḥ suvelam vāsāya citra sānum upāruhat
pṛṣṭhatas lakṣmaṇa ca enam anvagacchat samāhitaḥ

original: 6.029.009c saśaraṃ cāpam udyamya sumahad vikrame rataḥ
analyzed: sa śaram cāpam udyamya su mahat vikrame rataḥ
tam anvarohat sugrīvaḥ sa amātyaḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.029.010c hanūmān aṅgado nīlo maindo dvivida eva ca
analyzed: hanūmān aṅgadaḥ nīlaḥ maindaḥ dvividaḥ eva ca
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: 6.029.011c panasaḥ kumudaś caiva haro rambhaś ca yūthapaḥ
analyzed: panasaḥ kumudaḥ ca eva haraḥ rambhaḥ ca yūthapaḥ

original: 6.029.012a ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ śīghragāminaḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ vānarāḥ śīghra gāminaḥ
te vāyu vega pravaṇāḥ tam girim giri cāriṇaḥ
adhyārohanta śataśas suvelam yatra rāghavaḥ

original: 6.029.013a te tv adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvataḥ
analyzed: te tu adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvatas

original: 6.029.013c dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm
tām śubhām pravara dvārām prākāra vara śobhitām
laṅkām rākṣasa saṃpūrṇām dadṛśuḥ hari yūthapāḥ
prākāra caya saṃsthaiḥ ca tathā nīlaiḥ niśācaraiḥ

original: 6.029.015c dadṛśus te hariśreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ te hari śreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparam kṛtam

original: 6.029.016a te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.029.016c mumucur vipulān nādāṃs tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ vipulān nādān tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ
tatas u stam agamat sūryaḥ saṃdhyayā pratirañjitaḥ
pūrṇa candra pradīpā ca kṣapā samabhivartate
tatas sa rāmaḥ hari vāhinīpatiḥ
vibhīṣaṇena pratinandya satkṛtaḥ
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ yūthapa yūtha saṃvṛtaḥ
suvela pṛṣṭhe nyavasat yathāsukham

original: 6.030.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitās tatra suvele haripuṃgavāḥ
analyzed: tām rātrim uṣitāḥ tatra suvele hari puṃgavāḥ

original: 6.030.001c laṅkāyāṃ dadṛśur vīrā vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: laṅkāyām dadṛśuḥ vīrāḥ vanāni upavanāni ca
sama saumyāni ramyāṇi viśālāni āyatāni ca
dṛṣṭi ramyāṇi te dṛṣṭvā babhūvuḥ jāta vismayāḥ
campaka aśoka puṃnāga sāla tāla samākulā
tamāla vana saṃchannā nāga mālā samāvṛtā

original: 6.030.004a hintālair arjunair nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: hintālaiḥ arjunaiḥ nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiḥ ca puṣpitaiḥ

original: 6.030.004c tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca paṭālaiś ca samantataḥ
analyzed: tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ ca paṭālaiḥ ca samantataḥ
śuśubhe puṣpita agraiḥ ca latā parigataiḥ drumaiḥ
laṅkā bahuvidhaiḥ divyaiḥ yathā indrasya amarāvatī
vicitra kusuma upetaiḥ rakta komala pallavaiḥ

original: 6.030.006c śādvalaiś ca tathā nīlaiś citrābhir vanarājibhiḥ
analyzed: śādvalaiḥ ca tathā nīlaiḥ citrābhiḥ vana rājibhiḥ

original: 6.030.007a gandhāḍhyāny abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
analyzed: gandha āḍhyāni abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
dhārayanti agamāḥ tatra bhūṣaṇāni iva mānavāḥ
tat caitraratha saṃkāśam manojñam nandana upamam
vanam sarvartukam ramyam śuśubhe ṣaṭpada āyutam
natyūha koyaṣṭibhakaiḥ nṛtyamānaiḥ ca barhibhiḥ
rutam parabhṛtānām ca śuśruve vana nirjhare
nitya matta vihaṃgāni bhramara ācaritāni ca
kokila ākula ṣaṇḍāni vihaga abhirutāni ca
bhṛṅgarāja abhigītāni bhramaraiḥ sevitāni ca
koṇālaka vighuṣṭāni sārasa abhirutāni ca

original: 6.030.012a viviśus te tatas tāni vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: viviśuḥ te tatas tāni vanāni upavanāni ca
hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ vīrāḥ harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
teṣām praviśatām tatra vānarāṇām mahā ojasām
puṣpa saṃsarga surabhiḥ vavau ghrāṇa sukhaḥ nilaḥ

original: 6.030.014a anye tu harivīrāṇāṃ yūthān niṣkramya yūthapāḥ
analyzed: anye tu hari vīrāṇām yūthāt niṣkramya yūthapāḥ
sugrīveṇa abhyanujñātāḥ laṅkām jagmuḥ patākinīm
vitrāsayantaḥ vihagān trāsayantaḥ mṛga dvipān

original: 6.030.015c kampayantaś ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ nādaiḥ svair nadatāṃ varāḥ
analyzed: kampayantaḥ ca tām laṅkām nādaiḥ svaiḥ nadatām varāḥ
kurvantaḥ te mahā vegāḥ mahīm cāraṇa pīḍitām
rajaḥ ca sahasā evā ūrdhvam jagāma caraṇa uddhatam

original: 6.030.017a ṛkṣāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇā mṛgāḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ siṃhāḥ varāhāḥ ca mahiṣāḥ vāraṇāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: 6.030.017c tena śabdena vitrastā jagmur bhītā diśo daśa
analyzed: tena śabdena vitrastāḥ jagmuḥ bhītāḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: 6.030.018a śikharaṃ tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu caikaṃ divispṛśam
analyzed: śikharam tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu ca ekam divispṛśam
samantāt puṣpa saṃchannam mahārajata saṃnibham
śata yojana vistīrṇam vimalam cāru darśanam

original: 6.030.019c ślakṣṇaṃ śrīman mahac caiva duṣprāpaṃ śakunair api
analyzed: ślakṣṇam śrīmat mahat ca eva duṣprāpam śakunaiḥ api

original: 6.030.020a manasāpi durārohaṃ kiṃ punaḥ karmaṇā janaiḥ
analyzed: manasā api durāroham kim punar karmaṇā janaiḥ
niviṣṭā tatra śikhare laṅkā rāvaṇa pālitā
sā purī gopuraiḥ uccais pāṇḍura ambuda saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 6.030.021c kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā
analyzed: kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā

original: 6.030.022a prāsādaiś ca vimānaiś ca laṅkā paramabhūṣitā
analyzed: prāsādaiḥ ca vimānaiḥ ca laṅkā parama bhūṣitā
