ghanaiḥ iva ātapa apāye madhyamam vaiṣṇavam padam
yasyām stambha sahasreṇa prāsādaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
kailāsa śikhara ākāraḥ dṛśyate kham iva ullikhan
caityaḥ sa rākṣasa indrasya babhūva pura bhūṣaṇam

original: 6.030.024c śatena rakṣasāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate
analyzed: śatena rakṣasām nityam yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate
tām samṛddhām samṛddha arthaḥ lakṣmīvān lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: 6.030.025c rāvaṇasya purīṃ rāmo dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya purīm rāmaḥ dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ
tām ratna pūrṇām bahu saṃvidhānām
prāsāda mālābhiḥ alaṃkṛtām ca
purīm mahā yantra kavāṭa mukhyām
dadarśa rāmaḥ mahatā balena
atha tasmin nimittāni dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa pūrvajaḥ
lakṣmaṇam lakṣmi saṃpannam idam vacanam abravīt
parigṛhya udakam śītam vanāni phalavanti ca
bala ogham saṃvibhajya imam vyūhya tiṣṭhema lakṣmaṇa
loka kṣaya karam bhīmam bhayam paśyāmi upasthitam
nibarhaṇam pravīrāṇām ṛkṣa vānara rakṣasām

original: 6.031.004a vātāś ca paruṣaṃ vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā
analyzed: vātāḥ ca paruṣam vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā
parvata agrāṇi vepante patanti dharaṇīdharāḥ
meghāḥ kravyāda saṃkāśāḥ paruṣāḥ paruṣa svanāḥ
krūrāḥ krūram pravarṣanti miśram śoṇita bindubhiḥ
raktacandana saṃkāśā saṃdhyā parama dāruṇā

original: 6.031.006c jvalac ca nipataty etad ādityād agnimaṇḍalam
analyzed: jvalat ca nipatati etat ādityāt agni maṇḍalam
ādityam abhivāśyante janayantaḥ mahat bhayam
dīnāḥ dīna svarāḥ ghorāḥ apraśastāḥ mṛga dvijāḥ
rajanyām aprakāśaḥ ca saṃtāpayati candramāḥ
kṛṣṇa rakta aṃśu paryantaḥ yathā lokasya saṃkṣaye
hrasvaḥ rūkṣaḥ praśastaḥ ca pariveṣaḥ su lohitaḥ
āditya maṇḍale nīlam lakṣma lakṣmaṇa dṛśyate

original: 6.031.010a dṛśyante na yathāvac ca nakṣatrāṇy abhivartate
analyzed: dṛśyante na yathāvat ca nakṣatrāṇi abhivartate

original: 6.031.010c yugāntam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati
analyzed: yuga antam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati

original: 6.031.011a kākāḥ śyenās tathā gṛdhrā nīcaiḥ paripatanti ca
analyzed: kākāḥ śyenāḥ tathā gṛdhrāḥ nīcais paripatanti ca

original: 6.031.011c śivāś cāpy aśivā vācaḥ pravadanti mahāsvanāḥ
analyzed: śivāḥ ca api aśivāḥ vācaḥ pravadanti mahā svanāḥ
kṣipram adya durādharṣām purīm rāvaṇa pālitām
abhiyāma javena eva sarvatas haribhiḥ vṛtāḥ

original: 6.031.013a ity evaṃ tu vadan vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
analyzed: iti evam tu vadan vīraḥ lakṣmaṇam lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ
tasmāt avātarat śīghram parvata agrāt mahā balaḥ

original: 6.031.014a avatīrya tu dharmātmā tasmāc chailāt sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: avatīrya tu dharma ātmā tasmāt śailāt sa rāghavaḥ
paraiḥ parama durdharṣam dadarśa balam ātmanaḥ
saṃnahya tu sa sugrīvaḥ kapi rāja balam mahat
kāla jñaḥ rāghavaḥ kāle saṃyugāya abhyacodayat

original: 6.031.016a tataḥ kāle mahābāhur balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas kāle mahā bāhuḥ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ

original: 6.031.016c prasthitaḥ purato dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
analyzed: prasthitaḥ puratas dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm

original: 6.031.017a taṃ vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
analyzed: tam vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmān jāmbavān nalaḥ

original: 6.031.017c ṛkṣarājas tathā nīlo lakṣmaṇaś cānyayus tadā
analyzed: ṛkṣa rājaḥ tathā nīlaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca anyayuḥ tadā
tatas paścāt su mahatī pṛtanā ṛkṣa vanaukasām

original: 6.031.018c pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam
analyzed: pracchādya mahatīm bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam
śaila śṛṅgāṇi śataśas pravṛddhān ca mahīruhām
jagṛhuḥ kuñjara prakhyāḥ vānarāḥ para vāraṇāḥ

original: 6.031.020a tau tv adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tau tu adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
rāvaṇasya purīm laṅkām āsedatuḥ ariṃdamau
patākā mālinīm ramyām udyāna vana śobhitām
citra vaprām su duṣprāpām ucca prākāra toraṇām
tām suraiḥ api durdharṣām rāma vākya pracoditāḥ
yathā nideśam saṃpīḍya nyaviśanta vanaukasaḥ
laṅkāyāḥ tu uttara dvāram śaila śṛṅgam iva unnatam

original: 6.031.023c rāmaḥ sahānujo dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca
analyzed: rāmaḥ sahānujaḥ dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca
laṅkām upaniviṣṭaḥ ca rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
lakṣmaṇa anucaraḥ vīraḥ purīm rāvaṇa pālitām
uttara dvāram āsādya yatra tiṣṭhati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.031.025c nānyo rāmād dhi tad dvāraṃ samarthaḥ parirakṣitum
analyzed: na anyaḥ rāmāt hi tat dvāram samarthaḥ parirakṣitum
rāvaṇa adhiṣṭhitam bhīmam varuṇena iva sāgaram
sa āyudhau rākṣasaiḥ bhīmaiḥ abhiguptam samantataḥ
laghūnām trāsa jananam pātālam iva dānavaiḥ

original: 6.031.027a vinyastāni ca yodhānāṃ bahūni vividhāni ca
analyzed: vinyastāni ca yodhānām bahūni vividhāni ca
dadarśa āyudha jālāni tathā eva kavacāni ca

original: 6.031.028a pūrvaṃ tu dvāram āsādya nīlo haricamūpatiḥ
analyzed: pūrvam tu dvāram āsādya nīlaḥ hari camūpatiḥ

original: 6.031.028c atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān
analyzed: atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān
aṅgadaḥ dakṣiṇa dvāram jagrāha su mahā balaḥ
ṛṣabheṇa gavākṣeṇa gajena gavayena ca
hanūmān paścima dvāram rarakṣa balavān kapiḥ

original: 6.031.030c pramāthi praghasābhyāṃ ca vīrair anyaiś ca saṃgataḥ
analyzed: pramāthi praghasābhyām ca vīraiḥ anyaiḥ ca saṃgataḥ

original: 6.031.031a madhyame ca svayaṃ gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata
analyzed: madhyame ca svayam gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata
saha sarvaiḥ hari śreṣṭhaiḥ suparṇa śvasana upamaiḥ
vānarāṇām tu ṣaṭtriṃśat koṭyaḥ prakhyāta yūthapāḥ
nipīḍya upaniviṣṭāḥ ca sugrīvaḥ yatra vānaraḥ
śāsanena tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.031.033c dvāre dvāre harīṇāṃ tu koṭiṃ koṭiṃ nyaveśayat
analyzed: dvāre dvāre harīṇām tu koṭim koṭim nyaveśayat

original: 6.031.034a paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān
analyzed: paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān
adūrāt madhyame gulme tasthau bahu bala anugaḥ

original: 6.031.035a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śārdūlā iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
analyzed: te tu vānara śārdūlāḥ śārdūlāḥ iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
gṛhītvā druma śaila agrān hṛṣṭāḥ yuddhāya tasthire
sarve vikṛta lāṅgūlāḥ sarve daṃṣṭra nakha āyudhāḥ
sarve vikṛta citra aṅgāḥ sarve ca vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 6.031.037a daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
analyzed: daśa nāga balāḥ ke cit ke cit daśa guṇa uttarāḥ
ke cit nāga sahasrasya babhūvuḥ tulya vikramāḥ

original: 6.031.038a santi caughā balāḥ ke cit ke cic chataguṇottarāḥ
analyzed: santi ca oghāḥ balāḥ ke cid ke cit śataguṇa uttarāḥ
aprameya balāḥ ca anye tatra āsan hari yūthapāḥ

original: 6.031.039a adbhutaś ca vicitraś ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
analyzed: adbhutaḥ ca vicitraḥ ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
tatra vānara sainyānām śalabhānām iva udgamaḥ
paripūrṇam iva ākāśam saṃchannā iva ca medinī

original: 6.031.040c laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiś ca saṃpatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ
analyzed: laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiḥ ca saṃpatadbhiḥ ca vānaraiḥ
śatam śata sahasrāṇām pṛthak ṛkṣa vanaukasām

original: 6.031.041c laṅkā dvārāṇy upājagmur anye yoddhuṃ samantataḥ
analyzed: laṅkāḥ dvārāṇi upājagmuḥ anye yoddhum samantataḥ

original: 6.031.042a āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvais taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ
analyzed: āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvaiḥ taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ

original: 6.031.042c ayutānāṃ sahasraṃ ca purīṃ tām abhyavartata
analyzed: ayutānām sahasram ca purīm tām abhyavartata
vānaraiḥ balavadbhiḥ ca babhūva druma pāṇibhiḥ
sarvatas saṃvṛtā laṅkā duṣpraveśā api vāyunā
rākṣasāḥ vismayam jagmuḥ sahasā abhinipīḍitāḥ
vānaraiḥ megha saṃkāśaiḥ śakra tulya parākramaiḥ
mahān śabdaḥ bhavat tatra bala oghasya abhivartataḥ
sāgarasya iva bhinnasya yathā syāt salila svanaḥ
tena śabdena mahatā sa prākārā sa toraṇā
laṅkā pracalitā sarvā sa śaila vana kānanā
rāma lakṣmaṇa guptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī
babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvaiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: 6.031.048a rāghavaḥ saṃniveśyaivaṃ sainyaṃ svaṃ rakṣasāṃ vadhe
analyzed: rāghavaḥ saṃniveśya evam sainyam svam rakṣasām vadhe

original: 6.031.048c saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdham niścitya ca punar punar
ānantaryam abhiprepsuḥ krama yoga artha tattva vid
vibhīṣaṇasya anumate rāja dharmam anusmaran
aṅgadam vāli tanayam samāhūya idam abravīt

original: 6.031.050a gatvā saumya daśagrīvaṃ brūhi madvacanāt kape
analyzed: gatvā saumya daśagrīvam brūhi mad vacanāt kape

original: 6.031.050c laṅghayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ bhayaṃ tyaktvā gatavyathaḥ
analyzed: laṅghayitvā purīm laṅkām bhayam tyaktvā gata vyathaḥ
bhraṣṭa śrīka gata aiśvarya mumūrṣaḥ naṣṭa cetanaḥ
ṛṣīṇām devatānām ca gandharva apsarasām tathā

original: 6.031.052a nāgānām atha yakṣāṇāṃ rājñāṃ ca rajanīcara
analyzed: nāgānām atha yakṣāṇām rājñām ca rajanīcara

original: 6.031.052c yac ca pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mohād avaliptena rākṣasa
analyzed: yat ca pāpam kṛtam mohāt avaliptena rākṣasa

original: 6.031.053a nūnam adya gato darpaḥ svayambhū varadānajaḥ
analyzed: nūnam adya gataḥ darpaḥ svayambhū vara dāna jaḥ
yasya daṇḍa dharaḥ te ham dāra āharaṇa karśitaḥ
daṇḍam dhārayamāṇaḥ tu laṅkā dvare vyavasthitaḥ

original: 6.031.054a padavīṃ devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca rākṣasa
analyzed: padavīm devatānām ca mahā ṛṣīṇām ca rākṣasa

original: 6.031.054c rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṇāṃ gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ
analyzed: rājarṣīṇām ca gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ

original: 6.031.055a balena yena vai sītāṃ māyayā rākṣasādhama
analyzed: balena yena vai sītām māyayā rākṣasa adhama

original: 6.031.055c mām atikrāmayitvā tvaṃ hṛtavāṃs tad vidarśaya
analyzed: mām atikrāmayitvā tvam hṛtavān tat vidarśaya

original: 6.031.056a arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: arākṣasam imam lokam kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.031.056c na cec charaṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm
analyzed: na ced śaraṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm
dharma ātmā rakṣasām śreṣṭhaḥ saṃprāptaḥ yam vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.031.057c laṅkaiśvaryaṃ dhruvaṃ śrīmān ayaṃ prāpnoty akaṇṭakam
analyzed: laṅkā aiśvaryam dhruvam śrīmān ayam prāpnoti akaṇṭakam

original: 6.031.058a na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktuṃ kṣaṇam api tvayā
analyzed: na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktum kṣaṇam api tvayā
śakyam mūrkha sahāyena pāpena avijita ātmanā

original: 6.031.059a yudhyasva vā dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa
analyzed: yudhyasva vā dhṛtim kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa

original: 6.031.059c maccharais tvaṃ raṇe śāntas tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: mad śaraiḥ tvam raṇe śāntaḥ tatas pūtaḥ bhaviṣyasi

original: 6.031.060a yady āviśasi lokāṃs trīn pakṣibhūto manojavaḥ
analyzed: yadi āviśasi lokān trīn pakṣi bhūtaḥ manaḥ javaḥ

original: 6.031.060c mama cakṣuṣpathaṃ prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
analyzed: mama cakṣuṣpatham prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi

original: 6.031.061a bravīmi tvāṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aurdhvadekikam
analyzed: bravīmi tvām hitam vākyam kriyatām aurdhvadekikam

original: 6.031.061c sudṛṣṭā kriyatāṃ laṅkā jīvitaṃ te mayi sthitam
analyzed: su dṛṣṭā kriyatām laṅkā jīvitam te mayi sthitam

original: 6.031.062a ity uktaḥ sa tu tāreyo rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tu tāreyaḥ rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā
jagāma ākāśam āviśya mūrtimān iva havyavāṭ
saḥ tipatya muhūrtena śrīmān rāvaṇa mandiram
dadarśa āsīnam avyagram rāvaṇam sacivaiḥ saha
tatas tasya avidūreṇa nipatya hari puṃgavaḥ
dīpta agni sadṛśaḥ tasthau aṅgadaḥ kanaka aṅgadaḥ
tat rāma vacanam sarvam anyūna adhikam uttamam
sa amātyam śrāvayām āsa nivedya ātmānam ātmanā
dūtaḥ ham kosala indrasya rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 6.031.066c vāliputro 'ṅgado nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
analyzed: vāli putraḥ ṅgadaḥ nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
āha tvām rāghavaḥ rāmaḥ kausalyā ānanda vardhanaḥ
niṣpatya pratiyudhyasva nṛśaṃsam puruṣa adhama
hantāsmi tvām saha amātyam sa putra jñāti bāndhavam

original: 6.031.068c nirudvignās trayo lokā bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi
analyzed: nirudvignāḥ trayaḥ lokāḥ bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi
deva dānava yakṣāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām

original: 6.031.069c śatrum adyoddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kaṇṭakam
analyzed: śatrum adyā uddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇām ca kaṇṭakam
vibhīṣaṇasya ca aiśvaryam bhaviṣyati hate tvayi

original: 6.031.070c na cet satkṛtya vaidehīṃ praṇipatya pradāsyasi
analyzed: na ced satkṛtya vaidehīm praṇipatya pradāsyasi

original: 6.031.071a ity evaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇe haripuṃgave
analyzed: iti evam paruṣam vākyam bruvāṇe hari puṃgave
amarṣa vaśam āpannaḥ niśācara gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: 6.031.072a tataḥ sa roṣatāmrākṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivāṃs tadā
analyzed: tatas sa roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivān tadā

original: 6.031.072c gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhā vadhyatām iti cāsakṛt
analyzed: gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhāḥ vadhyatām iti ca asakṛt
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīpta agni sama tejasaḥ

original: 6.031.073c jagṛhus taṃ tato ghorāś catvāro rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ tam tatas ghorāḥ catvāraḥ rajanīcarāḥ

original: 6.031.074a grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
balam darśayitum vīraḥ yātudhāna gaṇe tadā

original: 6.031.075a sa tān bāhudvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva
analyzed: sa tān bāhu dvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva
prāsādam śaila saṃkāśam utpāpāta aṅgadaḥ tadā
te ntarikṣāt vinirdhūtāḥ tasya vegena rākṣasāḥ
bhumau nipatitāḥ sarve rākṣasa indrasya paśyataḥ
tatas prāsāda śikharam śaila śṛṅgam iva unnatam
tat paphāla tad ākrāntam daśagrīvasya paśyataḥ
bhaṅktvā prāsāda śikharam nāma viśrāvya ca ātmanaḥ
vinadya su mahā nādam utpapāta vihāyasā

original: 6.031.079a rāvaṇas tu paraṃ cakre krodhaṃ prāsādadharṣaṇāt
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu param cakre krodham prāsāda dharṣaṇāt
vināśam ca ātmanaḥ paśyan niḥśvāsa paramaḥ bhavat

original: 6.031.080a rāmas tu bahubhir hṛṣṭair ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu bahubhiḥ hṛṣṭaiḥ ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
vṛtaḥ ripu vadha ākāṅkṣī yuddhāya eva abhyavartata
suṣeṇaḥ tu mahā vīryaḥ giri kūṭa upamaḥ hariḥ
bahubhiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ tatra vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
catur dvārāṇi sarvāṇi sugrīva vacanāt kapiḥ
paryākramata durdharṣaḥ nakṣatrāṇi iva candramāḥ
teṣām akṣauhiṇi śatam samavekṣya vanaukasām
laṅkām upaniviṣṭānām sāgaram ca ativartatām

original: 6.031.084a rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmus trāsaṃ jagmus tathāpare
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ vismayam jagmuḥ trāsam jagmuḥ tathā apare
apare samara uddharṣāt dharṣam eva upapedire
kṛtsnam hi kapibhiḥ vyāptam prākāra parikhā antaram
dadṛśuḥ rākṣasāḥ dīnāḥ prākāram vānarīkṛtam
tasmin mahā bhīṣaṇake pravṛtte
kolāhale rākṣasa rājadhānyām
pragṛhya rakṣāṃsi mahā āyudhāni
yuga anta vātāḥ iva saṃviceruḥ

original: 6.032.001a tatas te rākṣasās tatra gatvā rāvaṇamandiram
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ tatra gatvā rāvaṇa mandiram

original: 6.032.001c nyavedayan purīṃ ruddhāṃ rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: nyavedayan purīm ruddhām rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ

original: 6.032.002a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ śrutvā jātakrodho niśācaraḥ
analyzed: ruddhām tu nagarīm śrutvā jāta krodhaḥ niśācaraḥ
vidhānam dviguṇam śrutvā prāsādam saḥ dhyarohata
sa dadarśa āvṛtām laṅkām sa śaila vana kānanām
asaṃkhyeyaiḥ hari gaṇaiḥ sarvatas yuddha kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: 6.032.004a sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvāṃ vasudhāṃ kavalīkṛtām
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvām vasudhām kavalīkṛtām
katham kṣapayitavyāḥ syuḥ iti cintā paraḥ bhavat

original: 6.032.005a sa cintayitvā suciraṃ dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa cintayitvā su ciram dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ
rāghavam hari yūthān ca dadarśa āyata locanaḥ
prekṣataḥ rākṣasa indrasya tāni anīkāni bhāgaśas
rāghava priya kāma artham laṅkām āruruhuḥ tadā
te tāmra vaktrāḥ hema ābhāḥ rāma arthe tyakta jīvitāḥ
laṅkām sāla tāla śilā āyudhāḥ

original: 6.032.008a te drumaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: te drumaiḥ parvata agraiḥ ca muṣṭibhiḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
prāsāda agrāṇi ca uccāni mamantuḥ toraṇāni ca
pārikhāḥ pūrayanti sma prasanna salila āyutāḥ

original: 6.032.009c pāṃsubhiḥ parvatāgraiś ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: pāṃsubhiḥ parvata agraiḥ ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.032.010a tataḥ sahasrayūthāś ca koṭiyūthāś ca yūthapāḥ
analyzed: tatas sahasra yūthāḥ ca koṭi yūthāḥ ca yūthapāḥ
koṭī śata yutāḥ ca anye laṅkām āruruhuḥ tadā
kāñcanāni pramṛdnantaḥ toraṇāni plavaṃgamāḥ
kailāsa śikhara ābhāni gopurāṇi pramathya ca

original: 6.032.012a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: āplavantaḥ plavantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
laṅkām tām abhyavartanta mahā vāraṇa saṃnibhāḥ

original: 6.032.013a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: jayati atibalaḥ rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ
rājā jayati sugrīvaḥ rāghaveṇa abhipālitaḥ

original: 6.032.014a ity evaṃ ghoṣayantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: iti evam ghoṣayantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
abhyadhāvanta laṅkāyāḥ prākāram kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 6.032.015a vīrabāhuḥ subāhuś ca nalaś ca vanagocaraḥ
analyzed: vīrabāhuḥ subāhuḥ ca nalaḥ ca vanagocaraḥ
nipīḍya upaniviṣṭāḥ te prākāram hari yūthapāḥ
etasmin antare cakruḥ skandhāvāra niveśanam

original: 6.032.017a pūrvadvāraṃ tu kumudaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: pūrva dvāram tu kumudaḥ koṭibhiḥ daśabhiḥ vṛtaḥ
āvṛtya balavān tasthau haribhiḥ jita kāśibhiḥ
dakṣiṇa dvāram āgamya vīraḥ śatabaliḥ kapiḥ

original: 6.032.018c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: āvṛtya balavān tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.032.019a suṣeṇaḥ paścimadvāraṃ gatas tārā pitā hariḥ
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ paścima dvāram gataḥ tārā pitā hariḥ

original: 6.032.019c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhir āvṛtaḥ
analyzed: āvṛtya balavān tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhiḥ āvṛtaḥ
uttara dvāram āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha

original: 6.032.020c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: āvṛtya balavān tasthau sugrīvaḥ ca hari īśvaraḥ
golāṅgūlaḥ mahā kāyaḥ gavākṣaḥ bhīma darśanaḥ

original: 6.032.021c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahā vīryaḥ tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ
ṛṣkāṇām bhīma vegānām dhūmraḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 6.032.022c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahā vīryaḥ tasthau rāmasya pārśvatas
saṃnaddhaḥ tu mahā vīryaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.032.023c vṛto yas tais tu sacivais tasthau tatra mahābalaḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ yaḥ taiḥ tu sacivaiḥ tasthau tatra mahā balaḥ
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
samantāt parighāvantaḥ rarakṣuḥ hari vāhinīm
tatas kopa parīta ātmā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
niryāṇam sarva sainyānām drutam ājñāpayat tadā
niṣpatanti tatas sainyāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ rāvaṇa coditāḥ
samaye pūryamāṇasya vegāḥ iva mahā udadheḥ
etasmin antare ghoraḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata

original: 6.032.027c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca yathā devāsure purā
analyzed: rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca yathā devāsure purā
te gadābhiḥ pradīptābhiḥ śakti śūla paraśvadhaiḥ
nijaghnuḥ vānarān ghorāḥ kathayantaḥ sva vikramān

original: 6.032.029a tathā vṛkṣair mahākāyāḥ parvatāgraiś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: tathā vṛkṣaiḥ mahā kāyāḥ parvata agraiḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.032.029c rākṣasās tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhair dantaiś ca vegitāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhaiḥ dantaiḥ ca vegitāḥ

original: 6.032.030a rākṣasās tv apare bhīmāḥ prākārasthā mahīgatān
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ tu apare bhīmāḥ prākāra sthāḥ mahī gatān

original: 6.032.030c bhiṇḍipālaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca śūlaiś caiva vyadārayan
analyzed: bhindipālaiḥ ca khaḍgaiḥ ca śūlaiḥ ca eva vyadārayan
vānarāḥ ca api saṃkruddhāḥ prākāra sthān mahī gatāḥ
rākṣasān pātayām āsuḥ samāplutya plavaṃgamāḥ
sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ māṃsa śoṇita kardamaḥ
rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca saṃbabhūva adbhuta upamāḥ

original: 6.033.001a yudhyatāṃ tu tatas teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: yudhyatām tu tatas teṣām vānarāṇām mahātmanām
rakṣasām saṃbabhūva atha bala kopaḥ su dāruṇaḥ
te hayaiḥ kāñcana āpīḍaiḥ dhvajaiḥ ca agni śikhā upamaiḥ
rathaiḥ ca āditya saṃkāśaiḥ kavacaiḥ ca manoramaiḥ
niryayuḥ rākṣasa vyāghrāḥ nādayantaḥ diśaḥ daśa
rākṣasāḥ bhīma karmāṇaḥ rāvaṇasya jaya eṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.033.004a vānarāṇām api camūr mahatī jayam iccatām
analyzed: vānarāṇām api camūḥ mahatī jayam iccatām
abhyadhāvata tām senām rakṣasām kāmarūpiṇām
etasmin antare teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām
rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca dvandva yuddham avartata
aṅgadena indrajit sārdham vāli putreṇa rākṣasaḥ
ayudhyata mahā tejāḥ tryambakeṇa yathā andhakaḥ

original: 6.033.007a prajaṅghena ca saṃpātir nityaṃ durmarṣaṇo raṇe
analyzed: prajaṅghena ca saṃpātiḥ nityam durmarṣaṇaḥ raṇe
jambūmālinam ārabdhaḥ hanūmān api vānaraḥ
saṃgataḥ su mahā krodhaḥ rākṣasaḥ rāvaṇa anujaḥ
samare tīkṣṇavegena mitraghnena vibhīṣaṇaḥ
tapanena gajaḥ sārdham rākṣasena mahā balaḥ
nikumbhena mahā tejāḥ nīlaḥ pi samayudhyata
vānara indraḥ tu sugrīvaḥ praghasena samāgataḥ
saṃgataḥ samare śrīmān virūpākṣeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.033.011a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: agniketuḥ ca durdharṣaḥ raśmiketuḥ ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.033.011c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ
analyzed: suptaghnaḥ yajñakopaḥ ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ
vajramuṣṭiḥ tu maindena dvividena aśaniprabhaḥ
rākṣasābhyām su ghorābhyām kapi mukhyau samāgatau
vīraḥ pratapanaḥ ghoraḥ rākṣasaḥ raṇa durdharaḥ
samare tīkṣṇa vegena nalena samayudhyata

original: 6.033.014a dharmasya putro balavān suṣeṇa iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: dharmasya putraḥ balavān suṣeṇaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
sa vidyunmālinā sārdham ayudhyata mahā kapiḥ

original: 6.033.015a vānarāś cāpare bhīmā rākṣasair aparaiḥ saha
analyzed: vānarāḥ ca apare bhīmāḥ rākṣasaiḥ aparaiḥ saha

original: 6.033.015c dvandvaṃ samīyur bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha
analyzed: dvandvam samīyuḥ bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha
tatra āsīt su mahat yuddham tumulam loma harṣaṇam

original: 6.033.016c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām
analyzed: rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca vīrāṇām jayam icchatām
hari rākṣasa dehebhyaḥ prasṛtāḥ keśa śāḍvalāḥ
śarīra saṃghāṭa vahāḥ prasusruḥ śoṇita āpagāḥ
ājaghāna indrajit kruddhaḥ vajreṇa iva śatakratuḥ
aṅgadam gadayā vīram śatru sainya vidāraṇam
tasya kāñcana citra aṅgam ratham sa aśvam sa sārathim

original: 6.033.019c jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgado vegavān kapiḥ
analyzed: jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgadaḥ vegavān kapiḥ

original: 6.033.020a saṃpātis tu tribhir bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ
analyzed: saṃpātiḥ tu tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ
nijaghāna aśvakarṇena prajaṅgham raṇa mūrdhani
jambūmālī ratha sthaḥ tu ratha śaktyā mahā balaḥ
bibheda samare kruddhaḥ hanūmantam stanāntare

original: 6.033.022a tasya taṃ ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: tasya tam ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
pramamātha talena āśu saha tena eva rakṣasā
bhinna gātraḥ śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣipra hastena rakṣasā
prajaghāna adri śṛṅgeṇa tapanam muṣṭinā gajaḥ
grasantam iva sainyāni praghasam vānara adhipaḥ
sugrīvaḥ sapta parṇena nirbibheda jaghāna ca
prapīḍya śara varṣeṇa rākṣasam bhīma darśanam
nijaghāna virūpākṣam śareṇa ekena lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.033.026a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: agniketuḥ ca durdharṣaḥ raśmiketuḥ ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.033.026c suptighno yajñakopaś ca rāmaṃ nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: suptighnaḥ yajñakopaḥ ca rāmam nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.033.027a teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāmas tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ
analyzed: teṣām caturṇām rāmaḥ tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ
kruddhaḥ caturbhiḥ ciccheda ghoraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ

original: 6.033.028a vajramuṣṭis tu maindena muṣṭinā nihato raṇe
analyzed: vajramuṣṭiḥ tu maindena muṣṭinā nihataḥ raṇe

original: 6.033.028c papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale
analyzed: papāta sa rathaḥ sa aśvaḥ pura aṭṭaḥ iva bhū tale
vajra aśani sama sparśaḥ pi aśaniprabham
jaghāna giri śṛṅgeṇa miṣatām sarva rakṣasām
dvividam vānara indram tu druma yodhinam āhave
śaraiḥ aśani saṃkāśaiḥ sa vivyādha aśaniprabhaḥ
sa śaraiḥ atividdha aṅgaḥ dvividaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
sālena sa ratham sa aśvam nijaghāna aśaniprabham
nikumbhaḥ tu raṇe nīlam nīlāñjana caya prabham

original: 6.033.032c nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ karair megham ivāṃśumān
analyzed: nirbibheda śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ karaiḥ megham iva aṃśumān
punar śara śatena atha kṣiprahastaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.033.033c bibheda samare nīlaṃ nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca
analyzed: bibheda samare nīlam nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca
tasya eva ratha cakreṇa nīlaḥ viṣṇuḥ iva āhave

original: 6.033.034c śiraś ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ
vidyunmālī ratha sthaḥ tu śaraiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: 6.033.035c suṣeṇaṃ tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: suṣeṇam tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhur

original: 6.033.036a taṃ rathastham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇo vānarottamaḥ
analyzed: tam ratha stham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇaḥ vānara uttamaḥ
giri śṛṅgeṇa mahatā ratham āśu nyapātayat
lāghavena tu saṃyuktaḥ vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ

original: 6.033.037c apakramya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāpāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ
analyzed: apakramya rathāt tūrṇam gadā pāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ
tatas krodha samāviṣṭaḥ suṣeṇaḥ hari puṃgavaḥ
śilām su mahatīm gṛhya niśācaram abhidravat
tam āpatantam gadayā vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ
vakṣasi abhijagnān āśu suṣeṇam hari sattamam
gadā prahāram tam ghoram acintya plavaga uttamaḥ

original: 6.033.040c tāṃ śilāṃ pātayām āsa tasyorasi mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: tām śilām pātayām āsa tasya urasi mahā mṛdhe
śilā prahāra abhihataḥ vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ
niṣpiṣṭa hṛdayaḥ bhūmau gatāsuḥ nipapāta ha

original: 6.033.042a evaṃ tair vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrās te rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: evam taiḥ vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrāḥ te rajanīcarāḥ

original: 6.033.042c dvandve vimṛditās tatra daityā iva divaukasaiḥ
analyzed: dvandve vimṛditāḥ tatra daityāḥ iva divaukasaiḥ

original: 6.033.043a bhallaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomara paṭṭasaiḥ
analyzed: bhallaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ gadābhiḥ ca śakti tomara paṭṭasaiḥ

original: 6.033.043c apaviddhaś ca bhinnaś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hayaiḥ
analyzed: apaviddhaḥ ca bhinnaḥ ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikaiḥ hayaiḥ
nihataiḥ kuñjaraiḥ mattaiḥ tathā vānara rākṣasaiḥ
cakra akṣa yuga daṇḍaiḥ ca bhagnaiḥ dharaṇi saṃśritaiḥ
babhūva āyodhanam ghoram gomāyu gaṇa sevitam
kabandhāni samutpetuḥ dikṣu vānara rakṣasām
vimarde tumule tasmin deva asura raṇa upame
vidāryamāṇāḥ hari puṃgavaiḥ tadā
niśācarāḥ śoṇita digdha gātrāḥ
punar su yuddham tarasā samāśritā
divākarasya astamaya abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.034.001a yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām
analyzed: yudhyatām eva teṣām tu tadā vānara rakṣasām

original: 6.034.001c ravir astaṃ gato rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇahāriṇī
analyzed: raviḥ astam gataḥ rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇa hāriṇī
anyonyam baddha vairāṇām ghorāṇām jayam icchatām
saṃpravṛttam niśā yuddham tadā vāraṇa rakṣasām
rākṣasaḥ si iti harayaḥ hariḥ ca asi iti rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.034.003c anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
analyzed: anyonyam samare jaghnuḥ tasmin tamasi dāruṇe

original: 6.034.004a jahi dāraya caitīti kathaṃ vidravasīti ca
analyzed: jahi dāraya ca eti iti katham vidravasi iti ca

original: 6.034.004c evaṃ sutumulaḥ śabdas tasmiṃs tamasi śuśruve
analyzed: evam su tumulaḥ śabdaḥ tasmin tamasi śuśruve
kālāḥ kāñcana saṃnāhāḥ tasmin tamasi rākṣasāḥ
saṃprādṛśyanta śaila indrāḥ dīpta oṣadhi vanāḥ iva
tasmin tamasi duṣpāre rākṣasāḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ
paripetuḥ mahā vegāḥ bhakṣayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
te hayān kāñcana apīḍan dhvajān ca agni śikhā upamān
āplutya daśanaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ bhīma kopāḥ vyadārayan
kuñjarān kuñjara ārohān patākā dhvajinaḥ rathān

original: 6.034.008c cakarṣuś ca dadaṃśuś ca daśanaiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
analyzed: cakarṣuḥ ca dadaṃśuḥ ca daśanaiḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ

original: 6.034.009a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmaś ca śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca api rāmaḥ ca śaraiḥ āśīviṣa umapaiḥ
dṛśya adṛśyāni rakṣāṃsi pravarāṇi nijaghnatuḥ
turaṃga khura vidhvastam ratha nemi samuddhatam
rurodha karṇa netra āṇi ṇi udhyatām dharaṇī rajaḥ
vartamāne tathā ghore saṃgrāme loma harṣaṇe
rudhira udāḥ mahā vegāḥ nadyaḥ tatra prasusruvuḥ
tatas bherī mṛdaṅgānām paṇavānām ca nisvanaḥ
śaṅkha veṇu svana unmiśraḥ saṃbabhūva adbhuta upamaḥ
hatānām stanamānānām rākṣasānām ca nisvanaḥ
śastrāṇām vānarāṇām ca saṃbabhūva ati dāruṇaḥ
śastra puṣpa upahārā ca tatra āsīt yuddha medinī
durjñeyā durniveśā ca śoṇita āsrava kardamā
sā babhūva niśā ghorā hari rākṣasa hāriṇī
kālarātriḥ iva bhūtānām sarveṣām duratikramā

original: 6.034.016a tatas te rākṣasās tatra tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ tatra tasmin tamasi dāruṇe
rāmam eva abhyadhāvanta saṃhṛṣṭā śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
teṣām āpatatām śabdaḥ kruddhānām abhigarjatām

original: 6.034.017c udvarta iva saptānāṃ samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ
analyzed: udvartaḥ iva saptānām samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ

original: 6.034.018a teṣāṃ rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ jaghāna niśācarān
analyzed: teṣām rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaṭ jaghāna niśācarān
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa śitaiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ
yajñaśatruḥ ca durdharṣaḥ mahāpārśva mahodarau
vajra daṃṣṭraḥ mahā kāyaḥ tau ca ubhau śuka sāraṇau

original: 6.034.020a te tu rāmeṇa bāṇaughaḥ sarvamarmasu tāḍitāḥ
analyzed: te tu rāmeṇa bāṇa oghaḥ sarva marmasu tāḍitāḥ
yuddhāt apasṛtāḥ tatra sa avaśeṣa āyuṣaḥ bhavan
tatas kāñcana citra aṅgaiḥ śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ

original: 6.034.021c diśaś cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 6.034.022a ye tv anye rākṣasā vīrā rāmasyābhimukhe sthitāḥ
analyzed: ye tu anye rākṣasāḥ vīrāḥ rāmasya abhimukhe sthitāḥ

original: 6.034.022c te 'pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgā iva pāvakam
analyzed: te pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgāḥ iva pāvakam
suvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ viśikhaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ sahasraśas

original: 6.034.023c babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotair iva śāradī
analyzed: babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotaiḥ iva śāradī

original: 6.034.024a rākṣasānāṃ ca ninadair harīṇāṃ cāpi garjitaiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca ninadaiḥ harīṇām ca api garjitaiḥ

original: 6.034.024c sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyo ghoratarā tadā
analyzed: sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyas ghoratarā tadā
tena śabdena mahatā pravṛddhena samantataḥ
trikūṭaḥ kandara ākīrṇaḥ pravyāharat iva acalaḥ
golāṅgūlāḥ mahā kāyāḥ tamasā tulya varcasaḥ
saṃpariṣvajya bāhubhyām bhakṣayan rajanīcarān

original: 6.034.027a aṅgadas tu raṇe śatruṃ nihantuṃ samupasthitaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ tu raṇe śatrum nihantum samupasthitaḥ

original: 6.034.027c rāvaṇer nijaghānāśu sārathiṃ ca hayān api
analyzed: rāvaṇeḥ nijaghāna āśu sārathim ca hayān api

original: 6.034.028a indrajit tu rathaṃ tyaktvā hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
analyzed: indrajit tu ratham tyaktvā hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ
aṅgadena mahā māyaḥ tatra eva antaradhīyata
saḥ gataḥ pāpaḥ raṇa karkaśaḥ
brahma datta varaḥ vīraḥ rāvaṇiḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
adṛśyaḥ niśitān bāṇān mumoca aśani varcasaḥ

original: 6.034.030a sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva ghorair nāgamayaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sa rāmam lakṣmaṇam ca eva ghoraiḥ nāga mayaiḥ śaraiḥ
bibheda samare kruddhaḥ sarva gātreṣu rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.035.001a sa tasya gatim anvicchan rājaputraḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: sa tasya gatim anvicchan rāja putraḥ pratāpavān
dideśa atibalaḥ rāmaḥ daśa vānara yūthapān

original: 6.035.002a dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlaṃ ca plavagarṣabham
analyzed: dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlam ca plavaga ṛṣabham

original: 6.035.002c aṅgadaṃ vāliputraṃ ca śarabhaṃ ca tarasvinam
analyzed: aṅgadam vāli putram ca śarabham ca tarasvinam
vinatam jāmbavantam ca sānuprastham mahā balam
ṛṣabham ca ṛṣabha skandham ādideśa paraṃtapaḥ

original: 6.035.004a te saṃprahṛṣṭā harayo bhīmān udyamya pādapān
analyzed: te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ harayaḥ bhīmān udyamya pādapān

original: 6.035.004c ākāśaṃ viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇā diśo daśa
analyzed: ākāśam viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇāḥ diśaḥ daśa
teṣām vegavatām vegam iṣubhiḥ vegavattaraiḥ
astra vid parama astreṇa vārayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
tam bhīma vegāḥ harayaḥ nārācaiḥ kṣata vikṣatāḥ

original: 6.035.006c andhakāre na dadṛśur meghaiḥ sūryam ivāvṛtam
analyzed: andhakāre na dadṛśuḥ meghaiḥ sūryam iva āvṛtam
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ eva sarva marma bhidaḥ śarān
bhṛśam āveśayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ samitiṃjayaḥ
nirantara śarīrau tu bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
kruddhena indrajotā vīrau pannagaiḥ śara tām gataiḥ
tayoḥ kṣataja mārgeṇa susrāva rudhiram bahu

original: 6.035.009c tāv ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
analyzed: tau ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitau iva kiṃśukau
tatas paryanta rakta akṣaḥ bhinnāñjana caya upamaḥ
rāvaṇiḥ bhrātarau vākyam antardhāna gataḥ bravīt
yudhyamānam anālakṣyam tridaśeśvaraḥ

original: 6.035.011c draṣṭum āsādituṃ vāpi na śaktaḥ kiṃ punar yuvām
analyzed: draṣṭum āsāditum vā api na śaktaḥ kim punar yuvām
prāvṛtau iṣu jālena rāghavau kaṅka patriṇā
eṣa roṣa parīta ātmā nayāmi yama sādanam

original: 6.035.013a evam uktvā tu dharmajñau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: evam uktvā tu dharma jñau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.035.013c nirbibheda śitair bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca
analyzed: nirbibheda śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca
bhinnāñjana caya śyāmaḥ visphārya vipulam dhanuḥ

original: 6.035.014c bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarān ghorān visasarja mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas śarān ghorān visasarja mahā mṛdhe

original: 6.035.015a tato marmasu marmajño majjayan niśitāñ śarān
analyzed: tatas marmasu marma jñaḥ majjayan niśitām śarān

original: 6.035.015c rāmalakṣmaṇayor vīro nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ vīraḥ nanāda ca muhur muhur

original: 6.035.016a baddhau tu śarabandhena tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
analyzed: baddhau tu śara bandhena tau ubhau raṇa mūrdhani
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa na śekatuḥ udīkṣitum
tatas vibhinna sarva aṅgau śara śalya ācitau ubhau
dhvajau iva mahā indrasya rajju muktau prakampitau
tau saṃpracalitau vīrau marma bhedena karśitau
nipetatuḥ mahā iṣvāsau jagatyām jagatīpatī
tau vīra śayane vīrau śayānau rudhira ukṣitau
śara veṣṭita sarva aṅgau ārtau parama pīḍitau

original: 6.035.020a na hy aviddhaṃ tayor gātraṃ babhūvāṅgulam antaram
analyzed: na hi a viddham tayoḥ gātram babhūva aṅgulam antaram

original: 6.035.020c nānirbhinnaṃ na cāstabdham ā karāgrād ajihmagaiḥ
analyzed: na a nirbhinnam na ca a stabdham ā kara agrāt ajihmagaiḥ

original: 6.035.021a tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
analyzed: tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
asṛj susruvatuḥ tīvram jalam prasravaṇau iva

original: 6.035.022a papāta prathamaṃ rāmo viddho marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: papāta prathamam rāmaḥ viddhaḥ marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ

original: 6.035.022c krodhād indrajitā yena purā śakro vinirjitaḥ
analyzed: krodhāt indrajitā yena purā śakraḥ vinirjitaḥ
nāracaiḥ ardhanārācaiḥ bhallaiḥ añjalikaiḥ api

original: 6.035.023c vivyādha vatsadantaiś ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣurais tathā
analyzed: vivyādha vatsadantaiḥ ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣuraiḥ tathā

original: 6.035.024a sa vīraśayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam
analyzed: sa vīra śayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam
bhinna muṣṭi parīṇāham triṇatam rukma bhūṣitam
bāṇa pāta antare rāmam patitam puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: 6.035.025c sa tatra lakṣmaṇo dṛṣṭvā nirāśo jīvite 'bhavat
analyzed: sa tatra lakṣmaṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā nirāśaḥ jīvite bhavat
baddhau tu vīrau patitau śayānau
tau vānarāḥ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
samāgatā vāyusuta pramukhyā
viṣadam ārtāḥ paramam ca jagmuḥ

original: 6.036.001a tato dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva vīkṣamāṇā vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas dyām pṛthivīm ca eva vīkṣamāṇāḥ vanaukasaḥ
dadṛśuḥ saṃtatau bāṇaiḥ bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
vṛṣṭvā iva uparate deve kṛta karmaṇi rākṣase
ājagāma atha tam deśam sa sugrīvaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
nīla dvivida maindāḥ ca suṣeṇa sumukha aṅgadāḥ
tūrṇam hanumatā sārdham anvaśocanta rāghavau
niśceṣṭau manda niḥśvāsau śoṇita ogha pariplutau
śara jāla ācitau stabdhau śayānau śara talpayoḥ
niḥśvasantau yathā sarpau niśceṣṭau manda vikramau
rudhira srāva digdha aṅgau tāpanīyau iva dhvajau
tau vīra śayane vīrau śayānau manda ceṣṭitau
yūthapaiḥ taiḥ parivṛtau bāṣpa vyākula locanaiḥ
rāghavau patitau dṛṣṭvā śara jāla samāvṛtau
babhūvuḥ vyathitāḥ sarve vānarāḥ sa vibhīṣaṇāḥ

original: 6.036.008a antarikṣaṃ nirīkṣanto diśaḥ sarvāś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: antarikṣam nirīkṣantaḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.036.008c na cainaṃ māyayā channaṃ dadṛśū rāvaṇiṃ raṇe
analyzed: na ca enam māyayā channam dadṛśuḥ rāvaṇim raṇe
tam tu māyā praticchinnam māyayā eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
vīkṣamāṇaḥ dadarśa atha bhrātuḥ putram avasthitam
tam apratima karmāṇam apratidvandvam āhave
dadarśa antarhitam vīram vara dānāt vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.036.011a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca
analyzed: indrajit tu ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca
uvāca parama prītaḥ harṣayan sarva nairṛtān

original: 6.036.012a dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahābalau
analyzed: dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahā balau
sāditau māmakaiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
na imau mokṣayitum śakyau etasmāt iṣu bandhanāt
sarvaiḥ api samāgamya sa ṛṣi saṅghaiḥ sura asuraiḥ
yatkṛte cintayānasya śoka ārtasya pituḥ mama

original: 6.036.014c aspṛṣṭvā śayanaṃ gātrais triyāmā yāti śarvatī
analyzed: a spṛṣṭvā śayanam gātraiḥ triyāmā yāti śarvatī

original: 6.036.015a kṛtsneyaṃ yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsv ivākulā
analyzed: kṛtsnā iyam yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsu iva ākulā
saḥ yam mūla haraḥ narthaḥ sarveṣām nihataḥ mayā
rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya eva sarveṣām ca vanaukasām

original: 6.036.016c vikramā niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ
analyzed: vikramāḥ niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ

original: 6.036.017a evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśvagān
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśva gān

original: 6.036.017c yūthapān api tān sarvāṃs tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: yūthapān api tān sarvān tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ

original: 6.036.018a tān ardayitvā bāṇaughais trāsayitvā ca vānarān
analyzed: tān ardayitvā bāṇa oghaiḥ trāsayitvā ca vānarān
prajahāsa mahā bāhuḥ vacanam ca idam abravīt
śara bandhena ghoreṇa mayā baddhau camū mukhe
sahitau bhrātarau etau niśāmayata rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.036.020a evam uktās tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭayodhinaḥ
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭa yodhinaḥ

original: 6.036.020c paraṃ vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ
analyzed: param vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ

original: 6.036.021a vineduś ca mahānādān sarve te jaladopamāḥ
analyzed: vineduḥ ca mahā nādān sarve te jalada upamāḥ

original: 6.036.021c hato rāma iti jñātvā rāvaṇiṃ samapūjayan
analyzed: hataḥ rāmaḥ iti jñātvā rāvaṇim samapūjayan

original: 6.036.022a niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau
vasudhāyām nirucchvāsau hatau iti anvamanyata
harṣeṇa tu samāviṣṭaḥ indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ
praviveśa purīm laṅkām harṣayan sarva nairṛtān
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ dṛṣṭvā śarīre sāyakaiḥ cite
sarvāṇi ca aṅga upāṅgāni sugrīvam bhayam āviśat
tam uvāca paritrastam vānara indram vibhīṣaṇaḥ
sa bāṣpa vadanam dīnam śoka vyākula locanam
alam trāsena sugrīva bāṣpa vegaḥ nigṛhyatām

original: 6.036.026c evaṃ prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayo nāsti naiṣṭhikaḥ
analyzed: evam prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayaḥ na asti naiṣṭhikaḥ
sa śeṣa bhāgya tā asmākam yadi vīra bhaviṣyati
moham etau prahāsyete bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
paryavasthāpaya ātmānam anātham mām ca vānara
satya dharma anuraktānām na asti mṛtyu kṛtam bhayam

original: 6.036.029a evam uktvā tatas tasya jalaklinnena pāṇinā
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas tasya jala klinnena pāṇinā
sugrīvasya śubhe netre pramamārja vibhīṣaṇaḥ
pramṛjya vadanam tasya kapi rājasya dhīmataḥ
abravīt kāla saṃprātam asaṃbhrāntam idam vacaḥ
na kālaḥ kapi rāja indra vaiklavyam anuvartitum
atisnehaḥ pi akāle smin maraṇāya upapadyate
tasmāt utsṛjya vaiklavyam sarva kārya vināśanam
hitam rāma purogāṇām sainyānām anucintyatām

original: 6.036.033a atha vā rakṣyatāṃ rāmo yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ
analyzed: atha vā rakṣyatām rāmaḥ yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ

original: 6.036.033c labdhasaṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayaṃ no vyapaneṣyataḥ
analyzed: labdha saṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayam naḥ vyapaneṣyataḥ

original: 6.036.034a naitat kiṃ cana rāmasya na ca rāmo mumūrṣati
analyzed: na etat kim cana rāmasya na ca rāmaḥ mumūrṣati

original: 6.036.034c na hy enaṃ hāsyate lakṣmīr durlabhā yā gatāyuṣām
analyzed: na hi enam hāsyate lakṣmīḥ durlabhā yā gata āyuṣām
tasmāt āśvāsaya ātmānam balam ca āśvāsaya svakam

original: 6.036.035c yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punaḥ saṃsthāpayāmy aham
analyzed: yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punar saṃsthāpayāmi aham
ete hi utphulla nayanāḥ trāsāt āgata sādhvasāḥ
karṇe karṇe prakathitāḥ harayaḥ hari puṃgava

original: 6.036.037a māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkaṃ saṃpraharṣitum
analyzed: mām tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkam saṃpraharṣitum

original: 6.036.037c tyajantu harayas trāsaṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam
analyzed: tyajantu harayaḥ trāsam bhukta pūrvām iva srajam
samāśvāsya tu sugrīvam rākṣasa indraḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
vidrutam vānara anīkam tat samāśvāsayat punar
indrajit tu mahā māyaḥ sarva sainya samāvṛtaḥ
viveśa nagarīm laṅkām pitaram ca abhyupāgamat
tatra rāvaṇam āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
ācacakṣe priyam pitre nihatau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.036.041a utpapāta tato hṛṣṭaḥ putraṃ ca pariṣasvaje
analyzed: utpapāta tatas hṛṣṭaḥ putram ca pariṣasvaje

original: 6.036.041c rāvaṇo rakṣasāṃ madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ rakṣasām madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau

original: 6.036.042a upāghrāya sa mūrdhny enaṃ papraccha prītamānasaḥ
analyzed: upāghrāya sa mūrdhni enam papraccha prīta mānasaḥ

original: 6.036.042c pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttaṃ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat
analyzed: pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttam pitre sarvam nyavedayat
sa harṣa vega anugata antarātmā
śrutvā vacaḥ tasya mahā rathasya
jahau jvaram dāśaratheḥ samutthitam
prahṛṣya vācā abhinananda putram
pratipraviṣṭe laṅkām tu kṛtārthe rāvaṇa ātmaje
rāghavam parivārya ārtāḥ rarakṣuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.037.002a hanūmān aṅgado nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
analyzed: hanūmān aṅgadaḥ nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudaḥ nalaḥ
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: 6.037.003a jāmbavān ṛṣabhaḥ sundo rambhaḥ śatabaliḥ pṛthuḥ
6.037.003c vyūḍhānīkāś ca yattāś ca drumān ādāya sarvataḥ
analyzed: vyūḍha anīkāḥ ca yattāḥ ca drumān ādāya sarvatas

original: 6.037.004a vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇāḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ tiryak ūrdhvam ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.037.004c tṛṇeṣv api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasā iti menire
analyzed: tṛṇeṣu api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasāḥ iti menire
rāvaṇaḥ ca api saṃhṛṣṭaḥ visṛjya indrajitam sutam

original: 6.037.005c ājuhāva tataḥ sītā rakṣaṇī rākṣasīs tadā
analyzed: ājuhāva tatas sītā rakṣaṇīḥ rākṣasīḥ tadā

original: 6.037.006a rākṣasyas trijaṭā cāpi śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasyaḥ trijaṭā ca api śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ

original: 6.037.006c tā uvāca tato hṛṣṭo rākṣasī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: tāḥ uvāca tatas hṛṣṭaḥ rākṣasīḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
hatau indrajitā ākhyāta vaidehyāḥ rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.037.007c puṣpakaṃ ca samāropya darśayadhvaṃ hatau raṇe
analyzed: puṣpakam ca samāropya darśayadhvam hatau raṇe

original: 6.037.008a yad āśrayād avaṣṭabdho neyaṃ mām upatiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat āśrayāt avaṣṭabdhaḥ na iyam mām upatiṣṭhati

original: 6.037.008c so 'syā bhartā saha bhrātrā nirasto raṇamūrdhani
analyzed: sā u syāḥ bhartā saha bhrātrā nirastaḥ raṇa mūrdhani
nirviśaṅkā nirudvignā nirapekṣā ca maithilī
mām upasthāsyate sītā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: 6.037.010a adya kālavaśaṃ prāptaṃ raṇe rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: adya kāla vaśam prāptam raṇe rāmam sa lakṣmaṇam
avekṣya vinivṛtta āśāḥ na anyām gatim a paśyatī
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.037.011c rākṣasyas tās tathety uktvā prajagmur yatra puṣpakam
analyzed: rākṣasyaḥ tāḥ tathā iti uktvā prajagmuḥ yatra puṣpakam
tatas puṣpakam ādaya rākṣasyaḥ rāvaṇa ājñayā
aśoka vanikā sthām tām maithilīm samupānayan
tām ādāya tu rākṣasyaḥ bhartṛ śoka parāyaṇām

original: 6.037.013c sītām āropayām āsur vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tadā
analyzed: sītām āropayām āsuḥ vimānam puṣpakam tadā

original: 6.037.014a tataḥ puṣpakam āropya sītāṃ trijaṭayā saha
analyzed: tatas puṣpakam āropya sītām trijaṭayā saha
rāvaṇaḥ kārayat laṅkām patākā dhvaja mālinīm
prāghoṣayata hṛṣṭaḥ ca laṅkāyām rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.037.015c rāghavo lakṣmaṇaś caiva hatāv indrajitā raṇe
analyzed: rāghavaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva hatau indrajitā raṇe

original: 6.037.016a vimānenāpi sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha
analyzed: vimānena api sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha

original: 6.037.016c dadarśa vānarāṇāṃ tu sarvaṃ sinyaṃ nipātitam
analyzed: dadarśa vānarāṇām tu sarvam sinyam nipātitam
prahṛṣṭa manasaḥ ca api dadarśa piśita aśanān
vānarān ca api duḥkha ārtān rāma lakṣmaṇa pārśvatas
tatas sītā dadarśa ubhau śayānau śata talpayoḥ

original: 6.037.018c lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca visaṃjñau śarapīḍitau
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam ca eva rāmam ca visaṃjñau śara pīḍitau
vidhvasta kavacau vīrau vipraviddha śarāsanau
sāyakaiḥ chinna sarva aṅgau śara stambha mayau kṣitau

original: 6.037.020a tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣarṣabhau
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣa ṛṣabhau

original: 6.037.020c duḥkhārtā subhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ vilalāpa ha
analyzed: duḥkha ārtā su bhṛśam sītā karuṇam vilalāpa ha
sā bāṣpa śoka abhihatā samīkṣya
tau bhrātarau deva sama prabhāvau
vitarkayantī nidhanam tayoḥ sā
duḥkha anvitā vākyam idam jagāda

original: 6.038.001a bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: bhartāram nihatam dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam
vilalāpa bhṛśam sītā karuṇam śoka karśitā

original: 6.038.002a ūcur lakṣaṇikā ye māṃ putriṇy avidhaveti ca
analyzed: ūcuḥ lakṣaṇikāḥ ye mām putriṇī a vidhavā iti ca
te sya sarve hate rāme jñāninaḥ nṛta vādinaḥ

original: 6.038.003a yajvano mahiṣīṃ ye mām ūcuḥ patnīṃ ca satriṇaḥ
analyzed: yajvanaḥ mahiṣīm ye mām ūcuḥ patnīm ca satriṇaḥ
te sarve hate rāme jñāninaḥ nṛta vādinaḥ

original: 6.038.004a vīrapārthivapatnī tvaṃ ye dhanyeti ca māṃ viduḥ
analyzed: vīra pārthiva patnī tvam ye dhanyā iti ca mām viduḥ
te sarve hate rāme jñāninaḥ nṛta vādinaḥ

original: 6.038.005a ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye māṃ dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām
analyzed: ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye mām dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām
te sarve hate rāme jñāninaḥ nṛta vādinaḥ

original: 6.038.006a imāni khalu padmāni pādayor yaiḥ kila striyaḥ
analyzed: imāni khalu padmāni pādayoḥ yaiḥ kila striyaḥ
adhirājye bhiṣicyante narendraiḥ patibhiḥ saha
vaidhavyam yānti yaiḥ nāryaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ bhāgya durlabhāḥ
na ātmanaḥ tāni paśyāmi paśyantī hata lakṣaṇā
satyāni imāni padmāni strīṇām uktvāni lakṣaṇe

original: 6.038.008c tāny adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me
analyzed: tāni adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me

original: 6.038.009a keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samā nīlā bhruvau cāsaṃgate mama
analyzed: keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samāḥ nīlāḥ bhruvau ca asaṃgate mama

original: 6.038.009c vṛtte cālomaśe jaṅghe dantāś cāviralā mama
analyzed: vṛtte ca alomaśe jaṅghe dantāḥ ca aviralāḥ mama

original: 6.038.010a śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphāv ūrū ca me citau
analyzed: śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphau ūrū ca me citau

original: 6.038.010c anuvṛttā nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāś cāṅgulayo mama
analyzed: anuvṛttāḥ nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāḥ ca aṅgulayaḥ mama
stanau ca aviralau pīnau mama imau magna cūcukau

original: 6.038.011c magnā cotsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśvoraskaṃ ca me citam
analyzed: magnā ca utsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśva uraskam ca me citam

original: 6.038.012a mama varṇo maṇinibho mṛdūny aṅgaruhāṇi ca
analyzed: mama varṇaḥ maṇi nibhaḥ mṛdūni aṅgaruhāṇi ca
pratiṣṭhitām dvadaśabhiḥ mām ūcuḥ śubha lakṣaṇām
samagra yavam acchidram pāṇi pādam ca varṇavat

original: 6.038.013c mandasmitety eva ca māṃ kanyālakṣaṇikā viduḥ
analyzed: mandasmitā iti eva ca mām kanyā lakṣaṇikāḥ viduḥ
adhirājye bhiṣekaḥ me brāhmaṇaiḥ patinā saha
kṛtānta kuśalaiḥ uktam tat sarvam vitathīkṛtam
śodhayitvā janasthānam pravṛttim upalabhya ca

original: 6.038.015c tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ bhrātarau goṣpade hatau
analyzed: tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyam bhrātarau goṣpade hatau

original: 6.038.016a nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindraṃ vāyavyam eva ca
analyzed: nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindram vāyavyam eva ca
astram brahmaśiraḥ ca eva rāghavau pratyapadyatām
adṛśyamānena raṇe māyayā vāsava upamau
mama nāthau anāthāyāḥ nihatau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.038.018a na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ
analyzed: na hi dṛṣṭi patham prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ

original: 6.038.018c jīvan pratinivarteta yady api syān manojavaḥ
analyzed: jīvan pratinivarteta yadi api syāt manojavaḥ
na kālasya atibhāraḥ sti kṛtāntaḥ ca su durjayaḥ

original: 6.038.019c yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ
analyzed: yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ

original: 6.038.020a nāhaṃ śocāmi bhartāraṃ nihataṃ na ca lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: na aham śocāmi bhartāram nihatam na ca lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.038.020c nātmānaṃ jananī cāpi yathā śvaśrūṃ tapasvinīm
analyzed: na ātmānam jananī ca api yathā śvaśrūm tapasvinīm

original: 6.038.021a sā hi cintayate nityaṃ samāptavratam āgatam
analyzed: sā hi cintayate nityam samāpta vratam āgatam

original: 6.038.021c kadā drakṣyāmi sītāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: kadā drakṣyāmi sītām ca rāmam ca sahalakṣmaṇam
paridevayamānām tām rākṣasī trijaṭā bravīt

original: 6.038.022c mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā devi bhartāyaṃ tava jīvati
analyzed: mā viṣādam kṛthāḥ devi bhartā ayam tava jīvati

original: 6.038.023a kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca
analyzed: kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca
yathā imau jīvataḥ devi bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
na hi kopa parītāni harṣa paryutsukāni ca

original: 6.038.024c bhavanti yudhi yodhānāṃ mukhāni nihate patau
analyzed: bhavanti yudhi yodhānām mukhāni nihate patau

original: 6.038.025a idaṃ vimānaṃ vaidehi puṣpakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: idam vimānam vaidehi puṣpakam nāma nāmataḥ

original: 6.038.025c divyaṃ tvāṃ dhārayen nedaṃ yady etau gajajīvitau
analyzed: divyam tvām dhārayet na idam yadi etau gaja jīvitau
hata vīra pradhānā hi hata utsāhā nirudyamā

original: 6.038.026c senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hatakarṇeva naur jale
analyzed: senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hata karṇā iva nauḥ jale
iyam punar asaṃbhrāntā nirudvignā tarasvinī

original: 6.038.027c senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe
analyzed: senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe

original: 6.038.028a sā tvaṃ bhava suvisrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukhodayaiḥ
analyzed: sā tvam bhava su visrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukha udayaiḥ

original: 6.038.028c ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehād etad bravīmi te
analyzed: ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehāt etat bravīmi te

original: 6.038.029a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
analyzed: anṛtam na ukta pūrvam me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
cāritra sukha śīla tvāt praviṣṭā asi manaḥ mama

original: 6.038.030a nemau śakyau raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: na imau śakyau raṇe jetum sa indraiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: 6.038.030c etayor ānanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cāveditaṃ tava
analyzed: etayoḥ ānanam dṛṣṭvā mayā ca āveditam tava

original: 6.038.031a idaṃ ca sumahac cihnaṃ śanaiḥ paśyasva maithili
analyzed: idam ca su mahat cihnam śanais paśyasva maithili

original: 6.038.031c niḥsaṃjñāv apy ubhāv etau naiva lakṣmīr viyujyate
analyzed: niḥsaṃjñau api ubhau etau nā eva lakṣmīḥ viyujyate
prāyeṇa gata sattvānām puruṣāṇām gata āyuṣām
dṛśyamāneṣu vaktreṣu param bhavati vaikṛtam

original: 6.038.033a tyaja śokaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca janakātmaje
analyzed: tyaja śokam ca duḥkham ca moham ca janakātmaje
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ arthe na adya śakyam a jīvitum

original: 6.038.034a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sītā surasutopamā
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasyāḥ sītā sura sutā upamā

original: 6.038.034c kṛtāñjalir uvācedam evam astv iti maithilī
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ uvāca idam evam astu iti maithilī

original: 6.038.035a vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tat tu samivartya manojavam
analyzed: vimānam puṣpakam tat tu manojavam

original: 6.038.035c dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā
analyzed: dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā

original: 6.038.036a tatas trijaṭayā sārdhaṃ puṣpakād avaruhya sā
analyzed: tatas trijaṭayā sārdham puṣpakāt avaruhya sā
aśoka vanikām eva rakṣasībhiḥ praveśitā
praviśya sītā bahu vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍām
tām rākṣasa indrasya vihāra bhūmim
saṃprekṣya saṃcintya ca rāja putrau
param viṣādam samupājagāma
ghoreṇa śara bandhena baddhau daśaratha ātmajau
niśvasantau yathā nāgau śayānau rudhira ukṣitau
sarve te vānara śreṣṭhāḥ sa sugrīvāḥ mahā balāḥ
parivārya mahātmānau tasthuḥ śoka pariplutāḥ
etasmin rāmaḥ pratyabudhyata vīryavān

original: 6.039.003c sthiratvāt sattvayogāc ca śaraiḥ saṃdānito 'pi san
analyzed: sthira tvāt sattva yogāt ca śaraiḥ saṃdānitaḥ san

original: 6.039.004a tato dṛṣṭvā sarudhiraṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ gāḍham arpitam
analyzed: tatas dṛṣṭvā sa rudhiram viṣaṇṇam gāḍham arpitam
bhrātaram dīna vadanam paryadevayat āturaḥ

original: 6.039.005a kiṃ nu me sītayā kāryaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena vā
analyzed: kim nu me sītayā kāryam kim kāryam jīvitena vā

original: 6.039.005c śayānaṃ yo 'dya paśyāmi bhrātaraṃ yudhi nirjitam
analyzed: śayānam yaḥ dya paśyāmi bhrātaram yudhi nirjitam

original: 6.039.006a śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptuṃ loke vicinvatā
analyzed: śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptum loke vicinvatā
na lakṣmaṇa samaḥ bhrātā sacivaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ

original: 6.039.007a parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān vānarāṇāṃ tu paśyatām
analyzed: parityakṣyāmi aham prāṇān vānarāṇām tu paśyatām
yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 6.039.008a kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kausalyāṃ mātaraṃ kiṃ nu kaikayīm
analyzed: kim nu vakṣyāmi kausalyām mātaram kim nu kaikayīm
katham ambām sumitrām ca putra darśana lālasām

original: 6.039.009a vivatsāṃ vepamānāṃ ca krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
analyzed: vivatsām vepamānām ca krośantīm kurarīm iva

original: 6.039.009c katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi taṃ vinā
analyzed: katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi tam vinā

original: 6.039.010a kathaṃ vakṣyāmi śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ ca yaśasvinam
analyzed: katham vakṣyāmi śatrughnam bharatam ca yaśasvinam

original: 6.039.010c mayā saha vanaṃ yāto vinā tenāgataḥ punaḥ
analyzed: mayā saha vanam yātaḥ vinā tena āgataḥ punar

original: 6.039.011a upālambhaṃ na śakṣyāmi soḍhuṃ bata sumitrayā
analyzed: upālambham na śakṣyāmi soḍhum bata sumitrayā

original: 6.039.011c ihaiva dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe
analyzed: iha eva deham tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe

original: 6.039.012a dhiṅ māṃ duṣkṛtakarmāṇam anāryaṃ yatkṛte hy asau
analyzed: dhik mām duṣkṛta karmāṇam anāryam yad kṛte hi asau
lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ śete śara talpe gatāsu vat

original: 6.039.013a tvaṃ nityaṃ suviṣaṇṇaṃ mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: tvam nityam su viṣaṇṇam mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa

original: 6.039.013c gatāsur nādya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum
analyzed: gatāsuḥ na adya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum

original: 6.039.014a yenādya bahavo yuddhe rākṣasā nihatāḥ kṣitau
analyzed: yena adya bahavaḥ yuddhe rākṣasāḥ nihatāḥ kṣitau

original: 6.039.014c tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ
analyzed: tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ
śayānaḥ śara talpe smin sva śoṇita pariplutaḥ

original: 6.039.015c śarajālaiś cito bhāti bhāskaro 'stam iva vrajan
analyzed: śara jālaiḥ citaḥ bhāti bhāskaraḥ stam iva vrajan
bāṇa abhihata marma tvāt na śaknoti abhivīkṣitum

original: 6.039.016c rujā cābruvato hy asya dṛṣṭirāgeṇa sūcyate
analyzed: rujā ca abruvataḥ hi asya dṛṣṭi rāgeṇa sūcyate

original: 6.039.017a yathaiva māṃ vanaṃ yāntam anuyāto mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: yathā eva mām vanam yāntam anuyātaḥ mahā dyutiḥ
aham api anuyāsyāmi tathā eva enam yama kṣayam

original: 6.039.018a iṣṭabandhujano nityaṃ māṃ ca nityam anuvrataḥ
analyzed: iṣṭa bandhu janaḥ nityam mām ca nityam anuvrataḥ
imām adya gataḥ vasthām mama anāryasya durnayaiḥ
su ruṣṭena api vīreṇa na saṃsmare

original: 6.039.019c paruṣaṃ vipriyaṃ vāpi śrāvitaṃ na kadā cana
analyzed: paruṣam vipriyam vā api śrāvitam na kadā cana
visasarja eka vegena pañcabāṇa śatāni yaḥ

original: 6.039.020c iṣvastreṣv adhikas tasmāt kārtavīryāc ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: iṣu astreṣu adhikaḥ tasmāt kārtavīryāt ca lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.039.021a astrair astrāṇi yo hanyāc chakrasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: astraiḥ astrāṇi yaḥ hanyāt śakrasya api mahātmanaḥ
saḥ yam urvyā aṃhataḥ śete mahārha śayana ucitaḥ

original: 6.039.022a tac ca mithyā pralaptaṃ māṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tat ca mithyā pralaptam mām pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.039.022c yan mayā na kṛto rājā rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat mayā na kṛtaḥ rājā rākṣasānām vibhīṣaṇaḥ
asmin muhūrte sugrīva pratiyātum itas rhasi

original: 6.039.023c matvā hīnaṃ mayā rājan rāvaṇo 'bhidraved balī
analyzed: matvā hīnam mayā rājan rāvaṇaḥ bhidravet balī
aṅgadam tu puraskṛtya sa sainyaḥ sa suhṛd janaḥ

original: 6.039.024c sāgaraṃ tara sugrīva punas tenaiva setunā
analyzed: sāgaram tara sugrīva punar tena eva setunā

original: 6.039.025a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
analyzed: kṛtam hanumatā kāryam yat anyaiḥ duṣkaram raṇe
ṛkṣa rājena tuṣyāmi golāṅgūla adhipena ca

original: 6.039.026a aṅgadena kṛtaṃ karma maindena dvividena ca
analyzed: aṅgadena kṛtam karma maindena dvividena ca

original: 6.039.026c yuddhaṃ kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoraṃ saṃpātinā kṛtam
analyzed: yuddham kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoram saṃpātinā kṛtam
gavayena gavākṣeṇa śarabheṇa gajena ca

original: 6.039.027c anyaiś ca haribhir yuddhaṃ madārthe tyaktajīvitaiḥ
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca haribhiḥ yuddham mada arthe tyakta jīvitaiḥ

original: 6.039.028a na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ daivaṃ sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ
analyzed: na ca atikramitum śakyam daivam sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ

original: 6.039.028c yat tu śakyaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
analyzed: yat tu śakyam vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
kṛtam sugrīva tat sarvam bhavatā adharma bhīruṇā
mitra kāryam kṛtam idam bhavadbhiḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.039.029c anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhatha
analyzed: anujñātāḥ mayā sarve yathā iṣṭam gantum arhatha

original: 6.039.030a śuśruvus tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam
analyzed: śuśruvuḥ tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam
vartayām cakruḥ aśrūṇi netraiḥ kṛṣṇa itara īkṣaṇāḥ
tatas sarvāṇi anīkāni sthāpayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
ājagāma gadā pāṇiḥ tvaritaḥ yatra rāghavaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā tvaritam yāntam nīlāñjana caya upamam

original: 6.039.032c vānarā dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānās tu rāvaṇim
analyzed: vānarāḥ dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānāḥ tu rāvaṇim
athā uvāca mahā tejāḥ hari rājaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.040.001c kim iyaṃ vyathitā senā mūḍhavāteva naur jale
analyzed: kim iyam vyathitā senā mūḍha vātā iva nauḥ jale
sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāli putraḥ ṅgadaḥ bravīt

original: 6.040.002c na tvaṃ paśyasi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: na tvam paśyasi rāmam ca lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam
śara jāla ācitau vīrau ubhau daśaratha ātmajau
śara talpe mahātmānau śayānau rudhira ukṣitau
athā abravīt vānara indraḥ sugrīvaḥ putram aṅgadam

original: 6.040.004c nānimittam idaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ bhayena tu
analyzed: na animittam idam manye bhavitavyam bhayena tu
viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ hi ete tyakta praharaṇāḥ diśaḥ
prapalāyanti harayaḥ trāsāt utphulla locanāḥ

original: 6.040.006a anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhatas
viprakarṣanti ca anyonyam patitam laṅghayanti ca
etasmin antare vīraḥ gadā pāṇiḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.040.007c sugrīvaṃ vardhayām āsa rāghavaṃ ca niraikṣata
analyzed: sugrīvam vardhayām āsa rāghavam ca niraikṣata
vibhīṣaṇam tam sugrīvaḥ dṛṣṭvā vānara bhīṣaṇam
ṛkṣa rājam samīpa stham jāmbavantam uvāca ha
vibhīṣaṇaḥ yam saṃprāptaḥ yam dṛṣṭvā vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
vidravanti paritrastāḥ rāvaṇa ātmaja śaṅkayā
śīghram etān su vitrastān bahudhā vipradhāvitān
paryavasthāpaya ākhyāhi vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam
sugrīveṇa evam uktaḥ tu jāmbavān ṛkṣa pārthivaḥ
vānarān sāntvayām āsa saṃnivartya prahāvataḥ

original: 6.040.012a te nivṛttāḥ punaḥ sarve vānarās tyaktasaṃbhramāḥ
analyzed: te nivṛttāḥ punar sarve vānarāḥ tyakta saṃbhramāḥ

original: 6.040.012c ṛkṣarājavacaḥ śrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: ṛkṣa rāja vacaḥ śrutvā tam ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.040.013a vibhīṣaṇas tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātraṃ śaraiś citam
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātram śaraiḥ citam
lakṣmaṇasya ca dharma ātmā babhūva vyathita indriyaḥ

original: 6.040.014a jalaklinnena hastena tayor netre pramṛjya ca
analyzed: jala klinnena hastena tayoḥ netre pramṛjya ca
śoka saṃpīḍita manāḥ ruroda vilalāpa ca
imau tau sattva saṃpannau vikrāntau priya saṃyugau
imām avasthām gamitau rākasaiḥ kūṭa yodhibhiḥ

original: 6.040.016a bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā
analyzed: bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā
rākṣasyā jihmayā buddhyā chalitau ṛju vikramau

original: 6.040.017a śarair imāv alaṃ viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau
analyzed: śaraiḥ imau alam viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau

original: 6.040.017c vasudhāyām ima suptau dṛśyete śalyakāv iva
analyzed: vasudhāyām suptau dṛśyete śalyakau iva

original: 6.040.018a yayor vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā
analyzed: yayoḥ vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā
tau ubhau deha nāśāya prasuptau puruṣa ṛṣabhau
jīvan adya smi naṣṭa rājya manorathaḥ

original: 6.040.019c prāptapratijñaś ca ripuḥ sakāmo rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: prāpta pratijñaḥ ca ripuḥ sa kāmaḥ rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
evam vilapamānam tam pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam
sugrīvaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ hari rājaḥ bravīt idam

original: 6.040.021a rājyaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: rājyam prāpsyasi dharma jña laṅkāyām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.040.021c rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyaṃ neha lapsyate
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyam na iha lapsyate
śara saṃpīḍitau etau ubhau rāghava lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.040.022c tyaktvā mohaṃ vadhiṣyete sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tyaktvā moham vadhiṣyete sa gaṇam rāvaṇam raṇe

original: 6.040.023a tam evaṃ sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: tam evam sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasam

original: 6.040.023c suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ pārśve sugrīvas tam uvāca ha
analyzed: suṣeṇam śvaśuram pārśve sugrīvaḥ tam uvāca ha
saha śūraiḥ hari gaṇaiḥ labdha saṃjñau ariṃdamau

original: 6.040.024c gaccha tvaṃ bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: gaccha tvam bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhām rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.040.025a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā saputraṃ sahabāndhavam
analyzed: aham tu rāvaṇam hatvā sa putram saha bāndhavam

original: 6.040.025c maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakro naṣṭām iva śriyam
analyzed: maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakraḥ naṣṭām iva śriyam
śrutvā etat vānara indrasya suṣeṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
devāsuram mahā yuddham anubhūtam su dāruṇam
tadā sma dānavāḥ devām śara saṃsparśa kovidāḥ
nijaghnuḥ śastra viduṣaḥ chādayantaḥ muhur muhur

original: 6.040.028a tān ārtān naṣṭasaṃjñāṃś ca parāsūṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: tān ārtān naṣṭa saṃjñān ca parāsūn ca bṛhaspatiḥ
vidhyābhiḥ mantra yuktābhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ cikitsati

original: 6.040.029a tāny auṣadhāny ānayituṃ kṣīrodaṃ yāntu sāgaram
analyzed: tāni auṣadhāni ānayitum kṣīrodam yāntu sāgaram
javena vānarāḥ śīghram saṃpāti panasa ādayaḥ

original: 6.040.030a harayas tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahauṣadhī
analyzed: harayaḥ tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahā auṣadhī
saṃjīva karaṇīm divyām viśalyām devanirmitām

original: 6.040.031a candraś ca nāma droṇaś ca parvatau sāgarottame
analyzed: candraḥ ca nāma droṇaḥ ca parvatau sāgara uttame

original: 6.040.031c amṛtaṃ yatra mathitaṃ tatra te paramauṣadhī
analyzed: amṛtam yatra mathitam tatra te parama oṣadhī

original: 6.040.032a te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate paramauṣadhī
analyzed: te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate parama oṣadhī

original: 6.040.032c ayaṃ vāyusuto rājan hanūmāṃs tatra gacchatu
analyzed: ayam vāyusutaḥ rājan hanūmān tatra gacchatu

original: 6.040.033a etasminn antare vāyur meghāṃś cāpi savidyutaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare vāyuḥ meghān ca api sa vidyutaḥ

original: 6.040.033c paryasyan sāgare toyaṃ kampayann iva parvatān
analyzed: paryasyan sāgare toyam kampayan iva parvatān
mahatā pakṣa vātena sarve dvīpa mahā drumāḥ
nipetuḥ bhagna viṭapāḥ sa mūlāḥ lavaṇāmbhasi
abhavan pannagāḥ trastāḥ bhoginaḥ tatravāsinaḥ

original: 6.040.035c śīghraṃ sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuś ca lavaṇārṇavam
analyzed: śīghram sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuḥ ca lavaṇārṇavam
tatas garuḍam vainateyam mahā balam

original: 6.040.036c vānarā dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam
analyzed: vānarāḥ dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam

original: 6.040.037a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgās te vipradudruvuḥ
analyzed: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgāḥ te vipradudruvuḥ

original: 6.040.037c yais tau satpuruṣau baddhau śarabhūtair mahābalau
analyzed: yaiḥ tau sat puruṣau baddhau śara bhūtaiḥ mahā balau

original: 6.040.038a tataḥ suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca
analyzed: tatas suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca
vimamarśa ca pāṇibhyām mukhe candra sama prabhe
vainateyena saṃspṛṣṭāḥ tayoḥ saṃruruhuḥ vraṇāḥ

original: 6.040.039c suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayor āśu babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayoḥ āśu babhūvatuḥ

original: 6.040.040a tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ cauja utsāhaś ca mahāguṇāḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ vīryam balam ca ojaḥ utsāhaḥ ca mahā guṇāḥ

original: 6.040.040c pradarśanaṃ ca buddhiś ca smṛtiś ca dviguṇaṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: pradarśanam ca buddhiḥ ca smṛtiḥ ca dviguṇam tayoḥ
tau utthāpya mahā vīryau garuḍaḥ vāsava upamau

original: 6.040.041c ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaś cainam uvāca ha
analyzed: ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaḥ ca enam uvāca ha
bhavat prasādāt vyasanam rāvaṇi prabhavam mahat

original: 6.040.042c āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghraṃ ca balinau kṛtau
analyzed: āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghram ca balinau kṛtau

original: 6.040.043a yathā tātaṃ daśarathaṃ yathājaṃ ca pitāmaham
analyzed: yathā tātam daśaratham yathā ajam ca pitāmaham

original: 6.040.043c tathā bhavantam āsādya hṛṣayaṃ me prasīdati
analyzed: tathā bhavantam āsādya me prasīdati
kaḥ bhavān rūpa saṃpannaḥ divya sraj anulepanaḥ
vasānaḥ viraje vastre divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ vainateyaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.040.046a ahaṃ sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
analyzed: aham sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇaḥ bahiścaraḥ
garutmān iha saṃprāptaḥ yuvayoḥ sāhya kāraṇāt

original: 6.040.047a asurā vā mahāvīryā dānavā vā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: asurāḥ vā mahā vīryāḥ dānavāḥ vā mahā balāḥ
surāḥ ca api sa gandharvāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum
na imam mokṣayitum śaktāḥ śara bandham su dāruṇam
māyā balāt indrajitā nirmitam krūra karmaṇā
ete nāgāḥ kādraveyāḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭra viṣa ulbaṇāḥ
rakṣaḥ māyā prabhāvena śarāḥ bhūtvā tvad āśritāḥ
sabhāgyaḥ ca asi dharma jña rāma satya parākrama
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā samare ripu ghātinā

original: 6.040.051a imaṃ śrutvā tu vṛttāntaṃ tvaramāṇo 'ham āgataḥ
analyzed: imam śrutvā tu vṛttāntam tvaramāṇaḥ ham āgataḥ
sahasā yuvayoḥ snehāt sakhitvam anupālayan
mokṣitau ca mahā ghorāt asmāt sāyaka bandhanāt

original: 6.040.052c apramādaś ca kartavyo yuvābhyāṃ nityam eva hi
analyzed: apramādaḥ ca kartavyaḥ yuvābhyām nityam eva hi
prakṛtyā rākṣasāḥ sarve saṃgrāme kūṭa yodhinaḥ
śūrāṇām śuddha bhāvānām bhavatām ārjavam balam

original: 6.040.054a tan na viśvasitavyaṃ vo rākṣasānāṃ raṇājire
analyzed: tat na viśvasitavyam vaḥ rākṣasānām raṇa ajire
etena eva upamānena nitya jihmāḥ hi rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.040.055a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ suparṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rāmam suparṇaḥ su mahā balaḥ
pariṣvajya suhṛd snigdham āpraṣṭum upacakrame

original: 6.040.056a sakhe rāghava dharmajña ripūṇām api vatsala
analyzed: sakhe rāghava dharma jña ripūṇām api vatsala
abhyanujñātum icchāmi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
bāla vṛddha avaśeṣām tu laṅkām kṛtvā śara ūrmibhiḥ

original: 6.040.057c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ hatvā sītāṃ samupalapsyase
analyzed: rāvaṇam ca ripum hatvā sītām samupalapsyase

original: 6.040.058a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ suparṇaḥ śīghravikramaḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vacanam suparṇaḥ śīghra vikramaḥ

original: 6.040.058c rāmaṃ ca virujaṃ kṛtvā madhye teṣāṃ vanaukasām
analyzed: rāmam ca   kṛtvā madhye teṣām vanaukasām

original: 6.040.059a pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam tatas kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān
jagāma ākāśam āviśya suparṇaḥ pavanaḥ yathā
virujau rāghavau dṛṣṭvā tatas vānara yūthapāḥ

original: 6.040.060c siṃhanādāṃs tadā nedur lāṅgūlaṃ dudhuvuś ca te
analyzed: siṃhanādān tadā neduḥ lāṅgūlam dudhuvuḥ ca te

original: 6.040.061a tato bherīḥ samājaghnur mṛdaṅgāṃś ca vyanādayan
analyzed: tatas bherīḥ samājaghnuḥ mṛdaṅgān ca vyanādayan

original: 6.040.061c dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanty api yathāpuram
analyzed: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanti api yathāpuram
āsphoṭya āsphoṭya vikrāntāḥ vānarāḥ naga yodhinaḥ
drumān utpāṭya vividhān tasthuḥ śata sahasraśas
visṛjantaḥ mahā nādān trāsayantaḥ niśācarān
laṅkā dvārāṇi upājagmuḥ yoddhu kāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
tatas tu bhīmaḥ tumulaḥ
babhūva śākhāmṛga yūthapānām
kṣaye nidāghasya yathā ghanānām
nādaḥ su bhīmaḥ nadatām niśīthe
teṣām su tumulam śabdam vānarāṇām tarasvinām

original: 6.041.001c nardatāṃ rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: nardatām rākṣasaiḥ sārdham tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ
snigdha gambhīra nirghoṣam śrutvā sa ninadam bhṛśam

original: 6.041.002c sacivānāṃ tatas teṣāṃ madhye vacanam abravīt
analyzed: sacivānām tatas teṣām madhye vacanam abravīt
yathā asau saṃprahṛṣṭānām vānarāṇām samutthitaḥ

original: 6.041.003c bahūnāṃ sumahān nādo meghānām iva garjatām
analyzed: bahūnām su mahān nādaḥ meghānām iva garjatām

original: 6.041.004a vyaktaṃ sumahatī prītir eteṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: vyaktam su mahatī prītiḥ eteṣām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.041.004c tathā hi vipulair nādaiś cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi vipulaiḥ nādaiḥ cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ

original: 6.041.005a tau tu baddhau śarais tīṣkṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tau tu baddhau śaraiḥ tīṣkṇaiḥ bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.041.005c ayaṃ ca sumahān nādaḥ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
analyzed: ayam ca su mahān nādaḥ śaṅkām janayati iva me

original: 6.041.006a etat tu vacanaṃ coktvā mantriṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: etat tu vacanam ca uktvā mantriṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
uvāca nairṛtān tatra samīpa parivartinaḥ
jñāyatām tūrṇam etaṣām sarveṣām vana cāriṇām
śoka kāle samutpanne harṣa kāraṇam utthitam

original: 6.041.008a tathoktās tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te
analyzed: tathā uktāḥ tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te
dadṛśuḥ pālitām senām sugrīveṇa mahātmanā

original: 6.041.009a tau ca muktau sughoreṇa śarabandhena rāghavau
analyzed: tau ca muktau su ghoreṇa śara bandhena rāghavau
samutthitau mahābhāgau viṣeduḥ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ
saṃtrasta hṛdayā sarve prākārāt avaruhya te
viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ sarve rākṣasa indram upasthitāḥ
tat apriyam dīna mukhāḥ rāvaṇasya niśācarāḥ
kṛtsnam nivedayām āsuḥ yathāvat vākya kovidāḥ

original: 6.041.012a yau tāv indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: yau tau indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
nibaddhau śara bandhena niṣprakampa bhujau kṛtau
vimuktau śara bandhena tau dṛśyete raṇa ajire
pāśān iva gajau chittvā gaja indra sama vikramau

original: 6.041.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam teṣām rākṣasa indraḥ mahā balaḥ
cintā śoka samākrāntaḥ viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ bravīt
ghoraiḥ datta varaiḥ baddhau śaraiḥ āśīviṣa umapaiḥ
amoghaiḥ sūrya saṃkāśaiḥ pramathya indrajitā yudhi

original: 6.041.016a tam astrabandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama
analyzed: tam astra bandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama

original: 6.041.016c saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvam anupaśyāmy ahaṃ balam
analyzed: saṃśaya stham idam sarvam anupaśyāmi aham balam
niṣphalāḥ khalu saṃvṛttāḥ śarāḥ vāsuki tejasaḥ

original: 6.041.017c ādattaṃ yais tu saṃgrāme ripūṇāṃ mama jīvitam
analyzed: ādattam yaiḥ tu saṃgrāme ripūṇām mama jīvitam

original: 6.041.018a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho niśvasann urago yathā
analyzed: evam uktvā tu saṃkruddhaḥ niśvasan uragaḥ yathā

original: 6.041.018c abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye dhūmrākṣaṃ nāma rākasaṃ
analyzed: abravīt rakṣasām madhye dhūmrākṣam nāma rākasam
balena mahatā yuktaḥ rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
tvam vadhāya abhiniryāhi rāmasya saha vānaraiḥ

original: 6.041.020a evam uktas tu dhūmrākṣo rākṣasendreṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dhūmrākṣaḥ rākṣasa indreṇa dhīmatā
kṛtvā praṇāmam saṃhṛṣṭaḥ nirjagāma nṛpa ālayāt
abhiniṣkramya tat dvāram balādhyakṣam uvāca ha

original: 6.041.021c tvarayasva balaṃ tūrṇaṃ kiṃ cireṇa yuyutsataḥ
analyzed: tvarayasva balam tūrṇam kim cireṇa yuyutsataḥ
dhūmrākṣasya vacaḥ śrutvā balādhyakṣaḥ bala anugaḥ
balam udyojayām āsa rāvaṇasya ājñayā drutam
te baddha ghaṇṭāḥ balinaḥ ghora rūpāḥ niśācarāḥ
vinardamānāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ dhūmrākṣam paryavārayan
vividha āyudha hastāḥ ca śūla mudgara pāṇayaḥ

original: 6.041.024c gadābhiḥ paṭṭasair daṇḍair āyasair musalair bhṛśam
analyzed: gadābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ daṇḍaiḥ āyasaiḥ musalaiḥ bhṛśam

original: 6.041.025a parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: parighaiḥ bhinḍipālaiḥ ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ

original: 6.041.025c niryayū rākṣasā ghorā nardanto jaladā yathā
analyzed: niryayuḥ rākṣasāḥ ghorāḥ nardantaḥ jaladāḥ yathā

original: 6.041.026a rathaiḥ kavacinas tv anye dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
analyzed: rathaiḥ kavacinaḥ tu anye dhvajaiḥ ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
suvarṇa jāla vihitaiḥ kharaiḥ ca vividha ānanaiḥ

original: 6.041.027a hayaiḥ paramaśīghraiś ca gajendraiś ca madotkaṭaiḥ
analyzed: hayaiḥ parama śīghraiḥ ca gaja indraiḥ ca mada utkaṭaiḥ
niryayuḥ rākṣasa vyāghrāḥ vyāghrāḥ iva durāsadāḥ
vṛka siṃha mukhaiḥ yuktam kharaiḥ kanaka bhūṣaṇaiḥ
āruroha ratham divyam dhūmrākṣaḥ khara nisvanaḥ

original: 6.041.029a sa niryāto mahāvīryo dhūmrākṣo rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa niryātaḥ mahā vīryaḥ dhūmrākṣaḥ rākṣasaiḥ vṛtaḥ
prahasan paścima dvāram hanūmān yatra yūthapaḥ
prayāntam tu mahā ghoram rākṣasam bhīma darśanam
antarikṣa gatāḥ krūrāḥ śakunāḥ pratyavārayan

original: 6.041.031a rathaśīrṣe mahābhīmo gṛdhraś ca nipapāta ha
analyzed: ratha śīrṣe mahā bhīmaḥ gṛdhraḥ ca nipapāta ha
dhvaja agre grathitāḥ ca eva nipetuḥ kuṇapa aśanāḥ

original: 6.041.032a rudhirārdro mahāñ śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patito bhuvi
analyzed: rudhira ārdraḥ mahān śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patitaḥ bhuvi
visvaram ca utsṛjan nādam dhūmrākṣasya samīpatas

original: 6.041.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī
analyzed: vavarṣa rudhiram devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī
pratilomam vavau vāyuḥ nirghāta sama nisvanaḥ

original: 6.041.033e timiraughāvṛtās tatra diśaś ca na cakāśire
analyzed: timira ogha āvṛtāḥ tatra diśaḥ ca na cakāśire

original: 6.041.034a sa tūtpātāṃs tato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahān
analyzed: sa tu utpātān tatas dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānām bhaya āvahān
prādurbhūtān su ghorān ca dhūmrākṣaḥ vyathitaḥ bhavat
tatas su bhīmaḥ bahubhiḥ niśācaraiḥ
vṛtaḥ bhiniṣkramya raṇa utsukaḥ balī
dadarśa tām rāghava bāhu pālitām
samudra kalpām bahu vānarīm camūm
dhūmrākṣam prekṣya niryāntam rākṣasam bhīma nisvanam
vineduḥ vānarāḥ sarve prahṛṣṭāḥ yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.042.002a teṣāṃ tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe harirakṣasām
analyzed: teṣām tu tumulam yuddham saṃjajñe hari rakṣasām
anyonyam pādapaiḥ ghoraiḥ nighnatam śūla mudgaraiḥ
rākṣasaiḥ vānarāḥ ghorāḥ vinikṛttāḥ samantataḥ

original: 6.042.003c vānarai rākṣasāś cāpi drumair bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ
analyzed: vānaraiḥ rākṣasāḥ ca api drumaiḥ bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ

original: 6.042.004a rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhā vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca api saṃkruddhāḥ vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
vivyadhuḥ ghora saṃkāśaiḥ kaṅka patraiḥ ajihmagaiḥ

original: 6.042.005a te gadābhiś ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ
analyzed: te gadābhiḥ ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ

original: 6.042.005c ghoraiś ca parighaiś citrais triśūlaiś cāpi saṃśitaiḥ
analyzed: ghoraiḥ ca parighaiḥ citraiḥ triśūlaiḥ ca api saṃśitaiḥ
vidāryamāṇāḥ rakṣobhiḥ vānarāḥ te mahā balāḥ
amarṣāt janita uddharṣāḥ cakruḥ karmāṇi abhīta vat
śara nirbhinna gātrāḥ te śūla nirbhinna dehinaḥ

original: 6.042.007c jagṛhus te drumāṃs tatra śilāś ca hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ te drumān tatra śilāḥ ca hari yūthapāḥ

original: 6.042.008a te bhīmavegā harayo nardamānās tatas tataḥ
analyzed: te bhīma vegāḥ harayaḥ nardamānāḥ tatas tatas

original: 6.042.008c mamanthū rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire
analyzed: mamanthuḥ rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire
tat babhūva adbhutam ghoram yuddham vānara rakṣasām

original: 6.042.009c śilābhir vividhābhiś ca bahuśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ
analyzed: śilābhiḥ vividhābhiḥ ca bahu śākhaiḥ ca pādapaiḥ

original: 6.042.010a rākṣasā mathitāḥ ke cid vānarair jitakāśibhiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ mathitāḥ ke cid vānaraiḥ jita kāśibhiḥ

original: 6.042.010c vavarṣū rudhiraṃ ke cin mukhai rudhirabhojanāḥ
analyzed: vavarṣuḥ rudhiram ke cit mukhaiḥ rudhira bhojanāḥ

original: 6.042.011a pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cid rāśīkṛtā drumaiḥ
analyzed: pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cit rāśīkṛtāḥ drumaiḥ

original: 6.042.011c śilābhiś cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cid dantair vidāritāḥ
analyzed: śilābhiḥ cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cit dantaiḥ vidāritāḥ

original: 6.042.012a dhvajair vimathitair bhagnaiḥ kharaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
analyzed: dhvajaiḥ vimathitaiḥ bhagnaiḥ kharaiḥ ca vinipātitaiḥ
rathaiḥ vidhvaṃsitaiḥ ca api patitaiḥ rajanīcaraiḥ
vānaraiḥ bhīma vikrāntaiḥ āplutya āplutya vegitaiḥ
rākṣasāḥ karajaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mukheṣu vinikartitāḥ
vivarṇa vadanāḥ bhūyas viprakīrṇa śiroruhāḥ
mūḍhāḥ śoṇita gandhena nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
naye tu parama kruddhāḥ rākṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
talaiḥ eva abhidhāvanti vajra sparśa samaiḥ harīn
vanaraiḥ āpatantaḥ te vegitāḥ vegavattaraiḥ
muṣṭibhiḥ caraṇaiḥ dantaiḥ pādapaiḥ ca apapothitāḥ

original: 6.042.017a sanyaṃ tu vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣo rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sanyam tu vidrutam dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣaḥ rākṣasa ṛṣabhaḥ
krodhena kadanam cakre vānarāṇām yuyutsatām

original: 6.042.018a prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇitasravāḥ
analyzed: prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇita sravāḥ

original: 6.042.018c mudgarair āhatāḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
analyzed: mudgaraiḥ āhatāḥ ke cid patitāḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 6.042.019a parighair mathitaḥ ke cid bhiṇḍipālair vidāritāḥ
analyzed: parighaiḥ mathitaḥ ke cit bhindipālaiḥ vidāritāḥ

original: 6.042.019c paṭṭasair āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalanto gatāsavaḥ
analyzed: paṭṭasaiḥ āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalantaḥ gatāsavaḥ

original: 6.042.020a ke cid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrā vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: ke cit vinihatāḥ bhūmau rudhira ārdrāḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.042.020c ke cid vidrāvitā naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhai rākṣasair yudhi
analyzed: ke cit vidrāvitāḥ naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhaiḥ rākṣasaiḥ yudhi
vibhinna hṛdayāḥ ke cid eka pārśvena śāyitāḥ

original: 6.042.021c vidāritāstraśūlai ca ke cid āntrair vinisrutāḥ
analyzed: vidārita astra śūlaiḥ ca ke cit āntraiḥ vinisrutāḥ

original: 6.042.022a tat subhīmaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ harirākasa saṃkulam
analyzed: tat su bhīmam mahat yuddham hari rākasa saṃkulam
prababhau śastra bahulam śilā pādapa saṃkulam
dhanuḥ jyā tantri madhuram hikkā tāla samanvitam
mandra stanita saṃgītam yuddha gāndharvam ābabhau
dhūmrākṣaḥ tu dhanuṣpāṇiḥ vānarān raṇa mūrdhani

original: 6.042.024c hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśas tāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśaḥ tām śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
dhūmrākṣeṇa arditam sainyam vyathitam dṛśya mārutiḥ
abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya vipulām śilām
krodhāt dviguṇa tāmra akṣaḥ pitṛ tulya parākramaḥ

original: 6.042.026c śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: śilām tām pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya ratham prati

original: 6.042.027a āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt
analyzed: āpatantīm śilām dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt
rathāt āplutya vegena vasudhāyām vyatiṣṭhata

original: 6.042.028a sā pramathya rathaṃ tasya nipapāta śilābhuvi
analyzed: sā pramathya ratham tasya nipapāta śilā bhuvi
sa cakra kūbaram sa aśvam sa dhvajam sa śarāsanam

original: 6.042.029a sa bhaṅktvā tu rathaṃ tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa bhaṅktvā tu ratham tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
rakṣasām kadanam cakre sa skandha viṭapaiḥ drumaiḥ
vibhinna śirasaḥ bhūtvā rākṣasāḥ śoṇita ukṣitāḥ
drumaiḥ pramathitāḥ ca anye nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
vidrāvya rākṣasam sainyam hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
gireḥ śikharam ādāya dhūmrākṣam abhidudruve

original: 6.042.032a tam āpatantaṃ dhūmrākṣo gadām udyamya vīryavān
analyzed: tam āpatantam dhūmrākṣaḥ gadām udyamya vīryavān
vinardamānaḥ sahasā hanūmantam abhidravat

original: 6.042.033a tataḥ kruddhas tu vegena gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ tu vegena gadām tām bahu kaṇṭakām

original: 6.042.033c pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣo mastake tu hanūmataḥ
analyzed: pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣaḥ mastake tu hanūmataḥ

original: 6.042.034a tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīmarūpayā
analyzed: tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīma rūpayā

original: 6.042.034c sa kapir mārutabalas taṃ prahāram acintayan
analyzed: sa kapiḥ māruta balaḥ tam prahāram a cintayan
dhūmrākṣasya śiraḥ madhye giri śṛṅgam apātayat
sa vihvalita sarva aṅgaḥ giri śṛṅgeṇa tāḍitaḥ

original: 6.042.035c papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇa iva parvataḥ
analyzed: papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇaḥ iva parvataḥ
dhūmrākṣam nihatam dṛṣṭvā hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
trastāḥ praviviśuḥ laṅkām vadhyamānāḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
sa tu pavanasutaḥ nihatya śatrum
kṣataja vahāḥ saritaḥ ca saṃvikīrya
ripu vadha janita śramaḥ mahātmā
mudam agamat kapibhiḥ ca pūjyamānaḥ
dhūmrākṣam nihatam śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
balādhyakṣam uvāca idam kṛta añjalim upasthitam
śīghram niryāntu durdharṣāḥ rākṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
akampanam puraskṛtya sarva śastra prakovidam
tatas nānā praharaṇāḥ bhīma akṣāḥ bhīma darśanāḥ
niṣpetuḥ rākṣasāḥ mukhyāḥ balādhyakṣa pracoditāḥ
ratham āsthāya vipulam tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ
