original: 6.043.004c rākasaiḥ saṃvṛto ghorais tadā niryāty akampanaḥ
analyzed: rākasaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ ghoraiḥ tadā niryāti akampanaḥ

original: 6.043.005a na hi kampayituṃ śakyaḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: na hi kampayitum śakyaḥ suraiḥ api mahā mṛdhe

original: 6.043.005c akampanas tatas teṣām āditya iva tejasā
analyzed: akampanaḥ tatas teṣām ādityaḥ iva tejasā
tasya nidhāvamānasya saṃrabdhasya yuyutsayā
akasmāt dainyam āgacchat hayānām ratha vāhinām
vyasphurat nayanam ca asya savyam yuddha abhinandinaḥ

original: 6.043.007c vivarṇo mukhavarṇaś ca gadgadaś cābhavat svaraḥ
analyzed: vivarṇaḥ mukha varṇaḥ ca gadgadaḥ ca abhavat svaraḥ
abhavat sudine ca api durdine rūkṣa mārutam

original: 6.043.008c ūcuḥ khagā mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrā bhayāvahāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ khagāḥ mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrāḥ bhaya āvahāḥ
sa siṃha upacita skandhaḥ śārdūla sama vikramaḥ
tān utpātān a cintya eva nirjagāma raṇa ajiram

original: 6.043.010a tadā nirgacchatas tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: tadā nirgacchataḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 6.043.010c babhūva sumahān nādaḥ kṣobhayann iva sāgaram
analyzed: babhūva su mahān nādaḥ kṣobhayan iva sāgaram
tena śabdena vitrastā vānarāṇām mahā camūḥ
druma śaila praharaṇāḥ yoddhum samavatiṣṭhata
teṣām yuddham mahā raudram saṃjajñe kapi rakṣasām
rāma rāvaṇayoḥ arthe samabhityakta jīvinām

original: 6.043.013a sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ
analyzed: sarve hi ati balāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvata saṃnibhāḥ
harayaḥ rākṣasāḥ ca eva paraspara jighaṃsavaḥ
teṣām vinardātām śabdaḥ saṃyuge titarasvinām
śuśruve su mahān krodhāt anyonyam abhigarjatām
rajaḥ ca aruṇa varṇa ābham su bhīmam abhavat bhṛśam
uddhūtam hari rakṣobhiḥ saṃrurodha diśaḥ daśa
anyonyam rajasā tena kauśeya uddhūta pāṇḍunā

original: 6.043.016c saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśur na raṇājire
analyzed: saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśuḥ na raṇa ajire

original: 6.043.017a na dhvajo na patākāvā varma vā turago 'pi vā
analyzed: na dhvajaḥ na patākāvā varma vā turagaḥ vā

original: 6.043.017c āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dadṛśe tena reṇunā
analyzed: āyudham syandanam vā api dadṛśe tena reṇunā

original: 6.043.018a śabdaś ca sumahāṃs teṣāṃ nardatām abhidhāvatām
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca su mahān teṣām nardatām abhidhāvatām

original: 6.043.018c śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire
analyzed: śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire

original: 6.043.019a harīn eva susaṃkruddhā harayo jaghnur āhave
analyzed: harīn eva su saṃkruddhāḥ harayaḥ jaghnuḥ āhave

original: 6.043.019c rākṣasāś cāpi rakṣāṃsi nijaghnus timire tadā
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca api rakṣāṃsi nijaghnuḥ timire tadā

original: 6.043.020a parāṃś caiva vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca vānararākṣasāḥ
analyzed: parān ca eva vinighnantaḥ svān ca vānara rākṣasāḥ
rudhira ārdram tadā cakruḥ mahīm paṅka anulepanām

original: 6.043.021a tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa siktaṃ vyapagataṃ rajaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu rudhira ogheṇa siktam vyapagatam rajaḥ
śarīra śava saṃkīrṇā babhūva ca vasuṃdharā
druma śakti śilā prāsaiḥ gadā parigha tomaraiḥ

original: 6.043.022c harayo rākṣasās tūrṇaṃ jaghnur anyonyam ojasā
analyzed: harayaḥ rākṣasāḥ tūrṇam jaghnuḥ anyonyam ojasā
bāhubhiḥ parigha ākāraiḥ yudhyantaḥ parvata upamāḥ
harayaḥ bhīma karmāṇaḥ rākṣasām jaghnuḥ āhave
rākṣasāḥ ca api saṃkruddhāḥ prāsa tomara pāṇayaḥ
kapīn nijaghnire tatra śastraiḥ parama dāruṇaiḥ
harayaḥ tu api rakṣāṃsi mahā druma mahā aśmabhiḥ
vidārayanti abhikramya śastrāṇi ācchidya vīryataḥ

original: 6.043.026a etasminn antare vīrā harayaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare vīrāḥ harayaḥ kumudaḥ nalaḥ

original: 6.043.026c maindaś ca paramakruddhaś cakrur vegam anuttamam
analyzed: maindaḥ ca parama kruddhaḥ cakruḥ vegam anuttamam

original: 6.043.027a te tu vṛkṣair mahāvegā rākṣasānāṃ camūmukhe
analyzed: te tu vṛkṣaiḥ mahā vegāḥ rākṣasānām camū mukhe
kadanam su maha cakruḥ līlayā hari yūthapāḥ

original: 6.044.001a tad dṛṣṭvā sumahat karma kṛtaṃ vānarasattamaiḥ
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā su mahat karma kṛtam vānara sattamaiḥ

original: 6.044.001c krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ
analyzed: krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ
krodha mūrchita rūpaḥ tu dhnuvan parama kārmukam

original: 6.044.002c dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇām sārathim vākyam abravīt

original: 6.044.003a tatraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ rathaṃ prāpaya sārathe
analyzed: tatra eva tāvat tvaritam ratham prāpaya sārathe

original: 6.044.003c ete 'tra bahavo ghnanti subahūn rākṣasān raṇe
analyzed: ete tra bahavaḥ ghnanti su bahūn rākṣasān raṇe

original: 6.044.004a ete 'tra balavanto hi bhīmakāyāś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: ete tra balavantaḥ hi bhīma kāyāḥ ca vānarāḥ
druma śaila praharaṇāḥ tiṣṭhanti pramukhe mama

original: 6.044.005a etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino hy aham
analyzed: etān nihantum icchāmi samara ślāghinaḥ hi aham

original: 6.044.005c etaiḥ pramathitaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasaṃ balam
analyzed: etaiḥ pramathitam sarvam dṛśyate rākṣasam balam
tatas prajavita aśvena rathena rathinām varaḥ
harīn abhyahanat krodhāt śara jālaiḥ akampanaḥ

original: 6.044.007a na sthātuṃ vānarāḥ śekuḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
analyzed: na sthātum vānarāḥ śekuḥ kim punar yoddhum āhave
akampana śaraiḥ bhagnāḥ sarve eva pradudruvuḥ
tān mṛtyu vaśam āpannān akampana vaśam gatān
samīkṣya hanumān jñātīn upatasthe mahā balaḥ
tam mahā plavagam dṛṣṭvā sarve plavaga yūthapāḥ
sametya samare vīrāḥ sahitāḥ paryavārayan
vyavasthitam hanūmantam te dṛṣṭvā hari yūthapāḥ
babhūvuḥ balavantaḥ hi balavantam upāśritāḥ
akampanaḥ tu śaila ābham hanūmantam avasthitam

original: 6.044.011c mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śarair abhivavarṣa ha
analyzed: mahā indraḥ iva dhārābhiḥ śaraiḥ abhivavarṣa ha
a cintayitvā bāṇa oghām śarīre patitām śitān
akampana vadha arthāya manaḥ dadhre mahā balaḥ
sa prahasya mahā tejāḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.044.013c abhidudrāva tad rakṣaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
analyzed: abhidudrāva tat rakṣaḥ kampayan iva medinīm
tasya abhinardamānasya dīpyamānasya tejasā
babhūva rūpam durdharṣam dīptasya iva vibhāvasoḥ
ātmānam tu a praharaṇam jñātvā krodha samanvitaḥ
śailam utpāṭayām āsa vegena hari puṃgavaḥ
tam gṛhītvā mahā śailam pāṇinā ekena mārutiḥ
vinadya su mahā nādam bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
tatas tam abhidudrāva rākṣasa indram akampanam

original: 6.044.017c yathā hi namuciṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: yathā hi namucim saṃkhye vajreṇa iva puraṃdaraḥ

original: 6.044.018a akampanas tu tad dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgaṃ samudyatam
analyzed: akampanaḥ tu tat dṛṣṭvā giri śṛṅgam samudyatam
dūrāt eva mahā bāṇaiḥ ardhacandraiḥ vyadārayat
tat parvata agram ākāśe rakṣaḥ bāṇa vidāritam
vikīrṇam patitam dṛṣṭvā hanūmān krodha mūrchitaḥ
saḥ śvakarṇam samāsādya roṣa darpa anvitaḥ hariḥ
tūrṇam utpāṭayām āsa mahā girim iva ucchritam
tam gṛhītvā mahā skandham saḥ śvakarṇam mahā dyutiḥ

original: 6.044.021c prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge
pradhāvan uru vegena prabhañjan tarasā drumān
hanūmān parama kruddhaḥ caraṇaiḥ dārayat kṣitim

original: 6.044.023a gajāṃś ca sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā
analyzed: gajān ca sa gaja ārohān sa rathān rathinaḥ tathā

original: 6.044.023c jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasāṃś ca padātikān
analyzed: jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasān ca padātikān

original: 6.044.024a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam
analyzed: tam antakam iva kruddham samare prāṇa hāriṇam
hanūmantam abhiprekṣya rākṣasāḥ vipradudruvuḥ
tam āpatantam saṃkruddham rākṣasānām bhaya āvaham

original: 6.044.025c dadarśākampano vīraś cukrodha ca nanāda ca
analyzed: dadarśa akampanaḥ vīraḥ cukrodha ca nanāda ca
sa caturdaśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ śitaiḥ deha vidāraṇaiḥ
nirbibheda hanūmantam mahā vīryam akampanaḥ

original: 6.044.027a sa tathā pratividdhas tu bahvībhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: sa tathā pratividdhaḥ tu bahvībhiḥ śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 6.044.027c hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
analyzed: hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍhaḥ iva sānumān

original: 6.044.028a tato 'nyaṃ vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam
analyzed: tatas vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam
śirasi abhijaghāna āśu rākṣasa indram akampanam

original: 6.044.029a sa vṛkṣeṇa hatas tena sakrodhena mahātmanā
analyzed: sa vṛkṣeṇa hataḥ tena sa krodhena mahātmanā

original: 6.044.029c rākṣaso vānarendreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ vānara indreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca

original: 6.044.030a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasendram akampanam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā nihatam bhūmau rākṣasa indram akampanam

original: 6.044.030c vyathitā rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣitikampa iva drumāḥ
analyzed: vyathitāḥ rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣiti kampe iva drumāḥ
tyakta praharaṇāḥ sarve rākṣasāḥ te parājitāḥ

original: 6.044.031c laṅkām abhiyayus trastā vānarais tair abhidrutāḥ
analyzed: laṅkām abhiyayuḥ trastāḥ vānaraiḥ taiḥ abhidrutāḥ
te muktakeśāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ bhagna mānāḥ parājitāḥ
sravat śramajalaiḥ aṅgaiḥ śvasantaḥ vipradudruvuḥ

original: 6.044.033a anyonyaṃ pramamantus te viviśur nagaraṃ bhayāt
analyzed: anyonyam pramamantuḥ te viviśuḥ nagaram bhayāt

original: 6.044.033c pṛṣṭhatas te susaṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas te su saṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ muhur muhur
teṣu laṅkām praviṣṭeṣu rākṣaseṣu mahā balāḥ
sametya harayaḥ sarve hanūmantam apūjayan

original: 6.044.035a so 'pi prahṛṣṭas tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat
analyzed: saḥ pi prahṛṣṭaḥ tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat
hanūmān sattva saṃpannaḥ yathārham anukūlataḥ

original: 6.044.036a vineduś ca yathā prāṇaṃ harayo jitakāśinaḥ
analyzed: vineduḥ ca yathā prāṇam harayaḥ jita kāśinaḥ

original: 6.044.036c cakarṣuś ca punas tatra saprāṇān eva rākṣasān
analyzed: cakarṣuḥ ca punar tatra sa prāṇān eva rākṣasān
sa vīra śobhām abhajat mahā kapiḥ
sametya rakṣāṃsi nihatya mārutiḥ
mahā asuram bhīmam amitra nāśanam
yathā eva viṣṇuḥ balinam camū mukhe
apūjayan deva gaṇāḥ tadā kapim
svayam ca tibalaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
tathā eva sugrīva mukhāḥ plavaṃgamā
vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca eva mahā balaḥ tadā
akampana vadham śrutvā kruddhaḥ vai rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.045.001c kiṃ cid dīnamukhaś cāpi sacivāṃs tān udaikṣata
analyzed: kim cit dīna mukhaḥ ca api sacivān tān udaikṣata

original: 6.045.002a sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca
analyzed: sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtam tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca

original: 6.045.002c purīṃ pariyayau laṅkāṃ sarvān gulmān avekṣitum
analyzed: purīm pariyayau laṅkām sarvān gulmān avekṣitum

original: 6.045.003a tāṃ rākṣasagaṇair guptāṃ gulmair bahubhir āvṛtām
analyzed: tām rākṣasa gaṇaiḥ guptām gulmaiḥ bahubhiḥ āvṛtām
dadarśa nagarīm laṅkām patākā dhvaja mālinīm

original: 6.045.004a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: ruddhām tu nagarīm dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
uvāca amarṣitaḥ kāle prahastam yuddha kovidam
purasya upaniviṣṭasya sahasā pīḍitasya ca
na anyam yuddhāt prapaśyāmi mokṣam yuddha viśārada

original: 6.045.006a ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā senāpatir mama
analyzed: aham vā kumbhakarṇaḥ vā tvam vā senāpatiḥ mama

original: 6.045.006c indrajid vā nikumbho vā vaheyur bhāram īdṛśam
analyzed: indrajit vā nikumbhaḥ vā vaheyuḥ bhāram īdṛśam

original: 6.045.007a sa tvaṃ balam itaḥ śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca
analyzed: sa tvam balam itas śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca
vijayāya abhiniryāhi yatra sarve vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.045.008a niryāṇād eva te nūnaṃ capalā harivāhinī
analyzed: niryāṇāt eva te nūnam capalā hari vāhinī
nardatām rākṣasa indrāṇām śrutvā nādam draviṣyati

original: 6.045.009a capalā hy avinītāś ca calacittāś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: capalāḥ hi avinītāḥ ca cala cittāḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.045.009c na sahiṣyanti te nādaṃ siṃhanādam iva dvipāḥ
analyzed: na sahiṣyanti te nādam siṃha nādam iva dvipāḥ

original: 6.045.010a vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
avaśaḥ te nirālambaḥ prahasta vaśam eṣyati
āpad saṃśayi tā śreyaḥ na atra niḥsaṃśayīkṛtā

original: 6.045.011c pratilomānulomaṃ vā yad vā no manyase hitam
analyzed: pratiloma anulomam vā yat vā naḥ manyase hitam
rāvaṇena evam uktaḥ tu prahastaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ
rākṣasa indram uvāca idam asura indram iva uśanāḥ

original: 6.045.013a rājan mantritapūrvaṃ naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
analyzed: rājan mantrita pūrvam naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ

original: 6.045.013c vivādaś cāpi no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam
analyzed: vivādaḥ ca api no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam

original: 6.045.014a pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyo vyavasitaṃ mayā
analyzed: pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyaḥ vyavasitam mayā

original: 6.045.014c apradāne punar yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭam etat tathaiva naḥ
analyzed: apradāne punar yuddham dṛṣṭam etat tathā eva naḥ

original: 6.045.015a so 'haṃ dānaiś ca mānaiś ca satataṃ pūjitas tvayā
analyzed: saḥ ham dānaiḥ ca mānaiḥ ca satatam pūjitaḥ tvayā

original: 6.045.015c sāntvaiś ca vividhaiḥ kāle kiṃ na kuryāṃ priyaṃ tava
analyzed: sāntvaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ kāle kim na kuryām priyam tava

original: 6.045.016a na hi me jīvitaṃ rakṣyaṃ putradāradhanāni vā
analyzed: na hi me jīvitam rakṣyam putra dāra dhanāni vā

original: 6.045.016c tvaṃ paśya māṃ juhūṣantaṃ tvadarthe jīvitaṃ yudhi
analyzed: tvam paśya mām juhūṣantam tvad arthe jīvitam yudhi

original: 6.045.017a evam uktvā tu bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu bhartāram rāvaṇam vāhinīpatiḥ

original: 6.045.017c samānayata me śīghraṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
analyzed: samānayata me śīghram rākṣasānām mahat balam
mad bāṇa aśani vegena hatānām tu raṇa ajire
adya tṛpyantu māṃsena pakṣiṇaḥ kānanaukasām

original: 6.045.019a ity uktās te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛtatvarāḥ
analyzed: iti uktāḥ te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛta tvarāḥ
balam udyojayām āsuḥ tasmin rākṣasa mandire
sā babhūva muhūrtena tigma nānāvidha āyudhaiḥ

original: 6.045.020c laṅkā rākṣasavīrais tair gajair iva samākulā
analyzed: laṅkā rākṣasa vīraiḥ taiḥ gajaiḥ iva samākulā
hutāśanam tarpayatām brāhmaṇān ca namasyatām
ājya gandha prativahaḥ surabhiḥ mārutaḥ vavau

original: 6.045.022a srajaś ca vividhākārā jagṛhus tv abhimantritāḥ
analyzed: srajaḥ ca vividha ākārāḥ jagṛhuḥ tu abhimantritāḥ
saṃgrāma sajjāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ dhārayan rākṣasāḥ tadā
sa dhanuṣkāḥ kavacinaḥ vegāt āplutya rākṣasāḥ
rāvaṇam prekṣya rājānam prahastam paryavārayan

original: 6.045.024a athāmantrya ca rājānaṃ bherīm āhatya bhairavām
analyzed: atha āmantrya ca rājānam bherīm āhatya bhairavām
āruroha ratham divyam prahastaḥ sajja kalpitam
hayaiḥ mahā javaiḥ yuktam samyak sūta su saṃyutam
mahā jalada nirghoṣam sākṣāt candra arka bhāsvaram
uraga dhvaja durdharṣam su varūtham su apaskaram
suvarṇa jāla saṃyuktam prahasantam iva śriyā
tatas tam ratham āsthāya rāvaṇa arpita śāsanaḥ

original: 6.045.027c laṅkāyā niryayau tūrṇaṃ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: laṅkāyāḥ niryayau tūrṇam balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
tatas duṃdubhi nirghoṣaḥ parjanya ninada upamaḥ
śuśruve śaṅkha śabdaḥ ca prayāte vāhinīpatau

original: 6.045.029a ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasā jagmur agrataḥ
analyzed: ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasāḥ jagmuḥ agratas
bhīma rūpāḥ mahā kāyāḥ prahastasya puraḥsarāḥ
vyūḍhena eva su ghoreṇa pūrva dvārāt sa niryayau
gaja yūtha nikāśena balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
sāgara pratimā oghena vṛtaḥ tena balena saḥ
prahastaḥ niryayau tūrṇam kruddhaḥ kāla antaka upamaḥ

original: 6.045.032a tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ ca nardatām
analyzed: tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānām ca nardatām
laṅkāyām sarva bhūtāni vineduḥ vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ
vyabhram ākāśam āviśya māṃsa śoṇita bhojanāḥ

original: 6.045.033c maṇḍalāny apasavyāni khagāś cakrū rathaṃ prati
analyzed: maṇḍalāni apasavyāni khagāḥ cakruḥ ratham prati
vamantyaḥ pāvaka jvālāḥ śivāḥ ghorāḥ vavāśire

original: 6.045.035a antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau
analyzed: antarikṣāt papāta ulkā vāyuḥ ca paruṣaḥ vavau

original: 6.045.035c anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhā grahāś ca na cakāśire
analyzed: anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhāḥ grahāḥ ca na cakāśire

original: 6.045.036a vavarṣū rudhiraṃ cāsya siṣicuś ca puraḥsarān
analyzed: vavarṣuḥ rudhiram ca asya siṣicuḥ ca puraḥsarān
ketu mūrdhani gṛdhraḥ sya vilīnaḥ dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
sāratheḥ bahuśas ca asya saṃgrāmam avagāhataḥ
pratodaḥ nyapatat hastāt sūtasya haya sādinaḥ

original: 6.045.038a niryāṇa śrīś ca yāsyāsīd bhāsvarā ca sudurlabhā
analyzed: śrīḥ ca yā asya āsīt bhāsvarā ca su durlabhā

original: 6.045.038c sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitā hayāḥ
analyzed: sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitāḥ hayāḥ
prahastam tu abhiniryāntam prakhyāta bala pauruṣam
yudhi nānā praharaṇā kapi senā abhyavartata
atha ghoṣaḥ su tumulaḥ harīṇām samajāyata

original: 6.045.040c vṛkṣān ārujatāṃ caiva gurvīś cāgṛhṇatāṃ śilāḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣān ārujatām ca eva gurvīḥ ca āgṛhṇatām śilāḥ
ubhe pramudite sainye rakṣaḥ gaṇa vanaukasām
vegitānām samarthānām anyonya vadha kāṅkṣiṇām
parasparam ca āhvayatām ninādaḥ śrūyate mahān
tatas prahastaḥ kapi rāja vāhinīm
abhipratasthe vijayāya durmatiḥ
vivṛddha vegām ca viveśa tām camūm
yathā mumūrṣuḥ śalabhaḥ vibhāvasum
tatas prahastam niryāntam bhīmam bhīma parākramam
garjantam su mahā kāyam rākṣasaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtam
dadarśa mahatī senā vānarāṇām balīyasām
ati saṃjāta roṣāṇām prahastam abhigarjatām
khaḍga śakti aṣṭi bāṇāḥ ca śūlāni musalāni ca

original: 6.046.003c gadāś ca parighāḥ prāsā vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
analyzed: gadāḥ ca parighāḥ prāsāḥ vividhāḥ ca paraśvadhāḥ
dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi rākṣasānām jaya eṣiṇām
pragṛhītāni aśobhanta vānarān abhidhāvatām
jagṛhuḥ pādapān ca api puṣpitān vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.046.005c śilāś ca vipulā dīrghā yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: śilāḥ ca vipulāḥ dīrghāḥ yoddhu kāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.046.006a teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
analyzed: teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ su mahān abhūt

original: 6.046.006c bahūnām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ ca śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca varṣatām
analyzed: bahūnām aśma vṛṣṭim ca śara vṛṣṭim ca varṣatām
bahavaḥ rākṣasāḥ yuddhe bahūn vānara yūthapān

original: 6.046.007c vānarā rākṣasāṃś cāpi nijaghnur bahavo bahūn
analyzed: vānarāḥ rākṣasān ca api nijaghnuḥ bahavaḥ bahūn

original: 6.046.008a śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cit ke cit tu paramāyudhaiḥ
analyzed: śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid ke cid tu parama āyudhaiḥ

original: 6.046.008c parighair āhatāḥ ke cit ke cic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: parighaiḥ āhatāḥ ke cit ke cit chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ

original: 6.046.009a nirucchvāsāḥ punaḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
analyzed: nirucchvāsāḥ punar ke cid patitāḥ dharaṇī tale
vibhinna hṛdayāḥ ke cid iṣu saṃtāna saṃditāḥ

original: 6.046.010a ke cid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi
analyzed: ke cit dvidhā kṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitāḥ bhuvi

original: 6.046.010c vānarā rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvataś ca vidāritāḥ
analyzed: vānarāḥ rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvatas ca vidāritāḥ
vānaraiḥ ca api saṃkruddhaiḥ rākṣasa oghāḥ samantataḥ
pādapaiḥ giri śṛṅgaiḥ ca saṃpiṣṭāḥ vasudhā tale

original: 6.046.012a vajrasparśatalair hastair muṣṭibhiś ca hatā bhṛśam
analyzed: vajra sparśa talaiḥ hastaiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ ca hatāḥ bhṛśam
vemuḥ śoṇitam āsyebhyaḥ viśīrṇa daśana īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.046.013a ārtasvaraṃ ca svanatāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca nardatām
analyzed: ārta svaram ca svanatām siṃhanādam ca nardatām

original: 6.046.013c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo harīṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yudhi
analyzed: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ harīṇām rakṣasām yudhi
vānarāḥ rākṣasāḥ kruddhāḥ vīra mārgam anuvratāḥ
vivṛtta nayanāḥ krūrāḥ cakruḥ karmāṇi a bhīta vat
ete prahasta sacivāḥ sarve jaghnuḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.046.016a teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ nighnatāṃ cāpi vānarān
analyzed: teṣām āpatatām śīghram nighnatām ca api vānarān
dvividaḥ giri śṛṅgeṇa jaghāna ekam narāntakam

original: 6.046.017a durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipuladrumam
analyzed: durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipula drumam
rākṣasam kṣipra hastaḥ tu samunnatam apothayat

original: 6.046.018a jāmbavāṃs tu susaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
analyzed: jāmbavān tu su saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīm śilām
pātayām āsa tejasvī mahānādasya vakṣasi
atha kumbhahanuḥ tatra tāreṇa āsādya vīryavān
vṛkṣeṇa abhihataḥ mūrdhni prāṇān tatyāja rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.046.020a amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma prahasto ratham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ tat karma prahastaḥ ratham āsthitaḥ
cakāra kadanam ghoram dhanuṣpāṇiḥ vanaukasām

original: 6.046.021a āvarta iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayos tadā
analyzed: āvartaḥ iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayoḥ tadā
kṣubhitasya aprameyasya sāgarasya iva nisvanaḥ
mahatā hi śara ogheṇa prahastaḥ yuddha kovidaḥ
ardayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ vānarān parama āhave

original: 6.046.023a vānarāṇāṃ śarīrais tu rākṣasānāṃ ca medinī
analyzed: vānarāṇām śarīraiḥ tu rākṣasānām ca medinī

original: 6.046.023c babhūva nicitā ghorā patitair iva parvataiḥ
analyzed: babhūva nicitā ghorā patitaiḥ iva parvataiḥ
sā mahī rudhira ogheṇa pracchannā saṃprakāśate

original: 6.046.024c saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśair iva puṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśaiḥ iva puṣpitaiḥ
hata vīra ogha vaprām tu bhagna āyudha mahā drumām
śoṇita ogha mahā toyām yama sāgara gāminīm
yakṛt plīha mahā paṅkām vinikīrṇa antra śaivalām
bhinna kāya śiraḥ mīnām aṅga avayava śādvalām
gṛdhra haṃsa gaṇa ākīrṇām kaṅka sārasa sevitām
medhaḥ phena samākīrṇām ārta stanita nisvanām
tām kāpuruṣa dustārām yuddha bhūmi mayīm nadīm
nadīm iva ghana apāye haṃsa sārasa sevitām

original: 6.046.029a rākṣasāḥ kapimukhyāś ca terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ kapi mukhyāḥ ca teruḥ tām dustarām nadīm
yathā padma rajaḥ dhvastām nalinīm gaja yūthapāḥ

original: 6.046.030a tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bāṇaughān prahastaṃ syandane sthitam
analyzed: tatas sṛjantam bāṇa oghān prahastam syandane sthitam
dadarśa tarasā nīlaḥ vinighnantam plavaṃgamān
sa tam parama durdharṣam āpatantam mahā kapiḥ

original: 6.046.031c prahastaṃ tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān
analyzed: prahastam tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān
sa tena abhihataḥ kruddhaḥ nadan rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
vavarṣa śara varṣāṇi plavagānām camūpatau
a pārayan vārayitum pratyagṛhṇāt nimīlitaḥ

original: 6.046.033c yathaiva govṛṣo varṣaṃ śāradaṃ śīghram āgatam
analyzed: yathā eva go vṛṣaḥ varṣam śāradam śīghram āgatam
evam eva prahastasya śara varṣam durāsadam
nimīlita akṣaḥ sahasā nīlaḥ sehe su dāruṇam
roṣitaḥ śara varṣeṇa sālena mahatā mahān
prajaghāna hayān nīlaḥ prahastasya manojavān

original: 6.046.036a vidhanus tu kṛtas tena prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ
analyzed: vidhanuḥ tu kṛtaḥ tena prahastaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ
pragṛhya musalam ghoram syandanāt avapupluve
tau ubhau vāhinī mukhyau jāta roṣau tarasvinau
sthitau kṣataja digdha aṅgau prabhinnau iva kuñjarau
ullikhantau su tīkṣṇābhiḥ daṃṣṭrābhiḥ itaretaram
siṃha śārdūla sadṛśau siṃha śārdūla ceṣṭitau
vikrānta vijayau vīrau samareṣu anivartinau
kāṅkṣamāṇau yaśaḥ prāptum vṛtra vāsavayoḥ samau

original: 6.046.040a ājaghāna tadā nīlaṃ lalāṭe musalena saḥ
analyzed: ājaghāna tadā nīlam lalāṭe musalena saḥ
prahastaḥ parama āyastaḥ tasya susrāva śoṇitam
tatas śoṇita digdha aṅgaḥ pragṛhya su mahā tarum
prahastasya urasi kruddhaḥ visasarja mahā kapiḥ

original: 6.046.042a tam acintyaprahāraṃ sa pragṛhya musalaṃ mahat
analyzed: tam acintya prahāram sa pragṛhya musalam mahat
abhidudrāva balinam balī nīlam plavaṃgamam
tam ugra vegam saṃrabdham āpatantam mahā kapiḥ
tatas saṃprekṣya jagrāha mahā vegaḥ mahā śilām
tasya yuddha abhikāmasya mṛdhe musala yodhinaḥ

original: 6.046.044c prahastasya śilāṃ nīlo mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat
analyzed: prahastasya śilām nīlaḥ mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat

original: 6.046.045a sā tena kapimukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā
analyzed: sā tena kapi mukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā

original: 6.046.045c bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiras tadā
analyzed: bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiraḥ tadā
sa gatāsuḥ gata śrīkaḥ gata sattvaḥ gata indriyaḥ

original: 6.046.046c papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
analyzed: papāta sahasā bhūmau chinna mūlaḥ iva drumaḥ
vibhinna śirasaḥ tasya bahu susrāva śoṇitam

original: 6.046.047c śarīrād api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: śarīrāt api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇam yathā

original: 6.046.048a hate prahaste nīlena tad akampyaṃ mahad balam
analyzed: hate prahaste nīlena tat akampyam mahat balam
rakṣasām a prahṛṣṭānām laṅkām abhijagāma ha
na śekuḥ samavasthātum nihate vāhinīpatau
setu bandham samāsādya viśīrṇam salilam yathā

original: 6.046.050a hate tasmiṃś camūmukhye rākṣasas te nirudyamāḥ
analyzed: hate tasmin camū mukhye rākṣasaḥ te nirudyamāḥ
rakṣaḥpati gṛham gatvā dhyāna mūka tvam āgatāḥ
tatas tu nīlaḥ vijayī mahā balaḥ
praśasyamānaḥ sva kṛtena karmaṇā
sametya rāmeṇa sa lakṣmaṇena
prahṛṣṭa rūpaḥ tu babhūva yūthapaḥ
tasmin hate rākṣasa sainya pāle
plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
bhīma āyudham sāgara tulya vegam
pradudruve rākṣasa rāja sainyam
gatvā tu rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ śaśaṃsuḥ
senāpatim pāvaka sūnu śastam
tat ca api teṣām vacanam niśamya
rakṣaḥ dhipaḥ krodha vaśam jagāma
saṃkhye prahastam nihatam niśamya
śoka arditaḥ krodha parīta cetāḥ
uvāca tān nairṛta yodha mukhyān
indraḥ yathā ca amara yodha mukhyān
na avajñā ripave kāryā yaiḥ indra bala sūdanaḥ
sūditaḥ sainya pālaḥ me sa anuyātraḥ sa kuñjaraḥ
saḥ ham ripu vināśāya vijayāya a vicārayan

original: 6.047.005c svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇaśīrṣaṃ tad adbhutam
analyzed: svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇa śīrṣam tat adbhutam

original: 6.047.006a adya tad vānarānīkaṃ rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: adya tat vānara anīkam rāmam ca sahalakṣmaṇam
nirdahiṣyāmi bāṇa oghaiḥ vanam dīptaiḥ iva agnibhiḥ
saḥ evam uktvā jvalana prakāśam
ratham turaṃga uttama rāji yuktam
prakāśamānam vapuṣā jvalantam
samāruroha amararājaśatruḥ
sa śaṅkha bherī paṭaha praṇādaiḥ
āsphoṭita kṣveḍita siṃhanādaiḥ
puṇyaiḥ stavaiḥ ca api abhipūjyamānaḥ
tadā yayau rākṣasa rāja mukhyaḥ
sa śaila jīmūta nikāśa rūpaiḥ
māṃsa aśanaiḥ pāvaka dīpta netraiḥ
babhau vṛtaḥ rākṣasa rāja mukhyaiḥ
bhūtaiḥ vṛtaḥ rudraḥ iva amara īśaḥ
tatas nagaryāḥ sahasā mahā ojāḥ
niṣkramya tat vānara sainyam ugram
mahā arṇava abhra stanitam dadarśa
samudyatam pādapa śaila hastam
tat rākṣasa anīkam ati pracaṇḍam
ālokya rāmaḥ bhujaga indra bāhuḥ
vibhīṣaṇam śastrabhṛtām variṣṭham
uvāca senā anugataḥ pṛthu śrīḥ
nānā patākā dhvaja śastra juṣṭam
prāsa asi śūla āyudha cakra juṣṭam
sainyam naga indra upama nāga juṣṭam
kasya idam akṣobhyam abhīru juṣṭam
tatas tu rāmasya niśamya vākyam
vibhīṣaṇaḥ śakra samāna vīryaḥ
śaśaṃsa rāmasya bala pravekam
mahātmanām rākṣasa puṃgavānām
yaḥ sau gaja skandha gataḥ mahātmā
nava udita arka upama tāmra vaktraḥ
prakampayan nāga śiraḥ bhyupaiti hi
akampanam tu enam avehi rājan
yaḥ sau ratha sthaḥ mṛgarāja ketuḥ
dhūnvan dhanuḥ śakra dhanuḥ prakāśam
karī iva bhāti ugra vivṛtta daṃṣṭraḥ
saḥ indrajit nāma vara pradhānaḥ
yaḥ ca eṣa
dhanvī ratha sthaḥ tirathaḥ ti vīryaḥ
visphārayan cāpam a tulya mānam
nāmnā atikāyaḥ ti vivṛddha kāyaḥ
āruhya ghaṇṭā ninada praṇādam
gajam kharam garjati vai mahātmā
mahodaraḥ nāma saḥ eṣa vīraḥ
yaḥ sau hayam kāñcana citra bhāṇḍam
āruhya saṃdhyā abhra giri prakāśam
prāsam samudyamya marīci naddham
piśācaḥ eṣa aśani tulya vegaḥ
yaḥ ca eṣa śūlam niśitam pragṛhya
vidyutprabham kiṃkara vajra vegam
vṛṣa indram āsthāya giri prakāśam
āyāti saḥ sau tri śirāḥ yaśasvī
asau ca jīmūta nikāśa rūpaḥ
kumbhaḥ pṛthu vyūḍha sujāta vakṣāḥ
samāhitaḥ pannaga rāja ketuḥ
visphārayan bhāti dhanuḥ vidhūnvan
yaḥ ca eṣa jāmbūnada vajra juṣṭam
dīptam sa dhūmam parigham pragṛhya
āyāti rakṣaḥ bala ketu bhūtaḥ
saḥ sau nikumbhaḥ dbhuta ghora karmā
yaḥ ca eṣa cāpa asi śara ogha juṣṭam
patākinam pāvaka dīpta rūpam
ratham samāsthāya vibhāti udagraḥ
nara antakaḥ sau naga śṛṅga yodhī
yaḥ ca eṣa nānāvidha ghora rūpaiḥ
vyāghra uṣṭra nāga indra mṛgendra vaktraiḥ
bhūtaiḥ vṛtaḥ bhāti vivṛtta netraiḥ
saḥ sau surāṇām api darpa hantā
yatra etat indu pratimam
chattram sitam sūkṣma śalākam agryam
atra eṣa rakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ mahātmā
bhūtaiḥ vṛtaḥ rudraḥ iva avabhāti
asau kirīṭī cala kuṇḍala āsyaḥ
nāga indra vindhya upama bhīma kāyaḥ
rakṣaḥ adhipaḥ sūryaḥ iva avabhāti
pratyuvāca tatas rāmaḥ vibhīṣaṇam ariṃdamam
aho dīptaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.047.027a āditya iva duṣprekṣyo raśmibhir bhāti rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: ādityaḥ iva duṣprekṣyaḥ raśmibhiḥ bhāti rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.047.027c suvyaktaṃ lakṣaye hy asya rūpaṃ tejaḥsamāvṛtam
analyzed: su vyaktam lakṣaye hi asya rūpam tejaḥ samāvṛtam
deva dānava vīrāṇām vapuḥ nā evaṃvidham bhavet
yādṛśam rākṣasa indrasya vapuḥ etat prakāśate
sarve parvata saṃkāśāḥ sarve parvata yodhinaḥ
sarve dīpta āyudha dharāḥ yodhaḥ ca asya mahā ojasaḥ
bhāti pradīptaiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
bhūtaiḥ parivṛtaḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ dehavadbhiḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 6.047.031a evam uktvā tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vīryavān
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rāmaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya vīryavān
lakṣmaṇa anucaraḥ tasthau samuddhṛtya śara uttamam
tatas sa rakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ mahātmā
rakṣāṃsi tāni āha mahā balāni
dvāreṣu caryā gṛha gopureṣu
su nirvṛtāḥ tiṣṭhata nirviśaṅkāḥ
visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān
gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam
vyadārayat vānara sāgara ogham
mahā jhaṣaḥ pūrmam iva arṇava ogham
tam āpatantam sahasā samīkṣya
dīpta iṣu cāpam yudhi rākṣasa indram
mahat samutpāṭya mahīdhara agram
dudrāva rakṣaḥ adhipatim hari īśaḥ
tat śaila śṛṅgam bahu vṛkṣa sānum
pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya
tam āpatantam sahasā samīkṣya
bibheda bāṇaiḥ tapanīya puṅkhaiḥ
tasmin pravṛddha uttama sānu vṛkṣe
śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām
mahā ahi kalpam śaram antaka ābham
samādade rākṣasa loka nāthaḥ
sa tam gṛhītvā anila tulya vegam
sa visphuliṅga jvalana prakāśam
bāṇam mahā indra aśani tulya vegam
cikṣepa sugrīva vadhāya ruṣṭaḥ
sa sāyakaḥ rāvaṇa bāhu muktaḥ
śakra aśani prakhya vapuḥ śita agraḥ
sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegāt
guhā īritā kraucam iva ugra śaktiḥ
sa sāyaka ārtaḥ viparīta cetāḥ
kūjan pṛthivyām nipapāta vīraḥ
tam prekṣya bhūmau patitam visaṃjmam
neduḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ yudhi yātudhānāḥ
tatas gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ su daṃṣṭraḥ
tathā ṛṣabhaḥ jyotimukhaḥ nalaḥ ca
śailān samudyamya vivṛddha kāyāḥ
pradudruvuḥ tam prati rākṣasa indram
teṣām prahārān sa cakāra meghān
rakṣaḥ dhipaḥ bāṇa gaṇaiḥ śita agraiḥ
tān vānara indrān api bāṇa jālaiḥ
bibheda jāmbūnada citra puṅkhaiḥ
te vānara indrāḥ tridaśa ari bāṇaiḥ
bhinnāḥ nipetuḥ bhuvi bhīma rūpāḥ
tatas tu tat vānara sainyam ugram
pracchādayām āsa sa bāṇa jālaiḥ
te vadhyamānāḥ patita agrya vīrā
nānadyamānāḥ bhaya śalya viddhāḥ
śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇa sāyaka ārtā
jagmuḥ śaraṇyam śaraṇam sma rāmam
tatas mahātmā sa dhanuḥ dhanuṣmān
ādāya rāmaḥ saharāḥ jagāma
tam lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ abhyupetya
uvāca vākyam parama artha yuktam
kāmam āryaḥ su paryāptaḥ vadhāya asya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.047.045c vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho
analyzed: vidhamiṣyāmi aham nīcam anujānīhi mām vibho
tam abravīt mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 6.047.046c gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge
analyzed: gaccha yatna paraḥ ca api bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge
rāvaṇaḥ hi mahā vīryaḥ raṇe dbhuta parākramaḥ
trailokyena api saṃkruddhaḥ duṣprasahyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.047.048a tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya
analyzed: tasya chidrāṇi mārgasva sva chidrāṇi ca gopaya
cakṣuṣā dhanuṣā yatnāt rakṣa ātmānam samāhitaḥ

original: 6.047.049a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca
analyzed: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca

original: 6.047.049c abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam
analyzed: abhivādya tatas rāmam yayau saumitriḥ āhavam
sa rāvaṇam vāraṇa hasta bāhuḥ
dadarśa dīpta udyata bhīma cāpam
pracchādayantam śara vṛṣṭi jālaiḥ
tān vānarān bhinna vikīrṇa dehān
tam ālokya mahā tejāḥ hanūmān mārutātmajā
nivārya śara jālāni pradudrāva sa rāvaṇam

original: 6.047.052a rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam
analyzed: ratham tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam

original: 6.047.052c trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt
analyzed: trāsayan rāvaṇam dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt
deva dānava gandharvāḥ yakṣāḥ ca saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 6.047.053c avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam
analyzed: avadhya tvāt tvayā bhagnāḥ vānarebhyaḥ tu te bhayam

original: 6.047.054a eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ
analyzed: eṣa me dakṣiṇaḥ bāhuḥ pañca śākhaḥ samudyataḥ
vidhamiṣyati te dehāt bhūtātmānam cira uṣitam
śrutvā hanūmataḥ vākyam rāvaṇaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
saṃrakta nayanaḥ krodhāt idam vacanam abravīt

original: 6.047.056a kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi
analyzed: kṣipram prahara niḥśaṅkam sthirām kīrtim avāpnuhi
tatas tvām jñāti vikrāntam nāśayiṣyāmi vānara
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāyusūnuḥ vacaḥ bravīt

original: 6.047.057c prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava
analyzed: prahṛtam hi mayā pūrvam akṣam smara sutam tava
evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
ājaghāna anilasutam talena urasi vīryavān

original: 6.047.059a sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: sa tala abhihataḥ tena cacāla ca muhur muhur
ājaghāna abhisaṃkruddhaḥ talena eva amara dviṣam
tatas talena abhihataḥ vānareṇa mahātmanā
daśagrīvaḥ samādhūtaḥ yathā bhūmicale calaḥ

original: 6.047.061a saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam
analyzed: saṃgrāme tam tathā dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam tala tāḍitam

original: 6.047.061c ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ vānarāḥ siddhāḥ neduḥ devāḥ saha asurāḥ
atha āśvasya mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
sādhu vānara vīryeṇa ślāghanīyaḥ si me ripuḥ

original: 6.047.063a rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt
analyzed: rāvaṇena evam uktaḥ tu mārutiḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.047.063c dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa
analyzed: dhik astu mama vīryam tu yat tvam jīvasi rāvaṇa

original: 6.047.064a sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase
analyzed: sakṛt tu prahara idānīm durbuddhe kim vikatthase

original: 6.047.064c tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam
analyzed: tatas tvām māmakaḥ muṣṭiḥ nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam
tatas māruti vākyena krodhaḥ tasya tadā ajvalat
saṃrakta nayanaḥ yatnāt muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
pātayām āsa vegena vānara urasi vīryavān

original: 6.047.065e hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ
analyzed: hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punar

original: 6.047.066a vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: vihvalam tam tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantam mahā balam
rathena atirathaḥ śīghram nīlam prati samabhyagāt
pannaga pratimaiḥ bhīmaiḥ para marma atibhedibhiḥ
śaraiḥ ādīpayām āsa nīlam hari camūpatim
sa śara ogha samāyastaḥ nīlaḥ kapi camūpatiḥ
kareṇa ekena śaila agram rakṣaḥ adhipataye sṛjat
hanūmān api tejasvī samāśvastaḥ mahā manāḥ
viprekṣamāṇaḥ yuddha īpsuḥ sa roṣam idam abravīt
nīlena saha saṃyuktam rāvaṇam rākṣaseśvaram
anyena yudhyamānasya na yuktam abhidhāvanam

original: 6.047.071a rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ pi mahā tejāḥ tat śṛṅgam saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.047.071c ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha
analyzed: ājaghāna su tīkṣṇa agraiḥ tat vikīrṇam papāta ha

original: 6.047.072a tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ
analyzed: tat vikīrṇam gireḥ śṛṅgam dṛṣṭvā hari camūpatiḥ
kālāgniḥ iva jajvāla krodhena para vīra hā

original: 6.047.073a so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān
analyzed: saḥ śvakarṇān dhavān sālān cūtān ca api su puṣpitān

original: 6.047.073c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge
analyzed: anyān ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaḥ cikṣepa saṃyuge

original: 6.047.074a sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ
abhyavarṣat su ghoreṇa śara varṣeṇa pāvakim
abhivṛṣṭaḥ śara ogheṇa meghena iva mahā acalaḥ

original: 6.047.075c hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha
analyzed: hrasvam kṛtvā tadā rūpam dhvaja agre nipapāta ha
pāvakātmajam ālokya dhvaja agre samavasthitam

original: 6.047.076c jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha
analyzed: jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tatas nīlaḥ nanāda ha

original: 6.047.077a dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim
analyzed: dhvaja agre dhanuṣaḥ ca agre kirīṭa agre ca tam harim

original: 6.047.077c lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ hanūmān ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ ca vismitāḥ
rāvaṇaḥ mahā tejāḥ kapi lāghava vismitaḥ

original: 6.047.078c astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam
analyzed: astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam

original: 6.047.079a tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: tatas te cukruśuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ labdha lakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
nīla lāghava saṃbhrāntam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āhave

original: 6.047.080a vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā
analyzed: vānarāṇām ca nādena saṃrabdhaḥ rāvaṇaḥ tadā
saṃbhrama āviṣṭa hṛdayaḥ na kim cit pratyapadyata
āgneyena atha saṃyuktam gṛhītvā rāvaṇaḥ śaram
dhvaja śīrṣa sthitam nīlam udaikṣata niśācaraḥ
tatas bravīt mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
kape lāghava yuktaḥ si māyayā parayā anayā

original: 6.047.083a jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara
analyzed: jīvitam khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara

original: 6.047.083c tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ
analyzed: tāni tāni ātma rūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśas
tathā api tvām mayā muktaḥ sāyakaḥ stra prayojitaḥ
jīvitam parirakṣantam jīvitāt bhraṃśayiṣyati
evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
saṃdhāya bāṇam astreṇa camūpatim atāḍayat
saḥ stra yuktena bāṇena nīlaḥ vakṣasi tāḍitaḥ
nirdahyamānaḥ sahasā nipapāta mahī tale
pitṛ māhātmya saṃyogāt ātmanaḥ ca api tejasā

original: 6.047.087c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
analyzed: jānubhyām apatat bhūmau na ca prāṇaiḥ vyayujyata
visaṃjñam vānaram dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvaḥ raṇa utsukaḥ
rathena ambuda nādena saumitrim abhidudruve
tam āha saumitriḥ adīna sattvaḥ
visphārayantam dhanuḥ aprameyam
anvehi mām eva niśācara indra

original: na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi
analyzed: na vānarān tvam prati yoddhum arhasi
sa tasya vākyam paripūrṇa ghoṣam
jyā śabdam ugram ca niśamya rājā
āsādya saumitrim avasthitam tam
kopa anvitam vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ
diṣṭyā asi me rāghava dṛṣṭi mārgam
prāptaḥ nta gāmī viparīta buddhiḥ
asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyu deśam
saṃsādyamānaḥ mama bāṇa jālaiḥ
tam āha saumitriḥ a vismayānaḥ
garjantam udvṛtta sita agra daṃṣṭram
rājan na garjanti mahā prabhāvā
vikatthase pāpa kṛtām variṣṭha
jānāmi vīryam tava rākṣasa indra
balam pratāpam ca parākramam ca
avasthitaḥ ham śara cāpa pāṇiḥ
āgaccha kim mogha vikatthanena
saḥ evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja
rakṣaḥ dhipaḥ sapta śarān su puṅkhān
tān lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcana citra puṅkhaiḥ
ciccheda bāṇaiḥ niśita agra dhāraiḥ
tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān
nikṛtta bhogān iva pannaga indrān
laṅkā īśvaraḥ krodha vaśam jagāma
sasarja ca anyān niśitān pṛṣatkān
sa bāṇa varṣam tu vavarṣa tīvram
rāmānujaḥ kārmuka saṃprayuktam
kṣura ardhacandra uttama karṇi bhallaiḥ

original: śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca
analyzed: śarān ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ ca āśu śarān śita agrān
mahā indra vajra aśani tulya vegān
saṃdhāya cāpe jvalana prakāśān
sasarja rakṣaḥ dhipateḥ vadhāya
sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasa indraḥ
chittvā ca tān lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna
śareṇa kālāgni sama prabheṇa
svayambhudattena lalāṭa deśe
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ rāvaṇa sāyaka ārtaḥ
cacāla cāpam śithilam pragṛhya
punar ca saṃjñām pratilabhya kṛcchrāt
ciccheda cāpam tridaśa indra śatroḥ
nikṛtta cāpam tribhiḥ ājaghāna
bāṇaiḥ tadā dāśarathiḥ śita agraiḥ
sa sāyaka ārtaḥ vicacāla rājā
kṛcchrāt ca saṃjñām punar āsasāda
sa kṛtta cāpaḥ śara tāḍitaḥ ca
sveda ārdra gātraḥ rudhira avasiktaḥ
jagrāha śaktim samudagra śaktiḥ
svayambhu dattām yudhi devaśatruḥ
sa tām vidhūma anala saṃnikāśām
vitrāsanīm vānara vāhinīnām
cikṣepa śaktim tarasā jvalantīm
saumitraye rākṣasa rāṣṭra nāthaḥ
tām āpatantīm bharata anujaḥ straiḥ
jaghāna bāṇaiḥ ca huta agni kalpaiḥ
tathā api sā tasya viveśa śaktiḥ
bhujāntaram dāśaratheḥ viśālam

original: 6.047.104a śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare
analyzed: śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitriḥ tāḍitaḥ tu stanāntare

original: 6.047.104c viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ acintyam svam bhāgam ātmānam pratyanusmarat
tatas dānava darpa ghnam saumitrim deva kaṇṭakaḥ
tam pīḍayitvā bāhubhyām aprabhuḥ laṅghane bhavat

original: 6.047.106a himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ
analyzed: himavān mandaraḥ meruḥ trailokyam vā saha amaraiḥ

original: 6.047.106c śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ
analyzed: śakyam bhujābhyām uddhartum na saṃkhye bharata anujaḥ

original: 6.047.107a athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
analyzed: atha enam vaiṣṇavam bhāgam mānuṣam deham āsthitam
visaṃjñam lakṣmaṇam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ vismitaḥ bhavat
atha vāyusutaḥ kruddhaḥ rāvaṇam samabhidravat
ājaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ vajra kalpena muṣṭinā
tena muṣṭi prahāreṇa rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.047.109c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca
analyzed: jānubhyām apatat bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca
visaṃjñam rāvaṇam dṛṣṭvā samare bhīma vikramam

original: 6.047.110c ṛṣayo vānarāś caiva nedur devāḥ savāsavāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ vānarāḥ ca eva neduḥ devāḥ sa vāsavāḥ
hanūmān api tejasvī lakṣmaṇam rāvaṇa arditam
anayat rāghava abhyāśam bāhubhyām parigṛhya tam

original: 6.047.112a vāyusūnoḥ suhṛttvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ
analyzed: vāyusūnoḥ suhṛd tvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ
śatrūṇām aprakampyaḥ u pi laghu tvam agamat kapeḥ

original: 6.047.113a taṃ samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitriṃ yudhi durjayam
analyzed: tam samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitrim yudhi durjayam

original: 6.047.113c rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānaṃ punar upāgamat
analyzed: rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānam punar upāgamat
rāvaṇaḥ mahā tejāḥ prāpya saṃjñām mahā āhave

original: 6.047.114c ādade niśitān bāṇāñ jagrāha ca mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: ādade niśitān bāṇām jagrāha ca mahat dhanuḥ

original: 6.047.115a āśvastaś ca viśalyaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ
analyzed: āśvastaḥ ca viśalyaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatru sūdanaḥ
viṣṇoḥ bhāgam amīmāṃsyam ātmānam pratyanusmaran
nipātita mahā vīrām vānarāṇām mahā camūm

original: 6.047.116c rāghavas tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam samabhidravat
athā enam upasaṃgamya hanūmān vākyam abravīt

original: 6.047.117c mama pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya rakṣasaṃ śāstum arhasi
analyzed: mama pṛṣṭham samāruhya rakṣasam śāstum arhasi

original: 6.047.118a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyaṃ vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam
analyzed: tat śrutvā rāghavaḥ vākyam vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam
ārohat sahasā śūraḥ hanūmantam mahā kapim
ratha stham rāvaṇam saṃkhye dadarśa manuja adhipaḥ

original: 6.047.119a tam ālokya mahātejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tam ālokya mahā tejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ
vairocanam iva kruddhaḥ viṣṇuḥ abhyudyata āyudhaḥ
jyā śabdam akarot tīvram vajra niṣpeṣa nisvanam

original: 6.047.120c girā gambhīrayā rāmo rākṣasendram uvāca ha
analyzed: girā gambhīrayā rāmaḥ rākṣasa indram uvāca ha

original: 6.047.121a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvaṃ hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvam hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam

original: 6.047.121c kva nu rākṣasaśārdūla gato mokṣam avāpsyasi
analyzed: kva nu rākṣasa śārdūla gataḥ mokṣam avāpsyasi
yadi indra vaivasvata bhāskarān vā
svayambhu vaiśvānara śaṃkarān vā

original: 6.047.122c gamiṣyasi tvaṃ daśa vā diśo vā;
analyzed: gamiṣyasi tvam daśa vā diśaḥ vā
tathā api me na adya gataḥ vimokṣyase
yaḥ ca eṣa śaktyā abhihataḥ tvayā adya
icchan viṣādam sahasā abhyupetaḥ
saḥ eṣa rakṣaḥ gaṇa rāja mṛtyuḥ
sa putra dārasya tava adya yuddhe
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasa indraḥ mahā kapim
ājaghāna śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kāla anala śikhā upamaiḥ
rākṣasena āhave tasya tāḍitasya api sāyakaiḥ
svabhāva tejaḥ yuktasya bhūyaḥ tejaḥ vyavardhata
tatas rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇena kṛta vraṇam
dṛṣṭvā plavaga śārdūlam krodhasya vaśam eyivān
tasya abhisaṃkramya ratham sa cakram
sa aśva dhvaja chatra mahā patākam
sa sārathim sa aśani śūla khaḍgam
rāmaḥ praciccheda śaraiḥ su puṅkhaiḥ
atha indra śatrum tarasā jaghāna
bāṇena vajra aśani saṃnibhena
bhujāntare vyūḍha sujāta rūpe
vajreṇa merum bhagavān iva indraḥ
yaḥ vajra pāta aśani saṃnipātān
na cukṣubhe na api cacāla rājā
sa rāma bāṇa abhihataḥ bhṛśa ārtaḥ
cacāla cāpam ca mumoca vīraḥ
tam vihvalantam prasamīkṣya rāmaḥ
samādade dīptam atha ardhacandram
tena arka varṇam sahasā kirīṭam
ciccheda rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ mahātmāḥ
tam nirviṣa āśīviṣa saṃnikāśam
śānta arciṣam sūryam iva aprakāśam
gata śriyam kṛtta kirīṭa kūṭam
uvāca rāmaḥ yudhi rākṣasa indram
kṛtam tvayā karma mahat su bhīmam
hata pravīraḥ ca kṛtaḥ tvayā aham
tasmāt pariśrāntaḥ iti vyavasya
na tvam śaraiḥ mṛtyu vaśam nayāmi
saḥ evam uktaḥ hata darpa harṣaḥ
nikṛtta cāpaḥ sa hata aśva sūtaḥ
śara arditaḥ kṛtta mahā kirīṭaḥ
viveśa laṅkām sahasā sma rājā
tasmin praviṣṭe rajanīcara indre
mahā bale dānava deva śatrau
harīn viśalyān sahalakṣmaṇena
cakāra rāmaḥ parama āhava agre
tasmin prabhagne tridaśa indra śatrau
sura asurāḥ bhūta gaṇāḥ diśaḥ ca
sa sāgarāḥ sa ṛṣi mahā uragāḥ ca
tathā eva bhūmi ambu carāḥ ca hṛṣṭāḥ
sa praviśya purīm laṅkām rāma bāṇa bhaya arditaḥ
bhagna darpaḥ tadā rājā babhūva vyathita indriyaḥ
mātaṃgaḥ iva siṃhena garuḍena iva pannagaḥ
abhibhūtaḥ bhavat rājā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
brahma daṇḍa prakāśānām vidyut sadṛśa varcasām
smaran rāghava bāṇānām vivyathe rākṣaseśvaraḥ
sa kāñcana mayam divyam āśritya parama āsanam
vic prekṣamāṇaḥ rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.048.005a sarvaṃ tat khalu me moghaṃ yat taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: sarvam tat khalu me mogham yat taptam paramam tapaḥ
yat samānaḥ mahā indreṇa mānuṣeṇa asmi nirjitaḥ

original: 6.048.006a idaṃ tad brahmaṇo ghoraṃ vākyaṃ mām abhyupasthitam
analyzed: idam tat brahmaṇaḥ ghoram vākyam mām abhyupasthitam

original: 6.048.006c mānuṣebhyo vijānīhi bhayaṃ tvam iti tat tathā
analyzed: mānuṣebhyaḥ vijānīhi bhayam tvam iti tat tathā
deva dānava gandharvaiḥ yakṣa rākṣasa pannagaiḥ

original: 6.048.007c avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam
analyzed: avadhya tvam mayā prāptam mānuṣebhyaḥ na yācitam
etat eva abhyupāgamya yatnam kartum iha arhatha
rākṣasāḥ ca api tiṣṭhantu caryā gopura mūrdhasu
sa ca apratima gambhīraḥ deva dānava darpa hā
brahma śāpa abhibhūtaḥ tu kumbhakarṇaḥ vibodhyatām

original: 6.048.010a sa parājitam ātmānaṃ prahastaṃ ca niṣūditam
analyzed: sa parājitam ātmānam prahastam ca niṣūditam
jñātvā rakṣaḥ balam bhīmam ādideśa mahā balaḥ
dvāreṣu yatnaḥ kriyatām prākārāḥ ca adhiruhyatām
nidrā vaśa samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ vibodhyatām

original: 6.048.012a nava ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: nava ṣaṭ sapta ca aṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.048.012c taṃ tu bodhayata kṣipraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: tam tu bodhayata kṣipram kumbhakarṇam mahā balam

original: 6.048.013a sa hi saṃkhye mahābāhuḥ kakudaṃ sarvarakṣasām
analyzed: sa hi saṃkhye mahā bāhuḥ kakudam sarva rakṣasām

original: 6.048.013c vānarān rājaputrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati
analyzed: vānarān rāja putrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati

original: 6.048.014a kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍho grāmyasukhe rataḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍhaḥ grāmya sukhe rataḥ
rāmeṇa abhinirastasya saṃgrāmaḥ smin su dāruṇe

original: 6.048.015a bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite
analyzed: bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite

original: 6.048.015c kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tena śakratulyabalena hi
analyzed: kim kariṣyāmi aham tena śakra tulya balena hi

original: 6.048.016a īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yo na sāhyāya kalpate
analyzed: īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yaḥ na sāhyāya kalpate

original: 6.048.016c te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasendrasya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: te tu tat vacanam śrutvā rākṣasa indrasya rākṣasāḥ
jagmuḥ parama saṃbhrāntāḥ kumbhakarṇa niveśanam
te rāvaṇa samādiṣṭāḥ māṃsa śoṇita bhojanāḥ

original: 6.048.018a gandhamālyāṃs tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ
analyzed: gandha mālyān tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ
tām praviśya mahā dvārām sarvatas yojana āyatām
kumbhakarṇa guhām ramyām sarva gandha pravāhinīm
pratiṣṭhamānāḥ kṛcchreṇa yatnāt praviviśuḥ guhām

original: 6.048.020a tāṃ praviśya guhāṃ ramyāṃ śubhāṃ kāñcanakuṭṭimām
analyzed: tām praviśya guhām ramyām śubhām kāñcana kuṭṭimām
dadṛśuḥ nairṛta vyāghram śayānam bhīma darśanam

original: 6.048.021a te tu taṃ vikṛtaṃ suptaṃ vikīrṇam iva parvatam
analyzed: te tu tam vikṛtam suptam vikīrṇam iva parvatam
kumbhakarṇam mahā nidram sahitāḥ pratyabodhayan
ūrdhva romāñcita tanum śvasantam iva pannagam
trāsayantam mahā śvāsaiḥ śayānam bhīma darśanam
bhīma nāsā puṭam tam tu pātāla vipula ānanam
dadṛśuḥ nairṛta vyāghram kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
tatas cakruḥ mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇa agratas tadā
māṃsānām meru saṃkāśam rāśim parama tarpaṇam

original: 6.048.025a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
analyzed: mṛgāṇām mahiṣāṇām ca varāhāṇām ca saṃcayān
cakruḥ nairṛta śārdūlāḥ rāśiman asya ca adbhutam

original: 6.048.026a tataḥ śoṇitakumbhāṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: tatas śoṇita kumbhān ca madyāni vividhāni ca
purastāt kumbhakarṇasya cakruḥ tridaśa śatravaḥ
lilipuḥ ca parārdhyena candanena paraṃtapam

original: 6.048.027c divyair ācchādayām āsur mālyair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
analyzed: divyaiḥ ācchādayām āsuḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ

original: 6.048.028a dhūpaṃ sugandhaṃ sasṛjus tuṣṭuvuś ca paraṃtapam
analyzed: dhūpam su gandham sasṛjuḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca paraṃtapam
jaladāḥ iva ca uneduḥ yātudhānāḥ sahasraśas
śaṅkhān āpūrayām āsuḥ śaśāṅka sadṛśa prabhān

original: 6.048.029c tumulaṃ yugapac cāpi vineduś cāpy amarṣitāḥ
analyzed: tumulam yugapad ca api vineduḥ ca api amarṣitāḥ

original: 6.048.030a nedur āsphoṭayām āsuś cikṣipus te niśācarāḥ
analyzed: neduḥ āsphoṭayām āsuḥ cikṣipuḥ te niśācarāḥ
kumbhakarṇa vibodha artham cakruḥ te vipulam svanam
sa śaṅkha bherī paṭaha praṇādam
āsphoṭita kṣveḍita siṃhanādam
diśaḥ dravantaḥ tridivam kirantaḥ
śrutvā vihaṃgāḥ sahasā nipetuḥ
yadā bhṛśam taiḥ ninadaiḥ mahātmā
na kumbhakarṇaḥ bubudhe prasuptaḥ
tatas musuṇḍī musalāni sarve
rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ te jagṛhuḥ gadāḥ ca
tam śaila śṛṅgaiḥ musalaiḥ gadābhiḥ
vṛkṣaiḥ talaiḥ mudgara muṣṭibhiḥ ca
sukha prasuptam bhuvi kumbhakarṇam
rakṣāṃsi udagrāṇi tadā nijaghnuḥ
tasya niśvāsa vātena kumbhakarṇasya rakṣasaḥ
rākṣasāḥ balavantaḥ pi sthātum na aśaknuvan puras
tatas sya puratas gāḍham rākṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
mṛdaṅga paṇavān bherīḥ śaṅkha kumbha gaṇān tathā
daśa rākṣasa sāhasram yugapad paryavādayan
nīlāñjana caya ākāram te tu tam pratyabodhayan

original: 6.048.036c abhighnanto nadantaś ca naiva saṃvivide tu saḥ
analyzed: abhighnantaḥ nadantaḥ ca nā eva saṃvivide tu saḥ

original: 6.048.037a yadā cainaṃ na śekus te pratibodhayituṃ tadā
analyzed: yadā ca enam na śekuḥ te pratibodhayitum tadā
tatas gurutaram yatnam dāruṇam samupākraman

original: 6.048.038a aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgāñ jaghnur daṇḍakaśāṅkuśaiḥ
analyzed: aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgām jaghnuḥ daṇḍa kaśā aṅkuśaiḥ
bherī śaṅkha mṛdaṅgān ca sarva prāṇaiḥ avādayan
nijaghnuḥ ca asya gātrāṇi mahā kāṣṭha kaṭam karaiḥ
mudgaraiḥ musalaiḥ ca eva sarva prāṇa samudyataiḥ
tena śabdena mahatā laṅkā samabhipūritā
sa parvata vanā sarvā sā u pi na eva prabudhyate
tatas sahasram bherīṇām yugapad samahanyata
mṛṣṭa kāñcana koṇānām asaktānām samantataḥ

original: 6.048.042a evam apy atinidras tu yadā naiva prabudhyata
analyzed: evam api ati nidraḥ tu yadā na eva prabudhyata

original: 6.048.042c śāpasya vaśam āpannas tataḥ kruddhā niśācarāḥ
analyzed: śāpasya vaśam āpannaḥ tatas kruddhāḥ niśācarāḥ
mahā krodha samāviṣṭāḥ sarve bhīma parākramāḥ
tat rakṣaḥ bodhayiṣyantaḥ cakruḥ anye parākramam

original: 6.048.044a anye bherīḥ samājaghnur anye cakrur mahāsvanam
analyzed: anye bherīḥ samājaghnuḥ anye cakruḥ mahā svanam

original: 6.048.044c keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇāv anye daśanti ca
analyzed: keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇau anye daśanti ca
na kumbhakarṇaḥ paspande mahā nidrā vaśam gataḥ
anye ca balinaḥ tasya kūṭamudgara pāṇayaḥ
mūrdhni vakṣasi gātreṣu pātayan kūṭamudgarān
rajju bandhana baddhābhiḥ śataghnībhiḥ ca sarvatas
vadhyamānaḥ mahā kāyaḥ na prābudhyata rākṣasaḥ
vāraṇānām sahasram tu śarīre sya pradhāvitam

original: 6.048.047c kumbhakarṇas tato buddhaḥ sparśaṃ param abudhyata
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tatas buddhaḥ sparśam param abudhyata
sa pātyamānaiḥ giri śṛṅga vṛkṣaiḥ
acintayan tān vipulān prahārān
nidrā kṣayāt kṣudh bhaya pīḍitaḥ ca
vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ sahasā utpapāta
sa nāgabhoga acalaśṛṅga kalpau
vikṣipya bāhū giri śṛṅga sārau
vivṛtya vaktram vaḍavāmukha ābham
niśācaraḥ sau vikṛtam jajṛmbhe
tasya jājṛmbhamāṇasya vaktram pātāla saṃnibham
dadṛśe meru śṛṅga agre divākaraḥ iva uditaḥ
vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ tibalaḥ pratibuddhaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.048.051c niśvāsaś cāsya saṃjajñe parvatād iva mārutaḥ
analyzed: niśvāsaḥ ca asya saṃjajñe parvatāt iva mārutaḥ

original: 6.048.052a rūpam uttiṣṭhatas tasya kumbhakarṇasya tad babhau
analyzed: rūpam uttiṣṭhataḥ tasya kumbhakarṇasya tat babhau
tapānte sa balākasya meghasya iva vivarṣataḥ
tasya dīpta agni sadṛśe vidyut sadṛśa varcasī
dadṛśāte mahā netre dīptau iva mahā grahau
ādat bubhukṣitaḥ māṃsam śoṇitam tṛṣitaḥ pibat

original: 6.048.054c medaḥ kumbhaṃ ca madyaṃ ca papau śakraripus tadā
analyzed: medaḥ kumbham ca madyam ca papau śakra ripuḥ tadā

original: 6.048.055a tatas tṛpta iti jñātvā samutpetur niśācarāḥ
analyzed: tatas tṛptaḥ iti jñātvā samutpetuḥ niśācarāḥ
śirobhiḥ ca praṇamya enam sarvatas paryavārayan

original: 6.048.056a sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛtarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛta ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 6.048.056c bodhanād vismitaś cāpi rākṣasān idam abravīt
analyzed: bodhanāt vismitaḥ ca api rākṣasān idam abravīt
kimartham aham āhatya bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ

original: 6.048.057c kaccit sukuśalaṃ rājño bhayaṃ vā neha kiṃ cana
analyzed: kaccit su kuśalam rājñaḥ bhayam vā na iha kim cana

original: 6.048.058a atha vā dhruvam anyebhyo bhayaṃ param upasthitam
analyzed: atha vā dhruvam anyebhyaḥ bhayam param upasthitam
yad artham eva tvaritaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ
adya rākṣasa rājasya bhayam utpāṭayāmi aham
pātayiṣye mahā indram vā śātayiṣye tathā analam

original: 6.048.060a na hy alpakāraṇe suptaṃ bodhayiṣyati māṃ bhṛśam
analyzed: na hi alpa kāraṇe suptam bodhayiṣyati mām bhṛśam
tat ākhyāta artha tattvena mad prabodhana kāraṇam
evam bruvāṇam saṃrabdham kumbhakarṇam ariṃdamam

original: 6.048.061c yūpākṣaḥ sacivo rājñaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
analyzed: yūpākṣaḥ sacivaḥ rājñaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ uvāca ha

original: 6.048.062a na no devakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid bhayam asti kadā cana
analyzed: na naḥ deva kṛtam kim cit bhayam asti kadā cana

original: 6.048.062c na daityadānavebhyo vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam
analyzed: na daitya dānavebhyaḥ vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam

original: 6.048.062e yādṛśaṃ mānuṣaṃ rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam
analyzed: yādṛśam mānuṣam rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam
vānaraiḥ parvata ākāraiḥ laṅkā iyam parivāritā
sītā haraṇa saṃtaptāt rāmāt naḥ tumulam bhayam
ekena vānareṇa iyam pūrvam dagdhā mahā purī
kumāraḥ nihataḥ ca akṣaḥ sa anuyātraḥ sa kuñjaraḥ
svayam rakṣaḥ adhipaḥ ca api paulastyaḥ deva kaṇṭakaḥ
mṛta iti saṃyuge mukta ārāmeṇa āditya tejasā

original: 6.048.066a yan na devaiḥ kṛto rājā nāpi daityair na dānavaiḥ
analyzed: yat na devaiḥ kṛtaḥ rājā na api daityaiḥ na dānavaiḥ

original: 6.048.066c kṛtaḥ sa iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇasaṃśayāt
analyzed: kṛtaḥ saḥ iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇa saṃśayāt

original: 6.048.067a sa yūpākṣavacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur yudhi parājayam
analyzed: sa yūpākṣa vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātuḥ yudhi parājayam
kumbhakarṇaḥ vivṛtta akṣaḥ yūpākṣam idam abravīt
sarvam adyā eva yūpākṣa hari sainyam sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.048.068c rāghavaṃ ca raṇe hatvā paścād drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam
analyzed: rāghavam ca raṇe hatvā paścāt drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam
rākṣasān tarpayiṣyāmi harīṇām māṃsa śoṇitaiḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ ca api svayam pāsyāmi śoṇitam
tat tasya vākyam bruvataḥ niśamya
sa garvitam roṣa vivṛddha doṣam
mahodaraḥ nairṛta yodha mukhyaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ vākyam idam babhāṣe

original: 6.048.071a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇadoṣu vimṛśya ca
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇa doṣu vimṛśya ca

original: 6.048.071c paścād api mahābāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi
analyzed: paścāt api mahā bāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi
mahodara vacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasaiḥ parivāritaḥ
kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā tejāḥ saṃpratasthe mahā balaḥ
tam samutthāpya bhīma akṣam bhīma rūpa parākramam
rākṣasāḥ tvaritāḥ jagmuḥ daśagrīva niveśanam
tatas gatvā daśagrīvam āsīnam parama āsane
ūcuḥ baddhāñjali puṭāḥ sarve eva niśācarāḥ
prabuddhaḥ kumbhakarṇo sau bhrātā te rākṣasa ṛṣabha

original: 6.048.075c kathaṃ tatraiva niryātu drakṣyase tam ihāgatam
analyzed: katham tatra eva niryātu drakṣyase tam iha āgatam

original: 6.048.076a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ yathānyāyam ca pūjitam

original: 6.048.076c draṣṭum enam ihecchāmi yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
analyzed: draṣṭum enam iha icchāmi yathānyāyam ca pūjitam

original: 6.048.077a tathety uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ
kumbhakarṇam idam vākyam ūcuḥ rāvaṇa coditāḥ
draṣṭum tvām kāṅkṣate rājā sarva rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
gamane kriyatām buddhiḥ bhrātaram saṃpraharṣaya

original: 6.048.079a kumbhakarṇas tu durdharṣo bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tu durdharṣaḥ bhrātuḥ ājñāya śāsanam

original: 6.048.079c tathety uktvā mahāvīryaḥ śayanād utpapāta ha
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā mahā vīryaḥ śayanāt utpapāta ha
prakṣālya vadanam hṛṣṭaḥ snātaḥ parama bhūṣitaḥ
pipāsuḥ tvarayām āsa pānam bala samīraṇam

original: 6.048.081a tatas te tvaritās tasya rājṣasā rāvaṇājñayā
analyzed: tatas te tvaritāḥ tasya rājṣasāḥ rāvaṇa ājñayā

original: 6.048.081c madyaṃ bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kṣipram evopahārayan
analyzed: madyam bhakṣyān ca vividhān kṣipram eva upahārayan
pītvā ghaṭa sahasram sa gamanāya upacakrame
īṣat samutkaṭaḥ mattaḥ tejaḥ bala samanvitaḥ
kumbhakarṇaḥ babhau hṛṣṭaḥ kāla antaka yama upamaḥ
bhrātuḥ sa bhavanam gacchan rakṣaḥ bala samanvitaḥ
kumbhakarṇaḥ pada nyāsaiḥ akampayata medinīm
sa rājamārgam vapuṣā prakāśayan
sahasraraśmiḥ dharaṇīm iva aṃśubhiḥ
jagāma tatra añjali mālayā vṛtaḥ
śatakratuḥ geham iva svayambhuvaḥ

original: 6.048.086a ke cic charaṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmaṃ;
analyzed: ke cit śaraṇyam śaraṇam sma rāmam
vrajanti ke cid vyathitāḥ patanti

original: 6.048.086c ke cid diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti;
analyzed: ke cit diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti

original: ke cid bhayārtā bhuvi śerate sma
analyzed: ke cit bhaya ārtāḥ bhuvi śerate sma
tam adri śṛṅga pratimam kirīṭinam
spṛśantam ādityam iva ātma tejasā
vanaukasaḥ prekṣya vivṛddham adbhutam
bhaya arditāḥ dudruvire tatas tatas

original: 6.049.001a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ dhanuḥ ādāya vīryavān
kirīṭinam mahā kāyam kumbhakarṇam dadarśa ha
tam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa śreṣṭham parvata ākāra darśanam
kramamāṇam iva ākāśam purā nārāyaṇam prabhum
sa toya ambuda saṃkāśam kāñcana aṅgada bhūṣaṇam
dṛṣṭvā punar pradudrāva vānarāṇām mahā camūḥ

original: 6.049.004a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vardhamānaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: vidrutām vāhinīm dṛṣṭvā vardhamānam ca rākṣasam

original: 6.049.004c savismayam idaṃ rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
analyzed: sa vismayam idam rāmaḥ vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
kaḥ sau parvata saṃkaśaḥ kirīṭī hari locanaḥ

original: 6.049.005c laṅkāyāṃ dṛśyate vīraḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: laṅkāyām dṛśyate vīraḥ sa vidyut iva toyadaḥ
pṛthivyāḥ ketu bhūtaḥ sau mahān ekaḥ tra dṛśyate

original: 6.049.006c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tataḥ
analyzed: yam dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tatas

original: 6.049.007a ācakṣva me mahān ko 'sau rakṣo vā yadi vāsuraḥ
analyzed: ācakṣva me mahān kaḥ sau rakṣaḥ vā yadi vā asuraḥ

original: 6.049.007c na mayaivaṃvidhaṃ bhūtaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana
analyzed: na mayā evaṃvidham bhūtam dṛṣṭa pūrvam kadā cana
sa pṛṣṭaḥ rāja putreṇa rāmeṇa akliṣṭa kāriṇā
vibhīṣaṇaḥ mahā prājñaḥ kākutstham idam abravīt

original: 6.049.009a yena vaivasvato yuddhe vāsavaś ca parājitaḥ
analyzed: yena vaivasvataḥ yuddhe vāsavaḥ ca parājitaḥ
sa eṣa viśravasaḥ putraḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ pratāpavān
etena devāḥ yudhi dānavāḥ ca
yakṣāḥ bhujaṃgāḥ piśita aśanāḥ ca
gandharva vidyādhara kiṃnarāḥ ca
sahasraśas rāghava saṃprabhagnāḥ
śūla pāṇim virūpa akṣam kumbhakarṇam mahā balam

original: 6.049.011c hantuṃ na śekus tridaśāḥ kālo 'yam iti mohitāḥ
analyzed: hantum na śekuḥ tridaśāḥ kālaḥ yam iti mohitāḥ

original: 6.049.012a prakṛtyā hy eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: prakṛtyā hi eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
anyeṣām rākṣasa indrāṇām vara dāna kṛtam balam
etena jāta mātreṇa kṣudhā ārtena mahātmanā
bhakṣitāni sahasrāṇi sattvānām su bahūni api
teṣu saṃbhakṣyamāṇeṣu prajāḥ bhaya nipīḍitāḥ

original: 6.049.014c yānti sma śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ tam apy arthaṃ nyavedayan
analyzed: yānti sma śaraṇam śakram tam api artham nyavedayan
sa kumbhakarṇam kupitaḥ mahā indraḥ
jaghāna vajreṇa śitena vajrī
sa śakra vajra abhihataḥ mahātmā
cacāla kopāt ca bhṛśam nanāda
tasya nānadyamānasya kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ

original: 6.049.016c śrutvā ninādaṃ vitrastā bhūyo bhūmir vitatrase
analyzed: śrutvā ninādam vitrastā bhūyas bhūmiḥ vitatrase
tatas kopāt mahā indrasya kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
vikṛṣya airāvatāt dantam jaghāna urasi vāsavam
kumbhakarṇa prahāra ārtaḥ vicacāla sa vāsavaḥ
tatas viṣeduḥ sahasā deva brahma ṛṣi dānavāḥ

original: 6.049.019a prajābhiḥ saha śakraś ca yayau sthānaṃ svayambhuvaḥ
analyzed: prajābhiḥ saha śakraḥ ca yayau sthānam svayambhuvaḥ
kumbhakarṇasya daurātmyam śaśaṃsuḥ te prajāpateḥ

original: 6.049.019e prajānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi devānāṃ cāpi dharṣaṇam
analyzed: prajānām bhakṣaṇam ca api devānām ca api dharṣaṇam

original: 6.049.020a evaṃ prajā yadi tv eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśaḥ
analyzed: evam prajāḥ yadi tu eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśas
acireṇa eva kālena śūnyaḥ lokaḥ bhaviṣyati
vāsavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarva loka pitāmahaḥ

original: 6.049.021c rakṣāṃsy āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇam dadarśa ha
kumbhakarṇam samīkṣya eva vitatrāsa prajāpatiḥ

original: 6.049.022c dṛṣṭvā niśvasya caivedaṃ svayambhūr idam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā niśvasya ca evā idam svayambhūḥ idam abravīt
dhruvam loka vināśāya paurastyena asi nirmitaḥ

original: 6.049.023c tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛtakalpaḥ śayiṣyasi
analyzed: tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛta kalpaḥ śayiṣyasi
nipapāta agratas prabhoḥ
tatas parama saṃbhrāntaḥ rāvaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
vivṛddhaḥ kāñcanaḥ vṛkṣaḥ phala kāle nikṛtyate

original: 6.049.025a na naptāraṃ svakaṃ nyāyyaṃ śaptum evaṃ prajāpate
analyzed: na naptāram svakam nyāyyam śaptum evam prajāpate

original: 6.049.025c na mithyāvacanaś ca tvaṃ svapsyaty eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: na mithyā vacanaḥ ca tvam svapsyati eṣa na saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.049.025e kālas tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā
analyzed: kālaḥ tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā

original: 6.049.026a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūr idam abravīt
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūḥ idam abravīt

original: 6.049.026c śayitā hy eṣa ṣaṇ māsān ekāhaṃ jāgariṣyati
analyzed: śayitā hi eṣa ṣaṭ māsān eka aham jāgariṣyati

original: 6.049.027a ekenāhnā tv asau vīraś caran bhūmiṃ bubhukṣitaḥ
analyzed: ekena ahnā tu asau vīraḥ caran bhūmim bubhukṣitaḥ

original: 6.049.027c vyāttāsyo bhakṣayel lokān saṃkruddha iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: vyātta āsyaḥ bhakṣayet lokān saṃkruddhaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
saḥ sau vyasanam āpannaḥ kumbhakarṇam abodhayat
tvad parākrama bhītaḥ ca rājā saṃprati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.049.029a sa eṣa nirgato vīraḥ śibirād bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa nirgataḥ vīraḥ śibirāt bhīma vikramaḥ
vānarān bhṛśa saṃkruddhaḥ bhakṣayan paridhāvati
kumbhakarṇam samīkṣya eva harayaḥ vipradudruvuḥ

original: 6.049.030c katham enaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ
analyzed: katham enam raṇe kruddham vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ

original: 6.049.031a ucyantāṃ vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam
analyzed: ucyantām vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam
iti vijñāya harayaḥ bhaviṣyanti iha nirbhayāḥ
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat su mukha udgatam

original: 6.049.032c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ nīlaṃ senāpatiṃ tadā
analyzed: uvāca rāghavaḥ vākyam nīlam senāpatim tadā

original: 6.049.033a gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake
analyzed: gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake

original: 6.049.033c dvārāṇy ādāya laṅkāyāś caryāś cāpy atha saṃkramān
analyzed: dvārāṇi ādāya laṅkāyāḥ caryāḥ ca api atha saṃkramān

original: 6.049.034a śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca śilāś cāpy upasaṃharan
analyzed: śaila śṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣān ca śilāḥ ca api upasaṃharan
tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ sarve sa āyudhāḥ śaila pāṇayaḥ
rāghaveṇa samādiṣṭaḥ nīlaḥ hari camūpatiḥ
śaśāsa vānara anīkam yathāvat kapi kuñjaraḥ

original: 6.049.036a tato gavākṣaḥ śarabho hanumān aṅgado nalaḥ
analyzed: tatas gavākṣaḥ śarabhaḥ hanumān aṅgadaḥ nalaḥ
śaila śṛṅgāṇi śaila ābhāḥ gṛhītvā dvāram abhyayus
tatas harīṇām tat anīkam ugram
rarāja śaila udyata vṛkṣa hastam
gireḥ samīpa anugatam yathā eva
mahat mahā ambhodhara jālam ugram
sa tu rākṣasa śārdūlaḥ nidrā mada samākulaḥ
rājamārgam śriyā juṣṭam yayau vipula vikramaḥ
rākṣasānām sahasraiḥ ca vṛtaḥ parama durjayaḥ
gṛhebhyaḥ puṣpa varṣeṇa kāryamāṇaḥ tadā yayau
sa hema jāla vitatam bhānu bhāsvara darśanam
dadarśa vipulam ramyam rākṣasa indra niveśanam
sa tat tadā sūryaḥ iva abhra jālam
praviśya rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ niveśanam
dadarśa dūre grajam āsana stham
svayambhuvam śakraḥ iva āsana stham

original: 6.050.005a so 'bhigamya gṛhaṃ bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca
analyzed: saḥ bhigamya gṛham bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca
dadarśa udvignam āsīnam vimāne puṣpake gurum
atha dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇam upasthitam
tūrṇam utthāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ saṃnikarṣam upānayat
atha āsīnasya paryaṅke kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.050.007c bhrātur vavande caraṇāṃ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābravīt
analyzed: bhrātuḥ vavande caraṇām kim kṛtyam iti ca abravīt
utpatya ca enam muditaḥ rāvaṇaḥ pariṣasvaje
sa bhrātrā saṃpariṣvaktaḥ yathāvat ca abhinanditaḥ
kumbhakarṇaḥ śubham divyam pratipede varāsanam
sa tadā āsanam āśritya kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
saṃrakta nayanaḥ kopāt rāvaṇam vākyam abravīt

original: 6.050.010a kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ
analyzed: kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ

original: 6.050.010c śaṃsa kasmād bhayaṃ te 'sti ko 'dya preto bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śaṃsa kasmāt bhayam te sti kaḥ dya pretaḥ bhaviṣyati
bhrātaram rāvaṇaḥ kruddham kumbhakarṇam avasthitam

original: 6.050.011c īṣat tu parivṛttābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: īṣat tu parivṛttābhyām netrābhyām vākyam abravīt

original: 6.050.012a adya te sumahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahābala
analyzed: adya te su mahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahā bala

original: 6.050.012c sukhitas tvaṃ na jānīṣe mama rāmakṛtaṃ bhayam
analyzed: sukhitaḥ tvam na jānīṣe mama rāma kṛtam bhayam
eṣa dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ sugrīva sahitaḥ balī

original: 6.050.013c samudraṃ sabalas tīrtvā mūlaṃ naḥ parikṛntati
analyzed: samudram sa balaḥ tīrtvā mūlam naḥ parikṛntati

original: 6.050.014a hanta paśyasva laṅkāyā vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: hanta paśyasva laṅkāyāḥ vanāni upavanāni ca
setunā sukham āgamya vānara ekārṇavam kṛtam

original: 6.050.015a ye rākṣasā mukhyatamā hatās te vānarair yudhi
analyzed: ye rākṣasāḥ mukhyatamāḥ hatāḥ te vānaraiḥ yudhi

original: 6.050.015c vānarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana
analyzed: vānarāṇām kṣayam yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana

original: 6.050.016a sarvakṣapitakośaṃ ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām
analyzed: sarva kṣapita kośam ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām
trāyasva imām purīm laṅkām bāla vṛddha avaśeṣitām

original: 6.050.017a bhrātur arthe mahābāho kuru karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: bhrātuḥ arthe mahā bāho kuru karma su duṣkaram

original: 6.050.017c mayaivaṃ noktapūrvo hi kaś cid bhrātaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: mayā evam na ukta pūrvaḥ hi kaḥ cid bhrātar paraṃtapa

original: 6.050.017e tvayy asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me
analyzed: tvayi asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me
deva asura vimardeṣu bahuśas rākṣasa ṛṣabha

original: 6.050.018c tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāś cāsurā yudhi
analyzed: tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāḥ ca asurāḥ yudhi

original: 6.050.018e na hi te sarvabhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśo balī
analyzed: na hi te sarva bhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśaḥ balī
kuruṣva me priya hitam etat uttamam
yathāpriyam priya raṇa bāndhava priya
sva tejasā vidhama sapatna vāhinīm
śarad ghanam pavanaḥ iva udyataḥ mahān
tasya rākṣasa rājasya niśamya paridevitam
kumbhakarṇaḥ babhāṣe tha vacanam prajahāsa ca

original: 6.051.002a dṛṣṭo doṣo hi yo 'smābhiḥ purā mantravinirṇaye
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ doṣaḥ hi yaḥ smābhiḥ purā mantra vinirṇaye
hiteṣu anabhiyuktena saḥ yam āsāditaḥ tvayā

original: 6.051.003a śīghraṃ khalv abhyupetaṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: śīghram khalu abhyupetam tvām phalam pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
nirayeṣu eva patanam yathā duṣkṛta karmaṇaḥ

original: 6.051.004a prathamaṃ vai mahārāja kṛtyam etad acintitam
analyzed: prathamam vai mahā rāja kṛtyam etat a cintitam
kevalam vīrya darpeṇa na anubandhaḥ vicāritaḥ

original: 6.051.005a yaḥ paścāt pūrvakāryāṇi kuryād aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ paścāt pūrva kāryāṇi kuryāt aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ

original: 6.051.005c pūrvaṃ cottarakāryāṇi na sa veda nayānayau
analyzed: pūrvam ca uttara kāryāṇi na sa veda naya anayau
deśa kāla vihīnāni karmāṇi viparīta vat
kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣi aprayateṣu iva

original: 6.051.007a trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
analyzed: trayāṇām pañcadhā yogam karmaṇām yaḥ prapaśyati

original: 6.051.007c sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi
analyzed: sacivaiḥ samayam kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi

original: 6.051.008a yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati
analyzed: yathāgamam ca yaḥ rājā samayam vicikīrṣati
budhyate sacivān buddhyā suhṛdaḥ ca anupaśyati

original: 6.051.009a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate
analyzed: dharmam artham ca kāmam ca sarvān vā rakṣasām pate

original: 6.051.009c bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ
analyzed: bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punar

original: 6.051.010a triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate
analyzed: triṣu ca eteṣu yat śreṣṭham śrutvā tat na avabudhyate

original: 6.051.010c rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam
analyzed: rājā vā rājamātraḥ vā vyartham tasya bahu śrutam

original: 6.051.011a upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam
analyzed: upapradānam sāntvam vā bhedam kāle ca vikramam

original: 6.051.011c yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau
analyzed: yogam ca rakṣasām śreṣṭha tau ubhau ca naya anayau

original: 6.051.012a kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: kāle dharma artha kāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha

original: 6.051.012c niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt
analyzed: niṣeveta ātmavān loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt
hita anubandham ālokya kārya akāryam iha ātmanaḥ
rājā saha artha tattva jñaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha jīvati
an abhijñāya śāstra arthān puruṣāḥ paśu buddhayaḥ
prāgalbhyāt vaktum icchanti mantreṣu abhyantarīkṛtāḥ

original: 6.051.015a aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: a śāstra viduṣām teṣām na kāryam ahitam vacaḥ
arthaśāstra anabhijñānām vipulām śriyam icchatām

original: 6.051.016a ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ
analyzed: ahitam ca hita ākāram dhārṣṭyāt jalpanti ye narāḥ
avekṣya mantra bāhyāḥ te kartavyāḥ kṛtya dūṣaṇāḥ
vināśayantaḥ bhartāram sahitāḥ śatrubhiḥ budhaiḥ
viparītāni kṛtyāni kārayanti iha mantriṇaḥ
tān bhartā mitra saṃkāśān amitrān mantra nirṇaye
vyavahāreṇa jānīyāt sacivān upasaṃhitān
capalasya iha kṛtyāni sahasā anupradhāvataḥ

original: 6.051.019c chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ
analyzed: chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ

original: 6.051.020a yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati
analyzed: yaḥ hi śatrum avajñāya na ātmānam abhirakṣati

original: 6.051.020c avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate
analyzed: avāpnoti hi saḥ narthān sthānāt ca vyavaropyate

original: 6.051.021a tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam

original: 6.051.021c bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha
analyzed: bhrukuṭim ca eva saṃcakre kruddhaḥ ca enam uvāca ha

original: 6.051.022a mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati
analyzed: mānyaḥ guruḥ iva ācāryaḥ kim mām tvam anuśāsati

original: 6.051.022c kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām
analyzed: kim evam vāc śramam kṛtvā kāle yuktam vidhīyatām
vibhramāt citta mohāt vā bala vīrya āśrayeṇa vā

original: 6.051.023c nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: na abhipannam idānīm yat vyarthāḥ tasya punar kṛthāḥ

original: 6.051.024a asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām
analyzed: asmin kāle tu yat yuktam tat idānīm vidhīyatām
mama apanaya jam doṣam vikrameṇa samīkuru

original: 6.051.025a yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi
analyzed: yadi khalu asti me snehaḥ bhrātṛ tvam vā avagacchasi

original: 6.051.025c yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam
analyzed: yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamam matam
sa suhṛdyaḥ vipanna artham dīnam abhyavapadyate
sa bandhuḥ yaḥ upanīteṣu sāhāyyāya upakalpate

original: 6.051.027a tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam
analyzed: tam athā evam bruvāṇam tu vacanam dhīra dāruṇam

original: 6.051.027c ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha
analyzed: ruṣṭaḥ yam iti vijñāya śanais ślakṣṇam uvāca ha
atīva hi samālakṣya bhrātaram kṣubhita indriyam
kumbhakarṇaḥ śanais vākyam babhāṣe parisāntvayan
alam rākṣasa rāja indra saṃtāpam upapadya te

original: 6.051.029c roṣaṃ ca saṃparityajya svastho bhavitum arhasi
analyzed: roṣam ca saṃparityajya svasthaḥ bhavitum arhasi

original: 6.051.030a naitan manasi kartavvyaṃ mayi jīvati pārthiva
analyzed: na etat manasi kartavvyam mayi jīvati pārthiva
tam aham nāśayiṣyāmi yad kṛte paritapyase

original: 6.051.031a avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava
analyzed: avaśyam tu hitam vācyam sarva avastham mayā tava
bandhu bhāvāt abhihitam bhrātṛ snehāt ca pārthiva

original: 6.051.032a sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā
analyzed: sadṛśam yat tu kāle smin kartum snigdhena bandhunā

original: 6.051.032c śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe
analyzed: śatrūṇām kadanam paśya kriyamāṇam mayā raṇe
adya paśya mahā bāho mayā samara mūrdhani

original: 6.051.033c hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīṃ harivāhinīm
analyzed: hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīm hari vāhinīm

original: 6.051.034a adya rāmasya tad dṛṣṭvā mayānītaṃ raṇāc chiraḥ
analyzed: adya rāmasya tat dṛṣṭvā mayā ānītam raṇāt śiraḥ
sukhībhava mahā bāho sītā bhavatu duḥkhitā

original: 6.051.035a adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanaṃ sumahat priyam
analyzed: adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanam su mahat priyam

original: 6.051.035c laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihatabāndhavāḥ
analyzed: laṅkāyām rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihata bāndhavāḥ
adya śoka parītānām sva bandhu vadha kāraṇāt
śatroḥ yudhi vināśena karomi asra pramārjanam
adya parvata saṃkāśam sa sūryam iva toyadam
vikīrṇam paśya samare sugrīvam plavaga īśvaram

original: 6.051.038a na paraḥ preṣaṇīyas te yuddhāyātula vikrama
analyzed: na paraḥ preṣaṇīyaḥ te yuddhāya atula vikrama
aham utsādayiṣyāmi śatrūn tava mahā bala

original: 6.051.039a yadi śakro yadi yamo yadi pāvakamārutau
analyzed: yadi śakraḥ yadi yamaḥ yadi pāvaka mārutau

original: 6.051.039c tān ahaṃ yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇāv api
analyzed: tān aham yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇau api
giri mātra śarīrasya śita śūla dharasya me
nardataḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrasya bibhīyāt ca puraṃdaraḥ

original: 6.051.041a atha vā tyaktaśastrasya mṛdgatas tarasā ripūn
analyzed: atha vā tyakta śastrasya mṛd gataḥ tarasā ripūn

original: 6.051.041c na me pratimukhe kaś cic chaktaḥ sthātuṃ jijīviṣuḥ
analyzed: na me pratimukhe kaḥ cit śaktaḥ sthātum jijīviṣuḥ

original: 6.051.042a naiva śaktyā na gadayā nāsinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: na eva śaktyā na gadayā na asinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.051.042c hastābhyām eva saṃrabdho haniṣyāmy api vajriṇam
analyzed: hastābhyām eva saṃrabdhaḥ haniṣyāmi api vajriṇam

original: 6.051.043a yadi me muṣṭivegaṃ sa rāghavo 'dya sahiṣyati
analyzed: yadi me muṣṭi vegam sa rāghavaḥ sahiṣyati

original: 6.051.043c tataḥ pāsyanti bāṇaughā rudhiraṃ rāghavasya te
analyzed: tatas pāsyanti bāṇa oghāḥ rudhiram rāghavasya te

original: 6.051.044a cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati
analyzed: cintayā bādhyase rājan kimartham mayi tiṣṭhati
saḥ ham śatru vināśāya tava niryātum udyataḥ

original: 6.051.045a muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge
analyzed: muñca rāmāt bhayam rājan haniṣyāmi iha saṃyuge

original: 6.051.045c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: rāghavam lakṣmaṇam ca eva sugrīvam ca mahā balam

original: 6.051.045e asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātuṃ mahad yaśaḥ
analyzed: asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātum mahat yaśaḥ
vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukha āvaham
sukham samāhartum aham vrajāmi
nihatya rāmam saha lakṣmaṇena
khādāmi sarvān hari yūtha mukhyān
ramasva kāmam piba ca agrya vāruṇīm
kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatām jvaraḥ
mayā adya rāme gamite yama kṣayam
cirāya sītā vaśa gā bhaviṣyati
tat uktam atikāyasya balinaḥ bāhu śālinaḥ
kumbhakarṇasya vacanam śrutvā uvāca mahodaraḥ
kumbhakarṇa kule jātaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ prākṛta darśanaḥ

original: 6.052.002c avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum
analyzed: avaliptaḥ na śaknoṣi kṛtyam sarvatra veditum

original: 6.052.003a na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau
analyzed: na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa naya anayau

original: 6.052.003c tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi
analyzed: tvam tu kaiśorakāt dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalam vaktum icchasi

original: 6.052.004a sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit
analyzed: sthānam vṛddhim ca hānim ca deśa kāla vibhāga vid

original: 6.052.004c ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca pareṣām ca budhyate rākṣasa ṛṣabha

original: 6.052.005a yat tu śakyaṃ balavatā kartuṃ prākṛtabuddhinā
analyzed: yat tu śakyam balavatā kartum prākṛta buddhinā
anupāsita vṛddhena kaḥ kuryāt tādṛśam budhaḥ

original: 6.052.006a yāṃs tu dharmārthakāmāṃs tvaṃ bravīṣi pṛthag āśrayān
analyzed: yān tu dharma artha kāmān tvam bravīṣi pṛthak āśrayān

original: 6.052.006c anuboddhuṃ svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te
analyzed: anuboddhum svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te

original: 6.052.007a karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojanam
analyzed: karma ca eva hi sarveṣām kāraṇānām prayojanam

original: 6.052.007c śreyaḥ pāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām
analyzed: śreyaḥ pāpīyasām ca atra phalam bhavati karmaṇām

original: 6.052.008a niḥśreyasa phalāv eva dharmārthāv itarāv api
analyzed: niḥśreyasa phalau eva dharma arthau itarau api
adharma anarthayoḥ prāptiḥ phalam ca pratyavāyikam
aihalaukika pāratryam karma pumbhiḥ niṣevyate

original: 6.052.009c karmāṇy api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: karmāṇi api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ

original: 6.052.010a tatra kḷptam idaṃ rājñā hṛdi kāryaṃ mataṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: tatra kḷptam idam rājñā hṛdi kāryam matam ca naḥ

original: 6.052.010c śatrau hi sāhasaṃ yat syāt kim ivātrāpanīyate
analyzed: śatrau hi sāhasam yat syāt kim iva atra apanīyate

original: 6.052.011a ekasyaivābhiyāne tu hetur yaḥ prakṛtas tvayā
analyzed: ekasya eva abhiyāne tu hetuḥ yaḥ prakṛtaḥ tvayā

original: 6.052.011c tatrāpy anupapannaṃ te vakṣyāmi yad asādhu ca
analyzed: tatra api anupapannam te vakṣyāmi yat asādhu ca
yena pūrvam janasthāne tibalāḥ hatāḥ

original: 6.052.012c rākṣasā rāghavaṃ taṃ tvaṃ katham eko jayiṣyasi
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ rāghavam tam tvam katham ekaḥ jayiṣyasi

original: 6.052.013a ye purā nirjitās tena janasthāne mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: ye purā nirjitāḥ tena janasthāne mahā ojasaḥ

original: 6.052.013c rākṣasāṃs tān pure sarvān bhītān adyāpi paśyasi
analyzed: rākṣasān tān pure sarvān bhītān adya api paśyasi

original: 6.052.014a taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
analyzed: tam siṃham iva saṃkruddham rāmam daśaratha ātmajam
sarpam suptam iva abuddhyā prabodhayitum icchasi

original: 6.052.015a jvalantaṃ tejasā nityaṃ krodhena ca durāsadam
analyzed: jvalantam tejasā nityam krodhena ca durāsadam

original: 6.052.015c kas taṃ mṛtyum ivāsahyam āsādayitum arhati
analyzed: kaḥ tam mṛtyum iva asahyam āsādayitum arhati
saṃśaya stham idam sarvam śatroḥ pratisamāsane

original: 6.052.016c ekasya gamanaṃ tatra na hi me rocate tava
analyzed: ekasya gamanam tatra na hi me rocate tava

original: 6.052.017a hīnārthas tu samṛddhārthaṃ ko ripuṃ prākṛto yathā
analyzed: hīna arthaḥ tu samṛddha artham kaḥ ripum prākṛtaḥ yathā
niścitam jīvita tyāge vaśam ānetum icchati
yasya nā asti manuṣyeṣu sadṛśaḥ rākṣasa uttama
katham āśaṃsase yoddhum tulyena indra vivasvatoḥ

original: 6.052.019a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahodaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdham kumbhakarṇam mahodaraḥ
uvāca rakṣasām madhye rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇam

original: 6.052.020a labdhvā punas tāṃ vaidehīṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ prajalpasi
analyzed: labdhvā punar tām vaidehīm kimartham tvam prajalpasi

original: 6.052.020c yadecchasi tadā sītā vaśagā te bhaviṣyati
