analyzed: yadā icchasi tadā sītā vaśa gā te bhaviṣyati

original: 6.052.021a dṛṣṭaḥ kaś cid upāyo me sītopasthānakārakaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kaḥ cit upāyaḥ me sītā upasthāna kārakaḥ

original: 6.052.021c rucitaś cet svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara taṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: rucitaḥ ced svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara tam śṛṇu
aham dvijihvaḥ saṃhrādī kumbhakarṇaḥ vitardanaḥ
pañca rāma vadhāya ete niryānti iti avaghoṣaya

original: 6.052.023a tato gatvā vayaṃ yuddhaṃ dāsyāmas tasya yatnataḥ
analyzed: tatas gatvā vayam yuddham dāsyāmaḥ tasya yatnataḥ

original: 6.052.023c jeṣyāmo yadi te śatrūn nopāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ
analyzed: jeṣyāmaḥ yadi te śatrūn na upāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ

original: 6.052.024a atha jīvati naḥ śatrur vayaṃ ca kṛtasaṃyugāḥ
analyzed: atha jīvati naḥ śatruḥ vayam ca kṛta saṃyugāḥ
tatas samabhipatsyāmaḥ manasā yat samīkṣitum
vayam yuddhāt iha eṣyāmaḥ rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ
vidārya sva tanum bāṇaiḥ rāma nāma aṅkitaiḥ śitaiḥ
bhakṣitaḥ rāghavaḥ smābhiḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca iti vādinaḥ

original: 6.052.026c tava pādau grahīṣyāmas tvaṃ naḥ kāma prapūraya
analyzed: tava pādau grahīṣyāmaḥ tvam naḥ kāma prapūraya
tatas vaghoṣaya pure gaja skandhena pārthiva

original: 6.052.027c hato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sasainya iti sarvataḥ
analyzed: hataḥ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sa sainyaḥ iti sarvatas

original: 6.052.028a prīto nāma tato bhūtvā bhṛtyānāṃ tvam ariṃdama
analyzed: prītaḥ nāma tatas bhūtvā bhṛtyānām tvam ariṃdama

original: 6.052.028c bhogāṃś ca parivārāṃś ca kāmāṃś ca vasudāpaya
analyzed: bhogān ca parivārān ca kāmān ca vasu dāpaya
tatas mālyāni vāsāṃsi vīrāṇām anulepanam

original: 6.052.029c peyaṃ ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca muditaḥ piba
analyzed: peyam ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayam ca muditaḥ piba
tatas smin bahulībhūte kaulīne sarvatas gate

original: 6.052.030c praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya
analyzed: praviśya āśvāsya ca api tvam sītām rahasi sāntvaya

original: 6.052.030e dhanadhānyaiś ca kāmaiś ca ratnaiś caināṃ pralobhaya
analyzed: dhana dhānyaiḥ ca kāmaiḥ ca ratnaiḥ ca enām pralobhaya
anayā upadhayā rājan bhaya śoka anubandhayā
akāmā tvad vaśam sītā naṣṭa nāthā gamiṣyati

original: 6.052.032a rañjanīyaṃ hi bhartāraṃ vinaṣṭam avagamya sā
analyzed: rañjanīyam hi bhartāram vinaṣṭam avagamya sā
nairāśyāt strī laghu tvāt ca tvad vaśam pratipatsyate
sā purā sukha saṃvṛddhā sukha arhā duḥkha karṣitā
tvayi adhīnaḥ sukham jñātvā sarvathā upagamiṣyati
etat su nītam mama darśanena
rāmam hi dṛṣṭvā eva bhavet anarthaḥ
iha eva te setsyati mā utsukaḥ bhūḥ
mahān ayuddhena sukhasya lābhaḥ
a naṣṭa sainyaḥ hi an avāpta saṃśayaḥ
ripūn ayuddhena jayam janādhipa

original: 6.052.035c yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate;
analyzed: yaśaḥ ca puṇyam ca mahat mahīpate

original: śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute
analyzed: śriyam ca kīrtim ca ciram samaśnute

original: 6.053.001a sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram
analyzed: sa tathā uktaḥ tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇaḥ mahodaram
abravīt rākṣasa śreṣṭham bhrātaram rāvaṇam tatas

original: 6.053.002a so 'haṃ tava bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham tava bhayam ghoram vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ
rāmasya adya pramārjāmi nirvairaḥ tvam sukhībhava

original: 6.053.003a garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalā iva toyadāḥ
analyzed: garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalāḥ iva toyadāḥ

original: 6.053.003c paśya saṃpādyamānaṃ tu garjitaṃ yudhi karmaṇā
analyzed: paśya saṃpādyamānam tu garjitam yudhi karmaṇā
na marṣayati ca ātmānam saṃbhāvayati na ātmanā

original: 6.053.004c adarśayitvā śūrās tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram
analyzed: a darśayitvā śūrāḥ tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram
viklavānām abuddhīnām rājñām paṇḍita māninām
śṛṇvatām āditas idam tvadvidhānām mahodara
yuddhe kāpuruṣaiḥ nityam bhavadbhiḥ priya vādibhiḥ
rājānam anugacchadbhiḥ kṛtyam etat vināśitam

original: 6.053.007a rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam
analyzed: rāja śeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośaḥ balam hatam
rājānam imam āsādya suhṛd cihnam amitrakam

original: 6.053.008a eṣa niryāmy ahaṃ yuddham udyataḥ śatrunirjaye
analyzed: eṣa niryāmi aham yuddham udyataḥ śatru nirjaye
durnayam bhavatām adya samīkartum mahā āhave
evam uktavataḥ vākyam kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ
pratyuvāca tatas vākyam prahasan rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.053.010a mahodaro 'yaṃ rāmāt tu paritrasto na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mahodaraḥ yam rāmāt tu paritrastaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 6.053.010c na hi rocayate tāta yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
analyzed: na hi rocayate tāta yuddham yuddha viśārada

original: 6.053.011a kaś cin me tvatsamo nāsti sauhṛdena balena ca
analyzed: kaḥ cit me tvad samaḥ nā asti sauhṛdena balena ca
gaccha śatru vadhāya tvam kumbhakarṇa jayāya ca
ādade niśitam śūlam vegāt śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
sarva kālāyasam dīptam tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇam
indra aśani samam bhīmam vajra pratima gauravam
deva dānava gandharva yakṣa kiṃnara sūdanam
rakta mālya mahā dāma svatas ca udgata pāvakam
ādāya niśitam śūlam śatru śoṇita rañjitam
kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇam vākyam abravīt

original: 6.053.015a gamiṣyāmy aham ekākī tiṣṭhatv iha balaṃ mahat
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi aham ekākī tiṣṭhatu iha balam mahat

original: 6.053.015c adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddho bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān
analyzed: adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddhaḥ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān
kumbhakarṇa vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ gaccha śūla mudgala pāṇibhiḥ

original: 6.053.017a vānarā hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāś ca vyavasāyinaḥ
analyzed: vānarāḥ hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāḥ ca vyavasāyinaḥ

original: 6.053.017c ekākinaṃ pramattaṃ vā nayeyur daśanaiḥ kṣayam
analyzed: ekākinam pramattam vā nayeyuḥ daśanaiḥ kṣayam
tasmāt parama durdharṣaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ vraja
rakṣasām ahitam sarvam śatru pakṣam nisūdaya
atha āsanāt samutpatya srajam maṇi kṛta antarām
ābabandha mahā tejāḥ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ
aṅgadān aṅgulīveṣṭān varāṇi ābharaṇāni ca
hāram ca śaśi saṃkāśam ābabandha mahātmanaḥ
divyāni ca sugandhīni mālya dāmāni rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.053.021c śrotre cāsajjayām āsa śrīmatī cāsya kuṇḍale
analyzed: śrotre ca asajjayām āsa śrīmatī ca asya kuṇḍale
kāñcana aṅgada keyūraḥ niṣka ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
kumbha karṇaḥ bṛhat karṇaḥ su hutaḥ gniḥ iva ābabhau
śroṇī sūtreṇa mahatā mecakena virājitaḥ
amṛta utpādane naddhaḥ bhujaṃgena iva mandaraḥ
sa kāñcanam bhāra saham nivātam
vidyut prabham dīptam iva ātma bhāsā
ābadhyamānaḥ kavacam rarāja
saṃdhyā abhra saṃvītaḥ iva adrirājaḥ
sarva ābharaṇa naddha aṅgaḥ śūla pāṇiḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
trivikrama kṛta utsāhaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ iva ābabhau
bhrātaram saṃpariṣvajya kṛtvā ca api pradakṣiṇam
praṇamya śirasā tasmai saṃpratasthe mahā baliḥ

original: 6.053.026e tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ sainyaiḥ ca api vara āyudhaiḥ

original: 6.053.027c taṃ gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca syandanaiś cāmbudasvanaiḥ
analyzed: tam gajaiḥ ca turaṃgaiḥ ca syandanaiḥ ca ambuda svanaiḥ
anujagmuḥ mahātmānam rathinaḥ rathinām varam
sarpaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ kharaiḥ aśvaiḥ siṃha dvipa mṛga dvijaiḥ

original: 6.053.028c anujagmuś ca taṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: anujagmuḥ ca tam ghoram kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
sa puṣpa varṇaiḥ avakīryamāṇaḥ
dhṛta ātapatraḥ śita śūla pāṇiḥ
viniryayau dānava deva śatruḥ
padātayaḥ a bahavaḥ mahā nādāḥ mahā balāḥ
anvayuḥ rākṣasāḥ bhīmāḥ bhīma akṣāḥ śastra pāṇayaḥ
rakta akṣāḥ su mahā kāyāḥ nīlāñjana caya upamāḥ

original: 6.053.031c śūrān udyamya khaḍgāṃś ca niśitāṃś ca paraśvadhān
analyzed: śūrān udyamya khaḍgān ca niśitān ca paraśvadhān
bahu vyāmān ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān
tāla skandhān ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān
atha anyat vapuḥ ādāya dāruṇam loma harṣaṇam
niṣpapāta mahā tejāḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
dhanuḥ śata parīṇāhaḥ sa ṣaṣ śata samucchitaḥ
raudraḥ śakaṭa cakra akṣaḥ mahā parvata saṃnibhaḥ
saṃnipatya ca rakṣāṃsi dagdha śaila upamaḥ mahān
kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā vaktraḥ prahasan idam abravīt
adya vānara mukhyānām tāni yūthāni bhāgaśas
nirdahiṣyāmi saṃkruddhaḥ śalabhān iva pāvakaḥ
na aparādhyanti me kāmam vānarāḥ vana cāriṇaḥ
jātiḥ asmadvidhānām sā pura udyāna vibhūṣaṇam
pura rodhasya mūlam tu rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.053.038c hate tasmin hataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge
analyzed: hate tasmin hatam sarvam tam vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge
evam tasya bruvāṇasya kumbhakarṇasya rākṣasāḥ
nādam cakruḥ mahā ghoram kampayantaḥ iva arṇavam
tasya niṣpatataḥ tūrṇam kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ
babhūvuḥ ghora rūpāṇi nimittāni samantataḥ
ulkā aśani yutāḥ meghāḥ vineduḥ ca su dāruṇāḥ
sa sāgara vanā ca eva vasudhā samakampata
ghora rūpāḥ śivāḥ neduḥ sa jvāla kavalaiḥ mukhaiḥ
maṇḍalāni apasavyāni babandhuḥ ca vihaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.053.043a niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre 'sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ
analyzed: niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ

original: 6.053.043c prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyo bāhur akampata
analyzed: prāsphurat nayanam ca asya savyaḥ bāhuḥ akampata
niṣpapāta tadā ca uklā jvalantī bhīma nisvanā

original: 6.053.044c ādityo niṣprabhaś cāsīn na pravāti sukho 'nilaḥ
analyzed: ādityaḥ niṣprabhaḥ ca āsīt na pravāti sukhaḥ nilaḥ
acintayat mahā utpātān utthitān loma harṣaṇān
niryayau kumbhakarṇaḥ tu kṛtānta bala coditaḥ
sa laṅghayitvā prākāram padbhyām parvata saṃnibhaḥ
dadarśa abhra ghana prakhyam vānara anīkam adbhutam
te dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa śreṣṭham vānarāḥ parvata upamam

original: 6.053.047c vāyununnā iva ghanā yayuḥ sarvā diśas tadā
analyzed: vāyu nunnāḥ iva ghanāḥ yayuḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ tadā
tat vānara anīkam ati pracaṇḍam
diśaḥ dravat bhinnam iva abhra jālam
sa kumbhakarṇaḥ samavekṣya harṣān
nanāda bhūyas ghanavat ghana ābhaḥ
te tasya ghoram ninadam niśamya
yathā ninādam divi vāridasya
petuḥ dharaṇyām bahavaḥ plavaṃgā
nikṛtta mūlāḥ iva sāla vṛkṣāḥ
vipula parighavān sa kumbhakarṇaḥ
ripu nidhanāya viniḥsṛtaḥ mahātmā
kapi gaṇa bhayam ādadat su bhīmam
prabhuḥ iva kiṃkara daṇḍavān yugānte
sa nanāda mahā nādam samudram abhinādayan

original: 6.054.001c janayann iva nirghātān vidhamann iva parvatān
analyzed: janayan iva nirghātān vidhaman iva parvatān

original: 6.054.002a tam avadhyaṃ maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca
analyzed: tam avadhyam maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca
prekṣya bhīma akṣam āyāntam vānarāḥ vipradudruvuḥ
tān tu vidravataḥ dṛṣṭvā vāli putraḥ ṅgadaḥ bravīt

original: 6.054.003c nalaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca kumudaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: nalam nīlam gavākṣam ca kumudam ca mahā balam

original: 6.054.004a ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇy abhijanāni ca
analyzed: ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇi abhijanāni ca

original: 6.054.004c kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā harayo yathā
analyzed: kva gacchata bhaya trastāḥ prākṛtāḥ harayaḥ yathā

original: 6.054.005a sādhu saumyā nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
analyzed: sādhu saumyāḥ nivartadhvam kim prāṇān parirakṣatha

original: 6.054.005c nālaṃ yuddhāya vai rakṣo mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikāḥ
analyzed: na alam yuddhāya vai rakṣaḥ mahatī iyam vibhīṣikāḥ
mahatīm utthitām enām rākṣasānām vibhīṣikām
vikramāt vidhamiṣyāmaḥ nivartadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.054.007a kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tataḥ
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tatas
vṛkṣa adri hastāḥ harayaḥ saṃpratasthuḥ raṇa ajiram

original: 6.054.008a te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇam vanaukasaḥ
nijaghnuḥ parama kruddhāḥ sa madāḥ iva kuñjarāḥ

original: 6.054.008e prāṃśubhir giriśṛṅgaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: prāṃśubhiḥ giri śṛṅgaiḥ ca śilābhiḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: 6.054.009a pādapaiḥ puṣpitāgraiś ca hanyamāno na kampate
analyzed: pādapaiḥ puṣpita agraiḥ ca hanyamānaḥ na kampate

original: 6.054.009c tasya gātreṣu patitā bhidyante śataśaḥ śilāḥ
analyzed: tasya gātreṣu patitāḥ bhidyante śataśas śilāḥ

original: 6.054.009e pādapāḥ puṣpitāgrāś ca bhagnāḥ petur mahītale
analyzed: pādapāḥ puṣpita agrāḥ ca bhagnāḥ petuḥ mahī tale
saḥ pi sainyāni saṃkruddhaḥ vānarāṇām mahā ojasām
mamantha parama āyattaḥ vanāni agniḥ iva utthitaḥ
lohita ārdrāḥ tu bahavaḥ śerate vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.054.011c nirastāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ
analyzed: nirastāḥ patitāḥ bhūmau tāmra puṣpāḥ iva drumāḥ
laṅghayantaḥ pradhāvantaḥ vānarāḥ na avalokayan

original: 6.054.012c ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
analyzed: ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cit gaganam āśritāḥ

original: 6.054.013a vadhyamānās tu te vīrā rākṣasena balīyasā
analyzed: vadhyamānāḥ tu te vīrāḥ rākṣasena balīyasā

original: 6.054.013c sāgaraṃ yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tenaiva dudruvuḥ
analyzed: sāgaram yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tena eva dudruvuḥ

original: 6.054.014a te sthalāni tathā nimnaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanā bhayāt
analyzed: te sthalāni tathā nimnam viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ bhayāt

original: 6.054.014c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ

original: 6.054.015a mamajjur arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cit samāśritāḥ
analyzed: mamajjuḥ arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cid samāśritāḥ

original: 6.054.015c niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cin naivāvatasthire
analyzed: niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cit na eva avatasthire

original: 6.054.016a tān samīkṣyāṅgado bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt
analyzed: tān samīkṣya aṅgadaḥ bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt
avatiṣṭhata yudhyāmaḥ nivartadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.054.017a bhagnānāṃ vo na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām
analyzed: bhagnānām vaḥ na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām

original: 6.054.017c sthānaṃ sarve nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
analyzed: sthānam sarve nivartadhvam kim prāṇān parirakṣatha
nirāyudhānām dravatām asaṃga gati pauruṣāḥ

original: 6.054.018c dārā hy apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātas tu jīvitām
analyzed: dārāḥ hi apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātaḥ tu jīvitām

original: 6.054.019a kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca
analyzed: kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca

original: 6.054.019c anāryāḥ khalu yad bhītās tyaktvā vīryaṃ pradhāvata
analyzed: anāryāḥ khalu yat bhītāḥ tyaktvā vīryam pradhāvata

original: 6.054.020a vikatthanāni vo yāni yadā vai janasaṃsadi
analyzed: vikatthanāni vaḥ yāni yadā vai jana saṃsadi

original: 6.054.020c tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sodagrāṇi mahānti ca
analyzed: tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sa udagrāṇi mahānti ca

original: 6.054.021a bhīrupravādāḥ śrūyante yas tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhīru pravādāḥ śrūyante yaḥ tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ

original: 6.054.021c mārgaḥ satpuruṣair juṣṭaḥ sevyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ bhayam
analyzed: mārgaḥ sat puruṣaiḥ juṣṭaḥ sevyatām tyajyatām bhayam
śayāmahe vā nihatāḥ pṛthivyām alpa jīvitāḥ

original: 6.054.022c duṣprāpaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā prāpnumo yudhi sūditāḥ
analyzed: duṣprāpam brahma lokam vā prāpnumaḥ yudhi sūditāḥ

original: 6.054.022e saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtiṃ vā nihatya śatrum āhave
analyzed: saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtim vā nihatya śatrum āhave

original: 6.054.023a na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutsthaṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati
analyzed: na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutstham dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati
dīpyamānam iva āsādya pataṃgaḥ jvalanam yathā
palāyanena ca uddiṣṭāḥ prāṇān rakṣāmahe vayam

original: 6.054.024c ekena bahavo bhagnā yaśo nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: ekena bahavaḥ bhagnāḥ yaśaḥ nāśam gamiṣyati

original: 6.054.025a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śūram aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam tam śūram aṅgadam kanaka aṅgadam
dravamāṇāḥ tatas vākyam ūcuḥ śūra vigarhitam

original: 6.054.026a kṛtaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ kadanam ghoram kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā

original: 6.054.026c na sthānakālo gacchāmo dayitaṃ jīvitaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: na sthāna kālaḥ gacchāmaḥ dayitam jīvitam hi naḥ

original: 6.054.027a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ sarve te bhejire diśaḥ
analyzed: etāvat uktvā vacanam sarve te bhejire diśaḥ
bhīmam bhīma akṣam āyāntam dṛṣṭvā vānara yūthapāḥ

original: 6.054.028a dravamāṇās tu te vīrā aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ
analyzed: dravamāṇāḥ tu te vīrāḥ aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ

original: 6.054.028c sāntvaiś ca bahumānaiś ca tataḥ sarve nivartitāḥ
analyzed: sāntvaiḥ ca bahu mānaiḥ ca tatas sarve nivartitāḥ
ṛṣabha śarabha mainda dhūmra nīlāḥ
kumuda suṣeṇa gavākṣa rambha tārāḥ
dvivida panasa vāyuputra mukhyāḥ
tvaritatara abhimukham raṇam prayātāḥ
te nivṛttāḥ mahā kāyāḥ śrutvā aṅgada vacaḥ tadā
naiṣṭhikīm buddhim āsthāya sarve saṃgrāma kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
samudīrita vīryāḥ te samāropita vikramāḥ
paryavasthāpitāḥ vākyaiḥ aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ

original: 6.055.003a prayātāś ca gatā harṣaṃ maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ
analyzed: prayātāḥ ca gatāḥ harṣam maraṇe kṛta niścayāḥ
cakruḥ su tumulam yuddham vānarāḥ tyakta jīvitāḥ

original: 6.055.004a atha vṛkṣān mahākāyāḥ sānūni sumahānti ca
analyzed: atha vṛkṣān mahā kāyāḥ sānūni su mahānti ca
vānarāḥ tūrṇam udyamya kumbhakarṇam abhidravan

original: 6.055.005a sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddho gadām udyamya vīryavān
analyzed: sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ gadām udyamya vīryavān
ardayan su mahā kāyaḥ samantāt vyākṣipat ripūn

original: 6.055.006a śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: śatāni sapta ca aṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ
prakīrṇāḥ śerate bhūmau kumbhakarṇena pothitāḥ

original: 6.055.007a ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathaiva ca
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathā eva ca
parikṣipya ca bāhubhyām khādan viparidhāvati
bhakṣayan bhṛśa saṃkruddhaḥ garuḍaḥ pannagān iva

original: 6.055.008a hanūmāñ śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
analyzed: hanumān śaila śṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣān ca vividhān bahūn
vavarṣa kumbhakarṇasya śirasi ambaram āsthitaḥ

original: 6.055.009a tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha
analyzed: tāni parvata śṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha
babhañja vṛkṣa varṣam ca kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
tatas harīṇām tat anīkam ugram
dudrāva śūlam niśitam pragṛhya
tasthau sya a patataḥ purastān
mahīdhara agram hanumān pragṛhya
sa kumbhakarṇam kupitaḥ jaghāna
vegena śaila uttama bhīma kāyam
sa cukṣubhe tena tadā abhibūtaḥ
meda ārdra gātraḥ rudhira avasiktaḥ
sa śūlam āvidhya taḍit prakāśam
girim yathā prajvalita agra śṛṅgam
bāhu antare mārutim ājaghāna
guho calam krauñcam iva ugra śaktyā
sa śūla nirbhinna mahā bhujāntaraḥ
pravihvalaḥ śoṇitam udvaman mukhāt
nanāda bhīmam hanumān mahā āhave
yugānta megha stanita svana upamam
tatas vineduḥ sahasā prahṛṣṭā
rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ tam vyathitam samīkṣya
plavaṃgamāḥ tu vyathitāḥ bhaya ārtāḥ
pradudruvuḥ saṃyati kumbhakarṇāt
nīlaḥ cikṣepa śaila agram kumbhakarṇāya dhīmate
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya muṣṭinā abhijaghāna ha
muṣṭi prahāra abhihatam tat śaila agram vyaśīryata
sa visphuliṅgam sa jvālam nipapāta mahī tale
ṛṣabhaḥ śarabhaḥ nīlaḥ gavākṣaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
pañca vānara śārdūlāḥ kumbhakarṇam upādravan

original: 6.055.018a śailair vṛkṣais talaiḥ pādair muṣṭibhiś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: śailaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ talaiḥ pādaiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ ca mahā balāḥ
kumbhakarṇam mahā kāyam sarvatas bhinijaghnire

original: 6.055.019a sparśān iva prahārāṃs tān vedayāno na vivyathe
analyzed: sparśān iva prahārān tān vedayānaḥ na vivyathe
ṛṣabham tu mahā vegam bāhubhyām pariṣasvaje
kumbhakarṇa bhujābhyām tu pīḍitaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
nipapāta ṛṣabhaḥ bhīmaḥ pramukha āgata śoṇitaḥ

original: 6.055.021a muṣṭinā śarabhaṃ hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave
analyzed: muṣṭinā śarabham hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave
ājaghāna gavākṣam ca talena indra ripuḥ tadā
datta prahara vyathitāḥ mumuhuḥ śoṇita ukṣitāḥ

original: 6.055.022c nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ
analyzed: nipetuḥ te tu medinyām nikṛttāḥ iva kiṃśukāḥ
teṣu vānara mukhyeṣu patiteṣu mahātmasu
vānarāṇām sahasrāṇi kumbhakarṇam pradudruvuḥ

original: 6.055.024a taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tam śailam iva śaila ābhāḥ sarve tu plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
samāruhya samutpatya dadaṃśuḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: 6.055.025a taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā
analyzed: tam nakhaiḥ daśanaiḥ ca api muṣṭibhiḥ jānubhiḥ tathā
kumbhakarṇam mahā kāyam te jaghnuḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
sa vānara sahasraiḥ taiḥ ācitaḥ parvata upamaḥ
rarāja rākṣasa vyāghraḥ giriḥ ātmaruhaiḥ iva

original: 6.055.027a bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: bāhubhyām vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahā balaḥ

original: 6.055.027c bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva
analyzed: bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ garuḍaḥ pannagān iva
prakṣiptāḥ kumbhakarṇena vaktre pātāla saṃnibhe

original: 6.055.028c nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ
analyzed: nāsā puṭābhyām nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyām ca eva vānarāḥ
bhakṣayan bhṛśa saṃkruddhaḥ harīn parvata saṃnibhaḥ
babhañja vānarān sarvān saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasa uttamaḥ
māṃsa śoṇita saṃkledām bhūmim kurvan sa rākṣasaḥ
cacāra hari sainyeṣu kālāgniḥ iva mūrchitaḥ
vajra hastaḥ yathā śakraḥ pāśa hastaḥ iva antakaḥ
śūla hastaḥ babhau tasmin kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.055.032a yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ
analyzed: yathā śuṣkāṇi araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ
tathā vānara sainyāni kumbhakarṇaḥ vinirdahat

original: 6.055.033a tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ
analyzed: tatas te vadhyamānāḥ tu hata yūthāḥ vināyakāḥ
vānarāḥ bhaya saṃvignāḥ vineduḥ visvaram bhṛśam
anekaśas vadhyamānāḥ kumbhakarṇena vānarāḥ
rāghavam śaraṇam jagmuḥ vyathitāḥ khinna cetasaḥ
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
utpapāta tadā vīraḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ
sa parvata agram utkṣipya samāvidhya mahā kapiḥ
abhidudrāva vegena kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṃgamam
tasthau vivṛta sarva aṅgaḥ vānara indrasya saṃmukhaḥ
kapi śoṇita digdha aṅgam bhakṣayantam mahā kapīn

original: 6.055.038c kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kumbhakarṇam sthitam dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.055.039a pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: pātitāḥ ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtam karma su duṣkaram

original: 6.055.039c bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptam te paramam yaśaḥ

original: 6.055.040a tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: tyaja tat vānara anīkam prākṛtaiḥ kim kariṣyasi
sahasva ekam nipātam me parvatasya asya rākṣasa
tat vākyam hari rājasya sattva dhairya samanvitam
śrutvā rākṣasa śārdūlaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ bravīt vacaḥ
prajāpateḥ tu pautraḥ tvam tathā eva ṛkṣarajaḥ sutaḥ
śruta pauruṣa saṃpannaḥ tasmāt garjasi vānara
sa kumbhakarṇasya vacaḥ niśamya
vyāvidhya śailam sahasā mumoca
tena ājaghāna urasi kumbhakarṇam
śailena vajra aśani saṃnibhena
tat śaila śṛṅgam sahasā vikīrṇam
bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle
tatas viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā
rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ ca api mudā vineduḥ
sa śaila śṛṅga abhihataḥ cukopa
nanāda kopāt ca vivṛtya vaktram
vyāvidhya śūlam ca taḍit prakāśam
cikṣepa hari ṛkṣa pateḥ vadhāya
tat kumbhakarṇasya bhuja praviddham
śūlam śitam kāñcana dāma juṣṭam
kṣipram samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyām
babhañja vegena sutaḥ nilasya
kṛtam bhāra sahasrasya śūlam kālāyasam mahat
babhañja janaum āropya prahṛṣṭaḥ plavaga ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 6.055.048a sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ;
analyzed: sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlam
cukopa rakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ mahātmā
utpāṭya laṅkā malayāt sa śṛṅgam
jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena
sa śaila śṛṅga abhihataḥ visaṃjñaḥ
papāta bhūmau yudhi vānara indraḥ
tam prekṣya bhūmau patitam visaṃjñam
neduḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ yudhi yātudhānāḥ
tam abhyupetya adbhuta ghora vīryam
sa kumbhakarṇaḥ yudhi vānara indram
jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya
yathā anilaḥ megham ati pracaṇḍaḥ
sa tam mahā megha nikāśa rūpam
utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
rarāja meru pratimāna rūpaḥ
meruḥ yathā ati ucchrita ghora śṛṅgaḥ
tatas samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ
saṃstūyamānaḥ yudhi rākṣasa indraiḥ
śṛṇvan ninādam tridaśālayānām
plavaṃga rāja graha vismitānām

original: 6.055.053a tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene;
analyzed: tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene
hari indram indra upamam indra vīryaḥ

original: 6.055.053c asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt;
analyzed: asmin hṛte sarvam idam hṛtam syāt
sa rāghavam sainyam iti indraśatruḥ

original: 6.055.054a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
analyzed: vidrutām vāhinīm dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇām tatas tatas
kumbhakarṇena sugrīvam gṛhītam ca api vānaram
hanūmān cintayām āsa matimān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.055.055c evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
analyzed: evam gṛhīte sugrīve kim kartavyam mayā bhavet

original: 6.055.056a yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā
analyzed: yat vai nyāyyam mayā kartum tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā
bhūtvā parvata saṃkāśaḥ nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasam
mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe
mahā bale muṣṭi viśīrṇa dehe
vimocite vānara pārthive ca
bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ

original: 6.055.058a atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ
analyzed: atha vā svayam api eṣa mokṣam prāpsyati pārthivaḥ
gṛhītaḥ yam yadi bhavet tridaśaiḥ sa asura uragaiḥ

original: 6.055.059a manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ
analyzed: manye na tāvat ātmānam budhyate vānara adhipaḥ
śaila prahāra abhihataḥ kumbhakarṇena saṃyuge
ayam muhūrtāt sugrīvaḥ labdha saṃjñaḥ mahā āhave

original: 6.055.060c ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vānarāṇām ca yat pathyam tat kariṣyati
mayā tu mokṣitasya asya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.055.061c aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ
analyzed: a prītaḥ ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrti nāśaḥ ca śāśvataḥ

original: 6.055.062a tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ
analyzed: tasmāt muhūrtam kāṅkṣiṣye vikramam pārthivasya naḥ

original: 6.055.062c bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham
analyzed: bhinnam ca vānara anīkam tāvat āśvāsayāmi aham

original: 6.055.063a ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: iti evam cintayitvā tu hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
bhūyas saṃstambhayām āsa vānarāṇām mahā camūm
sa kumbhakarṇaḥ viveśa laṅkām
sphurantam ādāya mahā harim tam
vimāna caryā gṛha gopura sthaiḥ
puṣpa agrya varṣaiḥ avakīryamāṇaḥ
tatas sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrāt
balīyasaḥ tasya bhujāntara sthaḥ
avekṣamāṇaḥ pura rājamārgam
vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā
evam gṛhītena katham nu nāma
śakyam mayā saṃprati kartum adya
tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇām
bhaviṣyati iṣṭam ca hitam ca kāryam
tatas kara agraiḥ sahasā sametya
rājā harīṇām amara indra śatroḥ

original: 6.055.067c nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ;
analyzed: nakhaiḥ ca karṇau daśanaiḥ ca nāsām
dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca kumbhakarṇam
sa kumbha karṇau hṛta karṇa nāsaḥ
vidāritaḥ tena vimarditaḥ ca
roṣa abhibhūtaḥ kṣataja ārdra gātraḥ
sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau
sa bhū tale bhīma bala abhipiṣṭaḥ
surāribhiḥ taiḥ abhihanyamānaḥ
jagāma kham vegavat abhyupetya
punar ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
karṇa nāsāḥ vihīnasya kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
rarāja śoṇita utsiktaḥ giriḥ prasravaṇaiḥ iva
tatas sa puryāḥ sahasā mahātmā
niṣkramya tat vānara sainyam ugram
babhakṣa rakṣaḥ yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
prajāḥ yuga anta agniḥ iva pradīptaḥ
bubhukṣitaḥ śoṇita māṃsa gṛdhnuḥ
praviśya tat vānara sainyam ugram
cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān
ṛkṣān ca mohāt yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ

original: 6.055.073a ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: ekam dvau trīn bahūn kruddhaḥ vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ
samādāya eka hastena pracikṣepa tvaran mukhe

original: 6.055.074a saṃprasravaṃs tadā medaḥ śoṇitaṃ ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: saṃprasravan tadā medaḥ śoṇitam ca mahā balaḥ
vadhyamānaḥ naga indra agraiḥ bhakṣayām āsa vānarān

original: 6.055.074e te bhakṣyamāṇā harayo rāmaṃ jagmus tadā gatim
analyzed: te bhakṣyamāṇāḥ harayaḥ rāmam jagmuḥ tadā gatim
tasmin kāle sumitrāyāḥ putraḥ para bala ardanaḥ
cakāra lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ yuddham para puraṃjayaḥ

original: 6.055.076a sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān
analyzed: sa kumbhakarṇasya śarām śarīre sapta vīryavān
nicakhāna ādade ca anyān visasarja ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
atikramya ca saumitrim kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ
rāmam eva abhidudrāva dārayan iva medinīm

original: 6.055.078a atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan
analyzed: atha dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ raudram astram prayojayan
kumbhakarṇasya hṛdaye sasarja niśitām śarān
tasya rāmeṇa viddhasya sahasā abhipradhāvataḥ
aṅgāra miśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhāt niśceruḥ arciṣaḥ
tasya urasi nimagnāḥ ca śarāḥ barhiṇa vāsasaḥ
hastāt ca asya paribhraṣṭā papāta urvyām mahā gadā

original: 6.055.081a sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa nirāyudham ātmānam yadā mene mahā balaḥ

original: 6.055.081c muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
analyzed: muṣṭibhyām ca araṇābhyām ca cakāra kadanam mahat
sa bāṇaiḥ atividdha aṅgaḥ kṣatajena samukṣitaḥ
rudhiram parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇān iva

original: 6.055.083a sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ
analyzed: sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ
vānarān rākṣasān ṛkṣān khādan viparidhāvati

original: 6.055.084a tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
analyzed: tasmin kāle sa dharma ātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ rāmam abravīt
kumbhakarṇa vadhe yuktaḥ yogān parimṛśan bahūn

original: 6.055.085a naivāyaṃ vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān
analyzed: na eva ayam vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān

original: 6.055.085c mattaḥ śoṇitagandhena svān parāṃś caiva khādati
analyzed: mattaḥ śoṇita gandhena svān parān ca eva khādati
sādhu enam adhirohantu sarvatas vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.055.086c yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ
analyzed: yūthapāḥ ca yathāmukhyāḥ tiṣṭhantu asya samantataḥ
api ayam durmatiḥ kāle guru bhāra prapīḍitaḥ

original: 6.055.087c prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān
analyzed: prapatan rākṣasaḥ bhūmau na anyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāja putrasya dhīmataḥ
te samāruruhuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ kumbhakarṇam plavaṃgamāḥ
kumbhakarṇaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ samārūḍhaḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
vyadhūnayat tān vegena duṣṭa hastī iva hastipān

original: 6.055.090a tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmo ruṣṭo 'yam iti rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmaḥ ruṣṭaḥ yam iti rākṣasaḥ
samutpapāta vegena dhanuḥ uttamam ādade
sa cāpam ādāya bhujaṃga kalpam
dṛḍha jyam ugram tapanīya citram
harīn samāśvāsya samutpapāta
rāmaḥ nibaddha uttama tūṇa bāṇaḥ

original: 6.055.092a sa vānaragaṇais tais tu vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ
analyzed: sa vānara gaṇaiḥ taiḥ tu vṛtaḥ parama durjayaḥ
lakṣmaṇa anucaraḥ rāmaḥ saṃpratasthe mahā balaḥ
sa dadarśa mahātmānam kirīṭinam ariṃdamam
śoṇita āpluta sarva aṅgam kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
sarvān samabhidhāvantam yathā aruṣṭam diśā gajam
mārgamāṇam harīn kruddham rākṣasaiḥ parivāritam
vindhya mandara saṃkāśam kāñcana aṅgada bhūṣaṇam
sravantam rudhiram vaktrāt varṣa megham iva utthitam
jihvayā parilihyantam śoṇitam śoṇita ukṣitam
mṛdnantam vānara anīkam kāla antaka yama upamam
tam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa śreṣṭham pradīpta anala varcasam
visphārayām āsa tadā kārmukam puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
sa tasya cāpa nirghoṣāt kupitaḥ nairṛta ṛṣabhaḥ
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ tam ghoṣam abhidudrāva rāghavam
tatas tu vāta uddhata megha kalpam
bhujaṃga rāja uttama bhoga bāhum
tam āpatantam dharaṇīdhara ābham
uvāca rāmaḥ yudhi kumbhakarṇam
āgaccha rakṣaḥ dhi pamā viṣādam
avasthitaḥ ham pragṛhīta cāpaḥ
avehi mām śakra sapatna rāmam
ayam muhūrtāt bhavitā vicetāḥ
rāmaḥ yam iti vijñāya jahāsa vikṛta svanam
pātayan iva sarveṣām hṛdayāni vanaukasām
prahasya vikṛtam bhīmam sa megha svanita upamam
kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāghavam vākyam abravīt

original: 6.055.103a nāhaṃ virādho vijñeyo na kabandhaḥ kharo na ca
analyzed: na aham virādhaḥ vijñeyaḥ na kabandhaḥ kharaḥ na ca

original: 6.055.103c na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'ham āgataḥ
analyzed: na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ham āgataḥ

original: 6.055.104a paśya me mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat
analyzed: paśya me mudgaram ghoram sarva kālāyasam mahat

original: 6.055.104c anena nirjitā devā dānavāś ca mayā purā
analyzed: anena nirjitāḥ devāḥ dānavāḥ ca mayā purā

original: 6.055.105a vikarṇanāsa iti māṃ nāvajñātuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: vikarṇa nāsaḥ iti mām na avajñātum tvam arhasi

original: 6.055.105c svalpāpi hi na me pīḍā karṇanāsāvināśanāt
analyzed: su alpā api hi na me pīḍā karṇa nāsā vināśanāt
darśaya ikṣvāku śārdūla vīryam gātreṣu me laghu
tatas tvām bhakṣayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭa pauruṣa vikramam
sa kumbhakarṇasya vacaḥ niśamya
rāmaḥ su puṅkhān visasarja bāṇān
taiḥ āhataḥ vajra sama pravegaiḥ
na cukṣubhe na vyathate surāriḥ
yaiḥ sāyakaiḥ sāla varā nikṛttā
vālī hataḥ vānara puṃgavaḥ ca
te kumbhakarṇasya tadā śarīram
vajra upamāḥ na vyathayām pracakruḥ
sa vāri dhārāḥ iva sāyakān tān
pibam śarīreṇa mahā indra śatruḥ
jaghāna rāmasya śara pravegam
vyāvidhya tam mudgaram ugra vegam
tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣataja anuliptam
vitrāsanam deva mahā camūnām
vyāvidhya tam mudgaram ugra vegam
vidrāvayām āsa camūm harīṇām
vāyavyam ādāya tatas vara astram
rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya
sa mudgaram tena jahāra bāhum
sa kṛtta bāhuḥ tumulam nanāda
sa tasya bāhuḥ giri śṛṅga kalpaḥ
sa mudgaraḥ rāghava bāṇa kṛttaḥ
papāta tasmin hari rāja sainye
jaghāna tām vānara vāhinīm ca
te vānarāḥ bhagna hata avaśeṣāḥ
paryantam āśritya tadā viṣaṇṇāḥ
pravepita aṅgāḥ dadṛśuḥ su ghoram
narendra rakṣaḥ dhipa saṃnipātam
sa kumbhakarṇaḥ stra nikṛtta bāhuḥ
mahān nikṛtta agraḥ iva acala indraḥ
utpāṭayām āsa kareṇa vṛkṣam
tatas bhidudrāva raṇe narendram
tam tasya bāhum saha sāla vṛkṣam
samudyatam pannaga bhoga kalpam
aindra astra yuktena jahāra rāmaḥ
bāṇena jāmbūnada citritena
sa kumbhakarṇasya bhujaḥ nikṛttaḥ
papāta bhūmau giri saṃnikāśaḥ
viveṣṭamānaḥ nijaghāna vṛkṣān
śailām śilā vānara rākṣasān ca
tam chinna bāhum samavekṣya rāmaḥ
samāpatantam sahasā nadantam
dvau ardhacandrau niśitau pragṛhya
ciccheda pādau yudhi rākṣasasya
nikṛtta bāhuḥ vinikṛtta pādaḥ
vidārya vaktram vaḍavāmukha ābham
dudrāva rāmam sahasā abhigarjan
rāhuḥ yathā candram iva antarikṣe
apūrayat tasya mukham śita agraiḥ
rāmaḥ śaraiḥ hema pinaddha puṅkhaiḥ
sa pūrṇa vaktraḥ na śaśāka vaktum
cukūja kṛcchreṇa mumoha ca api
atha ādade sūrya marīci kalpam
sa brahmadaṇḍa antaka kāla kalpam
ariṣṭam aindram niśitam su puṅkham
rāmaḥ śaram māruta tulya vegam
tam vajra jāmbūnada cāru puṅkham
pradīpta sūrya jvalana prakāśam
mahā indra vajra aśani tulya vegam
rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya
sa sāyakaḥ rāghava bāhu coditaḥ
diśaḥ sva bhāsā daśa saṃprakāśayan
vidhūma vaiśvānara dīpta darśanaḥ
jagāma śakra aśani tulya vikramaḥ
sa tat mahā parvata kūṭa saṃnibham
vivṛtta daṃṣṭram cala cāru kuṇḍalam
cakarta rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ śiraḥ tadā
yathā eva vṛtrasya purā puraṃdaraḥ
tat rāma bāṇa abhihatam papāta
rakṣaḥśiraḥ parvata saṃnikāśam
babhañja caryā gṛha gopurāṇi
prākāram uccam tam apātayat ca
tat ca atikāyam himavat prakāśam
rakṣaḥ tadā toyanidhau papāta
grāhān mahā mīna cayān bhujaṃgamān
mamarda bhūmim ca tathā viveśa
tasmin hate brāhmaṇa deva śatrau
mahā bale saṃyati kumbhakarṇe
cacāla bhūḥ bhūmidharāḥ ca sarve
harṣāt ca devāḥ tumulam praṇeduḥ
tatas tu deva ṛṣi mahā ṛṣi pannagāḥ
surāḥ ca bhūtāni suparṇa guhyakāḥ
sa yakṣa gandharva gaṇāḥ nabhaḥ gatāḥ
praharṣitā rāma parākrameṇa
praharṣam īyuḥ bahavaḥ tu vānarāḥ
prabuddha padma pratimaiḥ iva ānanaiḥ
apūjayan rāghavam iṣṭa bhāginam
hate ripau bhīma bale durāsade
sa kumbhakarṇam sura sainya mardanam
mahatsu yuddheṣu aparājita śramam
nananda hatvā bharatāgrajaḥ raṇe
mahā asuram vṛtram iva amara adhipaḥ
kumbhakarṇam hatam dṛṣṭvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
rākṣasāḥ rākṣasa indrāya rāvaṇāya nyavedayan
śrutvā vinihatam saṃkhye kumbhakarṇam mahā balam

original: 6.056.002c rāvaṇaḥ śokasaṃtapto mumoha ca papāta ca
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ śoka saṃtaptaḥ mumoha ca papāta ca
pitṛvyam nihatam śrutvā devāntaka narāntakau
triśirāḥ ca atikāyaḥ ca ruruduḥ śoka pīḍitāḥ
bhrātaram nihatam śrutvā rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā
mahodara mahāpārśvau śoka ākrāntau babhūvatuḥ
tatas kṛcchrāt samāsādya saṃjñām rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
kumbhakarṇa vadhāt dīnaḥ vilalāpa sa rāvaṇaḥ
hā vīra ripu darpa ghna kumbhakarṇa mahā bala

original: 6.056.006c śatrusainyaṃ pratāpyaikaḥ kva māṃ saṃtyajya gacchasi
analyzed: śatru sainyam pratāpya ekaḥ kva mām saṃtyajya gacchasi

original: 6.056.007a idānīṃ khalv ahaṃ nāsmi yasya me patito bhujaḥ
analyzed: idānīm khalu aham na asmi yasya me patitaḥ bhujaḥ

original: 6.056.007c dakṣiṇo yaṃ samāśritya na bibhemi surāsurān
analyzed: dakṣiṇaḥ yam samāśritya na bibhemi sura asurān
katham evaṃvidhaḥ vīraḥ deva dānava darpa hā

original: 6.056.008c kālāgnipratimo hy adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ
analyzed: kālāgni pratimaḥ hi adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ

original: 6.056.009a yasya te vajraniṣpeṣo na kuryād vyasanaṃ sadā
analyzed: yasya te vajra niṣpeṣaḥ na kuryāt vyasanam sadā
sa katham rāma bāṇa ārtaḥ prasuptaḥ si mahī tale

original: 6.056.010a ete devagaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhir gagane sthitāḥ
analyzed: ete deva gaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhiḥ gagane sthitāḥ

original: 6.056.010c nihataṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ
analyzed: nihatam tvām raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ
dhruvam adyā eva saṃhṛṣṭāḥ labdha lakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
ārokṣyanti iha durgāṇi laṅkā dvārāṇi sarvaśas

original: 6.056.012a rājyena nāsti me kāryaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi sītayā
analyzed: rājyena na asti me kāryam kim kariṣyāmi sītayā
kumbhakarṇa vihīnasya jīvite nā asti me ratiḥ

original: 6.056.013a yady ahaṃ bhrātṛhantāraṃ na hanmi yudhi rāghavam
analyzed: yadi aham bhrātṛ hantāram na hanmi yudhi rāghavam

original: 6.056.013c nanu me maraṇaṃ śreyo na cedaṃ vyarthajīvitam
analyzed: nanu me maraṇam śreyaḥ na ca idam vyartha jīvitam

original: 6.056.014a adyaiva taṃ gamiṣyāmi deśaṃ yatrānujo mama
analyzed: adyā eva tam gamiṣyāmi deśam yatra anujaḥ mama

original: 6.056.014c na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇaṃ jīvitum utsahe
analyzed: na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇam jīvitum utsahe

original: 6.056.015a devā hi māṃ hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrvāpakāriṇam
analyzed: devāḥ hi mām hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrva apakāriṇam
katham indram jayiṣyāmi kumbhakarṇa hate tvayi

original: 6.056.016a tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śubham
analyzed: tat idam mām anuprāptam vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śubham

original: 6.056.016c yad ajñānān mayā tasya na gṛhītaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat ajñānāt mayā tasya na gṛhītam mahātmanaḥ
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ yāvat kumbhakarṇa prahastayoḥ
vināśaḥ yam samutpannaḥ mām vrīḍayati dāruṇaḥ

original: 6.056.018a tasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāto vipāko mama śokadaḥ
analyzed: tasya ayam karmaṇaḥ prātar vipākaḥ mama śoka daḥ

original: 6.056.018c yan mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirasto vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirastaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
iti bahuvidham ākula antarātmā
kṛpaṇam atīva vilapya kumbhakarṇam
nyapatat atha daśānanaḥ bhṛśa ārtaḥ
tam anujam indra ripum hatam viditvā
evam vilapamānasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
śrutvā śoka abhitaptasya triśirāḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.057.002a evam eva mahāvīryo hato nas tāta madhyamaḥ
analyzed: evam eva mahā vīryaḥ hataḥ naḥ tāta madhyamaḥ

original: 6.057.002c na tu satpuruṣā rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān
analyzed: na tu sat puruṣāḥ rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān

original: 6.057.003a nūnaṃ tribhuvaṇasyāpi paryāptas tvam asi prabho
analyzed: nūnam tribhuvaṇasya api paryāptaḥ tvam asi prabho

original: 6.057.003c sa kasmāt prākṛta iva śokasyātmānam īdṛśam
analyzed: sa kasmāt prākṛtaḥ iva śokasya ātmānam īdṛśam

original: 6.057.004a brahmadattāsti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyako dhanuḥ
analyzed: brahma dattā asti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyakaḥ dhanuḥ
sahasra khara saṃyuktaḥ rathaḥ megha sama svanaḥ
tvayā asakṛt viśastreṇa viśastāḥ deva dānavāḥ
sa sarva āyudha saṃpannaḥ rāghavam śāstum arhasi
kāmam tiṣṭha mahā rāja nirgamiṣyāmi aham raṇam

original: 6.057.006c uddhariṣyāmi te śatrūn garuḍaḥ pannagān iha
analyzed: uddhariṣyāmi te śatrūn garuḍaḥ pannagān iha
śambaraḥ devarājena narakaḥ viṣṇunā yathā

original: 6.057.007c tathādya śayitā rāmo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
analyzed: tathā adya śayitā rāmaḥ mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
śrutvā triśirasaḥ vākyam rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
punar jātam iva ātmānam manyate kāla coditaḥ
śrutvā triśirasaḥ vākyam devāntaka narāntakau
atikāyaḥ ca tejasvī babhūvuḥ yuddha harṣitāḥ

original: 6.057.010a tato 'ham aham ity evaṃ garjanto nairṛtarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tatas ham aham iti evam garjantaḥ nairṛta ṛṣabhāḥ
rāvaṇasya sutāḥ vīrāḥ śakra tulya parākramāḥ
antarikṣa carāḥ sarve sarve māyāḥ viśāradāḥ
sarve tridaśa darpa ghnāḥ sarve ca raṇa durmadāḥ
sarve stra bala saṃpannāḥ sarve kīrtayaḥ

original: 6.057.012c sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ
analyzed: sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ
sarve stra viduṣaḥ vīrāḥ sarve yuddha viśāradāḥ
sarve pravara jijñānāḥ sarve labdha varāḥ tathā
sa taiḥ tathā bhāskara tulya varcasaiḥ
sutaiḥ vṛtaḥ śatru bala pramardanaiḥ
rarāja rājā maghavān yathā amaraiḥ
vṛtaḥ mahā dānava darpa nāśanaiḥ

original: 6.057.015a sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: 6.057.015c āśīrbhiś ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: āśīrbhiḥ ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
mahodara mahāpārśvau bhrātarau ca api rāvaṇaḥ
rakṣaṇa artham kumārāṇām preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
te bhivādya mahātmānam rāvaṇam ripu rāvaṇam
kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam ca eva mahā kāyāḥ pratasthire
sarva oṣadhībhiḥ gandhaiḥ ca samālabhya mahā balāḥ
nirjagmuḥ nairṛta śreṣṭhāḥ ṣaṭ ete yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
tatas sudarśanam nāma nīla jīmūta saṃnibham
airāvata kule jātam āruroha mahodaraḥ
sarva āyudha samāyuktam tūṇībhiḥ ca su alaṃkṛtam
rarāja gajam āsthāya savitā iva asta mūrdhani
haya uttama samāyuktam sarva āyudha samākulam
āruroha ratha śreṣṭham triśirāḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
triśirāḥ ratham āsthāya virarāja dhanuḥ dharaḥ
sa vidyut ulkaḥ sa jvālaḥ sa indracāpaḥ iva ambudaḥ

original: 6.057.023a tribhiḥ kirīṭais triśirāḥ śuśubhe sa rathottame
analyzed: tribhiḥ kirīṭaiḥ tri śirāḥ śuśubhe sa ratha uttame
himavān iva śaila indraḥ tribhiḥ kāñcana parvataiḥ
atikāyaḥ pi tejasvī rākṣasa indra sutaḥ tadā
āruroha ratha śreṣṭham śreṣṭhaḥ sarva dhanuṣmatām
su cakra akṣam su saṃyuktam sa anukarṣam sa kūbaram
tūṇī bāṇāsanaiḥ dīptam parigha ākulam
sa kāñcana vicitreṇa kirīṭena virājatā

original: 6.057.026c bhūṣaṇaiś ca babhau meruḥ prabhābhir iva bhāsvaraḥ
analyzed: bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca babhau meruḥ prabhābhiḥ iva bhāsvaraḥ

original: 6.057.027a sa rarāja rathe tasmin rājasūnur mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa rarāja rathe tasmin rāja sūnuḥ mahā balaḥ
vṛtaḥ nairṛta śārdūlaiḥ vajrapāṇiḥ iva amaraiḥ
hayam uccaiḥśravaḥ prakhyam śvetam kanaka bhūṣaṇam
manojavam mahā kāyam āruroha narāntakaḥ
gṛhītvā prāsam virarāja narāntakaḥ

original: 6.057.029c śaktim ādāya tejasvī guhaḥ śatruṣv ivāhave
analyzed: śaktim ādāya tejasvī guhaḥ śatruṣu iva āhave
devāntakaḥ samādāya parigham vajra bhūṣaṇam

original: 6.057.030c parigṛhya giriṃ dorbhyāṃ vapur viṣṇor viḍambayan
analyzed: parigṛhya girim dorbhyām vapuḥ viṣṇoḥ viḍambayan
mahāpārśvaḥ mahā tejāḥ gadām ādāya vīryavān
virarāja gadā pāṇiḥ kuberaḥ iva saṃyuge

original: 6.057.032a te pratasthur mahātmāno balair apratimair vṛtāḥ
analyzed: te pratasthuḥ mahātmānaḥ balaiḥ apratimaiḥ vṛtāḥ
surāḥ iva amarāvatyām balaiḥ apratimaiḥ vṛtāḥ

original: 6.057.033a tān gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca rathaiś cāmbudanisvanaiḥ
analyzed: tān gajaiḥ ca turaṃgaiḥ ca rathaiḥ ca ambuda nisvanaiḥ
anujagmuḥ mahātmānaḥ rākṣasāḥ pravara āyudhāḥ
te virejuḥ mahātmānaḥ kumārāḥ sūrya varcasaḥ

original: 6.057.034c kirīṭinaḥ śriyā juṣṭā grahā dīptā ivāmbare
analyzed: kirīṭinaḥ śriyā juṣṭāḥ grahāḥ dīptāḥ iva ambare

original: 6.057.035a pragṛhītā babhau teṣāṃ chatrāṇām āvaliḥ sitā
analyzed: pragṛhītā babhau teṣām chatrāṇām āvaliḥ sitā
śārada abhra pratīkāśām haṃsa āvaliḥ iva ambare

original: 6.057.036a maraṇaṃ vāpi niścitya śatrūṇāṃ vā parājayam
analyzed: maraṇam vā api niścitya śatrūṇām vā parājayam

original: 6.057.036c iti kṛtvā matiṃ vīrā nirjagmuḥ saṃyugārthinaḥ
analyzed: iti kṛtvā matim vīrāḥ nirjagmuḥ saṃyuga arthinaḥ

original: 6.057.037a jagarjuś ca praṇeduś ca cikṣipuś cāpi sāyakān
analyzed: jagarjuḥ ca praṇeduḥ ca cikṣipuḥ ca api sāyakān
jahṛṣuḥ ca mahātmānaḥ niryāntaḥ yuddha durmadāḥ
kṣveḍita āsphoṭa ninadaiḥ saṃcacāla iva medinī
rakṣasām siṃhanādaiḥ ca pusphoṭa iva tadā ambaram
te bhiniṣkramya muditāḥ rākṣasa indrāḥ mahā balāḥ
dadṛśuḥ vānara anīkam samudyata śilā nagam
harayaḥ pi mahātmānaḥ dadṛśuḥ nairṛtam balam
hasti aśva ratha saṃbādham kiṅkiṇī śata nāditam
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśam samudyata mahā āyudham
dīpta anala ravi prakhyaiḥ nairṛtaiḥ sarvatas vṛtam

original: 6.057.042a tad dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntam labdha lakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
samudyata mahā śailāḥ saṃpraṇeduḥ muhur muhur
tatas samudghuṣṭa ravam niśamya
rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ vānara yūthapānām
a mṛṣyamāṇāḥ para harṣam ugram
mahā balāḥ bhīmataram vineduḥ
te rākṣasa balam ghoram praviśya hari yūthapāḥ

original: 6.057.044c vicerur udyataiḥ śailair nagāḥ śikhariṇo yathā
analyzed: viceruḥ udyataiḥ śailaiḥ nagāḥ śikhariṇaḥ yathā

original: 6.057.045a ke cid ākāśam āviśya ke cid urvyāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: ke cit ākāśam āviśya ke cit urvyām plavaṃgamāḥ
rakṣaḥ sainyeṣu saṃkruddhāḥ ceruḥ druma śilā āyudhāḥ
te pādapa śilā śailaiḥ cakruḥ vṛṣṭim anuttamām
bāṇa oghaiḥ vāryamāṇāḥ ca harayaḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
siṃhanādān vineduḥ ca raṇe rākṣasa vānarāḥ
śilābhiḥ cūrṇayām āsuḥ yātudhānān plavaṃgamāḥ
nijaghnuḥ saṃyuge kruddhāḥ kavaca ābharaṇa āvṛtān

original: 6.057.048c ke cid rathagatān vīrān gajavājigatān api
analyzed: ke cit ratha gatān vīrān gaja vāji gatān api
nijaghnuḥ sahasā āplutya yātudhānān plavaṃgamāḥ
śaila śṛṅga nipātaiḥ ca muṣṭibhiḥ vā anta locanāḥ

original: 6.057.049e celuḥ petuś ca neduś ca tatra rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ
analyzed: celuḥ petuḥ ca neduḥ ca tatra rākṣasa puṃgavāḥ

original: 6.057.050a tataḥ śailaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca visṛṣṭair harirākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: tatas śailaiḥ ca khaḍgaiḥ ca visṛṣṭaiḥ hari rākṣasaiḥ
muhūrtena āvṛtā bhūmiḥ abhavat śoṇita āplutā
vikīrṇa parvata ākāraiḥ rakṣobhiḥ ari mardanaiḥ

original: 6.057.051c ākṣiptāḥ kṣipyamāṇāś ca bhagnaśūlāś ca vānaraiḥ
analyzed: ākṣiptāḥ kṣipyamāṇāḥ ca bhagna śūlāḥ ca vānaraiḥ

original: 6.057.052a vānarān vānarair eva jagnus te rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: vānarān vānaraiḥ eva jagnuḥ te rajanīcarāḥ

original: 6.057.052c rākṣasān rākṣasair eva jaghnus te vānarā api
analyzed: rākṣasān rākṣasaiḥ eva jaghnuḥ te vānarāḥ api

original: 6.057.053a ākṣipya ca śilās teṣāṃ nijaghnū rākṣasā harīn
analyzed: ākṣipya ca śilāḥ teṣām nijaghnuḥ rākṣasāḥ harīn

original: 6.057.053c teṣāṃ cācchidya śastrāṇi jaghnū rakṣāṃsi vānarāḥ
analyzed: teṣām ca ācchidya śastrāṇi jaghnuḥ rakṣāṃsi vānarāḥ
nijaghnuḥ śaila śūla astraiḥ vibhiduḥ ca parasparam
siṃhanādān vineduḥ ca raṇe vānara rākṣasāḥ
chinna varma tanu trāṇāḥ rākṣasāḥ vānaraiḥ hatāḥ

original: 6.057.055c rudhiraṃ prasrutās tatra rasasāram iva drumāḥ
analyzed: rudhiram prasrutāḥ tatra rasa sāram iva drumāḥ

original: 6.057.056a rathena ca rathaṃ cāpi vāraṇena ca vāraṇam
analyzed: rathena ca ratham ca api vāraṇena ca vāraṇam

original: 6.057.056c hayena ca hayaṃ ke cin nijaghnur vānarā raṇe
analyzed: hayena ca hayam ke cit nijaghnuḥ vānarāḥ raṇe

original: 6.057.057a kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiś ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: kṣurapraiḥ ardhacandraiḥ ca bhallaiḥ ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
rākṣasāḥ vānara indrāṇām cicchiduḥ śilāḥ

original: 6.057.058a vikīrṇaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca drumaiś chinnaiś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: vikīrṇaiḥ parvata agraiḥ ca drumaiḥ chinnaiḥ ca saṃyuge
hataiḥ ca kapi rakṣobhiḥ durgamā vasudhā abhavat
tasmin pravṛtte tumule vimarde
prahṛṣyamāṇeṣu valī mukheṣu
nipātyamāneṣu ca rākṣaseṣu
mahā ṛṣayaḥ deva gaṇāḥ ca neduḥ
tatas hayam māruta tulya vegam
āruhya śaktim niśitām pragṛhya
narāntakaḥ vānara rāja sainyam
mahā arṇavam mīnaḥ iva āviveśa
sa vānarān saptaśatāni vīraḥ
prāsena dīptena vinirbibheda
ekaḥ kṣaṇena indra ripuḥ mahātmā
jaghāna sainyam hari puṃgavānām
dadṛśuḥ ca mahātmānam haya pṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitam
carantam hari sainyeṣu vidyādhara mahā ṛṣayaḥ
sa tasya dadṛśe mārgaḥ māṃsa śoṇita kardamaḥ
patitaiḥ parvata ākāraiḥ vānaraiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
yāvat vikramitum buddhim cakruḥ plavaga puṃgavāḥ
tāvat etān atikramya nirbibheda narāntakaḥ
jvalantam prāsam udyamya saṃgrāma ante narāntakaḥ
dadāha hari sainyāni vanāni iva vibhāvasuḥ

original: 6.057.066a yāvad utpāṭayām āsur vṛkṣāñ śailān vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: yāvat utpāṭayām āsuḥ śailān vanaukasaḥ
tāvat prāsa hatāḥ petuḥ vajra kṛttāḥ iva acalāḥ
dikṣu sarvāsu balavān vicacāra narāntakaḥ
pramṛdnan sarvatas yuddhe prāvṛṣ kāle yathā anilaḥ

original: 6.057.068a na śekur dhāvituṃ vīrā na sthātuṃ spandituṃ kutaḥ
analyzed: na śekuḥ dhāvitum vīrāḥ na sthātum spanditum kutas

original: 6.057.068c utpatantaṃ sthitaṃ yāntaṃ sarvān vivyādha vīryavān
analyzed: utpatantam sthitam yāntam sarvān vivyādha vīryavān
ekena antaka kalpena prāsena āditya tejasā
bhinnāni hari sainyāni nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
vajra niṣpeṣa sadṛśam prāsasya abhinipātanam

original: 6.057.070c na śekur vānarāḥ soḍhuṃ te vinedur mahāsvanam
analyzed: na śekuḥ vānarāḥ soḍhum te vineduḥ mahā svanam
patatām hari vīrāṇām rūpāṇi pracakāśire
vajra bhinna agra kūṭānām śailānām patatām iva

original: 6.057.072a ye tu pūrvaṃ mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇena pātitāḥ
analyzed: ye tu pūrvam mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇena pātitāḥ
te svasthāḥ vānara śreṣṭhāḥ sugrīvam upatasthire
viprekṣamāṇaḥ sugrīvaḥ dadarśa hari vāhinīm
narāntaka bhaya trastām vidravantīm itas tatas

original: 6.057.074a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dadarśa narāntakam
analyzed: vidrutām vāhinīm dṛṣṭvā sa dadarśa narāntakam
gṛhīta prāsam āyāntam haya pṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitam
athā uvāca mahā tejāḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ
kumāram aṅgadam vīram śakra tulya parākramam

original: 6.057.076a gacchainaṃ rākṣasaṃ vīra yo 'sau turagam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: gaccha enam rākṣasam vīra yaḥ sau turagam āsthitaḥ
kṣobhayantam hari balam kṣipram prāṇaiḥ viyojaya

original: 6.057.077a sa bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣpapātāṅgadas tadā
analyzed: sa bhartuḥ vacanam śrutvā niṣpapāta aṅgadaḥ tadā
anīkāt megha saṃkāśāt megha anīkāt iva aṃśumān
śaila saṃghāta saṃkāśaḥ harīṇām uttamaḥ ṅgadaḥ
rarāja aṅgada saṃnaddhaḥ sa dhātuḥ iva parvataḥ
nirāyudhaḥ mahā tejāḥ kevalam nakha daṃṣṭravān
narāntakam abhikramya vāli putraḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: 6.057.080a tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhir haribhis tvaṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: tiṣṭha kim prākṛtaiḥ ebhiḥ haribhiḥ tvam kariṣyasi
asmin vajra sama sparśe prāsam kṣipa mama urasi
aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā pracukrodha narāntakaḥ

original: 6.057.081c saṃdaśya daśanair oṣṭhaṃ niśvasya ca bhujaṃgavat
analyzed: saṃdaśya daśanaiḥ oṣṭham niśvasya ca bhujaṃga vat
sa prāsam āvidhya tadā aṅgadāya
samujjvalantam sahasā utsasarja
sa vāli putra urasi vajra kalpe
babhūva bhagnaḥ nyapatat ca bhūmau
tam prāsam ālokya tadā vibhagnam
suparṇa kṛtta uraga bhoga kalpam
talam samudyamya sa vāli putraḥ
turaṃgamasya abhijaghāna mūrdhni
nimagna pādaḥ sphuṭita akṣi
niṣkrānta jihvaḥ cala saṃnikāśaḥ
sa tasya vājī nipapāta bhūmau
tala prahāreṇa vikīrṇa mūrdhā
narāntakaḥ krodha vaśam jagāma
hatam turagam patitam nirīkṣya
sa muṣṭim udyamya mahā prabhāvaḥ
jaghāna śīrṣe yudhi vāli putram
atha aṅgadaḥ muṣṭi vibhinna mūrdhā
susrāva tīvram rudhiram bhṛśa uṣṇam
muhur vijajvāla mumoha ca api
saṃjñām samāsādya visiṣmiye ca
atha aṅgadaḥ vajra samāna vegam
saṃvartya muṣṭim giri śṛṅga kalpam
nipātayām āsa tadā mahātmā
narāntakasya urasi vāli putraḥ
sa muṣṭi niṣpiṣṭa vibhinna vakṣāḥ
jvālām vamam śoṇita digdha gātraḥ
narāntakaḥ bhūmi tale papāta
yathā acalaḥ vajra nipāta bhagnaḥ
atha antarikṣe tridaśa uttamānām
vanaukasām ca eva mahā praṇādaḥ
babhūva tasmin nihate gryavīre
narāntake vāli sutena saṃkhye
atha aṅgadaḥ rāma manaḥ praharṣaṇam
su duṣkaram tam kṛtavān hi vikramam
visiṣmiye saḥ u pi ativīrya vikramaḥ

original: punaś ca yuddhe sa babhūva harṣitaḥ
analyzed: punar ca yuddhe sa babhūva harṣitaḥ
narāntakam hatam dṛṣṭvā cukruśuḥ nairṛta ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.058.001c devāntakas trimūrdhā ca paulastyaś ca mahodaraḥ
analyzed: devāntakaḥ trimūrdhā ca paulastyaḥ ca mahodaraḥ
ārūḍhaḥ megha saṃkāśam vāraṇa indram mahodaraḥ
vāli putram mahā vīryam abhidudrāva vīryavān
bhrātṛ vyasana saṃtaptaḥ tadā devāntakaḥ balī
ādāya parigham dīptam aṅgadam samabhidravat
ratham āditya saṃkāśam yuktam parama vājibhiḥ
āsthāya triśirāḥ vīraḥ vāli putram atha abhyayāt
sa tribhiḥ deva darpa ghnaiḥ nairṛta indraiḥ abhidrutaḥ
vṛkṣam utpāṭayām āsa mahā viṭapam aṅgadaḥ
devāntakāya tam vīraḥ cikṣepa sahasā aṅgadaḥ
mahā vṛkṣam mahā śākham śakraḥ dīptam iva aśanim
triśirāḥ tam praciccheda śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ

original: 6.058.007c sa vṛkṣaṃ kṛttam ālokya utpapāta tato 'ṅgadaḥ
analyzed: sa vṛkṣam kṛttam ālokya utpapāta tatas ṅgadaḥ

original: 6.058.008a sa vavarṣa tato vṛkṣāñ śilāś ca kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: sa vavarṣa tatas vṛkṣām śilāḥ ca kapi kuñjaraḥ

original: 6.058.008c tān praciccheda saṃkruddhas triśirā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tān praciccheda saṃkruddhaḥ triśirāḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.058.009a parighāgreṇa tān vṛkṣān babhañja ca surāntakaḥ
analyzed: parigha agreṇa tān vṛkṣān babhañja ca sura antakaḥ
triśirāḥ ca aṅgadam vīram abhidudrāva sāyakaiḥ
gajena samabhidrutya vāli putram mahodaraḥ
jaghāna urasi saṃkruddhaḥ tomaraiḥ vajra saṃnibhaiḥ
devāntakaḥ ca saṃkruddhaḥ parigheṇa tadā aṅgadam
upagamya abhihatya āśu vyapacakrāma vegavān
sa tribhiḥ nairṛta śreṣṭhaiḥ yugapad samabhidrutaḥ
na vivyathe mahā tejāḥ vāli putraḥ pratāpavān
talena bhṛśam utpatya jaghāna asya mahā gajam

original: 6.058.013c petatur locane tasya vinanāda sa vāraṇaḥ
analyzed: petatuḥ locane tasya vinanāda sa vāraṇaḥ
viṣāṇam ca asya niṣkṛṣya vāli putraḥ mahā balaḥ
devāntakam abhidrutya tāḍayām āsa saṃyuge
sa vihvalita sarva aṅgaḥ vāta uddhataḥ iva drumaḥ
lākṣā rasa savarṇam ca susrāva rudhiram mukhāt
athā āśvāsya mahā tejāḥ kṛcchrāt devāntakaḥ balī
āvidhya parigham ghoram ājaghāna tadā aṅgadam
parigha abhihataḥ ca api vānara indra ātmajaḥ tadā

original: 6.058.017c jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau punar evotpapāta ha
analyzed: jānubhyām patitaḥ bhūmau punar eva utpapāta ha
samutpatantam triśirāḥ tribhiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
ghoraiḥ hari pateḥ putram lalāṭe bhijaghāna ha
tatas ṅgadam parikṣiptam tribhiḥ nairṛta puṃgavaiḥ

original: 6.058.019c hanūmān api vijñāya nīlaś cāpi pratasthatuḥ
analyzed: hanūmān api vijñāya nīlaḥ ca api pratasthatuḥ

original: 6.058.020a tataś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ nīlas triśirase tadā
analyzed: tatas cikṣepa śaila agram nīlaḥ triśirase tadā

original: 6.058.020c tad rāvaṇasuto dhīmān bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tat rāvaṇa sutaḥ dhīmān bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tat bāṇa śata nirbhinnam vidārita śilā talam
sa visphuliṅgam sa jvālam nipapāta gireḥ śiraḥ

original: 6.058.022a tato jṛmbhitam ālokya harṣād devāntakas tadā
analyzed: tatas jṛmbhitam ālokya harṣāt devāntakaḥ tadā
parigheṇa abhidudrāva mārutātmajam āhave
tam āpatantam utpatya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
ājaghāna tadā mūrdhni vajra vegena muṣṭinā
sa muṣṭi niṣpiṣṭa vikīrṇa mūrdhā
nirvānta danta akṣi vilambi jihvaḥ
gatāsuḥ urvyām sahasā papāta
tasmin hate rākṣasa yodha mukhye
mahā bale saṃyati devaśatrau
kruddhaḥ trimūrdhā niśita agram ugram
vavarṣa nīla urasi bāṇa varṣam
sa taiḥ śara oghaiḥ abhivarṣyamāṇaḥ
vibhinna gātraḥ kapi sainya pālaḥ
nīlaḥ babhūva atha visṛṣṭa gātraḥ
viṣṭambhitaḥ tena mahā balena
tatas tu nīlaḥ pratilabhya saṃjñām
śailam samutpāṭya sa vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍam
tatas samutpatya bhṛśa ugra vegaḥ
mahodaram tena jaghāna mūrdhni
tatas sa śaila abhinipāta bhagnaḥ
mahodaraḥ tena saha dvipena
vipothitaḥ bhūmi tale gatāsuḥ
papāta varja abhihataḥ yathā adriḥ

original: 6.058.029a pitṛvyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā triśirāś cāpam ādade
analyzed: pitṛvyam nihatam dṛṣṭvā triśirāḥ cāpam ādade

original: 6.058.029c hanūmantaṃ ca saṃkruddho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: hanūmantam ca saṃkruddhaḥ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.058.030a hanūmāṃs tu samutpatya hayāṃs triśirasas tadā
analyzed: hanūmān tu samutpatya hayān triśirasaḥ tadā

original: 6.058.030c vidadāra nakhaiḥ kruddho gajendraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva
analyzed: vidadāra nakhaiḥ kruddhaḥ gaja indram mṛgarāj iva
atha śaktim samādāya kālarātrim iva antakaḥ
cikṣepa anilaputrāya triśirāḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.058.032a divi kṣiptām ivolkāṃ tāṃ śaktiṃ kṣiptām asaṃgatām
analyzed: divi kṣiptām iva ulkām tām śaktim kṣiptām asaṃgatām

original: 6.058.032c gṛhītvā hariśārdūlo babhañja ca nanāda ca
analyzed: gṛhītvā hari śārdūlaḥ babhañja ca nanāda ca

original: 6.058.033a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorasaṃkāśāṃ śaktiṃ bhagnāṃ hanūmatā
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā ghora saṃkāśām śaktim bhagnām hanūmatā
prahṛṣṭāḥ vānara gaṇāḥ vineduḥ jaladāḥ iva
tatas khaḍgam samudyamya triśirāḥ rākṣasa uttamaḥ
nicakhāna tadā roṣāt vānara indrasya vakṣasi
khaḍga prahāra abhihataḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
ājaghāna trimūrdhānam talena urasi vīryavān
sa tala bhihataḥ tena srasta hasta ambaraḥ bhuvi
nipapāta mahā tejāḥ triśirāḥ tyakta cetanaḥ

original: 6.058.037a sa tasya patataḥ khaḍgaṃ samācchidya mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa tasya patataḥ khaḍgam samācchidya mahā kapiḥ
nanāda giri saṃkāśaḥ trāsayan sarva nairṛtān
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ tam ghoṣam utpapāta niśācaraḥ

original: 6.058.038c utpatya ca hanūmantaṃ tāḍayām āsa muṣṭinā
analyzed: utpatya ca hanūmantam tāḍayām āsa muṣṭinā
tena muṣṭi prahāreṇa saṃcukopa mahā kapiḥ
kupitaḥ ca nijagrāha kirīṭe rākṣasa ṛṣabham
sa tasya śīrṣāṇi asinā śitena
kirīṭa juṣṭāni sa kuṇḍalāni
kruddhaḥ praciccheda sutaḥ nilasya
tvaṣṭuḥ sutasya iva śirāṃsi śakraḥ
tāni āyata akṣāṇi aga saṃnibhāni
pradīpta vaiśvānara locanāni
petuḥ śirāṃsi indra ripoḥ dharaṇyām
jyotīṃṣi muktāni yathā arka mārgāt
tasmin hate deva ripau triśīrṣe
hanūmata śakra parākrameṇa
neduḥ plavaṃgāḥ pracacāla bhūmī
rakṣāṃsi atha u dudruvire samantāt

original: 6.058.043a hataṃ triśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca mahodaram
analyzed: hatam triśirasam dṛṣṭvā tathā eva ca mahodaram
hatau prekṣya durādharṣau devāntaka narāntakau
cukopa parama amarṣī mahāpārśvaḥ mahā balaḥ
jagrāha arciṣmatīm ca api gadām sarva āyasīm śubhām
hema paṭṭa parikṣiptām māṃsa śoṇita lepanām
virājamānām vapuṣā śatru śoṇita rañjitām
tejasā saṃpradīpta agrām rakta mālya vibhūṣitām
airāvata mahāpadma sārvabhauma bhaya āvahām
gadām ādāya saṃkruddhaḥ mahāpārśvaḥ mahā balaḥ
harīn samabhidudrāva yugānta agniḥ iva jvalan
atha ṛṣayaḥ samutpatya vānaraḥ ravaṇānujam
mahāpārśvam upāgamya tasthau tasya agratas balī

original: 6.058.049a taṃ purastāt sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānaraṃ parvatopamam
analyzed: tam purastāt sthitam dṛṣṭvā vānaram parvata upamam
ājaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ gadayā vajra kalpayā
sa tayā abhihataḥ tena gadayā vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
bhinna vakṣāḥ samādhūtaḥ susrāva rudhiram bahu

original: 6.058.051a sa saṃprāpya cirāt saṃjñām ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa saṃprāpya cirāt saṃjñām ṛṣabhaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
kruddhaḥ visphuramāṇa oṣṭhaḥ mahāpārśvam udaikṣata

original: 6.058.052a tāṃ gṛhītvā gadāṃ bhīmām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tām gṛhītvā gadām bhīmām āvidhya ca punar punar
matta anīkam mahāpārśvam jaghāna raṇa mūrdhani
sa svayā gadayā bhinnaḥ vikīrṇa daśana īkṣaṇaḥ
nipapāta mahāpārśvaḥ vajra āhataḥ iva acalaḥ
tasmin hate bhrātari rāvaṇasya
tat nairṛtānām balam arṇava ābham
tyakta āyudham kevala jīvita artham
dudrāva bhinna arṇava saṃnikāśam
sva balam vyathitam dṛṣṭvā tumulam loma harṣaṇam
bhrātṝn ca nihatān dṛṣṭvā śakra tulya parākramān
pitṛvyau ca api saṃdṛśya samare saṃniṣūditau
mahodara mahāpārśvau bhrātarau rākṣasa ṛṣabhau
cukopa ca mahā tejāḥ brahmadatta varaḥ yudhi
atikāyaḥ dri saṃkāśaḥ deva dānava darpa hā
sa bhāskara sahasrasya saṃghātam iva bhāsvaram
ratham āsthāya śakra ariḥ abhidudrāva vānarān

original: 6.059.005a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirīṭī mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaḥ
analyzed: sa visphārya mahat cāpam kirīṭī mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalaḥ

original: 6.059.005c nāma viśrāvayām āsa nanāda ca mahāsvanam
analyzed: nāma viśrāvayām āsa nanāda ca mahā svanam
tena siṃhapraṇādena nāma viśrāvaṇena ca

original: 6.059.006c jyāśabdena ca bhīmena trāsayām āsa vānarān
analyzed: jyā śabdena ca bhīmena trāsayām āsa vānarān

original: 6.059.007a te tasya rūpam ālokya yathā viṣṇos trivikrame
analyzed: te tasya rūpam ālokya yathā viṣṇoḥ trivikrame

original: 6.059.007c bhayārtā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti diśo daśa
analyzed: bhaya ārtāḥ vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti diśaḥ daśa
te tikāyam samāsādya vānarāḥ mūḍha cetasaḥ
śaraṇyam śaraṇam jagmuḥ lakṣmaṇa agrajam āhave
tatas tikāyam kākutsthaḥ ratha stham parvata upamam
dadarśa dhanvinam dūrāt garjantam kāla megha vat

original: 6.059.010a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ rāghavas tu suvismitaḥ
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā mahātmānam rāghavaḥ tu su vismitaḥ

original: 6.059.010c vānarān sāntvayitvā tu vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
analyzed: vānarān sāntvayitvā tu vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
kaḥ sau parvata saṃkāśaḥ dhanuṣmān hari locanaḥ
yukte haya sahasreṇa viśāle syandane sthitaḥ

original: 6.059.012a ya eṣa niśitaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa niśitaiḥ śūlaiḥ su tīkṣṇaiḥ prāsa tomaraiḥ

original: 6.059.012c arciṣmadbhir vṛto bhāti bhūtair iva maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: arciṣmadbhiḥ vṛtaḥ bhāti bhūtaiḥ iva maheśvaraḥ
kāla jihvā prakāśābhiḥ yaḥ eṣaḥ abhivirājate
āvṛtaḥ ratha śaktībhiḥ vidyudbhiḥ iva toyadaḥ
dhanūṃsi ca asya sajyāni hema pṛṣṭhāni sarvaśas
śobhayanti ratha śreṣṭham śakra pātam iva ambaram

original: 6.059.015a ka eṣa rakṣaḥ śārdūlo raṇabhūmiṃ virājayan
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa rakṣaḥ śārdūlaḥ raṇa bhūmim virājayan
abhyeti rathinām śreṣṭhaḥ rathena āditya tejasā
dhvaja śṛṅga pratiṣṭhena rāhuṇā abhivirājate
sūrya raśmi prabhaiḥ bāṇaiḥ diśaḥ daśa virājayan
triṇatam megha nirhrādam hema pṛṣṭham alaṃkṛtam
śatakratu dhanuḥ prakhyam dhanuḥ ca asya virājate
sa dhvajaḥ sa patākaḥ ca sa anukarṣaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 6.059.019a viṃśatir daśa cāṣṭau ca tūṇīraratham āsthitāḥ
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ daśa ca aṣṭau ca tūṇīra ratham āsthitāḥ

original: 6.059.019c kārmukāṇi ca bhīmāni jyāś ca kāñcanapiṅgalāḥ
analyzed: kārmukāṇi ca bhīmāni jyāḥ ca kāñcana piṅgalāḥ

original: 6.059.020a dvau ca khaḍgau rathagatau pārśvasthau pārśvaśobhinau
analyzed: dvau ca khaḍgau ratha gatau pārśva sthau pārśva śobhinau
catur hasta tsaru citau vyakta hasta daśa āyatau
rakta kaṇṭha guṇaḥ dhīraḥ mahā parvata saṃnibhaḥ
kālaḥ kāla mahā vaktraḥ megha sthaḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
kāñcana aṅgada naddhābhyām bhujābhyām eṣa śobhate
śṛṅgābhyām iva tuṅgābhyām himavān parvata uttamaḥ

original: 6.059.023a kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tu yasyaitad bhāti vaktraṃ śubhekṣaṇam
analyzed: kuṇḍalābhyām tu yasya etat bhāti vaktram śubha īkṣaṇam
punarvasu antara gatam pūrṇa bimbam iva aindavam

original: 6.059.024a ācakṣva me mahābāho tvam enaṃ rākṣasottamam
analyzed: ācakṣva me mahā bāho tvam enam rākṣasa uttamam

original: 6.059.024c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve bhayārtā vidrutā diśaḥ
analyzed: yam dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve bhaya ārtāḥ vidrutāḥ diśaḥ
sa pṛṣṭhaḥ rāja putreṇa rāmeṇa amita tejasā
ācacakṣe mahā tejāḥ rāghavāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
daśagrīvaḥ mahā tejāḥ rājā vaiśravaṇānujaḥ
tasya āsīt vīryavān putraḥ rāvaṇa pratimaḥ raṇe

original: 6.059.028a aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe nāge khaḍge dhanuṣi karṣaṇe
analyzed: aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe nāge khaḍge dhanuṣi karṣaṇe

original: 6.059.028c bhede sāntve ca dāne ca naye mantre ca saṃmataḥ
analyzed: bhede sāntve ca dāne ca naye mantre ca saṃmataḥ

original: 6.059.029a yasya bāhuṃ samāśritya laṅkā bhavati nirbhayā
analyzed: yasya bāhum samāśritya laṅkā bhavati nirbhayā
tanayam dhānyamālinyāḥ atikāyam imam viduḥ
etena ārādhitaḥ brahmā tapasā bhāvitātmanā

original: 6.059.030c astrāṇi cāpy avāptāni ripavaś ca parājitāḥ
analyzed: astrāṇi ca api avāptāni ripavaḥ ca parājitāḥ
sura asuraiḥ avadhya tvam dattam asmai svayambhuvā

original: 6.059.031c etac ca kavacaṃ divyaṃ rathaś caiṣo 'rkabhāskaraḥ
analyzed: etat ca kavacam divyam rathaḥ ca eṣaḥ rka bhāskaraḥ

original: 6.059.032a etena śataśo devā dānavāś ca parājitāḥ
analyzed: etena śataśas devāḥ dānavāḥ ca parājitāḥ

original: 6.059.032c rakṣitāni ca rakṣāmi yakṣāś cāpi niṣūditāḥ
analyzed: rakṣitāni ca rakṣāmi yakṣāḥ ca api niṣūditāḥ

original: 6.059.033a vajraṃ viṣṭambhitaṃ yena bāṇair indrasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: vajram viṣṭambhitam yena bāṇaiḥ indrasya dhīmataḥ
pāśaḥ salilarājasya yuddhe pratihataḥ tathā
eṣa u ti kāyaḥ balavān rākṣasānām atha ṛṣabhaḥ
rāvaṇasya sutaḥ dhīmān devadana iva darpa hā

original: 6.059.035a tad asmin kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ kṣipraṃ puruṣapuṃgava
analyzed: tat asmin kriyatām yatnaḥ kṣipram puruṣa puṃgava
purā vānara sainyāni kṣayam nayati sāyakaiḥ
tatas tikāyaḥ balavān praviśya hari vāhinīm

original: 6.059.036c visphārayām āsa dhanur nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: visphārayām āsa dhanuḥ nanāda ca punar punar

original: 6.059.037a taṃ bhīmavapuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
analyzed: tam bhīma vapuṣam dṛṣṭvā ratha stham rathinām varam
abhipetuḥ mahātmānaḥ ye pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.059.038a kumudo dvivido maindo nīlaḥ śarabha eva ca
analyzed: kumudaḥ dvividaḥ maindaḥ nīlaḥ śarabhaḥ eva ca
pādapaiḥ giri śṛṅgaiḥ ca yugapad samabhidravan

original: 6.059.039a teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṃś ca śailāṃś ca śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: teṣām vṛkṣān ca śailān ca śaraiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
atikāyaḥ mahā tejāḥ ciccheda astra vidām varaḥ

original: 6.059.040a tāṃś caiva sarān sa harīñ śaraiḥ sarvāyasair balī
analyzed: tān ca eva sarān sa harīm śaraiḥ sarva āyasaiḥ balī
vivyādha abhimukhaḥ saṃkhye bhīma kāyaḥ niśācaraḥ
te rditāḥ bāṇa barṣeṇa bhinna gātrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
na śekuḥ atikāyasya pratikartum mahā raṇe

original: 6.059.042a tat sainyaṃ harivīrāṇāṃ trāsayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tat sainyam hari vīrāṇām trāsayām āsa rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.059.042c mṛgayūtham iva kruddho harir yauvanam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: mṛga yūtham iva kruddhaḥ hariḥ yauvanam āsthitaḥ
sa rāṣasa indraḥ hari sainya madhye
na ayudhyamānam nijaghāna kam cit
upetya rāmam sa dhanuḥ kalāpī
sa garvitam vākyam idam babhāṣe
rathe sthitaḥ ham śara cāpa pāṇiḥ
na prākṛtam kam cana yodhayāmi
yasya asti śaktiḥ vyavasāya yuktā
dadātum me kṣipram iha adya yuddham
tat tasya vākyam bruvataḥ niśamya
cukopa saumitriḥ amitra hantā
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ ca samutpapāta
jagrāha cāpam ca tatas smayitvā

original: 6.059.046a kruddhaḥ saumitrir utpatya tūṇād ākṣipya sāyakam
analyzed: kruddhaḥ saumitriḥ utpatya tūṇāt ākṣipya sāyakam
purastāt atikāyasya vicakarṣa mahat dhanuḥ

original: 6.059.047a pūrayan sa mahīṃ śailān ākāśaṃ sāgaraṃ diśaḥ
analyzed: pūrayan sa mahīm śailān ākāśam sāgaram diśaḥ
jyā śabdaḥ lakṣmaṇasya ugraḥ trāsayan rajanīcarān
saumitreḥ cāpa nirghoṣam śrutvā pratibhayam tadā
visiṣmiye mahā tejāḥ rākṣasa indra ātmajaḥ balī
atha atikāyaḥ kupitaḥ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam utthitam

original: 6.059.049c ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: ādāya niśitam bāṇam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 6.059.050a bālas tvam asi saumitre vikrameṣv avicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: bālaḥ tvam asi saumitre vikrameṣu a vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.059.050c gaccha kiṃ kālasadṛśaṃ māṃ yodhayitum icchasi
analyzed: gaccha kim kāla sadṛśam mām yodhayitum icchasi

original: 6.059.051a na hi madbāhusṛṣṭānām astrāṇāṃ himavān api
analyzed: na hi mad bāhu sṛṣṭānām astrāṇām himavān api

original: 6.059.051c soḍhum utsahate vegam antarikṣam atho mahī
analyzed: soḍhum utsahate vegam antarikṣam atho mahī
sukha prasuptam kālāgnim prabodhayitum icchasi

original: 6.059.052c nyasya cāpaṃ nivartasva mā prāṇāñ jahi madgataḥ
analyzed: nyasya cāpam nivartasva mā jahi mad gataḥ

original: 6.059.053a atha vā tvaṃ pratiṣṭabdho na nivartitum icchasi
analyzed: atha vā tvam pratiṣṭabdhaḥ na nivartitum icchasi
tiṣṭha prāṇān parityajya gamiṣyasi yama kṣayam
paśya me niśitān bāṇān ari darpa niṣūdanān
īśvara āyudha saṃkāśān tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇān

original: 6.059.055a eṣa te sarpasaṃkāśo bāṇaḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
analyzed: eṣa te sarpa saṃkāśaḥ bāṇaḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
mṛgarājaḥ iva kruddhaḥ nāga rājasya śoṇitam
śrutvā atikāyasya vacaḥ sa roṣam
sa garvitam saṃyati rāja putraḥ
sa saṃcukopa atibalaḥ bṛhat śrīḥ
uvāca vākyam ca tatas mahā artham
na vākya mātreṇa bhavān pradhānaḥ
na katthanāt sat puruṣāḥ bhavanti
mayi sthite dhanvini bāṇa pāṇau
vidarśayasva ātma balam durātman
karmaṇā sūcaya ātmānam na vikatthitum arhasi

original: 6.059.058c pauruṣeṇa tu yo yuktaḥ sa tu śūra iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa tu yaḥ yuktaḥ sa tu śūraḥ iti smṛtaḥ
sarva āyudha samāyuktaḥ dhanvī tvam ratham āsthitaḥ

original: 6.059.059c śarair vā yadi vāpy astrair darśayasva parākramam
analyzed: śaraiḥ vā yadi vā api astraiḥ darśayasva parākramam

original: 6.059.060a tataḥ śiras te niśitaiḥ pātayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tatas śiraḥ te niśitaiḥ pātayiṣyāmi aham śaraiḥ
mārutaḥ kāla saṃpakvam vṛntāt tāla phalam yathā
adya te māmakāḥ bāṇāḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇāḥ
pāsyanti rudhiram gātrāt bāṇa śalya antara utthitam

original: 6.059.062a bālo 'yam iti vijñāya na māvajñātum arhasi
analyzed: bālaḥ yam iti vijñāya na mā avajñātum arhasi

original: 6.059.062c bālo vā yadi vā vṛddho mṛtyuṃ jānīhi saṃyuge
analyzed: bālaḥ vā yadi vā vṛddhaḥ mṛtyum jānīhi saṃyuge
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat parama arthavat
atikāyaḥ pracukrodha bāṇam ca uttamam ādade

original: 6.059.064a tato vidyādharā bhūtā devā daityā maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas vidyādharāḥ bhūtāḥ devāḥ daityāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 6.059.064c guhyakāś ca mahātmānas tad yuddhaṃ dadṛśus tadā
analyzed: guhyakāḥ ca mahātmānaḥ tat yuddham dadṛśuḥ tadā
tikāyaḥ kupitaḥ cāpam āropya sāyakam
lakṣmaṇasya pracikṣepa saṃkṣipan iva ca ambaram
tam āpatantam niśitam śaram āśīviṣa upamam
ardhacandreṇa ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 6.059.067a taṃ nikṛttaṃ śaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛttabhogam ivoragam
analyzed: tam nikṛttam śaram dṛṣṭvā kṛtta bhogam iva uragam
atikāyaḥ bhṛśam kruddhaḥ pañcabāṇān samādade
tām śarān saṃpracikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ

original: 6.059.068c tān aprāptāñ śarais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda bharatānujaḥ
analyzed: tān aprāptām śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ ciccheda bharata anujaḥ

original: 6.059.069a sa tāṃś chittvā śarais tīkṣṇair lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: sa tān chittvā śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 6.059.069c ādade niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: ādade niśitam bāṇam jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 6.059.070a tam ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe yojayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe yojayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.059.070c vicakarṣa ca vegena visasarja ca sāyakam
analyzed: vicakarṣa ca vegena visasarja ca sāyakam
pūrṇa āyata visṛṣṭena śareṇa anata parvaṇā
lalāṭe rākṣasa śreṣṭham ājaghāna sa vīryavān

original: 6.059.072a sa lalāṭe śaro magnas tasya bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: sa lalāṭe śaraḥ magnaḥ tasya bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
dadṛśe śoṇitena aktaḥ pannaga indraḥ iva āhave
rākṣasaḥ pracakampe ca lakṣmaṇeṣu prakampitaḥ
rudra bāṇa hatam bhīmam yathā tripura gopuram

original: 6.059.074a cintayām āsa cāśvasya vimṛśya ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: cintayām āsa ca āśvasya vimṛśya ca mahā balaḥ
sādhu bāṇa nipātena si me ripuḥ

original: 6.059.075a vicāryaivaṃ vinamyāsyaṃ vinamya ca bhujāv ubhau
analyzed: vicārya evam vinamya āsyam vinamya ca bhujau ubhau

original: 6.059.075c sa rathopastham āsthāya rathena pracacāra ha
analyzed: sa rathopastham āsthāya rathena pracacāra ha

original: 6.059.076a ekaṃ trīn pañca sapteti sāyakān rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: ekam trīn pañca sapta iti sāyakān rākṣasa ṛṣabhaḥ
ādade saṃdadhe ca api vicakarṣa utsasarja ca
te bāṇāḥ kāla saṃkāśāḥ rākṣasa indradhanuḥ cyutāḥ
hema puṅkhāḥ ravi prakhyāḥ cakruḥ dīptam iva ambaram
tatas tān rākṣasa utsṛṣṭām śara oghān rāvaṇa anujaḥ
asaṃbhrāntaḥ praciccheda niśitaiḥ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.059.079a tāñ śarān yudhi saṃprekṣya nikṛttān rāvaṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: tām śarān yudhi saṃprekṣya nikṛttān rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
cukopa tridaśa indra ariḥ jagrāha niśitam śaram

original: 6.059.080a sa saṃdhāya mahātejās taṃ bāṇaṃ sahasotsṛjat
analyzed: sa saṃdhāya mahā tejāḥ tam bāṇam sahasā utsṛjat
tatas saumitrim āyāntam ājaghāna stanāntare
atikāyena saumitriḥ tāḍitaḥ yudhi vakṣasi

original: 6.059.081c susrāva rudhiraṃ tīvraṃ madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: susrāva rudhiram tīvram madam mattaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: 6.059.082a sa cakāra tadātmānaṃ viśalyaṃ sahasā vibhuḥ
analyzed: sa cakāra tadā ātmānam viśalyam sahasā vibhuḥ

original: 6.059.082c jagrāha ca śaraṃ tīṣṇam astreṇāpi samādadhe
analyzed: jagrāha ca śaram tīṣṇam astreṇa api samādadhe
āgneyena tadā astreṇa yojayām āsa sāyakam

original: 6.059.083c sa jajvāla tadā bāṇo dhanuś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa jajvāla tadā bāṇaḥ dhanuḥ ca asya mahātmanaḥ
atikāyaḥ ti tejasvī sauram astram samādade
tena bāṇam bhujaṃga ābham hema puṅkham ayojayat

original: 6.059.085a tatas taṃ jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śaram āhitam
analyzed: tatas tam jvalitam ghoram lakṣmaṇaḥ śaram āhitam
atikāyāya cikṣepa kāla daṇḍam iva antakaḥ
āgneyena abhisaṃyuktam dṛṣṭvā bāṇam niśācaraḥ
utsasarja tadā bāṇam dīptam sūrya astra yojitam

original: 6.059.087a tāv ubhāv ambare bāṇāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
analyzed: tau ubhau ambare bāṇau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ

original: 6.059.087c tejasā saṃpradīptāgrau kruddhāv iva bhujaṃ gamau
analyzed: tejasā saṃpradīpta agrau kruddhau iva bhujam gamau
tau anyonyam vinirdahya petatuḥ dharaṇī tale
nirarciṣau bhasma kṛtau na bhrājete śara uttamau

original: 6.059.089a tato 'tikāyaḥ saṃkruddhas tv astram aiṣīkam utsṛjat
analyzed: tikāyaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ tu astram aiṣīkam utsṛjat

original: 6.059.089c tat praciccheda saumitrir astram aindreṇa vīryavān
analyzed: tat praciccheda saumitriḥ astram aindreṇa vīryavān
aiṣīkam nihatam dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
yāmyena astreṇa saṃkruddhaḥ yojayām āsa sāyakam

original: 6.059.091a tatas tad astraṃ cikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tatas tat astram cikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ

original: 6.059.091c vāyavyena tad astraṃ tu nijaghāna sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: vāyavyena tat astram tu nijaghāna sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
atha enam śara dhārābhiḥ dhārābhiḥ iva toyadaḥ
abhyavarṣata saṃkruddhaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ rāvaṇa ātmajam
te tikāyam samāsādya kavace vajra bhūṣite
bhagna agra śalyāḥ sahasā petuḥ bāṇāḥ mahī tale
tān moghān abhisaṃprekṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
abhyavarṣata bāṇānām sahasreṇa mahā yaśāḥ
sa varṣyamāṇaḥ bāṇa oghaiḥ atikāyaḥ mahā balaḥ
avadhya kavacaḥ saṃkhye rākṣasaḥ na eva vivyathe

original: 6.059.096a na śaśāka rujaṃ kartuṃ yudhi tasya narottamaḥ
analyzed: na śaśāka rujam kartum yudhi tasya nara uttamaḥ

original: 6.059.096c athainam abhyupāgamya vāyur vākyam uvāca ha
analyzed: athā enam abhyupāgamya vāyuḥ vākyam uvāca ha
brahma datta varaḥ hi eṣa avadhya kavaca āvṛtaḥ

original: 6.059.097c brāhmeṇāstreṇa bhindhy enam eṣa vadhyo hi nānyathā
analyzed: brāhmeṇa astreṇa bhindhi enam eṣa vadhyaḥ hi na anyathā
tatas sa vāyoḥ vacanam niśamya
saumitriḥ indra pratimāna vīryaḥ
samādade bāṇam amogha vegam
tat brāhmam astram sahasā niyojya
tasmin vara astre tu niyujyamāne
saumitriṇā bāṇa vare śita agre
diśaḥ sa candra arka mahā grahāḥ ca
nabhaḥ ca tatrāsa rarāsa ca urvī
tam brahmaṇaḥ streṇa niyujya cāpe
śaram su puṅkham yama dūta kalpam
saumitriḥ indra ari sutasya tasya
sasarja bāṇam yudhi vajra kalpam
tam lakṣmaṇa utsṛṣṭam amogha vegam
samāpatantam jvalana prakāśam
suvarṇa vajra uttama citra puṅkham
tadā atikāyaḥ samare dadarśa
tam prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā atikāyaḥ
jaghāna bāṇaiḥ niśitaiḥ anekaiḥ
sa sāyakaḥ tasya suparṇa vegaḥ
tadā ativegena jagāma pārśvam
tam āgatam prekṣya tadā atikāyaḥ
bāṇam pradīpta antaka kāla kalpam
jaghāna śakti ṛṣṭi gadā kuṭhāraiḥ
śūlaiḥ halaiḥ ca api a vipanna ceṣṭaḥ
tāni āyudhāni adbhuta vigrahāṇi
moghāni kṛtvā sa śaraḥ agni dīptaḥ
prasahya tasya eva kirīṭa juṣṭam
tadā atikāyasya śiraḥ jahāra
tat śiraḥ sa śiraḥ trāṇam lakṣmaṇa iṣu prapīḍitam

original: 6.059.105c papāta sahasā bhūmau śṛṅgaṃ himavato yathā
analyzed: papāta sahasā bhūmau śṛṅgam himavataḥ yathā
praharṣa yuktāḥ bahavaḥ tu vānarā
prabuddha padma pratima ānanāḥ tadā
apūjayan lakṣmaṇam iṣṭa bhāginam
hate ripau bhīma bale durāsade
tatas hatān rākṣasa puṃgavān tān
deva antaka ādi tri śiraḥ tikāyān
rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ tatra hata avaśiṣṭāḥ
te rāvaṇāya tvaritam śaśaṃsuḥ
tatas hatān tān sahasā niśamya
rājā mumoha aśru paripluta akṣaḥ
putra kṣayam bhrātṛ vadham ca ghoram
vicintya rājā vipulam pradadhyau
tatas tu rājānam udīkṣya dīnam
śoka arṇave saṃparipupluvānam
atha ṛṣabhaḥ rākṣasa rāja sūnuḥ
atha indrajit vākyam idam babhāṣe
na tāta moham pratigantum arhasi
yatra indrajit jīvati rākṣasa indra
na indra ari bāṇa abhihataḥ hi kaḥ cit
prāṇān samarthaḥ samare bhidhartum
paśya adya rāmam saha lakṣmaṇena
mad bāṇa nirbhinna vikīrṇa deham
gata āyuṣam bhūmi tale śayānam
śaraiḥ śitaiḥ ācita sarva gātram
imām pratijñām śṛṇu śakra śatroḥ
su niścitām pauruṣa daiva yuktām
adya eva rāmam saha lakṣmaṇena
saṃtāpayiṣyāmi śaraiḥ amoghaiḥ
adya indra vaivasvata viṣṇu mitra
sādhya aśvi vaiśvānara candra sūryāḥ
drakṣyanti me vikramam aprameyam
viṣṇoḥ iva ugram bali yajña vāṭe
saḥ evam uktvā tridaśa indra śatruḥ
āpṛcchya rājānam adīna sattvaḥ
samāruroha anila tulya vegam
ratham khara śreṣṭha samādhi yuktam
samāsthāya mahā tejāḥ ratham hari ratha upamam

original: 6.060.009c jagāma sahasā tatra yatra yuddham ariṃdama
analyzed: jagāma sahasā tatra yatra yuddham ariṃdama
tam prasthitam mahātmānam anujagmuḥ mahā balāḥ
saṃharṣamāṇāḥ bahavaḥ dhanuḥ pravara pāṇayaḥ

original: 6.060.011a gajaskandhagatāḥ ke cit ke cit paramavājibhiḥ
analyzed: gaja skandha gatāḥ ke cid ke cid parama vājibhiḥ
prāsa mudgara nistriṃśa paraśvadha gadā dharāḥ

original: 6.060.012a sa śaṅkhaninadair bhīmair bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
analyzed: sa śaṅkha ninadaiḥ bhīmaiḥ bherīṇām ca mahā svanaiḥ
jagāma tridaśa indra ariḥ stūyamānaḥ niśācaraiḥ
sa śaṅkha śaśi varṇena chatreṇa ripu sādanaḥ
rarāja paripūrṇena nabhaḥ candramasā yathā
avījyata tatas vīraḥ haimaiḥ hema vibhūṣitaiḥ
cāru cāmara mukhyaiḥ ca mukhyaḥ sarva dhanuṣmatām
tatas tu indrajitā laṅkā sūrya pratima tejasā
rarāja aprativīryeṇa dyauḥ iva arkeṇa bhāsvatā

original: 6.060.016a sa tu dṛṣṭvā viniryāntaṃ balena mahatā vṛtam
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭvā viniryāntam balena mahatā vṛtam
rākṣasa adhipatiḥ śrīmān rāvaṇaḥ putram abravīt

original: 6.060.017a tvam apratirathaḥ putra jitas te yudhi vāsavaḥ
analyzed: tvam apratirathaḥ putra jitaḥ te yudhi vāsavaḥ

original: 6.060.017c kiṃ punar mānuṣaṃ dhṛṣyaṃ na vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
analyzed: kim punar mānuṣam dhṛṣyam na vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
tathā uktaḥ rākṣasa indreṇa pratigṛhya mahā āśiṣaḥ
rathena aśva yujā vīraḥ śīghram gatvā nikumbhilām
sa saṃprāpya mahā tejāḥ yuddha bhūmim ariṃdamaḥ

original: 6.060.019c sthāpayām āsa rakṣāṃsi rathaṃ prati samantataḥ
analyzed: sthāpayām āsa rakṣāṃsi ratham prati samantataḥ
tatas tu huta bhoktāram hutabhuj sadṛśa prabhaḥ
juhuve rākṣasa śreṣṭhaḥ mantravat vidhivat tadā
sa haviḥ jāla saṃskāraiḥ mālya gandha puraskṛtaiḥ
juhuve pāvakam tatra rākṣasa indraḥ pratāpavān
śastrāṇi śara patrāṇi samidhaḥ vibhītakaḥ

original: 6.060.022c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
analyzed: lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvam kārṣṇāyasam tathā
sa tatra agnim samāstīrya śara patraiḥ sa tomaraiḥ
chāgasya sarva kṛṣṇasya galam jagrāha jīvataḥ
sakṛt eva samiddhasya vidhūmasya mahā arciṣaḥ

original: 6.060.024c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ yāny adarśayan
analyzed: babhūvuḥ tāni liṅgāni vijayam yāni adarśayan
pradakṣiṇa āvarta śikhaḥ tapta kāñcana saṃnibhaḥ

original: 6.060.025c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
analyzed: haviḥ tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ

original: 6.060.026a so 'stram āhārayām āsa brāhmam astravidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: saḥ stram āhārayām āsa brāhmam astra vidām varaḥ
dhanuḥ ca ātma ratham ca eva sarvam tatra abhyamantrayat
tasmin āhūyamāne stre hūyamāne ca pāvake
sa arka graha indu nakṣatram vitatrāsa nabhastalam
sa pāvakam pāvaka dīpta tejāḥ
hutvā mahā indra pratima prabhāvaḥ
sa cāpa bāṇa asi ratha aśva sūtaḥ
khe ntardadhe ātmānam acintya rūpaḥ
sa sainyam utsṛjya sametya tūrṇam
mahā raṇe vānara vāhinīṣu
adṛśyamānaḥ śara jālam ugram
vavarṣa nīla ambudharaḥ yathā ambu
te śakrajit bāṇa viśīrṇa dehā
māyā hatāḥ visvaram unnadantaḥ
raṇe nipetuḥ harayaḥ dri kalpā
yathā indra vajra abhihatāḥ naga indrāḥ
te kevalam saṃdadṛśuḥ śita agrān
bāṇān raṇe vānara vāhinīṣu
māyāḥ nigūḍham ca sura indra śatrum
na ca atra tam rākṣasam abhyapaśyan
tatas sa rakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ mahātmā
sarvāḥ diśaḥ bāṇa gaṇaiḥ śita agraiḥ
pracchādayām āsa ravi prakāśaiḥ
viṣādayām āsa ca vānara indrān
sa śūla nistriṃśa paraśvadhāni
vyāvidhya dīpta anala saṃnibhāni
sa visphuliṅga ujjvala pāvakāni
vavarṣa tīvram plavaga indra sainye
tatas jvalana saṃkāśaiḥ śitaiḥ vānara yūthapāḥ
tāḍitāḥ śakrajit bāṇaiḥ praphullāḥ iva kiṃśukāḥ
anyonyam abhisarpantaḥ ninadantaḥ ca visvaram
rākṣasa indra astra nirbhinnāḥ nipetuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.060.036a udīkṣamāṇā gaganaṃ ke cin netreṣu tāḍitāḥ
analyzed: udīkṣamāṇāḥ gaganam ke cit netreṣu tāḍitāḥ

original: 6.060.036c śarair viviśur anyonyaṃ petuś ca jagatītale
analyzed: śaraiḥ viviśuḥ anyonyam petuḥ ca jagatī tale
hanūmantam ca sugrīvam aṅgadam gandhamādanam

original: 6.060.037c jāmbavantaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca vegadarśinam eva ca
analyzed: jāmbavantam suṣeṇam ca vegadarśinam eva ca

original: 6.060.038a maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ gajagomukhau
analyzed: maindam ca dvividam nīlam gavākṣam gaja gomukhau
kesarim hari lomānam vidyut daṃṣṭram ca vānaram
sūryānanam jyotirmukham tathā dadhimukham harim

original: 6.060.039c pāvakākṣaṃ nalaṃ caiva kumudaṃ caiva vānaram
analyzed: pāvaka akṣam nalam ca eva kumudam ca eva vānaram
prāsaiḥ śūlaiḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ indrajit mantra saṃhitaiḥ
vivyādha hari śārdūlān sarvān tān rākṣasa uttamaḥ
sa vai gadābhiḥ hari yūtha mukhyān
nirbhidya bāṇaiḥ tapanīya puṅkhaiḥ
vavarṣa rāmam śara vṛṣṭi jālaiḥ
sa lakṣmaṇam bhāskara raśmi kalpaiḥ
sa bāṇa varṣaiḥ abhivarṣyamāṇaḥ
dhārā nipātān iva tān vicintya
samīkṣamāṇaḥ parama adbhuta śrī
rāmaḥ tadā lakṣmaṇam iti uvāca
asau punar lakṣmaṇa rākṣasa indraḥ
brahmāstram āśritya sura indra śatruḥ
nipātayitvā hari sainyam ugram
