asmām śaraiḥ ardayati prasaktam
svayambhuvā datta varaḥ mahātmā
kham āsthitaḥ ntarhita bhīma kāyaḥ
katham nu śakyaḥ yudhi naṣṭa dehaḥ
nihantum adyā indrajit udyata astraḥ
manye svayambhūḥ bhagavān acintyaḥ
yasya etat astram prabhavaḥ ca yaḥ sya
bāṇa avapātān tvam iha adya dhīman
mayā saha avyagra manāḥ sahasva
pracchādayati eṣa hi rākṣasa indraḥ
sarvāḥ diśaḥ sāyaka vṛṣṭi jālaiḥ
etat ca sarvam patita agrya vīram
na bhrājate vānara rāja sainyam
āvām tu dṛṣṭvā patitau visaṃjñau
nivṛtta yuddhau hata roṣa harṣau
dhruvam pravekṣyati amara ari vāsam
asau samādāya raṇa agra lakṣmīm
tatas tu tau indrajit astra jālaiḥ
babhūvatuḥ tatra tadā viśastau
sa ca api tau tatra viṣādayitvā
nanāda harṣāt yudhi rākṣasa indraḥ
sa tat tadā vānara rāja sainyam
rāmam ca saṃkhye saha lakṣmaṇena
viṣādayitvā sahasā viveśa
purīm daśagrīva bhuja abhiguptām
tayoḥ tadā sāditayoḥ raṇa agre
mumoha sainyam hari yūthapānām
sugrīva nīla aṅgada jāmbavantaḥ

original: na cāpi kiṃ cit pratipedire te
analyzed: na ca api kim cit pratipedire te
tatas viṣaṇṇam samavekṣya sainyam
vibhīṣaṇaḥ buddhimatām variṣṭhaḥ
uvāca śākhāmṛga rāja vīrān
āśvāsayan apratimaiḥ vacobhiḥ
mā bhaiṣṭa na asti atra viṣāda kālaḥ
yat ārya putrau avaśau viṣaṇṇau
svayambhuvaḥ vākyam atha udvahantau
yat sāditau indrajit astra jālaiḥ
tasmai tu dattam parama astram etat
svayambhuvā brāhmam amogha vegam
tat mānayantau yadi rāja putrau
nipātitau kaḥ tra viṣāda kālaḥ

original: 6.061.005a brāhmam astraṃ tadā dhīmān mānayitvā tu mārutiḥ
analyzed: brāhmam astram tadā dhīmān mānayitvā tu mārutiḥ
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā hanūmān tam athā bravīt
etasmin nihate sainye vānarāṇām tarasvinām

original: 6.061.006c yo yo dhārayate prāṇāṃs taṃ tam āśvāsayāvahe
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ dhārayate prāṇān tam tam āśvāsayāvahe

original: 6.061.007a tāv ubhau yugapad vīrau hanūmad rākṣasottamau
analyzed: tau ubhau yugapad vīrau hanumant rākṣasa uttamau
ulkā hastau tadā rātrau raṇa śīrṣe viceratuḥ
chinna lāṅgūla hasta ūru pāda aṅguli śiraḥ dharaiḥ
sravadbhiḥ kṣatajam gātraiḥ prasravadbhiḥ samantataḥ
patitaiḥ parvata ākāraiḥ vānaraiḥ abhisaṃkulām

original: 6.061.009c śastraiś ca patitair dīptair dadṛśāte vasuṃdharām
analyzed: śastraiḥ ca patitaiḥ dīptaiḥ dadṛśāte vasuṃdharām
sugrīvam aṅgadam nīlam śarabham gandhamādanam
jāmbavantam suṣeṇam ca vegadarśanam āhukam

original: 6.061.011a maindaṃ nalaṃ jyotimukhaṃ dvividaṃ panasaṃ tathā
analyzed: maindam nalam jyotirmukham dvividam panasam tathā

original: 6.061.011c vibhīṣaṇo hanūmāṃś ca dadṛśāte hatān raṇe
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ hanūmān ca dadṛśāte hatān raṇe
saptaṣaṣṭiḥ hatāḥ koṭyaḥ vānarāṇām tarasvinām
ahnaḥ pañcama śeṣeṇa vallabhena svayambhuvaḥ
sāgara ogha nibham bhīmam dṛṣṭvā bāṇa arditam balam
mārgate jāmbavantam sma hanūmān sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
svabhāva jarayā yuktam vṛddham śara śataiḥ citam
prajāpati sutam vīram śāmyantam iva pāvakam

original: 6.061.015a dṛṣṭvā tam upasaṃgamya paulastyo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam upasaṃgamya paulastyaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.061.015c kaccid āryaśarais tīrṣṇair na prāṇā dhvaṃsitās tava
analyzed: kaccit ārya śaraiḥ tīrṣṇaiḥ na prāṇāḥ dhvaṃsitāḥ tava
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā jāmbavān ṛkṣa puṃgavaḥ

original: 6.061.016c kṛcchrād abhyudgiran vākyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: kṛcchrāt abhyudgiran vākyam idam vacanam abravīt
nairṛta indra mahā vīrya svareṇa tvā abhilakṣaye

original: 6.061.017c pīḍyamānaḥ śitair bāṇair na tvāṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
analyzed: pīḍyamānaḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ na tvām paśyāmi cakṣuṣā

original: 6.061.018a añjanā suprajā yena mātariśvā ca nairṛta
analyzed: añjanā su prajāḥ yena mātariśvā ca nairṛta

original: 6.061.018c hanūmān vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prāṇān dhārayate kva cit
analyzed: hanūmān vānara śreṣṭhaḥ prāṇān dhārayate kva cit
śrutvā jāmbavataḥ vākyam uvāca idam vibhīṣaṇaḥ
ārya putrau atikramya kasmāt pṛcchasi mārutim

original: 6.061.020a naiva rājani sugrīve nāṅgade nāpi rāghave
analyzed: na eva rājani sugrīve na aṅgade na api rāghave

original: 6.061.020c ārya saṃdarśitaḥ sneho yathā vāyusute paraḥ
analyzed: ārya saṃdarśitaḥ snehaḥ yathā vāyusute paraḥ
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā jāmbavān vākyam abravīt
śṛṇu nairṛta śārdūla yasmāt pṛcchāmi mārutim

original: 6.061.022a tasmiñ jīvati vīre tu hatam apy ahataṃ balam
analyzed: tasmin jīvati vīre tu hatam api ahatam balam
hanūmati ujjhita prāṇe vayam hatāḥ
dhriyate mārutiḥ tāta māruta pratimaḥ yadi
vaiśvānara samaḥ vīrye jīvita āśā tatas bhavet
tatas vṛddham upāgamya niyamena abhyavādayat
gṛhya jāmbavataḥ pādau hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
śrutvā hanumataḥ vākyam tathā api vyathita indriyaḥ
punar jātam iva ātmānam sa mene ṛkṣa puṃgavaḥ
tatas bravīt mahā tejāḥ hanūmantam sa jāmbavān
āgaccha hari śārdūla vānarān trātum arhasi

original: 6.061.027a nānyo vikramaparyāptas tvam eṣāṃ paramaḥ sakhā
analyzed: na anyaḥ vikrama paryāptaḥ tvam eṣām paramaḥ sakhā
tvad parākrama kālaḥ yam na anyam paśyāmi kam cana
ṛkṣa vānara vīrāṇām anīkāni praharṣaya

original: 6.061.028c viśalyau kuru cāpy etau sāditau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: viśalyau kuru ca api etau sāditau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.061.029a gatvā paramam adhvānam upary upari sāgaram
analyzed: gatvā paramam adhvānam upari upari sāgaram
himavantam naga śreṣṭham hanūman gantum arhasi
tatas kāñcanam ati ugram ṛṣabham parvata uttamam
kailāsa śikharam ca api drakṣyasi ari niṣūdana
tayoḥ śikharayoḥ madhye pradīptam atula prabham
sarva oṣadhi yutam vīra drakṣyasi auṣadhi parvatam
tasya vānara śārdūla catasraḥ mūrdhni saṃbhavāḥ

original: 6.061.032c drakṣyasy oṣadhayo dīptā dīpayantyo diśo daśa
analyzed: drakṣyasi oṣadhayaḥ dīptāḥ dīpayantyaḥ diśaḥ daśa
mṛtasaṃjīvanīm ca eva viśalyakaraṇīm api
sauvarṇakaraṇīm ca eva saṃdhānīm ca mahauṣadhīm

original: 6.061.034a tāḥ sarvā hanuman gṛhya kṣipram āgantum arhasi
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāḥ hanuman gṛhya kṣipram āgantum arhasi
āśvāsaya harīn prāṇaiḥ yojya gandhavaha ātmajaḥ
śrutvā jāmbavataḥ vākyam hanūmān hari puṃgavaḥ
āpūryata bala uddharṣaiḥ toya vegaiḥ iva arṇavaḥ
sa parvata taṭa agra sthaḥ pīḍayan parvata uttaram

original: 6.061.036c hanūmān dṛśyate vīro dvitīya iva parvataḥ
analyzed: hanūmān dṛśyate vīraḥ dvitīyaḥ iva parvataḥ
hari pāda vinirbhinnaḥ niṣasāda sa parvataḥ
na śaśāka tad ātmānam soḍhum bhṛśa nipīḍitaḥ

original: 6.061.038a tasya petur nagā bhūmau harivegāc ca jajvaluḥ
analyzed: tasya petuḥ nagāḥ bhūmau hari vegāt ca jajvaluḥ
śṛṅgāṇi ca vyakīryanta pīḍitasya hanūmatā
tasmin saṃpīḍyamāne tu bhagna druma śilā tale

original: 6.061.039c na śekur vānarāḥ sthātuṃ ghūrṇamāne nagottame
analyzed: na śekuḥ vānarāḥ sthātum ghūrṇamāne naga uttame
sa ghūrṇita mahā dvārā prabhagna gṛha gopurā
laṅkā trāsa ākulā rātrau pranṛttā iva abhavat tadā
pṛthivīdhara saṃkāśaḥ nipīḍya dharaṇīdharam
pṛthivīm kṣobhayām āsa sa arṇavām mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.061.042a padbhyāṃ tu śailam āpīḍya vaḍavāmukhavan mukham
analyzed: padbhyām tu śailam āpīḍya vaḍavāmukha vat mukham
vivṛtya ugram nanāda uccais trāsayan iva rākṣasān
tasya nānadyamānasya śrutvā ninadam adbhutam

original: 6.061.043c laṅkāsthā rākṣasāḥ sarve na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
analyzed: laṅkā sthāḥ rākṣasāḥ sarve na śekuḥ spanditum bhayāt
namaskṛtvā atha rāmāya mārutiḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
rāghava arthe param karma samaihata paraṃtapaḥ
sa puccham udyamya bhujaṃga kalpam
vinamya pṛṣṭham śravaṇe nikuñcya
vivṛtya vaktram vaḍavāmukha ābham
āpupluve vyomni sa caṇḍa vegaḥ
sa vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍān tarasā jahāra
śailām śilāḥ prākṛta vānarān ca
bāhu ūru vega uddhata saṃpraṇunnāḥ
te kṣīṇa vegāḥ salile nipetuḥ
sa tau prasārya uraga bhoga kalpau
jagāma merum naga rājam agryam
diśaḥ prakarṣan iva vāyu sūnuḥ
sa sāgaram ghūrṇita vīci mālam
tadā bhṛśam bhrāmita sarva sattvam
samīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā jagāma
cakram yathā viṣṇu kara agra muktam
sa parvatān vṛkṣa gaṇān sarāṃsi
nadīḥ taṭākāni pura uttamāni
sphīta añjanān tān api saṃprapaśyan
jagāma vegāt pitṛ tulya vegaḥ
āditya patham āśritya jagāma sa gata śramaḥ
sa dadarśa hari śreṣṭhaḥ himavantam naga uttamam
nānā prasravaṇa upetam bahu kaṃdara nirjharam
śveta abhra caya saṃkāśaiḥ śikharaiḥ cāru darśanaiḥ
sa tam samāsādya mahā naga indram
atipravṛddha uttama ghora śṛṅgam
dadarśa puṇyāni mahā āśramāṇi
sura ṛṣi saṃgha uttama sevitāni
sa brahma kośam rajata ālayam ca
śakra ālayam rudra śara pramokṣam
haya ānanam brahmaśiraḥ ca dīptam
dadarśa vaivasvata kiṃkarān ca
vajrālayam vaiśvaraṇālayam ca
sūrya prabham sūrya nibandhanam ca
brahmāsanam śaṃkara kārmukam ca
dadarśa nābhim ca vasuṃdharāyāḥ
kailāsam agryam himavat śilām ca
tathā ṛṣabham kāñcana śailam agryam
sa dīpta sarva oṣadhi saṃpradīptam
dadarśa sarva oṣadhi parvata indram
sa tam samīkṣya anala raśmi dīptam
visiṣmiye vāsava dūta sūnuḥ
āplutya tam ca oṣadhi parvata indram
tatra oṣadhīnām vicayam cakāra
sa yojana sahasrāṇi samatītya mahā kapiḥ
divya oṣadhi dharam śailam vyacarat mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.061.058a mahauṣadhyas tu tāḥ sarvās tasmin parvatasattame
analyzed: mahauṣadhyaḥ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ tasmin parvata sattame
vijñāya arthinam āyāntam tatas jagmuḥ adarśanam
sa tāḥ mahātmā hanumān apaśyan
cukopa kopāt ca bhṛśam nanāda
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ gni nikāśa cakṣuḥ
mahīdhara indram tam uvāca vākyam
kim etat evam su viniścitam te
yat rāghave na asi kṛta anukampaḥ
paśya adya mad bāhu bala abhibhūto
vikīrṇam ātmānam atho naga indra
sa tasya śṛṅgam sa nagam sa nāgam
sa kāñcanam dhātu sahasra juṣṭam
vikīrṇa kūṭam calita agra sānum
pragṛhya vegāt sahasā unmamātha
sa tam samutpāṭya kham utpapāta
vitrāsya lokān sa surān sura indrān
saṃstūyamānaḥ khacaraiḥ anekaiḥ
jagāma vegāt garuḍa ugra vīryaḥ
sa bhāskara adhvānam anuprapannaḥ
tat bhāskara ābham śikharam pragṛhya
babhau tadā bhāskara saṃnikāśaḥ
raveḥ samīpe pratibhāskara ābhaḥ
sa tena śailena bhṛśam rarāja
śaila upamaḥ gandhavaha ātmajaḥ tu
sahasra dhāreṇa sa pāvakena
cakreṇa khe viṣṇuḥ iva uddhṛtena
tam vānarāḥ prekṣya tadā vineduḥ

original: sa tān api prekṣya mudā nanāda
analyzed: sa tān api prekṣya mudā nanāda
teṣām samudghuṣṭa ravam niśamya
laṅkā ālayāḥ bhīmataram vineduḥ
tatas mahātmā nipapāta tasmin
śaila uttame vānara sainya madhye
hari uttamebhyaḥ śirasā abhivādya
vibhīṣaṇam tatra ca sasvaje saḥ
tau api ubhau mānuṣa rāja putrau
tam gandham āghrāya mahauṣadhīnām
babhūvatuḥ tatra tadā viśalyau
uttasthuḥ anye ca hari pravīrāḥ
tatas hariḥ gandhavaha ātmajaḥ tu
tam oṣadhī śailam udagra vīryaḥ
nināya vegāt himavantam eva
punar ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
tatas bravīt mahā tejāḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ
arthyam vijāpayan ca api hanumantam mahā balam

original: 6.062.002a yato hataḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kumārāś ca niṣūditāḥ
analyzed: yatas hataḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kumārāḥ ca niṣūditāḥ
na idānīm idam upanirhāram rāvaṇaḥ dātum arhati

original: 6.062.003a ye ye mahābalāḥ santi laghavaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: ye ye mahā balāḥ santi laghavaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
laṅkām abhyutpatantu āśu gṛhya ulkāḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.062.004a tato 'staṃ gata āditye raudre tasmin niśāmukhe
analyzed: tatas u stam gate āditye raudre tasmin niśā mukhe

original: 6.062.004c laṅkām abhimukhāḥ solkā jagmus te plavagarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: laṅkām abhimukhāḥ sa ulkāḥ jagmuḥ te plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
ulkā hastaiḥ hari gaṇaiḥ sarvatas samabhidrutāḥ
ārakṣa sthāḥ virūpa akṣāḥ sahasā vipradudruvuḥ
gopura aṭṭa pratolīṣu caryāsu vividhāsu ca

original: 6.062.006c prāsādeṣu ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sasṛjus te hutāśanam
analyzed: prāsādeṣu ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sasṛjuḥ te hutāśanam
teṣām gṛha sahasrāṇi dadāha hutabhuj tadā
āvāsān rākṣasānām ca sarveṣām gṛhamedhinām
hema citra tanutrāṇām sraj dāma ambara dhāriṇām
sīdhu pāna cala akṣāṇām mada vihvala gāminām
kānta ālambita vastrāṇām śatru saṃjāta manyunām
gadā śūla asi hastānām khādatām pibatām api
śayaneṣu mahārheṣu prasuptānām priyaiḥ saha

original: 6.062.010c trastānāṃ gacchatāṃ tūrṇaṃ putrān ādāya sarvataḥ
analyzed: trastānām gacchatām tūrṇam putrān ādāya sarvatas
teṣām gṛha sahasrāṇi tadā laṅkā nivāsinām

original: 6.062.011c adahat pāvakas tatra jajvāla ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: adahat pāvakaḥ tatra jajvāla ca punar punar
sāravanti mahārhāṇi gambhīra guṇavanti ca
hema candra ardhacandrāṇi candraśālā unnatāni ca
ratna citra gavākṣāṇi sa adhiṣṭhānāni sarvaśas
maṇi vidruma citrāṇi spṛśanti iva ca bhāskaram
krauñca barhiṇa vīṇānām bhūṣaṇānām ca nisvanaiḥ

original: 6.062.014c nāditāny acalābhāni veśmāny agnir dadāha saḥ
analyzed: nāditāni acala ābhāni veśmāni agniḥ dadāha saḥ
jvalanena parītāni toraṇāni cakāśire
vidyudbhiḥ iva naddhāni megha jālāni gharmage
vimāneṣu prasuptāḥ ca dahyamānāḥ vara aṅganāḥ
tyakta ābharaṇa saṃyogāḥ hāhā iti uccais vicukruśaḥ
tatra ca agni parītāni nipetuḥ bhavanāni api
vajri vajra hatāni iva śikharāṇi mahā gireḥ
tāni nirdahyamānāni dūratas pracakāśire
himavat śikharāṇi iva dīpta oṣadhi vanāni ca
harmya agraiḥ dahyamānaiḥ ca jvālā prajvalitaiḥ api

original: 6.062.019c rātrau sā dṛśyate laṅkā puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ
analyzed: rātrau sā dṛśyate laṅkā puṣpitaiḥ iva kiṃśukaiḥ

original: 6.062.020a hastyadhyakṣair gajair muktair muktaiś ca turagair api
analyzed: hasti adhyakṣaiḥ gajaiḥ muktaiḥ muktaiḥ ca turagaiḥ api
babhūva laṅkā loka ante bhrānta grāhaḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: 6.062.021a aśvaṃ muktaṃ gajo dṛṣṭvā kaccid bhīto 'pasarpati
analyzed: aśvam muktam gajaḥ dṛṣṭvā kaccit upasarpati

original: 6.062.021c bhīto bhītaṃ gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kva cid aśvo nivartate
analyzed: bhītaḥ bhītam gajam dṛṣṭvā kva cit aśvaḥ nivartate

original: 6.062.022a sā babhūva muhūrtena haribhir dīpitā purī
analyzed: sā babhūva muhūrtena haribhiḥ dīpitā purī
lokasya asya kṣaye ghore pradīptā iva vasuṃdharā
nārī janasya dhūmena vyāptasya uccais vineduṣaḥ
svanaḥ jvalana taptasya śuśruve daśa yojanam
pradagdha kāyān aparān rākṣasān nirgatān bahis
sahasā abhyutpatanti sma harayaḥ yuyutsavaḥ

original: 6.062.025a udghuṣṭaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
analyzed: udghuṣṭam vānarāṇām ca rākṣasānām ca nisvanaḥ

original: 6.062.025c diśo daśa samudraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cānvanādayat
analyzed: diśaḥ daśa samudram ca pṛthivīm ca anvanādayat

original: 6.062.026a viśalyau tu mahātmānau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: viśalyau tu mahātmānau tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.062.026c asaṃbhrāntau jagṛhatus tāv ubhau dhanuṣī vare
analyzed: asaṃbhrāntau jagṛhatuḥ tau ubhau dhanuṣī vare
tatas visphārayāṇasya rāmasya dhanuḥ uttamam
babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ rākṣasānām bhaya āvahaḥ

original: 6.062.028a aśobhata tadā rāmo dhanur visphārayan mahat
analyzed: aśobhata tadā rāmaḥ dhanuḥ visphārayat mahat

original: 6.062.028c bhagavān iva saṃkruddho bhavo vedamayaṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: bhagavān iva saṃkruddhaḥ bhavaḥ veda mayam dhanuḥ
vānara udghuṣṭa ghoṣaḥ ca rākṣasānām ca nisvanaḥ

original: 6.062.029c jyāśabdaś cāpi rāmasya trayaṃ vyāpa diśo daśa
analyzed: jyā śabdaḥ ca api rāmasya trayam vyāpa diśaḥ daśa
tasya kārmuka muktaiḥ ca śaraiḥ tat pura gopuram
kailāsa śṛṅga pratimam vikīrṇam apatat bhuvi

original: 6.062.031a tato rāmaśarān dṛṣṭvā vimāneṣu gṛheṣu ca
analyzed: tatas rāma śarān dṛṣṭvā vimāneṣu gṛheṣu ca
saṃnāhaḥ rākṣasa indrāṇām tumulaḥ samapadyata
teṣām saṃnahyamānānām siṃhanādam ca kurvatām
śarvarī rākṣasa indrāṇām raudrī iva samapadyata
ādiṣṭāḥ vānara indrāḥ te sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
āsannāḥ dvāram āsādya yudhyadhvam plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.062.034a yaś ca vo vitathaṃ kuryāt tatra tatra vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca vaḥ vitatham kuryāt tatra tatra vyavasthitaḥ
sa hantavyaḥ abhisaṃplutya rāja śāsana dūṣakaḥ
teṣu vānara mukhyeṣu dīpta ulkā ujjvala pāṇiṣu

original: 6.062.035c sthiteṣu dvāram āsādya rāvaṇaṃ manyur āviśat
analyzed: sthiteṣu dvāram āsādya rāvaṇam manyuḥ āviśat

original: 6.062.036a tasya jṛmbhitavikṣepād vyāmiśrā vai diśo daśa
analyzed: tasya jṛmbhita vikṣepāt vyāmiśrāḥ vai diśaḥ daśa

original: 6.062.036c rūpavān iva rudrasya manyur gātreṣv adṛśyata
analyzed: rūpavān iva rudrasya manyuḥ gātreṣu adṛśyata

original: 6.062.037a sa nikumbhaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca kumbhakarṇātmajāv ubhau
analyzed: sa nikumbham ca kumbham ca kumbhakarṇa ātmajau ubhau

original: 6.062.037c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho rākṣasair bahubhiḥ saha
analyzed: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ saha

original: 6.062.038a śaśāsa caiva tān sarvān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: śaśāsa ca eva tān sarvān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
rākṣasāḥ gacchata atrā eva siṃhanādam ca nādayan

original: 6.062.039a tatas tu coditās tena rākṣasā jvalitāyudhāḥ
analyzed: tatas tu coditāḥ tena rākṣasāḥ jvalita āyudhāḥ

original: 6.062.039c laṅkāyā niryayur vīrāḥ praṇadantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: laṅkāyāḥ niryayuḥ vīrāḥ praṇadantaḥ punar punar
bhīma aśva ratha mātaṃgam nānā āpatti samākulam
dīpta śūla gadā khaḍga prāsa tomara kārmukam
tat rākṣasa balam ghoram bhīma vikrama pauruṣam
dadṛśe jvalita prāsam kiṅkiṇī śata nāditam
hema jāla ācita bhujam vyāveṣṭita paraśvadham
vyāghūrṇita mahā śastram bāṇa saṃsakta kārmukam
gandha mālya madhu utseka saṃmodita mahā anilam
ghoram śūra jana ākīrṇam mahā ambudhara nisvanam

original: 6.062.044a taṃ dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ rākṣasānāṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntam rākṣasānām su dāruṇam

original: 6.062.044c saṃcacāla plavaṃgānāṃ balam uccair nanāda ca
analyzed: saṃcacāla plavaṃgānām balam uccais nanāda ca

original: 6.062.045a javenāplutya ca punas tad rākṣasabalaṃ mahat
analyzed: javena āplutya ca punar tat rākṣasa balam mahat
abhyayāt prati ari balam pataṃgaḥ iva pāvakam
teṣām bhuja parāmarśa vyāmṛṣṭa parigha aśani
rākṣasānām balam śreṣṭham bhūyastaram aśobhata

original: 6.062.047a tathaivāpy apare teṣāṃ kapīnām asibhiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: tathā eva api apare teṣām kapīnām asibhiḥ śitaiḥ
pravīrān abhitas jaghnuḥ ghora rūpāḥ niśācarāḥ
ghnantam anyam jaghāna anyaḥ pātayantam apātayat
garhamāṇam jagarha anye daśantam apare daśat

original: 6.062.049a dehīty anye dadāty anyo dadāmīty aparaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: dehi iti anye dadāti anyaḥ dadāmi iti aparaḥ punar
kim kleśayasi tiṣṭha iti tatra anyonyam babhāṣire
samudyata mahā prāsam muṣṭi śūla asi saṃkulam
prāvartata mahā raudram yuddham vānara rakṣasām
vānarān daśa sapta iti rākṣasāḥ abhyapātayan
rākṣasān daśa sapta iti vānarāḥ jaghnuḥ āhave
visrasta keśa rasanam vimukta kavaca dhvajam
balam rākṣasam ālambya vānarāḥ paryavārayan
pravṛtte saṃkule tasmin ghore vīra jana kṣaye
aṅgadaḥ kampanam vīram āsasāda raṇa utsukaḥ

original: 6.063.002a āhūya so 'ṅgadaṃ kopāt tāḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
analyzed: āhūya saḥ ṅgadam kopāt tāḍayām āsa vegitaḥ

original: 6.063.002c gadayā kampanaḥ pūrvaṃ sa cacāla bhṛśāhataḥ
analyzed: gadayā kampanaḥ pūrvam sa cacāla bhṛśa āhataḥ

original: 6.063.003a sa saṃjñāṃ prāpya tejasvī cikṣepa śikharaṃ gireḥ
analyzed: sa saṃjñām prāpya tejasvī cikṣepa śikharam gireḥ

original: 6.063.003c arditaś ca prahāreṇa kampanaḥ patito bhuvi
analyzed: arditaḥ ca prahāreṇa kampanaḥ patitaḥ bhuvi
hata pravīrā vyathitā rākṣasa indra camūḥ tadā
jagāma abhimukhī sā tu kumbhakarṇa sutaḥ yatas

original: 6.063.004e āpatantīṃ ca vegena kumbhas tāṃ sāntvayac camūm
analyzed: āpatantīm ca vegena kumbhaḥ tām sāntvayat camūm

original: 6.063.005a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ dhanvinām śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya su samāhitaḥ
mumoca āśīviṣa prakhyām śarān deha vidāraṇān

original: 6.063.006a tasya tac chuśubhe bhūyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
analyzed: tasya tat śuśubhe bhūyas sa śaram dhanuḥ uttamam
vidyut airāvata arciṣmat dvitīya indradhanuḥ yathā
ākarṇa kṛṣṭa muktena jaghāna dvividam tadā
tena hāṭaka puṅkhena patriṇā patra vāsasā
sahasā abhihataḥ tena vipramukta padaḥ sphuran
nipapāta adri kūṭa ābhaḥ vihvalaḥ plavaga uttamaḥ

original: 6.063.009a maindas tu bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tatra mahāhave
analyzed: maindaḥ tu bhrātaram dṛṣṭvā bhagnam tatra mahā āhave
abhidudrāva vegena pragṛhya mahatīm śilām

original: 6.063.010a tāṃ śilāṃ tu pracikṣepa rākṣasāya mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tām śilām tu pracikṣepa rākṣasāya mahā balaḥ

original: 6.063.010c bibheda tāṃ śilāṃ kumbhaḥ prasannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: bibheda tām śilām kumbhaḥ prasannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
saṃdhāya ca anyam su mukham śaram āśīviṣa upamam
ājaghāna mahā tejāḥ vakṣasi dvivida agrajam

original: 6.063.012a sa tu tena prahāreṇa maindo vānarayūthapaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa maindaḥ vānara yūthapaḥ

original: 6.063.012c marmaṇy abhihatas tena papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
analyzed: marmaṇi abhihataḥ tena papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ

original: 6.063.013a aṅgado mātulau dṛṣṭvā patitau tau mahābalau
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ mātulau dṛṣṭvā patitau tau mahā balau
abhidudrāva vegena kumbham udyata kārmukam

original: 6.063.014a tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha kumbhaḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam vivyādha kumbhaḥ pañcabhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 6.063.014c tribhiś cānyaiḥ śitair bāṇair mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ ca anyaiḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ

original: 6.063.015a so 'ṅgadaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kumbho vivyādha vīryavān
analyzed: saḥ ṅgadam vividhaiḥ bāṇaiḥ kumbhaḥ vivyādha vīryavān
akuṇṭha dhāraiḥ niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kanaka bhūṣaṇaiḥ
aṅgadaḥ pratividdha aṅgaḥ vāli putraḥ na kampate
śilā pādapa varṣāṇi tasya mūrdhni vavarṣa ha

original: 6.063.017a sa praciccheda tān sarvān bibheda ca punaḥ śilāḥ
analyzed: sa praciccheda tān sarvān bibheda ca punar śilāḥ
āpatantam ca saṃprekṣya kumbhaḥ vānara yūthapam

original: 6.063.018c bhruvor vivyādha bāṇābhyām ulkābhyām iva kuñjaram
analyzed: bhruvoḥ vivyādha bāṇābhyām ulkābhyām iva kuñjaram
aṅgadaḥ pāṇinā netre pidhāya rudhira ukṣite
sālam āsannam ekena parijagrāha pāṇinā
tam indra ketu pratimam vṛkṣam mandara saṃnibham
samutsṛjantam vegena paśyatām sarva rakṣasām

original: 6.063.021a sa ciccheda śitair bāṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ kāyabhedanaiḥ
analyzed: sa ciccheda śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ kāya bhedanaiḥ

original: 6.063.021c aṅgado vivyathe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sasāda ca mumoha ca
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ vivyathe bhīkṣṇam sasāda ca mumoha ca

original: 6.063.022a aṅgadaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantam iva sāgare
analyzed: aṅgadam vyathitam dṛṣṭvā sīdantam iva sāgare
durāsadam hari śreṣṭhāḥ rāghavāya nyavedayan

original: 6.063.023a rāmas tu vyathitaṃ śrutvā vāliputraṃ mahāhave
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu vyathitam śrutvā vāli putram mahā āhave
vyādideśa hari śreṣṭhām jāmbavat pramukhān tatas

original: 6.063.024a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śrutvā rāmasya śāsanam
analyzed: te tu vānara śārdūlāḥ śrutvā rāmasya śāsanam
abhipetuḥ su saṃkruddhāḥ kumbham udyata kārmukam
tatas druma śilā hastāḥ kopa saṃrakta locanāḥ
rirakṣiṣantaḥ bhyapatan aṅgadam vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.063.026a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān ca suṣeṇaḥ ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
kumbhakarṇa ātmajam vīram kruddhāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ
tān tu vānara indrān mahā balān
āvavāra śara ogheṇa nagena iva jalāśayam

original: 6.063.028a tasya bāṇacayaṃ prāpya na śoker ativartitum
analyzed: tasya bāṇa cayam prāpya na śokeḥ ativartitum
vānara indrāḥ mahātmānaḥ velām iva mahā udadhiḥ

original: 6.063.029a tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā harigaṇāñ śaravṛṣṭibhir arditān
analyzed: tān tu dṛṣṭvā hari gaṇām śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ arditān
aṅgadam pṛṣṭhatas kṛtvā bhrātṛ jam plavaga īśvaraḥ
abhidudrāva vegena sugrīvaḥ kumbham āhave

original: 6.063.030c śailasānu caraṃ nāgaṃ vegavān iva kesarī
analyzed: śaila sānu caram nāgam vegavān iva kesarī

original: 6.063.031a utpāṭya ca mahāśailān aśvakarṇān dhavān bahūn
analyzed: utpāṭya ca mahā śailān aśvakarṇān dhavān bahūn

original: 6.063.031c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣāṃś cikṣepa ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: anyān ca vividhān vṛkṣān cikṣepa ca mahā balaḥ
tām chādayantīm ākāśam vṛkṣa vṛṣṭim durāsadām
kumbhakarṇa ātmajaḥ śrīmān ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
abhilakṣyeṇa tīvreṇa kumbhena niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.063.033c ācitās te drumā rejur yathā ghorāḥ śataghnayaḥ
analyzed: ācitāḥ te drumāḥ rejuḥ yathā ghorāḥ śataghnayaḥ

original: 6.063.034a drumavarṣaṃ tu tac chinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbhena vīryavān
analyzed: druma varṣam tu tat chinnam dṛṣṭvā kumbhena vīryavān
vānara adhipatiḥ śrīmān mahā sattvaḥ na vivyathe

original: 6.063.035a nirbhidyamānaḥ sahasā sahamānaś ca tāñ śarān
analyzed: nirbhidyamānaḥ sahasā sahamānaḥ ca tām śarān
kumbhasya dhanuḥ ākṣipya babhañja indradhanuḥ prabham

original: 6.063.036a avaplutya tataḥ śīghraṃ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: avaplutya tatas śīghram kṛtvā karma su duṣkaram

original: 6.063.036c abravīt kupitaḥ kumbhaṃ bhagnaśṛṅgam iva dvipam
analyzed: abravīt kupitaḥ kumbham bhagna śṛṅgam iva dvipam

original: 6.063.037a nikumbhāgraja vīryaṃ te bāṇavegaṃ tad adbhutam
analyzed: nikumbha agraja vīryam te bāṇa vegam tat adbhutam

original: 6.063.037c saṃnatiś ca prabhāvaś ca tava vā rāvaṇasya vā
analyzed: saṃnatiḥ ca prabhāvaḥ ca tava vā rāvaṇasya vā
ekaḥ tvam anujātaḥ si pitaram balavattaraḥ
tvām eva ekam mahā bāhum śūla hastam ariṃdamam
tridaśāḥ na ativartante jita indriyam iva ādhayaḥ
vara dānāt pitṛvyaḥ te sahate deva dānavān

original: 6.063.040c kumbhakarṇas tu vīryeṇa sahate ca surāsurān
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tu vīryeṇa sahate ca sura asurān
dhanuṣi indrajitaḥ tulyaḥ pratāpe rāvaṇasya ca

original: 6.063.041c tvam adya rakṣasāṃ loke śreṣṭho 'si balavīryataḥ
analyzed: tvam adya rakṣasām loke śreṣṭhaḥ si bala vīryataḥ
mahā vimardam samare mayā saha tava adbhutam
adya bhūtāni paśyantu śakra śambarayoḥ iva
kṛtam apratimam karma darśitam ca astra kauśalam
pātitāḥ hari vīrāḥ ca tvayā ete bhīma vikramāḥ

original: 6.063.044a upālambhabhayāc cāpi nāsi vīra mayā hataḥ
analyzed: upālambha bhayāt ca api na asi vīra mayā hataḥ

original: 6.063.044c kṛtakarmā pariśrānto viśrāntaḥ paśya me balam
analyzed: kṛta karmā pariśrāntaḥ viśrāntaḥ paśya me balam
tena sugrīva vākyena sa avamānena mānitaḥ
agneḥ ājya hutasya iva tejaḥ tasya abhyavardhata

original: 6.063.046a tataḥ kumbhaḥ samutpatya sugrīvam abhipadya ca
analyzed: tatas kumbhaḥ samutpatya sugrīvam abhipadya ca
ājaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ vajra vegena muṣṭinā

original: 6.063.047a tasya carma ca pusphoṭa saṃjajñe cāsya śoṇitam
analyzed: tasya carma ca pusphoṭa saṃjajñe ca asya śoṇitam
sa ca muṣṭiḥ mahā vegaḥ pratijaghne sthi maṇḍale

original: 6.063.048a tadā vegena tatrāsīt tejaḥ prajvālitaṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: tadā vegena tatra āsīt tejaḥ prajvālitam muhur
vajra niṣpeṣa saṃjāta jvālā merau yathā girau
sa tatra abhihataḥ tena sugrīvaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
muṣṭim saṃvartayām āsa vajra kalpam mahā balaḥ
arciḥ sahasra vikacam ravi maṇḍala saprabham

original: 6.063.050c sa muṣṭiṃ pātayām āsa kumbhasyorasi vīryavān
analyzed: sa muṣṭim pātayām āsa kumbhasya urasi vīryavān
muṣṭinā abhihataḥ tena nipapāta āśu rākṣasaḥ
lohitāṅgaḥ iva ākāśāt dīpta raśmiḥ yadṛcchayā
kumbhasya patataḥ rūpam bhagnasya urasi muṣṭinā
babhau rudra abhipannasya yathārūpam gavām pateḥ
tasmin hate bhīma parākrameṇa
plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
mahī sa śailā sa vanā cacāla
bhayam ca rakṣāṃsi adhikam viveśa
nikumbhaḥ bhrātaram dṛṣṭvā sugrīveṇa nipātitam
pradahan iva kopena vānara indram avaikṣata
tatas sraj dāma saṃnaddham datta pañcāṅgulam śubham
ādade parigham vīraḥ naga indra śikhara upamam
hema paṭṭa parikṣiptam vajra vidruma bhūṣitam
yama daṇḍa upamam bhīmam rakṣasām bhaya nāśanam
tam āvidhya mahā tejāḥ śakra dhvaja samam raṇe
vinanāda vivṛtta āsyaḥ nikumbhaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
uraḥ gatena niṣkeṇa bhuja sthaiḥ aṅgadaiḥ api

original: 6.064.005c kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mṛṣṭābhyāṃ mālayā ca vicitrayā
analyzed: kuṇḍalābhyām ca mṛṣṭābhyām mālayā ca vicitrayā

original: 6.064.006a nikumbho bhūṣaṇair bhāti tena sma parigheṇa ca
analyzed: nikumbhaḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhāti tena sma parigheṇa ca
yathā indradhanuṣā meghaḥ sa vidyut stanayitnumān
parigha agreṇa pusphoṭa vāta granthiḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.064.007c prajajvāla saghoṣaś ca vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: prajajvāla sa ghoṣaḥ ca vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
nagaryāḥ viṭapāvatyāḥ gandharva bhavana uttamaiḥ

original: 6.064.008c saha caivāmarāvatyā sarvaiś ca bhavanaiḥ saha
analyzed: saha ca eva amarāvatyā sarvaiḥ ca bhavanaiḥ saha
sa tārā gaṇa nakṣatram sa candram sa mahāgraham
nikumbha parigha āghūrṇam bhramati iva nabhas talam
durāsadaḥ ca saṃjajñe parigha ābharaṇa prabhaḥ
krodha indhanaḥ nikumbha agniḥ yugānta agniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: 6.064.011a rākṣasā vānarāś cāpi na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ vānarāḥ ca api na śekuḥ spanditum bhayāt

original: 6.064.011c hanūmaṃs tu vivṛtyoras tasthau pramukhato balī
analyzed: hanūman tu vivṛtya uraḥ tasthau pramukhatas balī
parigha upama bāhuḥ tu parigham bhāskara prabham

original: 6.064.012c balī balavatas tasya pātayām āsa vakṣasi
analyzed: balī balavataḥ tasya pātayām āsa vakṣasi

original: 6.064.013a sthire tasyorasi vyūḍhe parighaḥ śatadhā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: sthire tasya urasi vyūḍhe parighaḥ śatadhā kṛtaḥ
viśīryamāṇaḥ sahasā ulkā śatam iva ambare

original: 6.064.014a sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla ca mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla ca mahā kapiḥ
parigheṇa samādhūtaḥ yathā bhūmicale calaḥ
sa tathā abhihataḥ tena hanūmān plavaga uttamaḥ
muṣṭim saṃvartayām āsa balena ati mahā balaḥ
tam udyamya mahā tejāḥ nikumbha urasi vīryavān
abhicikṣepa vegena vegavān vāyu vikramaḥ

original: 6.064.017a tataḥ pusphoṭa carmāsya prasusrāva ca śoṇitam
analyzed: tatas pusphoṭa carma asya prasusrāva ca śoṇitam

original: 6.064.017c muṣṭinā tena saṃjajñe jvālā vidyud ivotthitā
analyzed: muṣṭinā tena saṃjajñe jvālā vidyut iva utthitā

original: 6.064.018a sa tu tena prahāreṇa nikumbho vicacāla ha
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa nikumbhaḥ vicacāla ha
svasthaḥ ca api nijagrāha hanūmantam mahā balam
vicukruśuḥ tadā saṃkhye bhīmam laṅkā nivāsinaḥ
nikumbhena uddhṛtam dṛṣṭvā hanūmantam mahā balam
sa tathā hriyamāṇaḥ kumbhakarṇa ātmajena hi
ājaghāna anilasutaḥ vajra vegena muṣṭinā
ātmānam mocayitvā atha kṣitau abhyavapadyata
hanūmān unmamatha āśu nikumbham mārutātmajaḥ
nikṣipya parama āyattaḥ nikumbham niṣpipeṣa ca
utpatya ca asya vegena papāta urasi vīryavān
parigṛhya ca bāhubhyām parivṛtya śirodharām

original: 6.064.023c utpāṭayām āsa śiro bhairavaṃ nadato mahat
analyzed: utpāṭayām āsa śiraḥ bhairavam nadataḥ mahat
atha vinadati sādite nikumbhe
pavanasutena raṇe babhūva yuddham
daśaratha suta rākṣasa indra camvoḥ
bhṛśataram āgata roṣayoḥ su bhīmam

original: 6.065.001a nikumbhaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā kumbhaṃ ca vinipātitam
analyzed: nikumbham ca hatam śrutvā kumbham ca vinipātitam
rāvaṇaḥ parama amarṣī prajajvāla analaḥ yathā
nairṛtaḥ krodha śokābhyām dvābhyām tu parimūrchitaḥ
khara putram viśāla akṣam makarākṣam acodayat
gaccha putra mayā ājñaptaḥ balena abhisamanvitaḥ

original: 6.065.003c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva jahi tau savanaukasau
analyzed: rāghavam lakṣmaṇam ca eva jahi tau sa vanaukasau

original: 6.065.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śūro mānī kharātmajaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śūraḥ mānī khara ātmajaḥ

original: 6.065.004c bāḍham ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ makarākṣaḥ niśācaraḥ
saḥ bhivādya daśagrīvam kṛtvā ca api pradakṣiṇam
nirjagāma gṛhāt śubhrāt rāvaṇasya ājñayā balī
samīpa stham balādhyakṣam khara putraḥ bravīt idam

original: 6.065.006c ratham ānīyatāṃ śīghraṃ sainyaṃ cānīyatāṃ tvarāt
analyzed: ratham ānīyatām śīghram sainyam ca ānīyatām tvarāt
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā balādhyakṣaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.065.007c syandanaṃ ca balaṃ caiva samīpaṃ pratyapādayat
analyzed: syandanam ca balam ca eva samīpam pratyapādayat
pradakṣiṇam ratham kṛtvā āruroha niśācaraḥ

original: 6.065.008c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ me ratham āvaha
analyzed: sūtam saṃcodayām āsa śīghram me ratham āvaha

original: 6.065.009a atha tān rākṣasān sarvān makarākṣo 'bravīd idam
analyzed: atha tān rākṣasān sarvān makarākṣaḥ bravīt idam

original: 6.065.009c yūyaṃ sarve prayudhyadhvaṃ purastān mama rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: yūyam sarve prayudhyadhvam purastāt mama rākṣasāḥ
aham rākṣasa rājena rāvaṇena mahātmanā

original: 6.065.010c ājñaptaḥ samare hantuṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: ājñaptaḥ samare hantum tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.065.011a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ ca niśācarāḥ
analyzed: adya rāmam vadhiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇam ca niśācarāḥ

original: 6.065.011c śākhāmṛgaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ vānarāṃś ca śarottamaiḥ
analyzed: śākhāmṛgam ca sugrīvam vānarān ca śara uttamaiḥ
adya śūla nipātaiḥ ca vānarāṇām mahā camūm
pradahiṣyāmi saṃprāptām śuṣka indhanam iva analaḥ

original: 6.065.013a makarākṣasya tac chrutvā vacanaṃ te niśācarāḥ
analyzed: makarākṣasya tat śrutvā vacanam te niśācarāḥ
sarve nānā āyudha upetāḥ balavantaḥ samāhitāḥ
te kāmarūpiṇaḥ śūrāḥ daṃṣṭriṇaḥ piṅgala īkṣaṇāḥ
mātaṃgāḥ iva nardantaḥ dhvasta keśāḥ bhayānakāḥ
parivārya mahā kāyāḥ mahā kāyam khara ātmajam
abhijagmuḥ tadā hṛṣṭāḥ cālayantaḥ vasuṃdharām
śaṅkha bherī sahasrāṇām āhatānām samantataḥ

original: 6.065.016c kṣveḍitāsphoṭitānāṃ ca tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
analyzed: kṣveḍita āsphoṭitānām ca tatas śabdaḥ mahān abhūt

original: 6.065.017a prabhraṣṭo 'tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sārathes tadā
analyzed: prabhraṣṭaḥ tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sāratheḥ tadā

original: 6.065.017c papāta sahasā caiva dhvajas tasya ca rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: papāta sahasā ca eva dhvajaḥ tasya ca rakṣasaḥ
tasya te ratha saṃyuktāḥ hayāḥ vikrama varjitāḥ

original: 6.065.018c caraṇair ākulair gatvā dīnāḥ sāsramukhā yayuḥ
analyzed: caraṇaiḥ ākulaiḥ gatvā dīnāḥ sa asra mukhāḥ yayuḥ
pravāti pavanaḥ tasya sa pāṃsuḥ khara dāruṇaḥ
niryāṇe tasya raudrasya makarākṣasya durmateḥ
tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni rākṣasāḥ vīryavattamāḥ
acintya nirgatāḥ sarve yatra tau rāma lakṣmaṇau
ghana gaja mahiṣa aṅga tulya varṇāḥ
samara mukheṣu asakṛt gadā asi bhinnāḥ
aham aham iti yuddha kauśalāḥ te
rajanicarāḥ paribabhramuḥ nadantaḥ
nirgatam makarākṣam te dṛṣṭvā vānara puṃgavāḥ
āplutya sahasā sarve yoddhu kāmāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: 6.066.002a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahat tad yuddhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas pravṛttam su mahat tat yuddham loma harṣaṇam
niśācaraiḥ plavaṃgānām devānām dānavaiḥ iva
vṛkṣa śūla nipātaiḥ ca śilā parigha pātanaiḥ
anyonyam mardayanti sma tadā kapi niśācarāḥ
śakti śūla gadā khaḍgaiḥ tomaraiḥ ca niśācarāḥ
paṭṭasaiḥ bhindipālaiḥ ca bāṇa pātaiḥ samantataḥ
pāśa mudgara daṇḍaiḥ ca nirghātaiḥ ca aparaiḥ tathā
kadanam kapi siṃhānām cakruḥ te rajanīcarāḥ
bāṇa oghaiḥ arditāḥ ca api khara putreṇa vānarāḥ
saṃbhrānta manasaḥ sarve dudruvuḥ bhaya pīḍitāḥ

original: 6.066.007a tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.066.007c nedus te siṃhavad dhṛṣṭā rākṣasā jitakāśinaḥ
analyzed: neduḥ te siṃha vat dhṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ jita kāśinaḥ
vidravatsu tadā teṣu vānareṣu samantataḥ

original: 6.066.008c rāmas tān vārayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa rākṣasān
analyzed: rāmaḥ tān vārayām āsa śara varṣeṇa rākṣasān
vāritān rākṣasān dṛṣṭvā makarākṣaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.066.009c krodhān alasam āviṣṭo vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: krodhān alasam āviṣṭaḥ vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 6.066.010a tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdhaṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ dadāmi te
analyzed: tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdham dvandva yuddham dadāmi te

original: 6.066.010c tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanuḥ muktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.066.011a yat tadā daṇḍakāraṇye pitaraṃ hatavān mama
analyzed: yat tadā daṇḍaka araṇye pitaram hatavān mama
mad agratas sva karma stham smṛtvā roṣaḥ bhivardhate

original: 6.066.012a dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava
analyzed: dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava

original: 6.066.012c yan mayāsi na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ tasmin kāle mahāvane
analyzed: yat mayā asi na dṛṣṭaḥ tvam tasmin kāle mahā vane

original: 6.066.013a diṣṭyāsi darśanaṃ rāma mama tvaṃ prāptavān iha
analyzed: diṣṭyā asi darśanam rāma mama tvam prāptavān iha
kāṅkṣitaḥ si kṣudhā ārtasya siṃhasya iva itaraḥ mṛgaḥ
adya mad bāṇa vegena preta rāj viṣayam gataḥ

original: 6.066.014c ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha tais tvaṃ sameṣyasi
analyzed: ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha taiḥ tvam sameṣyasi

original: 6.066.015a bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vaco mama
analyzed: bahunā atra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vacaḥ mama

original: 6.066.015c paśyantu sakalā lokās tvāṃ māṃ caiva raṇājire
analyzed: paśyantu sakalāḥ lokāḥ tvām mām ca eva raṇa ajire

original: 6.066.016a astrair vā gadayā vāpi bāhubhyāṃ vā mahāhave
analyzed: astraiḥ vā gadayā vā api bāhubhyām vā mahā āhave

original: 6.066.016c abhyastaṃ yena vā rāma tena vā vartatāṃ yudhi
analyzed: abhyastam yena vā rāma tena vā vartatām yudhi
makarākṣa vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
abravīt prahasan vākyam uttara uttara vādinam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām tvad pitā ca yaḥ

original: 6.066.018c triśirā dūṣaṇaś cāpi daṇḍake nihatā mayā
analyzed: triśirāḥ dūṣaṇaḥ ca api daṇḍake nihatāḥ mayā
su āśitāḥ tava māṃsena gṛdhra gomāyu vāyasāḥ
bhaviṣyanti adya vai pāpa tīkṣṇa tuṇḍa nakha aṅkuśāḥ

original: 6.066.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kharaputro niśācaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa khara putraḥ niśācaraḥ
bāṇa oghān asṛjat tasmai rāghavāya raṇa ajire

original: 6.066.021a tāñ śarāñ śaravarṣeṇa rāmaś ciccheda naikadhā
analyzed: tām śarām śara varṣeṇa rāmaḥ ciccheda na ekadhā

original: 6.066.021c nipetur bhuvi te chinnā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: nipetuḥ bhuvi te chinnāḥ rukma puṅkhāḥ sahasraśas

original: 6.066.022a tad yuddham abhavat tatra sametyānyonyam ojasā
analyzed: tat yuddham abhavat tatra sametya anyonyam ojasā
khara rākṣasa putrasya sūnoḥ daśarathasya ca
jīmūtayoḥ iva ākāśe śabdaḥ jyā talayoḥ tadā

original: 6.066.023c dhanur muktaḥ svanotkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇājire
analyzed: dhanuḥ muktaḥ svana utkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇa ajire
deva dānava gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ ca mahā uragāḥ
antarikṣa gatāḥ sarve draṣṭu kāmāḥ tat adbhutam
viddham anyonya gātreṣu dviguṇam vardhate balam
kṛta pratikṛta anyonyam kurvāte tau raṇa ajire

original: 6.066.026a rāmam uktās tu bāṇaughān rākṣasas tv acchinad raṇe
analyzed: rāmam uktāḥ tu bāṇa oghān rākṣasaḥ tu acchinat raṇe

original: 6.066.026c rakṣomuktāṃs tu rāmo vai naikadhā prācchinac charaiḥ
analyzed: rakṣaḥ muktān tu rāmaḥ vai na ekadhā prācchinat śaraiḥ

original: 6.066.027a bāṇaughavitatāḥ sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
analyzed: bāṇa ogha vitatāḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ ca vidiśaḥ tathā

original: 6.066.027c saṃchannā vasudhā caiva samantān na prakāśate
analyzed: saṃchannā vasudhā ca eva samantāt na prakāśate

original: 6.066.028a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur dhanuś ciccheda rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ mahā bāhuḥ dhanuḥ ciccheda rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.066.028c aṣṭābhir atha nārācaiḥ sūtaṃ vivyādha rāghavaḥ
analyzed: aṣṭābhiḥ atha nārācaiḥ sūtam vivyādha rāghavaḥ

original: 6.066.028e bhittvā śarai rathaṃ rāmo rathāśvān samapātayat
analyzed: bhittvā śaraiḥ ratham rāmaḥ ratha aśvān samapātayat
virathaḥ vasudhām tiṣṭhat makarākṣaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.066.029c atiṣṭhad vasudhāṃ rakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
analyzed: atiṣṭhat vasudhām rakṣaḥ śūlam jagrāha pāṇinā
trāsanam sarva bhūtānām yuga anta agni sama prabham

original: 6.066.030a vibhrāmya ca mahac chūlaṃ prajvalantaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: vibhrāmya ca mahat śūlam prajvalantam niśācaraḥ

original: 6.066.030c sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahāhave
analyzed: sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahā āhave
tam āpatantam jvalitam khara putra karāt cyutam

original: 6.066.031c bāṇais tu tribhir ākāśe śūlaṃ ciccheda rāghavaḥ
analyzed: bāṇaiḥ tu tribhiḥ ākāśe śūlam ciccheda rāghavaḥ
sa chinnaḥ na ekadhā śūlaḥ divya hāṭaka maṇḍitaḥ
vyaśīryata mahā uklā iva rāma bāṇa arditaḥ bhuvi
tat śūlam nihatam dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇa adbhuta karmaṇā

original: 6.066.033c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhogatāḥ
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhaḥ gatāḥ

original: 6.066.034a tad dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūlaṃ makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā nihatam śūlam makarākṣaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 6.066.034c muṣṭim udyamya kākutsthaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: muṣṭim udyamya kākutstham tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: 6.066.035a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā patantaṃ vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā patantam vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ
pāvaka astram tatas rāmaḥ saṃdadhe sva śarāsane

original: 6.066.036a tenāstreṇa hataṃ rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe
analyzed: tena astreṇa hatam rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe

original: 6.066.036c saṃchinnahṛdayaṃ tatra papāta ca mamāra ca
analyzed: saṃchinna hṛdayam tatra papāta ca mamāra ca

original: 6.066.037a dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam
laṅkām eva pradhāvanta rāma bāla arditāḥ tadā
daśaratha nṛpa putra bāṇa vegaiḥ
rajanicaram nihatam khara ātmajam tam
dadṛśuḥ atha ca devatāḥ prahṛṣṭā
girim iva vajra hatam yathā viśīrṇam
makarākṣam hatam śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ
ādideśa atha saṃkruddhaḥ raṇāya indrajitam sutam
jahi vīra mahā vīryau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.067.002c adṛśyo dṛśyamāno vā sarvathā tvaṃ balādhikaḥ
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ vā sarvathā tvam bala adhikaḥ
tvam apratima karmāṇam indram jayasi saṃyuge

original: 6.067.003c kiṃ punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge
analyzed: kim punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge
tathā uktaḥ rākṣasa indreṇa pratigṛhya pituḥ vacaḥ

original: 6.067.004c yajñabhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit
analyzed: yajña bhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakam juhuve ndrajit
juhvataḥ ca api tatra agnim rakta uṣṇīṣa dharāḥ striyaḥ

original: 6.067.005c ājagmus tatra saṃbhrāntā rākṣasyo yatra rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: ājagmuḥ tatra saṃbhrāntāḥ rākṣasyaḥ yatra rāvaṇiḥ
śastrāṇi śara patrāṇi samidhaḥ vibhītakāḥ

original: 6.067.006c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
analyzed: lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvam kārṣṇāyasam tathā
sarvatas gnim samāstīrya śara patraiḥ samantataḥ
chāgasya sarva kṛṣṇasya galam jagrāha jīvataḥ
caru homa samiddhasya vidhūmasya mahā arciṣaḥ

original: 6.067.008c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ darśayanti ca
analyzed: babhūvuḥ tāni liṅgāni vijayam darśayanti ca
pradakṣiṇa āvarta śikhaḥ tapta hāṭaka saṃnibhaḥ

original: 6.067.009c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
analyzed: haviḥ tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
hutvā agnim tarpayitvā atha deva dānava rākṣasān
āruroha ratha śreṣṭham antardhāna gatam śubham

original: 6.067.011a sa vājibhiś caturbhis tu bāṇaiś ca niśitair yutaḥ
analyzed: sa vājibhiḥ caturbhiḥ tu bāṇaiḥ ca niśitaiḥ yutaḥ
āropita mahā cāpaḥ śuśubhe syandana uttame
jājvalyamānaḥ vapuṣā tapanīya paricchadaḥ

original: 6.067.012c śaraiś candrārdhacandraiś ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ candra ardhacandraiḥ ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
jāmbūnada mahā kambuḥ dīpta pāvaka saṃnibhaḥ
babhūva indrajitaḥ ketuḥ vaidūrya samalaṃkṛtaḥ
tena ca āditya kalpena brahmāstreṇa ca pālitaḥ
sa babhūva durādharṣaḥ rāvaṇiḥ su mahā balaḥ
saḥ bhiniryāya nagarāt indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ
hutvā agnim rākṣasaiḥ mantraiḥ antardhāna gataḥ bravīt

original: 6.067.016a adya hatvāhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane
analyzed: adya hatvā āhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane
jayam pitre pradāsyāmi rāvaṇāya raṇa adhikam

original: 6.067.017a kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīṃ hatvā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīm hatvā rāmam sa lakṣmaṇam
kariṣye paramām prītim iti uktvā antaradhīyata
āpapāta atha saṃkruddhaḥ daśagrīveṇa coditaḥ
tīkṣṇa kārmuka nārācaiḥ tīkṣṇaḥ tu indra ripuḥ raṇe

original: 6.067.019a sa dadarśa mahāvīryau nāgau triśirasāv iva
analyzed: sa dadarśa mahā vīryau nāgau tri śirasau iva
sṛjantau iṣu jālāni vīrau vānara madhya gau

original: 6.067.020a imau tāv iti saṃcintya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
analyzed: imau tau iti saṃcintya sajyam kṛtvā ca kārmukam
saṃtatāna iṣu dhārābhiḥ parjanyaḥ iva vṛṣṭimān

original: 6.067.021a sa tu vaihāyasaṃ prāpya saratho rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: sa tu vaihāyasam prāpya sa rathaḥ rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.067.021c acakṣur viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: acakṣuḥ viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tau tasya śara vegena parītau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.067.022c dhanuṣī saśare kṛtvā divyam astraṃ pracakratuḥ
analyzed: dhanuṣī sa śare kṛtvā divyam astram pracakratuḥ
pracchādayantau gaganam śara jālaiḥ mahā balau

original: 6.067.023c tam astraiḥ surasaṃkāśau naiva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam astraiḥ sura saṃkāśau na eva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.067.024a sa hi dhūmāndhakāraṃ ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ
analyzed: sa hi dhūma andhakāram ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ
diśaḥ ca antardadhe śrīmān nīhāra tamasā āvṛtaḥ
na eva jyā tala nirghoṣaḥ na ca nemi khura svanaḥ

original: 6.067.025c śuśruve caratas tasya na ca rūpaṃ prakāśate
analyzed: śuśruve carataḥ tasya na ca rūpam prakāśate
ghana andhakāre timire śara varṣam iva adbhutam
sa vavarṣa mahā bāhuḥ nārāca śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 6.067.027a sa rāmaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair dattavaro bhṛśam
analyzed: sa rāmam sūrya saṃkāśaiḥ śaraiḥ datta varaḥ bhṛśam
vivyādha samare kruddhaḥ sarva gātreṣu rāvaṇiḥ

original: 6.067.028a tau hanyamānau nārācair dhārābhir iva parvatau
analyzed: tau hanyamānau nārācaiḥ dhārābhiḥ iva parvatau
hema puṅkhān nara vyāghrau tigmān mumucatuḥ śarān
antarikṣam samāsādya rāvaṇim kaṅka patriṇaḥ

original: 6.067.029c nikṛtya patagā bhūmau petus te śoṇitokṣitāḥ
analyzed: nikṛtya patagāḥ bhūmau petuḥ te śoṇita ukṣitāḥ
atimātram śara ogheṇa pīḍyamānau nara uttamau

original: 6.067.030c tān iṣūn patato bhallair anekair nicakartatuḥ
analyzed: tān iṣūn patataḥ bhallaiḥ anekaiḥ nicakartatuḥ

original: 6.067.031a yato hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitāñ śitān
analyzed: yatas hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitām śitān
tatas tatas dāśarathī sasṛjāte stram uttamam

original: 6.067.032a rāvaṇis tu diśaḥ sarvā rathenātirathaḥ patan
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ tu diśaḥ sarvāḥ rathena atirathaḥ patan

original: 6.067.032c vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghv astro niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghu astraḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tena atividdhau tau vīrau rukma puṅkhaiḥ su saṃhataiḥ
babhūvatuḥ dāśarathī puṣpitau iva kiṃśukau

original: 6.067.034a nāsya veda gatiṃ kaś cin na ca rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śarān
analyzed: na asya veda gatim kaḥ cit na ca rūpam dhanuḥ śarān

original: 6.067.034c na cānyad viditaṃ kiṃ cit sūryasyevābhrasaṃplave
analyzed: na ca anyat viditam kim cit sūryasya iva abhra saṃplave

original: 6.067.035a tena viddhāś ca harayo nihatāś ca gatāsavaḥ
analyzed: tena viddhāḥ ca harayaḥ nihatāḥ ca gatāsavaḥ
babhūvuḥ śataśas tatra patitāḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 6.067.036a lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ tu su saṃkruddhaḥ bhrātaram vākyam abravīt
brāhmam astram prayokṣyāmi vadha artham sarva rakṣasām

original: 6.067.037a tam uvāca tato rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣaṇam

original: 6.067.037c naikasya heto rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyāṃ hantum arhasi
analyzed: na ekasya hetoḥ rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyām hantum arhasi
ayudhyamānam pracchannam prāñjalim śaraṇa āgatam

original: 6.067.038c palāyantaṃ pramattaṃ vā na tvaṃ hantum ihārhasi
analyzed: palāyantam pramattam vā na tvam hantum iha arhasi

original: 6.067.039a asyaiva tu vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyāvo mahābala
analyzed: asya eva tu vadhe yatnam kariṣyāvaḥ mahā bala
ādekṣyāvaḥ mahā vegān astrān āśīviṣa upamān

original: 6.067.040a tam enaṃ māyinaṃ kṣudram antarhitarathaṃ balāt
analyzed: tam enam māyinam kṣudram antarhita ratham balāt
rākṣasam nihaniṣyanti dṛṣṭvā vānara yūthapāḥ

original: 6.067.041a yady eṣa bhūmiṃ viśate divaṃ vā;
analyzed: yadi eṣa bhūmim viśate divam vā
rasātalam vā api nabhastalam vā
evam mama astra dagdhaḥ
patiṣyate bhūmi tale gatāsuḥ
iti evam uktvā vacanam mahātmā
raghu pravīraḥ plavaga ṛṣabhaiḥ vṛtaḥ
vadhāya raudrasya nṛśaṃsa karmaṇaḥ
tadā mahātmā tvaritam nirīkṣate

original: 6.068.001a vijñāya tu manas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: vijñāya tu manaḥ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
saṃnivṛtya āhavāt tasmāt praviveśa puram tatas
saḥ nusmṛtya vadham teṣām rākṣasānām tarasvinām
krodha tāmra īkṣaṇaḥ śūraḥ nirjagāma mahā dyutiḥ

original: 6.068.003a sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasaiḥ vṛtaḥ
indrajit tu mahā vīryaḥ paulastyaḥ deva kaṇṭakaḥ

original: 6.068.004a indrajit tu tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: indrajit tu tatas dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
raṇāya abhyudyatau vīrau māyām prāduṣkarot tadā

original: 6.068.005a indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tadā
analyzed: indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītām māyā mayīm tadā
balena mahatā āvṛtya tasyāḥ vadham arocayat

original: 6.068.006a mohanārthaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā sudurmatiḥ
analyzed: mohana artham tu sarveṣām buddhim kṛtvā su durmatiḥ
hantum sītām vyavasitaḥ vānara abhimukhaḥ yayau

original: 6.068.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tv abhiniryāntaṃ nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tu abhiniryāntam nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ
utpetuḥ abhisaṃkruddhāḥ śilā hastāḥ yuyutsavaḥ
hanūmān puratas teṣām jagāma kapi kuñjaraḥ
pragṛhya su mahat śṛṅgam parvatasya durāsadam

original: 6.068.009a sa dadarśa hatānandāṃ sītām indrajito rathe
analyzed: sa dadarśa hata ānandām sītām indrajitaḥ rathe
eka veṇī dharām dīnām upavāsa kṛśa ānanām
parikliṣṭa eka vasanām amṛjām rāghava priyām
rajaḥ malābhyām āliptaiḥ sarva gātraiḥ vara striyam

original: 6.068.011a tāṃ nirīkṣya muhūrtaṃ tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca
analyzed: tām nirīkṣya muhūrtam tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca
bāṣpa paryākula mukhaḥ hanūmān vyathitaḥ bhavat

original: 6.068.012a abravīt tāṃ tu śokārtāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinām
analyzed: abravīt tām tu śoka ārtām nirānandām tapasvinām
dṛṣṭvā rathe stitām sītām rākṣasa indra suta āśritām

original: 6.068.013a kiṃ samarthitam asyeti cintayan sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: kim samarthitam asya iti cintayan sa mahā kapiḥ
saha taiḥ vānara śreṣṭhaiḥ abhyadhāvata rāvaṇim
tat vānara balam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇiḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 6.068.014c kṛtvā viśokaṃ nistriṃśaṃ mūrdhni sītāṃ parāmṛśat
analyzed: kṛtvā viśokam nistriṃśam mūrdhni sītām parāmṛśat

original: 6.068.015a taṃ striyaṃ paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: tam striyam paśyatām teṣām tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ

original: 6.068.015c krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti māyayā yojitāṃ rathe
analyzed: krośantīm rāma rāma iti māyayā yojitām rathe
gṛhīta mūrdhajām dṛṣṭvā hanūmān dainyam āgataḥ
duḥkha jam vāri netrābhyām utsṛjan mārutātmajaḥ
abravīt paruṣam vākyam krodhāt rakṣaḥ dhipa ātmajam
durātman ātma nāśāya keśa pakṣe parāmṛśaḥ

original: 6.068.017c brahmarṣīṇāṃ kule jāto rākṣasīṃ yonim āśritaḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣīṇām kule jātaḥ rākṣasīm yonim āśritaḥ

original: 6.068.017e dhik tvāṃ pāpasamācāraṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
analyzed: dhik tvām pāpa samācāram yasya te matiḥ īdṛśī
nṛśaṃsa anārya durvṛtta kṣudra pāpa parākrama

original: 6.068.018c anāryasyedṛśaṃ karma ghṛṇā te nāsti nirghṛṇa
analyzed: anāryasya īdṛśam karma ghṛṇā te na asti nirghṛṇa

original: 6.068.019a cyutā gṛhāc ca rājyāc ca rāmahastāc ca maithilī
analyzed: cyutā gṛhāt ca rājyāt ca rāma hastāt ca maithilī

original: 6.068.019c kiṃ tavaiṣāparāddhā hi yad enāṃ hantum icchasi
analyzed: kim tava eṣā aparāddhā hi yat enām hantum icchasi

original: 6.068.020a sītāṃ ca hatvā na ciraṃ jīviṣyasi kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sītām ca hatvā na ciram jīviṣyasi katham cana
vadha arha karmaṇā anena mama hasta gataḥ hi asi

original: 6.068.021a ye ca strīghātināṃ lokā lokavadhyaiś ca kutsitāḥ
analyzed: ye ca strī ghātinām lokāḥ loka vadhyaiḥ ca kutsitāḥ

original: 6.068.021c iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase
analyzed: iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase

original: 6.068.022a iti bruvāṇo hanumān sāyudhair haribhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ hanumān sa āyudhaiḥ haribhiḥ vṛtaḥ
abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasa indra sutam prati
āpatantam mahā vīryam tat anīkam vanaukasām
rakṣasām bhīma vegānām anīkena nyavārayat
sa tām bāṇa sahasreṇa vikṣobhya hari vāhinīm
hari śreṣṭham hanūmantam indrajit pratyuvāca ha

original: 6.068.025a sugrīvas tvaṃ ca rāmaś ca yannimittam ihāgatāḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ tvam ca rāmaḥ ca yad nimittam iha āgatāḥ

original: 6.068.025c tāṃ haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyaiva tava paśyataḥ
analyzed: tām haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyā eva tava paśyataḥ

original: 6.068.026a imāṃ hatvā tato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tvāṃ ca vānara
analyzed: imām hatvā tatas rāmam lakṣmaṇam tvām ca vānara

original: 6.068.026c sugrīvaṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi taṃ cānāryaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: sugrīvam ca vadhiṣyāmi tam ca anāryam vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.068.027a na hantavyāḥ striyaś ceti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
analyzed: na hantavyāḥ striyaḥ ca iti yat bravīṣi plavaṃgama

original: 6.068.027c pīḍā karam amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eta tat
analyzed: pīḍā karam amitrāṇām yat syāt kartavyam eta tat

original: 6.068.028a tam evam uktvā rudatīṃ sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tataḥ
analyzed: tam evam uktvā rudatīm sītām māyā mayīm tatas
śita dhāreṇa khaḍgena nijaghāna indrajit svayam
yajñopavīta mārgeṇa chinnā tena tapasvinī
sā pṛthivyām pṛthu śroṇī papāta priya darśanā

original: 6.068.030a tām indrajitstriyaṃ hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha
analyzed: tām indrajit striyam hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha

original: 6.068.030c mayā rāmasya paśyemāṃ kopena ca niṣūditām
analyzed: mayā rāmasya paśya imām kopena ca niṣūditām

original: 6.068.031a tataḥ khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam
analyzed: tatas khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam

original: 6.068.031c hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahāsvanam
analyzed: hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahā svanam
vānarāḥ śuśruvuḥ śabdam adūre pratyavasthitāḥ

original: 6.068.032c vyāditāsyasya nadatas tad durgaṃ saṃśritasya tu
analyzed: vyādita āsyasya nadataḥ tat durgam saṃśritasya tu
tathā tu sītām vinihatya durmatiḥ
prahṛṣṭa cetāḥ sa babhūva rāvaṇiḥ
tam hṛṣṭa rūpam samudīkṣya vānarā
viṣaṇṇa rūpāḥ samabhipradudruvuḥ
śrutvā tam bhīma nirhrādam śakra aśani sama svanam
vīkṣamāṇāḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ dudruvuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 6.069.002a tān uvāca tataḥ sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: tān uvāca tatas sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
viṣaṇṇa vadanān dīnān trastān vidravataḥ pṛthak
kasmāt viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ vidravadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.069.003c tyaktayuddhasamutsāhāḥ śūratvaṃ kva nu vo gatam
analyzed: tyakta yuddha samutsāhāḥ śūra tvam kva nu vaḥ gatam
pṛṣṭhatas nuvrajadhvam mām agratas yāntam āhave
śūraiḥ abhijana upetaiḥ ayuktam hi nivartitum
evam uktāḥ su saṃkruddhāḥ vāyuputreṇa dhīmatā
śaila śṛṅgān drumān ca eva jagṛhuḥ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
abhipetuḥ ca garjantaḥ rākṣasān vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
parivārya hanūmantam anvayuḥ ca mahā āhave

original: 6.069.007a sa tair vānaramukhyais tu hanūmān sarvato vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ vānara mukhyaiḥ tu hanūmān sarvatas vṛtaḥ
hutāśanaḥ iva arciṣmān adahat śatru vāhinīm
sa rākṣasānām kadanam cakāra su mahā kapiḥ
vṛtaḥ vānara sainyena kāla antaka yama upamaḥ

original: 6.069.009a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa tu śokena ca āviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahā kapiḥ

original: 6.069.009c hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīṃ pātayac chilām
analyzed: hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīm pātayat śilām

original: 6.069.010a tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā
analyzed: tām āpatantīm dṛṣṭvā eva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā
vidheya aśva samāyuktaḥ su dūram apavāhitaḥ
tam indrajitam a prāpya rathatham saha sārathim

original: 6.069.011c viveśa dharaṇīṃ bhittvā sā śilāvyartham udyatā
analyzed: viveśa dharaṇīm bhittvā sā śilā vyartham udyatā

original: 6.069.012a patitāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu rakṣasāṃ vyathitā camūḥ
analyzed: patitāyām śilāyām tu rakṣasām vyathitā camūḥ
tam abhyadhāvam śataśas nadantaḥ kānanaukasaḥ

original: 6.069.013a te drumāṃś ca mahākāyā giriśṛṅgāṇi codyatāḥ
analyzed: te drumān ca mahā kāyāḥ giri śṛṅgāṇi ca udyatāḥ
cikṣipuḥ dviṣatām madhye vānarāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
vānaraiḥ taiḥ mahā vīryaiḥ ghora rūpāḥ niśācarāḥ
vīryāt abhihatāḥ vṛkṣaiḥ vyaveṣṭanta raṇa kṣitau
sva sainyam abhivīkṣya atha vānara arditam indrajit
pragṛhīta āyudhaḥ kruddhaḥ parān abhimukhaḥ yayau
sa śara oghān avasṛjan sva sainyena abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
jaghāna kapi śārdūlān su bahūn dṛṣṭa vikramaḥ
śūlaiḥ aśanibhiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ

original: 6.069.017c te cāpy anucarāṃs tasya vānarā jaghnur āhave
analyzed: te ca api anucarān tasya vānarāḥ jaghnuḥ āhave
sa skandha viṭapaiḥ sālaiḥ śilābhiḥ ca mahā balaiḥ
hanūmān kadanam cakre rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām

original: 6.069.019a sa nivārya parānīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: sa nivārya para anīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.069.019c hanūmān saṃnivartadhvaṃ na naḥ sādhyam idaṃ balam
analyzed: hanūmān saṃnivartadhvam na naḥ sādhyam idam balam
tyaktvā prāṇān viceṣṭantaḥ rāma priya cikīrṣavaḥ

original: 6.069.020c yannimittaṃ hi yudhyāmo hatā sā janakātmajā
analyzed: yad nimittam hi yudhyāmaḥ hatā sā janakātmajā

original: 6.069.021a imam arthaṃ hi vijñāpya rāmaṃ sugrīvam eva ca
analyzed: imam artham hi vijñāpya rāmam sugrīvam eva ca

original: 6.069.021c tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
analyzed: tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
iti uktvā vānara śreṣṭhaḥ vārayan sarva vānarān

original: 6.069.022c śanaiḥ śanair asaṃtrastaḥ sabalaḥ sa nyavartata
analyzed: śanais śanais asaṃtrastaḥ sa balaḥ sa nyavartata

original: 6.069.023a sa tu prekṣya hanūmantaṃ vrajantaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa tu prekṣya hanūmantam vrajantam yatra rāghavaḥ
nikumbhilām adhiṣṭhāya pāvakam juhuve ndrajit

original: 6.069.024a yajñabhūmyāṃ tu vidhivat pāvakas tena rakṣasā
analyzed: yajña bhūmyām tu vidhivat pāvakaḥ tena rakṣasā
hūyamānaḥ prajajvāla homa śoṇita bhuj tadā
saḥ rciḥ pinaddhaḥ dadṛśe homa śoṇita tarpitaḥ
saṃdhyā āgataḥ iva ādityaḥ sa tīvra agniḥ samutthitaḥ
atha indrajit rākṣasa bhūtaye tu
juhāva havyam vidhinā vidhānavat
dṛṣṭvā vyatiṣṭhanta ca rākṣasāḥ te
mahā samūheṣu naya anaya jñāḥ
rāghavaḥ ca api vipulam tam rākṣasa vanaukasām
śrutvā saṃgrāma nirghoṣam jāmbavantam uvāca ha

original: 6.070.002a saumya nūnaṃ hanumatā kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: saumya nūnam hanumatā kṛtam karma su duṣkaram

original: 6.070.002c śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ sumahān āyudhasvanaḥ
analyzed: śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ su mahān āyudha svanaḥ
tat gaccha kuru sāhāyyam sva balena abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
kṣipram ṛṣka pate tasya kapi śreṣṭhasya yudhyataḥ
ṛkṣa rājaḥ tathā iti uktvā svena anīkena saṃvṛtaḥ
āgacchat paścima dvāram hanūmān yatra vānaraḥ
atha āyāntam hanūmantam dadarśa ṛkṣa patiḥ pathi
vānaraiḥ kṛta saṃgrāmaiḥ śvasadbhiḥ abhisaṃvṛtam

original: 6.070.006a dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmāṃś ca tad ṛṣkabalam udyatam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmān ca tat ṛṣka balam udyatam
nīla megha nibham bhīmam saṃnivārya nyavartata
sa tena hari sainyena saṃnikarṣam mahā yaśāḥ

original: 6.070.007c śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
analyzed: śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhitaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 6.070.008a samare yudhyamānānām asmākaṃ prekṣatāṃ ca saḥ
analyzed: samare yudhyamānānām asmākam prekṣatām ca saḥ
jaghāna rudatīm sītām indrajit rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
udbhrānta cittaḥ tām dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇaḥ ham ariṃdama

original: 6.070.009c tad ahaṃ bhavato vṛttaṃ vijñāpayitum āgataḥ
analyzed: tat aham bhavataḥ vṛttam vijñāpayitum āgataḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavaḥ śoka mūrchitaḥ

original: 6.070.010c nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
analyzed: nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinna mūlaḥ iva drumaḥ

original: 6.070.011a taṃ bhūmau devasaṃkāśaṃ patitaṃ dṛśya rāghavam
analyzed: tam bhūmau deva saṃkāśam patitam dṛśya rāghavam
abhipetuḥ samutpatya sarvatas kapi sattamāḥ
asiñcan salilaiḥ ca enam padma utpala sugandhibhiḥ
pradahantam asahyam ca sahasā agnim iva utthitam
tam bāhubhyām pariṣvajya su duḥkhitaḥ
uvāca rāmam asvastham vākyam hetu artha saṃhitam
śubhe vartmani tiṣṭhantam tvām ārya vijita indriyam

original: 6.070.014c anarthebhyo na śaknoti trātuṃ dharmo nirarthakaḥ
analyzed: anarthebhyaḥ na śaknoti trātum dharmaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: 6.070.015a bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jaṅgamānāṃ ca darśanam
analyzed: bhūtānām sthāvarāṇām ca jaṅgamānām ca darśanam

original: 6.070.015c yathāsti na tathā dharmas tena nāstīti me matiḥ
analyzed: yathā asti na tathā dharmaḥ tena na asti iti me matiḥ

original: 6.070.016a yathaiva sthāvaraṃ vyaktaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca tathāvidham
analyzed: yathā eva sthāvaram vyaktam jaṅgamam ca tathāvidham

original: 6.070.016c nāyam arthas tathā yuktas tvadvidho na vipadyate
analyzed: na ayam arthaḥ tathā yuktaḥ tvadvidhaḥ na vipadyate

original: 6.070.017a yady adharmo bhaved bhūto rāvaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
analyzed: yadi adharmaḥ bhavet bhūtaḥ rāvaṇaḥ narakam vrajet

original: 6.070.017c bhavāṃś ca dharmasaṃyukto naivaṃ vyasanam āpnuyāt
analyzed: bhavān ca dharma saṃyuktaḥ na evam vyasanam āpnuyāt

original: 6.070.018a tasya ca vyasanābhāvād vyasanaṃ ca gate tvayi
analyzed: tasya ca vyasana abhāvāt vyasanam ca gate tvayi
dharmeṇa upalabhet dharmam adharmam ca api adharmataḥ
yadi dharmeṇa yujyeran na adharma rucayaḥ janāḥ

original: 6.070.019c dharmeṇa caratāṃ dharmas tathā caiṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavet
analyzed: dharmeṇa caratām dharmaḥ tathā ca eṣām phalam bhavet

original: 6.070.020a yasmād arthā vivardhante yeṣv adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt arthāḥ vivardhante yeṣu adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: 6.070.020c kliśyante dharmaśīlāś ca tasmād etau nirarthakau
analyzed: kliśyante dharma śīlāḥ ca tasmāt etau nirarthakau
vadhyante pāpa karmāṇaḥ yadi adharmeṇa rāghava

original: 6.070.021c vadhakarmahato dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kaṃ vadhiṣyati
analyzed: vadha karma hataḥ dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kam vadhiṣyati

original: 6.070.022a atha vā vihitenāyaṃ hanyate hanti vā param
analyzed: atha vā vihitena ayam hanyate hanti vā param

original: 6.070.022c vidhir ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā
analyzed: vidhiḥ ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā
a dṛṣṭa pratikāreṇa avyaktena asatā satā
katham śakyam param prāptum dharmeṇa ari vikarśana

original: 6.070.024a yadi sat syāt satāṃ mukhya nāsat syāt tava kiṃ cana
analyzed: yadi sat syāt satām mukhya na asat syāt tava kim cana

original: 6.070.024c tvayā yadīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ tasmāt san nopapadyate
analyzed: tvayā yadi īdṛśam prāptam tasmāt sat na upapadyate

original: 6.070.025a atha vā durbalaḥ klībo balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
analyzed: atha vā durbalaḥ klībaḥ balam dharmaḥ nuvartate

original: 6.070.025c durbalo hṛtamaryādo na sevya iti me matiḥ
analyzed: durbalaḥ hṛta maryādaḥ na sevyaḥ iti me matiḥ

original: 6.070.026a balasya yadi ced dharmo guṇabhūtaḥ parākrame
analyzed: balasya yadi ced dharmaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ parākrame

original: 6.070.026c dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale
analyzed: dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale

original: 6.070.027a atha cet satyavacanaṃ dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa
analyzed: atha ced satya vacanam dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa

original: 6.070.027c anṛtas tvayy akaruṇaḥ kiṃ na baddhas tvayā pitā
analyzed: anṛtaḥ tvayi akaruṇaḥ kim na baddhaḥ tvayā pitā

original: 6.070.028a yadi dharmo bhaved bhūta adharmo vā paraṃtapa
analyzed: yadi dharmaḥ bhavet bhūta adharmaḥ vā paraṃtapa

original: 6.070.028c na sma hatvā muniṃ vajrī kuryād ijyāṃ śatakratuḥ
analyzed: na sma hatvā munim vajrī kuryāt ijyām śatakratuḥ
adharma saṃśritaḥ dharmaḥ vināśayati rāghava

original: 6.070.029c sarvam etad yathākāmaṃ kākutstha kurute naraḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat yathākāmam kākutstha kurute naraḥ

original: 6.070.030a mama cedaṃ mataṃ tāta dharmo 'yam iti rāghava
analyzed: mama ca idam matam tāta dharmaḥ yam iti rāghava

original: 6.070.030c dharmamūlaṃ tvayā chinnaṃ rājyam utsṛjatā tadā
analyzed: dharma mūlam tvayā chinnam rājyam utsṛjatā tadā

original: 6.070.031a arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: arthebhyaḥ hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyaḥ tatas tatas
kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhyaḥ iva āpagāḥ
arthena hi viyuktasya puruṣasya alpa tejasaḥ

original: 6.070.032c vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā
analyzed: vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvāḥ grīṣme kusaritaḥ yathā
saḥ yam artham parityajya sukha kāmaḥ sukha edhitaḥ

original: 6.070.033c pāpam ārabhate kartuṃ tathā doṣaḥ pravartate
analyzed: pāpam ārabhate kartum tathā doṣaḥ pravartate

original: 6.070.034a yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavaḥ
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ tasya mitrāṇi yasya arthāḥ tasya bāndhavaḥ

original: 6.070.034c yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ sa pumān loke yasya arthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: 6.070.035a yasyārthāḥ sa ca vikrānto yasyārthāḥ sa ca buddhimān
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ sa ca vikrāntaḥ yasya arthāḥ sa ca buddhimān

original: 6.070.035c yasyārthāḥ sa mahābhāgo yasyārthāḥ sa mahāguṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ sa mahābhāgaḥ yasya arthāḥ sa mahā guṇaḥ
arthasya ete parityāge doṣāḥ pravyāhṛtāḥ mayā

original: 6.070.036c rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhis tvayā kṛtā
analyzed: rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhiḥ tvayā kṛtā
yasya arthāḥ dharma kāma arthāḥ tasya sarvam pradakṣiṇam
a dhanena artha kāmena na arthaḥ śakyaḥ vicinvatā

original: 6.070.038a harṣaḥ kāmaś ca darpaś ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
analyzed: harṣaḥ kāmaḥ ca darpaḥ ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamaḥ damaḥ
arthāt etāni sarvāṇi pravartante narādhipa

original: 6.070.039a yeṣāṃ naśyaty ayaṃ lokaś caratāṃ dharmacāriṇām
analyzed: yeṣām naśyati ayam lokaḥ caratām dharma cāriṇām

original: 6.070.039c te 'rthās tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ
analyzed: te rthāḥ tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ

original: 6.070.040a tvayi pravrajite vīra guroś ca vacane sthite
analyzed: tvayi pravrajite vīra guroḥ ca vacane sthite
rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā prāṇaiḥ priyatarā tava

original: 6.070.041a tad adya vipulaṃ vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam
analyzed: tat adya vipulam vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam
karmaṇā vyapaneṣyāmi tasmāt uttiṣṭha rāghava
ayam anagha tava uditaḥ priya artham
janakasutāḥ nidhanam nirīkṣya ruṣṭaḥ
sa haya gaja rathām sa rākṣasa indrām
bhṛśam iṣubhiḥ vinipātayāmi laṅkām
rāmam āśvāsayāne tu lakṣmaṇe bhrātṛ vatsale
nikṣipya gulmān sva sthāne tatra agacchat vibhīṣaṇaḥ
nānā praharaṇaiḥ vīraiḥ caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ vṛtaḥ
nīlāñjana caya ākāraiḥ mātaṃgaiḥ iva yūthapaḥ
saḥ bhigamya mahātmānam rāghavam śoka lālasam
vānarān ca eva dadṛśe bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇān
rāghavam ca mahātmānam ikṣvāku kula nandanam
dadarśa moham āpannam lakṣmaṇasya aṅkam āśritam
vrīḍitam śoka saṃtaptam dṛṣṭvā rāmam vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.071.005c antarduḥkhena dīnātmā kim etad iti so 'bravīt
analyzed: antar duḥkhena dīna ātmā kim etat iti saḥ bravīt

original: 6.071.006a vibhīṣaṇa mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca vānarān
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇa mukham dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam tān ca vānarān
uvāca lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam idam bāṣpa pariplutaḥ

original: 6.071.007a hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ
analyzed: hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvā eva rāghavaḥ

original: 6.071.007c hanūmad vacanāt saumya tato moham upāgataḥ
analyzed: hanūmat vacanāt saumya tatas moham upāgataḥ
kathayantam tu saumitrim saṃnivārya vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.071.008c puṣkalārtham idaṃ vākyaṃ visaṃjñaṃ rāmam abravīt
analyzed: puṣkala artham idam vākyam visaṃjñam rāmam abravīt
manuja indra ārta rūpeṇa yat uktaḥ tvam hanūmatā

original: 6.071.009c tad ayuktam ahaṃ manye sāgarasyeva śoṣaṇam
analyzed: tat ayuktam aham manye sāgarasya iva śoṣaṇam
abhiprāyam tu jānāmi rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.071.010c sītāṃ prati mahābāho na ca ghātaṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: sītām prati mahā bāho na ca ghātam kariṣyati
yācyamānaḥ su bahuśas mayā hita cikīrṣuṇā

original: 6.071.011c vaidehīm utsṛjasveti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ
analyzed: vaidehīm utsṛjasva iti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ

original: 6.071.012a naiva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kuto yudhā
analyzed: na eva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kutas yudhā

original: 6.071.012c sā draṣṭum api śakyeta naiva cānyena kena cit
analyzed: sā draṣṭum api śakyeta nā eva ca anyena kena cit

original: 6.071.013a vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.071.013c caityaṃ nikumbhilāṃ nāma yatra homaṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: caityam nikumbhilām nāma yatra homam kariṣyati

original: 6.071.014a hutavān upayāto hi devair api savāsavaiḥ
analyzed: hutavān upayātaḥ hi devaiḥ api sa vāsavaiḥ
durādharṣaḥ bhavati eṣa saṃgrāme rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.071.015a tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā
analyzed: tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā
vighnam anvicchatā tāta vānarāṇām parākrame

original: 6.071.015e sasainyās tatra gacchāmo yāvat tan na samāpyate
analyzed: sa sainyāḥ tatra gacchāmaḥ yāvat tat na samāpyate
tyaja imam nara śārdūla mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam

original: 6.071.016c sīdate hi balaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ śokakarśitam
analyzed: sīdate hi balam sarvam dṛṣṭvā tvām śoka karśitam

original: 6.071.017a iha tvaṃ svastha hṛdayas tiṣṭha sattvasamucchritaḥ
analyzed: iha tvam svastha hṛdayaḥ tiṣṭha sattva samucchritaḥ
lakṣmaṇam preṣaya asmābhiḥ saha sainya anukarṣibhiḥ

original: 6.071.018a eṣa taṃ naraśārdūlo rāvaṇiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: eṣa tam nara śārdūlaḥ rāvaṇim niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.071.018c tyājayiṣyati tat karma tato vadhyo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tyājayiṣyati tat karma tatas vadhyaḥ bhaviṣyati
tasya ete niśitāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ patri patra aṅga vājinaḥ
patatriṇaḥ iva asaumyāḥ śarāḥ pāsyanti śoṇitam
tat saṃdiśa mahā bāho lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣaṇam
rākṣasasya vināśāya vajram vajradharaḥ yathā
manuja vara na kāla viprakarṣo
ripu nidhanam prati yat kṣamaḥ dya kartum
tvam atisṛja ripoḥ vadhāya bāṇīm
asura pura unmathane yathā mahā indraḥ
samāpta karmā hi sa rākṣasa indraḥ
bhavati adṛśyaḥ samare sura asuraiḥ
yuyutsatā tena samāpta karmaṇā
bhavet surāṇām api saṃśayaḥ mahān
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavaḥ śoka karśitaḥ

original: 6.072.001c nopadhārayate vyaktaṃ yad uktaṃ tena rakṣasā
analyzed: na upadhārayate vyaktam yat uktam tena rakṣasā
tatas dhairyam avaṣṭabhya rāmaḥ para puraṃjayaḥ
vibhīṣaṇam upāsīnam uvāca kapi saṃnidhau

original: 6.072.003a nairṛtādhipate vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ te vibhīṣaṇa
analyzed: nairṛta adhipate vākyam yat uktam te vibhīṣaṇa

original: 6.072.003c bhūyas tac chrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
analyzed: bhūyas tat śrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 6.072.004c yat tat punar idaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat tat punar idam vākyam babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
yathā ājñaptam mahā bāho tvayā gulma niveśanam
tat tathā anuṣṭhitam vīra tvad vākya samanantaram
tāni anīkāni sarvāṇi vibhaktāni samantataḥ
vinyastāḥ yūthapāḥ ca eva yathānyāyam vibhāgaśaḥ

original: 6.072.007a bhūyas tu mama vijāpyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas tu mama vijāpyam tat śṛṇuṣva mahā yaśaḥ
tvayi akāraṇa saṃtapte saṃtapta hṛdayāḥ vayam

original: 6.072.008a tyaja rājann imaṃ śokaṃ mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam
analyzed: tyaja rājan imam śokam mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam
tat iyam tyajyatām cintā śatru harṣa vivardhanī
udyamaḥ kriyatām vīra harṣaḥ samupasevyatām

original: 6.072.009c prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaś vca niśācarāḥ
analyzed: prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaḥ niśācarāḥ

original: 6.072.010a raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ me hitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatām me hitam vacaḥ

original: 6.072.010c sādhv ayaṃ yātu saumitrir balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sādhu ayam yātu saumitriḥ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
nikumbhilāyām saṃprāpya hantum rāvaṇim āhave
dhanuḥ maṇḍala nirmuktaiḥ āśīviṣa viṣa upamaiḥ
śaraiḥ hantum mahā iṣvāsaḥ rāvaṇim samitiṃjayaḥ
tena vīreṇa tapasā vara dānāt svayambhutaḥ

original: 6.072.012c astraṃ brahmaśiraḥ prāptaṃ kāmagāś ca turaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: astram brahmaśiraḥ prāptam kāma gāḥ ca turaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.072.013a nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahutāgniṃ ca yo ripuḥ
analyzed: nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahuta agnim ca yaḥ ripuḥ

original: 6.072.013c tvām ātatāyinaṃ hanyād indraśatro sa te vadhaḥ
analyzed: tvām ātatāyinam hanyāt indra śatro sa te vadhaḥ

original: 6.072.013e ity evaṃ vihito rājan vadhas tasyaiva dhīmataḥ
analyzed: iti evam vihitaḥ rājan vadhaḥ tasya eva dhīmataḥ
vadhāya indrajitaḥ rāma tam diśasva mahā balam

original: 6.072.014c hate tasmin hataṃ viddhi rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam
analyzed: hate tasmin hatam viddhi rāvaṇam sa suhṛd janam
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutva rāmaḥ vākyam atha abravīt
jānāmi tasya raudrasya māyām satya parākrama

original: 6.072.016a sa hi brahmāstravit prājño mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa hi brahmāstra vid prājñaḥ mahā māyaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.072.016c karoty asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān savaruṇān api
analyzed: karoti asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān sa varuṇān api
tasya antarikṣe carataḥ ratha sthasya mahā yaśaḥ
na gatiḥ jñāyate vīrasūryasya iva abhra saṃplave

original: 6.072.018a rāghavas tu ripor jñātvā māyāvīryaṃ durātmanaḥ
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tu ripoḥ jñātvā māyā vīryam durātmanaḥ
lakṣmaṇam kīrti saṃpannam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 6.072.019a yad vānarendrasya balaṃ tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat vānara indrasya balam tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
hanumat pramukhaiḥ ca eva yūthapaiḥ saha lakṣmaṇa
jāmbavena ṛkṣa patinā saha sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ
jahi tam rākṣasa sutam māyā bala viśāradam

original: 6.072.021a ayaṃ tvāṃ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ
analyzed: ayam tvām sacivaiḥ sārdham mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ
abhijñaḥ tasya deśasya pṛṣṭhatas nugamiṣyati
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
jagrāha kārmukam śreṣṭham anyat bhīma parākramaḥ

original: 6.072.023a saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī hemacāpadhṛk
analyzed: saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī
rāma pādau upaspṛśya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitriḥ abravīt
adya mad kārmuka unmukhāḥ śarāḥ nirbhidya rāvaṇim
laṅkām abhipatiṣyanti haṃsāḥ puṣkariṇīm iva

original: 6.072.025a adyaiva tasya raudrasya śarīraṃ māmakāḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: adyā eva tasya raudrasya śarīram māmakāḥ śarāḥ
vidhamiṣyanti hatvā tam mahā cāpa guṇa cyutāḥ

original: 6.072.026a sa evam uktvā dyutimān vacanaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam uktvā dyutimān vacanam bhrātuḥ agratas
sa rāvaṇi vadha ākāṅkṣī lakṣmaṇaḥ tvaritaḥ yayau

original: 6.072.027a so 'bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā ca api pradakṣiṇam
nikumbhilām abhiyayau caityam rāvaṇi pālitam
vibhīṣaṇena sahitaḥ rāja putraḥ pratāpavān
kṛta svastyayanaḥ bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ tvaritaḥ yayau

original: 6.072.029a vānarāṇāṃ sahasrais tu hanūmān bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: vānarāṇām sahasraiḥ tu hanūmān bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
vibhīṣaṇaḥ saha amātyaḥ tadā lakṣmaṇam anvagāt
mahatā hari sainyena sa vegam abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
ṛkṣa rāja balam ca eva dadarśa pathi viṣṭhitam

original: 6.072.031a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā dūram adhvānam saumitriḥ mitra nandanaḥ
rākṣasa indra balam dūrāt apaśyat vyūham āsthitam
sa saṃprāpya dhanuṣpāṇiḥ māyā yogam ariṃdama
tasthau brahma vidhānena vijetum raghunandanaḥ
vividham amala śastra bhāsvaram tat
dhvaja gahanam vipulam mahā rathaiḥ ca
pratibhayatamam aprameya vegam
timiram iva dviṣatām balam viveśa
atha tasyām avasthāyām lakṣmaṇam rāvaṇa anujaḥ
pareṣām ahitam vākyam artha sādhakam abravīt
asya anīkasya mahataḥ bhedane yata lakṣmaṇa
rākṣasa indra sutaḥ pi atra bhinne dṛśyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 6.073.003a sa tvam indrāśaniprakhyaiḥ śarair avakiran parān
analyzed: sa tvam indra aśani prakhyaiḥ śaraiḥ avakiran parān

original: 6.073.003c abhidravāśu yāvad vai naitat karma samāpyate
analyzed: abhidrava āśu yāvat vai na etat karma samāpyate
jahi vīra durātmānam māyā param adhārmikam
rāvaṇim krūra karmāṇam sarva loka bhaya āvaham
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śubha lakṣaṇaḥ
vavarṣa śara varṣāṇi rākṣasa indra sutam prati
ṛkṣāḥ śākhāmṛgāḥ ca eva druma adri vara yodhinaḥ
abhyadhāvanta sahitāḥ tat anīkam avasthitam

original: 6.073.007a rākṣasāś ca śitair bāṇair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ asibhiḥ śakti tomaraiḥ
udyataiḥ samavartanta kapi sainya jighāṃsavaḥ
sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ saṃjajñe kapi rakṣasām

original: 6.073.008c śabdena mahatā laṅkāṃ nādayan vai samantataḥ
analyzed: śabdena mahatā laṅkām nādayan vai samantataḥ

original: 6.073.009a śastrair bahuvidhākāraiḥ śitair bāṇaiś ca pādapaiḥ
analyzed: śastraiḥ bahuvidha ākāraiḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ ca pādapaiḥ

original: 6.073.009c udyatair giriśṛṅgaiś ca ghorair ākāśam āvṛtam
analyzed: udyataiḥ giri śṛṅgaiḥ ca ghoraiḥ ākāśam āvṛtam
te rākṣasāḥ vānareṣu vikṛta ānana bāhavaḥ

original: 6.073.010c niveśayantaḥ śastrāṇi cakrus te sumahad bhayam
analyzed: niveśayantaḥ śastrāṇi cakruḥ te su mahat bhayam

original: 6.073.011a tathaiva sakalair vṛkṣair giriśṛṅgaiś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: tathā eva sakalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ giri śṛṅgaiḥ ca vānarāḥ
abhijaghnuḥ nijaghnuḥ ca samare rākṣasa ṛṣabhān
ṛkṣa vānara mukhyaiḥ ca mahā kāyaiḥ mahā balaiḥ
rakṣasām vadhyamānānām mahat bhayam ajāyata

original: 6.073.013a svam anīkaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ tu śrutvā śatrubhir arditam
analyzed: svam anīkam viṣaṇṇam tu śrutvā śatrubhiḥ arditam
udatiṣṭhata durdharṣaḥ tat karmaṇi an anuṣṭhite
vṛkṣa andhakārāt niṣkramya jāta krodhaḥ sa rāvaṇiḥ

original: 6.073.014c āruroha rathaṃ sajjaṃ pūrvayuktaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: āruroha ratham sajjam pūrva yuktam sa rākṣasaḥ
sa bhīma kārmuka śaraḥ kṛṣṇāñjana caya upamaḥ
rakta āsya nayanaḥ krūraḥ babhau mṛtyuḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 6.073.016a dṛṣṭvaiva tu rathasthaṃ taṃ paryavartata tad balam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tu ratha stham tam paryavartata tat balam
rakṣasām bhīma vegānām lakṣmaṇena yuyutsatām

original: 6.073.017a tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya sudurāsadam
analyzed: tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya su durāsadam
dharaṇīdhara saṃkāśī mahā vṛkṣam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 6.073.018a sa rākṣasānāṃ tat sainyaṃ kālāgnir iva nirdahan
analyzed: sa rākṣasānām tat sainyam kālāgniḥ iva nirdahan

original: 6.073.018c cakāra bahubhir vṛkṣair niḥsaṃjñaṃ yudhi vānaraḥ
analyzed: cakāra bahubhiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ niḥsaṃjñam yudhi vānaraḥ
vidhvaṃsayantam tarasā dṛṣṭvā eva pavanātmajam
rākṣasānām sahasrāṇi hanūmantam avākiran
śita śūla dharāḥ śūlaiḥ asibhiḥ ca asi pāṇayaḥ
śaktibhiḥ śakti hastāḥ ca paṭṭasaiḥ paṭṭasa āyudhāḥ

original: 6.073.021a parighaiś ca gadābhiś ca kuntaiś ca śubhadarśanaiḥ
analyzed: parighaiḥ ca gadābhiḥ ca kuntaiḥ ca śubha darśanaiḥ

original: 6.073.021c śataśaś ca śataghnībhir āyasair api mudgaraiḥ
analyzed: śataśas ca śataghnībhiḥ āyasaiḥ api mudgaraiḥ

original: 6.073.022a ghoraiḥ paraśubhiś caiva bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: ghoraiḥ paraśubhiḥ ca eva bhindipālaiḥ ca rākṣasāḥ
muṣṭibhiḥ vajra vegaiḥ ca talaiḥ aśani saṃnibhaiḥ
abhijaghnuḥ samāsādya samantāt parvata upamam

original: 6.073.023c teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
analyzed: teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaḥ cakāra kadanam mahat
sa dadarśa kapi śreṣṭham acala upamam indrajit
sūdayānam amitra ghnam amitrān pavana ātmajam

original: 6.073.025a sa sārathim uvācedaṃ yāhi yatraiṣa vānaraḥ
analyzed: sa sārathim uvāca idam yāhi yatra eṣa vānaraḥ

original: 6.073.025c kṣayam eva hi naḥ kuryād rākṣasānām upekṣitaḥ
analyzed: kṣayam eva hi naḥ kuryāt rākṣasānām upekṣitaḥ

original: 6.073.026a ity uktaḥ sārathis tena yayau yatra sa mārutiḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sārathiḥ tena yayau yatra sa mārutiḥ
vahan parama durdharṣam sthitam indrajitam rathe
saḥ bhyupetya śarān khaḍgān paṭṭasa asi paraśvadhān
abhyavarṣata durdharṣaḥ kapi mūrdhni sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.073.028a tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ
analyzed: tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ

original: 6.073.028c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: roṣeṇa mahatā āviṣaḥ vākyam ca idam uvāca ha
yudhyasva yadi si rāvaṇa ātmaja durmate
vāyuputram samāsādya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi

original: 6.073.030a bāhubhyāṃ saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave
analyzed: bāhubhyām saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave

original: 6.073.030c vegaṃ sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: vegam sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvam rakṣasām varaḥ
hanūmantam jighāṃsantam samudyata śarāsanam
rāvaṇa ātmajam ācaṣṭe lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
yaḥ tu vāsava nirjetā rāvaṇasya ātmasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 6.073.032c sa eṣa ratham āsthāya hanūmantaṃ jighāṃsati
analyzed: saḥ eṣa ratham āsthāya hanūmantam jighāṃsati
tam apratima saṃsthānaiḥ śaraiḥ śatru vidāraṇaiḥ
jīvitānta karaiḥ ghoraiḥ saumitre rāvaṇim jahi

original: 6.073.034a ity evam uktas tu tadā mahātmā;
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ tu tadā mahātmā
vibhīṣaṇena ari vibhīṣaṇena
dadarśa tam parvata saṃnikāśam
ratha sthitam bhīma balam durāsadam

original: 6.074.001a evam uktvā tu saumitriṃ jātaharṣo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu saumitrim jāta harṣaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
dhanuṣpāṇinam ādāya tvaramāṇaḥ jagāma saḥ

original: 6.074.002a avidūraṃ tato gatvā praviśya ca mahad vanam
analyzed: avidūram tatas gatvā praviśya ca mahat vanam

original: 6.074.002c darśayām āsa tat karma lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: darśayām āsa tat karma lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśam nyagrodham bhīma darśanam
tejasvī rāvaṇa bhrātā lakṣmaṇāya nyavedayat
iha upahāram bhūtānām balavān
upahṛtya tatas paścāt saṃgrāmam abhivartate
adṛśyaḥ sarva bhūtānām tatas bhavati rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.074.005c nihanti samare śatrūn badhnāti ca śarottamaiḥ
analyzed: nihanti samare śatrūn badhnāti ca śara uttamaiḥ
tam apraviṣṭam nyagrodham balinam rāvaṇa ātmajam
vidhvaṃsaya śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ sa ratham sa aśva sārathim
tathā iti uktvā mahā tejāḥ saumitriḥ mitra nandanaḥ
babhūva avasthitaḥ tatra citram visphārayan dhanuḥ
sa rathena agni varṇena balavān rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
indrajit kavacī khaḍgī sa dhvajaḥ pratyadṛśyata
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ paulastyam aparājitam

original: 6.074.009c samāhvaye tvāṃ samare samyag yuddhaṃ prayaccha me
analyzed: samāhvaye tvām samare samyak yuddham prayaccha me
