evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ manasvī rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.074.010c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: abravīt paruṣam vākyam tatra dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.074.011a iha tvaṃ jātasaṃvṛddhaḥ sākṣād bhrātā pitur mama
analyzed: iha tvam jāta saṃvṛddhaḥ sākṣāt bhrātā pituḥ mama

original: 6.074.011c kathaṃ druhyasi putrasya pitṛvyo mama rākṣasa
analyzed: katham druhyasi putrasya pitṛvyaḥ mama rākṣasa

original: 6.074.012a na jñātitvaṃ na sauhārdaṃ na jātis tava durmate
analyzed: na jñāti tvam na sauhārdam na jātiḥ tava durmate

original: 6.074.012c pramāṇaṃ na ca sodaryaṃ na dharmo dharmadūṣaṇa
analyzed: pramāṇam na ca sodaryam na dharmaḥ dharma dūṣaṇa

original: 6.074.013a śocyas tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaś ca sādhubhiḥ
analyzed: śocyaḥ tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaḥ ca sādhubhiḥ

original: 6.074.013c yas tvaṃ svajanam utsṛjya parabhṛtyatvam āgataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam sva janam utsṛjya para bhṛtya tvam āgataḥ

original: 6.074.014a naitac chithilayā buddhyā tvaṃ vetsi mahad antaram
analyzed: na etat śithilayā buddhyā tvam vetsi mahat antaram

original: 6.074.014c kva ca svajanasaṃvāsaḥ kva ca nīcaparāśrayaḥ
analyzed: kva ca sva jana saṃvāsaḥ kva ca nīca para āśrayaḥ

original: 6.074.015a guṇavān vā parajanaḥ svajano nirguṇo 'pi vā
analyzed: guṇavān vā para janaḥ sva janaḥ vā

original: 6.074.015c nirguṇaḥ svajanaḥ śreyān yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ
analyzed: nirguṇaḥ sva janaḥ śreyān yaḥ paraḥ paraḥ eva saḥ
niranukrośa tā ca iyam yādṛśī te niśācara
sva janena tvayā śakyam paruṣam rāvaṇa anuja
iti uktaḥ bhrātṛ putreṇa pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.074.017c ajānann iva macchīlaṃ kiṃ rākṣasa vikatthase
analyzed: a jānan iva mad śīlam kim rākṣasa vikatthase
rākṣasa indra suta asādho pāruṣyam tyaja gauravāt

original: 6.074.018c kule yady apy ahaṃ jāto rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām
analyzed: kule yadi api aham jātaḥ rakṣasām krūra karmaṇām

original: 6.074.018e guṇo 'yaṃ prathamo nṝṇāṃ tan me śīlam arākṣasaṃ
analyzed: guṇaḥ yam prathamaḥ nṝṇām tat me śīlam arākṣasam

original: 6.074.019a na rame dāruṇenāhaṃ na cādharmeṇa vai rame
analyzed: na rame dāruṇena aham na ca adharmeṇa vai rame
bhrātrā viṣama śīlena katham bhrātā nirasyate
para svānām ca haraṇam para dāra abhimarśanam

original: 6.074.020c suhṛdām atiśaṅkāṃ ca trayo doṣāḥ kṣayāvahāḥ
analyzed: suhṛdām atiśaṅkām ca trayaḥ doṣāḥ kṣaya āvahāḥ

original: 6.074.021a maharṣīṇāṃ vadho ghoraḥ sarvadevaiś ca vigrahaḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣīṇām vadhaḥ ghoraḥ sarva devaiḥ ca vigrahaḥ

original: 6.074.021c abhimānaś ca kopaś ca vairitvaṃ pratikūlatā
analyzed: abhimānaḥ ca kopaḥ ca vairi tvam pratikūla tā
ete doṣāḥ mama bhrātuḥ jīvita aiśvarya nāśanāḥ

original: 6.074.022c guṇān pracchādayām āsuḥ parvatān iva toyadāḥ
analyzed: guṇān pracchādayām āsuḥ parvatān iva toyadāḥ

original: 6.074.023a doṣair etaiḥ parityakto mayā bhrātā pitā tava
analyzed: doṣaiḥ etaiḥ parityaktaḥ mayā bhrātā pitā tava

original: 6.074.023c neyam asti purī laṅkā na ca tvaṃ na ca te pitā
analyzed: na iyam asti purī laṅkā na ca tvam na ca te pitā

original: 6.074.024a atimānī ca bālaś ca durvinītaś ca rākṣasa
analyzed: atimānī ca bālaḥ ca durvinītaḥ ca rākṣasa

original: 6.074.024c baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
analyzed: baddhaḥ tvam kāla pāśena brūhi mām yat yat icchasi

original: 6.074.025a adya te vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ kim iha tvaṃ tu vakṣyasi
analyzed: adya te vyasanam prāptam kim iha tvam tu vakṣyasi

original: 6.074.025c praveṣṭuṃ na tvayā śakyo nyagrodho rākṣasādhama
analyzed: praveṣṭum na tvayā śakyaḥ nyagrodhaḥ rākṣasa adhama

original: 6.074.026a dharṣayitvā tu kākutsthau na śakyaṃ jīvituṃ tvayā
analyzed: dharṣayitvā tu kākutsthau na śakyam jīvitum tvayā
yudhyasva naradevena lakṣmaṇena raṇe saha

original: 6.074.026e hatas tvaṃ devatā kāryaṃ kariṣyasi yamakṣaye
analyzed: hataḥ tvam devatā kāryam kariṣyasi yama kṣaye
nidarśayasva ātma balam samudyatam
kuruṣva sarva āyudha sāyaka vyayam
na lakṣmaṇasya etya hi bāṇa gocaram
tvam adya jīvan sa balaḥ gamiṣyasi
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇiḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
abravīt paruṣam vākyam vegena abhyutpapāta ha
udyata āyudha nistriṃśaḥ rathe tu samalaṃkṛte
kāla aśva yukte mahati sthitaḥ kāla antaka upamaḥ
mahā pramāṇam udyamya vipulam vegavat dṛḍham
dhanuḥ bhīmam parāmṛśya śarān ca amitra nāśanān
uvāca enam samārabdhaḥ saumitrim sa vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.075.004c tāṃś ca vānaraśārdūlān paśyadhvaṃ me parākramam
analyzed: tān ca vānara śārdūlān paśyadhvam me parākramam
adya mad kārmuka utsṛṣṭam śara varṣam durāsadam
muktam varṣam iva ākāśe vārayiṣyatha saṃyuge
adya vaḥ māmakāḥ bāṇāḥ mahā kārmuka niḥsṛtāḥ
vidhamiṣyanti gātrāṇi tūla rāśim iva analaḥ
tīkṣṇa sāyaka nirbhinnām śūla śakti ṛṣṭi tomaraiḥ

original: 6.075.007c adya vo gamayiṣyāmi sarvān eva yamakṣayam
analyzed: adya vaḥ gamayiṣyāmi sarvān eva yama kṣayam
kṣipataḥ śara varṣāṇi kṣipra hastasya me yudhi
jīmūtasya iva nadataḥ kaḥ sthāsyati mama agratas

original: 6.075.009a tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya garjitaṃ lakṣmaṇas tadā
analyzed: tat śrutvā rākṣasa indrasya garjitam lakṣmaṇaḥ tadā
abhīta vadanaḥ kruddhaḥ rāvaṇim vākyam abravīt

original: 6.075.010a uktaś ca durgamaḥ pāraḥ kāryāṇāṃ rākṣasa tvayā
analyzed: uktaḥ ca durgamaḥ pāraḥ kāryāṇām rākṣasa tvayā

original: 6.075.010c kāryāṇāṃ karmaṇā pāraṃ yo gacchati sa buddhimān
analyzed: kāryāṇām karmaṇā pāram yaḥ gacchati sa buddhimān

original: 6.075.011a sa tvam arthasya hīnārtho duravāpasya kena cit
analyzed: sa tvam arthasya hīna arthaḥ duravāpasya kena cit
vacaḥ vyāhṛtya jānīṣe smi iti durmate
antardhāna gatena ājau yaḥ tvayā ācaritaḥ tadā
taskara ācaritaḥ mārgaḥ na eṣa vīra niṣevitaḥ

original: 6.075.013a yathā bāṇapathaṃ prāpya sthito 'haṃ tava rākṣasa
analyzed: yathā bāṇa patham prāpya sthitaḥ ham tava rākṣasa

original: 6.075.013c darśayasvādya tat tejo vācā tvaṃ kiṃ vikatthase
analyzed: darśayasva adya tat tejaḥ vācā tvam kim vikatthase

original: 6.075.014a evam ukto dhanur bhīmaṃ parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ dhanuḥ bhīmam parāmṛśya mahā balaḥ
sasarje niśitān bāṇān indrajit samijiṃjaya
te nisṛṣṭāḥ mahā vegāḥ śarāḥ sarpa viṣa upamāḥ

original: 6.075.015c saṃprāpya lakṣmaṇaṃ petuḥ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
analyzed: saṃprāpya lakṣmaṇam petuḥ śvasantaḥ iva pannagāḥ
śaraiḥ ati mahā vegaiḥ vegavān rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
saumitrim indrajit yuddhe vivyādha śubha lakṣaṇam
sa śaraiḥ atividdha aṅgaḥ rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ

original: 6.075.017c śuśubhe lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: śuśubhe lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: 6.075.018a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma prasamīkṣyādhigamya ca
analyzed: indrajit tu ātmanaḥ karma prasamīkṣya adhigamya ca
vinadya su mahā nādam idam vacanam abravīt
patriṇaḥ śita dhārāḥ te śarāḥ mad kārmuka cyutāḥ
ādāsyante dya saumitre jīvitam jīvitānta gāḥ

original: 6.075.020a adya gomāyusaṃghāś ca śyenasaṃghāś ca lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: adya gomāyu saṃghāḥ ca śyena saṃghāḥ ca lakṣmaṇa

original: 6.075.020c gṛdhrāś ca nipatantu tvāṃ gatāsuṃ nihataṃ mayā
analyzed: gṛdhrāḥ ca nipatantu tvām gatāsum nihatam mayā
kṣatrabandhuḥ sadā anāryaḥ rāmaḥ parama durmatiḥ

original: 6.075.021c bhaktaṃ bhrātaram adyaiva tvāṃ drakṣyati mayā hatam
analyzed: bhaktam bhrātaram adyā eva tvām drakṣyati mayā hatam
viśasta kavacam bhūmau vyapaviddha śarāsanam

original: 6.075.022c hṛtottamāṅgaṃ saumitre tvām adya nihataṃ mayā
analyzed: hṛta uttamāṅgam saumitre tvām adya nihatam mayā
iti bruvāṇam saṃrabdham paruṣam rāvaṇa ātmajam
hetumat vākyam atyartham lakṣmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha

original: 6.075.024a akṛtvā katthase karma kimartham iha rākṣasa
analyzed: a kṛtvā katthase karma kimartham iha rākṣasa

original: 6.075.024c kuru tat karma yenāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ tava katthanam
analyzed: kuru tat karma yena aham śraddadhyām tava katthanam

original: 6.075.025a anuktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃ cid apy anavakṣipan
analyzed: an uktvā paruṣam vākyam kim cit api an avakṣipan
a vikatthan vadhiṣyāmi tvām paśya puruṣādana
iti uktvā pañca nārācān ākarṇa āpūritām śarān
nicakhāna mahā vegān lakṣmaṇaḥ rākṣasa urasi

original: 6.075.027a sa śarair āhatas tena saroṣo rāvaṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa śaraiḥ āhataḥ tena sa roṣaḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
su prayuktaiḥ tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ prativivyādha lakṣmaṇam
sa babhūva mahā bhīmaḥ nara rākṣasa siṃhayoḥ
vimardaḥ tumulaḥ yuddhe paraspara vadha eṣiṇoḥ
ubhau hi bala saṃpannau ubhau vikrama śālinau
ubhau api su vikrāntau sarva śastra astra kovidau
ubhau parama durjeyau atulya bala tejasau

original: 6.075.030c yuyudhāte mahāvīrau grahāv iva nabho gatau
analyzed: yuyudhāte mahā vīrau grahau iva nabhaḥ gatau

original: 6.075.031a balavṛtrāv iva hi tau yudhi vai duṣpradharṣaṇau
analyzed: bala vṛtrau iva hi tau yudhi vai duṣpradharṣaṇau
yuyudhāte mahātmānau tadā kesariṇau iva
bahūn avasṛjantau hi mārgaṇa oghān avasthitau
nara rākṣasa siṃhau tau prahṛṣṭau abhyayudhyatām
su saṃprahṛṣṭau nara rākṣasa uttamau
jaya eṣiṇau mārgaṇa cāpa dhāriṇau
parasparam tau pravavarṣatuḥ bhṛśam
śara ogha varṣeṇa balāhakau iva
tatas śaram dāśarathiḥ saṃdhāya amitra karśanaḥ

original: 6.076.001c sasarja rākṣasendrāya kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
analyzed: sasarja rākṣasa indrāya kruddhaḥ sarpaḥ iva śvasan
tasya jyā tala nirghoṣam sa śrutvā rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
vivarṇa vadanaḥ bhūtvā lakṣmaṇam samudaikṣata
tam viṣaṇṇa mukham dṛṣṭvā rākṣasam rāvaṇa ātmajam
saumitrim yuddha saṃsaktam pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
nimittāni anupaśyāmi yāni asmin rāvaṇa ātmaje

original: 6.076.004c tvara tena mahābāho bhagna eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tvara tena mahā bāho bhagnaḥ eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
tatas saṃdhāya saumitriḥ śarān agni śikhā upamān

original: 6.076.005c mumoca niśitāṃs tasmai sarvān iva viṣolbaṇān
analyzed: mumoca niśitān tasmai sarvān iva viṣa ulbaṇān
śakra aśani sama sparśaiḥ lakṣmaṇena āhataḥ śaraiḥ
muhūrtam abhavat mūḍhaḥ sarva saṃkṣubhita indriyaḥ
upalabhya muhūrtena saṃjñām pratyāgata indriyaḥ
dadarśa avasthitam vīram vīraḥ daśaratha ātmajam
saḥ bhicakrāma saumitrim roṣāt saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 6.076.008c abravīc cainam āsādya punaḥ sa paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca enam āsādya punar sa paruṣam vacaḥ

original: 6.076.009a kiṃ na smarasi tad yuddhe prathame matparākramam
analyzed: kim na smarasi tat yuddhe prathame mad parākramam

original: 6.076.009c nibaddhas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā yadā yudhi viceṣṭase
analyzed: nibaddhaḥ tvam saha bhrātrā yadā yudhi viceṣṭase
yuvā khalu mahā yuddhe śakra aśani samaiḥ śaraiḥ
śāyinau prathamam bhūmau visaṃjñau sa puraḥsarau

original: 6.076.011a smṛtir vā nāsti te manye vyaktaṃ vā yamasādanam
analyzed: smṛtiḥ vā nā asti te manye vyaktam vā yama sādanam

original: 6.076.011c gantum icchasi yasmāt tvaṃ māṃ dharṣayitum icchasi
analyzed: gantum icchasi yasmāt tvam mām dharṣayitum icchasi

original: 6.076.012a yadi te prathame yuddhe na dṛṣṭo matparākramaḥ
analyzed: yadi te prathame yuddhe na dṛṣṭaḥ mad parākramaḥ
adya tvām darśayiṣyāmi tiṣṭha idānīm vyavasthitaḥ

original: 6.076.013a ity uktvā saptabhir bāṇair abhivivyādha lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: iti uktvā saptabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ abhivivyādha lakṣmaṇam
daśabhiḥ ca hanūmantam tīkṣṇa dhāraiḥ śara uttamaiḥ
tatas śara śatena eva su prayuktena vīryavān
krodhāt dviguṇa saṃrabdhaḥ nirbibheda vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.076.015a tad dṛṣṭvendrajitaḥ karma kṛtaṃ rāmānujas tadā
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā indrajitaḥ karma kṛtam rāma anujaḥ tadā

original: 6.076.015c acintayitvā prahasan naitat kiṃ cid iti bruvan
analyzed: a cintayitvā prahasan na etat kim cit iti bruvan

original: 6.076.016a mumoca sa śarān ghorān saṃgṛhya narapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: mumoca sa śarān ghorān saṃgṛhya nara puṃgavaḥ
abhīta vadanaḥ kruddhaḥ rāvaṇim lakṣmaṇaḥ yudhi
na evam raṇa gataḥ śūrāḥ praharanti niśācara

original: 6.076.017c laghavaś cālpavīryāś ca sukhā hīme śarās tava
analyzed: laghavaḥ ca alpa vīryāḥ ca sukhāḥ hi ime śarāḥ tava

original: 6.076.018a naivaṃ śūrās tu yudhyante samare jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: na evam śūrāḥ tu yudhyante samare jaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.076.018c ity evaṃ taṃ bruvāṇas tu śaravarṣair avākirat
analyzed: iti evam tam bruvāṇaḥ tu śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 6.076.019a tasya bāṇais tu vidhvastaṃ kavacaṃ hemabhūṣitam
analyzed: tasya bāṇaiḥ tu vidhvastam kavacam hema bhūṣitam
vyaśīryata rathopasthe tārā jālam iva ambarāt
vidhūta varmā nārācaiḥ babhūva sa kṛta vraṇaḥ

original: 6.076.020c indrajit samare śūraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
analyzed: indrajit samare śūraḥ prarūḍhaḥ iva sānumān

original: 6.076.021a abhīkṣṇaṃ niśvasantau hi yudhyetāṃ tumulaṃ yudhi
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam niśvasantau hi yudhyetām tumulam yudhi
śara saṃkṛtta sarva aṅgau sarvatas rudhira ukṣitau

original: 6.076.022a astrāṇy astravidāṃ śreṣṭhau darśayantau punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: astrāṇi astra vidām śreṣṭhau darśayantau punar punar
śarān uccāvaca ākārān antarikṣe babandhatuḥ

original: 6.076.023a vyapetadoṣam asyantau laghucitraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca
analyzed: vyapeta doṣam asyantau laghu citram ca suṣṭhu ca

original: 6.076.023c ubhau tu tumulaṃ ghoraṃ cakratur nararākṣasau
analyzed: ubhau tu tumulam ghoram cakratuḥ nara rākṣasau
tayoḥ pṛthak pṛthak bhīmaḥ śuśruve tala nisvanaḥ
su ghorayoḥ niṣṭanatoḥ gagane meghayoḥ iva

original: 6.076.025a te gātrayor nipatitā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śarā yudhi
analyzed: te gātrayoḥ nipatitāḥ rukma puṅkhāḥ śarāḥ yudhi
asṛj digdhāḥ viniṣpetuḥ viviśuḥ dharaṇī talam
anyaiḥ su niśitaiḥ śastraiḥ ākāśe saṃjaghaṭṭire

original: 6.076.026c babhañjuś cicchiduś cāpi tayor bāṇāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: babhañjuḥ cicchiduḥ ca api tayoḥ bāṇāḥ sahasraśas

original: 6.076.027a sa babhūva raṇe ghoras tayor bāṇamayaś cayaḥ
analyzed: sa babhūva raṇe ghoraḥ tayoḥ bāṇa mayaḥ cayaḥ

original: 6.076.027c agnibhyām iva dīptābhyāṃ satre kuśamayaś cayaḥ
analyzed: agnibhyām iva dīptābhyām satre kuśa mayaḥ cayaḥ
tayoḥ kṛta vraṇau dehau śuśubhāte mahātmanoḥ
sa puṣpau iva niṣpatrau vane śālmali kuṃśukau

original: 6.076.029a cakratus tumulaṃ ghoraṃ saṃnipātaṃ muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: cakratuḥ tumulam ghoram saṃnipātam muhur muhur
indrajit lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva paraspara jaya eṣiṇau

original: 6.076.030a lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇiṃ yuddhe rāvaṇiś cāpi lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ rāvaṇim yuddhe rāvaṇiḥ ca api lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.076.030c anyonyaṃ tāv abhighnantau na śramaṃ pratyapadyatām
analyzed: anyonyam tau abhighnantau na śramam pratyapadyatām
bāṇa jālaiḥ śarīra sthaiḥ avagāḍhaiḥ tarasvinau
śuśubhāte mahā vīrau virūḍhau iva parvatau
tayoḥ rudhira siktāni saṃvṛtāni śaraiḥ bhṛśam
babhrājuḥ sarva gātrāṇi jvalantaḥ iva pāvakāḥ

original: 6.076.033a tayor atha mahān kālo vyatīyād yudhyamānayoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ atha mahān kālaḥ vyatīyāt yudhyamānayoḥ

original: 6.076.033c na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ
analyzed: na ca tau yuddha vaimukhyam śramam vā api upajagmatuḥ
atha samara pariśramam nihantum
samara mukheṣu ajitasya lakṣmaṇasya
priya hitam upapādayat mahā ojāḥ
samaram upetya vibhīṣaṇaḥ vatasthe

original: 6.077.001a yudhyamānau tu tau dṛṣṭvā prasaktau nararākṣasau
analyzed: yudhyamānau tu tau dṛṣṭvā prasaktau nara rākṣasau
śūraḥ sa rāvaṇa bhrātā tasthau saṃgrāma mūrdhani

original: 6.077.002a tato visphārayām āsa mahad dhanur avasthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas visphārayām āsa mahat dhanuḥ avasthitaḥ
utsasarja ca tīkṣṇa agrān rākṣaseṣu mahā śarān
te śarāḥ śikhi saṃkāśāḥ nipatantaḥ samāhitāḥ

original: 6.077.003c rākṣasān dārayām āsur vajrā iva mahāgirīn
analyzed: rākṣasān dārayām āsuḥ vajrāḥ iva mahā girīn
vibhīṣaṇasya anucarāḥ te pi śūla asi paṭṭasaiḥ
ciccheduḥ samare vīrān rākṣasān rākṣasa uttamāḥ

original: 6.077.005a rākṣasais taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa tadā tu vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa tadā tu vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.077.005c babhau madhye prahṛṣṭānāṃ kalabhānām iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: babhau madhye prahṛṣṭānām kalabhānām iva dvipaḥ
tatas saṃcodayānaḥ vai harīn rakṣaḥ raṇa priyān

original: 6.077.006c uvāca vacanaṃ kāle kālajño rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: uvāca vacanam kāle kāla jñaḥ rakṣasām varaḥ
ekaḥ yam rākṣasa indrasya parāyaṇam iva sthitaḥ

original: 6.077.007c etac cheṣaṃ balaṃ tasya kiṃ tiṣṭhata harīśvarāḥ
analyzed: etat śeṣam balam tasya kim tiṣṭhata hari īśvarāḥ
asmin vinihate pāpe rākṣase raṇa mūrdhani

original: 6.077.008c rāvaṇaṃ varjayitvā tu śeṣam asya balaṃ hatam
analyzed: rāvaṇam varjayitvā tu śeṣam asya balam hatam

original: 6.077.009a prahasto nihato vīro nikumbhaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: prahastaḥ nihataḥ vīraḥ nikumbhaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 6.077.009c kumbhakarṇaś ca kumbhaś ca dhūmrākṣaś ca niśācaraḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ ca kumbhaḥ ca dhūmrākṣaḥ ca niśācaraḥ

original: 6.077.010a akampanaḥ supārśvaś ca cakramālī ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: akampanaḥ supārśvaḥ ca cakramālī ca rākṣasaḥ
kampanaḥ sattvavantaḥ ca devāntaka narāntakau
etān nihatya atibalān bahūn rākṣasa sattamān

original: 6.077.011c bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tīrtvā laṅghyatāṃ goṣpadaṃ laghu
analyzed: bāhubhyām sāgaram tīrtvā laṅghyatām goṣpadam laghu

original: 6.077.012a etāvad iha śeṣaṃ vo jetavyam iha vānarāḥ
analyzed: etāvat iha śeṣam vaḥ jetavyam iha vānarāḥ
hatāḥ sarve samāgamya rākṣasāḥ bala darpitāḥ

original: 6.077.013a ayuktaṃ nidhanaṃ kartuṃ putrasya janitur mama
analyzed: ayuktam nidhanam kartum putrasya janituḥ mama

original: 6.077.013c ghṛṇām apāsya rāmārthe nihanyāṃ bhrātur ātmajam
analyzed: ghṛṇām apāsya rāma arthe nihanyām bhrātuḥ ātmajam

original: 6.077.014a hantukāmasya me bāṣpaṃ cakśuś caiva nirudhyate
analyzed: hantu kāmasya me bāṣpam cakśuḥ ca eva nirudhyate
tat eva eṣa mahā bāhuḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ śamayiṣyati

original: 6.077.014e vānarā ghnantuṃ saṃbhūya bhṛtyān asya samīpagān
analyzed: vānarāḥ ghnantum saṃbhūya bhṛtyān asya samīpa gān
iti tena ati yaśasā rākṣasena abhicoditāḥ
vānara indrāḥ jahṛṣire lāṅgalāni ca vivyadhuḥ

original: 6.077.016a tatas te kapiśārdūlāḥ kṣveḍantaś ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: tatas te kapi śārdūlāḥ kṣveḍantaḥ ca muhur muhur

original: 6.077.016c mumucur vividhān nādān meghān dṛṣṭveva barhiṇaḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ vividhān nādān meghān dṛṣṭvā iva barhiṇaḥ

original: 6.077.017a jāmbavān api taiḥ sarvaiḥ svayūthair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān api taiḥ sarvaiḥ sva yūthaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ

original: 6.077.017c aśmabhis tāḍayām āsa nakhair dantaiś ca rākṣasān
analyzed: aśmabhiḥ tāḍayām āsa nakhaiḥ dantaiḥ ca rākṣasān
nighnantam ṛkṣa adhipatim rākṣasāḥ te mahā balāḥ
parivavruḥ bhayam tyaktvā tam anekavidha āyudhāḥ
śaraiḥ paraśubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ yaṣṭi tomaraiḥ

original: 6.077.019c jāmbavantaṃ mṛdhe jaghnur nighnantaṃ rākṣasīṃ camūm
analyzed: jāmbavantam mṛdhe jaghnuḥ nighnantam rākṣasīm camūm
sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ saṃjajñe kapi rākṣasām
deva asurāṇām kruddhānām yathā bhīmaḥ mahā svanaḥ

original: 6.077.021a hanūmān api saṃkruddhaḥ sālam utpāṭya parvatāt
analyzed: hanūmān api saṃkruddhaḥ sālam utpāṭya parvatāt
rakṣasām kadanam cakre samāsādya sahasraśas

original: 6.077.022a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ pitṛvyasyendrajid yudhi
analyzed: sa dattvā tumulam yuddham pitṛvyasya indrajit yudhi
lakṣmaṇam para vīra ghnam punar eva abhyadhāvata

original: 6.077.023a tau prayuddhau tadā vīrau mṛdhe lakṣmaṇarākṣasau
analyzed: tau prayuddhau tadā vīrau mṛdhe lakṣmaṇa rākṣasau
śara oghān abhivarṣantau jaghnatuḥ tau parasparam
abhīkṣṇam antardadhatuḥ śara jālaiḥ mahā balau
candra ādityau iva uṣṇa ante yathā meghaiḥ tarasvinau

original: 6.077.025a na hy ādānaṃ na saṃdhānaṃ dhanuṣo vā parigrahaḥ
analyzed: na hi ādānam na saṃdhānam dhanuṣaḥ vā parigrahaḥ

original: 6.077.025c na vipramokṣo bāṇānāṃ na vikarṣo na vigrahaḥ
analyzed: na vipramokṣaḥ bāṇānām na vikarṣaḥ na vigrahaḥ
na muṣṭi pratisaṃdhānam na lakṣya pratipādanam
adṛśyata tayoḥ tatra yudhyatoḥ pāṇi lāghavāt
cāpa vega pramuktaiḥ ca bāṇa jālaiḥ samantataḥ
antarikṣe bhisaṃchanne na rūpāṇi cakāśire

original: 6.077.027e tamasā pihitaṃ sarvam āsīd bhīmataraṃ mahat
analyzed: tamasā pihitam sarvam āsīt bhīmataram mahat

original: 6.077.028a na tadānīiṃ vavau vāyur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ
analyzed: na tadānīm vavau vāyuḥ na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ

original: 6.077.028c svastyas tu lokebhya iti jajalpaś ca maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: svastyaḥ tu lokebhyaḥ iti jajalpaḥ ca mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 6.077.028e saṃpetuś cātra saṃprāptā gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: saṃpetuḥ ca atra saṃprāptāḥ gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ
atha rākṣasa siṃhasya kṛṣṇān kanaka bhūṣaṇān

original: 6.077.029c śaraiś caturbhiḥ saumitrir vivyādha caturo hayān
analyzed: śaraiḥ caturbhiḥ saumitriḥ vivyādha caturaḥ hayān
pareṇa bhallena sūtasya vicariṣyataḥ

original: 6.077.030c lāghavād rāghavaḥ śrīmāñ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
analyzed: lāghavāt rāghavaḥ śrīmām śiraḥ kāyāt apāharat
nihatam sārathim dṛṣṭvā samare rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.077.031c prajahau samaroddharṣaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha
analyzed: prajahau samara uddharṣam viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha
viṣaṇṇa vadanam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasam hari yūthapāḥ
tatas parama saṃhṛṣṭaḥ lakṣmaṇam ca abhyapūjayan
tatas pramāthī śarabhaḥ rabhasaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
amṛṣyamāṇāḥ catvāraḥ cakruḥ vegam hari īśvarāḥ

original: 6.077.034a te cāsya hayamukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ
analyzed: te ca asya haya mukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ
caturṣu su mahā vīryāḥ nipetuḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
teṣām adhiṣṭhitānām taiḥ vānaraiḥ parvata upamaiḥ
mukhebhyaḥ rudhiram vyaktam hayānām samavartata

original: 6.077.036a te nihatya hayāṃs tasya pramathya ca mahāratham
analyzed: te nihatya hayān tasya pramathya ca mahā ratham
punar utpatya vegena tasthuḥ lakṣmaṇa pārśvataḥ
sa hata aśvāt avaplutya rathāt mathita sāratheḥ
śara varṣeṇa saumitrim abhyadhāvata rāvaṇiḥ
tatas mahā indra pratiman sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
padātinam tam niśitaiḥ śara uttamaiḥ
sṛjantam ādau niśitām śara uttamān
bhṛśam tadā bāṇa gaṇaiḥ nyavārayat

original: 6.078.001a sa hatāśvo mahātejā bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ
analyzed: sa hata aśvaḥ mahā tejāḥ bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ
indrajit parama kruddhaḥ saṃprajajvāla tejasā

original: 6.078.002a tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantāv anyonyam iṣubhir bhṛśam
analyzed: tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantau anyonyam iṣubhiḥ bhṛśam
vijayena abhiniṣkrāntau vane gaja vṛṣau iva
nibarhayantaḥ ca anyonyam te rākṣasa vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.078.003c bhartāraṃ na jahur yuddhe saṃpatantas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: bhartāram na jahuḥ yuddhe saṃpatantaḥ tatas tatas

original: 6.078.004a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ samuddiśya paraṃ lāghavam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: sa lakṣmaṇam samuddiśya param lāghavam āsthitaḥ
vavarṣa śara varṣāṇi varṣāṇi iva puraṃdaraḥ

original: 6.078.005a muktam indrajitā tat tu śaravarṣam ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: muktam indrajitā tat tu śara varṣam ariṃdamaḥ
avārayat asaṃbhrāntaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ su durāsadam
abhedya kacanam matvā lakṣmaṇam rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.078.006c lalāṭe lakṣmaṇaṃ bāṇaiḥ supuṅkhais tribhir indrajit
analyzed: lalāṭe lakṣmaṇam bāṇaiḥ su puṅkhaiḥ tribhiḥ indrajit
avidhyat parama kruddhaḥ śīghram astram pradarśayan
taiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ lalāṭa sthaiḥ śuśubhe raghunandanaḥ
raṇa agre samara ślāghī triśṛṅgaḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 6.078.008a sa tathāpy ardito bāṇai rākṣasena mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: sa tathā api arditaḥ bāṇaiḥ rākṣasena mahā mṛdhe

original: 6.078.008c tam āśu prativivyādha lakṣmaṇaḥ panabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam āśu prativivyādha lakṣmaṇaḥ panabhiḥ śaraiḥ
lakṣmaṇa indrajitau vīrau mahā bala śarāsanau
anyonyam jaghnatuḥ bāṇaiḥ viśikhaiḥ bhīma vikramau
tau parasparam abhyetya sarva gātreṣu dhanvinau

original: 6.078.010c ghorair vivyadhatur bāṇaiḥ kṛtabhāvāv ubhau jaye
analyzed: ghoraiḥ vivyadhatuḥ bāṇaiḥ kṛta bhāvau ubhau jaye
tasmai dṛḍhataram kruddhaḥ hata aśvāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
vajra sparśa samān pañca sasarja urasi mārgaṇān

original: 6.078.012a te tasya kāyaṃ nirbhidya rukmapuṅkhā nimittagāḥ
analyzed: te tasya kāyam nirbhidya rukma puṅkhāḥ nimitta gāḥ
babhūvuḥ lohita ādigdhāḥ rakṭāḥ iva mahā uragāḥ

original: 6.078.013a sa pitṛvyasya saṃkruddha indrajic charam ādade
analyzed: sa pitṛvyasya saṃkruddhaḥ indrajit śaram ādade
uttamam rakṣasām madhye yamadattam mahā balaḥ

original: 6.078.014a taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā maheṣuṃ tena saṃhitam
analyzed: tam samīkṣya mahā tejāḥ mahā iṣum tena saṃhitam
lakṣmaṇaḥ pi ādade bāṇam anyam bhīma parākramaḥ

original: 6.078.015a kubereṇa svayaṃ svapne yad dattam amitātmanā
analyzed: kubereṇa svayam svapne yat dattam amita ātmanā

original: 6.078.015c durjayaṃ durviṣahyaṃ ca sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: durjayam durviṣahyam ca sa indraiḥ api sura asuraiḥ

original: 6.078.016a tābhyāṃ tau dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe saṃhitau sāyakottamau
analyzed: tābhyām tau dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe saṃhitau sāyaka uttamau
vikṛṣyamāṇau vīrābhyām bhṛśam jajvalatuḥ śriyā

original: 6.078.017a tau bhāsayantāv ākāśaṃ dhanurbhyāṃ viśikhau cyutau
analyzed: tau bhāsayantau ākāśam dhanurbhyām viśikhau cyutau
mukhena mukham āhatya saṃnipetatuḥ ojasā
tau mahā graha saṃkāśau anyonyam saṃnipatya ca
saṃgrāme śatadhā yātau medinyām vinipetatuḥ

original: 6.078.019a śarau pratihatau dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
analyzed: śarau pratihatau dṛṣṭvā tau ubhau raṇa mūrdhani
vrīḍitaḥ jāta roṣau ca lakṣmaṇa indrajitau ubhau

original: 6.078.020a susaṃrabdhas tu saumitrir astraṃ vāruṇam ādade
analyzed: su saṃrabdhaḥ tu saumitriḥ astram vāruṇam ādade

original: 6.078.020c raudraṃ mahedrajid yuddhe vyasṛjad yudhi viṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: raudram mahā idrajit yuddhe vyasṛjat yudhi viṣṭhitaḥ
tayoḥ su tumulam yuddham saṃbabhūva adbhuta upamam
gagana sthāni bhūtāni lakṣmaṇam paryavārayan
bhairava abhirute bhīme yuddhe vānara rākṣasām

original: 6.078.022c bhūtair bahubhir ākāśaṃ vismitair āvṛtaṃ babhau
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ bahubhiḥ ākāśam vismitaiḥ āvṛtam babhau
ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ gandharvāḥ garuṇa uragāḥ
śatakratum puraskṛtya rarakṣuḥ lakṣmaṇam raṇe
atha anyam mārgaṇa śreṣṭham saṃdadhe rāvaṇa anujaḥ
hutāśana sama sparśam rāvaṇa ātmaja dāruṇam
su patram anuvṛtta aṅgam su parvāṇam su saṃsthitam
suvarṇa vikṛtam vīraḥ śarīra anta karam śaram
durāvāram durviṣaham rākṣasānām bhaya āvaham
āśīviṣa viṣa prakhyam deva saṃghaiḥ samarcitam

original: 6.078.027a yena śakro mahātejā dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
analyzed: yena śakraḥ mahā tejāḥ dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
purā devāsure yuddhe vīryavān harivāhanaḥ

original: 6.078.028a tad aindram astraṃ saumitriḥ saṃyugeṣv aparājitam
analyzed: tat aindram astram saumitriḥ saṃyugeṣu aparājitam
śara śreṣṭham dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe nara śreṣṭhaḥ bhisaṃdadhe
saṃdhāya amitra dalanam vicakarṣa śarāsanam

original: 6.078.029c sajyam āyamya durdharśaḥ kālo lokakṣaye yathā
analyzed: sajyam āyamya durdharśaḥ kālaḥ loka kṣaye yathā

original: 6.078.030a saṃdhāya dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe vikarṣann idam abravīt
analyzed: saṃdhāya dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe vikarṣan idam abravīt
lakṣmīvān lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam artha sādhakam ātmanaḥ

original: 6.078.031a dharmātmā satyasaṃdhaś ca rāmo dāśarathir yadi
analyzed: dharma ātmā satya saṃdhaḥ ca rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ yadi

original: 6.078.031c pauruṣe cāpratidvandvas tad enaṃ jahi rāvaṇim
analyzed: pauruṣe ca apratidvandvaḥ tat enam jahi rāvaṇim

original: 6.078.032a ity uktvā bāṇam ākarṇaṃ vikṛṣya tam ajihmagam
analyzed: iti uktvā bāṇam ākarṇam vikṛṣya tam ajihmagam
lakṣmaṇaḥ samare vīraḥ sasarja indrajitam prati
aindra astreṇa samāyujya lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 6.078.033a tac chiraḥ saśiras trāṇaṃ śrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam
analyzed: tat śiraḥ sa śiraḥ trāṇam śrīmat jvalita kuṇḍalam
pramathya indrajitaḥ kāyāt papāta dharaṇī tale
tat rākṣasa tanūjasya chinna skandham śiraḥ mahat
tapanīya nibham bhūmau dadṛśe rudhira ukṣitam
hataḥ tu nipapāta āśu dharaṇyām rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ
kavacī sa śirastrāṇaḥ vidhvastaḥ sa śarāsanaḥ

original: 6.078.036a cukruśus te tataḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: cukruśuḥ te tatas sarve vānarāḥ sa vibhīṣaṇāḥ

original: 6.078.036c hṛṣyanto nihate tasmin devā vṛtravadhe yathā
analyzed: hṛṣyantaḥ nihate tasmin devāḥ vṛtra vadhe yathā
atha antarikṣe bhūtānām ṛṣīṇām ca mahātmanām
abhijajñe ca saṃnādaḥ gandharva apsarasām api
patitam samabhijñāya rākṣasī sā mahā camūḥ
vadhyamānāḥ diśaḥ bheje haribhiḥ jita kāśibhiḥ

original: 6.078.039a vanarair vadhyamānās te śastrāṇy utsṛjya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: vanaraiḥ vadhyamānāḥ te śastrāṇi utsṛjya rākṣasāḥ
laṅkām abhimukhāḥ sarve naṣṭa saṃjñāḥ pradhāvitāḥ

original: 6.078.040a dudruvur bahudhā bhītā rākṣasāḥ śataśo diśaḥ
analyzed: dudruvuḥ bahudhā bhītāḥ rākṣasāḥ śataśas diśaḥ
tyaktvā praharaṇān sarve paṭṭasa asi paraśvadhān

original: 6.078.041a ke cil laṅkāṃ paritrastāḥ praviṣṭā vānarārditāḥ
analyzed: ke cit laṅkām paritrastāḥ praviṣṭāḥ vānara arditāḥ

original: 6.078.041c samudre patitāḥ ke cit ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
analyzed: samudre patitāḥ ke cit ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
hatam indrajitam dṛṣṭvā śayānam samara kṣitau

original: 6.078.042c rākṣasānāṃ sahasreṣu na kaś cit pratyadṛśyata
analyzed: rākṣasānām sahasreṣu na kaḥ cit pratyadṛśyata
yathā astam gate āditye na avatiṣṭhanti raśmayaḥ

original: 6.078.043c tathā tasmin nipatite rākṣasās te gatā diśaḥ
analyzed: tathā tasmin nipatite rākṣasāḥ te gatāḥ diśaḥ
śānta rakśmiḥ iva ādityaḥ nirvāṇaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
sa babhūva mahā tejāḥ vyapāsta gata jīvitaḥ
praśānta pīḍāḥ bahulaḥ vinaṣṭa ariḥ praharṣavān
babhūva lokaḥ patite rākṣasa indra sute tadā

original: 6.078.046a harṣaṃ ca śakro bhagavān saha sarvaiḥ surarṣabhaiḥ
analyzed: harṣam ca śakraḥ bhagavān saha sarvaiḥ sura ṛṣabhaiḥ
jagāma nihate tasmin rākṣase pāpa karmaṇi

original: 6.078.047a śuddhā āpo nabhaś caiva jahṛṣur daityadānavāḥ
analyzed: śuddhāḥ āpaḥ nabhaḥ ca eva jahṛṣuḥ daitya dānavāḥ
ājagmuḥ patite tasmin sarva loka bhaya āvahe
ūcuḥ ca sahitāḥ sarve deva gandharva dānavāḥ
vijvarāḥ śānta kaluṣāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vicarantu iti
tatas bhyanandan saṃhṛṣṭāḥ samare hari yūthapāḥ
tam apratibalam dṛṣṭvā hatam nairṛta puṃgavam
vibhīṣaṇaḥ hanūmān ca jāmbavān ca ṛkṣa yūthapaḥ
vijayena abhinandantaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca api lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.078.051a kṣveḍantaś ca nadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: kṣveḍantaḥ ca nadantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
labdhalakṣāḥ raghu sutam parivārya upatasthire
lāṅgūlāni pravidhyantaḥ sphoṭayantaḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 6.078.052c lakṣmaṇo jayatīty evaṃ vākyaṃ vyaśrāvayaṃs tadā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ jayati iti evam vākyam vyaśrāvayan tadā
anyonyam ca samāśliṣya kapayaḥ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
cakruḥ uccāvaca guṇāḥ rāghava āśraya jāḥ kathāḥ
tat asukaram atha abhivīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ
priya suhṛdaḥ yudhi lakṣmaṇasya karma
paramam upalabhan manaḥ praharṣam
vinihatam indra ripum niśamya devāḥ
rudhira klinna gātraḥ tu lakṣmaṇaḥ śubha lakṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.079.001c babhūva hṛṣṭas taṃ hatvā śakrajetāram āhave
analyzed: babhūva hṛṣṭaḥ tam hatvā śakra jetāram āhave

original: 6.079.002a tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ ca vīryavān
analyzed: tatas sa jāmbavantam ca hanūmantam ca vīryavān

original: 6.079.002c saṃnivartya mahātejās tāṃś ca sarvān vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: saṃnivartya mahā tejāḥ tān ca sarvān vanaukasaḥ
ājagāma tatas śīghram yatra sugrīva rāghavau
vibhīṣaṇam avaṣṭabhya hanūmantam ca lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.079.004a tato rāmam abhikramya saumitrir abhivādya ca
analyzed: tatas rāmam abhikramya saumitriḥ abhivādya ca
tasthau bhrātṛ samīpa sthaḥ śakrasya indrānujaḥ yathā

original: 6.079.004e ācacakṣe tadā vīro ghoram indrajito vadham
analyzed: ācacakṣe tadā vīraḥ ghoram indrajitaḥ vadham

original: 6.079.005a rāvaṇas tu śiraś chinnaṃ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu śiraḥ chinnam lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
nyavedayata rāmāya tadā hṛṣṭaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
upaveśya tam utsaṅge pariṣvajya avapīḍitam

original: 6.079.006c mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya bhūyaḥ saṃspṛśya ca tvaran
analyzed: mūrdhni ca enam upāghrāya bhūyas saṃspṛśya ca tvaran
uvāca lakṣmaṇam vākyam āśvāsya puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
kṛtam parama kalyāṇam karma duṣkara kāriṇā

original: 6.079.007c niramitraḥ kṛto 'smy adya niryāsyati hi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: niramitraḥ kṛtaḥ smi adya niryāsyati hi rāvaṇaḥ
bala vyūhena mahatā śrutvā putram nipātitam
tam putra vadha saṃtaptam niryāntam rākṣasa adhipam
balena āvṛtya mahatā nihaniṣyāmi durjayam

original: 6.079.009a tvayā lakṣmaṇa nāthena sītā ca pṛthivī ca me
analyzed: tvayā lakṣmaṇa nāthena sītā ca pṛthivī ca me

original: 6.079.009c na duṣprāpā hate tv adya śakrajetari cāhave
analyzed: na duṣprāpā hate tu adya śakra jetari ca āhave

original: 6.079.010a sa taṃ bhrātaram āśvāsya pāriṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa tam bhrātaram āśvāsya pāriṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
rāmaḥ suṣeṇam muditaḥ samābhāṣya idam abravīt
sa śalyaḥ yam mahā prājñaḥ saumitriḥ mitra vatsalaḥ

original: 6.079.011c yathā bhavati susvasthas tathā tvaṃ samupācara
analyzed: yathā bhavati su svasthaḥ tathā tvam samupācara
viśalyaḥ kriyatām kṣipram saumitriḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
kṛṣa vānara sainyānām śūrāṇām druma yodhinām

original: 6.079.012c ye cānye 'tra ca yudhyantaḥ saśalyā vraṇinas tathā
analyzed: ye ca anye ca yudhyantaḥ sa śalyāḥ vraṇinaḥ tathā

original: 6.079.012e te 'pi sarve prayatnena kriyantāṃ sukhinas tvayā
analyzed: te sarve prayatnena kriyantām sukhinaḥ tvayā

original: 6.079.013a evam uktaḥ sa rāmeṇa mahātmā hariyūthapaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa rāmeṇa mahātmā hari yūthapaḥ
lakṣmaṇāya dadau nastas suṣeṇaḥ parama auṣadham

original: 6.079.014a sa tasya gandham āghrāya viśalyaḥ samapadyata
analyzed: sa tasya gandham āghrāya viśalyaḥ samapadyata

original: 6.079.014c tadā nirvedanaś caiva saṃrūḍhavraṇa eva ca
analyzed: tadā nirvedanaḥ ca eva saṃrūḍha vraṇaḥ eva ca
vibhīṣaṇa mukhānām ca suhṛdām rāghava ājñayā
sarva vānara mukhyānām cikitsām sa tadā akarot
tatas prakṛtim āpannaḥ hṛta śalyaḥ gata vyathaḥ
saumitriḥ muditaḥ tatra kṣaṇena vigata jvaraḥ
tathā eva rāmaḥ plavaga adhipaḥ tadā
vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca ṛkṣa patiḥ ca jāmbavān
avekṣya saumitrim arogam utthitam
mudā sa sainyaḥ su ciram jaharṣire
apūjayat karma sa lakṣmaṇasya
su duṣkaram dāśarathiḥ mahātmā
hṛṣṭāḥ babhūvuḥ yudhi yūthapa indrā
niśamya tam śakrajitam nipātitam

original: 6.080.001a tataḥ paulastya sacivāḥ śrutvā cendrajitaṃ hatam
analyzed: tatas paulastya sacivāḥ śrutvā ca indrajitam hatam
ācacakṣuḥ abhijñāya daśagrīvāya sa vyathāḥ
yuddhe hataḥ mahā rāja lakṣmaṇena tava ātmajaḥ
vibhīṣaṇa sahāyena miṣatām naḥ mahā dyute
śūraḥ śūreṇa saṃgamya saṃyugeṣu aparājitaḥ

original: 6.080.003c lakṣṇanena hataḥ śūraḥ putras te vibudhendrajit
analyzed: lakṣṇanena hataḥ śūraḥ putraḥ te vibudha indrajit

original: 6.080.004a sa taṃ pratibhayaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ putrasya dāruṇam
analyzed: sa tam pratibhayam śrutvā vadham putrasya dāruṇam

original: 6.080.004c ghoram indrajitaḥ saṃkhye kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
analyzed: ghoram indrajitaḥ saṃkhye kaśmalam prāviśat mahat
upalabhya cirāt saṃjñām rājā rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
putra śoka arditaḥ dīnaḥ vilalāpa ākula indriyaḥ
hā rākṣasa camū mukhya mama vatsa mahā ratha

original: 6.080.006c jitvendraṃ katham adya tvaṃ lakṣmaṇasya vaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: jitvā indram katham adya tvam lakṣmaṇasya vaśam gataḥ

original: 6.080.007a nanu tvam iṣubhiḥ kruddho bhindyāḥ kālāntakāv api
analyzed: nanu tvam iṣubhiḥ kruddhaḥ bhindyāḥ kāla antakau api

original: 6.080.007c mandarasyāpi śṛṅgāṇi kiṃ punar lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: mandarasya api śṛṅgāṇi kim punar lakṣmaṇam raṇe

original: 6.080.008a adya vaivasvato rājā bhūyo bahumato mama
analyzed: adya vaivasvataḥ rājā bhūyas bahu mataḥ mama
yena adya tvam mahā bāho saṃyuktaḥ kāladharmaṇā
eṣa panthāḥ su yodhānām sarva amara gaṇeṣu api

original: 6.080.009c yaḥ kṛte hanyate bhartuḥ sa pumān svargam ṛcchati
analyzed: yaḥ kṛte hanyate bhartuḥ sa pumān svargam ṛcchati
adya deva gaṇāḥ sarve lokapālāḥ tathā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 6.080.010c hatam indrajitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ svapsyanti nirbhayāḥ
analyzed: hatam indrajitam dṛṣṭvā sukham svapsyanti nirbhayāḥ

original: 6.080.011a adya lokās trayaḥ kṛtsnāḥ pṛthivī ca sakānanā
analyzed: adya lokāḥ trayaḥ kṛtsnāḥ pṛthivī ca sa kānanā
ekena indrajitā hīnā śūṇī eva pratibhāti me
adya nairṛtakanyāyām śroṣyāmi antaḥpure ravam
kareṇu saṃghasya yathā ninādam giri gahvare

original: 6.080.013a yauvarājyaṃ ca laṅkāṃ ca rakṣāṃsi ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: yauvarājyam ca laṅkām ca rakṣāṃsi ca paraṃtapa

original: 6.080.013c mātaraṃ māṃ ca bhāryāṃ ca kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
analyzed: mātaram mām ca bhāryām ca kva gataḥ si vihāya naḥ

original: 6.080.014a mama nāma tvayā vīra gatasya yamasādanam
analyzed: mama nāma tvayā vīra gatasya yama sādanam
pretakāryāṇi kāryāṇi viparīte hi vartase

original: 6.080.015a sa tvaṃ jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca salakṣmaṇe
analyzed: sa tvam jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca sa lakṣmaṇe

original: 6.080.015c mama śalyam anuddhṛtya kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
analyzed: mama śalyam an uddhṛtya kva gataḥ si vihāya naḥ
evam ādi vilāpa ārtam rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam
āviveśa mahān kopaḥ putra vyasana saṃbhavaḥ

original: 6.080.017a ghoraṃ prakṛtyā rūpaṃ tat tasya krodhāgnimūrchitam
analyzed: ghoram prakṛtyā rūpam tat tasya krodha agni mūrchitam
babhūva rūpam rudrasya kruddhasya iva durāsadam
tasya kruddhasya netrābhyām prāpatan asra bindavaḥ
dīptābhyām iva dīpābhyām sa arciṣaḥ sneha bindavaḥ
dantān vidaśataḥ tasya śrūyate daśana svanaḥ
yantrasya āveṣṭyamānasya mahataḥ dānavaiḥ iva

original: 6.080.020a kālāgnir iva saṃkruddho yāṃ yāṃ diśam avaikṣata
analyzed: kālāgniḥ iva saṃkruddhaḥ yām yām diśam avaikṣata
tasyām tasyām bhaya trastāḥ rākṣasāḥ saṃnililyire
tam antakam iva kruddham carācara cikhādiṣum
vīkṣamāṇam diśaḥ sarvāḥ rākṣasāḥ na upacakramuḥ
tatas parama saṃkruddhaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
abravīt rakṣasām madhye saṃstambhayiṣuḥ āhave
mayā varṣa sahasrāṇi caritvā duścaram tapaḥ
teṣu teṣu avakāśeṣu svayambhūḥ paritoṣitaḥ

original: 6.080.024a tasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādāc ca svayambhuvaḥ
analyzed: tasya eva tapasaḥ vyuṣṭyā prasādāt ca svayambhuvaḥ

original: 6.080.024c nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadā cana
analyzed: na asurebhyaḥ na devebhyaḥ bhayam mama kadā cana
kavacam brahma dattam me yat āditya sama prabham
deva asura vimardeṣu na bhinnam vajra śaktibhiḥ

original: 6.080.026a tena mām adya saṃyuktaṃ rathastham iha saṃyuge
analyzed: tena mām adya saṃyuktam ratha stham iha saṃyuge

original: 6.080.026c pratīyāt ko 'dya mām ājau sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: pratīyāt kaḥ dya mām ājau sākṣāt api puraṃdaraḥ
yat tadā abhiprasannena sa śaram kārmukam mahat
deva asura vimardeṣu mama dattam svayambhuvā

original: 6.080.028a adya tūryaśatair bhīmaṃ dhanur utthāpyatāṃ mahat
analyzed: adya tūrya śataiḥ bhīmam dhanuḥ utthāpyatām mahat
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ eva vadhāya parama āhave
sa putra vadha saṃtaptaḥ śūraḥ krodha vaśam gataḥ

original: 6.080.029c samīkṣya rāvaṇo buddhyā sītāṃ hantuṃ vyavasyata
analyzed: samīkṣya rāvaṇaḥ buddhyā sītām hantum vyavasyata
pratyavekṣya tu tāmra akṣaḥ su ghoraḥ ghora darśanān

original: 6.080.030c dīno dīnasvarān sarvāṃs tān uvāca niśācarān
analyzed: dīnaḥ dīna svarān sarvān tān uvāca niśācarān
māyayā mama vatsena vañcana artham vanaukasām

original: 6.080.031c kiṃ cid eva hataṃ tatra sīteyam iti darśitam
analyzed: kim cit eva hatam tatra sītā iyam iti darśitam

original: 6.080.032a tad idaṃ satyam evāhaṃ kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat idam satyam eva aham kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
vaidehīm nāśayiṣyāmi kṣatrabandhum anuvratām

original: 6.080.032e ity evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat
analyzed: iti evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat
uddhṛtya guṇa saṃpannam vimala ambara varcasam

original: 6.080.033c niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivaiḥ vṛtaḥ
rāvaṇaḥ putra śokena bhṛśam ākula cetanaḥ

original: 6.080.034c saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī
analyzed: saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī
vrajantam rākṣasam prekṣya siṃhanādam pracukruśuḥ

original: 6.080.035c ūcuś cānyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca anyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddham prekṣya rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.080.036a adyainaṃ tāv ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ
analyzed: adyā enam tau ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ
lokapālāḥ hi catvāraḥ kruddhena anena nirjitāḥ
bahavaḥ śatravaḥ ca anye saṃyugeṣu abhipātitāḥ
teṣām saṃjalpamānānām aśoka vanikām gatām
abhidudrāva vaidehīm rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
vāryamāṇaḥ su saṃkruddhaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ hita buddhibhiḥ

original: 6.080.038c abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe graho rohiṇīm iva
analyzed: abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe grahaḥ rohiṇīm iva
maithilī rakṣyamāṇā tu rākṣasībhiḥ aninditā
dadarśa rākṣasam kruddham nistriṃśa vara dhāriṇam
tam niśāmya sa nistriṃśam vyathitā janakātmajā
nivāryamāṇam bahuśas suhṛdbhiḥ anivartinam
yathā ayam mām abhikruddhaḥ samabhidravati svayam

original: 6.080.041c vadhiṣyati sanāthāṃ mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ
analyzed: vadhiṣyati sa nāthām mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ

original: 6.080.042a bahuśaś codayām āsa bhartāraṃ mām anuvratām
analyzed: bahuśas codayām āsa bhartāram mām anuvratām
bhāryā bhava ramasya iti pratyākhyātaḥ bhavat mayā

original: 6.080.043a so 'yaṃ mām anupasthānād vyaktaṃ nairāśyam āgataḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam mām anupasthānāt vyaktam nairāśyam āgataḥ
krodha moha samāviṣṭaḥ nihantum mām samudyataḥ

original: 6.080.044a atha vā tau naravyāghrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: atha vā tau nara vyāghrau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
mad nimittam anāryeṇa samare nipātitau
aho dhik mad nimittaḥ yam vināśaḥ rāja putrayoḥ

original: 6.080.045a hanūmato hi tadvākyaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṣudrayā mayā
analyzed: hanūmataḥ hi tat vākyam na kṛtam kṣudrayā mayā

original: 6.080.045c yady ahaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhena tadāyāsam aninditā
analyzed: yadi aham tasya pṛṣṭhena tadā ayāsam aninditā
na adya evam anuśoceyam bhartuḥ aṅka gatā satī

original: 6.080.046a manye tu hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati
analyzed: manye tu hṛdayam tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati

original: 6.080.046c ekaputrā yadā putraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ śroṣyate yudhi
analyzed: eka putrā yadā putram vinaṣṭam śroṣyate yudhi

original: 6.080.047a sā hi janma ca bālyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: sā hi janma ca bālyam ca yauvanam ca mahātmanaḥ
dharma kāryāṇi rūpam ca rudatī saṃsramiṣyati

original: 6.080.048a nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā
analyzed: nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā

original: 6.080.048c agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apo vāpi pravekṣyati
analyzed: agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apaḥ vā api pravekṣyati

original: 6.080.049a dhig astu kubjām asatīṃ mantharāṃ pāpaniścayām
analyzed: dhik astu kubjām asatīm mantharām pāpa niścayām
yad nimittam idam duḥkham kausalyā pratipatsyate

original: 6.080.050a ity evaṃ maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm
analyzed: iti evam maithilīm dṛṣṭvā vilapantīm tapasvinīm

original: 6.080.050c rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā grahavaśaṃ gatām
analyzed: rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā graha vaśam gatām
supārśvaḥ nāma medhāvī rāvaṇam rākṣaseśvaram
nivāryamāṇam sacivaiḥ idam vacanam abravīt
katham nāma daśagrīva sākṣāt vaiśravaṇānuja

original: 6.080.052c hantum icchasi vaidehīṃ krodhād dharmam apāsya hi
analyzed: hantum icchasi vaidehīm krodhāt dharmam apāsya hi
veda vidyā vrata snātaḥ svadharma nirataḥ sadā

original: 6.080.053c striyāḥ kasmād vadhaṃ vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: striyāḥ kasmāt vadham vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara
maithilīm rūpa saṃpannām pratyavekṣasva pārthiva

original: 6.080.054c tvam eva tu sahāsmābhī rāghave krodham utsṛja
analyzed: tvam eva tu saha asmābhiḥ rāghave krodham utsṛja
abhyutthānam tvam adyā eva kṛṣṇa pakṣa caturdaśīm

original: 6.080.055c kṛtvā niryāhy amāvāsyāṃ vijayāya balair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā niryāhi amāvāsyām vijayāya balaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.080.056a śūro dhīmān rathī khaḍgī rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
analyzed: śūraḥ dhīmān rathī khaḍgī ratha pravaram āsthitaḥ

original: 6.080.056c hatvā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm
analyzed: hatvā dāśarathim rāmam bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm
sa tat durātmā suhṛdā niveditam
vacaḥ su dharmyam pratigṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
gṛham jagāma atha tatas ca vīryavān
punar sabhām ca prayayau suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: 6.081.001a sa praviśya sabhāṃ rājā dīnaḥ paramaduḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: sa praviśya sabhām rājā dīnaḥ parama duḥkhitaḥ

original: 6.081.001c niṣasādāsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddha iva śvasan
analyzed: niṣasāda āsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddhaḥ iva śvasan

original: 6.081.002a abravīc ca tadā sarvān balamukhyān mahābalaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā sarvān bala mukhyān mahā balaḥ
rāvaṇaḥ prāñjalīn vākyam putra vyasana karśitaḥ
sarve bhavantaḥ sarveṇa hasti aśvena samāvṛtāḥ
niryāntu ratha saṃghaiḥ ca pādātaiḥ ca upaśobhitāḥ

original: 6.081.004a ekaṃ rāmaṃ parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha
analyzed: ekam rāmam parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha
prahṛṣṭā śara varṣeṇa prāvṛṣ kāle iva ambudāḥ

original: 6.081.005a atha vāhaṃ śarair tīṣkṇair bhinnagātraṃ mahāraṇe
analyzed: atha vā aham śaraiḥ tīṣkṇaiḥ bhinna gātram mahā raṇe

original: 6.081.005c bhavadbhiḥ śvo nihantāsmi rāmaṃ lokasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ śvas nihantāsmi rāmam lokasya paśyataḥ

original: 6.081.006a ity evaṃ rākṣasendrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: iti evam rākṣasa indrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.081.006c niryayus te rathaiḥ śīghraṃ nāgānīkaiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
analyzed: niryayuḥ te rathaiḥ śīghram nāga anīkaiḥ ca saṃvṛtāḥ
sa saṃgrāmaḥ mahā bhīmaḥ sūryasya udayanam prati
rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca tumulaḥ samapadyata

original: 6.081.008a te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: te gadābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
anyonyam samare jaghnuḥ tadā vānara rākṣasāḥ
mātaṃga ratha kūlasya vāji matsyāḥ dhvaja drumāḥ
śarīra saṃghāṭa vahāḥ prasasruḥ śoṇita āpagāḥ
dhvaja varma rathān aśvān nānā praharaṇāni ca
āplutya āplutya samare vānara indrāḥ babhañjire

original: 6.081.011a keśān karṇalalāṭāṃś ca nāsikāś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: keśān karṇa lalāṭān ca nāsikāḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.081.011c rakṣasāṃ daśanais tīkṣṇair nakhaiś cāpi vyakartayan
analyzed: rakṣasām daśanaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nakhaiḥ ca api vyakartayan
ekaikam rākṣasam saṃkhye śatam vānara puṃgavāḥ
abhyadhāvanta phalinam vṛkṣam śakunayaḥ yathā

original: 6.081.013a tathā gadābhir gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: tathā gadābhiḥ gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
nirjaghnuḥ vānarān ghorān rākṣasāḥ parvata upamāḥ
rākṣasaiḥ vadhyamānānām vānarāṇām mahā camūḥ
śaraṇyam śaraṇam yātāḥ rāmam daśaratha ātmajam

original: 6.081.015a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ dhanuḥ ādāya vīryavān

original: 6.081.015c praviśya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
analyzed: praviśya rākṣasam sainyam śara varṣam vavarṣa ha

original: 6.081.016a praviṣṭaṃ tu tadā rāmaṃ meghāḥ sūryam ivāmbare
analyzed: praviṣṭam tu tadā rāmam meghāḥ sūryam iva ambare
na abhijagmuḥ mahā ghoram nirdahantam śara agninā
kṛtāni eva su ghorāṇi rāmeṇa rajanīcarāḥ

original: 6.081.017c raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇy asukarāṇi ca
analyzed: raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇi asukarāṇi ca
cālayantam mahā anīkam vidhamantam mahā rathān

original: 6.081.018c dadṛśus te na vai rāmaṃ vātaṃ vanagataṃ yathā
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ te na vai rāmam vātam vana gatam yathā

original: 6.081.019a chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ śarair dagdhaṃ prabhagnaṃ śastrapīḍitam
analyzed: chinnam bhinnam śaraiḥ dagdham prabhagnam śastra pīḍitam

original: 6.081.019c balaṃ rāmeṇa dadṛśur na ramaṃ śīghrakāriṇam
analyzed: balam rāmeṇa dadṛśuḥ na ramam śīghrakāriṇam

original: 6.081.020a praharantaṃ śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam
analyzed: praharantam śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam
indriyārtheṣu tiṣṭhantam bhūtātmānam iva prajāḥ

original: 6.081.021a eṣa hanti gajānīkam eṣa hanti mahārathān
analyzed: eṣa hanti gaja anīkam eṣa hanti mahā rathān

original: 6.081.021c eṣa hanti śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha
analyzed: eṣa hanti śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha

original: 6.081.022a iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe
analyzed: iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe
anyonya kupitāḥ jaghnuḥ sādṛśyāt rāghavasya te

original: 6.081.023a na te dadṛśire rāmaṃ dahantam arivāhinīm
analyzed: na te dadṛśire rāmam dahantam ari vāhinīm
mohitāḥ parama astreṇa gāndharveṇa mahātmanā

original: 6.081.024a te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ

original: 6.081.024c punaḥ paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahāhave
analyzed: punar paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahā āhave
bhramantīm kāñcanīm koṭim kārmukasya mahātmanaḥ
alāta cakra pratimām dadṛśuḥ te na rāghavam
jyā ghoṣa tala nirghoṣam tejaḥ buddhi guṇa prabham
divya astra guṇa paryantam nighnantam yudhi rākṣasān

original: 6.081.027c dadṛśū rāmacakraṃ tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ rāma cakram tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ
anīkam daśa sāhasram rathānām vāta raṃhasām
aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi kuñjarāṇām tarasvinām
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi sa ārohāṇām ca vājinām
pūrṇe śata sahasre dve rākṣasānām padātinām
divasasya aṣṭame bhāge śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ
hatāni ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasām kāmarūpiṇām
te hata aśvāḥ hata rathāḥ śrāntāḥ vimathita dhvajāḥ
abhipetuḥ purīm laṅkām hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ

original: 6.081.032a hatair gajapadāty aśvais tad babhūva raṇājiram
analyzed: hataiḥ gaja padāti aśvaiḥ tat babhūva raṇa ajiram
ākrīḍa bhūmī rudrasya kruddhasya iva pinākinaḥ

original: 6.081.033a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 6.081.033c sādhu sādhv iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan

original: 6.081.034a abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ pratyanantaram
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvam pratyanantaram

original: 6.081.034c etad astrabalaṃ divyaṃ mama vā tryambakasya vā
analyzed: etat astra balam divyam mama vā tryambakasya vā
nihatya tām rākṣasa vāhinīm tu
rāmaḥ tadā śakra samaḥ mahātmā
astreṣu śastreṣu jita klamaḥ ca
saṃstūyate deva gaṇaiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ
tāni nāga sahasrāṇi sa ārohāṇām ca vājinām
rathānām ca agni varṇānām sa dhvajānām sahasraśas
rākṣasānām sahasrāṇi gadā parigha yodhinām
kāñcana dhvaja citrāṇām śūrāṇām kāmarūpiṇām
nihatāni śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
rāvaṇena prayuktāni rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 6.082.004a dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntāḥ hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
rākṣasyaḥ ca samāgamya dīnāḥ cintā pariplutāḥ
vidhavāḥ hata putrāḥ ca krośantyaḥ hata bāndhavāḥ
rākṣasyaḥ saha saṃgamya duḥkha ārtāḥ paryadevayan
katham śūrpaṇakhā vṛddhā karālā nirṇata udarī

original: 6.082.006c āsasāda vane rāmaṃ kandarpam iva rūpiṇam
analyzed: āsasāda vane rāmam kandarpam iva rūpiṇam
sukumāram mahā sattvam sarva bhūta hite ratam

original: 6.082.007c taṃ dṛṣṭvā lokavadhyā sā hīnarūpā prakāmitā
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā loka vadhyā sā hīna rūpā prakāmitā
katham sarva guṇaiḥ hīnāḥ guṇavantam mahā ojasam

original: 6.082.008c sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ kāmayām āsa rākṣasī
analyzed: su mukham durmukhī rāmam kāmayām āsa rākṣasī
janasya asya alpabhāgya tvāt śveta mūrdhajā
akāryam apahāsyam ca sarva loka vigarhitam
rākṣasānām vināśāya dūṣaṇasya kharasya ca
cakāra apratirūpā sā rāghavasya pradharṣaṇam

original: 6.082.011a tan nimittam idaṃ vairaṃ rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat
analyzed: tad nimittam idam vairam rāvaṇena kṛtam mahat

original: 6.082.011c vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
analyzed: vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā

original: 6.082.012a na ca sītāṃ daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām
analyzed: na ca sītām daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām

original: 6.082.012c baddhaṃ balavatā vairam akṣayaṃ rāghaveṇa ha
analyzed: baddham balavatā vairam akṣayam rāghaveṇa ha

original: 6.082.013a vaidehīṃ prārthayānaṃ taṃ virādhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: vaidehīm prārthayānam tam virādham prekṣya rākṣasam
hatam ekena rāmeṇa paryāptam tat nidarśanam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
nihatāni janasthāne śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ

original: 6.082.015a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaḥ triśirāḥ tathā
śaraiḥ āditya saṃkāśaiḥ paryāptam tat nidarśanam
hataḥ yojana bāhuḥ ca kabandhaḥ rudhira aśanaḥ
krodha ārtaḥ vinadan paryāptam tat nidarśanam
jaghāna balinam rāmaḥ sahasranayana ātmajam
bālinam megha saṃkāśam paryāptam tat nidarśanam
ṛśyamūke vasam śaile dīnaḥ bhagna manorathaḥ
sugrīvaḥ sthāpitaḥ rājye paryāptam tat nidarśanam
dharma artha sahitam vākyam sarveṣām rakṣasām hitam

original: 6.082.019c yuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇenoktaṃ mohāt tasya na rocate
analyzed: yuktam vibhīṣaṇena uktam mohāt tasya na rocate
vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ kuryāt yadi sma dhanada anujaḥ

original: 6.082.020c śmaśānabhūtā duḥkhārtā neyaṃ laṅkā purī bhavet
analyzed: śmaśāna bhūtā duḥkha ārtā na iyam laṅkā purī bhavet
kumbhakarṇam hatam śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahā balam
priyam ca indrajitam putram rāvaṇaḥ na avabudhyate

original: 6.082.022a mama putro mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ
analyzed: mama putraḥ mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ

original: 6.082.022c ity evaṃ śrūyate śabdo rākṣasānāṃ kule kule
analyzed: iti evam śrūyate śabdaḥ rākṣasānām kule kule

original: 6.082.023a rathāś cāśvāś ca nāgāś ca hatāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: rathāḥ ca aśvāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca hatāḥ śata sahasraśas

original: 6.082.023c raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāś ca padātayaḥ
analyzed: raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāḥ ca padātayaḥ

original: 6.082.024a rudro vā yadi vā viṣṇur mahendro vā śatakratuḥ
analyzed: rudraḥ vā yadi vā viṣṇuḥ mahā indraḥ vā śatakratuḥ

original: 6.082.024c hanti no rāmarūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ
analyzed: hanti naḥ rāma rūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ
hata pravīrāḥ rāmeṇa nirāśāḥ jīvite vayam
a paśyantyaḥ bhayasya antam anāthāḥ vilapāmahe
rāma hastāt daśagrīvaḥ śūraḥ datta varaḥ yudhi
idam bhayam mahā ghoram utpannam na avabudhyate

original: 6.082.027a na devā na ca gandharvā na piśācā na rākasāḥ
analyzed: na devāḥ na ca gandharvāḥ na piśācāḥ na rākasāḥ
upasṛṣṭam paritrātum śaktāḥ rāmeṇa saṃyuge

original: 6.082.028a utpātāś cāpi dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe
analyzed: utpātāḥ ca api dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe
kathayiṣyanti rāmeṇa rāvaṇasya nibarhaṇam
pitāmahena prītena deva dānava rākṣasaiḥ
rāvaṇasya abhayam dattam mānuṣebhyaḥ na yācitam

original: 6.082.030a tad idaṃ mānuṣān manye prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhayam
analyzed: tat idam mānuṣāt manye prāptam niḥsaṃśayam bhayam
jīvitānta karam ghoram rakṣasām rāvaṇasya ca
pīḍyamānāḥ tu balinā vara dānena rakṣasā
dīptaiḥ tapobhiḥ vibudhāḥ pitāmaham apūjayan
devatānām hita arthāya mahātmā vai pitāmahaḥ

original: 6.082.032c uvāca devatāḥ sarvā idaṃ tuṣṭo mahad vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ idam tuṣṭaḥ mahat vacaḥ

original: 6.082.033a adya prabhṛti lokāṃs trīn sarve dānavarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: adya prabhṛti lokān trīn sarve dānava rākṣasāḥ
bhayena prāvṛtāḥ nityam vicariṣyanti śāśvatam
daivataiḥ tu samāgamya sarvaiḥ ca indra purogamaiḥ

original: 6.082.035a prasannas tu mahādevo devān etad vaco 'bravīt
analyzed: prasannaḥ tu mahādevaḥ devān etat vacaḥ bravīt
utpatsyati hita artham vaḥ nārī rakṣaḥ kṣaya āvahā

original: 6.082.036a eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣud yathā dānavān purā
analyzed: eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣudh yathā dānavān purā
bhakṣayiṣyati naḥ sītā rākṣasa ghnī sa rāvaṇān
rāvaṇasya apanītena durvinītasya durmateḥ
ayam niṣṭānakaḥ ghoraḥ śokena samabhiplutaḥ

original: 6.082.038a taṃ na paśyāmahe loke yo naḥ śaraṇado bhavet
analyzed: tam na paśyāmahe loke yaḥ naḥ śaraṇa daḥ bhavet
rāghaveṇa upasṛṣṭānām kālena iva yuga kṣaye
iti iva sarvāḥ rajanīcara striyaḥ
parasparam saṃparirabhya bāhubhiḥ
viṣeduḥ ārta ati bhaya abhipīḍitā
vineduḥ uccais ca tadā su dāruṇam

original: 6.083.001a ārtānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ vai kule kule
analyzed: ārtānām rākṣasīnām tu laṅkāyām vai kule kule
rāvaṇaḥ karuṇam śabdam śuśrāva

original: 6.083.002a sa tu dīrghaṃ viniśvasya muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: sa tu dīrgham viniśvasya muhūrtam dhyānam āsthitaḥ
babhūva parama kruddhaḥ rāvaṇaḥ bhīma darśanaḥ
saṃdaśya daśanaiḥ oṣṭham krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 6.083.003c rākṣasair api durdarśaḥ kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ api durdarśaḥ kālāgniḥ iva mūrchitaḥ
uvāca ca samīpa sthān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
bhaya avyakta kathān tatra nirdahan iva cakṣuṣā
mahodaram mahāpārśvam virūpākṣam ca rākṣasam
śīghram vadata sainyāni niryāta iti mama ājñayā

original: 6.083.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te bhayārditāḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rākṣasāḥ te bhaya arditāḥ

original: 6.083.006c codayām āsur avyagrān rākṣasāṃs tān nṛpājñayā
analyzed: codayām āsuḥ avyagrān rākṣasān tān nṛpa ājñayā

original: 6.083.007a te tu sarve tathety uktvā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ
analyzed: te tu sarve tathā iti uktvā rākṣasāḥ ghora darśanāḥ
kṛta svastyayanāḥ sarve rāvaṇa abhimukhāḥ yayuḥ
pratipūjya yathānyāyam rāvaṇam te mahā rathāḥ
tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve bhartuḥ vijaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
athā uvāca prahasya etān rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
mahodara mahāpārśvau virūpākṣam ca rākṣasam
adya bāṇaiḥ dhanuḥ muktaiḥ yugānta āditya saṃnibhaiḥ
rāghavam lakṣmaṇam ca eva neṣyāmi yama sādhanam
kharasya kumbhakarṇasya prahasta indrajitoḥ tathā
kariṣyāmi pratīkāram adya śatru vadhāt aham

original: 6.083.012a naivāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na nadyo nāpi sāgaraḥ
analyzed: na eva antarikṣam na diśaḥ na nadyaḥ na api sāgaraḥ
prakāśa tvam gamiṣyāmi mad bāṇa jalada āvṛtāḥ
adya vānara yūthānām tāni yūthāni bhāgaśas
dhanuḥ samudrāt udbhūtaiḥ mathiṣyāmi śara ūrmibhiḥ
vyākośa padma cakrāṇi padma kesara varcasām
adya yūtha taṭākāni gaja vat pramathāmi aham
sa śaraiḥ adya vadanaiḥ saṃkhye vānara yūthapāḥ
maṇḍayiṣyanti vasudhām sa nālaiḥ iva paṅkalaiḥ
adya yuddha pracaṇḍānām harīṇām druma yodhinām
muktena eka iṣuṇā yuddhe bhetsyāmi ca śatam śatam

original: 6.083.017a hato bhartā hato bhrātā yāsāṃ ca tanayā hatāḥ
analyzed: hataḥ bhartā hataḥ bhrātā yāsām ca tanayāḥ hatāḥ
vadhena adya ripoḥ tāsām asra pramārjanam
adya mad bāṇa nirbhinnaiḥ prakīrṇaiḥ gata cetanaiḥ

original: 6.083.018c karomi vānarair yuddhe yatnāvekṣya talāṃ mahīm
analyzed: karomi vānaraiḥ yuddhe yatna avekṣya talām mahīm

original: 6.083.019a adya gomāyavo gṛdhrā ye ca māṃsāśino 'pare
analyzed: adya gomāyavaḥ gṛdhrāḥ ye ca māṃsa āśinaḥ pare
sarvān tān tarpayiṣyāmi śatru māṃsaiḥ śara arditaiḥ

original: 6.083.020a kalpyatāṃ me rathaśīghraṃ kṣipram ānīyatāṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: kalpyatām me ratha śīghram kṣipram ānīyatām dhanuḥ
anuprayāntu mām yuddhe ye vaśiṣṭāḥ niśācarāḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā mahāpārśvaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: 6.083.021c balādhyakṣān sthitāṃs tatra balaṃ saṃtvaryatām iti
analyzed: balādhyakṣān sthitān tatra balam saṃtvaryatām iti

original: 6.083.022a balādhyakṣās tu saṃrabdhā rākṣasāṃs tān gṛhād gṛhāt
analyzed: balādhyakṣāḥ tu saṃrabdhāḥ rākṣasān tān gṛhāt gṛhāt
codayantaḥ pariyayuḥ laṅkām laghu parākramāḥ
tatas muhūrtāt niṣpetuḥ rākṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
nardantaḥ bhīma vadanāḥ nānā praharaṇaiḥ bhujaiḥ

original: 6.083.024a asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlair galābhir musalair halaiḥ
analyzed: asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlaiḥ galābhiḥ musalaiḥ halaiḥ
śaktibhiḥ tīkṣṇa dhārābhiḥ mahadbhiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ

original: 6.083.025a yaṣṭibhir vimalaiś cakrair niśitaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: yaṣṭibhiḥ vimalaiḥ cakraiḥ niśitaiḥ ca paraśvadhaiḥ
bhindipālaiḥ śataghnībhiḥ anyaiḥ ca api vara āyudhaiḥ
atha anayan balādhyakṣāḥ catvāraḥ rāvaṇa ājñayā
drutam sūta samāyuktam yukta aṣṭa turagam ratham
āruroha ratham divyam dīpyamānam sva tejasā
rāvaṇaḥ sattva gāmbhīryāt dārayan iva medinīm
rāvaṇena abhyanujñātau mahāpārśva mahodarau

original: 6.083.028c virūpākṣaś ca durdharṣo rathān āruruhus tadā
analyzed: virūpākṣaḥ ca durdharṣaḥ rathān āruruhuḥ tadā

original: 6.083.029a te tu hṛṣṭā vinardanto bhindata iva medinīm
analyzed: te tu hṛṣṭāḥ vinardantaḥ bhindataḥ iva medinīm
nādam ghoram vimuñcantaḥ niryayuḥ jaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
tatas yuddhāya tejasvī rakṣaḥ gaṇa balaiḥ vṛtaḥ
niryayau udyata dhanuḥ kāla antaka yama umapaḥ
tatas prajavana aśvena rathena sa mahā rathaḥ

original: 6.083.031c dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 6.083.032a tato naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo diśaś ca timirāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: tatas naṣṭa prabhaḥ sūryaḥ diśaḥ ca timira āvṛtāḥ

original: 6.083.032c dvijāś ca nedur ghorāś ca saṃcacāla ca medinī
analyzed: dvijāḥ ca neduḥ ghorāḥ ca saṃcacāla ca medinī

original: 6.083.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaś caskhaluś ca turaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: vavarṣa rudhiram devaḥ caskhaluḥ ca turaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.083.033c dhvajāgre nyapatad gṛdhro vineduś cāśivaṃ śivāḥ
analyzed: dhvaja agre nyapatat gṛdhraḥ vineduḥ ca aśivam śivāḥ

original: 6.083.034a nayanaṃ cāsphurad vāmaṃ savyo bāhur akampata
analyzed: nayanam ca asphurat vāmam savyaḥ bāhuḥ akampata

original: 6.083.034c vivarṇavadanaś cāsīt kiṃ cid abhraśyata svaraḥ
analyzed: vivarṇa vadanaḥ ca āsīt kim cit abhraśyata svaraḥ
tatas niṣpatataḥ yuddhe daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
raṇe nidhana śaṃsīni rūpāṇi etāni jajñire
antarikṣāt papāta ulkā nirghāta sama nisvanā
vineduḥ aśivam gṛdhrāḥ vāyasaiḥ anunāditāḥ
etān a cintayan ghorān utpātān samupasthitān
niryayau rāvaṇaḥ mohāt vadha arthī kāla coditaḥ
teṣām tu ratha ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānām mahātmanām
vānarāṇām api camūḥ yuddhāya eva abhyavartata
teṣām su tumulam yuddham babhūva kapi rakṣasām
anyonyam āhvayānānām kruddhānām jayam icchatām
tatas kruddhaḥ daśagrīvaḥ śaraiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
vānarāṇām anīkeṣu cakāra kadanam mahat
nikṛtta śirasaḥ ke cid rāvaṇena valīmukhāḥ

original: 6.083.041c nirucchvāsā hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ
analyzed: nirucchvāsāḥ hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ

original: 6.083.041e ke cid vibhinnaśirasaḥ ke cic cakṣurvivarjitāḥ
analyzed: ke cid vibhinna śirasaḥ ke cid cakṣuḥ vivarjitāḥ
daśa ānanaḥ krodha vivṛtta netraḥ
yatas yatas bhyeti rathena saṃkhye
tatas tatas tasya śara pravegam
soḍhum na śekuḥ hari yūthapāḥ te

original: 6.084.001a tathā taiḥ kṛttagātrais tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: tathā taiḥ kṛtta gātraiḥ tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ

original: 6.084.001c babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhir vṛtā
analyzed: babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhiḥ vṛtā
rāvaṇasya aprasahyam tam śara saṃpātam ekatas

original: 6.084.002c na śekuḥ sahituṃ dīptaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam
analyzed: na śekuḥ sahitum dīptam pataṃgāḥ iva pāvakam
te rditāḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ krośantaḥ vipradudruvuḥ
pāvaka arciḥ samāviṣṭāḥ dahyamānāḥ yathā gajāḥ
plavaṃgānām anīkāni mahā abhrāṇi iva mārutaḥ

original: 6.084.004c sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
kadanam tarasā kṛtvā rākṣasa indraḥ vanaukasām

original: 6.084.005c āsasāda tato yuddhe rāghavaṃ tvaritas tadā
analyzed: āsasāda tatas yuddhe rāghavam tvaritaḥ tadā

original: 6.084.006a sugrīvas tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravato raṇe
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravataḥ raṇe

original: 6.084.006c gulme suṣeṇaṃ nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: gulme suṣeṇam nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutam manaḥ

original: 6.084.007a ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ vīraṃ sa taṃ nikṣipya vānaram
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sadṛśam vīram sa tam nikṣipya vānaram
sugrīvaḥ abhimukhaḥ śatrum pratasthe pādapa āyudhaḥ

original: 6.084.008a pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāsya sarve yūthādhipāḥ svayam
analyzed: pārśvatas pṛṣṭhatas ca asya sarve yūtha adhipāḥ svayam
anujahruḥ mahā śailān vividhān ca mahā drumān

original: 6.084.009a sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
analyzed: sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
pātayan vividhān ca anyām jaghāna uttama rākṣasān
mamarda ca mahā kāyaḥ rākṣasān vānara īśvaraḥ
yugānta samaye vāyuḥ pravṛddhān agamān iva
rākṣasānām anīkeṣu śaila varṣam vavarṣa ha
aśva varṣam yathā meghaḥ pakṣi saṃgheṣu kānane
kapi rāja vimuktaiḥ taiḥ śaila varṣaiḥ tu rākṣasāḥ
vikīrṇa śirasaḥ petuḥ nikṛttāḥ iva parvatāḥ
atha saṃkṣīyamāṇeṣu rākṣaseṣu samantataḥ
sugrīveṇa prabhagneṣu patatsu vinadatsu ca

original: 6.084.014a virūpākṣaḥ svakaṃ nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: virūpākṣaḥ svakam nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ
rathāt āplutya durdharṣaḥ gaja skandham upāruhat

original: 6.084.015a sa taṃ dviradam āruhya virūpākṣo mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa tam dviradam āruhya virūpākṣaḥ mahā rathaḥ
vinadan bhīma nirhrālam vānarān abhyadhāvata

original: 6.084.016a sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe
analyzed: sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camū mukhe
sthāpayām āsā ca udvignān rākṣasān saṃpraharṣayan

original: 6.084.017a so 'tividdhaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kapīndras tena rakṣasā
analyzed: saḥ tividdhaḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ kapīndraḥ tena rakṣasā

original: 6.084.017c cukrodha ca mahākrodho vadhe cāsya mano dadhe
analyzed: cukrodha ca mahā krodhaḥ vadhe ca asya manaḥ dadhe

original: 6.084.018a tataḥ pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ
analyzed: tatas pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ
abhipatya jaghāna asya pramukhe tam mahā gajam
sa tu prahāra abhihataḥ sugrīveṇa mahā gajaḥ
apāsarpat dhanuḥ mātram niṣasāda nanāda ca

original: 6.084.020a gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān
analyzed: gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān
rākṣasaḥ abhimukhaḥ śatrum pratyudgamya tatas kapim
ārṣabham carma khaḍgam ca pragṛhya laghu vikramaḥ
bhartsayan iva sugrīvam āsasāda vyavasthitam

original: 6.084.022a sa hi tasyābhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
analyzed: sa hi tasya abhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīm śilām
virūpākṣāya cikṣepa sugrīvaḥ jalada upamām

original: 6.084.023a sa tāṃ śilām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: sa tām śilām āpatantīm dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
apakramya su vikrāntaḥ khaḍgena prāharat tadā
tena khaḍgena saṃkruddhaḥ sugrīvasya camū mukhe
kavacam pātayām āsa sa khaḍga abhihataḥ patat

original: 6.084.025a sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapis tasya vyasarjayat
analyzed: sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapiḥ tasya vyasarjayat
tala prahāram aśaneḥ samānam bhīma nisvanam
tala prahāram tat rakṣaḥ sugrīveṇa samudyatam
naipuṇyāt mocayitvā enam muṣṭinā urasi atāḍayat
tatas tu saṃkruddhataraḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ

original: 6.084.027c mokṣitaṃ cātmano dṛṣṭvā prahāraṃ tena rakṣasā
analyzed: mokṣitam ca ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭvā prahāram tena rakṣasā
sa dadarśa antaram tasya virūpākṣasya vānaraḥ
tatas nyapātayat krodhāt śaṅkha deśe mahā talam
mahā indra aśani kalpena talena abhihataḥ kṣitau
papāta rudhira klinnaḥ śoṇitam sa samudvaman
vivṛtta nayanam krodhāt sa phena rudhira āplutam
dadṛśuḥ te virūpa akṣam virūpākṣataram kṛtam
sphurantam parivarjantam pārśvena rudhira ukṣitam

original: 6.084.031c karuṇaṃ ca vinardāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapayo ripum
analyzed: karuṇam ca vinarda antam dadṛśuḥ kapayaḥ ripum
tathā tu tau saṃyati saṃprayuktau
tarasvinau vānara rākṣasānām
bala arṇavau sasvanatuḥ sa bhīmam
mahā arṇavau dvau iva bhinna velau
vināśitam prekṣya virūpa netram
mahā balam tam hari pārthivena
balam samastam kapi rākṣasānām
unmatta gaṅgā pratimam babhūva

original: 6.085.001a hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyaṃ te mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyam te mahā mṛdhe
sarasi iva mahā gharme su upakṣīṇe babhūvatuḥ
sva balasya vighātena virūpākṣa vadhena ca
babhūva dviguṇam kruddhaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.085.003a prakṣīṇaṃ tu balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ valīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: prakṣīṇam tu balam dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānam valīmukhaiḥ
babhūva asya vyathā yuddhe prekṣya daiva viparyayam
uvāca ca samīpa stham mahodaram ariṃdamam

original: 6.085.004c asmin kāle mahābāho jayāśā tvayi me sthitā
analyzed: asmin kāle mahā bāho jaya āśā tvayi me sthitā
jahi śatru camūm vīra darśaya adya parākramam
bhartṛ piṇḍasya kālaḥ yam nirveṣṭum sādhu yudhyatām

original: 6.085.006a evam uktas tathety uktvā rākṣasendraṃ mahodaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tathā iti uktvā rākṣasa indram mahodaraḥ
praviveśa ari senām sa pataṃgaḥ iva pāvakam

original: 6.085.007a tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa kadanam cakre vānarāṇām mahā balaḥ
bhartṛ vākyena tejasvī svena vīryeṇa coditaḥ
prabhagnām samare dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇām mahā camūm
abhidudrāva sugrīvaḥ mahodaram anantaram

original: 6.085.009a pragṛhya vipulāṃ ghorāṃ mahīdhara samāṃ śilām
analyzed: pragṛhya vipulām ghorām mahīdhara samām śilām

original: 6.085.009c cikṣepa ca mahātejās tad vadhāya harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: cikṣepa ca mahā tejāḥ tat vadhāya hari īśvaraḥ

original: 6.085.010a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ
analyzed: tām āpatantīm sahasā śilām dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ
asaṃbhrāntaḥ tatas bāṇaiḥ nirbibheda durāsadām

original: 6.085.011a rakṣasā tena bāṇaughair nikṛttā sā sahasradhā
analyzed: rakṣasā tena bāṇa oghaiḥ nikṛttā sā sahasradhā
nipapāta śilā bhūmau gṛdhra cakram iva ākulam

original: 6.085.012a tāṃ tu bhinnāṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: tām tu bhinnām śilām dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
sālam utpāṭya cikṣepa rakṣase raṇa mūrdhani
śaraiḥ ca vidadāra enam śūraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: 6.085.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ kruddhaḥ parighaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas kruddhaḥ parigham patitam bhuvi

original: 6.085.013c āvidhya tu sa taṃ dīptaṃ parighaṃ tasya darśayan
analyzed: āvidhya tu sa tam dīptam parigham tasya darśayan
parigha agreṇa vegena jaghāna asya haya uttamān
tasmāt hata hayāt vīraḥ saḥ vaplutya mahā rathāt
gadām jagrāha saṃkruddhaḥ mahodaraḥ
gadā parigha hastau tau yudhi vīrau samīyatuḥ
nardantau go vṛṣa prakhyau ghanau iva sa vidyutau
ājaghāna gadām tasya parigheṇa hari īśvaraḥ

original: 6.085.016c papāta sa gadodbhinnaḥ parighas tasya bhūtale
analyzed: papāta sa gadā udbhinnaḥ parighaḥ tasya bhū tale
tatas jagrāha tejasvī sugrīvaḥ vasudhā talāt
āyasam musalam ghoram sarvatas hema bhūṣitam

original: 6.085.018a taṃ samudyamya cikṣepa so 'py anyāṃ vyākṣipad gadām
analyzed: tam samudyamya cikṣepa saḥ u pi anyām vyākṣipat gadām
bhinnau anyonyam āsādya petatuḥ dharaṇī tale
tatas bhagna praharaṇau muṣṭibhyām tau samīyatuḥ
tejaḥ bala samāviṣṭau dīptau iva hutāśanau

original: 6.085.020a jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ nedatuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: jaghnatuḥ tau tadā anyonyam nedatuḥ ca punar punar
talaiḥ ca anyonyam āhatya petatuḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 6.085.021a utpetatus tatas tūrṇaṃ jaghnatuś ca parasparam
analyzed: utpetatuḥ tatas tūrṇam jaghnatuḥ ca parasparam
bhujaiḥ cikṣepatuḥ vīrau anyonyam aparājitau
ājahāra tadā khagḍam adūra parivartinam
rākṣasaḥ carmaṇā sārdham mahā vegaḥ mahodaraḥ

original: 6.085.023a tathaiva ca mahākhaḍgaṃ carmaṇā patitaṃ saha
analyzed: tathā eva ca mahā khaḍgam carmaṇā patitam saha
jagrāha vānara śreṣṭhaḥ sugrīvaḥ vegavattaraḥ
tau tu roṣa parīta aṅgau nardantau abhyadhāvatām
udyata asī raṇe hṛṣṭau yudhi śastra viśāradau

original: 6.085.025a dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cobhau tau tūrṇaṃ saṃparīyatuḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇam maṇḍalam ca ubhau tau tūrṇam saṃparīyatuḥ
anyonyam abhisaṃkruddhau jaye praṇihitau ubhau

original: 6.085.026a sa tu śūro mahāvego vīryaślāghī mahodaraḥ
analyzed: sa tu śūraḥ mahā vegaḥ vīrya ślāghī mahodaraḥ

original: 6.085.026c mahācarmaṇi taṃ khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa durmatiḥ
analyzed: mahā carmaṇi tam khaḍgam pātayām āsa durmatiḥ
lagnam utkarṣataḥ khaḍgam khaḍgena kapi kuñjaraḥ
jahāra sa śiraḥ trāṇam kuṇḍala upahitam śiraḥ
nikṛtta śirasaḥ tasya patitasya mahī tale

original: 6.085.028c tad balaṃ rākṣasendrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati
analyzed: tat balam rākṣasa indrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati

original: 6.085.029a hatvā taṃ vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nanāda mudito hariḥ
analyzed: hatvā tam vānaraiḥ sārdham nanāda muditaḥ hariḥ

original: 6.085.029c cukrodha ca daśagrīvo babhau hṛṣṭaś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: cukrodha ca daśagrīvaḥ babhau hṛṣṭaḥ ca rāghavaḥ
mahodare tu nihate mahāpārśvaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.086.001c aṅgadasya camūṃ bhīmāṃ kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: aṅgadasya camūm bhīmām kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
sa vānarāṇām mukhyānām uttamāṅgāni sarvaśas

original: 6.086.002c pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalaṃ vṛntād ivānilaḥ
analyzed: pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalam vṛntāt iva anilaḥ

original: 6.086.003a keṣāṃ cid iṣubhir bāhūn skandhāṃś cicheda rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: keṣām cit iṣubhiḥ bāhūn skandhān cicheda rākṣasaḥ
vānarāṇām su saṃkruddhaḥ pārśvam keṣām vyadārayat
te rditāḥ bāṇa varṣeṇa mahāpārśvena vānarāḥ
viṣāda vimukhāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ gata cetasaḥ
nirīkṣya balam udvignam aṅgadaḥ rākṣasa arditam

original: 6.086.005c vegaṃ cakre mahābāhuḥ samudra iva parvaṇi
analyzed: vegam cakre mahā bāhuḥ samudraḥ iva parvaṇi
āyasam parigham gṛhya sūrya raśmi sama prabham
samare vānara śreṣṭhaḥ mahāpārśve nyapātayat

original: 6.086.007a sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvo vicetanaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvaḥ vicetanaḥ

original: 6.086.007c sasūtaḥ syandanāt tasmād visaṃjñaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
analyzed: sa sūtaḥ syandanāt tasmāt visaṃjñaḥ prāpatat bhuvi
sa ṛkṣa rājaḥ tu tejasvī nīlāñjana caya upamaḥ
niṣpatya su mahā vīryaḥ svāt yūthāt megha saṃnibhāt

original: 6.086.009a pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhāṃ kruddhaḥ sa vipulāṃ śilām
analyzed: pragṛhya giri śṛṅga ābhām kruddhaḥ sa vipulām śilām

original: 6.086.009c aśvāñ jaghāna tarasā syandanaṃ ca babhañja tam
analyzed: aśvām jaghāna tarasā syandanam ca babhañja tam
muhūrtāt labdha saṃjñaḥ tu mahāpārśvaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.086.010c aṅgadaṃ bahubhir bāṇair bhūyas taṃ pratyavidhyata
analyzed: aṅgadam bahubhiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhūyas tam pratyavidhyata
jāmbavantam tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ ājaghāna stanāntare

original: 6.086.011c ṛkṣarājaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣa rājam gavākṣam ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 6.086.012a gavākṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā śarapīḍitau
analyzed: gavākṣam jāmbavantam ca sa dṛṣṭvā śara pīḍitau
jagrāha parigham ghoram aṅgadaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
tasya aṅgadaḥ prakupitaḥ rākṣasasya tam āyasam
dūra sthitasya parigham ravi raśmi sama prabham

original: 6.086.014a dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān
analyzed: dvābhyām bhujābhyām saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān
mahāpārśvāya cikṣepa vadha artham vālinaḥ sutaḥ

original: 6.086.015a sa tu kṣipto balavatā parighas tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: sa tu kṣiptaḥ balavatā parighaḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.086.015c dhanuś ca saśaraṃ hastāc chirastraṃ cāpy apātayat
analyzed: dhanuḥ ca sa śaram hastāt śirastram ca api apātayat
tam samāsādya vegena vāli putraḥ pratāpavān
talena abhyahanat kruddhaḥ karṇa mūle sa kuṇḍale

original: 6.086.017a sa tu kruddho mahāvego mahāpārśvo mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: sa tu kruddhaḥ mahā vegaḥ mahāpārśvaḥ mahā dyutiḥ
kareṇa ekena jagrāha su mahāntam paraśvadham
tam taila dhautam vimalam śaila sāra mayam dṛḍham
rākṣasaḥ parama kruddhaḥ vāli putre nyapātayat
tena vāma aṃsaphalake bhṛśam pratyavapātitam

original: 6.086.019c aṅgado mokṣayām āsa saroṣaḥ sa paraśvadham
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ mokṣayām āsa sa roṣaḥ sa paraśvadham

original: 6.086.020a sa vīro vajrasaṃkāśam aṅgado muṣṭim ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa vīraḥ vajra saṃkāśam aṅgadaḥ muṣṭim ātmanaḥ
saṃvartayan su saṃkruddhaḥ pituḥ tulya parākramaḥ
rākṣasasya stana abhyāśe marma jñaḥ hṛdayam prati
indra aśani sama sparśam sa muṣṭim vinyapātayat
tena tasya nipātena rākṣasasya mahā mṛdhe

original: 6.086.022c paphāla hṛdayaṃ cāśu sa papāta hato bhuvi
analyzed: paphāla hṛdayam ca āśu sa papāta hataḥ bhuvi

original: 6.086.023a tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyaṃ saṃpracukṣubhe
analyzed: tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyam saṃpracukṣubhe

original: 6.086.023c abhavac ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu
analyzed: abhavat ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu
mahodara mahāpārśvau hatau dṛṣṭvā tu rākṣasau

original: 6.087.001c tasmiṃś ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahābale
analyzed: tasmin ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahā bale

original: 6.087.002a āviveśa mahān krodho rāvaṇaṃ tu mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: āviveśa mahān krodhaḥ rāvaṇam tu mahā mṛdhe

original: 6.087.002c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: sūtam saṃcodayām āsa vākyam ca idam uvāca ha
nihatānām amātyānām ruddhasya nagarasya ca
duḥkham upaneṣyāmi hatvā tau rāma lakṣmaṇau
rāma vṛkṣam raṇe hanmi sītā puṣpa phala pradam

original: 6.087.004c praśākhā yasya sugrīvo jāmbavān kumudo nalaḥ
analyzed: praśākhāḥ yasya sugrīvaḥ jāmbavān kumudaḥ nalaḥ

original: 6.087.005a sa diśo daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasyātiratho mahān
analyzed: sa diśaḥ daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasya atirathaḥ mahān
nādayan prayayau tūrṇam rāghavam ca abhyavartata
pūritā tena śabdena sa nadīgiri kānanā
saṃcacāla mahī sarvā sa varāha mṛga dvipā
tāmasam su mahā ghoram cakāra astram su dāruṇam

original: 6.087.007c nirdadāha kapīn sarvāṃs te prapetuḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: nirdadāha kapīn sarvān te prapetuḥ samantataḥ
tāni anīkāni anekāni rāvaṇasya śara uttamaiḥ
dṛṣṭvā bhagnāni śataśas rāghavaḥ paryavasthitaḥ

original: 6.087.009a sa dadarśa tato rāmaṃ tiṣṭhantam aparājitam
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas rāmam tiṣṭhantam aparājitam

original: 6.087.009c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavaṃ yathā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavam yathā
ālikhantam iva ākāśam avaṣṭabhya mahat dhanuḥ
padma patra viśāla akṣam dīrgha bāhum ariṃdamam

original: 6.087.011a vānarāṃś ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantaṃ ca rāvaṇam
analyzed: vānarān ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantam ca rāvaṇam

original: 6.087.011c samīkṣya rāghavo hṛṣṭo madhye jagrāha kārmukam
analyzed: samīkṣya rāghavaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ madhye jagrāha kārmukam

original: 6.087.012a visphārayitum ārebhe tataḥ sa dhanur uttamam
analyzed: visphārayitum ārebhe tatas sa dhanuḥ uttamam
mahā vegam mahā nādam nirbhindan iva medinīm
tayoḥ śara patham prāpya rāvaṇaḥ rāja putrayoḥ

original: 6.087.013c sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśisūryayoḥ
analyzed: sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśi sūryayoḥ
rāvaṇasya ca bāṇa oghaiḥ rāma vispharitena ca

original: 6.087.014c śabdena rākṣasās tena petuś ca śataśas tadā
analyzed: śabdena rākṣasāḥ tena petuḥ ca śataśas tadā

original: 6.087.015a tam icchan prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ lakṣmaṇo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam icchan prathamam yoddhum lakṣmaṇaḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
mumoca dhanuḥ āyamya śarān agni śikhā upamān
tān mukta mātrān ākāśe lakṣmaṇena dhanuṣmatā
bāṇān bāṇaiḥ mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ pratyavārayat

original: 6.087.017a ekam ekena bāṇena tribhis trīn daśabhir daśa
analyzed: ekam ekena bāṇena tribhiḥ trīn daśabhiḥ daśa
lakṣmaṇasya praciccheda darśayan pāṇi lāghavam
abhyatikramya saumitrim rāvaṇaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ

original: 6.087.018c āsasāda tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivācalam
analyzed: āsasāda tatas rāmam sthitam śailam iva acalam
sa saṃkhye rāmam āsādya krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ
vyasṛjat śara varṇāni rāvaṇaḥ rāghava upari
śara dhārāḥ tatas rāmaḥ rāvaṇasya dhanuḥ cyutāḥ
dṛṣṭvā eva āpatitāḥ śīghram bhallām jagrāha sa tvaram

original: 6.087.021a tāñ śaraughāṃs tato bhallais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tām śara oghān tatas bhallaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ ciccheda rāghavaḥ
dīpyamānān mahā vegān kruddhān āśīviṣān iva

original: 6.087.022a rāghavo rāvaṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rāvaṇo rāghavaṃ tathā
analyzed: rāghavaḥ rāvaṇam tūrṇam rāvaṇaḥ rāghavam tathā
anyonyam vividhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ abhivavarṣatuḥ

original: 6.087.023a ceratuś ca ciraṃ citraṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyadakṣiṇam
analyzed: ceratuḥ ca ciram citram maṇḍalam savya dakṣiṇam
bāṇa vegān samudīkṣya samareṣu aparājitau
tayoḥ bhūtāni vitreṣuḥ yugapad saṃprayudhyatoḥ
raudrayoḥ sāyaka mucoḥ yama antaka nikāśayoḥ

original: 6.087.025a saṃtataṃ vividhair bāṇair babhūva gaganaṃ tadā
analyzed: saṃtatam vividhaiḥ bāṇaiḥ babhūva gaganam tadā
ghanaiḥ iva ātapa apāye vidyut mālā samākulaiḥ
gavākṣitam iva ākāśam babhūva śūra vṛṣṭibhiḥ
mahā vegaiḥ su tīkṣṇa agraiḥ gṛdhra patraiḥ su vājitaiḥ

original: 6.087.027a śarāndhakāraṃ tau bhīmaṃ cakratuḥ paramaṃ tadā
analyzed: śara andhakāram tau bhīmam cakratuḥ paramam tadā
gate stam tapane ca api mahā meghau iva utthitau
babhūva tumulam yuddham anyonya vadha kāṅkṣiṇoḥ
an āsādyam a cintyam ca vṛtra vāsavayoḥ iva
ubhau hi parama iṣvāsau ubhau śastra viśāradau

original: 6.087.029c ubhau cāstravidāṃ mukhyāv ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ
analyzed: ubhau ca astra vidām mukhyau ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ

original: 6.087.030a ubhau hi yena vrajatas tena tena śarormayaḥ
analyzed: ubhau hi yena vrajataḥ tena tena śara ūrmayaḥ

original: 6.087.030c ūrmayo vāyunā viddhā jagmuḥ sāgarayor iva
analyzed: ūrmayaḥ vāyunā viddhāḥ jagmuḥ sāgarayoḥ iva
tatas saṃsakta hastaḥ tu rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇaḥ
nārāca mālām rāmasya lalāṭe pratyamuñcata
raudra cāpa prayuktām tām nīlotpala dala prabhām

original: 6.087.032c śirasā dhārayan rāmo na vyathāṃ pratyapadyata
analyzed: śirasā dhārayan rāmaḥ na vyathām pratyapadyata

original: 6.087.033a atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan
analyzed: atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan
śarān bhūyas samādāya rāmaḥ krodha samanvitaḥ

original: 6.087.034a mumoca ca mahātejāś cāpam āyamya vīryavān
analyzed: mumoca ca mahā tejāḥ cāpam āyamya vīryavān
tām śarān rākṣasa indrāya cikṣepa ācchinna sāyakaḥ
te mahā megha saṃkāśe kavace patitāḥ śarāḥ

original: 6.087.035c avadhye rākṣasendrasya na vyathāṃ janayaṃs tadā
analyzed: avadhye rākṣasa indrasya na vyathām janayan tadā

original: 6.087.036a punar evātha taṃ rāmo rathasthaṃ rākṣasādhipam
analyzed: punar eva atha tam rāmaḥ ratha stham rākṣasa adhipam
lalāṭe parama astreṇa sarva astra kuśalaḥ bhinat
te bhittvā bāṇa rūpāṇi pañca śīrṣāḥ iva uragāḥ
śvasantaḥ viviśuḥ bhūmim rāvaṇa pratikūla tāḥ
nihatya rāghavasya astram rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
āsuram su mahā ghoram anyat astram samādade
siṃha vyāghra mukhān ca anyān kaṅka kāka mukhān api
gṛdhra śyena mukhān ca api sṛgāla vadanān tathā
īhā mṛga muhān ca anyān vyādita āsyān bhaya āvahān

original: 6.087.040c pañcāsyāṃl lelihānāṃś ca sasarja niśitāñ śarān
analyzed: pañca āsyān lelihānān ca sasarja niśitām śarān
śarān khara mukhān ca anyān varāha mukha saṃsthitān
śvāna kukkuṭa vaktrān ca makara āśīviṣa ānanān
