original: 6.087.042a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitāñ śarān
analyzed: etān ca anyān ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitām śarān

original: 6.087.042c rāmaṃ prati mahātejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
analyzed: rāmam prati mahā tejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpaḥ iva śvasan
āsureṇa samāviṣṭaḥ saḥ streṇa raghunandanaḥ
sasarja astram mahā utsāhaḥ pāvakam pāvaka upamaḥ
agni dīpta mukhān bāṇān tathā sūrya mukhān api
candra ardhacandra vaktrān ca dhūmaketu mukhān api
graha nakṣatra varṇān ca mahā ulkāḥ mukha saṃsthitān
vidyujjihva upamān ca anyān sasarja niśitām śarān
te rāvaṇa śarāḥ ghorāḥ rāghava astra samāhatāḥ

original: 6.087.046c vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe jagmuś caiva sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: vilayam jagmuḥ ākāśe jagmuḥ ca eva sahasraśas
tat astram nihatam dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 6.087.047c hṛṣṭā nedus tataḥ sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ neduḥ tatas sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
tasmin pratihate stre tu rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.088.001c krodhaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ cakre krodhāc cāstram anantaram
analyzed: krodham ca dviguṇam cakre krodhāt ca astram anantaram

original: 6.088.002a mayena vihitaṃ raudram anyad astraṃ mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: mayena vihitam raudram anyat astram mahā dyutiḥ
utsraṣṭum rāvaṇaḥ ghoram rāghavāya pracakrame

original: 6.088.003a tataḥ śūlāni niścerur gadāś ca musalāni ca
analyzed: tatas śūlāni niśceruḥ gadāḥ ca musalāni ca
kārmukāt dīpyamānāni vajra sārāṇi sarvaśas
kūṭamudgara pāśāḥ ca dīptāḥ ca aśanayaḥ tathā

original: 6.088.004c niṣpetur vividhās tīkṣṇā vātā iva yugakṣaye
analyzed: niṣpetuḥ vividhāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ vātāḥ iva yuga kṣaye

original: 6.088.005a tad astraṃ rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tat astram rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttama astra vidām varaḥ
jaghāna parama astreṇa gandharveṇa mahā dyutiḥ
tasmin pratihate stre tu rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
rāvaṇaḥ krodha tāmra akṣaḥ sauram astram udīrayat

original: 6.088.007a tataś cakrāṇi niṣpetur bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca
analyzed: tatas cakrāṇi niṣpetuḥ bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca
kārmukāt bhīma vegasya daśagrīvasya dhīmataḥ

original: 6.088.008a tair āsīd gaganaṃ dīptaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ
analyzed: taiḥ āsīt gaganam dīptam saṃpatadbhiḥ itas tatas

original: 6.088.008c patadbhiś ca diśo dīptaiś candrasūryagrahair iva
analyzed: patadbhiḥ ca diśaḥ dīptaiḥ candra sūrya grahaiḥ iva

original: 6.088.009a tāni ciccheda bāṇaughaiś cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tāni ciccheda bāṇa oghaiḥ cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ
āyudhāni vicitrāṇi rāvaṇasya camū mukhe

original: 6.088.010a tad astraṃ tu hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tat astram tu hatam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 6.088.010c vivyādha daśabhir bāṇai rāmaṃ sarveṣu marmasu
analyzed: vivyādha daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ rāmam sarveṣu marmasu
sa viddhaḥ daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ mahā kārmuka niḥsṛtaiḥ
rāvaṇena mahā tejāḥ na prākampata rāghavaḥ
tatas vivyādha gātreṣu sarveṣu samitiṃjayaḥ

original: 6.088.012c rāghavas tu susaṃkruddho rāvaṇaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tu su saṃkruddhaḥ rāvaṇam bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
etasmin antare kruddhaḥ rāghavasya anujaḥ balī
lakṣmaṇaḥ sāyakān sapta jagrāha para vīra hā
taiḥ sāyakaiḥ mahā vegaiḥ rāvaṇasya mahā dyutiḥ

original: 6.088.014c dhvajaṃ manuṣyaśīrṣaṃ tu tasya ciccheda naikadhā
analyzed: dhvajam manuṣya śīrṣam tu tasya ciccheda na ekadhā
sāratheḥ ca api bāṇena śiraḥ jvalita kuṇḍalam
jahāra lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nairṛtasya mahā balaḥ

original: 6.088.016a tasya bāṇaiś ca ciccheda dhanur gajakaropamam
analyzed: tasya bāṇaiḥ ca ciccheda dhanuḥ gaja kara upamam
lakṣmaṇaḥ rākṣasa indrasya pañcabhiḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
nīla megha nibhān ca asya sat aśvān parvata upamān
jaghāna āplutya gadayā rāvaṇasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
hata aśvāt vegavān vegāt avaplutya mahā rathāt

original: 6.088.018c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ bhrātaraṃ prati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: krodham āhārayat tīvram bhrātaram prati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.088.019a tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāśaktir dīptāṃ dīptāśanīm iva
analyzed: tatas śaktim mahā śaktiḥ dīptām dīpta aśanīm iva
vibhīṣaṇāya cikṣepa rākṣasa indraḥ pratāpavān

original: 6.088.020a aprāptām eva tāṃ bāṇais tribhiś ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: aprāptām eva tām bāṇaiḥ tribhiḥ ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ
athā udatiṣṭhat saṃnādaḥ vānarāṇām tadā raṇe

original: 6.088.021a sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcanamālinī
analyzed: sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcana mālinī
sa visphuliṅgā jvalitā mahā ulkā iva divaḥ cyutā
tatas saṃbhāvitatarām kālena api durāsadām
jagrāha vipulām śaktim dīpyamānām sva tejasā
sā veginā balavatā rāvaṇena durātmanā
jajvāla su mahā ghorā śakra aśani sama prabhā

original: 6.088.024a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇas taṃ vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: etasmin antare vīraḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ tam vibhīṣaṇam
prāṇa saṃśayam āpannam tūrṇam eva abhyapadyata

original: 6.088.025a taṃ vimokṣayituṃ vīraś cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam vimokṣayitum vīraḥ cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ
rāvaṇam śakti hastam tam śara varṣaiḥ avākirat
kīryamāṇaḥ śara ogheṇa visṛṣṭtena mahātmanā
na prahartum manaḥ cakre vimukhīkṛta vikramaḥ

original: 6.088.027a mokṣitaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: mokṣitam bhrātaram dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ
lakṣmaṇa abhimukhaḥ tiṣṭhan idam vacanam abravīt

original: 6.088.028a mokṣitas te balaślāghin yasmād evaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: mokṣitaḥ te bala ślāghin yasmāt evam vibhīṣaṇaḥ
vimucya rākṣasam śaktiḥ tvayi iyam vinipātyate

original: 6.088.029a eṣā te hṛdayaṃ bhittvā śaktir lohitalakṣaṇā
analyzed: eṣā te hṛdayam bhittvā śaktiḥ lohita lakṣaṇā
mad bāhu parigha utsṛṣṭā prāṇān ādāya yāsyati

original: 6.088.030a ity evam uktvā tāṃ śaktim aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ mahāsvanām
analyzed: iti evam uktvā tām śaktim aṣṭa ghaṇṭām mahā svanām
mayena māyā vihitām amoghām śatru ghātinīm
lakṣmaṇāya samuddiśya jvalantīm iva tejasā

original: 6.088.031c rāvaṇaḥ paramakruddhaś cikṣepa ca nanāda ca
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ parama kruddhaḥ cikṣepa ca nanāda ca
sā kṣiptā bhīma vegena śakra aśani sama svanā
śaktiḥ abhyapatat vegāt lakṣmaṇam raṇa mūrdhani

original: 6.088.033a tām anuvyāharac chaktim āpatantīṃ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tām anuvyāharat śaktim āpatantīm sa rāghavaḥ

original: 6.088.033c svastyas tu lakṣmaṇāyeti moghā bhava hatodyamā
analyzed: svasti as tu lakṣmaṇāya iti moghā bhava hata udyamā
nyapatat sā mahā vegā lakṣmaṇasya mahā urasi
jihvā iva uraga rājasya dīpyamānā mahā dyutiḥ
tatas rāvaṇa vegena su dūram avagāḍhayā
śaktyā nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ papāta bhuvi lakṣmaṇaḥ
tad avastham samīpa sthaḥ lakṣmaṇam prekṣya rāghavaḥ
bhrātṛ snehāt mahā tejāḥ viṣaṇṇa hṛdayaḥ bhavat
sa muhūrtam anudhyāya bāṣpa vyākula locanaḥ
babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ yugānte iva pāvakaḥ

original: 6.088.038a na viṣādasya kālo 'yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: na viṣādasya kālaḥ yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ

original: 6.088.038c cakre sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: cakre su tumulam yuddham rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ

original: 6.088.039a sa dadarśa tato rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnaṃ mahāhave
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnam mahā āhave
lakṣmaṇam rudhira ādigdham sa pannagam iva acalam

original: 6.088.040a tām api prahitāṃ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā
analyzed: tām api prahitām śaktim rāvaṇena balīyasā

original: 6.088.040c yatnatas te hariśreṣṭhā na śekur avamarditum
analyzed: yatnatas te hari śreṣṭhāḥ na śekuḥ avamarditum
arditāḥ ca eva bāṇa oghaiḥ kṣipra hastena rakṣasā
saumitrim sā vinirbhidya praviṣṭā dharaṇī talam

original: 6.088.041c tāṃ karābhyāṃ parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktiṃ bhayāvahām
analyzed: tām karābhyām parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktim bhaya āvahām

original: 6.088.041e babhañja samare kruddho balavad vicakarṣa ca
analyzed: babhañja samare kruddhaḥ balavat vicakarṣa ca
tasya niṣkarṣataḥ śaktim rāvaṇena balīyasā
śarāḥ sarveṣu gātreṣu pātitāḥ marma bhedinaḥ

original: 6.088.043a acintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣyā ca lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: a cintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣya ā ca lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.088.043c abravīc ca hanūmantaṃ sugrīvaṃ caiva rāghavaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca hanūmantam sugrīvam ca eva rāghavaḥ
lakṣmaṇam parivārya iha tiṣṭhadhvam vānara uttamāḥ
parākramasya kālaḥ yam saṃprāptaḥ me cira īpsitaḥ
pāpa ātmā ayam daśagrīvaḥ vadhyatām pāpa niścayaḥ
kāṅkṣitaḥ stokakasya iva gharma ante megha darśanam

original: 6.088.045a asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ
analyzed: asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyam pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ

original: 6.088.045c arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
analyzed: arāvaṇam arāmam vā jagat drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
rājya nāśam vane vāsam daṇḍake paridhāvanam

original: 6.088.046c vaidehyāś ca parāmarśaṃ rakṣobhiś ca samāgamam
analyzed: vaidehyāḥ ca parāmarśam rakṣobhiḥ ca samāgamam

original: 6.088.047a prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ kleśaṃ ca nirayopamam
analyzed: prāptam duḥkham mahat ghoram kleśam ca niraya upamam

original: 6.088.047c adya sarvam ahaṃ tyakṣye hatvā taṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: adya sarvam aham tyakṣye hatvā tam rāvaṇam raṇe

original: 6.088.048a yadarthaṃ vānaraṃ sainyaṃ samānītam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: yad artham vānaram sainyam samānītam idam mayā

original: 6.088.048c sugrīvaś ca kṛto rājye nihatvā vālinaṃ raṇe
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ ca kṛtaḥ rājye nihatvā vālinam raṇe

original: 6.088.049a yadarthaṃ sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setur baddhaś ca sāgare
analyzed: yad artham sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setuḥ baddhaḥ ca sāgare

original: 6.088.049c so 'yam adya raṇe pāpaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam adya raṇe pāpaḥ cakṣuḥ viṣayam āgataḥ
cakṣuḥ viṣayam āgamya na ayam jīvitum arhati
dṛṣṭim dṛṣṭiviṣasya iva sarpasya mama rāvaṇaḥ
svasthāḥ paśyata durdharṣāḥ yuddham vānara puṃgavāḥ
āsīnāḥ parvata agreṣu mama idam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 6.088.052a adya rāmasya rāmatvaṃ paśyantu mama saṃyuge
analyzed: adya rāmasya rāma tvam paśyantu mama saṃyuge
trayaḥ lokāḥ sa gandharvāḥ sa devāḥ sa ṛṣi cāraṇāḥ

original: 6.088.053a adya karma kariṣyāmi yal lokāḥ sacarācarāḥ
analyzed: adya karma kariṣyāmi yat lokāḥ sa carācarāḥ
sa devāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvat bhūmiḥ dhariṣyati
evam uktvā śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
ājaghāna daśagrīvam raṇe rāmaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: 6.088.055a atha pradīptair nārācair musalaiś cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: atha pradīptaiḥ nārācaiḥ musalaiḥ ca api rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.088.055c abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: abhyavarṣat tadā rāmam dhārābhiḥ iva toyadaḥ
rāma rāvaṇa muktānām anyonyam abhinighnatām

original: 6.088.056c śarāṇāṃ ca śarāṇāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ
analyzed: śarāṇām ca śarāṇām ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ

original: 6.088.057a te bhinnāś ca vikīrṇāś ca rāmarāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: te bhinnāḥ ca vikīrṇāḥ ca rāma rāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ
antarikṣāt pradīpta agrāḥ nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
tayoḥ jyā tala nirghoṣaḥ rāma rāvaṇayoḥ mahān
trāsanaḥ sarva būtānām sa babhūva adbhuta upamaḥ
sa kīryamāṇaḥ śara jāla vṛṣṭibhiḥ
mahātmanā dīpta dhanuṣmatā arditaḥ
bhayāt pradudrāva sametya rāvaṇaḥ
yathā anilena abhihataḥ balāhakaḥ

original: 6.089.001a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa dattvā tumulam yuddham rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.089.001c visṛjan eva bāṇaughān suṣeṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: visṛjan eva bāṇa oghān suṣeṇam vākyam abravīt
eṣa rāvaṇa vegena lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ kṣitau

original: 6.089.002c sarpavad veṣṭate vīro mama śokam udīrayan
analyzed: sarpa vat veṣṭate vīraḥ mama śokam udīrayan

original: 6.089.003a śoṇitārdram imaṃ vīraṃ prāṇair iṣṭataraṃ mama
analyzed: śoṇita ārdram imam vīram prāṇaiḥ iṣṭataram mama

original: 6.089.003c paśyato mama kā śaktir yoddhuṃ paryākulātmanaḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ mama kā śaktiḥ yoddhum paryākula ātmanaḥ

original: 6.089.004a ayaṃ sa samaraślāghī bhrātā me śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ayam sa samara ślāghī bhrātā me śubha lakṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.089.004c yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇair me kiṃ sukhena vā
analyzed: yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇaiḥ me kim sukhena vā

original: 6.089.005a lajjatīva hi me vīryaṃ bhraśyatīva karād dhanuḥ
analyzed: lajjati iva hi me vīryam bhraśyati iva karāt dhanuḥ
sāyakāḥ vyavasīdanti dṛṣṭiḥ bāṣpa vaśam gatā

original: 6.089.005e cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā copajāyate
analyzed: cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā ca upajāyate
bhrātaram nihatam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena durātmanā
param viṣādam āpannaḥ vilalāpa ākula indriyaḥ

original: 6.089.007a na hi yuddhena me kāryaṃ naiva prāṇair na sītayā
analyzed: na hi yuddhena me kāryam na eva prāṇaiḥ na sītayā
bhrātaram nihatam dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam raṇa pāṃsuṣu

original: 6.089.008a kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ prāṇair yuddhe kāryaṃ na vidyate
analyzed: kim me rājyena kim prāṇaiḥ yuddhe kāryam na vidyate
yatra ayam nihataḥ śete raṇa mūrdhani lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.089.009a rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
na mṛtaḥ yam mahā bāhuḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ lakṣmi vardhanaḥ

original: 6.089.010a na cāsya vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ nāpi śyāmaṃ na niṣprabham
analyzed: na ca asya vikṛtam vaktram na api śyāmam na niṣprabham

original: 6.089.010c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca mukham asyābhilakṣyate
analyzed: su prabham ca prasannam ca mukham asya abhilakṣyate
padma rakta talau hastau su prasanne ca locane

original: 6.089.011c evaṃ na vidyate rūpaṃ gatāsūnāṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: evam na vidyate rūpam gatāsūnām viśām pate

original: 6.089.011e māṃ viṣādaṃ kṛtvā vīra saprāṇo 'yam ariṃdama
analyzed: mām viṣādam kṛtvā vīra sa prāṇaḥ yam ariṃdama
ākhyāsyate prasuptasya srasta gātrasya bhū tale

original: 6.089.012c socchvāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ vīra kampamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: sa ucchvāsam hṛdayam vīra kampamānam muhur muhur

original: 6.089.013a evam uktvā tu vākyajñaḥ suṣeṇo rāghavaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vākya jñaḥ suṣeṇaḥ rāghavam vacaḥ
samīpa stham uvāca idam hanūmantam abhitvaran

original: 6.089.014a saumya śīghram ito gatvā śailam oṣadhiparvatam
analyzed: saumya śīghram itas gatvā śailam oṣadhi parvatam

original: 6.089.014c pūrvaṃ hi kathito yo 'sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam hi kathitaḥ sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ

original: 6.089.015a dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya
analyzed: dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya
viśalyakaraṇī nāma viśalyakaraṇīm śubhām
sauvarṇakaraṇīm ca api tathā saṃjīvanīm api
saṃdhānakaraṇīm ca api gatvā śīghram iha ānaya
saṃjīvana artham vīrasya lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.089.017a ity evam ukto hanumān gatvā cauṣadhiparvatam
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ hanumān gatvā ca oṣadhi parvatam

original: 6.089.017c cintām abhyagamac chrīmān ajānaṃs tā mahauṣadhīḥ
analyzed: cintām abhyagamat śrīmān a jānan tāḥ mahā auṣadhīḥ
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā māruteḥ amita ojasaḥ

original: 6.089.018c idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharaṃ gireḥ
analyzed: idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharam gireḥ
a gṛhya yadi gacchāmi viśalyakaraṇīm aham

original: 6.089.019c kālātyayena doṣaḥ syād vaiklavyaṃ ca mahad bhavet
analyzed: kāla atyayena doṣaḥ syāt vaiklavyam ca mahat bhavet

original: 6.089.020a iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipraṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipram mahā balaḥ

original: 6.089.020c utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanūmāñ śikharaṃ gireḥ
analyzed: utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanumān śikharam gireḥ
oṣadhīḥ na avagacchāmi tāḥ aham hari puṃgava

original: 6.089.021c tad idaṃ śikharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ gires tasyāhṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: tat idam śikharam kṛtsnam gireḥ tasya āhṛtam mayā
evam kathayamānam tam praśasya pavanātmajam
suṣeṇaḥ vānara śreṣṭhaḥ jagrāha utpāṭya ca oṣadhīḥ
tatas saṃkṣodayitvā tām oṣadhim vānara uttamaḥ
lakṣmaṇasya dadau nastas suṣeṇaḥ su mahā dyutiḥ
sa śalyaḥ sa samāghrāya lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
viśalyaḥ virujaḥ śīghram udatiṣṭhat mahī talāt

original: 6.089.025a samutthitaṃ te harayo bhūtalāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: samutthitam te harayaḥ bhū talāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.089.025c sādhu sādhv iti suprītāḥ suṣeṇaṃ pratyapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti su prītāḥ suṣeṇam pratyapūjayan

original: 6.089.026a ehy ehīty abravīd rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ paravīrahā
analyzed: ehi ehi iti abravīt rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam para vīra hā
sasvaje sneha gāḍham ca bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.089.027a abravīc ca pariṣvajya saumitriṃ rāghavas tadā
analyzed: abravīt ca pariṣvajya saumitrim rāghavaḥ tadā

original: 6.089.027c diṣṭyā tvāṃ vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvām vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam

original: 6.089.028a na hi me jīvitenārthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā
analyzed: na hi me jīvitena arthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā

original: 6.089.028c ko hi me jīvitenārthas tvayi pañcatvam āgate
analyzed: kaḥ hi me jīvitena arthaḥ tvayi pañcatvam āgate

original: 6.089.029a ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti evam vadataḥ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.089.029c khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
tām pratijñām pratijñāya purā satya parākrama

original: 6.089.030c laghuḥ kaś cid ivāsattvo naivaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
analyzed: laghuḥ kaḥ cit iva asattvaḥ na evam vaktum iha arhasi

original: 6.089.031a na pratijñāṃ hi kurvanti vitathāṃ sādhavo 'nagha
analyzed: na pratijñām hi kurvanti vitathām sādhavaḥ nagha

original: 6.089.031c lakṣmaṇaṃ hi mahat tv asya pratijñāparipālanam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam hi mahat tu asya pratijñā paripālanam

original: 6.089.032a nairāśyam upagantuṃ te tad alaṃ matkṛte 'nagha
analyzed: nairāśyam upagantum te tat alam mad kṛte nagha
vadhena rāvaṇasya adya pratijñām anupālaya

original: 6.089.033a na jīvan yāsyate śatrus tava bāṇapathaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: na jīvan yāsyate śatruḥ tava bāṇa patham gataḥ
nardataḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrasya siṃhasya iva mahā gajaḥ

original: 6.089.034a ahaṃ tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: aham tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ

original: 6.089.034c yāvad astaṃ na yāty eṣa kṛtakarmā divākaraḥ
analyzed: yāvat astam na yāti eṣa kṛta karmā divākaraḥ

original: 6.090.001a lakṣmaṇena tu tad vākyam uktaṃ śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena tu tat vākyam uktam śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ
rāvaṇāya śarān ghorān visasarja camū mukhe

original: 6.090.002a daśagrīvo rathasthas tu rāmaṃ vajropamaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: daśagrīvaḥ ratha sthaḥ tu rāmam vajra upamaiḥ śaraiḥ
ājaghāna mahā ghoraiḥ dhārābhiḥ iva toyadaḥ
dīpta pāvaka saṃkāśaiḥ śaraiḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇaiḥ
nirbibheda raṇe rāmaḥ daśagrīvam samāhitaḥ
bhūmi sthitasya rāmasya ratha sthasya ca rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.090.004c na samaṃ yuddham ity āhur devagandharvadānavāḥ
analyzed: na samam yuddham iti āhuḥ deva gandharva dānavāḥ
tatas kāñcana citra aṅgaḥ kiṃkiṇī śata bhūṣitaḥ
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśaḥ vaidūrya maya kūbaraḥ
sat aśvaiḥ kāñcana āpīḍaiḥ yuktaḥ śveta prakīrṇakaiḥ
haribhiḥ sūrya saṃkāśaiḥ hema jāla vibhūṣitaiḥ
rukma veṇu dhvajaḥ śrīmān deva rāja rathaḥ varaḥ
abhyavartata kākutstham avatīrya triviṣṭapāt

original: 6.090.008a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sapratodo rathe sthitaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmam sa pratodaḥ rathe sthitaḥ
prāñjaliḥ mātaliḥ vākyam sahasrākṣasya sārathiḥ
sahasrākṣeṇa kākutstha rathaḥ yam vijayāya te
dattaḥ tava mahā sattva śrīmān śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
idam aindram mahat cāpam kavacam ca agni saṃnibham

original: 6.090.010c śarāś cādityasaṃkāśāḥ śaktiś ca vimalā śitāḥ
analyzed: śarāḥ ca āditya saṃkāśāḥ śaktiḥ ca vimalā śitāḥ

original: 6.090.011a āruhyemaṃ rathaṃ vīra rākṣasaṃ jahi rāvaṇam
analyzed: āruhya imam ratham vīra rākṣasam jahi rāvaṇam

original: 6.090.011c mayā sārathinā rāma mahendra iva dānavān
analyzed: mayā sārathinā rāma mahā indraḥ iva dānavān

original: 6.090.012a ity uktaḥ sa parikramya rathaṃ tam abhivādya ca
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa parikramya ratham tam abhivādya ca

original: 6.090.012c āruroha tadā rāmo lokāṃl lakṣmyā virājayan
analyzed: āruroha tadā rāmaḥ lokān lakṣmyā virājayan
tat babhūva adbhutam yuddham dvairatham loma harṣaṇam

original: 6.090.013c rāmasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya ca mahā bāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ

original: 6.090.014a sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvaṃ daivaṃ daivena rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvam daivam daivena rāghavaḥ
astram rākṣasa rājasya jaghāna parama astra vid

original: 6.090.015a astraṃ tu paramaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ rākasādhipa
analyzed: astram tu paramam ghoram rākṣasam rākasa adhipa
sasarja parama kruddhaḥ punar eva niśācaraḥ
te rāvaṇa dhanuḥ muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcana bhūṣaṇāḥ
abhyavartanta kākutstham sarpāḥ bhūtvā mahā viṣāḥ

original: 6.090.017a te dīptavadanā dīptaṃ vamanto jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
analyzed: te dīpta vadanāḥ dīptam vamantaḥ jvalanam mukhaiḥ
rāmam eva abhyavartanta vyādita āsyāḥ bhayānakāḥ
taiḥ vāsuki sama sparśaiḥ dīpta bhogaiḥ mahāviṣaiḥ

original: 6.090.018c diśaś ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś ca samāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ ca samāvṛtāḥ

original: 6.090.019a tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatata āhave
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatataḥ āhave
astram gārutmatam ghoram prāduścakre bhaya āvaham
te rāghava dhanuḥ muktāḥ rukma puṅkhāḥ śikhi prabhāḥ
suparṇāḥ kāñcanāḥ bhūtvā viceruḥ sarpa śatravaḥ

original: 6.090.021a te tān sarvāñ śarāñ jaghnuḥ sarparūpān mahājavān
analyzed: te tān sarvām śarām jaghnuḥ sarpa rūpān mahā javān
suparṇa rūpāḥ rāmasya viśikhāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
astre pratihate kruddhaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
abhyavarṣat tadā rāmam ghorābhiḥ śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
tatas śara sahasreṇa rāmam akliṣṭa kāriṇam
ardayitvā śara ogheṇa mātalim pratyavidhyata

original: 6.090.024a pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketuṃ ca kāñcanam
analyzed: pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketum ca kāñcanam
aindrān abhijaghāna aśvām śara jālena rāvaṇaḥ
viṣeduḥ deva gandharvāḥ dānavāḥ cāraṇaiḥ saha

original: 6.090.025c rāmam ārtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: rāmam ārtam tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
vyathitāḥ vānara indrāḥ ca babhūvuḥ sa vibhīṣaṇāḥ
rāma candramasam dṛṣṭvā grastam rāvaṇa rāhuṇā

original: 6.090.027a prājāpatyaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ rohiṇīṃ śaśinaḥ priyām
analyzed: prājāpatyam ca nakṣatram rohiṇīm śaśinaḥ priyām
samākramya budhaḥ tasthau prajānām aśubha āvahaḥ
sa dhūma parivṛtta ūrmiḥ prajvalan iva sāgaraḥ

original: 6.090.028c utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśann iva divākaram
analyzed: utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśan iva divākaram
śastra varṇaḥ su paruṣaḥ manda raśmiḥ divākaraḥ
adṛśyata kabandha aṅgaḥ saṃsaktaḥ dhūmaketunā
kosalānām ca nakṣatram vyaktam indra agni daivatam
ākramya aṅgārakaḥ tasthau viśākhām api ca ambare
daśa āsyaḥ viṃśati bhujaḥ pragṛhīta śarāsanaḥ
adṛśyata daśagrīvaḥ mainākaḥ iva parvataḥ
nirasyamānaḥ rāmaḥ tu daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
na aśakat abhisaṃdhātum sāyakān raṇa mūrdhani

original: 6.090.033a sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīṃ kruddhaḥ kiṃ cit saṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīm kruddhaḥ kim cit saṃrakta locanaḥ
jagāma su mahā krodham nirdahan iva cakṣuṣā

original: 6.091.001a tasya kruddhasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tasya kruddhasya vadanam dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
sarva bhūtāni vitreṣuḥ prākampata ca medinī
śailaḥ saṃcacāla acala drumaḥ

original: 6.091.002c babhūva cāpi kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: babhūva ca api kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritām patiḥ
khagāḥ ca khara nirghoṣāḥ gagane paruṣa svanāḥ
autpātikāḥ vinardantaḥ samantāt paricakramuḥ

original: 6.091.004a rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddham utpātāṃś ca sudāruṇān
analyzed: rāmam dṛṣṭvā su saṃkruddham utpātān ca su dāruṇān
vitreṣuḥ sarva bhūtāni rāvaṇasya āviśat bhayam

original: 6.091.005a vimānasthās tadā devā gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
analyzed: vimāna sthāḥ tadā devāḥ gandharvāḥ ca mahā uragāḥ
ṛṣi dānava daityāḥ ca garutmantaḥ ca khecarāḥ
dadṛśuḥ te tadā yuddham loka saṃvarta saṃsthitam
nānā praharaṇaiḥ bhīmaiḥ śūrayoḥ saṃprayudhyatoḥ

original: 6.091.007a ūcuḥ surāsurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ sura asurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ
prekṣamāṇāḥ mahā yuddham vākyam bhaktyā prahṛṣṭa vat
daśagrīvam jaya iti āhuḥ asurāḥ samavasthitāḥ

original: 6.091.008c devā rāmam athocus te tvaṃ jayeti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ rāmam atha ūcuḥ te tvam jaya iti punar punar

original: 6.091.009a etasminn antare krodhād rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare krodhāt rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ
prahartu kāmaḥ duṣṭa ātmā spṛśan praharaṇam mahat
śaila śṛṅga nibhaiḥ kūṭaiḥ citam dṛṣṭi bhaya āvaham
sa dhūmam iva tīkṣṇa agram yugānta agni caya upamam
ati raudram anāsādyam kālena api durāsadam
trāsanam sarva bhūtānām dāraṇam bhedanam tathā

original: 6.091.012c pradīpta iva roṣeṇa śūlaṃ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: pradīptaḥ iva roṣeṇa śūlam jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.091.013a tac chūlaṃ paramakruddho madhye jagrāha vīryavān
analyzed: tat śūlam parama kruddhaḥ madhye jagrāha vīryavān
anekaiḥ samare śūraiḥ rākṣasaiḥ parivāritaḥ
samudyamya mahā kāyaḥ nanāda yudhi bhairavam
saṃrakta nayanaḥ roṣāt sva sainyam abhiharṣayan

original: 6.091.015a pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
analyzed: pṛthivīm ca antarikṣam ca diśaḥ ca pradiśaḥ tathā
prākampayat tadā śabdaḥ rākṣasa indrasya dāruṇaḥ
ati nādasya nādena tena tasya durātmanaḥ
sarva bhūtāni vitreṣuḥ sāgaraḥ ca pracukṣubhe

original: 6.091.017a sa gṛhītvā mahāvīryaḥ śūlaṃ tad rāvaṇo mahat
analyzed: sa gṛhītvā mahā vīryaḥ śūlam tat rāvaṇaḥ mahat
vinadya su mahā nādam rāmam paruṣam abravīt

original: 6.091.018a śūlo 'yaṃ vajrasāras te rāma roṣān mayodyataḥ
analyzed: śūlaḥ yam vajra sāraḥ te rāma roṣāt mayā udyataḥ
tava bhrātṛ sahāyasya sadyas prāṇān hariṣyati
rakṣasām adya śūrāṇām nihatānām camū mukhe

original: 6.091.019c tvāṃ nihatya raṇaślāghin karomi tarasā samam
analyzed: tvām nihatya raṇa ślāghin karomi tarasā samam

original: 6.091.020a tiṣṭhedānīṃ nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava
analyzed: tiṣṭha idānīm nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava

original: 6.091.020c evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tac chūlaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tat śūlam rākṣasa adhipaḥ
āpatantam śara ogheṇa vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ
utpatantam yugānta agnim jala oghaiḥ iva vāsavaḥ
nirdadāha sa tān bāṇān rāma kārmuka niḥsṛtān
rāvaṇasya mahā śūlaḥ pataṃgān iva pāvakaḥ
tān dṛṣṭvā bhasmasāt bhūtām śūla saṃsparśa cūrṇitān
sāyakān antarikṣa sthān rāghavaḥ krodham āharat
sa tām mātalinā ānītām śaktim vāsava nirmitām
jagrāha parama kruddhaḥ rāghavaḥ raghunandanaḥ
sā tolitā balavatā śaktiḥ ghaṇṭā kṛta svanā
nabhaḥ prajvālayām āsa yuga anta uklena sa prabhā

original: 6.091.026a sā kṣiptā rākṣasendrasya tasmiñ śūle papāta ha
analyzed: sā kṣiptā rākṣasa indrasya tasmin śūle papāta ha

original: 6.091.026c bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahāñ śūlo nipapāta gatadyutiḥ
analyzed: bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahān śūlaḥ nipapāta gata dyutiḥ

original: 6.091.027a nirbibheda tato bāṇair hayān asya mahājavān
analyzed: nirbibheda tatas bāṇaiḥ hayān asya mahā javān

original: 6.091.027c rāmas tīkṣṇair mahāvegair vajrakalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mahā vegaiḥ vajra kalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
nirbibheda urasi tadā rāvaṇam niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
rāghavaḥ parama āyattaḥ lalāṭe patribhiḥ tribhiḥ
sa śaraiḥ bhinna sarva aṅgaḥ gātra prasruta śoṇitaḥ
rākṣasa indraḥ samūha sthaḥ phulla aśokaḥ iva ābabhau
sa rāma bāṇaiḥ atividdha gātraḥ
jagāma khedam ca samāja madhye
krodham ca cakre su bhṛśam tadānīm

original: 6.092.001a sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthenārdito raṇe
analyzed: sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthena arditaḥ raṇe
rāvaṇaḥ samara ślāghī mahā krodham upāgamat

original: 6.092.002a sa dīptanayano roṣāc cāpam āyamya vīryavān
analyzed: sa dīpta nayanaḥ roṣāt cāpam āyamya vīryavān
abhyardayat su saṃkruddhaḥ rāghavam parama āhave

original: 6.092.003a bāṇadhārā sahasrais tu sa toyada ivāmbarāt
analyzed: bāṇa dhārā sahasraiḥ tu sa toyadaḥ iva ambarāt

original: 6.092.003c rāghavaṃ rāvaṇo bāṇais taṭākam iva pūrayat
analyzed: rāghavam rāvaṇaḥ bāṇaiḥ taṭākam iva pūrayat
pūritaḥ śara jālena dhanuḥ muktena saṃyuge
mahā giriḥ iva akampyaḥ kāku sthaḥ na prakampate

original: 6.092.005a sa śaraiḥ śarajālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ
analyzed: sa śaraiḥ śara jālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ
gabhastīn iva sūryasya pratijagrāha vīryavān
tatas śara sahasrāṇi kṣipra hastaḥ niśācaraḥ
nijaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
sa śoṇita samādigdhaḥ samare lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ phullaḥ iva araṇye su mahān kiṃśuka drumaḥ
śara abhighāta saṃrabdhaḥ saḥ pi jagrāha sāyakān
kākutsthaḥ su mahā tejāḥ yuga anta āditya varcasaḥ
tatas nyonyam su saṃrabdhau ubhau tau rāma rāvaṇau
śara andhakāre samare na upālakṣayatām tadā
tatas krodha samāviṣṭaḥ rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 6.092.010c uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vīraḥ prahasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca rāvaṇam vīraḥ prahasya paruṣam vacaḥ
mama bhāryā janasthānāt ajñānāt rākṣasa adhama

original: 6.092.011c hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ nāsi vīryavān
analyzed: hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvam na asi vīryavān
mayā virahitām dīnām vartamānām mahā vane

original: 6.092.012c vaidehīṃ prasabhaṃ hṛtvā śūro 'ham iti manyase
analyzed: vaidehīm prasabham hṛtvā śūraḥ ham iti manyase
strīṣu śūra vināthāsu paradāra abhimarśake

original: 6.092.013c kṛtvā kāpuruṣaṃ karma śūro 'ham iti manyase
analyzed: kṛtvā kāpuruṣam karma śūraḥ ham iti manyase
bhinna maryāda nirlajja cāritreṣu anavasthita

original: 6.092.014c darpān mṛtyum upādāya śūro 'ham iti manyase
analyzed: darpāt mṛtyum upādāya śūraḥ ham iti manyase
śūreṇa dhanada bhrātrā balaiḥ samuditena ca

original: 6.092.015c ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ karma mahat tvayā
analyzed: ślāghanīyam yaśasyam ca kṛtam karma mahat tvayā
utsekena abhipannasya garhitasya ahitasya ca
karmaṇaḥ prāpnuhi idānīm tasya adya su mahat phalam
śūraḥ ham iti ca ātmānam avagacchasi durmate

original: 6.092.017c naiva lajjāsti te sītāṃ coravad vyapakarṣataḥ
analyzed: nā eva lajjā asti te sītām cora vat vyapakarṣataḥ

original: 6.092.018a yadi matsaṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt
analyzed: yadi mad saṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt

original: 6.092.018c bhrātaraṃ tu kharaṃ paśyes tadā matsāyakair hataḥ
analyzed: bhrātaram tu kharam paśyeḥ tadā mad sāyakaiḥ hataḥ
diṣṭyā asi mama duṣṭa ātman cakṣuḥ viṣayam āgataḥ

original: 6.092.019c adya tvāṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam
analyzed: adya tvām sāyakaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nayāmi yama sādanam

original: 6.092.020a adya te maccharaiś chinnaṃ śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
analyzed: adya te mad śaraiḥ chinnam śiraḥ jvalita kuṇḍalam
kravyādāḥ vyapakarṣantu vikīrṇam raṇa pāṃsuṣu

original: 6.092.021a nipatyorasi gṛdhrās te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa
analyzed: nipatya urasi gṛdhrāḥ te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa
pibantu rudhiram tarṣāt bāṇa śalya anta rothitam
adya mad bāṇa abhinnasya gatāsoḥ patitasya te
karṣantu antrāṇi patagāḥ garutmantaḥ iva uragān

original: 6.092.023a ity evaṃ sa vadan vīro rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti evam sa vadan vīraḥ rāmaḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
rākṣasa indram samīpa stham śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 6.092.024a babhūva dviguṇaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ harṣaś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: babhūva dviguṇam vīryam balam harṣaḥ ca saṃyuge
rāmasya astra balam ca eva śatroḥ nidhana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
prādurbabhūvuḥ astrāṇi sarvāṇi vidita ātmanaḥ
praharṣāt ca mahā tejāḥ śīghrahastataraḥ bhavat
śubhāni etāni cihnāni vijñāya ātma gatāni saḥ
bhūyas eva ardayat rāmaḥ rāvaṇam rākṣasa anta kṛt
harīṇām ca aśma nikaraiḥ śara varṣaiḥ ca rāghavāt
hanyamānaḥ daśagrīvaḥ vighūrṇa hṛdayaḥ bhavat

original: 6.092.028a yadā ca śastraṃ nārebhe na vyakarṣac charāsanam
analyzed: yadā ca śastram na ārebhe na vyakarṣat śarāsanam
na asya pratyakarot vīryam viklavena antarātmanā

original: 6.092.029a kṣiptāś cāpi śarās tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: kṣiptāḥ ca api śarāḥ tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
na raṇa arthāya vartante mṛtyu kāle bhivartataḥ

original: 6.092.030a sūtas tu rathanetāsya tadavasthaṃ nirīkṣya tam
analyzed: sūtaḥ tu ratha netā asya tad avastham nirīkṣya tam
śanais yuddhāt a saṃbhāntaḥ ratham tasya apavāhayat
sa tu mohāt su saṃkruddhaḥ kṛtānta bala coditaḥ
krodha saṃrakta nayanaḥ rāvaṇaḥ sūtam abravīt
hīna vīryam iva aśaktam pauruṣeṇa vivarjitam

original: 6.093.002c bhīruṃ laghum ivāsattvaṃ vihīnam iva tejasā
analyzed: bhīrum laghum iva asattvam vihīnam iva tejasā

original: 6.093.003a vimuktam iva māyābhir astrair iva bahiṣkṛtam
analyzed: vimuktam iva māyābhiḥ astraiḥ iva bahiṣkṛtam

original: 6.093.003c mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase
analyzed: mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase

original: 6.093.004a kimarthaṃ mām avajñāya macchandam anavekṣya ca
analyzed: kimartham mām avajñāya mad chandam an avekṣya ca
tvayā śatru samakṣam me rathaḥ yam apavāhitaḥ
tvayā adya hi mama anārya cira kāla samārjitam

original: 6.093.005c yaśo vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca pratyayaś ca vināśitha
analyzed: yaśaḥ vīryam ca tejaḥ ca pratyayaḥ ca vināśitha
śatroḥ prakhyāta vīryasya rañjanīyasya vikramaiḥ
paśyataḥ yuddha lubdhaḥ ham kṛtaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ tvayā

original: 6.093.007a yas tvaṃ ratham imaṃ mohān na codvahasi durmate
analyzed: yaḥ tvam ratham imam mohāt na ca udvahasi durmate

original: 6.093.007c satyo 'yaṃ pratitarko me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ
analyzed: satyaḥ yam pratitarkaḥ me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ

original: 6.093.008a na hīdaṃ vidyate karma suhṛdo hitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: na hi idam vidyate karma suhṛdaḥ hita kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 6.093.008c ripūṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ caitan na tvayaitat svanuṣṭhitam
analyzed: ripūṇām sadṛśam ca etat na tvayā etat su anuṣṭhitam

original: 6.093.009a nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ yāvan nāpaiti me ripuḥ
analyzed: nivartaya ratham śīghram yāvat na apaiti me ripuḥ

original: 6.093.009c yadi vāpy uṣito 'si tvaṃ smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ
analyzed: yadi vā api uṣitaḥ si tvam smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ

original: 6.093.010a evaṃ paruṣam uktas tu hitabuddhir abuddhinā
analyzed: evam paruṣam uktaḥ tu hita buddhiḥ abuddhinā

original: 6.093.010c abravīd rāvaṇaṃ sūto hitaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: abravīt rāvaṇam sūtaḥ hitam sa anunayam vacaḥ

original: 6.093.011a na bhīto 'smi na mūḍho 'smi nopajapto 'smi śatrubhiḥ
analyzed: na bhītaḥ smi na mūḍhaḥ smi na upajaptaḥ smi śatrubhiḥ

original: 6.093.011c na pramatto na niḥsneho vismṛtā na ca satkriyā
analyzed: na pramattaḥ na niḥsnehaḥ vismṛtā na ca satkriyā

original: 6.093.012a mayā tu hitakāmena yaśaś ca parirakṣatā
analyzed: mayā tu hita kāmena yaśaḥ ca parirakṣatā
sneha praskanna manasā priyam iti apriyam kṛtam

original: 6.093.013a nāsminn arthe mahārāja tvaṃ māṃ priyahite ratam
analyzed: na asmin arthe mahā rāja tvam mām priya hite ratam

original: 6.093.013c kaś cil laghur ivānāryo doṣato gantum arhasi
analyzed: kaḥ cit laghuḥ iva anāryaḥ doṣataḥ gantum arhasi
śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yat nimittam mayā rathaḥ
nadī vegaḥ iva ambhobhiḥ saṃyuge vinivartitaḥ
śramam tava avagacchāmi mahatā raṇa karmaṇā

original: 6.093.015c na hi te vīra saumukhyaṃ praharṣaṃ vopadhāraye
analyzed: na hi te vīra saumukhyam praharṣam vā upadhāraye
ratha udvahana khinnāḥ ca te ime ratha vājinaḥ
dīnāḥ gharma pariśrāntāḥ gāvaḥ varṣa hatāḥ iva

original: 6.093.017a nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ
analyzed: nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭham yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ
teṣu teṣu abhipanneṣu lakṣayāmi apradakṣiṇam
deśa kālau ca vijñeyau lakṣmaṇāni iṅgitāni ca

original: 6.093.018c dainyaṃ harṣaś ca khedaś ca rathinaś ca balābalam
analyzed: dainyam harṣaḥ ca khedaḥ ca rathinaḥ ca balābalam

original: 6.093.019a sthalanimnāni bhūmeś ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca
analyzed: sthala nimnāni bhūmeḥ ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca
yuddha kālaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ parasya antara darśanam
upayāna apayāne ca sthānam pratyapasarpaṇam
sarvam etat ratha sthena jñeyam rathakuṭumbinā
tava viśrāma hetoḥ tu tathā eṣām ratha vājinām

original: 6.093.021c raudraṃ varjayatā khedaṃ kṣamaṃ kṛtam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: raudram varjayatā khedam kṣamam kṛtam idam mayā

original: 6.093.022a na mayā svecchayā vīra ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ
analyzed: na mayā sva icchayā vīra rathaḥ yam apavāhitaḥ
bhartṛ sneha parītena mayā idam yat kṛtam vibho
ājñāpaya yathātattvam vakṣyasi ari niṣūdana

original: 6.093.023c tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vīraṃ gatānṛṇyena cetasā
analyzed: tat kariṣyāmi aham vīram gata anṛṇyena cetasā

original: 6.093.024a saṃtuṣṭas tena vākyena rāvaṇas tasya sāratheḥ
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ tena vākyena rāvaṇaḥ tasya sāratheḥ
praśasya enam bahuvidham yuddha lubdhaḥ bravīt idam

original: 6.093.025a rathaṃ śīghram imaṃ sūta rāghavābhimukhaṃ kuru
analyzed: ratham śīghram imam sūta rāghava abhimukham kuru
na a hatvā samare śatrūn nivartiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.093.026a evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 6.093.026c dadau tasya śubhaṃ hy ekaṃ hastābharaṇam uttamam
analyzed: dadau tasya śubham hi ekam hasta ābharaṇam uttamam
tatas drutam rāvaṇa vākya coditaḥ
pracodayām āsa hayān sa sārathiḥ
sa rākṣasa indrasya tatas mahā rathaḥ
kṣaṇena rāmasya raṇa agratas bhavat
tam āpatantam sahasā svanavantam mahā dhvajam
ratham rākṣasa rājasya nara rājaḥ dadarśa ha
kṛṣṇa vāji samāyuktam yuktam raudreṇa varcasā
taḍit patākā gahanam darśita indrāyudha āyudham
śara dhārāḥ vimuñcantam dhārā sāram iva anbudam

original: 6.094.003a taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā megha saṃkāśam āpatantam ratham ripoḥ
gireḥ vajra abhimṛṣṭasya dīryataḥ sadṛśa svanam
uvāca mātalim rāmaḥ sahasrākṣasya sārathim

original: 6.094.004a mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantam ratham ripoḥ
yathā apasavyam patatā vegena mahatā punar

original: 6.094.004e samare hantum ātmānaṃ tathānena kṛtā matiḥ
analyzed: samare hantum ātmānam tathā anena kṛtā matiḥ

original: 6.094.005a tad apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha rathaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: tat apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha ratham ripoḥ
vidhvaṃsayitum icchāmi vāyuḥ megham iva utthitam
aviklavam asaṃbhrāntam avyagra hṛdaya īkṣaṇam
raśmi saṃcāra niyatam pracodaya ratham drutam
kāmam na tvam samādheyaḥ puraṃdara ratha ucitaḥ

original: 6.094.007c yuyutsur aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
analyzed: yuyutsuḥ aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvām na śikṣaye

original: 6.094.008a parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ
pracodayām āsa ratham sura sārathi sattamaḥ
apasavyam tatas kurvan rāvaṇasya mahā ratham
cakra utkṣiptena rajasā rāvaṇam vyavadhūnayat
tatas kruddhaḥ daśagrīvaḥ tāmra visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ
ratha pratimukham rāmam sāyakaiḥ avadhūnayat
dharṣaṇa āmarṣitaḥ rāmaḥ dhairyam roṣeṇa laṅghayan
jagrāha su mahā vegam aindram yudhi śarāsanam
śarān ca su mahā tejāḥ sūrya raśmi sama prabhān
tat upoḍham mahat yuddham anyonya vadha kāṅkṣiṇoḥ
paraspara abhimukhayoḥ dṛptayoḥ iva siṃhayoḥ

original: 6.094.013a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
samīyuḥ dvairatham draṣṭum rāvaṇa kṣaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
samutpetuḥ atha utpātāḥ dāruṇāḥ loma harṣaṇāḥ
rāvaṇasya vināśāya rāghavasya jayāya ca
vavarṣa rudhiram devaḥ rāvaṇasya ratha upari
vātāḥ maṇḍalinaḥ tīvrāḥ apasavyam pracakramuḥ
mahat gṛdhra kulam ca asya bhramamāṇam nabhastale

original: 6.094.016c yena yena ratho yāti tena tena pradhāvati
analyzed: yena yena rathaḥ yāti tena tena pradhāvati
saṃdhyayā ca āvṛtā laṅkā japā puṣpa nikāśayā
dṛśyate saṃpradītā iva divase pi vasuṃdharā
sa nirghātāḥ mahā ulkāḥ ca saṃpracetuḥ mahā svanāḥ
viṣādayantyaḥ rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇasya tadā āhitāḥ

original: 6.094.019a rāvaṇaś ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā

original: 6.094.019c rakṣasāṃ ca praharatāṃ gṛhītā iva bāhavaḥ
analyzed: rakṣasām ca praharatām gṛhītāḥ iva bāhavaḥ

original: 6.094.020a tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ
analyzed: tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūrya raśmayaḥ
dṛśyante rāvaṇasya aṅge parvatasya iva dhātavaḥ

original: 6.094.021a gṛdhrair anugatāś cāsya vamantyo jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
analyzed: gṛdhraiḥ anugatāḥ ca asya vamantyaḥ jvalanam mukhaiḥ

original: 6.094.021c praṇedur mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivaṃ śivāḥ
analyzed: praṇeduḥ mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivam śivāḥ

original: 6.094.022a pratikūlaṃ vavau vāyū raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran
analyzed: pratikūlam vavau vāyuḥ raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran
tasya rākṣasa rājasya kurvan dṛṣṭi vilopanam
nipetuḥ indra aśanayaḥ sainye ca asya samantataḥ
durviṣahya svanāḥ ghorāḥ vinā jaladhara svanam

original: 6.094.024a diśaś ca pradiśaḥ sarvā babhūvus timirāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ ca pradiśaḥ sarvāḥ babhūvuḥ timira āvṛtāḥ
pāṃsu varṣeṇa mahatā durdarśam ca nabhaḥ bhavat

original: 6.094.025a kurvantyaḥ kalahaṃ ghoraṃ sārikās tadrathaṃ prati
analyzed: kurvantyaḥ kalaham ghoram sārikāḥ tad ratham prati
nipetuḥ śataśas tatra dāruṇāḥ dāruṇa svanāḥ
jaghanebhyaḥ sphuliṅgān ca netrebhyaḥ śrūṇi saṃtatam

original: 6.094.026c mumucus tasya turagās tulyam agniṃ ca vāri ca
analyzed: mumucuḥ tasya turagāḥ tulyam agnim ca vāri ca
evam prakārāḥ bahavaḥ samutpātāḥ bhaya āvahāḥ
rāvaṇasya vināśāya dāruṇāḥ saṃprajajñire

original: 6.094.028a rāmasyāpi nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca
analyzed: rāmasya api nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca
babhūvuḥ jaya śaṃsīni prādurbhūtāni sarvaśas
tatas nirīkṣya ātma gatāni rāghavaḥ
raṇe nimittāni nimitta kovidaḥ

original: 6.094.029c jagāma harṣaṃ ca parāṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ;
analyzed: jagāma harṣam ca parām ca nirvṛtim
cakāra yuddhe bhyadhikam ca vikramam
tatas pravṛttam su krūram rāma rāvaṇayoḥ tadā
su mahat dvairatham yuddham sarva loka bhaya āvaham

original: 6.095.002a tato rākṣasasainyaṃ ca harīṇāṃ ca mahad balam
analyzed: tatas rākṣasa sainyam ca harīṇām ca mahat balam
pragṛhīta praharaṇam niśceṣṭam samatiṣṭhata
saṃprayuddhau tatas dṛṣṭvā balavat nara rākṣasau
vyākṣipta hṛdayāḥ sarve param vismayam āgatāḥ
nānā praharaṇaiḥ vyagraiḥ bhujaiḥ vismita buddhayaḥ

original: 6.095.004c tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmaṃ nābhijaghnuḥ parasparam
analyzed: tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmam na abhijaghnuḥ parasparam

original: 6.095.005a rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇaṃ cāpi vānarāṇāṃ ca rāghavam
analyzed: rakṣasām rāvaṇam ca api vānarāṇām ca rāghavam
paśyatām vismita akṣāṇām sainyam citram iva ābabhau

original: 6.095.006a tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghavarāvaṇau
analyzed: tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghava rāvaṇau
kṛta buddhī sthira amarṣau yuyudhāte abhīta vat

original: 6.095.007a jetavyam iti kākutstho martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: jetavyam iti kākutsthaḥ martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ
dhṛtau sva vīrya sarvasvam yuddhe darśayatām tadā

original: 6.095.008a tataḥ krodhād daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān
analyzed: tatas krodhāt daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān

original: 6.095.008c mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam
analyzed: mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam
te śarāḥ tam an āsādya puraṃdara ratha dhvajam
rakta śaktim parāmṛśya nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
tatas rāmaḥ abhisaṃkruddhaḥ cāpam āyamya vīryavān
kṛta pratikṛtam kartum manasā saṃpracakrame
rāvaṇa dhvajam uddiśya mumoca niśitam śaram
mahā sarpam iva asahyam jvalantam svena tejasā

original: 6.095.012a jagāma sa mahīṃ bhittvā daśagrīvadhvajaṃ śaraḥ
analyzed: jagāma sa mahīm bhittvā daśagrīva dhvajam śaraḥ
sa nikṛttaḥ patat bhūmau rāvaṇasya ratha dhvajaḥ
dhvajasya unmathanam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ su mahā balaḥ
krodha jena agninā saṃkhye pradīptaḥ iva ca abhavat

original: 6.095.014a sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahad vaman
analyzed: sa roṣa vaśam āpannaḥ śara varṣam mahat vaman

original: 6.095.014c rāmasya turagān divyāñ śarair vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya turagān divyām śaraiḥ vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ

original: 6.095.015a te viddhā harayas tasya nāskhalan nāpi babhramuḥ
analyzed: te viddhāḥ harayaḥ tasya na askhalan na api babhramuḥ
babhūvuḥ svastha hṛdayāḥ padma nālaiḥ iva āhatāḥ

original: 6.095.016a teṣām asaṃbhramaṃ dṛṣṭvā vājināṃ rāvaṇas tadā
analyzed: teṣām asaṃbhramam dṛṣṭvā vājinām rāvaṇaḥ tadā

original: 6.095.016c bhūya eva susaṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
analyzed: bhūyas eva su saṃkruddhaḥ śara varṣam mumoca ha

original: 6.095.017a gadāś ca parighāṃś caiva cakrāṇi musalāni ca
analyzed: gadāḥ ca parighān ca eva cakrāṇi musalāni ca
giri śṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣān ca tathā śūla paraśvadhān

original: 6.095.018a māyā vihitam etat tu śastravarṣam apātayat
analyzed: māyā vihitam etat tu śastra varṣam apātayat
sahasraśas tatas bāṇān aśrānta hṛdaya udyamaḥ
tumulam trāsa jananam bhīmam bhīma pratisvanam
durdharṣam abhavat yuddhe na eka śastra mayam mahat
vimucya rāghava ratham samantāt vānare bale
sāyakaiḥ antarikṣam ca cakāra āśu nirantaram
mumoca ca daśagrīvaḥ niḥsaṅgena antarātmanā

original: 6.095.021a vyāyacchamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatparaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: vyāyacchamānam tam dṛṣṭvā tad param rāvaṇam raṇe

original: 6.095.021c prahasann iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe sāyakāñ śitān
analyzed: prahasan iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe śitān

original: 6.095.022a sa mumoca tato bāṇān raṇe śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: sa mumoca tatas bāṇān raṇe śata sahasraśas

original: 6.095.022c tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaś cakre svaśaraiḥ khaṃ nirantaram
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ cakre sva śaraiḥ kham nirantaram
tatas tābhyām prayuktena śara varṣeṇa bhāsvatā
śara baddham iva ābhāti dvitīyam bhāsvat ambaram
na animittaḥ bhavat bāṇaḥ na ati bhettā na niṣphalaḥ
tathā visṛjatoḥ bāṇān rāma rāvaṇayoḥ mṛdhe
prāyudhyetām avicchinnam asyantau savya dakṣiṇam

original: 6.095.025c cakratus tau śaraughais tu nirucchvāsam ivāmbaram
analyzed: cakratuḥ tau śara oghaiḥ tu nirucchvāsam iva ambaram

original: 6.095.026a rāvaṇasya hayān rāmo hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya hayān rāmaḥ hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ
jaghnatuḥ tau tadā anyonyam kṛta anukṛta kāriṇau

original: 6.096.001a tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāmarāvaṇau
analyzed: tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāma rāvaṇau
dadṛśuḥ sarva bhūtāni vismitena antarātmanā

original: 6.096.002a ardayantau tu samare tayos tau syandanottamau
analyzed: ardayantau tu samare tayoḥ tau syandana uttamau
paraspara vadhe yuktau ghora rūpau babhūvatuḥ

original: 6.096.003a maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gatapratyāgatāni ca
analyzed: maṇḍalāni ca vīthīḥ ca gata pratyāgatāni ca
darśayantau bahuvidhām sūtau sārathya jām gatim

original: 6.096.004a ardayan rāvaṇaṃ rāmo rāghavaṃ cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: ardayan rāvaṇam rāmaḥ rāghavam ca api rāvaṇaḥ
gati vegam samāpannau pravartana nivartane
kṣipatoḥ śara jālāni tayoḥ tau syandana uttamau
ceratuḥ saṃyuga mahīm sa āsārau jaladau iva

original: 6.096.006a darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatiṃ bahuvidhāṃ raṇe
analyzed: darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatim bahuvidhām raṇe
parasparasya abhimukhau punar eva ca tasthatuḥ

original: 6.096.007a dhuraṃ dhureṇa rathayor vaktraṃ vaktreṇa vājinām
analyzed: dhuram dhureṇa rathayoḥ vaktram vaktreṇa vājinām

original: 6.096.007c patākāś ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayos tadā
analyzed: patākāḥ ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayoḥ tadā

original: 6.096.008a rāvaṇasya tato rāmo dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya tatas rāmaḥ dhanuḥ muktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
caturbhiḥ caturaḥ dīptān hayān pratyapasarpayat
sa krodha vaśam āpannaḥ hayānām apasarpaṇe
mumoca niśitān bāṇān rāghavāya niśācaraḥ
saḥ tividdhaḥ balavatā daśagrīveṇa rāghavaḥ

original: 6.096.010c jagāma na vikāraṃ ca na cāpi vyathito 'bhavat
analyzed: jagāma na vikāram ca na ca api vyathitaḥ bhavat
cikṣepa ca punar bāṇān vajra pāta sama svanān
sārathim vajrahastasya samuddiśya niśācaraḥ

original: 6.096.012a mātales tu mahāvegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: mātaleḥ tu mahā vegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ

original: 6.096.012c na sūkṣmam api saṃmohaṃ vyathāṃ vā pradadur yudhi
analyzed: na sūkṣmam api saṃmoham vyathām vā pradaduḥ yudhi

original: 6.096.013a tayā dharṣaṇayā kroddho mātaler na tathātmanaḥ
analyzed: tayā dharṣaṇayā mātaleḥ na tathā ātmanaḥ
cakāra śara jālena rāghavaḥ vimukham ripum
viṃśatim triṃśatam ṣaṣṭim sahasraśas

original: 6.096.014c mumoca rāghavo vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ
analyzed: mumoca rāghavaḥ vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ

original: 6.096.015a gadānāṃ musalānāṃ ca parighāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
analyzed: gadānām musalānām ca parighāṇām ca nisvanaiḥ
śarāṇām puṅkha vātaiḥ ca kṣubhitāḥ sapta sāgarāḥ
kṣubdhānām sāgarāṇām ca pātāla tala vāsinaḥ

original: 6.096.016c vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāḥ ca sahasraśas
cakampe medinī kṛtsnā sa śaila vana kānanā

original: 6.096.017c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cābhūn na vavau cāpi mārutaḥ
analyzed: bhāskaraḥ niṣprabhaḥ ca abhūt na vavau ca api mārutaḥ

original: 6.096.018a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
cintām āpedire sarve sa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ
svasti go brāhmaṇebhyaḥ stu lokāḥ tiṣṭhantu śāśvatāḥ
jayatām rāghavaḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇam rākṣaseśvaram
tatas kruddhaḥ mahā bāhuḥ raghūṇām kīrti vardhanaḥ
saṃdhāya dhanuṣā rāmaḥ kṣuram āśīviṣa upamam
rāvaṇasya śiraḥ chindat śrīmat jvalita kuṇḍalam

original: 6.096.021a tac chiraḥ patitaṃ bhūmau dṛṣṭaṃ lokais tribhis tadā
analyzed: tat śiraḥ patitam bhūmau dṛṣṭam lokaiḥ tribhiḥ tadā
tasya eva sadṛśam ca anyat rāvaṇasya utthitam śiraḥ
tat kṣipram kṣipra hastena rāmeṇa kṣipra kāriṇā
dvitīyam rāvaṇa śiraḥ chinnam saṃyati sāyakaiḥ

original: 6.096.023a chinnamātraṃ ca tac chīrṣaṃ punar anyat sma dṛśyate
analyzed: chinna mātram ca tat śīrṣam punar anyat sma dṛśyate

original: 6.096.023c tad apy aśanisaṃkāśaiś chinnaṃ rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: tat api aśani saṃkāśaiḥ chinnam rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ

original: 6.096.024a evam eva śataṃ chinnaṃ śirasāṃ tulyavarcasām
analyzed: evam eva śatam chinnam śirasām tulya varcasām
na ca eva rāvaṇasya antaḥ dṛśyate jīvita kṣaye
tatas sarva astra vid vīraḥ kausalyā nandivardhanaḥ

original: 6.096.025c mārgaṇair bahubhir yuktaś cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: mārgaṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ yuktaḥ cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ

original: 6.096.026a mārīco nihato yais tu kharo yais tu sudūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: mārīcaḥ nihataḥ yaiḥ tu kharaḥ yaiḥ tu su dūṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.096.026c krañcāraṇye virādhas tu kabandho daṇḍakā vane
analyzed: krañcāraṇye virādhaḥ tu kabandhaḥ daṇḍakāḥ vane

original: 6.096.027a ta ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikā mama
analyzed: te ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikāḥ mama

original: 6.096.027c kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāvaṇe mandatejasaḥ
analyzed: kim nu tat kāraṇam yena rāvaṇe manda tejasaḥ

original: 6.096.028a iti cintāparaś cāsīd apramattaś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: iti cintā paraḥ ca āsīt apramattaḥ ca saṃyuge
vavarṣa śara varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ rāvaṇa urasi
rāvaṇaḥ pi tatas kruddhaḥ ratha sthaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
gadā musala varṣeṇa rāmam pratyardayat raṇe
deva dānava yakṣāṇām piśāca uraga rakṣasām

original: 6.096.030c paśyatāṃ tan mahad yuddhaṃ sarvarātram avartata
analyzed: paśyatām tat mahat yuddham sarva rātram avartata

original: 6.096.031a naiva ratriṃ na divasaṃ na muhūrtaṃ na cakṣaṇam
analyzed: na eva ratrim na divasam na muhūrtam na cakṣaṇam
rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham virāmam upagacchati

original: 6.097.001a atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavaṃ mātalis tadā
analyzed: atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavam mātaliḥ tadā

original: 6.097.001c ajānann iva kiṃ vīra tvam enam anuvartase
analyzed: a jānan iva kim vīra tvam enam anuvartase

original: 6.097.002a visṛjāsmai vadhāya tvam astraṃ paitāmahaṃ prabho
analyzed: visṛja asmai vadhāya tvam astram paitāmaham prabho

original: 6.097.002c vināśakālaḥ kathito yaḥ suraiḥ so 'dya vartate
analyzed: vināśa kālaḥ kathitaḥ yaḥ suraiḥ vartate

original: 6.097.003a tataḥ saṃsmārito rāmas tena vākyena mātaleḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃsmāritaḥ rāmaḥ tena vākyena mātaleḥ

original: 6.097.003c jagrāha sa śaraṃ dīptaṃ niśvasantam ivoragam
analyzed: jagrāha sa śaram dīptam niśvasantam iva uragam

original: 6.097.004a yam asmai prathamaṃ prādād agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: yam asmai prathamam prādāt agastyaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 6.097.004c brahmadattaṃ mahad bāṇam amoghaṃ yudhi vīryavān
analyzed: brahmadattam mahat bāṇam amogham yudhi vīryavān
brahmaṇā nirmitam pūrvam indra artham amita ojasā
dattam surapateḥ pūrvam triloka jaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
yasya vājeṣu pavanaḥ phale pāvaka bhāskarau
śarīram ākāśa mayam gaurave meru mandarau
jājvalyamānam vapuṣā su puṅkham hema bhūṣitam
tejasā sarva bhūtānām kṛtam bhāskara varcasam

original: 6.097.008a sadhūmam iva kālāgniṃ dīptam āśīviṣaṃ yathā
analyzed: sa dhūmam iva kālāgnim dīptam āśīviṣam yathā
ratha nāga aśva vṛndānām bhedanam kṣiprakāriṇam

original: 6.097.009a dvārāṇāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca girīṇām api bhedanam
analyzed: dvārāṇām parighāṇām ca girīṇām api bhedanam
nānā rudhira sikta aṅgam medaḥ digdham su dāruṇam
vajra sāram mahā nādam nānā samiti dāruṇam
sarva vitrāsanam bhīmam śvasantam iva pannagam
kaṅka gṛdhra balānām ca gomāyu gaṇa rakṣasām
nityam bhakṣa pradam yuddhe yama rūpam bhaya āvaham
nandanam vānara indrāṇām rakṣasām avasādanam
vājitam vividhaiḥ vājaiḥ cāru citraiḥ garutmataḥ
tam uttama iṣum lokānām ikṣvāku bhaya nāśanam
dviṣatām kīrti haraṇam praharṣa karam ātmanaḥ

original: 6.097.014a abhimantrya tato rāmas taṃ maheṣuṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: abhimantrya tatas rāmaḥ tam mahā iṣum mahā balaḥ
veda proktena vidhinā saṃdadhe kārmuke balī

original: 6.097.015a sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
analyzed: sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddhaḥ bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam

original: 6.097.015c cikṣepa param āyattas taṃ śaraṃ marmaghātinam
analyzed: cikṣepa param āyattaḥ tam śaram marma ghātinam
sa vajraḥ iva durdharṣaḥ vajra bāhu visarjitaḥ
kṛtāntaḥ iva ca a vāryaḥ nyapatat rāvaṇa urasi
sa visṛṣṭaḥ mahā vegaḥ śarīra anta karaḥ śaraḥ
bibheda hṛdayam tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
rudhira aktaḥ sa vegena jīvitānta karaḥ śaraḥ
rāvaṇasya haran prāṇān viveśa dharaṇī talam
sa śaraḥ rāvaṇam hatvā rudhira ārdra kṛta chaviḥ
kṛta karmā nibhṛta vat sva tūṇīm punar āviśat

original: 6.097.020a tasya hastād dhatasyāśu kārmukaṃ tat sasāyakam
analyzed: tasya hastāt hatasya āśu kārmukam tat sa sāyakam
nipapāta saha prāṇaiḥ bhraśyamānasya jīvitāt
gatāsuḥ bhīma vegaḥ tu nairṛta indraḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 6.097.021c papāta syandanād bhūmau vṛtro vajrahato yathā
analyzed: papāta syandanāt bhūmau vṛtraḥ vajra hataḥ yathā

original: 6.097.022a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā patitam bhūmau hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
hata nāthāḥ bhaya trastāḥ sarvatas saṃpradudruvuḥ
nardantaḥ ca abhipetuḥ tān vānarāḥ druma yodhinaḥ
daśagrīva vadham dṛṣṭvā vijayam rāghavasya ca

original: 6.097.024a arditā vānarair hṛṣṭair laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt
analyzed: arditāḥ vānaraiḥ hṛṣṭaiḥ laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt
hata āśraya tvāt karuṇaiḥ bāṣpa prasravaṇaiḥ mukhaiḥ
tatas vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vānarāḥ jita kāśinaḥ

original: 6.097.025c vadanto rāghavajayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca taṃ vadham
analyzed: vadantaḥ rāghava jayam rāvaṇasya ca tam vadham
atha antarikṣe vyanadat saumyaḥ tridaśa dundubhiḥ
divya gandha vahaḥ tatra mārutaḥ su sukhaḥ vavau
nipapāta antarikṣāt ca puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ tadā bhuvi
kirantī rāghava ratham duravāpāḥ manoharāḥ

original: 6.097.028a rāghavas tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve

original: 6.097.028c sādhu sādhv iti vāg agryā devatānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti vāc agryā devatānām mahātmanām

original: 6.097.029a āviveśa mahān harṣo devānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: āviveśa mahān harṣaḥ devānām cāraṇaiḥ saha
rāvaṇe nihate raudre sarva loka bhayaṃkare

original: 6.097.030a tataḥ sakāmaṃ sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: tatas sa kāmam sugrīvam aṅgadam ca mahā balam
cakāra rāghavaḥ prītaḥ hatvā rākṣasa puṃgavam
tatas prajagmuḥ praśamam marut gaṇā
diśaḥ praseduḥ vimalam nabhaḥ bhavat

original: 6.097.031c mahī cakampe na ca mārutā vavuḥ;
analyzed: mahī cakampe na ca mārutāḥ vavuḥ
sthira prabhaḥ ca api abhavat divākaraḥ
tatas tu sugrīva vibhīṣaṇa ādayaḥ
suhṛd viśeṣāḥ sahalakṣmaṇāḥ tadā
sametya hṛṣṭāḥ vijayena rāghavam
raṇe bhirāmam vidhinā abhyapūjayan
sa tu nihata ripuḥ sthira pratijñaḥ
sva jana bala abhivṛtaḥ raṇe rarāja
raghu kula nṛpa nandanaḥ
tridaśa gaṇaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ yathā indraḥ
rāvaṇam nihatam śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
antaḥpurāt viniṣpetuḥ rākṣasyaḥ śoka karśitāḥ
vāryamāṇāḥ su bahuśas vṛṣṭantyaḥ kṣiti pāṃsuṣu
vimukta keśyaḥ duḥkha ārtāḥ gāvaḥ vatsa hatāḥ yathā
uttareṇa viniṣkramya dvāreṇa saha rākṣasaiḥ
praviśya āyodhanam ghoram vicinvantyaḥ hatam patim

original: 6.098.004a āryaputreti vādinyo hā nātheti ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: ārya putra iti vādinyaḥ hā nātha iti ca sarvaśas
paripetuḥ kabandha aṅkām mahīm śoṇita kardamām
tāḥ bāṣpa paripūrṇa akṣyaḥ bhartṛ śoka parājitāḥ
kareṇvaḥ iva nardantyaḥ vineduḥ hata yūthapāḥ
dadṛśuḥ tāḥ mahā kāyam mahā vīryam mahā dyutim
rāvaṇam nihatam bhūmau nīlāñjana caya upamam

original: 6.098.007a tāḥ patiṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu
analyzed: tāḥ patim sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānam raṇa pāṃsuṣu

original: 6.098.007c nipetus tasya gātreṣu chinnā vanalatā iva
analyzed: nipetuḥ tasya gātreṣu chinnāḥ vana latāḥ iva

original: 6.098.008a bahumānāt pariṣvajya kā cid enaṃ ruroda ha
analyzed: bahu mānāt pariṣvajya kā cit enam ruroda ha

original: 6.098.008c caraṇau kā cid āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe 'valambya ca
analyzed: caraṇau kā cit āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe valambya ca

original: 6.098.009a uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cid bhūmau sma parivartate
analyzed: uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cit bhūmau sma parivartate

original: 6.098.009c hatasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā cin moham upāgamat
analyzed: hatasya vadanam dṛṣṭvā kā cit moham upāgamat

original: 6.098.010a kā cid aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī
analyzed: kā cit aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī

original: 6.098.010c snāpayantī mukhaṃ bāṣpais tuṣārair iva paṅkajam
analyzed: snāpayantī mukham bāṣpaiḥ tuṣāraiḥ iva paṅkajam

original: 6.098.011a evam ārtāḥ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhuvi
analyzed: evam ārtāḥ patim dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam nihatam bhuvi

original: 6.098.011c cukruśur bahudhā śokād bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan
analyzed: cukruśuḥ bahudhā śokāt bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan

original: 6.098.012a yena vitrāsitaḥ śakro yena vitrāsito yamaḥ
analyzed: yena vitrāsitaḥ śakraḥ yena vitrāsitaḥ yamaḥ
yena vaiśravaṇaḥ rājā puṣpakeṇa viyojitaḥ

original: 6.098.013a gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
analyzed: gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇām ca surāṇām ca mahātmanām

original: 6.098.013c bhayaṃ yena mahad dattaṃ so 'yaṃ śete raṇe hataḥ
analyzed: bhayam yena mahat dattam saḥ yam śete raṇe hataḥ

original: 6.098.014a asurebhyaḥ surebhyo vā pannagebhyo 'pi vā tathā
analyzed: asurebhyaḥ surebhyaḥ vā pannagebhyaḥ vā tathā

original: 6.098.014c na bhayaṃ yo vijānāti tasyedaṃ mānuṣād bhayam
analyzed: na bhayam yaḥ vijānāti tasya idam mānuṣāt bhayam
avadhyaḥ devatānām yaḥ tathā dānava rakṣasām

original: 6.098.015c hataḥ so 'yaṃ raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā
analyzed: hataḥ saḥ yam raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā

original: 6.098.016a yo na śakyaḥ surair hantuṃ na yakṣair nāsurais tathā
analyzed: yaḥ na śakyaḥ suraiḥ hantum na yakṣaiḥ na asuraiḥ tathā

original: 6.098.016c so 'yaṃ kaś cid ivāsattvo mṛtyuṃ martyena lambhitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam kaḥ cit iva asattvaḥ mṛtyum martyena lambhitaḥ

original: 6.098.017a evaṃ vadantyo bahudhā rurudus tasya tāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: evam vadantyaḥ bahudhā ruruduḥ tasya tāḥ striyaḥ

original: 6.098.017c bhūya eva ca duḥkhārtā vilepuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas eva ca duḥkha ārtāḥ vilepuḥ ca punar punar
a śṛṇvatā tu suhṛdām satatam hita vādinām

original: 6.098.018c etāḥ samam idānīṃ te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ samam idānīm te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ

original: 6.098.019a bruvāṇo 'pi hitaṃ vākyam iṣṭo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: bruvāṇaḥ pi hitam vākyam iṣṭaḥ bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
dhṛṣṭam paruṣitaḥ mohāt tvayā ātma vadha kāṅkṣiṇā

original: 6.098.020a yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī
analyzed: yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī

original: 6.098.020c na naḥ syād vyasanaṃ ghoram idaṃ mūlaharaṃ mahat
analyzed: na naḥ syāt vyasanam ghoram idam mūla haram mahat

original: 6.098.021a vṛttakāmo bhaved bhrātā rāmo mitrakulaṃ bhavet
analyzed: vṛtta kāmaḥ bhavet bhrātā rāmaḥ mitra kulam bhavet

original: 6.098.021c vayaṃ cāvidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sakāmā na ca śatravaḥ
analyzed: vayam ca avidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sa kāmāḥ na ca śatravaḥ

original: 6.098.022a tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītāṃ saṃrundhatā balāt
analyzed: tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītām saṃrundhatā balāt

original: 6.098.022c rākṣasā vayam ātmā ca trayaṃ tulaṃ nipātitam
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ vayam ātmā ca trayam tulam nipātitam

original: 6.098.023a na kāmakāraḥ kāmaṃ vā tava rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: na kāma kāraḥ kāmam vā tava rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 6.098.023c daivaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hataṃ daivena hanyate
analyzed: daivam ceṣṭayate sarvam hatam daivena hanyate

original: 6.098.024a vānarāṇāṃ vināśo 'yaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca te raṇe
analyzed: vānarāṇām vināśaḥ yam rākṣasānām ca te raṇe
tava ca eva mahā bāho daiva yogāt upāgataḥ

original: 6.098.025a naivārthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na cājñayā
analyzed: na eva arthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na ca ājñayā
śakyā daiva gatiḥ loke nivartayitum udyatā
vilepuḥ evam dīnāḥ tāḥ rākṣasa adhipa yoṣitaḥ
kuraryaḥ iva duḥkha ārtāḥ bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇāḥ
tāsām vilapamānānām tathā rākṣasa yoṣitām

original: 6.099.001c jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāram samudaikṣata
daśagrīvam hatam dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇa acintya karmaṇā
patim mandodarī tatra kṛpaṇā paryadevayat
nanu nāma mahā bāho tava vaiśravaṇānuja

original: 6.099.003c kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ trasyaty api puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: kruddhasya pramukhe sthātum trasyati api puraṃdaraḥ

original: 6.099.004a ṛṣayaś ca mahīdevā gandharvāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca mahī devāḥ gandharvāḥ ca yaśasvinaḥ

original: 6.099.004c nanu nāma tavodvegāc cāraṇāś ca diśo gatāḥ
analyzed: nanu nāma tava udvegāt cāraṇāḥ ca diśaḥ gatāḥ

original: 6.099.005a sa tvaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam mānuṣa mātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ

original: 6.099.005c na vyapatrapase rājan kim idaṃ rākṣasarṣabha
analyzed: na vyapatrapase rājan kim idam rākṣasa ṛṣabha

original: 6.099.006a kathaṃ trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa cānvitam
analyzed: katham trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa ca anvitam
aviṣahyam jaghāna tvam mānuṣaḥ vana gocaraḥ
mānuṣāṇām aviṣaye carataḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
vināśaḥ tava rāmeṇa saṃyuge na upapadyate

original: 6.099.008a na caitat karma rāmasya śraddadhāmi camūmukhe
analyzed: na ca etat karma rāmasya śraddadhāmi camū mukhe
sarvatas samupetasya tava tena abhimarśanam

original: 6.099.009a indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvaṇaṃ tvayā
analyzed: indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitam tribhuvaṇam tvayā

original: 6.099.009c smaradbhir iva tad vairam indriyair eva nirjitaḥ
analyzed: smaradbhiḥ iva tat vairam indriyaiḥ eva nirjitaḥ

original: 6.099.010a atha vā rāmarūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ
analyzed: atha vā rāma rūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ
māyām tava vināśāya vidhāya apratitarkitām

original: 6.099.011a yadaiva hi janasthāne rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yadā eva hi janasthāne rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.099.011c kharas tava hato bhrātā tadaivāsau na mānuṣaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ tava hataḥ bhrātā tadā eva asau na mānuṣaḥ

original: 6.099.012a yadaiva nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ duṣpraveṣāṃ surair api
analyzed: yadā eva nagarīm laṅkām duṣpraveṣām suraiḥ api

original: 6.099.012c praviṣṭo hanumān vīryāt tadaiva vyathitā vayam
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ hanumān vīryāt tadā eva vyathitāḥ vayam

original: 6.099.013a kriyatām avirodhaś ca rāghaveṇeti yan mayā
analyzed: kriyatām avirodhaḥ ca rāghaveṇa iti yat mayā

original: 6.099.013c ucyamāno na gṛhṇāsi tasyeyaṃ vyuṣṭir āgatā
analyzed: ucyamānaḥ na gṛhṇāsi tasya iyam vyuṣṭiḥ āgatā
akasmāt ca abhikāmaḥ si sītām rākṣasa puṃgava
aiśvaryasya vināśāya dehasya sva janasya ca

original: 6.099.015a arundhatyā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ rohiṇyāś cāpi durmate
analyzed: arundhatyāḥ viśiṣṭām tām rohiṇyāḥ ca api durmate

original: 6.099.015c sītāṃ dharṣayatā mānyāṃ tvayā hy asadṛśaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: sītām dharṣayatā mā anyām tvayā hi a sadṛśam kṛtam

original: 6.099.016a na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī
analyzed: na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī

original: 6.099.016c mayādhikā vā tulyā vā tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
analyzed: mayā adhikā vā tulyā vā tvam tu mohāt na budhyase
sarvathā sarva bhūtānām na asti mṛtyuḥ alakṣaṇaḥ
tava tāvat ayam mṛtyuḥ maithilī kṛta lakṣaṇaḥ
maithilī saha rāmeṇa viśokā vihariṣyati

original: 6.099.018c alpapuṇyā tv ahaṃ ghore patitā śokasāgare
analyzed: alpa puṇyā tu aham ghore patitā śoka sāgare

original: 6.099.019a kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane
analyzed: kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane
deva udyāneṣu sarveṣu vihṛtya sahitā tvayā
vimānena anurūpeṇa yā yāmi atulayā śriyā

original: 6.099.020c paśyantī vividhān deśāṃs tāṃs tāṃś citrasragambarā
analyzed: paśyantī vividhān deśān tān tān citra sraj ambarā
bhraṃśitā kāma bhogebhyaḥ sā asmi vīra vadhāt tava

original: 6.099.021a satyavāk sa mahābhāgo devaro me yad abravīt
analyzed: satya vāc sa mahābhāgaḥ devaraḥ me yat abravīt
ayam rākṣasa mukhyānām vināśaḥ paryupasthitaḥ
kāma krodha samutthena vyasanena prasaṅginā

original: 6.099.022c tvayā kṛtam idaṃ sarvam anāthaṃ rakṣasāṃ kulam
analyzed: tvayā kṛtam idam sarvam anātham rakṣasām kulam

original: 6.099.023a na hi tvaṃ śocitavyo me prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ
analyzed: na hi tvam śocitavyaḥ me prakhyāta bala pauruṣaḥ

original: 6.099.023c strīsvabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate
analyzed: strī svabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate

original: 6.099.024a sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvaṃ gṛhītvā svāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam ca tvam gṛhītvā svām gatim gataḥ
ātmānam anuśocāmi tvad viyogena duḥkhitām
sarva gātrāṇi vikṣipya kim śeṣe rudhira āplutaḥ

original: 6.099.025e prasupta iva śokārtāṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
analyzed: prasuptaḥ iva śoka ārtām kim mām na pratibhāṣase
mahā vīryasya dakṣasya saṃyugeṣu apalāyinaḥ

original: 6.099.026c yātudhānasya dauhitrīṃ kiṃ tvaṃ māṃ nābhyudīkṣase
analyzed: yātudhānasya dauhitrīm kim tvam mām na abhyudīkṣase
yena sūdayase śatrūn samare sūrya varcasā
vajraḥ vajradharasya iva saḥ yam te satata arcitaḥ
raṇe śatru praharaṇaḥ hema jāla pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: 6.099.028c parigho vyavakīrṇas te bāṇaiś chinnaḥ sahasradhā
analyzed: parighaḥ vyavakīrṇaḥ te bāṇaiḥ chinnaḥ sahasradhā

original: 6.099.029a dhig astu hṛdayaṃ yasyā mamedaṃ na sahasradhā
analyzed: dhik astu hṛdayam yasyāḥ mama idam na sahasradhā
tvayi pañcatvam āpanne phalate śoka pīḍitam

original: 6.099.030a etasminn antare rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
analyzed: etasmin antare rāmaḥ vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha

original: 6.099.030c saṃskāraḥ kriyatāṃ bhrātuḥ striyaś caitā nivartaya
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ kriyatām bhrātuḥ striyaḥ ca etāḥ nivartaya

original: 6.099.031a taṃ praśritas tato rāmaṃ śrutavākyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam praśritaḥ tatas rāmam śruta vākyaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
vimṛśya buddhyā dharma jñaḥ dharma artha sahitam vacaḥ
rāmasya eva anuvṛtti artham uttaram pratyabhāṣata
tyakta dharma vratam krūram nṛśaṃsam anṛtam tathā
na aham arhaḥ smi saṃskartum para dāra abhimarśakam

original: 6.099.033a bhrātṛrūpo hi me śatrur eṣa sarvāhite rataḥ
analyzed: bhrātṛ rūpaḥ hi me śatruḥ eṣa sarva ahite rataḥ
rāvaṇaḥ na arhate pūjām guru gauravāt

original: 6.099.034a nṛśaṃsa iti māṃ rāma vakṣyanti manujā bhuvi
analyzed: nṛśaṃsaḥ iti mām rāma vakṣyanti manujāḥ bhuvi

original: 6.099.034c śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtam punar

original: 6.099.035a tac chrutvā paramaprīto rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā parama prītaḥ rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām varaḥ
vibhīṣaṇam uvāca idam vākya jñaḥ vākya kovidam

original: 6.099.036a tavāpi me priyaṃ kāryaṃ tvatprabhavāc ca me jitam
analyzed: tava api me priyam kāryam tvad prabhavāt ca me jitam

original: 6.099.036c avaśyaṃ tu kṣamaṃ vācyo mayā tvaṃ rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: avaśyam tu kṣamam vācyaḥ mayā tvam rākṣasa īśvara
adharma anṛta saṃyuktaḥ kāmam eṣa niśācaraḥ

original: 6.099.037c tejasvī balavāñ śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśaḥ
analyzed: tejasvī balavān śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśas
śatakratu mukhaiḥ devaiḥ śrūyate na parājitaḥ
maraṇa antāni vairāṇi nirvṛttam naḥ prayojanam

original: 6.099.039c kriyatām asya saṃskāro mamāpy eṣa yathā tava
analyzed: kriyatām asya saṃskāraḥ mama api eṣa yathā tava
tvad sakāśāt mahā bāho saṃskāram vidhi pūrvakam

original: 6.099.040c kṣipram arhati dharmajña tvaṃ yaśobhāg bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: kṣipram arhati dharma jña tvam yaśaḥ bhāj bhaviṣyasi
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tvaramāṇaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
saṃskāreṇa anurūpeṇa yojayām āsa rāvaṇam

original: 6.099.042a sa dadau pāvakaṃ tasya vidhiyuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa dadau pāvakam tasya vidhi yuktam vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.099.042c tāḥ striyo 'nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ striyaḥ nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punar punar
praviṣṭāsu ca sarvāsu rākṣasīṣu vibhīṣaṇaḥ
rāma pārśvam upāgamya tadā atiṣṭhat vinīta vat
rāmaḥ u pi saha sainyena sa sugrīvaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.099.044c harṣaṃ lebhe ripuṃ hatvā yathā vṛtraṃ śatakratuḥ
analyzed: harṣam lebhe ripum hatvā yathā vṛtram śatakratuḥ
te rāvaṇa vadham dṛṣṭvā deva gandharva dānavāḥ

original: 6.100.001c jagmus tais tair vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: jagmuḥ taiḥ taiḥ vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ
rāvaṇasya vadham ghoram rāghavasya parākramam

original: 6.100.002c suyuddhaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sugrīvasay ca mantritam
analyzed: su yuddham vānarāṇām ca ca mantritam

original: 6.100.003a anurāgaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saumitrer lakṣmaṇasya ca
analyzed: anurāgam ca vīryam ca saumitreḥ lakṣmaṇasya ca
kathayantaḥ mahābhāgāḥ jagmuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ yathāgatam

original: 6.100.004a rāghavas tu rathaṃ divyam indradattaṃ śikhiprabham
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tu ratham divyam indra dattam śikhi prabham
anujñāya mahābhāgaḥ mātalim pratyapūjayat
rāghaveṇa abhyanujñātaḥ mātaliḥ śakra sārathiḥ

original: 6.100.005c divyaṃ taṃ ratham āsthāya divam evāruroha saḥ
analyzed: divyam tam ratham āsthāya divam eva āruroha saḥ
tasmin tu divam ārūḍhe sura sārathi sattame
rāghavaḥ parama prītaḥ sugrīvam pariṣasvaje
pariṣvajya ca sugrīvam lakṣmaṇena abhivāditaḥ
pūjyamānaḥ hari śreṣṭhaiḥ ājagāma bala ālayam
abravīt ca tadā rāmaḥ samīpa parivartinam
saumitrim sattva saṃpannam lakṣmaṇam dīpta tejasam
vibhīṣaṇam imam saumya laṅkāyām abhiṣecaya

original: 6.100.009c anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca mama caivopakāriṇam
analyzed: anuraktam ca bhaktam ca mama ca eva upakāriṇam

original: 6.100.010a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yad imaṃ rāvaṇānujam
analyzed: eṣa me paramaḥ kāmaḥ yat imam rāvaṇa anujam
laṅkāyām saumya paśyeyam abhiṣiktam vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.100.011a evam uktas tu saumitrī rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu saumitriḥ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 6.100.011c tathety uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇaṃ ghaṭam ādade
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇam ghaṭam ādade
ghaṭena tena saumitriḥ abhyaṣiñcat vibhīṣaṇam
laṅkāyām rakṣasām madhye rājānam rāma śāsanāt
abhyaṣiñcat sa dharma ātmā śuddha ātmānam vibhīṣaṇam

original: 6.100.013c tasyāmātyā jahṛṣire bhaktā ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tasya amātyāḥ jahṛṣire bhaktāḥ ye ca asya rākṣasāḥ
dṛṣṭvā abhiṣiktam laṅkāyām rākṣasa indram vibhīṣaṇam
rāghavaḥ paramām prītim jagāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 6.100.015a sa tad rājyaṃ mahat prāpya rāmadattaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tat rājyam mahat prāpya rāma dattam vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.100.015c prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tato rāmam upāgamat
analyzed: prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tatas rāmam upāgamat

original: 6.100.016a akṣatān modakāṃl lājān divyāḥ sumanasas tathā
analyzed: akṣatān modakān lājān divyāḥ sumanasaḥ tathā

original: 6.100.016c ājahrur atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurās tasmai niśācarāḥ
analyzed: ājahruḥ atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurāḥ tasmai niśācarāḥ

original: 6.100.017a sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣo rāghavāya nyavedayat
analyzed: sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣaḥ rāghavāya nyavedayat

original: 6.100.017c maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
analyzed: maṅgalyam maṅgalam sarvam lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
kṛta kāryam samṛddha artham dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ vibhīṣaṇam
pratijagrāha tat sarvam tasya eva priya kāmyayā

original: 6.100.019a tataḥ śailopamaṃ vīraṃ prāñjaliṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam
analyzed: tatas śaila upamam vīram prāñjalim pārśvatas sthitam
abravīt rāghavaḥ vākyam hanūmantam plavaṃgamam
anumānya mahā rājam imam saumya vibhīṣaṇam
praviśya rāvaṇa gṛham vinayena upasṛtya ca
vaidehyāḥ mām kuśalinam sa sugrīvam sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.100.021c ācakṣva jayatāṃ śreṣṭha rāvaṇaṃ ca mayā hatam
analyzed: ācakṣva jayatām śreṣṭha rāvaṇam ca mayā hatam

original: 6.100.022a priyam etad udāhṛtya maithilyās tvaṃ harīśvara
analyzed: priyam etat udāhṛtya maithilyāḥ tvam hari īśvara
pratigṛhya ca saṃdeśam upāvartitum arhasi
iti pratisamādiṣṭaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
praviveśa purīm laṅkām pūjyamānaḥ niśācaraiḥ
praviśya tu mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇasya niveśanam

original: 6.101.002c dadarśa śaśinā hīnāṃ sātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm
analyzed: dadarśa śaśinā hīnām sa ātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm
nibhṛtaḥ praṇataḥ prahvaḥ saḥ abhigamya abhivādya ca
rāmasya vacanam sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame
vaidehi kuśalī rāmaḥ sa sugrīvaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
kuśalam ca āha siddhārthaḥ hata śatruḥ ariṃdamaḥ
vibhīṣaṇa sahāyena rāmeṇa haribhiḥ saha

original: 6.101.005c nihato rāvaṇo devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca
analyzed: nihataḥ rāvaṇaḥ devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca

original: 6.101.006a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rāmo vīras tvāṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalam rāmaḥ vīraḥ tvām raghunandanaḥ
abravīt parama prītaḥ kṛtārthena antarātmanā

original: 6.101.007a priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvāṃ tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye
analyzed: priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvām tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye

original: 6.101.007c diṣṭyā jīvasi dharmajñe jayena mama saṃyuge
analyzed: diṣṭyā jīvasi dharma jñe jayena mama saṃyuge

original: 6.101.008a labdho no vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gatavyathā
analyzed: labdhaḥ naḥ vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gata vyathā

original: 6.101.008c rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatrur laṅkā ceyaṃ vaśe sthitā
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatruḥ laṅkā ca iyam vaśe sthitā

original: 6.101.009a mayā hy alabdhanidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye
analyzed: mayā hi alabdha nidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye
pratijñā eṣā vinistīrṇā baddhvā setum mahā udadhau

original: 6.101.010a saṃbhramaś ca na kartavyo vartantyā rāvaṇālaye
analyzed: saṃbhramaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ vartantyāḥ rāvaṇa ālaye

original: 6.101.010c vibhīṣaṇa vidheyaṃ hi laṅkaiśvaryam idaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇa vidheyam hi laṅkā aiśvaryam idam kṛtam
tat āśvasihi viśvastā sva gṛhe parivartase
ayam ca abhyeti saṃhṛṣṭaḥ tvad darśana samutsukaḥ
evam uktā samutpatya sītā śaśi nibha ānanā

original: 6.101.012c praharṣeṇāvaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kiṃ cana
analyzed: praharṣeṇa avaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kim cana
abravīt ca hari śreṣṭhaḥ sītām apratijalpatīm

original: 6.101.013c kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase devi kiṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase
analyzed: kim tvam cintayase devi kim ca mām na abhibhāṣase

original: 6.101.014a evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā
analyzed: evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā
abravīt parama pritā harṣa gadgadayā girā
priyam etat upaśrutya bhartuḥ vijaya saṃśritam
praharṣa vaśam āpannā nirvākyā asmi kṣaṇa antaram

original: 6.101.016a na hi paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ cintayantī plavaṃgama
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi sadṛśam cintayantī plavaṃgama
mad priya ākhyānakasya iha tava pratyabhinandanam

original: 6.101.017a na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara
analyzed: na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara

original: 6.101.017c sadṛśaṃ matpriyākhyāne tava dātuṃ bhavet samam
analyzed: sadṛśam mad priya ākhyāne tava dātum bhavet samam

original: 6.101.018a hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā ratnāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: hiraṇyam vā suvarṇam vā ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: 6.101.018c rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu naitad arhati bhāṣitum
analyzed: rājyam vā triṣu lokeṣu na etat arhati bhāṣitum

original: 6.101.019a evam uktas tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ
pragṛhīta añjaliḥ vākyam sītāyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ
bhartuḥ priya hite yukte bhartuḥ vijaya kāṅkṣiṇi

original: 6.101.020c snigdham evaṃvidhaṃ vākyaṃ tvam evārhasi bhāṣitum
analyzed: snigdham evaṃvidham vākyam tvam eva arhasi bhāṣitum

original: 6.101.021a tavaitad vacanaṃ saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca
analyzed: tava etat vacanam saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca
ratna oghāt vividhāt ca api deva rājyāt viśiṣyate

original: 6.101.022a arthataś ca mayā prāptā devarājyādayo guṇāḥ
analyzed: arthataḥ ca mayā prāptāḥ deva rājya ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: 6.101.022c hataśatruṃ vijayinaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi yat sthitam
analyzed: hata śatrum vijayinam rāmam paśyāmi yat sthitam

original: 6.101.023a imās tu khalu rākṣasyo yadi tvam anumanyase
analyzed: imāḥ tu khalu rākṣasyaḥ yadi tvam anumanyase

original: 6.101.023c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ sarvā yābhis tvaṃ tarjitā purā
analyzed: hantum icchāmi aham sarvāḥ yābhiḥ tvam tarjitā purā
kliśyantīm pati devām tvām aśoka vanikām gatām
ghora rūpa samācārāḥ krūrāḥ krūratara īkṣaṇāḥ

original: 6.101.025a rākṣasyo dāruṇakathā varam etaṃ prayaccha me
analyzed: rākṣasyaḥ dāruṇa kathāḥ varam etam prayaccha me

original: 6.101.025c icchāmi vividhair ghātair hantum etāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
analyzed: icchāmi vividhaiḥ ghātaiḥ hantum etāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: 6.101.026a muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiś caiva caraṇaiś caiva śobhane
analyzed: muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiḥ ca eva caraṇaiḥ ca eva śobhane

original: 6.101.026c ghorair jānuprahāraiś ca daśanānāṃ ca pātanaiḥ
analyzed: ghoraiḥ jānu prahāraiḥ ca daśanānām ca pātanaiḥ
bhakṣaṇaiḥ karṇa nāsānām keśānām luñcanaiḥ tathā

original: 6.101.027c bhṛśaṃ śuṣkamukhībhiś ca dāruṇair laṅghanair hataiḥ
analyzed: bhṛśam śuṣka mukhībhiḥ ca dāruṇaiḥ laṅghanaiḥ hataiḥ
evaṃprakāraiḥ bahubhiḥ viprakāraiḥ yaśasvini

original: 6.101.028c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ devi tavemāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ
analyzed: hantum icchāmi aham devi tava imāḥ kṛta kilbiṣāḥ
evam uktā mahumatā vaidehī janakātmajā
uvāca dharma sahitam hanūmantam yaśasvinī
rāja saṃśraya vaśyānām kurvatīnām para ājñayā

original: 6.101.030c vidheyānāṃ ca dāsīnāṃ kaḥ kupyed vānarottama
analyzed: vidheyānām ca dāsīnām kaḥ kupyet vānara uttama
bhāgya vaiṣamya yogena purā duścaritena ca

original: 6.101.031c mayaitet prāpyate sarvaṃ svakṛtaṃ hy upabhujyate
analyzed: mayā etat id prāpyate sarvam sva kṛtam hi upabhujyate

original: 6.101.032a prāptavyaṃ tu daśā yogān mayaitad iti niścitam
analyzed: prāptavyam tu daśā yogāt mayā etat iti niścitam
dāsīnām rāvaṇasya aham marṣayāmi iha durbalā
ājñaptāḥ rāvaṇena etāḥ rākṣasyaḥ mām atarjayan

original: 6.101.033c hate tasmin na kuryur hi tarjanaṃ vānarottama
analyzed: hate tasmin na kuryuḥ hi tarjanam vānara uttama
ayam vyāghra samīpe tu purāṇaḥ dharma saṃhitaḥ

original: 6.101.034c ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ śloko me taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
analyzed: ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ ślokaḥ me tam nibodha plavaṃgama

original: 6.101.035a na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām
analyzed: na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣām pāpa karmaṇām
samayaḥ rakṣitavyaḥ tu santaḥ cāritra bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: 6.101.036a pāpānāṃ vā śubhānāṃ vā vadhārhāṇāṃ plavaṃgama
analyzed: pāpānām vā śubhānām vā vadha arhāṇām plavaṃgama

original: 6.101.036c kāryaṃ kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaś cin nāparādhyati
analyzed: kāryam kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaḥ cit na aparādhyati
loka hiṃsā vihārāṇām rakṣasām kāmarūpiṇam

original: 6.101.037c kurvatām api pāpāni naiva kāryam aśobhanam
analyzed: kurvatām api pāpāni nā eva kāryam aśobhanam

original: 6.101.038a evam uktas tu hanumān sītayā vākyakovidaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu hanumān sītayā vākya kovidaḥ
pratyuvāca tatas sītām rāma patnīm yaśasvinīm
yuktā rāmasya bhavatī dharma patnī yaśasvinī

original: 6.101.039c pratisaṃdiśa māṃ devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: pratisaṃdiśa mām devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ
evam uktā hanumatā vaidehī janakātmajā
abravīt draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāram vānara uttama
tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā hanumān pavanātmajaḥ
harṣayan maithilīm vākyam uvāca idam mahā dyutiḥ
pūrṇa candra ānanam rāmam drakṣyasi ārye sa lakṣmaṇam
sthira mitram hata amitram śacī iva tridaśeśvaram

original: 6.101.043a tām evam uktvā rājantīṃ sītāṃ sākṣād iva śriyam
analyzed: tām evam uktvā rājantīm sītām sākṣāt iva śriyam
ājagāma mahā vegaḥ hanūmān yatra rāghavaḥ
saḥ uvāca mahā prajñam abhigamya plavaṃgamaḥ
rāmam vacanam artha jñaḥ varam sarva dhanuṣmatām
yad nimittaḥ yam ārambhaḥ karmaṇām ca phala udayaḥ

original: 6.102.002c tāṃ devīṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ maithilīṃ draṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: tām devīm śoka saṃtaptām maithilīm draṣṭum arhasi
sā hi śoka samāviṣṭā bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇā

original: 6.102.003c maithilī vijayaṃ śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat
analyzed: maithilī vijayam śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat

original: 6.102.004a pūrvakāt pratyayāc cāham ukto viśvastayā tayā
analyzed: pūrvakāt pratyayāt ca aham uktaḥ viśvastayā tayā
bhartāram draṣṭum icchāmi kṛtārtham sahalakṣmaṇam

original: 6.102.005a evam ukto hanumatā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hanumatā rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām varaḥ
agacchat sahasā dhyānam āsīt bāṣpa pariplutaḥ

original: 6.102.006a dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan
analyzed: dīrgham uṣṇam ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan
uvāca megha saṃkāśam vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam
divya aṅga rāgām vaidehīm divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitām
iha sītām śiraḥ snātām upasthāpaya māciram

original: 6.102.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa tvaramāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa tvaramāṇaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
praviśya antaḥpuram sītām strībhiḥ svābhiḥ acodayat
divya aṅga rāgā vaidehī divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: 6.102.009c yānam āroha bhadraṃ te bhartā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
