analyzed: yānam āroha bhadram te bhartā tvām draṣṭum icchati

original: 6.102.010a evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
a snātā draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāram rākṣasa adhipa
tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.102.011c yathāhaṃ rāmo bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi
analyzed: yathā aham rāmaḥ bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā maithilī bhrātṛ devatā
bhartṛ bhakti vratā sādhvī tathā iti pratyabhāṣata
tatas sītām śiraḥ snātām yuvatībhiḥ alaṃkṛtām
mahārha ābharaṇa upetām mahārha ambara dhāriṇīm
āropya śibikām dīptām parārdhya ambara saṃvṛtām
rakṣobhiḥ bahubhiḥ guptām ājahāra vibhīṣaṇaḥ
saḥ bhigamya mahātmānam jñātvā abhidhyānam āsthitam

original: 6.102.015c praṇataś ca prahṛṣṭaś ca prāptāṃ sītāṃ nyavedayat
analyzed: praṇataḥ ca prahṛṣṭaḥ ca prāptām sītām nyavedayat
tām āgatām upaśrutya rakṣaḥ gṛha cira uṣitām

original: 6.102.016c harṣo dainyaṃ ca roṣaś ca trayaṃ rāghavam āviśat
analyzed: harṣaḥ dainyam ca roṣaḥ ca trayam rāghavam āviśat
tatas pārśva gatam dṛṣṭvā sa vimarśam vicārayan
vibhīṣaṇam idam vākyam ahṛṣṭaḥ rāghavaḥ bravīt
rākṣasa adhipate saumya nityam mad vijaye rata
vaidehī saṃnikarṣam me śīghram samupagacchatu
sa tad vacanam ājñāya rāghavasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.102.019c tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnaṃ kārayām āsa sarvataḥ
analyzed: tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnam kārayām āsa sarvatas
kañcuka uṣṇīṣiṇaḥ tatra vetra jharjhara pāṇayaḥ
utsārayantaḥ puruṣāḥ samantāt paricakramuḥ

original: 6.102.021a ṛkṣāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣāṇām vānarāṇām ca rākṣasānām ca sarvatas
vṛndāni utsāryamāṇāni dūram utsasṛjuḥ tatas
teṣām utsāryamāṇānām sarveṣām dhvaniḥ utthitaḥ
vāyunā udvartamānasya sāgarasya iva nisvanaḥ
utsāryamāṇān tān dṛṣṭvā samantāt jāta saṃbhramān

original: 6.102.023c dākṣiṇyāt tadamarṣāc ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: dākṣiṇyāt tad amarṣāt ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ

original: 6.102.024a saṃrabdhaś cābravīd rāmaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
analyzed: saṃrabdhaḥ ca abravīt rāmaḥ cakṣuṣā pradahan iva
vibhīṣaṇam mahā prājñam sa upālambham idam vacaḥ

original: 6.102.025a kimarthaṃ mām anādṛtya kṛśyate 'yaṃ tvayā janaḥ
analyzed: kimartham mām an ādṛtya kṛśyate yam tvayā janaḥ
nivartaya enam udyogam janaḥ yam sva janaḥ mama

original: 6.102.026a na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārās tiraskriyāḥ
analyzed: na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārāḥ tiraskriyāḥ
na īdṛśāḥ rāja satkārāḥ vṛttam āvaraṇam striyaḥ

original: 6.102.027a vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayaṃ vare
analyzed: vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayam vare

original: 6.102.027c na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanaṃ duṣyate striyaḥ
analyzed: na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanam duṣyate striyaḥ

original: 6.102.028a saiṣā yuddhagatā caiva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā
analyzed: sā eṣā yuddha gatā ca eva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā

original: 6.102.028c darśane 'syā na doṣaḥ syān matsamīpe viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: darśane syāḥ na doṣaḥ syāt mad samīpe viśeṣataḥ

original: 6.102.029a tad ānaya samīpaṃ me śīghram enāṃ vibhīṣaṇa
analyzed: tat ānaya samīpam me śīghram enām vibhīṣaṇa

original: 6.102.029c sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛdgaṇavṛtaṃ sthitam
analyzed: sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛd gaṇa vṛtam sthitam

original: 6.102.030a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa savimarśo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa sa vimarśaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
rāmasya upānayat sītām saṃnikarṣam vinīta vat
tatas lakṣmaṇa sugrīvau hanūmān ca plavaṃgamaḥ

original: 6.102.031c niśamya vākyaṃ rāmasya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam
analyzed: niśamya vākyam rāmasya babhūvuḥ vyathitāḥ bhṛśam
kalatra nirapekṣaiḥ ca iṅgitaiḥ asya dāruṇaiḥ

original: 6.102.032c aprītam iva sītāyāṃ tarkayanti sma rāghavam
analyzed: a prītam iva sītāyām tarkayanti sma rāghavam

original: 6.102.033a lajjayā tv avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī
analyzed: lajjayā tu avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī
vibhīṣaṇena anugatā bhartāram sā abhyavartata
sā vastra saṃruddha mukhī lajjayā jana saṃsadi
ruroda āsādya bhartāram ārya putra iti bhāṣiṇī

original: 6.102.035a vismayāc ca praharṣāc ca snehāc ca paridevatā
analyzed: vismayāt ca praharṣāt ca snehāt ca paridevatā
udaikṣata mukham bhartuḥ saumyam saumyatara ānanā
atha samapanudat manaḥ klamam sā
su ciram adṛṣṭam udīkṣya vai priyasya
vadanam udita pūrṇa candra kāntam
vimala śaśāṅka nibha ānanā tadā āsīt

original: 6.103.001a tāṃ tu pārśve sthitāṃ prahvāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm
analyzed: tām tu pārśve sthitām prahvām rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm
hṛdaya antargata krodhaḥ vyāhartum upacakrame

original: 6.103.002a eṣāsi nirjitā bhadre śatruṃ jitvā mayā raṇe
analyzed: eṣā asi nirjitā bhadre śatrum jitvā mayā raṇe

original: 6.103.002c pauruṣād yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad etad upapāditam
analyzed: pauruṣāt yat anuṣṭheyam tat etat upapāditam
gataḥ smi antam amarṣasya dharṣaṇā saṃpramārjitā

original: 6.103.003c avamānaś ca śatruś ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau
analyzed: avamānaḥ ca śatruḥ ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau

original: 6.103.004a adya me pauruṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ
analyzed: adya me pauruṣam dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ
adya tīrṇa pratijña tvāt prabhavāmi iha ca ātmanaḥ

original: 6.103.005a yā tvaṃ virahitā nītā calacittena rakṣasā
analyzed: yā tvam virahitā nītā cala cittena rakṣasā
daiva saṃpāditaḥ doṣaḥ mānuṣeṇa mayā jitaḥ

original: 6.103.006a saṃprāptam avamānaṃ yas tejasā na pramārjati
analyzed: saṃprāptam avamānam yaḥ tejasā na pramārjati
kaḥ tasya puruṣa arthaḥ sti puruṣasya alpa tejasaḥ
laṅghanam ca samudrasya laṅkāyāḥ ca avamardanam

original: 6.103.007c saphalaṃ tasya tac chlāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ
analyzed: saphalam tasya tat ślāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ

original: 6.103.008a yuddhe vikramataś caiva hitaṃ mantrayataś ca me
analyzed: yuddhe vikramataḥ ca eva hitam mantrayataḥ ca me
sugrīvasya sa sainyasya sa phalaḥ pariśramaḥ

original: 6.103.009a nirguṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ tyaktvā yo māṃ svayam upasthitaḥ
analyzed: nirguṇam bhrātaram tyaktvā yaḥ mām svayam upasthitaḥ
vibhīṣaṇasya bhaktasya saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ

original: 6.103.010a ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sītā rāmasya tadvacaḥ
analyzed: iti evam bruvataḥ tasya sītā rāmasya tad vacaḥ
mṛgī iva utphulla nayanā babhūva aśru pariplutā

original: 6.103.011a paśyatas tāṃ tu rāmasya bhūyaḥ krodho 'bhyavartata
analyzed: paśyataḥ tām tu rāmasya bhūyas krodhaḥ bhyavartata
prabhūta ājya avasiktasya pāvakasya iva dīpyataḥ
sa baddhvā bhrukuṭim vaktre tiryak prekṣita locanaḥ
abravīt paruṣam sītām madhye vānara rakṣasām
yat kartavyam manuṣyeṇa dharṣaṇām parimārjatā

original: 6.103.013c tat kṛtaṃ sakalaṃ sīte śatruhastād amarṣaṇāt
analyzed: tat kṛtam sakalam sīte śatru hastāt amarṣaṇāt
nirjitāḥ jīva lokasya tapasā bhāvitātmanā
agastyena durādharṣā muninā dakṣiṇā iva diś

original: 6.103.015a viditaś cāstu bhadraṃ te yo 'yaṃ raṇapariśramaḥ
analyzed: viditaḥ ca astu bhadram te yaḥ yam raṇa pariśramaḥ

original: 6.103.015c sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdāṃ vīryān na tvadarthaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdām vīryāt na tvad artham mayā kṛtaḥ

original: 6.103.016a rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādam ca sarvaśas
prakhyātasya ātma vaṃśasya nyaṅgam ca parimārjatā
prāpta cāritra saṃdehā mama pratimukhe sthitā
dīpaḥ netra āturasya iva pratikūlā asi me dṛḍham

original: 6.103.018a tad gaccha hy abhyanujñātā yateṣṭaṃ janakātmaje
analyzed: tat gaccha hi abhyanujñātā yata iṣṭam janakātmaje

original: 6.103.018c etā daśa diśo bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā
analyzed: etāḥ daśa diśaḥ bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā

original: 6.103.019a kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyaṃ paragṛhoṣitām
analyzed: kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyam para gṛha uṣitām
tejasvi punar ādadyāt suhṛd lekhena cetasā
rāvaṇa aṅka paribhraṣṭām dṛṣṭām duṣṭena cakṣuṣā

original: 6.103.020c kathaṃ tvāṃ punarādadyāṃ kulaṃ vyapadiśan mahat
analyzed: katham tvām punar ādadyām kulam vyapadiśan mahat

original: 6.103.021a tadarthaṃ nirjitā me tvaṃ yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: tad artham nirjitā me tvam yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtam mayā

original: 6.103.021c nāsti me tvayy abhiṣvaṅgo yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām itaḥ
analyzed: na asti me tvayi abhiṣvaṅgaḥ yatheṣṭam gamyatām itas
iti pravyāhṛtam bhadre mayā etat kṛta buddhinā

original: 6.103.022c lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvaṃ kuru buddhiṃ yathāsukham
analyzed: lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvam kuru buddhim yathāsukham
sugrīve vānara indre vā rākṣasa indre vibhīṣaṇe

original: 6.103.023c niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ

original: 6.103.024a na hi tvāṃ rāvaṇo dṛṣṭvā divyarūpāṃ manoramām
analyzed: na hi tvām rāvaṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā divya rūpām manoramām
marṣayate ciram sīte sva gṛhe parivartinīm
tatas tat apriyam
priyāt upaśrutya cirasya maithilī
mumoca bāṣpam su bhṛśam pravepitā
gaja indra hasta abhihatā iva vallarī

original: 6.104.001a evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣam loma harṣaṇam
rāghaveṇa sa roṣeṇa bhṛśam pravyathitā abhavat

original: 6.104.002a sā tad aśrutapūrvaṃ hi jane mahati maithilī
analyzed: sā tat a śruta pūrvam hi jane mahati maithilī
śrutvā bhartṛ vacaḥ rūkṣam lajjayā vrīḍitā abhavat
praviśantī iva gātrāṇi svāni eva janakātmajā

original: 6.104.003c vākśalyais taiḥ saśalyeva bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat
analyzed: vāc śalyaiḥ taiḥ sa śalyā iva bhṛśam aśrūṇi avartayat
tatas bāṣpa parikliṣṭam pramārjantī svam ānanam

original: 6.104.004c śanair gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
analyzed: śanais gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt

original: 6.104.005a kiṃ mām asadṛśaṃ vākyam īdṛśaṃ śrotradāruṇam
analyzed: kim mām a sadṛśam vākyam īdṛśam śrotra dāruṇam

original: 6.104.005c rūkṣaṃ śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva
analyzed: rūkṣam śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva

original: 6.104.006a na tathāsmi mahābāho yathā tvam avagacchasi
analyzed: na tathā asmi mahā bāho yathā tvam avagacchasi

original: 6.104.006c pratyayaṃ gaccha me svena cāritreṇaiva te śape
analyzed: pratyayam gaccha me svena cāritreṇa eva te śape

original: 6.104.007a pṛthak strīṇāṃ pracāreṇa jātiṃ tvaṃ pariśaṅkase
analyzed: pṛthak strīṇām pracāreṇa jātim tvam pariśaṅkase

original: 6.104.007c parityajemāṃ śaṅkāṃ tu yadi te 'haṃ parīkṣitā
analyzed: parityaja imām śaṅkām tu yadi te ham parīkṣitā

original: 6.104.008a yady ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatāsmi vivaśā prabho
analyzed: yadi aham gātra saṃsparśam gatā asmi vivaśā prabho

original: 6.104.008c kāmakāro na me tatra daivaṃ tatrāparādhyati
analyzed: kāmakāraḥ na me tatra daivam tatra aparādhyati

original: 6.104.009a madadhīnaṃ tu yat tan me hṛdayaṃ tvayi vartate
analyzed: mad adhīnam tu yat tat me hṛdayam tvayi vartate
para adhīneṣu gātreṣu kim kariṣyāmi anīśvarā
saha saṃvṛddha bhāvāt ca saṃsargeṇa ca mānada

original: 6.104.010c yady ahaṃ te na vijñātā hatā tenāsmi śāśvatam
analyzed: yadi aham te na vijñātā hatā tena asmi śāśvatam

original: 6.104.011a preṣitas te yadā vīro hanūmān avalokakaḥ
analyzed: preṣitaḥ te yadā vīraḥ hanūmān avalokakaḥ

original: 6.104.011c laṅkāsthāhaṃ tvayā vīra kiṃ tadā na visarjitā
analyzed: laṅkā sthā aham tvayā vīra kim tadā na visarjitā
pratyakṣam vānara indrasya tvad vākya samanantaram

original: 6.104.012c tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktaṃ syāj jīvitaṃ mayā
analyzed: tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktam syāt jīvitam mayā

original: 6.104.013a na vṛthā te śramo 'yaṃ syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam
analyzed: na vṛthā te śramaḥ yam syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam
suhṛd jana parikleśaḥ na ca ayam niṣphalaḥ tava
tvayā tu nara śārdūla krodham eva anuvartatā
laghunā iva manuṣyeṇa strī tvam eva puraskṛtam
apadeśena janakāt nā utpattiḥ vasudhā talāt

original: 6.104.015c mama vṛttaṃ ca vṛttajña bahu te na puraskṛtam
analyzed: mama vṛttam ca vṛtta jña bahu te na puraskṛtam

original: 6.104.016a na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇir bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ
analyzed: na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇiḥ bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ

original: 6.104.016c mama bhaktiś ca śīlaṃ ca sarvaṃ te pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtam
analyzed: mama bhaktiḥ ca śīlam ca sarvam te pṛṣṭhatas kṛtam
evam bruvāṇā rudatī bāṣpa gadgada bhāṣiṇī

original: 6.104.017c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ sthitam
analyzed: abravīt lakṣmaṇam sītā dīnam dhyāna param sthitam

original: 6.104.018a citāṃ me kuru saumitre vyasanasyāsya bheṣajam
analyzed: citām me kuru saumitre vyasanasya asya bheṣajam
mithyā apavāda upahatā na aham jīvitum utsahe
a prītasya guṇaiḥ bhartuḥ tyaktayā jana saṃsadi

original: 6.104.019c yā kṣamā me gatir gantuṃ pravekṣye havyavāhanam
analyzed: yā kṣamā me gatiḥ gantum pravekṣye havyavāhanam

original: 6.104.020a evam uktas tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
amarṣa vaśam āpannaḥ rāghava ānanam aikṣata
sa vijñāya manaḥ chandam rāmasya ākāra sūcitam

original: 6.104.021c citāṃ cakāra saumitrir mate rāmasya vīryavān
analyzed: citām cakāra saumitriḥ mate rāmasya vīryavān

original: 6.104.022a adhomukhaṃ tato rāmaṃ śanaiḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: adhomukham tatas rāmam śanais kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
upāsarpata vaidehī dīpyamānam hutāśanam

original: 6.104.023a praṇamya devatābhyaś ca brāhmaṇebhyaś ca maithilī
analyzed: praṇamya devatābhyaḥ ca brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca maithilī
baddhāñjali puṭā ca idam uvāca agni samīpatas

original: 6.104.024a yathā me hṛdayaṃ nityaṃ nāpasarpati rāghavāt
analyzed: yathā me hṛdayam nityam na apasarpati rāghavāt

original: 6.104.024c tathā lokasya sākṣī māṃ sarvataḥ pātu pāvakaḥ
analyzed: tathā lokasya sākṣī mām sarvatas pātu pāvakaḥ

original: 6.104.025a evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam
viveśa jvalanam dīptam niḥsaṅgena antarātmanā
janaḥ sa su mahān tatra bāla vṛddha samākulaḥ
dadarśa maithilīm tatra praviśantīm hutāśanam

original: 6.104.027a tasyām agniṃ viśantyāṃ tu hāheti vipulaḥ svanaḥ
analyzed: tasyām agnim viśantyām tu hāhā iti vipulaḥ svanaḥ
rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca saṃbabhūva adbhuta upamaḥ
tatas vaiśravaṇaḥ rājā yamaḥ ca amitra karśanaḥ

original: 6.105.001c sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca varuṇaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: sahasrākṣaḥ mahā indraḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca paraṃtapaḥ

original: 6.105.002c kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahma vidām varaḥ
ete sarve samāgamya vimānaiḥ sūrya saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 6.105.003c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abhijagmuś ca rāghavam
analyzed: āgamya nagarīm laṅkām abhijagmuḥ ca rāghavam
tatas sa hasta ābharaṇān pragṛhya vipulān bhujān
abruvan tridaśa śreṣṭhāḥ prāñjalim rāghavam sthitam

original: 6.105.005a kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭho jñānavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭhaḥ jñānavatām varaḥ
upekṣase katham sītām patantīm havyavāhane
katham deva gaṇa śreṣṭham ātmānam na avabudhyase

original: 6.105.006a ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaṃ vasūnāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvam vasūnām ca prajāpatiḥ

original: 6.105.006c tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ
analyzed: tvam trayāṇām hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ

original: 6.105.007a rudrāṇām aṣṭamo rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ
analyzed: rudrāṇām aṣṭamaḥ rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ

original: 6.105.007c aśvinau cāpi te karṇau candrasūryau ca cakṣuṣī
analyzed: aśvinau ca api te karṇau candra sūryau ca cakṣuṣī

original: 6.105.008a ante cādau ca lokānāṃ dṛśyase tvaṃ paraṃtapa
analyzed: ante ca ādau ca lokānām dṛśyase tvam paraṃtapa

original: 6.105.008c upekṣase ca vaidehīṃ mānuṣaḥ prākṛto yathā
analyzed: upekṣase ca vaidehīm mānuṣaḥ prākṛtaḥ yathā

original: 6.105.009a ity ukto lokapālais taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ lokapālaiḥ taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ
abravīt tridaśa śreṣṭhān rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām varaḥ
ātmānam mānuṣam manye rāmam daśaratha ātmajam

original: 6.105.010c yo 'haṃ yasya yataś cāhaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
analyzed: yaḥ ham yasya yatas ca aham bhagavān tat bravītu me

original: 6.105.011a iti bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam kākutstham brahmā brahma vidām varaḥ

original: 6.105.011c abravīc chṛṇu me rāma satyaṃ satyaparākrama
analyzed: abravīt śṛṇu me rāma satyam satya parākrama

original: 6.105.012a bhavān nārāyaṇo devaḥ śrīmāṃś cakrāyudho vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhavān nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ śrīmān cakrāyudhaḥ vibhuḥ
ekaśṛṅgaḥ varāhaḥ tvam bhūta bhavya sapatnajit

original: 6.105.013a akṣaraṃ brahmasatyaṃ ca madhye cānte ca rāghava
analyzed: akṣaram brahma satyam ca madhye ca ante ca rāghava

original: 6.105.013c lokānāṃ tvaṃ paro dharmo viṣvaksenaś caturbhujaḥ
analyzed: lokānām tvam paraḥ dharmaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ catur bhujaḥ

original: 6.105.014c ajitaḥ khaḍgadhṛg viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
analyzed: ajitaḥ khaḍga dhṛk viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca eva bṛhat balaḥ

original: 6.105.015a senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tvaṃ buddhiḥ sattaṃ kṣamā damaḥ
analyzed: senā nīḥ grāmaṇīḥ ca tvam buddhiḥ sattam kṣamā damaḥ

original: 6.105.015c prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca tvam upendro madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: prabhavaḥ ca apyayaḥ ca tvam upendraḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: 6.105.016c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca tvām āhur divyā maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: śaraṇyam śaraṇam ca tvām āhuḥ divyāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ
sahasra śṛṅgaḥ veda ātmā śata jihvaḥ mahā ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 6.105.017c tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa

original: 6.105.018a prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ vā te na viduḥ ko bhavān iti
analyzed: prabhavam nidhanam vā te na viduḥ kaḥ bhavān iti

original: 6.105.018c dṛśyase sarvabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca
analyzed: dṛśyase sarva bhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca

original: 6.105.019a dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
analyzed: dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
sahasra caraṇaḥ śrīmān śata śīrṣaḥ sahasra dhṛk

original: 6.105.020a tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhāṃ ca saparvatām
analyzed: tvam dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhām ca sa parvatām

original: 6.105.020c ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvaṃ mahoragaḥ
analyzed: ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvam mahā uragaḥ
trīn lokān dhārayan rāma deva gandharva dānavān

original: 6.105.021c ahaṃ te hṛdayaṃ rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī
analyzed: aham te hṛdayam rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī

original: 6.105.022a devā gātreṣu lomāni nirmitā brahmaṇā prabho
analyzed: devāḥ gātreṣu lomāni nirmitāḥ brahmaṇā prabho

original: 6.105.022c nimeṣas te 'bhavad rātrir unmeṣas te 'bhavad divā
analyzed: nimeṣaḥ te bhavat rātriḥ unmeṣaḥ te bhavat divā

original: 6.105.023a saṃskārās te 'bhavan vedā na tad asti tvayā vinā
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ te bhavan vedāḥ na tat asti tvayā vinā

original: 6.105.023c jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyamṃ te vasudhātalam
analyzed: jagat sarvam śarīram te te vasudhā talam

original: 6.105.024a agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇa
analyzed: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādaḥ te somaḥ śrīvatsa lakṣaṇa

original: 6.105.024c tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramais tribhiḥ
analyzed: tvayā lokāḥ trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramaiḥ tribhiḥ

original: 6.105.025a mahendraś ca kṛto rājā baliṃ baddhvā mahāsuram
analyzed: mahā indraḥ ca kṛtaḥ rājā balim baddhvā mahā asuram

original: 6.105.025c sītā lakṣmīr bhavān viṣṇur devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: sītā lakṣmīḥ bhavān viṣṇuḥ devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
vadha artham rāvaṇasya iha praviṣṭaḥ mānuṣīm tanum

original: 6.105.026c tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: tat idam naḥ kṛtam kāryam tvayā dharma bhṛtām vara

original: 6.105.027a nihato rāvaṇo rāma prahṛṣṭo divam ākrama
analyzed: nihataḥ rāvaṇaḥ rāma prahṛṣṭaḥ divam ākrama

original: 6.105.027c amoghaṃ balavīryaṃ te amoghas te parākramaḥ
analyzed: amogham bala vīryam te amoghaḥ te parākramaḥ

original: 6.105.028a amoghās te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaś ca ye narāḥ
analyzed: amoghāḥ te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaḥ ca ye narāḥ

original: 6.105.028c ye tvāṃ devaṃ dhruvaṃ bhaktāḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamam
analyzed: ye tvām devam dhruvam bhaktāḥ purāṇam puruṣottamam

original: 6.105.029a ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
analyzed: ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti na asti teṣām parābhavaḥ
etat śrutvā śubham vākyam pitāmaha samīritam
aṅkena ādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vibhāvasuḥ
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśām tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇām
rakta ambara dharām bālām nīla kuñcita mūrdhajām
akliṣṭa mālya ābharaṇām tathā rūpām manasvinīm

original: 6.106.003c dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ

original: 6.106.004a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmam sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ

original: 6.106.004c eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyā na vidyate
analyzed: eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyāḥ na vidyate

original: 6.106.005a naiva vācā na manasā nānudhyānān na cakṣuṣā
analyzed: na eva vācā na manasā na anudhyānāt na cakṣuṣā

original: 6.106.005c suvṛttā vṛttaśauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha
analyzed: su vṛttā vṛtta śauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha
rāvaṇena apanītā eṣā vīrya utsiktena rakṣasā

original: 6.106.006c tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanād vanāt
analyzed: tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanāt vanāt
ruddhā ca antaḥpure guptā tvac cittā tvad parāyaṇā
rakṣitā rākṣasī saṃghaiḥ vikṛtaiḥ ghora darśanaiḥ
pralobhyamānā vividham bhartsyamānā ca maithilī
na acintayata tat rakṣaḥ tvad gatena antarātmanā
viśuddha bhāvām niṣpāpām pratigṛhṇīṣva rāghava

original: 6.106.009c na kiṃ cid abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
analyzed: na kim cit abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ dhṛtimān dṛḍha vikramaḥ
abravīt tridaśa śreṣṭham rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām varaḥ

original: 6.106.011a avaśyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati
analyzed: avaśyam triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati
dīrgha kāla uṣitā ca iyam rāvaṇa antaḥpure śubhā
bāliśaḥ khalu kāma ātmā rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 6.106.012c iti vakṣyanti māṃ santo jānakīm aviśodhya hi
analyzed: iti vakṣyanti mām santaḥ jānakīm a viśodhya hi
ananya hṛdayām bhaktām mad citta parirakṣaṇīm
aham api avagacchāmi maithilīm janakātmajām
pratyaya artham tu lokānām trayāṇām satya saṃśrayaḥ
upekṣe ca api vaidehīm praviśantīm hutāśanam

original: 6.106.015a imām api viśālākṣīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
analyzed: imām api viśāla akṣīm rakṣitām svena tejasā
rāvaṇaḥ na ativarteta velām iva mahā udadhiḥ

original: 6.106.016a na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭātmā manasāpi hi maithilīm
analyzed: na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭa ātmā manasā api hi maithilīm
pradharṣayitum a prāptām dīptām agni śikhām iva
na iyam arhati ca aiśvaryam rāvaṇa antaḥpure śubhā

original: 6.106.017c ananyā hi mayā sītāṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
analyzed: ananyā hi mayā sītām bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
viśuddhā triṣu lokeṣu maithilī janakātmajā

original: 6.106.018c na hi hātum iyaṃ śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
analyzed: na hi hātum iyam śakyā kīrtiḥ ātmavatā yathā

original: 6.106.019a avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ vo vaco hitam
analyzed: avaśyam ca mayā kāryam sarveṣām vaḥ vacaḥ hitam

original: 6.106.019c snigdhānāṃ lokamānyānām evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ hitam
analyzed: snigdhānām loka mānyānām evam ca bruvatām hitam
iti idam uktvā vacanam mahā balaiḥ
praśasyamānaḥ sva kṛtena karmaṇā
sametya rāmaḥ priyayā mahā balaḥ
sukham sukha arhaḥ nubabhūva rāghavaḥ

original: 6.107.001a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam
analyzed: etat śrutvā śubham vākyam rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam
idam śubhataram vākyam vyājahāra maheśvaraḥ
puṣkarākṣa mahā bāho mahā vakṣaḥ paraṃtapa

original: 6.107.002c diṣṭyā kṛtam idaṃ karma tvayā śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: diṣṭyā kṛtam idam karma tvayā śastrabhṛtām vara

original: 6.107.003a diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddham dāruṇam tamaḥ

original: 6.107.003c apāvṛttaṃ tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇajaṃ bhayam
analyzed: apāvṛttam tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇa jam bhayam

original: 6.107.004a āśvāsya bharataṃ dīnaṃ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: āśvāsya bharatam dīnam kausalyām ca yaśasvinīm

original: 6.107.004c kaikeyīṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamātaram
analyzed: kaikeyīm ca sumitrām ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa mātaram
prāpya rājyam ayodhyāyām nandayitvā suhṛd janam
ikṣvākūṇām kule vaṃśam sthāpayitvā mahā bala
iṣṭvā turaga medhena prāpya ca anuttamam yaśaḥ

original: 6.107.006c brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tridivaṃ gantum arhasi
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dhanam dattvā tridivam gantum arhasi

original: 6.107.007a eṣa rājā vimānasthaḥ pitā daśarathas tava
analyzed: eṣa rājā vimāna sthaḥ pitā daśarathaḥ tava

original: 6.107.007c kākutstha mānuṣe loke gurus tava mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: kākutstha mānuṣe loke guruḥ tava mahā yaśāḥ

original: 6.107.008a indralokaṃ gataḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ
analyzed: indra lokam gataḥ śrīmān tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ

original: 6.107.008c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya
mahādeva vacaḥ śrutvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
vimāna śikhara sthasya praṇāmam akarot pituḥ
dīpyamānam svayām lakṣmyā viraja umbara dhāriṇam

original: 6.107.010c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaraṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaram prabhuḥ
harṣeṇa mahatā āviṣṭaḥ vimāna sthaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 6.107.011c prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ daśarathas tadā
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ priyataram dṛṣṭvā putram daśarathaḥ tadā
āropya aṅkam mahā bāhuḥ varāsana gataḥ prabhuḥ
bāhubhyām saṃpariṣvajya tatas vākyam samādade

original: 6.107.013a na me svargo bahumataḥ saṃmānaś ca surarṣibhiḥ
analyzed: na me svargaḥ bahu mataḥ saṃmānaḥ ca sura ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 6.107.013c tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
analyzed: tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyam pratiśṛṇomi te

original: 6.107.014a kaikeyyā yāni coktāni vākyāni vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ yāni ca uktāni vākyāni vadatām vara
tava pravrājana arthāni sthitāni hṛdaye mama

original: 6.107.015a tvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinaṃ pariṣvajya salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: tvām tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinam pariṣvajya sa lakṣmaṇam

original: 6.107.015c adya duḥkhād vimukto 'smi nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: adya duḥkhāt vimuktaḥ smi nīhārāt iva bhāskaraḥ
tāritaḥ ham tvayā putra su putreṇa mahātmanā
aṣṭāvakreṇa dharma ātmā tāritaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yathā

original: 6.107.017a idānīṃ ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sureśvaraiḥ
analyzed: idānīm ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sura īśvaraiḥ
vadha artham rāvaṇasya iha vihitam puruṣottamam

original: 6.107.018a siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvāṃ rāma gṛhaṃ gatam
analyzed: siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvām rāma gṛham gatam
vanāt nivṛttam saṃhṛṣṭā drakṣyate śatru sūdana

original: 6.107.019a siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narā ye tvāṃ purīṃ gatam
analyzed: siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narāḥ ye tvām purīm gatam
jala ārdram abhiṣiktam ca drakṣyanti vasudhādhipam
anuraktena balinā śucinā dharma cāriṇā

original: 6.107.020c iccheyaṃ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ bharatena samāgatam
analyzed: iccheyam tvām aham draṣṭum bharatena samāgatam
caturdaśa samāḥ saumya vane niryāpitāḥ tvayā

original: 6.107.021c vasatā sītayā sārdhaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
analyzed: vasatā sītayā sārdham lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
nivṛtta vana vāsaḥ si pratijñā saphalā kṛtā

original: 6.107.022c rāvaṇaṃ ca raṇe hatvā devās te paritoṣitāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam ca raṇe hatvā devāḥ te paritoṣitāḥ

original: 6.107.023a kṛtaṃ karma yaśaḥ ślāghyaṃ prāptaṃ te śatrusūdana
analyzed: kṛtam karma yaśaḥ ślāghyam prāptam te śatru sūdana

original: 6.107.023c bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājyastho dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājya sthaḥ dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnuhi

original: 6.107.024a iti bruvāṇaṃ rājānaṃ rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam rājānam rāmaḥ prāñjaliḥ abravīt

original: 6.107.024c kuru prasādaṃ dharmajña kaikeyyā bharatasya ca
analyzed: kuru prasādam dharma jña kaikeyyāḥ bharatasya ca

original: 6.107.025a saputrāṃ tvāṃ tyajāmīti yad uktā kaikayī tvayā
analyzed: sa putrām tvām tyajāmi iti yat uktā kaikayī tvayā

original: 6.107.025c sa śāpaḥ kaikayīṃ ghoraḥ saputrāṃ na spṛśet prabho
analyzed: sa śāpaḥ kaikayīm ghoraḥ sa putrām na spṛśet prabho

original: 6.107.026a sa tatheti mahārājo rāmam uktvā kṛtāñjalim
analyzed: sa tathā iti mahā rājaḥ rāmam uktvā kṛta añjalim

original: 6.107.026c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha

original: 6.107.027a rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
analyzed: rāmam śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā

original: 6.107.027c kṛtā mama mahāprītiḥ prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca te
analyzed: kṛtā mama mahā prītiḥ prāptam dharma phalam ca te

original: 6.107.028a dharmaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña yaśaś ca vipulaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: dharmam prāpsyasi dharma jña yaśaḥ ca vipulam bhuvi

original: 6.107.028c rāme prasanne svargaṃ ca mahimānaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: rāme prasanne svargam ca mahimānam tathā eva ca
rāmam śuśrūṣa bhadram te sumitrā ānanda vardhana

original: 6.107.029c rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
analyzed: rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣu abhirataḥ sadā

original: 6.107.030a ete sendrās trayo lokāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: ete sa indrāḥ trayaḥ lokāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
abhigamya mahātmānam arcanti puruṣottamam

original: 6.107.031a etat tad uktam avyaktam akṣaraṃ brahmanirmitam
analyzed: etat tat uktam avyaktam akṣaram brahma nirmitam

original: 6.107.031c devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ saumya guhyaṃ rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: devānām hṛdayam saumya guhyam rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ

original: 6.107.032a avāptaṃ dharmacaraṇaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ tvayā
analyzed: avāptam dharma caraṇam yaśaḥ ca vipulam tvayā

original: 6.107.032c rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
analyzed: rāmam śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā

original: 6.107.033a sa tathoktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam
analyzed: sa tathā uktvā mahā bāhuḥ lakṣmaṇam prāñjalim sthitam

original: 6.107.033c uvāca rājā dharmātmā vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ śubham
analyzed: uvāca rājā dharma ātmā vaidehīm vacanam śubham

original: 6.107.034a kartavyo na tu vaidehi manyus tyāgam imaṃ prati
analyzed: kartavyaḥ na tu vaidehi manyuḥ tyāgam imam prati
rāmeṇa tvad viśuddhi artham kṛtam etat hita eṣiṇā

original: 6.107.035a na tvaṃ subhru samādheyā patiśuśrūvaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: na tvam subhru samādheyā pati śuśrūvaṇam prati

original: 6.107.035c avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivataṃ param
analyzed: avaśyam tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivatam param

original: 6.107.036a iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītāṃ tathā snuṣām
analyzed: iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītām tathā snuṣām
indra lokam vimānena yayau daśarathaḥ jvalan
pratiprayāte kākutsthe mahā indraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
abravīt parama prītaḥ rāghavam prāñjalim sthitam
amogham darśanam rāma tava asmākam paraṃtapa

original: 6.108.002c prītiyukto 'smi tena tvaṃ brūhi yan manasecchasi
analyzed: prīti yuktaḥ smi tena tvam brūhi yat manasā icchasi

original: 6.108.003a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 6.108.003c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca api bhāryayā
yadi prītiḥ samutpannā mayi sarva sura īśvara

original: 6.108.004c vakṣyāmi kuru me satyaṃ vacanaṃ vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: vakṣyāmi kuru me satyam vacanam vadatām vara

original: 6.108.005a mama hetoḥ parākrāntā ye gatā yamasādanam
analyzed: mama hetoḥ parākrāntāḥ ye gatāḥ yama sādanam

original: 6.108.005c te sarve jīvitaṃ prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
analyzed: te sarve jīvitam prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ

original: 6.108.006a matpriyeṣv abhiraktāś ca na mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti ca
analyzed: mad priyeṣu abhiraktāḥ ca na mṛtyum gaṇayanti ca

original: 6.108.006c tvatprasādāt sameyus te varam etad ahaṃ vṛṇe
analyzed: tvad prasādāt sameyuḥ te varam etat aham vṛṇe
nīrujān nirvraṇān ca eva saṃpanna bala pauruṣān
golāṅgūlān tathā eva ṛkṣān draṣṭum icchāmi mānada

original: 6.108.008a akāle cāpi mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: akāle ca api mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 6.108.008c nadyaś ca vimalās tatra tiṣṭheyur yatra vānarāḥ
analyzed: nadyaḥ ca vimalāḥ tatra tiṣṭheyuḥ yatra vānarāḥ

original: 6.108.009a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
mahā indraḥ pratyuvāca idam vacanam prīti lakṣaṇam

original: 6.108.010a mahān ayaṃ varas tāta tvayokto raghunandana
analyzed: mahān ayam varaḥ tāta tvayā uktaḥ raghunandana
samutthāsyanti harayaḥ suptāḥ nidrā kṣaye yathā

original: 6.108.011a suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiś caiva jñātibhiḥ svajanena ca
analyzed: suhṛdbhiḥ bāndhavaiḥ ca eva jñātibhiḥ sva janena ca

original: 6.108.011c sarva eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā
analyzed: sarve eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā
akāle puṣpa śabalāḥ phalavantaḥ ca pādapāḥ
bhaviṣyanti mahā iṣvāsa nadyaḥ ca salila āyutāḥ

original: 6.108.013a savraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ gātraiḥ saṃvṛtair nivraṇaiḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sa vraṇaiḥ prathamam gātraiḥ saṃvṛtaiḥ nivraṇaiḥ punar

original: 6.108.013c babhūvur vānarāḥ sarve kim etad iti vismitaḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ vānarāḥ sarve kim etat iti vismitaḥ
kākutstham paripūrṇa artham dṛṣṭvā sarve sura uttamāḥ

original: 6.108.014c ūcus te prathamaṃ stutvā stavārhaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: ūcuḥ te prathamam stutvā stava arham sahalakṣmaṇam

original: 6.108.015a gacchāyodhyām ito vīra visarjaya ca vānarān
analyzed: gaccha ayodhyām itas vīra visarjaya ca vānarān
maithilīm sāntvayasva enām anuraktām tapasvinīm
bhrātaram paśya bharatam tvad śokāt vrata cāriṇam
abhiṣecaya ca ātmānam paurān gatvā praharṣaya

original: 6.108.017a evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmam saumitriṇā saha

original: 6.108.017c vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam
analyzed: vimānaiḥ sūrya saṃkāśaiḥ hṛṣṭāḥ jagmuḥ surāḥ divam

original: 6.108.018a abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān
analyzed: abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvān tān tridaśa uttamān

original: 6.108.018c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇa rāma pālitā
mahā camūḥ hṛṣṭa janā yaśasvinī
śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvatas
niśā praṇītā iva hi śītaraśminā

original: 6.109.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam
analyzed: tām rātrim uṣitam rāmam sukha utthitam ariṃdamam

original: 6.109.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam jayam pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
snānāni ca aṅgarāgāṇi vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca

original: 6.109.002c candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca
alaṃkāra vidaḥ ca imāḥ nāryaḥ padma nibha īkṣaṇāḥ
upasthitāḥ tvām vidhivat snāpayiṣyanti rāghava

original: 6.109.004a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
harīn sugrīva mukhyān tvam snānena upanimantraya

original: 6.109.005a sa tu tāmyati dharmātmā mamahetoḥ sukhocitaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tāmyati dharma ātmā mama hetoḥ sukha ucitaḥ
su kumāraḥ mahā bāhuḥ kumāraḥ satya saṃśravaḥ
tam vinā kaikeyī putram bharatam dharma cāriṇam

original: 6.109.006c na me snānaṃ bahumataṃ vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: na me snānam bahu matam vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca

original: 6.109.007a ita eva pathā kṣipraṃ pratigacchāma tāṃ purīm
analyzed: itas eva pathā kṣipram pratigacchāma tām purīm

original: 6.109.007c ayodhyām āyato hy eṣa panthāḥ paramadurgamaḥ
analyzed: ayodhyām āyataḥ hi eṣa panthāḥ parama durgamaḥ

original: 6.109.008a evam uktas tu kākutsthaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu kākutstham pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.109.008c ahnā tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi tāṃ purīṃ pārthivātmaja
analyzed: ahnā tvām prāpayiṣyāmi tām purīm pārthiva ātmaja

original: 6.109.009a puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
analyzed: puṣpakam nāma bhadram te vimānam sūrya saṃnibham
mama bhrātuḥ kuberasya rāvaṇena āhṛtam balāt

original: 6.109.010a tad idaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam iha tiṣṭhati
analyzed: tat idam megha saṃkāśam vimānam iha tiṣṭhati

original: 6.109.010c tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyāṃ gajajvaraḥ
analyzed: tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyām gaja jvaraḥ

original: 6.109.011a ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān
analyzed: aham te yadi anugrāhyaḥ yadi smarasi me guṇān

original: 6.109.011c vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam
analyzed: vasa tāvat iha prājña yadi asti mayi sauhṛdam

original: 6.109.012a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca api bhāryayā

original: 6.109.012c arcitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ tato rāma gamiṣyasi
analyzed: arcitaḥ sarva kāmaiḥ tvam tatas rāma gamiṣyasi

original: 6.109.013a prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ
analyzed: prīti yuktaḥ tu me rāma sa sainyaḥ sa suhṛd gaṇaḥ

original: 6.109.013c satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām
analyzed: satkriyām vihitām tāvat gṛhāṇa tvam mayā udyatām

original: 6.109.014a praṇayād bahumānāc ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava
analyzed: praṇayāt bahu mānāt ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava

original: 6.109.014c prasādayāmi preṣyo 'haṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi te
analyzed: prasādayāmi preṣyaḥ ham na khalu ājñāpayāmi te

original: 6.109.015a evam uktas tato rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tatas rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
rakṣasām vānarāṇām ca sarveṣām ca upaśṛṇvatām
pūjitaḥ ham tvayā vīra sācivyena paraṃtapa
sarva ātmanā ca ca iṣṭibhiḥ sauhṛdena uttamena ca

original: 6.109.017a na khalv etan na kuryāṃ te vacanaṃ rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: na khalu etat na kuryām te vacanam rākṣasa īśvara

original: 6.109.017c taṃ tu me bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ bharataṃ tvarate manaḥ
analyzed: tam tu me bhrātaram draṣṭum bharatam tvarate manaḥ
mām nivartayitum sau citrakūṭam upāgataḥ

original: 6.109.018c śirasā yācato yasya vacanaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: śirasā yācataḥ yasya vacanam na kṛtam mayā

original: 6.109.019a kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: kausalyām ca sumitrām ca kaikeyīm ca yaśasvinīm

original: 6.109.019c gurūṃś ca suhṛdaś caiva paurāṃś ca tanayaiḥ saha
analyzed: gurūn ca suhṛdaḥ ca eva paurān ca tanayaiḥ saha
upasthāpaya me kṣipram vimānam rākṣasa īśvara

original: 6.109.020c kṛtakāryasya me vāsaḥ kathaṃ cid iha saṃmataḥ
analyzed: kṛta kāryasya me vāsaḥ katham cit iha saṃmataḥ
anujānīhi mām saumya pūjitaḥ smi vibhīṣaṇa

original: 6.109.021c manyur na khalu kartavyas tvaritas tvānumānaye
analyzed: manyuḥ na khalu kartavyaḥ tvaritaḥ tvā anumānaye
tatas kāñcana citra aṅgam vaidūrya maṇi vedikam
kūṭāgāraiḥ parikṣiptam sarvatas rajata prabham
pāṇḍurābhiḥ patākābhiḥ dhvajaiḥ ca samalaṃkṛtam
śobhitam kāñcanaiḥ harmyaiḥ hema padma vibhūṣitam
prakīrṇam kiṅkiṇī jālaiḥ muktā maṇi gavākṣitam
ghaṇṭā jālaiḥ parikṣiptam sarvatas madhura svanam
tat meru śikhara ākāram nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā
bahubhiḥ bhūṣitam harmyaiḥ muktā rajata saṃnibhau
talaiḥ sphaṭika citra aṅgaiḥ vaidūryaiḥ ca varāsanaiḥ
mahārha āstaraṇa upetaiḥ upapannam mahādhanaiḥ
upasthitam anādhṛṣyam tat vimānam manojavam
nivedayitvā rāmāya tasthau tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.110.001a upasthitaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpakaṃ puṣpabhūṣitam
analyzed: upasthitam tu tam dṛṣṭvā puṣpakam puṣpa bhūṣitam
avidūre sthitam rāmam pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.110.002a sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo vinīto rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ vinītaḥ rākṣasa īśvaraḥ
abravīt tvarayā upetaḥ kim karomi iti rāghavam
tam abravīt mahā tejāḥ lakṣmaṇasya upaśṛṇvataḥ
vimṛśya rāghavaḥ vākyam idam sneha puraskṛtam
kṛta prayatna karmāṇaḥ vibhīṣaṇa vanaukasaḥ

original: 6.110.004c ratnair arthaiś ca vivibhair bhūṣaṇaiś cābhipūjaya
analyzed: ratnaiḥ arthaiḥ ca vivibhaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca abhipūjaya
saha ebhiḥ arditā laṅkā nirjitā rākṣasa īśvara
hṛṣṭaiḥ prāṇa bhayam tyaktvā saṃgrāmeṣu anivartibhiḥ

original: 6.110.006a evaṃ saṃmānitāś ceme mānārhā mānada tvayā
analyzed: evam saṃmānitāḥ ca ime māna arhāḥ māna da tvayā
bhaviṣyanti kṛtajñena nirvṛtāḥ hari yūthapāḥ
tyāginam saṃgrahītāram sa anukrośam yaśasvinam

original: 6.110.007c yatas tvām avagacchanti tataḥ saṃbodhayāmi te
analyzed: yatas tvām avagacchanti tatas saṃbodhayāmi te

original: 6.110.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vānarāṃs tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa vānarān tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ
ratna arthaiḥ saṃvibhāgena sarvān eva anvapūjayat

original: 6.110.009a tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnair arthaiś ca yūthapān
analyzed: tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnaiḥ arthaiḥ ca yūthapān

original: 6.110.009c āruroha tato rāmas tad vimānam anuttamam
analyzed: āruroha tatas rāmaḥ tat vimānam anuttamam
aṅkena ādāya vaidehīm lajjamānām yaśasvinīm
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vikrāntena dhanuṣmatā
abravīt ca vimāna sthaḥ kākutsthaḥ sarva vānarān

original: 6.110.011c sugrīvaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: sugrīvam ca mahā vīryam rākṣasam ca vibhīṣaṇam
mitra kāryam kṛtam idam bhavadbhiḥ vānara uttamāḥ
anujñātāḥ mayā sarve yatheṣṭam pratigacchata

original: 6.110.013a yat tu kāryaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
analyzed: yat tu kāryam vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa

original: 6.110.013c kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatā dharmabhīruṇā
analyzed: kṛtam sugrīva tat sarvam bhavatā dharma bhīruṇā
kiṣkindhām pratiyāhi āśu sva sainyena abhisaṃvṛtaḥ

original: 6.110.014a svarājye vasa laṅkāyāṃ mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa
analyzed: sva rājye vasa laṅkāyām mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa

original: 6.110.014c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ sendrā api divaukasaḥ
analyzed: na tvām dharṣayitum śaktāḥ sa indrāḥ api divaukasaḥ
ayodhyām pratiyāsyāmi rājadhānīm pituḥ mama
abhyanujñātum icchāmi sarvān āmantrayāmi vaḥ

original: 6.110.016a evam uktās tu rāmeṇa vānarās te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tu rāmeṇa vānarāḥ te mahā balāḥ

original: 6.110.016c ūcuḥ prāñjalayo rāmaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ rāmam rākṣasaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.110.016e ayodhyāṃ gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu no bhavān
analyzed: ayodhyām gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu naḥ bhavān

original: 6.110.017a dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣekārdraṃ kausalyām abhivādya ca
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣeka ārdram kausalyām abhivādya ca
acireṇa āgamiṣyāmaḥ svān gṛhān nṛpateḥ suta

original: 6.110.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā vānaraiḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaiḥ
abravīt rāghavaḥ śrīmān sa sugrīva vibhīṣaṇān

original: 6.110.019a priyāt priyataraṃ labdhaṃ yad ahaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
analyzed: priyāt priyataram labdham yat aham sa suhṛd janaḥ

original: 6.110.019c sarvair bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītiṃ lapsye purīṃ gataḥ
analyzed: sarvaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītim lapsye purīm gataḥ

original: 6.110.020a kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānaṃ vānaraiḥ saha
analyzed: kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānam vānaraiḥ saha
tvam adhyāroha sa amātyaḥ rākṣasa indra vibhīṣaṇa

original: 6.110.021a tatas tat puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saha senayā
analyzed: tatas tat puṣpakam divyam sugrīvaḥ saha senayā

original: 6.110.021c adhyārohat tvarañ śīghraṃ sāmātyaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: adhyārohat tvaram śīghram sa amātyaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
teṣu ārūḍheṣu sarveṣu kauberam parama āsanam
rāghaveṇa abhyanujñātam utpapāta vihāyasam
yayau tena vimānena haṃsa yuktena bhāsvatā

original: 6.110.023c prahṛṣṭaś ca pratītaś ca babhau rāmaḥ kuberavat
analyzed: prahṛṣṭaḥ ca pratītaḥ ca babhau rāmaḥ kubera vat

original: 6.111.001a anujñātaṃ tu rāmeṇa tad vimānam anuttamam
analyzed: anujñātam tu rāmeṇa tat vimānam anuttamam
utpapāta mahā meghaḥ śvasanena uddhataḥ yathā
pātayitvā tatas cakṣuḥ sarvatas raghunandanaḥ
abravīt maithilīm sītām rāmaḥ śaśi nibha ānanām
kailāsa śikhara ākāre trikūṭa śikhare sthitām
laṅkām īkṣasva vaidehi nirmitām viśvakarmaṇā
etat āyodhanam paśya māṃsa śoṇita kardamam

original: 6.111.004c harīṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sīte viśasanaṃ mahat
analyzed: harīṇām rākṣasānām ca sīte viśasanam mahat
tava hetoḥ viśāla akṣi rāvaṇaḥ nihataḥ mayā
kumbhakarṇaḥ nihataḥ prahastaḥ ca niśācaraḥ
lakṣmaṇena indrajit ca atra rāvaṇiḥ nihataḥ raṇe
virūpākṣaḥ ca duṣprekṣyaḥ mahāpārśva mahodarau

original: 6.111.007a akampanaś ca nihato balino 'nye ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: akampanaḥ ca nihataḥ balinaḥ nye ca rākṣasāḥ
triśirāḥ ca atikāyaḥ ca devāntaka narāntakau

original: 6.111.008a atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā taṃ paryadevayat
analyzed: atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā tam paryadevayat
sapatnīnām sahasreṇa sa asreṇa parivāritā

original: 6.111.009a etat tu dṛśyate tīrthaṃ samudrasya varānane
analyzed: etat tu dṛśyate tīrtham samudrasya varānane

original: 6.111.009c yatra sāgaram uttīrya tāṃ rātrim uṣitā vayam
analyzed: yatra sāgaram uttīrya tām rātrim uṣitāḥ vayam

original: 6.111.010a eṣa setur mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
analyzed: eṣa setuḥ mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salila arṇave
tava hetoḥ viśāla akṣi nalasetuḥ su duṣkaraḥ
paśya sāgaram akṣobhyam vaidehi varuṇālayam
apāram abhigarjantam śaṅkha śukti niṣevitam
hiraṇyanābham śaila indram kāñcanam paśya maithili
viśrama artham hanumataḥ bhittvā sāgaram utthitam
atra rākṣasa rājaḥ yam ājagāma vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.111.014a eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citrakānanā
analyzed: eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citra kānanā

original: 6.111.014c sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ
analyzed: sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ

original: 6.111.015a dṛśyate 'sau mahān sīte savidyud iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: dṛśyate sau mahān sīte sa vidyut iva toyadaḥ
ṛśyamūkaḥ giri śreṣṭhaḥ kāñcanaiḥ dhātubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
atra aham vānara indreṇa sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ

original: 6.111.016c samayaś ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadhārthaṃ vālino mayā
analyzed: samayaḥ ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadha artham vālinaḥ mayā

original: 6.111.017a eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citrakānanā
analyzed: eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citra kānanā
tvayā vihīnaḥ yatra aham vilalāpa su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 6.111.018a asyās tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharmacāriṇī
analyzed: asyāḥ tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharma cāriṇī

original: 6.111.018c atra yojanabāhuś ca kabandho nihato mayā
analyzed: atra yojana bāhuḥ ca kabandhaḥ nihataḥ mayā
dṛśyate sau janasthāne sīte śrīmān vanaspatiḥ

original: 6.111.019c yatra yuddhaṃ mahad vṛttaṃ tavahetor vilāsini
analyzed: yatra yuddham mahat vṛttam tava hetoḥ vilāsini
rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya jaṭāyoḥ ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.111.020a kharaś ca nihataś saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaḥ ca nipātitaḥ

original: 6.111.020c triśirāś ca mahāvīryo mayā bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
analyzed: triśirāḥ ca mahā vīryaḥ mayā bāṇaiḥ ajihmagaiḥ
parṇa śālā tathā citrā dṛśyate śubha darśanā

original: 6.111.021c yatra tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
analyzed: yatra tvam rākṣasa indreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
eṣā godāvarī ramyā prasanna salilā śivā

original: 6.111.022c agastyasyāśramo hy eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili
analyzed: agastyasya āśramaḥ hi eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili
vaidehi dṛśyate ca atra śarabhaṅga āśramaḥ mahān
upayātaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ yatra śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ
ete te tāpasa āvāsāḥ dṛśyante tanu madhyame
atriḥ kula patiḥ yatra sūrya vaiśvānara prabhaḥ

original: 6.111.024e atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
analyzed: atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharma cāriṇī

original: 6.111.025a asmin deśe mahākāyo virādho nihato mayā
analyzed: asmin deśe mahā kāyaḥ virādhaḥ nihataḥ mayā
asau su tanu śaila indraḥ citrakūṭaḥ prakāśate
yatra mām kaikayī putraḥ prasādayitum āgataḥ

original: 6.111.027a eṣā sā yamunā dūrād dṛśyate citrakānanā
analyzed: eṣā sā yamunā dūrāt dṛśyate citra kānanā
bharadvāja āśramaḥ yatra śrīmān eṣa prakāśate
eṣā tripathagā gaṅgā dṛśyate varavarṇini
śṛṅgavera puram ca etat guhaḥ yatra samāgataḥ

original: 6.111.029a eṣā sā dṛśyate 'yodhyā rājadhānī pitur mama
analyzed: eṣā sā dṛśyate yodhyā rājadhānī pituḥ mama

original: 6.111.029c ayodhyāṃ kuru vaidehi praṇāmaṃ punar āgatā
analyzed: ayodhyām kuru vaidehi praṇāmam punar āgatā

original: 6.111.030a tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
utpatya utpatya dadṛśuḥ tām purīm śubha darśanām
tatas tu tām pāṇḍura harmya mālinīm
viśāla kakṣyām gaja vāji saṃkulām
purīm ayodhyām dadṛśuḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
purīm mahā indrasya yathā amarāvatīm
pūrṇe caturdaśe varṣe pañcabhyām lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ
bharadvāja āśramam prāpya vavande niyataḥ munim
saḥ pṛcchat abhivādya enam bharadvājam tapodhanam

original: 6.112.002c śṛṇoṣi ka cid bhagavan subhikṣānāmayaṃ pure
analyzed: śṛṇoṣi ka cit bhagavan subhikṣa anāmayam pure

original: 6.112.002e kaccic ca yukto bharato jīvanty api ca mātaraḥ
analyzed: kaccit ca yuktaḥ bharataḥ jīvanti api ca mātaraḥ

original: 6.112.003a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa bharadvājaḥ mahā muniḥ
pratyuvāca raghu śreṣṭham smita pūrvam prahṛṣṭa vat

original: 6.112.004a paṅkadigdhas tu bharato jaṭilas tvāṃ pratīkṣate
analyzed: paṅka digdhaḥ tu bharataḥ jaṭilaḥ tvām pratīkṣate

original: 6.112.004c pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ gṛhe
analyzed: pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvam ca kuśalam gṛhe
tvām purā cīra vasanam praviśantam mahā vanam

original: 6.112.005c strītṛtīyaṃ cyutaṃ rājyād dharmakāmaṃ ca kevalam
analyzed: strī tṛtīyam cyutam rājyāt dharma kāmam ca kevalam
padātim tyakta sarvasvam pituḥ vacana kāriṇam
svarga bhogaiḥ parityaktam svarga cyutam iva amaram

original: 6.112.007a dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvaṃ mamāsīt samitiṃjaya
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvam mama āsīt samitiṃjaya
kaikeyī vacane yuktam vanya mūla phala aśanam
sāmpratam su samṛddha artham sa mitra gaṇa bāndhavam

original: 6.112.008c samīkṣya vijitāriṃ tvāṃ mama prītir anuttamā
analyzed: samīkṣya vijita arim tvām mama prītiḥ anuttamā

original: 6.112.009a sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ te viditaṃ mama rāghava
analyzed: sarvam ca sukha duḥkham te viditam mama rāghava
yat tvayā vipulam prāptam janasthāna vadha ādikam
brāhmaṇa arthe niyuktasya rakṣataḥ sarva tāpasān
mārīca darśanam ca eva sītā unmathanam eva ca
kabandha darśanam ca eva pampā abhigamanam tathā

original: 6.112.011c sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyaṃ yac ca vālī hatas tvayā
analyzed: sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyam yat ca vālī hataḥ tvayā

original: 6.112.012a mārgaṇaṃ caiva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca
analyzed: mārgaṇam ca eva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca

original: 6.112.012c viditāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ nalasetur yathā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: viditāyām ca vaidehyām nalasetuḥ yathā kṛtaḥ

original: 6.112.012e yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭair hariyūthapaiḥ
analyzed: yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭaiḥ hari yūthapaiḥ
sa putra bāndhava amātyaḥ sa balaḥ saha vāhanaḥ

original: 6.112.013c yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ
analyzed: yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇaḥ deva kaṇṭakaḥ

original: 6.112.014a samāgamaś ca tridaśair yathādattaś ca te varaḥ
analyzed: samāgamaḥ ca tridaśaiḥ yathā dattaḥ ca te varaḥ
sarvam mama etat viditam tapasā dharma vatsala

original: 6.112.015a aham apy atra te dadmi varaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: aham api atra te dadmi varam śastrabhṛtām vara
arghyam pratigṛhāṇa idam ayodhyām śvas gamiṣyasi

original: 6.112.016a tasya tac chirasā vākyaṃ pratigṛhya nṛpātmajaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat śirasā vākyam pratigṛhya nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: 6.112.016c bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata
akāla phalinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ sarve ca api madhu sravāḥ

original: 6.112.017c bhavantu mārge bhagavann ayodhyāṃ prati gacchataḥ
analyzed: bhavantu mārge bhagavan ayodhyām prati gacchataḥ
niṣphalāḥ phalinaḥ ca āsan vipuṣpāḥ puṣpa śālinaḥ

original: 6.112.018c śuṣkāḥ samagrapatrās te nagāś caiva madhusravāḥ
analyzed: śuṣkāḥ samagra patrāḥ te nagāḥ ca eva madhu sravāḥ

original: 6.113.001a ayodhyāṃ tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: ayodhyām tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
cintayitvā tatas dṛṣṭim vānareṣu nyapātayat
priya kāmaḥ priyam rāmaḥ tatas tvarita vikramam
uvāca dhīmān tejasvī hanūmantam plavaṃgamam

original: 6.113.003a ayodhyāṃ tvarito gaccha kṣipraṃ tvaṃ plavagottama
analyzed: ayodhyām tvaritaḥ gaccha kṣipram tvam plavaga uttama
jānīhi kaccit kuśalī janaḥ nṛpati mandire
śṛṅgavera puram prāpya guham gahana gocaram
niṣāda adhipatim brūhi kuśalam vacanāt mama

original: 6.113.005a śrutvā tu māṃ kuśalinam arogaṃ vigatajvaram
analyzed: śrutvā tu mām kuśalinam arogam vigata jvaram

original: 6.113.005c bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mamātmasamaḥ sakhā
analyzed: bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mama ātma samaḥ sakhā

original: 6.113.006a ayodhyāyāś ca te mārgaṃ pravṛttiṃ bharatasya ca
analyzed: ayodhyāyāḥ ca te mārgam pravṛttim bharatasya ca
nivedayiṣyati prītaḥ niṣāda adhipatiḥ guhaḥ

original: 6.113.007a bharatas tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalaṃ vacanān mama
analyzed: bharataḥ tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalam vacanāt mama

original: 6.113.007c siddhārthaṃ śaṃsa māṃ tasmai sabhāryaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: siddhārtham śaṃsa mām tasmai sa bhāryam sahalakṣmaṇam
haraṇam ca api vaidehyāḥ rāvaṇena balīyasā

original: 6.113.008c sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādaṃ vālinaś ca vadhaṃ raṇe
analyzed: sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādam vālinaḥ ca vadham raṇe
maithilī anveṣaṇam ca eva yathā ca adhigatā tvayā
laṅghayitvā mahā toyam āpagā patim avyayam
upayānam samudrasya sāgarasya ca darśanam

original: 6.113.010c yathā ca kāritaḥ setū rāvaṇaś ca yathā hataḥ
analyzed: yathā ca kāritaḥ setuḥ rāvaṇaḥ ca yathā hataḥ
vara dānam mahā indreṇa brahmaṇā varuṇena ca
mahādeva prasādāt ca pitrā mama samāgamam

original: 6.113.012a jitvā śatrugaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: jitvā śatru gaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya ca anuttamam yaśaḥ
upayāti samṛddha arthaḥ saha mitraiḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 6.113.013a etac chrutvā yamākāraṃ bhajate bharatas tataḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā yama ākāram bhajate bharataḥ tatas

original: 6.113.013c sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvaṃ yac cāpi māṃ prati
analyzed: sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvam yat ca api mām prati

original: 6.113.014a jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntā bharatasyeṅgitāni ca
analyzed: jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntāḥ bharatasya iṅgitāni ca
tattvena mukha varṇena dṛṣṭyā vyābhāṣaṇena ca
sarva kāma samṛddham hi hasti aśva ratha saṃkulam
pitṛpaitāmaham rājyam kasya na āvartayet manaḥ

original: 6.113.016a saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyenārthī svayaṃ bhavet
analyzed: saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyena arthī svayam bhavet
praśāstu vasudhām sarvām akhilām raghunandanaḥ

original: 6.113.017a tasya buddhiṃ ca vijñāya vyavasāyaṃ ca vānara
analyzed: tasya buddhim ca vijñāya vyavasāyam ca vānara

original: 6.113.017c yāvan na dūraṃ yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi
analyzed: yāvat na dūram yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi
iti pratisamādiṣṭaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 6.113.018c mānuṣaṃ dhārayan rūpam ayodhyāṃ tvarito yayau
analyzed: mānuṣam dhārayan rūpam ayodhyām tvaritaḥ yayau
laṅghayitvā pitṛpatham bhujaga indra ālayam śubham
gaṅgā yamunayoḥ bhīmam saṃnipātam atītya ca
śṛṅgavera puram prāpya guham āsādya vīryavān

original: 6.113.020c sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭo hanūmān idam abravīt
analyzed: sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭaḥ hanūmān idam abravīt

original: 6.113.021a sakhā tu tava kākutstho rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
analyzed: sakhā tu tava kākutsthaḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 6.113.021c sasītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvāṃ kuśalam abravīt
analyzed: sa sītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvām kuśalam abravīt

original: 6.113.022a pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanān muneḥ
analyzed: pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanāt muneḥ
bharadvāja abhyanujñātam drakṣyasi adyā eva rāghavam
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ saṃprahṛṣṭa tanūruhaḥ
utpapāta mahā vegaḥ vegavān a vicārayan

original: 6.113.024a so 'paśyad rāmatīrthaṃ ca nadīṃ vālukinīṃ tathā
analyzed: saḥ paśyat rāmatīrtham ca nadīm vālukinīm tathā

original: 6.113.024c gomatīṃ tāṃ ca so 'paśyad bhīmaṃ sālavanaṃ tathā
analyzed: gomatīm tām ca saḥ paśyat bhīmam sāla vanam tathā

original: 6.113.025a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tvaritaḥ kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā dūram adhvānam tvaritaḥ kapi kuñjaraḥ
āsasāda drumān phullān nandigrāma samīpa jān
krośa mātre tu ayodhyāyāḥ cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambaram
dadarśa bharatam dīnam kṛśam āśrama vāsinam
jaṭilam mala digdha aṅgam bhrātṛ vyasana karśitam
phala mūla āśinam dāntam tāpasam dharma cāriṇam
samunnata jaṭā bhāram valkala ajina vāsasam
niyatam bhāvitātmānam brahmarṣi sama tejasam

original: 6.113.029a pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantaṃ vai vasuṃdharām
analyzed: pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantam vai vasuṃdharām
caturvarṇyasya lokasya trātāram sarvatas bhayāt

original: 6.113.030a upasthitam amātyaiś ca śucibhiś ca purohitaiḥ
analyzed: upasthitam amātyaiḥ ca śucibhiḥ ca purohitaiḥ
bala mukhyaiḥ ca yuktaiḥ ca kāṣāya ambara dhāribhiḥ

original: 6.113.031a na hi te rājaputraṃ taṃ cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram
analyzed: na hi te rāja putram tam cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambaram
parimoktum vyavasyanti paurāḥ vai dharma vatsalāḥ

original: 6.113.032a taṃ dharmam iva dharmajñaṃ devavantam ivāparam
analyzed: tam dharmam iva dharma jñam devavantam iva aparam
uvāca prāñjaliḥ vākayam hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
vasantam daṇḍaka araṇye yam tvam cīra jaṭā dharam

original: 6.113.033c anuśocasi kākutsthaṃ sa tvā kuśalam abravīt
analyzed: anuśocasi kākutstham sa tvā kuśalam abravīt

original: 6.113.034a priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokaṃ tyakṣyasi dāruṇam
analyzed: priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokam tyakṣyasi dāruṇam

original: 6.113.034c asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvaṃ rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ
analyzed: asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvam rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ

original: 6.113.035a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm
analyzed: nihatya rāvaṇam rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm
upayāti samṛddha arthaḥ saha mitraiḥ mahā balaiḥ

original: 6.113.036a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā vaidehī ca yaśasvinī
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ vaidehī ca yaśasvinī

original: 6.113.036c sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahendreṇa śacī yathā
analyzed: sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahā indreṇa śacī yathā
evam uktaḥ hanumatā bharataḥ kaikayī sutaḥ

original: 6.113.037c papāta sahasā hṛṣṭo harṣān mohaṃ jagāma ha
analyzed: papāta sahasā hṛṣṭaḥ harṣāt moham jagāma ha

original: 6.113.038a tato muhūrtād utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tatas muhūrtāt utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ
hanūmantam uvāca idam bharataḥ priya vādinam
aśoka jaiḥ prīti mayaiḥ kapim āliṅgya saṃbhramāt
siṣeca bharataḥ śrīmān vipulaiḥ aśru bindubhiḥ

original: 6.113.040a devo vā mānuṣo vā tvam anukrośād ihāgataḥ
analyzed: devaḥ vā mānuṣaḥ vā tvam anukrośāt iha āgataḥ

original: 6.113.040c priyākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam
analyzed: priya ākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam

original: 6.113.041a gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ ca śataṃ param
analyzed: gavām śata sahasram ca grāmāṇām ca śatam param

original: 6.113.041c sakuṇḍalāḥ śubhācārā bhāryāḥ kanyāś ca ṣoḍaśa
analyzed: sa kuṇḍalāḥ śubha ācārāḥ bhāryāḥ kanyāḥ ca ṣoḍaśa
hema varṇāḥ su nāsā ūrūḥ śaśi saumya ānanāḥ striyaḥ
sarva ābharaṇa saṃpannā saṃpannāḥ kula jātibhiḥ
niśamya rāma āgamanam nṛpa ātmajaḥ
kapi pravīrasya tadā adbhuta upamam
praharṣitaḥ rāma didṛkṣayā abhavat

original: punaś ca harṣād idam abravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: punar ca harṣāt idam abravīt vacaḥ

original: 6.114.001a bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya sumahad vanam
analyzed: bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya su mahat vanam

original: 6.114.001c śṛṇomy ahaṃ prītikaraṃ mama nāthasya kīrtanam
analyzed: śṛṇomi aham prīti karam mama nāthasya kīrtanam

original: 6.114.002a kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
analyzed: kalyāṇī bata gāthā iyam laukikī pratibhāti me

original: 6.114.002c eti jīvantam ānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api
analyzed: eti jīvantam ānandaḥ naram varṣa śatāt api

original: 6.114.003a rāghavasya harīṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya harīṇām ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ

original: 6.114.003c kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
analyzed: kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
sa pṛṣṭaḥ rāja putreṇa bṛsyām samupaveśitaḥ

original: 6.114.004c ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ vane
analyzed: ācacakṣe tatas sarvam rāmasya caritam vane

original: 6.114.005a yathā pravrajito rāmo mātur datte vare tava
analyzed: yathā pravrajitaḥ rāmaḥ mātuḥ datte vare tava

original: 6.114.005c yathā ca putraśokena rājā daśaratho mṛtaḥ
analyzed: yathā ca putra śokena rājā daśarathaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: 6.114.006a yathā dūtais tvam ānītas tūrṇaṃ rājagṛhāt prabho
analyzed: yathā dūtaiḥ tvam ānītaḥ tūrṇam rāja gṛhāt prabho

original: 6.114.006c tvayāyodhyāṃ praviṣṭena yathā rājyaṃ na cepsitam
analyzed: tvayā ayodhyām praviṣṭena yathā rājyam na ca īpsitam
citrakūṭam girim gatvā rājyena amitra karśanaḥ

original: 6.114.007c nimantritas tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām
analyzed: nimantritaḥ tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām

original: 6.114.008a sthitena rājño vacane yathā rājyaṃ visarjitam
analyzed: sthitena rājñaḥ vacane yathā rājyam visarjitam

original: 6.114.008c āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathāsi punar āgataḥ
analyzed: āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathā asi punar āgataḥ

original: 6.114.009a sarvam etan mahābāho yathāvad viditaṃ tava
analyzed: sarvam etat mahā bāho yathāvat viditam tava

original: 6.114.009c tvayi pratiprayāte tu yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me
analyzed: tvayi pratiprayāte tu yat vṛttam tat nibodha me
apayāte tvayi tadā samudbhrānta mṛga dvijam
praviveśa atha vijanam su mahat daṇḍaka vanam

original: 6.114.011a teṣāṃ purastād balavān gacchatāṃ gahane vane
analyzed: teṣām purastāt balavān gacchatām gahane vane
vinadan su mahā nādam virādhaḥ pratyadṛśyata
tam utkṣipya mahā nādam ūrdhva bāhum adhomukham

original: 6.114.012c nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram
analyzed: nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram

original: 6.114.013a tat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tat kṛtvā duṣkaram karma bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
sāyāhne śarabhaṅgasya ramyam āśramam īyatuḥ
śarabhaṅge divam prāpte rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
abhivādya munīn sarvām janasthānam upāgamat
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
hatāni vasatā tatra rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
tatas paścāt śūrpaṇakhā rāma pārśvam upāgatā
tatas rāmeṇa saṃdiṣṭaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ sahasā utthitaḥ
pragṛhya khaḍgam ciccheda karṇa nāse mahā balaḥ
tatas tena arditā bālā rāvaṇam samupāgatā
rāvaṇa anucaraḥ ghoraḥ mārīcaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 6.114.018c lobhayām āsa vaidehīṃ bhūtvā ratnamayo mṛgaḥ
analyzed: lobhayām āsa vaidehīm bhūtvā ratna mayaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: 6.114.019a sā rāmam abravīd dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti
analyzed: sā rāmam abravīt dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti

original: 6.114.019c aho manoharaḥ kānta āśrame no bhaviṣyati
analyzed: aho manoharaḥ kāntaḥ āśrame naḥ bhaviṣyati
tatas rāmaḥ dhanuṣpāṇiḥ dhāvantam anudhāvati
sa tam jaghāna dhāvantam śareṇa ānata parvaṇā

original: 6.114.021a atha saumyā daśagrīvo mṛgaṃ yāte tu rāghave
analyzed: atha saumyā daśagrīvaḥ mṛgam yāte tu rāghave
lakṣmaṇe ca api niṣkrānte praviveśa āśramam tadā

original: 6.114.021e jagrāha tarasā sītāṃ grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
analyzed: jagrāha tarasā sītām grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva

original: 6.114.022a trātukāmaṃ tato yuddhe hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: trātu kāmam tatas yuddhe hatvā gṛdhram jaṭāyuṣam

original: 6.114.022c pragṛhya sītāṃ sahasā jagāmāśu sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: pragṛhya sītām sahasā jagāma āśu sa rāvaṇaḥ
tatas tu adbhuta saṃkāśāḥ sthitāḥ parvata mūrdhani
sītām gṛhītvā gacchantam vānarāḥ parvata upamāḥ
dadṛśuḥ vismitāḥ tatra rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam
praviverśa tadā laṅkām rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇaḥ
tām suvarṇa parikrānte śubhe mahati veśmani

original: 6.114.025c praveśya maithilīṃ vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: praveśya maithilīm vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
nivartamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ dṛṣṭvā gṛdhram pravivyathe

original: 6.114.027a gṛdhraṃ hataṃ tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priyasakhaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: gṛdhram hatam tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priya sakham pituḥ
godāvarīm anucaran vana uddeśān ca puṣpitān
āsedatuḥ mahā araṇye kabandham nāma rākṣasam
tatas kabandha vacanāt rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
ṛśyamūkam girim gatvā sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ

original: 6.114.029a tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvaṃ prītyā hārdo vyajāyata
analyzed: tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvam prītyā hārdaḥ vyajāyata
itaretara saṃvādāt pragāḍhaḥ praṇayaḥ tayoḥ
rāmaḥ sva bāhu vīryeṇa sva rājyam pratyapādayat
vālinam samare hatvā mahā kāyam mahā balam
sugrīvaḥ sthāpitaḥ rājye sahitaḥ sarva vānaraiḥ
rāmāya pratijānīte rāja putryāḥ tu mārgaṇam
ādiṣṭāḥ vānara indreṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
daśa koṭyaḥ plavaṃgānām sarvāḥ prasthāpitāḥ diśaḥ
teṣām naḥ vipranaṣṭānām vindhye parvata sattame
bhṛśam śoka abhitaptānām mahān tyavartata

original: 6.114.034a bhrātā tu gṛdhrarājasya saṃpātir nāma vīryavān
analyzed: bhrātā tu gṛdhra rājasya saṃpātiḥ nāma vīryavān
samākhyāti sma vasatim sītāyāḥ rāvaṇa ālaye
saḥ ham duḥkha parītānām duḥkham tad jñātinām nudan
ātma vīryam samāsthāya yojanānām śatam plutaḥ
tatra aham ekām adrākṣam aśoka vanikām gatām
kauśeya vastrām malinām nirānandām dṛḍha vratām

original: 6.114.037a tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām
analyzed: tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām
abhijñānam maṇim labdhvā caritārthaḥ ham āgataḥ
mayā ca punar āgamya rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 6.114.038c abhijñānaṃ mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahāmaṇiḥ
analyzed: abhijñānam mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahā maṇiḥ

original: 6.114.039a śrutvā tāṃ maithilīṃ hṛṣṭas tv āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam
analyzed: śrutvā tām maithilīm hṛṣṭaḥ tu āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam
jīvita antam anuprāptaḥ pītvā amṛtam iva āturaḥ
udyojayiṣyan udyogam dadhre laṅkā vadhe manaḥ

original: 6.114.040c jighāṃsur iva lokāṃs te sarvāṃl lokān vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: jighāṃsuḥ iva lokān te sarvān lokān vibhāvasuḥ

original: 6.114.041a tataḥ samudram āsādya nalaṃ setum akārayat
analyzed: tatas samudram āsādya nalam setum akārayat
atarat kapi vīrāṇām vāhinī tena setunā

original: 6.114.042a prahastam avadhīn nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ tu rāghavaḥ
analyzed: prahastam avadhīt nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇam tu rāghavaḥ

original: 6.114.042c lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasutaṃ svayaṃ rāmas tu rāvaṇam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ rāvaṇa sutam svayam rāmaḥ tu rāvaṇam

original: 6.114.043a sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca
analyzed: sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca

original: 6.114.043c surarṣibhiś ca kākutstho varāṃl lebhe paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: sura ṛṣibhiḥ ca kākutsthaḥ varān lebhe paraṃtapaḥ

original: 6.114.044a sa tu dattavaraḥ prītyā vānaraiś ca samāgataḥ
analyzed: sa tu datta varaḥ prītyā vānaraiḥ ca samāgataḥ
puṣpakeṇa vimānena kiṣkindhām abhyupāgamat

original: 6.114.045a taṃ gaṅgāṃ punar āsādya vasantaṃ munisaṃnidhau
analyzed: tam gaṅgām punar āsādya vasantam muni saṃnidhau

original: 6.114.045c avighnaṃ puṣyayogena śvo rāmaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: avighnam puṣya yogena śvas rāmam draṣṭum arhasi
tatas sa satyam hanumat vacaḥ mahan
niśamya hṛṣṭaḥ bharataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
uvāca vāṇīm manasaḥ praharṣiṇī
cirasya pūrṇaḥ khalu me manorathaḥ

original: 6.115.001a śrutvā tu param ānandaṃ bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu param ānandam bharataḥ satya vikramaḥ
hṛṣṭam ājñāpayām āsa śatrughnam para vīra hā

original: 6.115.002a daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca
analyzed: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca
su gandha mālyaiḥ vāditraiḥ arcantu śucayaḥ narāḥ
rāja dārāḥ tathā amātyāḥ sainyāḥ senā gaṇa aṅganāḥ
abhiniryāntu rāmasya draṣṭum śaśi nibham mukham
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śatrughnaḥ para vīra hā
viṣṭīḥ aneka sāhasrīḥ codayām āsa vīryavān
samīkuruta nimnāni viṣamāṇi samāni ca

original: 6.115.005c sthānāni ca nirasyantāṃ nandigrāmād itaḥ param
analyzed: sthānāni ca nirasyantām nandigrāmāt itas param
siñcantu pṛthivīm kṛtsnām hima śītena vāriṇā

original: 6.115.006c tato 'bhyavakiraṃs tv anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiś ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: tatas bhyavakiran tu anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca sarvatas
samucchrita patākāḥ tu rathyāḥ puravara uttame
śobhayantu ca veśmāni sūryasya udayanam prati
sraj dāma mukta puṣpaiḥ ca su gandhaiḥ pañca varṇakaiḥ
rājamārgam asaṃbādham kirantu śataśas narāḥ
mattaiḥ nāga sahasraiḥ ca śātakumbha vibhūṣitaḥ
apare hema kakṣyābhiḥ sa gajābhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ

original: 6.115.009e niryayus tvarayā yuktā rathaiś ca sumahārathāḥ
analyzed: niryayuḥ tvarayā yuktāḥ rathaiḥ ca su mahā rathāḥ
tatas yānāni upārūḍhāḥ sarvāḥ daśaratha striyaḥ

original: 6.115.010c kausalyāṃ pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ
analyzed: kausalyām pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrām ca api niryayuḥ
aśvānām khura śabdena ratha nemi svanena ca
śaṅkha dundubhi nādena saṃcacāla iva medinī

original: 6.115.012a kṛtsnaṃ ca nagaraṃ tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat
analyzed: kṛtsnam ca nagaram tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat
dvijāti mukhyaiḥ dharma ātmā śreṇī mukhyaiḥ sa naigamaiḥ

original: 6.115.013a mālyamodaka hastaiś ca mantribhir bharato vṛtaḥ
analyzed: mālya modaka hastaiḥ ca mantribhiḥ bharataḥ vṛtaḥ
śaṅkha bherī ninādaiḥ ca bandibhiḥ ca abhivanditaḥ
ārya pādau gṛhītvā tu śirasā dharma kovidaḥ
pāṇḍuram chatram ādāya śukla mālya upaśobhitam
śukle ca vāla vyajane rāja arhe hema bhūṣite
upavāsa kṛśaḥ dīnaḥ cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambaraḥ

original: 6.115.016a bhrātur āgamanaṃ śrutvā tat pūrvaṃ harṣam āgataḥ
analyzed: bhrātuḥ āgamanam śrutvā tat pūrvam harṣam āgataḥ

original: 6.115.016c pratyudyayau tadā rāmaṃ mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: pratyudyayau tadā rāmam mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha
samīkṣya bharataḥ vākyam uvāca pavanātmajam

original: 6.115.017c kaccin na khalu kāpeyī sevyate calacittatā
analyzed: kaccit na khalu kāpeyī sevyate cala citta tā

original: 6.115.017e na hi paśyāmi kākutsthaṃ rāmam āryaṃ paraṃtapam
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi kākutstham rāmam āryam paraṃtapam

original: 6.115.018a athaivam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt
analyzed: athā evam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt
artham vijñāpayan eva bharatam satya vikramam

original: 6.115.019a sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhusravān
analyzed: sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhu sravān
bharadvāja prasādena matta bhramara nāditān

original: 6.115.020a tasya caiṣa varo datto vāsavena paraṃtapa
analyzed: tasya ca eṣa varaḥ dattaḥ vāsavena paraṃtapa
sa sainyasya tat ātithyam kṛtam sarva guṇa anvitam
nisvanaḥ śrūyate bhīmaḥ prahṛṣṭānām vanaukasām

original: 6.115.021c manye vānarasenā sā nadīṃ tarati gomatīm
analyzed: manye vānara senā sā nadīm tarati gomatīm
rajaḥ varṣam samudbhūtam paśya vālukinīm prati
manye sāla vanam ramyam lolayanti plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 6.115.023a tad etad dṛśyate dūrād vimalaṃ candrasaṃnibham
analyzed: tat etat dṛśyate dūrāt vimalam candra saṃnibham
vimānam puṣpakam divyam manasā brahma nirmitam

original: 6.115.024a rāvaṇaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ hatvā labdhaṃ mahātmanā
analyzed: rāvaṇam bāndhavaiḥ sārdham hatvā labdham mahātmanā
dhanadasya prasādena divyam etat manojavam

original: 6.115.025a etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau
analyzed: etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau
sugrīvaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ rākṣasa indraḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
tatas harṣa samudbhūtaḥ nisvanaḥ divam aspṛśat
strī bāla yuva vṛddhānām rāmaḥ yam iti kīrtitaḥ
ratha kuñjara vājibhyaḥ te vatīrya mahīm gatāḥ

original: 6.115.027c dadṛśus taṃ vimānasthaṃ narāḥ somam ivāmbare
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ tam vimāna stham narāḥ somam iva ambare
prāñjaliḥ bharataḥ bhūtvā prahṛṣṭaḥ rāghava unmukhaḥ
svāgatena yathārthena tatas rāmam apūjayat
manasā brahmaṇā sṛṣṭe vimāne lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ
rarāja pṛthu dīrgha akṣaḥ vajrapāṇiḥ iva aparaḥ
tatas vimāna agra gatam bharataḥ bhrātaram tadā

original: 6.115.030c vavande praṇato rāmaṃ merustham iva bhāskaram
analyzed: vavande praṇataḥ rāmam meru stham iva bhāskaram
āropitaḥ vimānam tat bharataḥ satya vikramaḥ
rāmam āsādya muditaḥ punar eva abhyavādayat
tam samutthāpya kākutsthaḥ cirasya akṣi patham gatam
aṅke bharatam āropya muditaḥ pariṣaṣvaje

original: 6.115.033a tato lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīṃ ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: tatas lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīm ca paraṃtapaḥ
abhyavādayata prītaḥ bharataḥ nāma ca abravīt
sugrīvam kaikayī putraḥ jāmbavantam tathā aṅgadam

original: 6.115.034c maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlam ṛṣabhaṃ caiva sasvaje
analyzed: maindam ca dvividam nīlam ṛṣabham ca eva sasvaje

original: 6.115.035a te kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: te kṛtvā mānuṣam rūpam vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
kuśalam paryapṛṣhanta prahṛṣṭāḥ bharatam tadā

original: 6.115.036a vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇam ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt

original: 6.115.036c diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtam karma su duṣkaram

original: 6.115.037a śatrughnaś ca tadā rāmam abhivādya salakṣmaṇam
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ ca tadā rāmam abhivādya sa lakṣmaṇam
sītāyāḥ caraṇau paścāt vavande vinaya anvitaḥ
rāmaḥ mātaram āsādya viṣaṇṇam śoka karśitām

original: 6.115.038c jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau mano mātuḥ prasādayan
analyzed: jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau manaḥ mātuḥ prasādayan

original: 6.115.039a abhivādya sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: abhivādya sumitrām ca kaikeyīm ca yaśasvinīm

original: 6.115.039c sa mātṝś ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat
analyzed: sa mātṝḥ ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat
svāgatam te mahā bāho kausalyā ānanda vardhana

original: 6.115.040c iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarā rāmam abruvan
analyzed: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarāḥ rāmam abruvan
tani añjali sahasrāṇi pragṛhītāni nāgaraiḥ
ākośāni iva padmāni dadarśa bharatāgrajaḥ

original: 6.115.042a pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam
analyzed: pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam
caraṇābhyām narendrasya yojayām āsa dharma vid

original: 6.115.043a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmam bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 6.115.043c etat te rakṣitaṃ rājan rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ mayā
analyzed: etat te rakṣitam rājan rājyam niryātitam mayā

original: 6.115.044a adya janma kṛtārthaṃ me saṃvṛttaś ca manorathaḥ
analyzed: adya janma kṛtārtham me saṃvṛttaḥ ca manorathaḥ

original: 6.115.044c yas tvāṃ paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam
analyzed: yaḥ tvām paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyām punar āgatam

original: 6.115.045a avekṣatāṃ bhavān kośaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ puraṃ balam
analyzed: avekṣatām bhavān kośam koṣṭhāgāram puram balam

original: 6.115.045c bhavatas tejasā sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ daśaguṇaṃ mayā
analyzed: bhavataḥ tejasā sarvam kṛtam daśaguṇam mayā

original: 6.115.046a tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhrātṛvatsalam
analyzed: tathā bruvāṇam bharatam dṛṣṭvā tam bhrātṛ vatsalam

original: 6.115.046c mumucur vānarā bāṣpaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ vānarāḥ bāṣpam rākṣasaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 6.115.047a tataḥ praharṣād bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tatas praharṣāt bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
yayau tena vimānena sa sainyaḥ bharata āśramam
bharata āśramam āsādya sa sainyaḥ rāghavaḥ tadā
avatīrya vimāna agrāt avatasthe mahī tale

original: 6.115.049a abravīc ca tadā rāmas tadvimānam anuttamam
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā rāmaḥ tat vimānam anuttamam
vaha vaiśravaṇam devam anujānāmi gamyatām
tatas rāma abhyanujñātam tat vimānam anuttamam
uttarām diśam uddiśya jagāma dhanada ālayam
purohitasya ātma samasya rāghavo
bṛhaspateḥ śakraḥ iva amarādhīaph
nipīḍya pādau pṛthak āsane śubhe
saha eva tena upaviveśa vīryavān
śirasi añjalim ādāya kaikeyī nandivardhanaḥ
babhāṣe bharataḥ jyeṣṭham rāmam satya parākramam

original: 6.116.002a pūjitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
analyzed: pūjitā māmikā mātā dattam rājyam idam mama

original: 6.116.002c tad dadāmi punas tubhyaṃ yathā tvam adadā mama
analyzed: tat dadāmi punar tubhyam yathā tvam adadāḥ mama
dhuram ekākinā nyastām ṛṣabheṇa balīyasā

original: 6.116.003c kiśoravad guruṃ bhāraṃ na voḍhum aham utsahe
analyzed: kiśora vat gurum bhāram na voḍhum aham utsahe

original: 6.116.004a vārivegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setur iva kṣaran
analyzed: vāri vegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setuḥ iva kṣaran
durbandhanam idam manye rājya chidram asaṃvṛtam

original: 6.116.005a gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya haṃsasyeva ca vāyasaḥ
analyzed: gatim kharaḥ iva aśvasya haṃsasya iva ca vāyasaḥ

original: 6.116.005c nānvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama
analyzed: na anvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama

original: 6.116.006a yathā ca ropito vṛkṣo jātaś cāntarniveśane
analyzed: yathā ca ropitaḥ vṛkṣaḥ jātaḥ ca antar niveśane
mahān ca su durārohaḥ mahā skandhaḥ praśākhavān

original: 6.116.007a śīryeta puṣpito bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet
analyzed: śīryeta puṣpitaḥ bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet

original: 6.116.007c tasya nānubhaved arthaṃ yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate
analyzed: tasya na anubhavet artham yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate

original: 6.116.008a eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
analyzed: eṣā upamā mahā bāho tvam artham vettum arhasi

original: 6.116.008c yady asmān manujendra tvaṃ bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
analyzed: yadi asmān manuja indra tvam bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
jagat adya abhiṣiktam tvām anupaśyatu sarvatas
pratapantam iva ādityam madhyāhne dīpta tejasam
tūrya saṃghāta nirghoṣaiḥ kāñcī nūpura nisvanaiḥ

original: 6.116.010c madhurair gītaśabdaiś ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca
analyzed: madhuraiḥ gīta śabdaiḥ ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca

original: 6.116.011a yāvad āvartate cakraṃ yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā
analyzed: yāvat āvartate cakram yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā

original: 6.116.011c tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmitvam abhivartaya
analyzed: tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmi tvam abhivartaya
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
tathā iti pratijagrāha niṣasāda āsane śubhe
tatas śatrughna vacanāt nipuṇāḥ śmaśru vardhakāḥ
sukha hastāḥ su śīghrāḥ ca rāghavam paryupāsata

original: 6.116.014a pūrvaṃ tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahābale
analyzed: pūrvam tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahā bale
sugrīve vānara indre ca rākṣasa indre vibhīṣaṇe
viśodhita jaṭaḥ snātaḥ citra mālya anulepanaḥ
mahārha vasana upetaḥ tasthau tatra śriyā jvalan

original: 6.116.016a pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān
analyzed: pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān
lakṣmaṇasya ca lakṣmīvān ikṣvāku kula vardhanaḥ
pratikarma ca sītāyāḥ sarvāḥ daśaratha striyaḥ
ātmanā eva tadā cakruḥ manasvinyaḥ manoharam
tatas rāghava patnīnām sarvāsām eva śobhanam
cakāra yatnāt kausalyā prahṛṣṭā putra vatsalā
tatas śatrughna vacanāt sumantraḥ nāma sārathiḥ
yojayitvā abhicakrāma ratham sarva aṅga śobhanam
arka maṇḍala saṃkāśam divyam dṛṣṭvā ratham sthitam
āruroha mahā bāhuḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 6.116.021a ayodhyāyāṃ tu sacivā rājño daśarathasya ye
analyzed: ayodhyāyām tu sacivāḥ rājñaḥ daśarathasya ye
purohitam puraskṛtya mantrayām āsuḥ arthavat
mantrayan rāma vṛddhi artham vṛtti artham nagarasya ca
sarvam eva abhiṣeka artham jaya arhasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.116.022e kartum arhatha rāmasya yad yan maṅgalapūrvakam
analyzed: kartum arhatha rāmasya yat yat maṅgala pūrvakam

original: 6.116.023a iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam
analyzed: iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam
nagarāt niryayuḥ tūrṇam rāma darśana buddhayaḥ
hari yuktam sahasra akṣaḥ ratham indraḥ iva anaghaḥ

original: 6.116.024c prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmo nagaram uttamam
analyzed: prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmaḥ nagaram uttamam

original: 6.116.025a jagrāha bharato raśmīñ śatrughnaś chatram ādade
analyzed: jagrāha bharataḥ raśmīm śatrughnaḥ chatram ādade
lakṣmaṇaḥ vyajanam tasya mūrdhni saṃparyavījayat
śvetam ca vāla vyajanam sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ
aparam candra saṃkāśam rākṣasa indraḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
ṛṣi saṃghaiḥ tad ākāśe devaiḥ ca sa marut gaṇaiḥ
stūyamānasya rāmasya śuśruve madhura dhvaniḥ
tatas śatruṃjayam nāma kuñjaram parvata upamam
āruroha mahā tejāḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ
nava nāga sahasrāṇi yayuḥ āsthāya vānarāḥ
mānuṣam vigraham kṛtvā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
śaṅkha śabda praṇādaiḥ ca dundubhīnām ca nisvanaiḥ
prayayuḥ puruṣa vyāghraḥ tām purīm harmya mālinīm
dadṛśuḥ te samāyāntam rāghavam sa puraḥsaram
virājamānam vapuṣā rathena atiratham tadā
te vardhayitvā kākutstham rāmeṇa pratinanditāḥ
anujagmuḥ mahātmānam bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritam

original: 6.116.033a amātyair brāhmaṇaiś caiva tathā prakṛtibhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: amātyaiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ ca eva tathā prakṛtibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 6.116.033c śriyā viruruce rāmo nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
analyzed: śriyā viruruce rāmaḥ nakṣatraiḥ iva candramāḥ
sa purogāmibhiḥ tūryaiḥ tāla svastika pāṇibhiḥ
pravyāharadbhiḥ muditaiḥ maṅgalāni yayau vṛtaḥ

original: 6.116.035a akṣataṃ jātarūpaṃ ca gāvaḥ kanyās tathā dvijāḥ
analyzed: akṣatam jātarūpam ca gāvaḥ kanyāḥ tathā dvijāḥ

original: 6.116.035c narā modakahastāś ca rāmasya purato yayuḥ
analyzed: narāḥ modaka hastāḥ ca rāmasya puratas yayuḥ

original: 6.116.036a sakhyaṃ ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvaṃ cānilātmaje
analyzed: sakhyam ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvam ca anilātmaje

original: 6.116.036c vānarāṇāṃ ca tat karma vyācacakṣe 'tha mantriṇām
analyzed: vānarāṇām ca tat karma vyācacakṣe tha mantriṇām
śrutvā ca vismayam jagmuḥ ayodhyā pura vāsinaḥ
dyutimān etat ākhyāya rāmaḥ vānara saṃvṛtaḥ
hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇām ayodhyām praviveśa ha

original: 6.116.038a tato hy abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākās te gṛhe gṛhe
analyzed: tatas hi abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākāḥ te gṛhe gṛhe
aikṣvāka adhyuṣitam ramyam āsasāda pituḥ gṛham

original: 6.116.039a pitur bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 6.116.039c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
analyzed: kausalyām ca sumitrām ca kaikeyīm ca abhyavādayat
athā abravīt rāja putraḥ bharatam dharmiṇām varam
atha upahitayā vācā madhuram raghunandanaḥ

original: 6.116.041a yac ca madbhavanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sāśokavanikaṃ mahat
analyzed: yat ca mad bhavanam śreṣṭham sa aśoka vanikam mahat
muktā vaidūrya saṃkīrṇam sugrīvasya nivedaya
