tasya tat vacanam śrutvā bharataḥ satya vikramaḥ

original: 6.116.042c pāṇau gṛhītvā sugrīvaṃ praviveśa tam ālayam
analyzed: pāṇau gṛhītvā sugrīvam praviveśa tam ālayam
tatas taila pradīpān ca paryaṅka āstaraṇāni ca
gṛhītvā viviśuḥ kṣipram śatrughnena pracoditāḥ
uvāca ca mahā tejāḥ sugrīvam rāghava anujaḥ
abhiṣekāya rāmasya dūtān ājñāpaya prabho
sauvarṇān vānara indrāṇām caturṇām caturaḥ ghaṭān
dadau kṣipram sa sugrīvaḥ sarva ratna vibhūṣitān
yathā pratyūṣa samaye caturṇām sāgara ambhasām

original: 6.116.046c pūrṇair ghaṭaiḥ pratīkṣadhvaṃ tathā kuruta vānarāḥ
analyzed: pūrṇaiḥ ghaṭaiḥ pratīkṣadhvam tathā kuruta vānarāḥ
evam uktāḥ mahātmānaḥ vānarāḥ vāraṇa upamāḥ

original: 6.116.047c utpetur gaganaṃ śīghraṃ garuḍā iva śīghragāḥ
analyzed: utpetuḥ gaganam śīghram garuḍāḥ iva śīghra gāḥ

original: 6.116.048a jāmbavāṃś ca hanūmāṃś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān ca hanūmān ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva kalaśām jala pūrṇān atha anayan
nadī śatānām pañcānām jale kumbhaiḥ upāharan
pūrvāt samudrāt kalaśam jala pūrṇam atha anayat
suṣeṇaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ sarva ratna vibhūṣitam

original: 6.116.050a ṛṣabho dakṣiṇāt tūrṇaṃ samudrāj jalam āharat
analyzed: ṛṣabhaḥ dakṣiṇāt tūrṇam samudrāt jalam āharat
gavayaḥ paścimāt toyam ājahāra mahā arṇavāt
ratna kumbhena mahatā śītam māruta vikramaḥ
uttarāt ca jalam śīghram garuḍa anila vikramaḥ
abhiṣekāya rāmasya śatrughnaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
purohitāya śreṣṭhāya suhṛdbhyaḥ ca nyavedayat

original: 6.116.054a tataḥ sa prayato vṛddho vasiṣṭho brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas sa prayataḥ vṛddhaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
rāmam pīṭhe saha sītam nyaveśayat

original: 6.116.055a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca jābāliḥ atha kāśyapaḥ

original: 6.116.055c kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaś ca gautamo vijayas tathā
analyzed: kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaḥ ca gautamaḥ vijayaḥ tathā
abhyaṣiñcat nara vyāghram prasannena sugandhinā
salilena sahasra akṣam vasavaḥ vāsavam yathā

original: 6.116.057a ṛtvigbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvaṃ kanyābhir mantribhis tathā
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvam kanyābhiḥ mantribhiḥ tathā
yodhaiḥ ca eva abhyaṣiñcan te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ sa naigamaiḥ
sarva oṣadhi rasaiḥ ca api daivataiḥ nabhasi sthitaiḥ

original: 6.116.058c caturhir lokapālaiś ca sarvair devaiś ca saṃgataiḥ
analyzed: caturhiḥ lokapālaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ devaiḥ ca saṃgataiḥ

original: 6.116.059a chatraṃ tasya ca jagrāha śatrughnaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ śubham
analyzed: chatram tasya ca jagrāha śatrughnaḥ pāṇḍuram śubham
śvetam ca vāla vyajanam sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ
aparam candra saṃkāśam rākṣasa indraḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
mālām jvalantīm vapuṣā kāñcanīm śata puṣkarām
rāghavāya dadau vāyuḥ vāsavena pracoditaḥ
sarva ratna samāyuktam maṇi ratna vibhūṣitam
muktā hāram narendrāya dadau śakra pracoditaḥ
prajaguḥ deva gandharvāḥ nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: 6.116.062c abhiṣeke tad arhasya tadā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: abhiṣeke tat arhasya tadā rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 6.116.063a bhūmiḥ sasyavatī caiva phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ
analyzed: bhūmiḥ sasyavatī ca eva phalavantaḥ ca pādapāḥ
gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi babhūvuḥ rāghava utsave

original: 6.116.064a sahasraśatam aśvānāṃ dhenūnāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā
analyzed: sahasra śatam aśvānām dhenūnām ca gavām tathā

original: 6.116.064c dadau śataṃ vṛṣān pūrvaṃ dvijebhyo manujarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: dadau śatam vṛṣān pūrvam dvijebhyaḥ manuja ṛṣabhaḥ
triṃśat koṭīḥ hiraṇyasya brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadau punar
nānā ābharaṇa vastrāṇi mahārhāṇi ca rāghavaḥ
arka raśmi pratīkāśām kāñcanīm maṇi vigrahām
sugrīvāya srajam divyām prāyacchat manuja ṛṣabhaḥ
vaidūrya maṇi citre ca vajra ratna vibhūṣite
vāli putrāya dhṛtimān aṅgadāya aṅgade dadau
maṇi pravara juṣṭam ca muktā hāram anuttamam
sītāyai pradadau rāmaḥ candra raśmi sama prabham

original: 6.116.069a araje vāsasī divye śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: araje vāsasī divye śubhāni ābharaṇāni ca
avekṣamāṇā vaidehī pradadau vāyusūnave
avamucya ātmanaḥ kaṇṭhāt dhāram janakanandinī

original: 6.116.070c avaikṣata harīn sarvān bhartāraṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: avaikṣata harīn sarvān bhartāram ca muhur muhur
tām iṅgita jñaḥ saṃprekṣya babhāṣe janakātmajām

original: 6.116.071c pradehi subhage hāraṃ yasya tuṣṭāsi bhāmini
analyzed: pradehi subhage hāram yasya tuṣṭā asi bhāmini

original: 6.116.072a pauruṣaṃ vikramo buddhir yasminn etāni nityadā
analyzed: pauruṣam vikramaḥ buddhiḥ yasmin etāni nityadā

original: 6.116.072c dadau sā vāyuputrāya taṃ hāram asitekṣaṇā
analyzed: dadau sā vāyuputrāya tam hāram asita īkṣaṇā
hanūmān tena hāreṇa śuśubhe vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
candra aṃśu caya gaureṇa śveta abhreṇa yathā acalaḥ

original: 6.116.074a tato dvivida maindābhyāṃ nīlāya ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: tatas dvivida maindābhyām nīlāya ca paraṃtapaḥ
sarvān kāma guṇān vīkṣya pradadau vasudhādhipaḥ
sarva vānara vṛddhāḥ ca ye ca anye vānara īśvarāḥ
vāsobhiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca eva yathārham pratipūjitāḥ

original: 6.116.076a yathārhaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve kāmai ratnaiś ca puṣkalair
analyzed: yathārham pūjitāḥ sarve kāmaiḥ ratnaiḥ ca puṣkalaiḥ
prahṛṣṭa manasaḥ sarve jagmuḥ eva yathāgatam
rāghavaḥ parama udāraḥ śaśāsa parayā mudā
uvāca lakṣmaṇam rāmaḥ dharma jñam dharma vatsalaḥ
ātiṣṭha dharma jña mayā saha imām
gām pūrva rāja adhyuṣitām balena

original: 6.116.078c tulyaṃ mayā tvaṃ pitṛbhir dhṛtā yā;
analyzed: tulyam mayā tvam pitṛbhiḥ dhṛtā yā
tām yauvarājye dhuram udvahasva
sarva ātmanā paryanunīyamānaḥ
yadā na saumitriḥ upaiti yogam
niyujyamānaḥ bhuvi yauvarājye
tatas bhyaṣiñcat bharatam mahātmā

original: 6.116.080a rāghavaś cāpi dharmātmā prāpya rājyam anuttamam
analyzed: rāghavaḥ ca api dharma ātmā prāpya rājyam anuttamam
īje bahuvidhaiḥ yajñaiḥ sa suhṛd bhrātṛ bāndhavaḥ
pauṇḍarīka aśvamedhābhyām vājapeyena ca asakṛt

original: 6.116.081c anyaiś ca vividhair yajñair ayajat pārthivarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ yajñaiḥ ayajat pārthiva ṛṣabhaḥ
rājyam daśa sahasrāṇi prāpya varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ
śata aśvamedhān ājahre sat aśvān bhūri dakṣiṇān
ājānu lambi bāhuḥ ca mahā skandhaḥ pratāpavān
lakṣmaṇa anucaraḥ rāmaḥ pṛthivīm anvapālayat

original: 6.116.084a na paryadevan vidhavā na ca vyālakṛtaṃ bhayam
analyzed: na paryadevan vidhavāḥ na ca vyāla kṛtam bhayam

original: 6.116.084c na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
analyzed: na vyādhi jam bhayam vā api rāme rājyam praśāsati

original: 6.116.085a nirdasyur abhaval loko nānarthaḥ kaṃ cid aspṛśat
analyzed: nirdasyuḥ abhavat lokaḥ na anarthaḥ kam cit aspṛśat

original: 6.116.085c na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate
analyzed: na ca sma vṛddhāḥ bālānām pretakāryāṇi kurvate
sarvam muditam eva āsīt sarvaḥ dharma paraḥ bhavat
rāmam eva anupaśyantaḥ na abhyahiṃsan parasparam
āsan varṣa sahasrāṇi tathā putra sahasriṇaḥ

original: 6.116.087c nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
analyzed: nirāmayāḥ viśokāḥ ca rāme rājyam praśāsati
nitya puṣpāḥ nitya phalāḥ taravaḥ skandha vistṛtāḥ

original: 6.116.088c kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukhasparśaś ca mārutaḥ
analyzed: kāla varṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukha sparśaḥ ca mārutaḥ

original: 6.116.089a svakarmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svair eva karmabhiḥ
analyzed: sva karmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svaiḥ eva karmabhiḥ

original: 6.116.089c āsan prajā dharmaparā rāme śāsati nānṛtāḥ
analyzed: āsan prajāḥ dharma parāḥ rāme śāsati na anṛtāḥ
sarve lakṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ sarve dharma parāyaṇāḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi rāmaḥ rājyam akārayat
